Taqbaylit d tutlayt am tutlayin-nniḍen.
Yiwen n wass, tikerrusin merra ad fsint.
Ḥemmleɣ ad aruɣ iḍrisen s tutlayt-inu.
Ma yella ur d-nedhi ara yid-neɣ, yiwen, deg-neɣ ur d-idehhu.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-aɣ lebɣi meqqren.
Mlet timucuha i warrac; semlilet amɣar d umeẓẓyan, d taqbaylit ara yafen iman-is.
Zik qqaren: "Win iḥemmlen tamaziɣt, yissin tira-s". Tura qqareɣ-as:"Win iḥemmlen tamaziɣt yeldi ablug".
Ibalmuden ḥemmlen nezzeh tutlayt-nsen.
Win iteddun ɣef tidet, yessawaḍ.
Tilelli n umeslay, ur ilaq ara ad teqqim d awal kan.
Zik, lkanun d aɣerbaz ma d timucuha d timsirin.
Win yettakken azal i tutlayt-is, ccan-is d win meqqren.
Acu n tmara i t-yerran mi yettgalla iḥennet.
Ulac am warrac, i ten-iceɣben ala turart.
Mi nella mecṭuḥit nettḥar ad nimɣur, tura mi meqqrit, neqqar-as amer neḥsi akka.
Tayri tecbeḥ am ujeǧǧig n tefsut.
Tilemẓit, i tt-iceɣben d tayri.
Imru yettaru ayen yettxemmim wallaɣ.
Yuzzel, yengef, yesgunfa.
A wi yerran tudert akk d turart.
Aru ay imru ad d-nesnulfu asefru.
D tazmert n tzemmurt i ak-nessaram.
Aha kan, awi-d tafyirt igerrzen seg uqerruy-ik.
Segmi yeffeɣ ur d-yuɣal s axxam, amzun d tuffɣa n yiberriq; tuffɣa tella, tuɣalin ulac.
Akka i d netta , yugi ad ibeddel.
Iyyaw ad nurar, ma tebɣam, ulli d wakraren.
Lliɣ ttmuquleɣ tafunast yettarran deg liffeẓ.
Tugem-d s uyeddid deg tala n taddart.
Seg Ubawal i d-nezdem isɣaren.
Ass-agi d asemmiḍ, yewwet udfel almi i tt-isemlal.
Yebberdeɛ aɣyul, yerra-as acwari, iruḥ srid ɣer ssuq n Tezmalt.
Yeẓẓeg-d taɣaḍt, yeččur-d agdur n uyefki i yerra d abuglu s snat n tmiqwa n liqa n uqurḍaɛ
Mi yeffeɣ ad ikes lmal-is, yuwi yid-s tajewwaqt-is.
Iruḥ ad yandi tixeftin-is i umergu.
Sexsi tafat n teftilt mi ara tɛeddiḍ ad teṭṭseḍ.
Tuker-it lqaɛa meskin.
Yugi ad yamen ayen ttwalint wallen-is.
Yegull ur yessusem.
Ayen yexdem mačči akken.
Ul-is, yeldi-t akk i medden.
Yenna: “Anda i iyi-tella ad tt-awḍeɣ”.
Yeskikiḍ-it amzun d tteryel.
Muḥend akka i d netta, yettnadi dima ad yegzu timsal akken i iwata.
Yezdel deg uxxam, ur d-iteffeɣ ara akk.
Tixsi-ihin tabaṭuct, ɣur-s tayuga n tselmemma ttaglent-d seg umgerḍ-is.
Yefka afus deg wayetma-s.
Ayen turiḍ ad d-yeqqim, ayen d-tenniḍ yuwi-t waḍu.
Menyif yiwet n tɣawsa sɛiɣ-tt wala snat ad tent-sɛuɣ.
Mi as-rriɣ iwnes ussid i uselkim-inu, sliɣ i kra n tezlatin n yicennayen n teqbaylit.
Uwiɣ afenǧal n lqahwa s imi-w, jeɣmeɣ tiqqit n lqahwa.
Arrac n ddunit merra, ḥemmlen turart n ddabax n uḍar.
Seg wakken isel akken i ilaq, yettaki i nnda mi ara tekkat.
Mi ara yili usefru d win yesseḥzanen, mi ara t-yettaru yimru amzun yettru.
Ddabax n uḍar iga d amubrin.
Ameqqran n uɛebbuḍ, yettaddam aḥric azuran.
Seksu, mi t-ččiɣ d amerɣan, ɣef waya i swiɣ aṭas n waman.
Lṭufan mazal-it ur yeɛtiq ara, d aleqqaq.
Aqcic i ssneɣ d amellḥan yerna d uḥdiq i tenna Zehwa tanubit.
Bnin uɣrum aquran s zzit n uzemmur.
Tura ad uɣaleɣ ɣer teftist ad am-tent-id-awiɣ tsebbaḍin-nni inem i tent-teǧǧiḍ din.
Iḍelli yusa-n Yidir ɣer ssuq ur k-in-yufi ara.
Ur asent-ten-id-yuɣ ara idlisen-nni i yessi-s.
Qqim din ad ak-tent-in-awiɣ.
Ur d-yusi, ur d-iceyyeɛ.
Yeqqim-asen d tiẓẓit deg taɣect.
Ad fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem, yazen ssber i yimawlan-is.
Amulli ameggaz, talwit d teɣzi n tudert, tayri d waṭas n tezmert.
A wi yufan yiwen d nekk wayeḍ am nekk.
Amek i tent-tufamt mi akken i tedlamt fell-asent?
Ddum ɣer sdat, tuɣalin ɣer deffir ulac.
D yemma-s ihedder yal iḍ, s wallen amzun yeqqar-as: “Acimi a yemma i iyi-d-tesɛiḍ?”
Ur n-ttaseɣ ara, dagi ara kemmleɣ ussan-iw.
Efk-iyi-d ad ččeɣ aqerruy-im ad m-in-fkeɣ lgelba n temẓin i yenna yizem i teɣyult.
Amcic d amakur, aydi d uqbiḥ, azrem d axeddaɛ, azger d asebri, tixsi d tamaggadt, tasekkurt d tahuskayt, inisi d amuḥric, uccen d bu txidas…
Mačči d lǧennet ur bɣiɣ anda llan warrac i yenna uɣyul meskin.
Ilemẓiyen msakit ḍaɛen, teddun ur iban sani, ass d yiḍ nutni ẓeṭṭlen.
Ma mazal tella tudert, yella usirem.
Tiɣimit urǧin tenɣa yiwen.
Tabrat, asmi ara m-tt-in-azneɣ, ttḥareɣ ad d-ṭṭfeɣ tiririt-im.
Yal anebdu, deg yimuras, nrezzu ɣer teftist n Awqas anda i neccucuf alma neɛya.
Ad k-yeg Rebbi d tixsi n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad as-yerfed tamaẓẓagt-is.
Imdanen deg Facebook ur ḥmmilen ara ad ɣren iwenniten, iḍrisen; ḥemmlen kan ad walin tugniwin, tiwlafin, ladɣa ma d tid n teqcicin.
Yewwet-it ur t-yezgil.
Netta yekkat abendayer, ma d ameddakel-is d lɣiṭa.
Wwet azrem s aqerruy ad ferẓent temsal.
Iwwet deg-i, wissen acimi.
Yewwet-it Rebbi, ar tura ur yessin leslaḥ-is.
Yewwet-it waḍu, yettusu, yeṭṭef ussu.
Tewwet tɛedda amzun ur iyi-d-twala ara akk.
Yekkat udfel deg tqucac n yidurar n tmurt n Leqbayel.
Yekkat tiryalin, lǧib-is dima yeččur.
Wwten tasɣart, nekk ur d-ffiɣeɣ.
Yekkat uzzal, anẓad n ukukru ur t-yesɛi.
Tewwet lkimya deg nneɛma-s mi ifukk aserwet.
Tewwet-it nneqra userdun ameɣbun.
Kkaten tijɛal, wigi nessen anwi-ten.
Ad iwwet akken ad t-id-isellek.
Iwwet afus-is ɣer lǧib-is, ixelles tibyirin neswa.
Tewwet-as tisegnit deg taɣma-s.
Ad tewwet agejdur mi ara tsel s tmettant n urgaz-is.
Yewwet-itt d ibeddi seg Bgayet ɣer Tezmalt.
Tekkat aqlaqel deg tgessart tserdunt teqqes taggent.
Akken yebɣu yili wugur ɣur-s tifrat.
Wejlala yebɣa ad d-heddren fell-as medden, dɣa yekker yeḍreg tala.
Yufa-tt ur inuda fell-as.
Iteddu yettemderkal, yewwet-itt-id almi ur yeɛqil abrid.
Blajuṭ yeẓẓa tanqelt, imir-nni kan yettraju-tt ad as-d-tfek tibexsisin.
Itezzem deg-s am uwtul aɛezzuni.
Yejɣem kan tijeqqimt n lqahwa ldint-d wallen-is.
Yeffeɣ i ubrid, sswab ɣur-s akk ulac.
Yegull ad yeddu alma yuweḍ.
Llant kra n tuttriwin ulac ɣur-sent tiririt.
Yerfed imru, yebda yettaru tabrat i tmeddakelt-is.
Yenna-as: “ A wi yufan ilel (lebḥer) d iɣi ma d igenni d tameḍluɛt.
Berka ur ttxemmim ara, ayen yuran ad iɛeddi.
Ddunit ara d-neǧǧ i warraw-nneɣ ur tessefraḥ.
Uggadeɣ tutlayt-iw ad taɣ abrid n nnger ma tkemmel akka.
Ass-a d tafaska,rziɣ ɣer uletma tamaẓuẓt, ɣufreɣ-tt-id.
Nennuɣ d waɣzen deg ttrad-nni; ncrew-itt merriɣet.
Yeffer deg umruj almi tefra; tura yuɣal d aqemqum.
Yeqqim nnig ubrid yettraju melmi ara d-yaweḍ.
Yuweḍ almi d imi n tala, yuɣal-d akken ur d-yeswi.
Nennum nettakk azal i wayen ur neswi.
Tal tanezzayt, ibalmuden ttruḥun s aɣerbaz.
Aɛebbuḍ n Tawes icekkeḍ, ur tettɛeṭṭil ara ad d-terbu.
Yerjem umeksa tizamarin-is s temriwin akken ad d-uɣalent.
Akka i yenna wuccen ɣef tyuzaḍ mi ur yessaweḍ ara ad yekcem s akantu-nsent: “ Akka wala ad ṭṭsent”, netta yessenhaz war aḥbas tabeḥlust-is yesɛedda ddaw lmecbuk
Zik seg tala i d-ttagment tlawin aman.
Icennu tizlatin n wiyaḍ imi ur yezmir ara ad d-yesnulfu.
Addad n tegnawt ibeddel, deg tlemmast n unebdu ḥemlen-d yisaffen.
Amzun deg tillas i nteddu, ur neẓri anda i neggar aḍar.
Amzun deg waluḍ i nteddu, aḍar i d-yekksen wayeḍ ad yewḥel.
Ttwalin s yir tiṭ tamaziɣt yeggaren isurifen imeqqranen ɣer sdat.
Kra n yimdanen ittɣad-iten lḥal mi tteqfalen abrid wiyaḍ, dɣa ula d nutni qeflen-t...
Nekkni s Leqbayel, neḥmmel ad nezger asif anda akken i yexjeḍ.
Almi d tura i faqeɣ amek i teddunt kra n temsal yerzan tira n tefyar.
Yemma teẓḍa-iyi sin n yibernyas.
Yemma meskint terwa lemḥani.
Kulfeɣ-as Rebbi i lmut yuwin yemma.
Enrhumé, il tousse; il est alité.
Yettru uqcic, yugi ad yessusem mi as-rẓen alelluc-is.
Aqbayli, tuwi-d fell-as ad yeɛqel iman-is ma ur yebɣi ara ad yefsi am teḥjurt n ssekker daxel lqahwa taberkant.
Ssentaɣ tisegnit deg ddjaj, win i d-ineṭqen yebɣa zzwaj.
Ssentaɣ tisegnit deg ssqef, win i d-ineṭqen ad isselqef.
Deg tegrest, ssaɣayen times deg lkanun akken ad ẓẓiẓnen.
Teddem ayeddid, teffeɣ ɣer tala ad d-tagem.
Yetturar uqcic ur iɛeyyu.
Tiqcicin ḥemmlent ad urarent ilqafen.
Tiɛleǧtin i teqcicin ma d ddabax i warrac.
Aqedduḥ n yimensi d yiwet n turart n yigerdan.
Mi d-yeswa, iteddu yettemderkal, d abrid ur t-yeɛqil.
Iḍarren-is bezzaf i gman, leɛmer i lsin asebbaḍ.
Ameqqran nettqadar-it, nessawal-as Dadda.
Icab uqerruy-is amzu d tawḍuft.
Iḍelli i d-yuɣ baba seg ssuq izimer n tfaska n lɛid.
Ṭawes yuɣ-itt Yidir ilindi.
Waqila yuɣ-itent akken i ilaq deg leɛqel.
Walaɣ-t mi i yuɣ abrid-is.
Tazemmurt-nni akken i ẓẓiɣ tuɣ.
Yuɣ lḥenni i tewwet i yifassen-is.
Tamɣart twala kan lṭufan-nni amelḥan tekker tuɣ-it s tiṭ.
Arrac n tura ur ttaɣen ara awal i yimeqqranen.
Mel-iyi-d d acu i k-yuɣen mi tugiḍ akka ad d-tutlayeḍ.
Lliɣ yid-s imalas yezrin, ur t-yuɣ wara.
Tazɣelt n tfekka-s tɛedda ukkuẓet tmerwin (40) n tfesniwin mi t-tuɣ tawla.
Yuɣ tannumi, sya i yettɛedday.
Isem n ucennay-nni yuɣ-d akk timura.
Adfel yuɣ-d akk tiɣaltin.
Yuɣ lḥal akka i d kečč, tugiḍ ad tbeddleḍ.
Tuɣ tmes akken i iwata mi yerna isɣaren i lkanun.
Yessazzel-d idammen-is mi i t-ifeddex s temri.
Yessazzel-d idammen-is mi i t-ifeddex s temri
Ẓwwer taruḍ-d kra n tefyar igerrzen.
Ḥemmleɣ ad d-mleɣ timucuha i yigerdan
Tawacult taqbaylit tettezzi-d i lkanun akken ad teẓẓiẓen, diɣen ad tsel i tmucuha.
Yenta-iyi yisef gar yiccer d uksum.
Yura tabrat ɣezzifen i yemma-s.
Yerfed allen-is d yifassen-is s igenni yedɛa.
Mi yeɛya yeqqim fell-as ad yesgunfu.
Deg unrar n tɣiwant i nurar ddabax n uḍar iḍelli.
Am win yefuden yeswa, akka i teḍra yid-i.
Uggadaɣ ad nuɣal d ayen ur nelli ma tkemmel akkagi.
Ad asent-yaru tibratin mi ara yewɛu.
Yura-asent tibratin iḍelli mi yestufa.
Inuda fell-asent, ur tent-yufi ara ar tura.
Deggren asirem-iw, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
Abrid ɣezzif, kkrem ad nebdu tikli ma tebɣam ad naweḍ.
A Rabaḥ! Zzi-d udem-k ad nerbeḥ.
Yugi wul ad yennecraḥ mi yugi yimi-m ad d-yecmumeḥ.
Zdiɣ d uɣilif, yettawi yid-i asurif.
Ayɣer i tegneḍ almi d azal?
I wacu-t tura wagi ?
Acimi akka tura tugiḍ ad tbeddleḍ?
Iwumi akka i tuwiḍ tarzeft?
Ddu ɣer sdat ur ttaggad!
Ay Aqbayli ur ttakk ara lwi, ur ɣeffel ara, aki.
Nniɣ-ak abrid i d-tuwiḍ akka ur yelhi.
La ak-d-qqareɣ, kker-d zik azekka.
Iwwet-it s lbunya s anzaren iffunzer-d.
Heddreɣ-as ɣellin-as.
Ccɣel-ik ala asbelɛeṭ.
Wissen melmi ara d-teldiḍ allen-ik?
Tenwiḍ ad d-tafeḍ kullec ihegga?
Zewwaɣet, melliḥet, tettiqi seg sser.
Urǧin yewwet-d udfel deg unebdu.
Mačči d asemmiḍ ass-a.
Warɛad yeffiɣ, winna ikcem-d.
Ulansi ara tekkeḍ, iberdan gezmen.
Yudan uyaziḍ, yefrari wass.
Kecmeɣ miḥlal mi nurar tuqemca tuffra.
Timesqaqart d yiwet n turart i ḥemmlen aṭas yigerdan.
Lufan temẓi tessen, lufan temɣer tezmer.
Tafunast n yigujilen tenza temmzel, aglim-is lsan-t d icifaḍ.
Ma yella nekk ttwaḥebseɣ, tikta-inu berra ttcalint.
Anef-as akken, ur t-ttmasi ara.
Yettru uqcic d amecṭuḥ, imeṭṭawen-is d tiregwa.
Imarawen-nneɣ ur xememmen ara fell-aneɣ.
Aḍris-a ɣezzif, ɣur-s nnig n semmuset n tseddarin.
Yuweḍ-d lawan n yiḍes, Maziɣ yekcem s ussu.
Anadaf ileddi-d tawwurt n uɣerbaz, inelmaden keččmen s abraḥ.
Iwudam n tmucuha-nneɣ d waɣzen d tteryel.
Fukken wussan n yimuras, inelmaden uɣalen s aɣerbaz.
Hder cwiṭ, fhem aṭas.
Azwel n ungal amezwru yura umaru Ɛmar Mezdad d « Iḍ d wass ».
Deg uɣmis “Liberté” nezmer ad naf timsirin n tjerrumt n tmaziɣt.
Tafekka n uzrem tettakk anzi ɣer ujeɛbub.
Tadawsa yelhan tessutur-d yal ass uɣus yelhan.
Tafyirt tbeddu dima s usekkil ameqqran, tettfakka s wagaz.
Yeḍfer amrar almi d tagust.
Jeḥḥa, asmi yessenz axxam-is, yeǧǧa i yiman-is yiwet n tagust.
Llant wid yesluɣuyen timedwin.
Win iɛeddan yewwet-it.
Cfu, ḥader ad tettuḍ ɣef wayen iɛeddan fell-ak.
Deg unebdu-a, teḍra-d yiwet n tfaska tadelsant tameqqrant deg At Mlikec.
Yettkel ɣef yiman-is.
Ass-agi yuɣal d argaz.
Yeṭllay kan ɣer yiman-s.
Yif-it lḥif.
Yessusem, yebra i wallen-is.
Zdi lqedd-ik!
Ffeɣ ɣer berra!
Qqim fell-ak!
Ɛeffeṭ!
Akli, ur yettayal ara deg yiman-is.
Yunag seg zik ɣer tmurt n Fransa.
Zik Leqbayel ttinigen ɣer Fransa ma d tura ɣer Kanada neɣ ɣer Marikan.
Iminigen ttuɣalen-d yal aseggas ɣer tmurt.
Sliman Azem yecna aṭas ɣef yinig.
Seg wasmi yeffeɣ tamurt, ccix Lḥesnawi ur d-yuɣal.
Ur walaɣ ara anda yeffeɣ tanezzayt-a.
Taqbaylit-iw, ṭṭḍeɣ-tt-id ɣer yemma.
Zik, deg ssuq i ttemyakken yimdanen ttiɛad (asihar).
Ttemlilin n medden deg ssuq.
Kra n tɣawsa yellan, ad tt-tafeḍ deg ssuq.
Yal imalas, ass n ssuq yettuɣal-d.
Deg tallit n Nnisan i ssefruruxen yizerman.
Seg wakken yefud, yeswa snat n lyitrat n waman ɣef yiwen n ujeqqim.
Deg Lezzayer, anda teddiḍ d araju.
Anamek n wawal « Amaziɣ » d « Argaz ilelli ».
Ur ɛeffset ara tamusayt.
Inuda fell-asent ur tent-yufi.
Kra yekka yiḍ d lgerra tekkat.
Tiqucac n yidurar mellulit seg udfel.
Ijdi n tneẓruft iteddu-d ur iḥebbes.
Meskin, yettagad tili-s.
Ayen i txedmeḍ ad t-tafeḍ.
Nxeddem ayen iwimi nezmer.
Yeqqur uqerruy-is.
Yettsetḥi meskin.
Yettaɣ awal kan i yiman-is.
Berka!
Akken i ilaq ad yili.
Yenwa akka i teddunt temsal.
Anwa ara d-irefden aḍad-is ?
Ar tura ur tefhim tigert.
Anwa seg-wen ara d-yalin ɣer tfelwit ?
Yeqqim fell-as yettraju ad d-awḍen.
Kra yekka yiḍ ur qmiceɣ tiṭ-iw.
Aṭas aya i ibeddel tamurt.
Bezzaf yeɛya, dɣa yebra i kullec.
Iseṭṭel acekkuḥ-is.
S waman d ssabun i yessared udem-is.
Tal tikkelt ara iɛeddi ad yečč yessirid ifassen-is.
Yettimɣur yettcab.
Arrac ur rewwun turart.
Icennu s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is.
Yedda ɣef wayyur n tziri.
Yezɣeb uglim-is.
Ikemmez aqerruy-is.
Yeṭall-it srid ɣer wallen.
Tnawel-d imensi.
Tenced-d akk timeddukal-is deg usfugel n tissulya-s.
Kkret ad nruḥ, ulac d acu n ccɣel i nesɛa dagi.
Yeswa kan lqahwa-s n tnezzayt iruḥ ad yexdem.
Neḥsa d akken deg Turuft, d tilawin yenḥafen i yellan s waṭas.
Raju-iyi ɣef tis 12 akken ad nečč akken.
Yeqqim akken cwiṭ iman-is tama ufella n tḥeddanin.
Ahat yesɛa s wacu ara yesserwel aɣersiw-nni.
Iḥar ad inaɣ diɣen.
Akka tura, ur d-yettban ara ad yexdem kra.
Ddunit tettezder cwiṭ cwiṭ deg tiselbi.
Ahya Leqbayel, kecmet ɣer ublug-a teɣrem taqbaylit.
Ad naru tifyar s teqbaylit.
Taɣuri d tira s teqbaylit uɣalen d aɣan fell-aneɣ.
Ḥemmleɣ ad ččareɣ tafelwit n tneɣrit s tira taqbaylit.
Nekk d teqbaylit-iw nemyeḥmmal seg zik.
Rebbi yefka-iyi-d d Aqbayli, maɛna bɣan ad iyi-rren d wayeḍ.
Ma yella ur d-tecɣileḍ ara d yiman-ik, yiwen ur d-iceɣɣel yid-k.
Tifyar-iw s teqbaylit, suqqleɣ-tent ɣer tutlayt n tefransist.
Aṭas n wungalen i d-iteffɣen s tutlayt taqbaylit.
Uriɣ nnig n wagim n yisefra.
Asentel iɣef tettezzi tmedyezt-iw d tilelli n umeslay.
Asefru ɣur-s talɣa iman-is.
Tira d assesfer (ddwa)
Tizlit d asefru, ternuḍ-as aẓawan.
Azegḍuf d yiwen n yimɣi iteqsen.
Am unhil yeffren aqerruy-is deg yijdi.
Am win yettakken tifaf i ulɣem.
Ulac amekdi n umdan am uydi-ines
Yenna umedyaz : «D imcac i ḥemmleɣ ɣef yiḍan acku imcac ur xeddmen ara d lɛesker».
Tullist taneggarut i uriɣ aṭas i tt-yeɣran.
Tutlayt taqbaylit tuklal ad tuɣal am tid i d-yufraren deg umaḍal.
Ma ireggem-d kra ixeddem-it.

Tafsut tif akk tisemhay-nniḍen

Yuɣ-d taculliḍt n uyefki.

Rewlen ɣef tmurt-nsen i ten-yeǧǧan i llaẓ.
Ilemẓiyen n tmurt n Leqbayen ɛebban-asen i yimariren n terbaɛt n Lezzayer semmus ɣer yilem deg temlilit taneggarut i d-yeḍran deg tlemmast n Lezzayer.

Yenna-as : « Nekk ad zbuɣ ma d kečč ad taruḍ. »

Ldim tiwwura n tfergacin, tilelli ad asen-d-tuɣal i yifrax.
Wissen amek ara yili uzekka?
Anelmad-a deg wakken d igellil ur yesɛi ara idrimen s wacu ara d-yaɣ idlisen-is.
Mi tesla m yiɣiɣden izeggen yiḍ, truḥ imir-nni kan.
Wagi d yiwen n umedya n tsuqqilt-is.
Ɣas ma tewwet lgerra iḍ-nni yezrin, gneɣ akken i ilaq.
Tasɣimt-a terna akken i iwata ɣef uselkim.
Kra tekka tmeddit ur d-yeldi imi-s.
Nesra kra n wumlan ɣef teɣremt.
tuwi-d ɣef uwanek ad yili d allal n uɣref.
Aseggas i d-iteddun ad nerzef ɣer Rome.
Mačči d ayen akken i tenwiḍ i d-iḍerrun.
Rebbi yuɣal ur yezmir ara meskin i yiman-is, cwi kan tura kkren-d wid i d-itekkin fell-as.
Yiwet n tikkelt i tettɛedday ɣef wuccen.
Tidet tettifrir-d am zzit ɣef waman.
Tidet am yiṭij, win i tt-iqerben aṭas ad ireɣ.
Igenni skudmal yettibrik, cwiṭ akka ad d-ɣlin yibunda n lgerra.
Iteddu iḍarren ḥafi ɣef yijdi n teftist.
Ur d-yesmuzgut ara, ixeddem ayen i as-d-yenna uqerruy-is.
Ur yeẓri ara anda i iteddu acku ur yeẓri ara ansa i d-yekka.
Win ur nessinen ara ansa i d-yekka ur yettissin ara anda i iteddu.
Aɛeddi seg tillas ɣer tafat din din.
Afrux d amezwaru i d-iɛezlen iman-is seg terbaɛt.
Terra-ten tmara ad mmeslayen i Boule de Suif.
Tilelli ur tesliḥ; ḥaca ma tessxedmeḍ-tt.
Ɣur-i yiwet n tmeddakelt yettidiren deg Kyito.
Sɛiɣ yiwen n umeddakel yettidiren deg Kyoto.
Nesmuzget i temsirt-is deg rradyu.
Tessenked-iyi i uletma-s.
Anfem-iyi ad arguɣ.
Ad ak-tt-in-awiɣ azekka ma tebɣiḍ.
Ur asent-yefki ara ayen i as-d-ssutrent.
Ahya Leqbayel ! Rezfem s ablug-a teɣrem taqbaylit.
Yiwet n tlemẓit tuker leḥwal n teslit, dɣa Rebbi yerra-t d timerqemt.
Menyif tameṭṭut iḥerzen wala tayuga ikerzen.
Yenna-asen akk ayen yettxemmim fell-asen.
Ayen tebɣum tinim-t-id, ma d nekk ṭṭfeɣ deg wawal i fkiɣ.
Nekk ur tt-ḥmmileɣ, nettat tettarra iman-is tḥemmel-iyi.
I umɣar i yennan i tmeṭṭut-is: « Xtir, ad temmteḍ neɣ ad ǧǧleɣ ».
Lxir n uɣyul meqqer imi d netta i yebnan acḥal d taddart deg tmurt n Leqbayel.
Amcic yerɣan s waman yeḥman yettaggad aman isemmaden.
Tɣaḍ-iyi teqbaylit meskint, imi seg zik tettwaḥqar.
Taqbaylit tettkel ɣef warraw-is yettxemmimen dima fell-as.
Deg tmendawt n Zzayer, tamaziɣt ur tt-id-isaḥ ara wayen tuklal.
Ulac d acu i yekreh Umaziɣ am tmuḥeqranit.
Tom yeskker times.
Llan sin neɣ kraḍ n yimra ɣef tnarit.
Yexdem s leɛtab akken ad iliwi tawacult-is.
Iḍelli tameddit ur iyi-teɛǧib ara tuffɣa, ihi qqimeɣ deg uxxam walaɣ yiwen n usaru.
Aha kan ma tzemreḍ !
Tabrat i as-yuzen ɣezzifet.
Ččar ul-ik d tayri tebḍuḍ-tt ɣef medden.
Ffeɣ ɣer berra ad timɣureḍ.
Ula d aferṭeṭṭu icebḥen, yella d tawekkiwt.
Yeswa lqahwa-is mi d-yekker seg yiḍes.
Akka i d-nnan wid iɛeddan.
Tekki ɣef wassaɣ azegzaw akken ad tkecmeḍ s ablug-iw « aghucaf ».
Yegzem yid-s akk assaɣen i t-yeqqnen ɣur-s.
Yegguma ad d-yuɣal anda akken i yedder tudert n zzelṭ.
Tafat iɣef yettnadi, urǧin i tt-yufi ar ass-a.
Tasenselkimt d yiwet n tussna yeggaren isurifen imeqqranen.
Ma yella kečč tugiḍ-iyi, amek i tebɣiḍ nekk ad k-qebleɣ.
Ma yella tugiḍ ad iyi-tqebleḍ akken lliɣ, ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara nidir akken.
Ssber ɣur-s tilisa, ihi fhem iman-ik.
Gma n tmara i iyi-ittun, yeswa-d seg waman n wanu n Zemzem.
Amzun ttnadin ad neg asaḍuf-nni i d-yeqqaren: « Tiṭ s tiṭ, ugel s wugel ».
D imir n usgunfu, inelmaden tturaren deg ubaraz n uɣerbaz-nsen.
Mi yendeh unayna, inelmaden ffɣen-d s abaraz ad ččen tanalt-nsen.
Inelmaden lqbayliyen ttafen iman-nsen mi ara tili temsirt s tutlayt taqbaylit.
Almi d tura i bdan ttfaqen s tmagit-nsen.
Ala aɣyul i inekren lasel-is.
Aql-i ttxemmimeɣ d acu ara xedmeɣ.
Asentel n tuget n yisefra-inu itezzi ɣef tnagmit tamagant.
Aql-iken tettwaɛerḍem ɣer tmeɣra n tissulya n mmi amenzu.
Ačewčew azewwaɣ yennejla.
Ačewčew azewwaɣ ur t-ḥmmilen ara wayetma-s.
Nutni akk d imellalen, ala netta i d azewwaɣ.
Ttǧellibent tnelmadin s umrar deg ubaraz n uɣerbaz.
Ɣef tfelwit tamellalt, yura uselmad ddeqs n tefyar.
Tal tuttra ɣur-s tiririt.
Yenna-as: « Uqbel ad d-teldiḍ imi-im i ẓriɣ d acu ara d-tiniḍ ».
Taqbaylit d tutlayt, d yiwen seg yifurkan n useklu amaziɣ.
Amarir n ddabax n uḍar yettcuddu isebbaḍen-is.
Fkem-iyi-d tasarut n uɣrem-a!
Ttxil-wen, sɛeddim-iyi-d aɣrum.
Ma ur telliḍ ara deg Facebook, amzun ulac-ik.
Wissen ma tzemrem ad iyi-temlem abrid yettawin ɣer teɣsert?
Telha teḍsa i tezmert n umdan.
Mi ara wwen yigumma, ɣellin-d ɣef tmurt.
Tezmer tkadimit ad tefru aṭas n temsal yeqqimen ɛelqent.
Yebɣa uqcic ad yinig ɣer Kanada.
Yenwa umeɣbun, medden akk am netta.
Yessen ad yenher azlalam seg temẓit.
Ma aẓawan yedda d imeslayen n usefru, tizlit ad d-teffeɣ telha.
Ma yella nebɣa, nezmer.
Ad d-galleɣ s merra lawliya ara akken i d-teḍra.
Kečč, ur tufiḍ d acu i ak-yettruḥun.
Ḥemmlen warrac ad uraren tuqemca tuffra.
Tzeggen tqerɛet d aman.
Igzem-d afurek seg tzemmurt s tmenčart.
Iqedder isɣaren i tegrest.
Ǧǧuǧǧgen yisekla deg tsemhuyt n tefsut.
Ufiɣ-t-id yettru am lgerra umeɣbun n Rebbi.
Kra yekka wass netta d ixeddim.
Anwa ur d-nusi?
Ayɣer i tettqudureḍ?
Melmi ara n-yaweḍ?
Anda i yezdeɣ tura?
Wissen ma yesla-d i wayen i as-nniɣ?
Ur d-qqar yiwen n wawal.
Nadi kan, ad tuɣaleḍ ad t-tafeḍ.
Ussan i d-iteddun ad ruḥeɣ ɣer kanada.
Mačči akken i tenwiḍ i yella.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-rnuɣ.
Aṭas i ḥemmleɣ yemma.
Yiwen ur yufi iman-is.
Yeggra-iyi-d kan ad jebdeɣ iman-iw.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara k-d-tawi tazzla.
Mačči akken i tenwiḍ i teddunt temsal.
Ur tettarew ara tmeṭṭut-a, d tiɛiqert.
A wi yufan ad yuɣal d afrux, ad yefferfer deg yigenwan.
Yufa-tent-id ssirident udmawen-nsent s ssabun.
Yeswa kan ddwawit-is, iɛedda yeṭṭes.
Yuḍen, tuɣ-it tawla.
Aṭas aya ur myeẓren ara.
Anwa deg-wen ara yeffɣen iḍ-a ?
Ur yebɣi ara ad tt-iwali tettru.
Timseɛraq d addal n wallaɣ.
Tanalt, nreffed-itt gar yimekli d yimensi.
Imekli ntett-it mi ara izgen wass.
Imensi tetten-t seg mi ara yeɣli yiṭij.
Tiremt n tnezzayt d lqahwa.
Ssuma n pitrul tettali trennu.
Tanezzayt ssalayen akenyal; tameddit ttsubbun-t-id.
Asalay n tekbabt yettili-d s ccna n yimseɣret aɣelnaw.
Teqqur tala.
Yeɣlet uydi.
Yeɣfel umdan.
Yeḥrec wuccen, d bu txidas.
Yemger yiger n yirden deg ɣuct.
Yettnadi ad d-yerr ttar.
Yeqqim aṭas iwakken ad d-yerr ttar.
Yegull ad d-yerr ttar.
Tamsalt n tririt n ttar tecɣeb-it aṭas.
Ur d-yettuɣal alma yerra-d ttar
Yugar-iten s waṭas.
Yegguma ad yesteɛref.
Yerra iman-is ur d-yesli ara akk.
Yuweḍ ɣer lebɣi-s.
Tafellaḥt-is d tukarḍa.
Ini-iyi-d anwa i tettxalaḍeḍ, ad ak-d-iniɣ d acu-k.
Yekkat wul-is.
Yefka-d Rebbi afrux ad yafeg.
Ulac win yellan d ilelli am ufrux.
Gren afrux daxel tfergact.
Yelha ufrux deg yigenni mačči daxel n tfergact.
Yal ass sebɣareɣ amawal-iw.
Tirmit n ddunit ɣer yimɣaren meqqert.
Ilaq tal taɣawsa ad tili deg wadeg-ines.
Yettcali seg tmurt ɣer tayeḍ.
Yettmenṭar.
Iteddu ur iban sani.
Yeqqim yettewhem.
Yedduqqes.
Yerfed ifassen-is.
Yeqmec allen-is.
Iɛḍes-d.
Yegergeɛ-d.
Yeḍsa-d.
Yettru.
Yuzzel.
Yuḍen.
Yewwet-it waḍu.
Yeṭṭef-d idrimen-is.
Yeffeɣ-it leɛqel.
Yettzeɛbiḍ wakud mebla ma nuki-as.
Aṭas i tecmet.
Yuɣal d amnafeq.
Ugiɣ ad amneɣ.
Kullec yesɛa tazwara d taggara.
Ini-d tura kečč ma yelha wakka.
Yelsa ssebbaḍ-is n waddal, iruḥ ad yurar ddabax.
Timetti tebra i wazalen-is.
Timetti skudmal tettbeddil udem.
Yettbeccic-d idammen.
Yenneḥcam, yebra i wallen-is.
Allaɣ-is iluɣ.
Yettargu umedyaz, allen-is ldint.
Yeččur umedyaz d iḥulfan.
Uriɣ ma d kra n tefyar.
Tafyirt tbeddu s usekkil ameqqran, tettfakka s wagaz.
Yefud yebɣa ad isew.
Yeluẓ yebɣa ad yečč.
Kečč ɣur-k lḥeqq, ma d nekk ḍelmeɣ.
Yeldi adlis-is ad iɣer.
Yeɣra aṭas n yidlisen ilindi.
Yiwen n ugazu n tẓurin yezmer ad yewzen alma d sin ikiluten.
Rran-t d aɣerbal s rrsas.
Mi d-yeffeɣ seg yixeddim, yečča tanalt-is n tmeddit.
Lufan ad teẓreḍ acḥal i kemm-ḥemmleɣ!
Lufan ad teẓreḍ acḥal i ɛyiɣ!
Lufan ad teẓreḍ acḥal i kem-kerheɣ!
Tugem-d aman seg wanu.
Win ur d-nenṭiq yeqbel.
Eǧǧ-it ad yidir akken yebɣa.
Ayen xeddmen d nekkni i t-yettxellisen.
Rajumt ihi, ad awent-d-teɣli tbexsist s imi.
Iruḥ akk deg-sent meskin.
Yekker zik ad d-yelwi iniɣman.
Yeddem acacfal, yeffeɣ ad d-yekkes akermus.
Wissen melmi ara yeẓẓed uzemmur-nni?
Iḥmel-s wasif, yuwi-d izeɣran.
Yeẓẓizin mi t-yeqreḥ fuccil.
D asemmiḍ! Fucclen yifassen-iw.
Yuwi taqfact n leɣbar ɣer wurti-s.
Icerrew-d azemmur ɣer ucerraɛ.
Icerrew-d azemmur ɣer ucellaf.
Izewwi-d iɛeqqayen n uzemmur s umextaf.
Seg zik nettɛebbi azaglu n ddel.
Ur beqquɣ ara ad rren takmamt i yimi-w.
Ad k-id-yehdu Rebbi.
Acimi akka i tzelgeḍ ?
Ǧǧiɣ-ten-in tturaren lfelǧa deg tejmaɛt.
Ay at laɛraḍ n Rebbi!
Abbuh a Lmumnin!
Ayen txedmeḍ ad t-tafeḍ.
Ad aɣ-yemneɛ Rebbi seg lmusibat.
Awer k-yawi wasif d asawen; awer k-yeqqes uzrem yemmuten.
Dayen, yuwi-aɣ wasif d asawen.
Kullfeɣ-ak Rebbi.
Nettuɣaḍ nezzeh.
Qquren wulawen.
Iban akka ara teffeɣ.
Tekfel-d ddeɛwessu-nni.
Awer tawḍeḍ !
Yecceḍ umcic ɣef yiclem n lmecmac.
Wissen melmi ara d-yali wass?
Aqeccaḍ deg tiṭ-ik!
Yemmut yeqqed-i, yedder yeqqed-i.
Ad yesteqsi Rebbi fell-am s lxir.
Teẓẓgeɣ, issedaw Rabaḥ.
Ssusem neɣ ma ulac ad d-slen.
Anda i tufeg i tres.
D winna kan a Ɛacur!
Ulac win ur nettaggad
Amer am wayen yeshel.
Ad ak-d-yefk Rebbi lxir d rrbeḥ.
Tarewla tessemneɛ bab-is.
Yeddez umzil uzzal zeggaɣen ɣef ẓẓebra s umaddaz-is.
Yezwi uzger azaglu ɣef umgerḍ-is ur d-yeɣli.
Ẓẓebra ẓẓayet, d uzzal.
Zzin yezdeɣ Zehwa ma terna teqqen taziba.
Wezznent tsuraz teẓḍa Zwina i ucebbub-is aɣezzfan.
Deg temssizzelt n tazzla tezga-d Zehra d tamzwarut.
Yedderbez s addaynin, yedduri din.
Iḍelli, slalwent tlawin deg tlemmast n yiḍ mi d-tlul Tlelli.
Mi ara tetteddu, tettecrurud am tsekkurt.
Yeɣli-d uɣalad mi as-d-kksen yiwen n udɣaɣ.
Yeṭṭef akk tiɣmert uẓeṭṭa n tissist.
Yessuffeɣ-d uɛarus timejjatin-is mi d-tecxaclew lgerra.
Ikukra umarir ad yekcem s anrar ad yurar.
Tafunast tettarra deg liffeẓ.
Aɣyul isebber.
Aydi yesseglaf ma yuggad.
Ifker yettidir timiḍiwin.
Bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ ayɣer i iyi-d-teskaddbeḍ.
Sseknem-d d acu i teswam.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad kem-ǧǧeɣ ad teɣreḍ aya.
Akka tura nneɣniɣ.
Giɣ-t kra tekka tudert-iw.
Yeffunzer-d.
Isekkeḍ-it.
Yeṭall yeffes, yeṭall zelmeḍ, yuɣal izger abrid.
Isxeḍ-iten-id Rebbi, yerran-ten d ibkan.
Rrbeḥ mi d-yedla fell-i, ur iyi-d-yufi ara.
Zzher-iw d aɛeẓẓug, ssawleɣ-as, ur d-yesli.
Ur zmireɣ ad ḍurreɣ yiwen.
Seg wasmi i d-kkreɣ akka.
Aki, ur ggan ara.
Anida i tettedduḍ akka?
Yudan kan uyaziḍ, kkreɣ-d.
Akka wala ad ṭṭsent tyuzaḍ-nni, i yenna wuccen.
Yufa-t-id wul-iw.
Tuɛer ddunit.
Wissen d acu i yebɣa ad d-yini ?
Yessuffeɣ rruḥ.
Ddu ɣer sdat, ttu tuggadin!
Nna Nwara, deg Ɛin Fwara, trekkem deg zzɛaf imi tarwa-s tewwet-itt-id dderya taseṭṭaft mi tt-terna deg temlilit taneggarut n ddabax.
Tudert wezzilet aṭas!
Urǧin yenɣa usgunfu yiwen.
Ansuf yis-wen!
D ayen i sriɣ beddat.
Aksum, s sshala i t-id-tekksen ɣef yiɣes.
Bezzaf fell-ak.
Tamhersa texdem axessar deg yimawlan n tmurt.
Wissen melmi ara ad-rren aḍar?
Acimi mačči akka ?
Ɣur-k nezzeh lḥeqq.
Ulac am kečč.
Qelbeɣ ddunit akken ma tella, ur tufiḍ d acu i ufiɣ.
Yestufa, ad d-yecɣel kan yid-k.
Zeɛfeɣ aṭas.
Yerwa rray-is.
Mačči d nekk, d netta !
Yeččur wul-iw, yettenfal
D tidet, kemm d tahuskayt.
Tahuski-m d tilawt.
D ccbaḥa n wul i d sseḥḥ.
Eǧǧ-iyi abrid ad ɛeddiɣ.
Udem-is merra yuɣal d azewwaɣ mi yenneḥcam.
Iḥemmel ad yečč seksu.
Seksu d tgella n Yimaziɣen.
Sin deg waman.
Ḥulfaɣ i yiman-iw am waman deg waman.
Iɛedda nnig-sen.
Fukken yirgazen.
Ur tettruḥuḍ ara ɣer dihin ?
Acḥal n tikal i yuɣal Anadoluspor d alɣuɣ ?
Ur yezmir ara ad d-yaf tamentilt n yiɣeblan-is.
Ass-a, uran deg walug n tneɣrit.
Mi negza tamsirt, nettɛedday ɣer yiluɣma.
Ad nɛeddi ɣer useɣti n yiluɣma.
Uriɣ tafyirt ɣef tfelwit.
Inelmaden ttarun ɣef tekfafin-nsen.
Ɣer taggara n temsirt nettaru alugen.
Win yettnadin ittaf.
Bedden merra yinelmaden mi d-yekcem uselmad taneɣrit.
Iḍ ameggaz.
Yuzen yiwet n tebrat n tayri i tmeddakelt-is.
Yefka-asent ayen i as-d-ssutrent.
Yefka-asent kra n yiwellihen yelhan.
Ar tufat.
Ǧǧem-iyi iman-iw.
Nɣiman mačči d ayen yelhan.
Ulac d acu yelhan am tudert.
Tudert ur tessuruf ara.
Tfukk tiɣin n wawal n warrac n tura.
Mi tfukkem iluɣma ad nɛeddi ɣer usteɣsi-nsen.
Tasedda d tawtemt n yizem.
Iḥiqel d awtem n tsekkurt.
Tixsi d tawtemt n yikerri.
Azger d awlay n tfunast.
Iḥiqel ixeddeɛ ayetma-s.
Amgerḍ n umdeɣ d aɣezzfan.
Aɣersiw aɛlayen akk deg ddunit d amdeɣ.
Aberhuc n tsedda qqaren-as aqlalas.
D izem i d agellid n teẓgi.
Uccen d bu txidas.
Aregnet yerza taserdunt.
Ɣellint-d tillas, imdanen keččmen s ixxamen-nsen.
Bururu d agḍiḍ n yiḍ.
Bururu itett aksum.
Bururu ittseyyid-d iɣerdayen.
Igudar tetten imurḍusen.
Kra n umurḍus yellan, idellu fella-s yifis.
Yufeg yitbir, deg tqejjirt-is qqnen-as yiwen n izen.
Fetlent seksu n tmeɣra n tissulya n Maziɣ.
Taɣaḍt d tafunast n yigellil.
Deg tudert, ayen yelhan d wayen n diri zgan ttnaɣen.
Itett tijɛal.
Azalen, fessin am udfel deg yiṭij.
Ilaq ad ḥadren.
Ass ameggaz.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i ččiɣ seg tnezzayt.
Yiwen ur yecliɛ deg wayen i tebɣiḍ ad d-tiniḍ.
Yeqḍa-d seg ssuq.
Yeɛmer ssuq nezzeh.
Itess aṭas.
Ala taqerɛet i yessen.
Itess akken ad yettu lehmum-is.
Yella kra neɣ kra iɣef ilaq ad nehder.
Nettat turar-d snitra, ma d netta yecna-d.
Ur yeqqar ara aṭas.
Menyif xir ma tessusmeḍ.
Anida i tetteddud akka?
Ad ruḥeɣ anda ara iyi-yawin yiḍarren-iw.
Berka tikerkas!
Urǧin yenna-d tidet.
Ur ḥsiɣ ara ad zemreɣ ad t-xedmeɣ.
Tidet tettarra amdan yefreḥ neɣ yeqreḥ.
D acu i tebɣiḍ ad teččeḍ?
Yeffer, yuggad ad t-id-walin.
Yettdebbir iman-is.
Yebda ixeddim d amecṭuḥ.
Maziɣ iruḥ ɣer Bgayet.
Maziɣ, tura d argaz.
Maziɣ ifukk-d tizrawin-is.
Maziɣ yebɣa ad inig ɣer kanada.
Yugi ad yidir deg tmurt-is.
Anida-t yimru?
Ur zmireɣ ara ad geɣ aya ma yella ur iyi-tɛawneḍ ara.
Ajiniral yessendeh-iten ad ɛeddin ɣer wayen-nniḍen.
Yeffeɣ-it leɛqel, ur yeẓri d acu i ixeddem.
Yettnaɣ d yiman-is.
Ẓẓebra n umzil ẓẓayet nezzeh.
Yexla uxxam n xwali.
Yemma d tamurt, d tameslayt, d tameddit, d tamaziɣt…
Deg umwan, legruri ggtent.
Asmi d-tewwet lgerra s waṭas, neflen-d yisaffen.
Deg umwan i kerzen Leqbayel tamurt-nsen.
Ayen tebɣuḍ tiɣzifeḍ ay iḍ, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Am win yettrebbin ibki, la taduṭ la ayefki.
Yuweḍ-iyi-d waluḍ almi d amgerḍ.
Tewwet-d lgerra, yekkes uɣebbar.
Ur ḥmmileɣ ara asemmiḍ n tegrest.
Tamhersa tessedrem tajmaɛt taqbaylit ɣef lsas.
Amcic yerɣan s waman yeḥman, yettaggad aman isemmaḍen.
Ayen i iruḥen ur d-yettuɣal.
Ffiɣ-d aman seg uyeddid.
Ččureɣ akufi d tazart.
Icbuyla ččuren d zzit.
Tiɣerɣert n uxxam tesleɣ s wakal.
Tisi tezga-d nnig uddaynin.
Mi ččiɣ imensi, ffɣeɣ ɣer berra ad dduɣ cwiṭ.
Yeɛreḍ Sami ad d-yeldi tawwurt n usafag.
Iruja Sami ad d-tsubb ssuma.
Sami d Layla sekren almi kan dayen.
Iteqqen Tom tisekkadin-is am lɛada mi ara yeqqar.
Ad as-fkeɣ uṭṭun-iw n usawal.
A-t-a aseggas aya i iga Sami inig-a.
Yettkukru ad iǧelleb s aman.
Acḥal aya ur k-walaɣ.
Ttkel kan ɣef yiman-ik.
Yettusu, iban yuḍen.
Yeɣza-as.
Ikellex-it akken i ilaq.
Yundi-as, yeṭṭef-it-id.
Yessaggad uzekka.
Amedyaz, yettarra-tt kan i tirga.
Urgaɣ zegzaw yigenni, ussan amzun d tafsut.
Urgaɣ yiwet n ddunit mebla leslaḥ.
Urgaɣ yemmut llaẓ, igellil yečča almi yerwa.
Urgaɣ, targit-iw tetteddu ad teffeɣ.
Yeččur usefru-inu d asirem.
Yefferfer usirem-iw, wissen anda yerra.
Yettrejdil zher-iw, ttrajuɣ-t, yegguma ad d-yaweḍ.
Zher-iw, irewwel fell-i, ur ẓriɣ acimi i iyi-yugi.
Tɛuẓẓeg tafat ur d-tesli, nessawel-as ur d-terri awal.
S tmara i nteddu ur neẓri, alamma d ddaw n wakal.
Nettru nugar agujil, nettwwet ur d-tuli tafat.
Temlel n udfel tesderɣil, iṭij n tefsut ma yekkat.
Ilaq ad as-hedreɣ fell-aneɣ.
Aya ixreb tudert-iw.
Amek i txeddmeɣ akka akken ad tesxesreḍ kullec i lebda?
D acu i tenwam ad t-xedmeɣ?
Tomi d Mari ttemyarun dima.
Nniɣ-ak-d yagi ur ssnuzu ara.
Melmi ara iyi-t-id-tiniḍ?
Taqcict tura kra neɣ kra ɣef usebter n udlis.
Anwa ara iyi-t-id-yinin?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-yenna.
Tom ur kem-yettaǧǧa ara ad tnehreḍ.
Nekk ḥemmleɣ ad urareɣ ddabax n uḍar, ma d netta d win n ufus.

D nutni i d-yuwḍen d imezwura, nekkni nerna-d deffir-sen.

D waniwa i tennuɣeḍ?

Ayɣer i tettaḍsaḍ?
Melmi ara d-teffɣeɣ?
Ffeɣ ur k-ẓerreɣ ara!
Yekkes usamuray aqerruy n ufna-ines s yiwet n tyita.
Ur nezmir ad nemtawi ɣef kra.
Tazwara n tmacahut d tasneknayt.
Yella wayen-nniḍen i d-heggaɣ i uzekka.
Ad am-in-fkeɣ sin n yisragen akken ad theggiḍ iman-im.

D yiwet n terbaɛt i icennun akken i iwata.

Wissen ma teɣriḍ tullisin-a?
Ɣer-itent terreḍ-iyi-d s wawal fell-asent.
Ḥemmlen warrac ad ssunɣen.
Tusa-iyi-d yiwet n tikti amacki-tt.
Mačči yiwet n tikti i yellan deg uqerruy.
Fkem-d tikti tamatut n uḍris teɣram.
Ɣur-i yiwet n tikti, wissen ma ad telhu.
Tikta deg uqerruy am uglaf.
Zik imdanen zedɣen deg yifran.
Deg yiwen n uqerruy, yiwet n tekti, deg sin n yiqerray snat n tekta, deg kraḍ n yiqerray, kraḍet n tekta…
Uwiɣ tasennart yid-i s asif ad d-gemreɣ iselman.
Iselman ur d-sneqben ara.

Yiwen ur d-yemmekta amulli-inu.

Amulli ameggaz!
Ass n 20 yebrir 2018 ad yili d amulli wis 38 n tefsut n Yimaziɣen.

Thegga-d yiwen n seksu amacki-t.
Waqila d izamaren i nella.

Uɣalem-d azekka.
Azekka ulac amahil.
Ur iyi-terri ara tmara ad iliɣ akken tebɣiḍ.
Lliɣ akken lliɣ yerna yehwa-iyi.

D ilmawen.

Idrimen ur ttegen tumert.

D idrimen i d tamentilt n merra iɣeblan yellan deg umaḍal.
Nreṭṭel idrimen i yimesbaɣuren kan.
S yidrimen nezmer ad naɣ kra yellan.

Ad awen-d-mleɣ tamacahut.

Ilemẓi yefka i yiman-is times, tewwa akk tfekka-ines.

Wissen ma llan yiseɣtiyen ɣef usebter.
D acu i d ttawil ushil swayes i nezmer ad nelmed tagnizit?
Yefka-aɣ-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-nessexdem.
Tutlayt-iw, ɣur-i tif akk tutlayin n ddunit.
Tiqreɛtin tilmawin yettwadeggren akka d wakka cemtent agama.
Yekker-d ad iɛiwed alqam, i useklu awessur yeɣlin.
Ddunit, seg zik tessaram, ad tt-id-mmagrent treḍbanin.
Ur tufiḍ anda ara nerr, teḍyeq ddunit.
Neẓẓṭel ussan d wuḍan, acḥal nsegerger n teqreɛtin.
Icucef iman-is s tumast, irfed-d taxellalt n ẓẓalamiṭ, yefka i yiman-is times.
Win i iyi-iẓẓan, iɣellet yal aseggas.
Agummu-w aẓidan, ḥemmlent-t ad t-ɣeẓẓent tuɣmas.
Asɣar-inu yeqwan d aquran, deg tegrest ssaɣayen yis-s timas.
S yiferrawen-iw yeẓdan, tettddarim i tili-w yal ass.
Akal ṭṭfeɣ-t s yiẓuran.
Anwa i d nekk? Nekk d aseklu.
Ur ttkukrut ara, ssiwlet-d ma yella kra i testeḥqem.
Ur d-ssutur ara, ttxilk.
Uɣaleɣ ziɣ, ssawḍeɣ ad t-xedmeɣ.
Yettlusu Tom iselsa n watmaten-is.
Kksem aɣilif, d nekk ara t-ixedmen.
Yunef-as ad iɛeddi.
Yunef-iyi ad ɛeddiɣ.
Yunef-ak ad tɛeddiḍ.
Yunef-as ad tɛeddi.
Yunef-aɣ ad nɛeddi.
Yunef-awen ad tɛeddim.
Yunef-akent ad tɛeddimt.
Yunef-asen ad ɛeddin.
Yunef-asent ad ɛeddint.
Yuɣ-iyi-t-id.
Yuɣ-ak-t-id.
Yuɣ-am-t-id.
Yuɣ-as-t-id.
Yuɣ-aɣ-t-id.
Yuɣ-awen-t-id.
Yuɣ-asen-t-id.
Ur yeṭallay ara akk ɣer wayen yettserrif.
Ttewwayent tezwal mi ara uɣalent d tiberkanin.
Ad iyi-yanef ad ɛeddiɣ.
Ad ak-yanef ad tɛeddiḍ.
Ad am-yanef ad tɛeddiḍ.
Ad as-yanef ad iɛeddi.
Ad as-yanef ad tɛeddi.
Ad aɣ-yanef ad nɛeddi.
Ad awen-yanef ad tɛeddim.
Ad awent-yanef ad tɛeddimt.
Ad asen-yanef ad ɛeddin.
Ad asent-yanef ad ɛeddint.
Ad iyi-t-id-ifek.
Ad ak-t-id-ifek.
Ad am-t-id-ifek.
Ad as-t-id-ifek.
Ad as-t-id-tfek.

Ad awent-t-id-ifek.

Ad asent-t-id-ifek.
Yuwi-asent-tent-id.
Ur asent-tent-id-yuwi ara.
Yuwi-akent-tent-id.
Ur akent-tent-id-yuwi ara.
Yuwi-asen-tent-id.
Ur asen-tent-id-yuwi ara.
Yuwi-asent-ten-id.
Ur asent-ten-id-yuwi ara.
Iɣucc Sami imcac.
Yenɣa Sami imcac.
Iḍan kerhen imcac.
Tetten yimcac aɣrum.
Yefra-tt Sami d yiman-is, ur yettuɣal ara ad yemmeslay d Layla.
Yeḍfer Sami Layla almi d azaduɣ-is.
Yemlal-iyi-id deg ubrid, yedda yid-i.
Yemlal-ik-id deg ubrid, yedda yid-k.
Yemlal-ikem-id deg ubrid, yedda yid-m.
Yemlal-it-id deg ubrid, yedda yid-s.
Yemlal-itt-id deg ubrid, yedda yid-s.
Yemlal-aɣ-d deg ubrid, yedda yid-neɣ.
Yemlal-iken-id deg ubrid, yedda yid-wen.

Yemlal-itent-id deg ubrid, yedda yid-sent
Ad iyi-t-id-yawi azekka.
Ad ak-t-id-yawi azekka.
Ad am-t-id-yawi azekka.

Ur ak-t-id-yuwi ara.
Win ifukken yezmer ad yeffeɣ.
Celui qui a terminé peut sortir.
Ur nteffeɣ ala win ifukken.
Fakk, tefɣeḍ.
Mazal ur fukkeɣ ara, ihi ad kemmleɣ.
Ticki ara fakkeɣ, ad ffɣeɣ.
Fukkeɣ, ihi tura ad ffɣeɣ.
Fukken akk, dɣa ffɣen.
Ur yeffiɣ, ur yekcim.
Ur yemmut, ur yeddir.
Ur ibedd, ur yeqqim.
Ur yuli, ur issubb.
Ur yeɣli ur yekkir.
Ur ten-tufim ara?
Deg wakken ɛyiɣ deg yiɣeblan-iw, ur ttḥebbireɣ ara ɣef wiyaḍ.
Ḥader ad as-tinim d tillas n yiḍ i t-yerran d amaggad.
Ala, Meqqran ur yelli d amaxuf.
Nezmer ad d-nini mebla akukru, d yiwen n umadan ur nessin ara akk tugdi.
Maɛna yettaggad ad d-yeɣli yiḍ.
Lxuf iɛennu-d Meqqran s ussu.
Ad yekcem ddaw n tduli, aɣilif yezdi yid-s.
Ad t-yaker kan yiḍes, ad d-bdun fell-as.
Acimi i yettaggad targit?
Ur yeẓri d acu-t? Amek-it? Win akken i as-d-ittebdaden.
D acu akka i d-yeqqar uɛejgul i umeɣbun n Meqqran?
Ilaq ad yeqqim yuki ur iɣeffel ara tikkelt ma yebɣa ad yaweḍ s iswi i d-yecreḍ seg tazwara.
Ad as-teɛreq kan ad tt-yerr ɣer ddin.
Kullec yebna ɣef ddin.
Ihi dayen, ibegges-d, ur yeɛdiz i kra.
Tikti-nni izedɣen allaɣ-is, yiwen ur yezmir ad as-tt-yesfeḍ.
Tikti-a, d ayen i t-iceɣben seg wasmi i d-yekker
Tom, ala netta i yeẓran.
Wissen ma tḍeɛfeḍ cwiṭ?
Ad ak-in-ssiwleɣ uqbel ad n-aseɣ.
A Werdiya ur kem-in-uwiḍeɣ ara akken ad d-tawḍeḍ yessi.
Anta akka i d-tegreḍ gar wallen-im a Weḥciya?
Ilindi akka imira i d-tedda d tislit.
Ur yuwiḍ ara useggas segmi d-tedda d tislit, turew-d akniwen.
Nettat tessenhaz aqerruy yeffes zelmeḍ.
Ad as-tiniḍ d nettat kan i d-yeddan d tislit ilindi.
Awal ur t-id-terni, teffeɣ s zɛaf.
Ixammen n Taddart n Tewrirt bnan akk s wakal d uẓru.
Yerna sser i teqbaylit, ittcebbiḥ-itt s usefru.
Yebɣa ad tesbur talwit, tanezzayt akked tmeddit.
Ay akal n lejdud-iw, win i d-ifkan irgazen.
Anda ad i-yawi ubrid-iw? Ssrima ṭṭfen-tt yiderɣalen.
Wagi d assimeɣ kan.
Iḥtuten-iw, ur uwiḍen ara. D acu akka i yeḍṛan?
Yeskaddeb Tom i umsaltu.
Ccwami n wul-is, yecna-tent.
Tagi d win akken yiwen ur d-yettmeslay fell-as deg taddart.
Iɣaḍ-it lḥal nezzeh.
D acu i d-yufa akka?
Qasi iberdeɛ aɣyul, yerra-as akurbu, yerna iɛebba-as allalen n tkerza.
Aql-ak ula d kečč tɛebbaḍ am uɣyul-nwen.
Sgunfu deg telwit.
Ccan-is d win meqqren.
Iḥemmel Faḍma am leɛmer-is.
Ḥemmlen-t akk medden.
Yeǧǧa tamurt d Faḍma, yeffeɣ ɣef tmura n medden.
A wi iwalan tamurt ula deg targit…
Wi ak-yennan yemmut?
Yal nnehta d asefru.
Yettfelliq deg yikiddiben, i d-yeɣlin ɣef tmurt-is.
S Tfinaɣ irgel ilmawen, yessakay deg tmital-is.
Am win yeẓẓaẓnen iliz, s wawal-is ufriẓ, yekkes fuccil di ccetwa.
D acu ara tiniḍ ihi?
Tecɣeb-iten yiwen n taluft, iɣef i ten-id-iwessa nnbi.
Izimer, aksum, taḥedduft, akal, amdan i nutni.
Tebɣa ad d-teggri tameddit, d tamurt-nni n leqbayel.
Mačči d timenɣiwt i nɣiɣ, mačči d tukarḍa i ukreɣ.
Azal n umdan yegrareb, Kennu yuɣal d lεada.
Ddunit-a merra teqleb, amzun tuḍen i lebda.
Tamurt, bnan-tt ɣef lekteb, tamcict tuɣal d tasedda.
ur ḥmmileɣ ara aksum n uzger, ula d Tom akken.
Yeḥmmel Tom aksum, ula d nekk akken.
Aksum-agi yelha yerna yerḍeb.
Rriɣ-tt ala i ccḍeḥ nekk d Mary.
Ayen akk i d-nniɣ d tidet.
D acu i d-yeḍran akka deg 20 tuḅer?
Iḥar Tom ad iwali Mary.
Ḥareɣ ad kem-waliɣ.
Temmut setti.
Yezmer Tom ad d-yemmeslay sswayeɛ ɣef yinzaḍ.
Ifukk asefru-s, yules-as taɣuri, yufa-t akken i t-yebɣa.
Mi yebges yebda tikli, abrid i yewwi ɣezzif.
Yehder meqqran i mmi-s almi tfukk tedyant-is.
Yettnadi ad yecfu akk ɣef wayen ara s-d-yini baba-s.
Aɣawas n usefru iga-t deg uqerruy-is uqbel ad iɛeddi ad t-issers ɣef usebter n walug-is.
Ad ak-isellem Rebbi a mmi!
Ansuf yis-k a baba, lɛeslama-k s axxam!
D tidet a mmi, urǧin ahat i d-teḍra i yiwen akken i d-teḍra yid-i.
Yebda la s-d-yettales tadyant-is seg tazwara-s almi d taggara-s.
Mazal ar tura ur iyi-tssuref.
Ur teẓri ara Maria d acu i tebɣa.
D acu i txeddmeḍ akka usawen ɣef useklu?
Azekka ad hedreɣ i Tom.
Ɣlin fell-as d aseddrem, ur tt-iḥudd uɛessas-is.
Asirem, ha-t yessusem, wiss ma ad iɛiwed ad d-ilal.
Deg ugerjum yebleɛ wawal,ɣas ma ur d-nenṭiq neḍlem.
Wwten-aɣ merra ɣef walim, ad nettu timẓin, aclim.
Ulac d acu i yuɛren, am win iɣuccen iman-is.
Tafunast tenza temzel, aglim lsan-t d icifaḍ.
Yiwen n uderɣal iteddu, mi t-id-yerra lḥiḍ, yenna-as sya i tuɣal ddunit.
Tettɣil d irden i tezreɛ, teḍmeɛ ad tili lɣella.
Zher ur s-izmir ddreɛ, meskint temger tuẓedla.
Ixaq uɣrib iman-is, acḥal d tabrat i as-tura.
Testeqsa-t amek i d tazmert-is, tuḍen weḥdes s tuffra.
Ɣas ma tella d tameṭṭut, tennuɣ d tudert am urgaz.
Kra yellan yerra-t ines, ig Rebbi d ayla n jeddi.
Urgaɣ tekker-d tlelli, i yuḍnen acḥal aya.
Urgaɣ yekkes lbaṭel, yeffeɣ tuffɣa n yiberriq.
Imdanen, ad ten-rreɣ d atmaten-iw, ass-nni akken ara kkawen yimeṭṭawen-iw.
A Caɛban, ah ya Caɛban, taqbaylit anda k-tt-rran?
D tuṭṭḍa i nteṭṭeḍ ilili, neqqar-as telha lbenna-s.
Meqqert tfawet, aṭas i aɣ-cergen.
Kra yellan ɣur-neɣ yelha, nefka-as-t i Urumi.

Tom d Mary ur ttaggaden ara tillas.

Ur cfiɣ ara amek i t-giɣ.

Aserdun s zzux yenna : « Yemma d tagmart » Yettu baba-s d aɣyul.
Faḍma n Sumer d tagrawliwt.
Ur ilaq ara ad yini Tom i Mary.

Yiwen ur yezmir ad iyi-irnu.
Iḥulfa Sami s kra yessaggaden.
Tom ur yugar ara aṭas Mary deg leɛmer.
Yetturar ddabex.

D umlan yelhan i as-fkiɣ.

Iwala-k Tom tgemreḍ iselman Imalas yezrin.
Ferḥeɣ mi ad waliɣ Tom.
Ad xedmeɣ ayen iwimi zemreɣ.

Ad d-terreḍ ɣef kullec.
Ttnnameɣ-tt.
Ur yeẓri ara imiren d akken yuḍen.
Tiriza d isem apurtugi.
Ur teẓri ara imiren d akken tuḍen.
Tom d ameddakel aqdim.

Iteddu yettaḍsa.

Twala-t kan, tebra i wallen-is.
Acḥal d abrid i tt-yurga.
Tugna-ines, ur yezmir ad tt-yettu.
Tugna-ines tedwi-t.
Yendem mi i tt-yeǧǧa.

Yeḥsa tḥemmel-it.
Izuxx aṭas s mmi-s.
Tzuxx aṭas s mmi-s.
Yiwen n unelmad yettwaḥbes.

Ur rejjmeɣ yiwen.

Ahat heggant iman-nsent.
Il est possible qu'elles se sont préparées.
Nniɣ-as ad iheggi iman-is.
Heggan akk iman-nsen.
Amenzu n yennayer d ixef n useggas ɣer Yimaziɣen.
Yettas-d deg wass wis mraw d sin n wayyur n janvier.
Yiwen n urgaz amaziɣ yuɣal d agellid neɣ d aferɛun ɣef Yimaṣriyen deg useggas 950 send talalit n Mass Ɛisa.
Seg yimir-nni i bdan Yimaziɣen ḥessben ussan.
Asfugel n yixef n useggas yeggra-d ar tura.
Deg Uwris, tamurt n Yicawiyen, tilawin ttbeddilent inyen d tgejda n uqiḍun.
Ɣef waya i as-qqaren i umenzu n yennayer « Buyni ».
Ma d irgazen tturaren ddabax n uḍar neɣ ɣeṭṭlen leɣruḍ s tyitiwin n lbarud s temgeḥyal.
Deg tmurt n Leqbayel, tilawin ttheggint-d imensi n yennayer s seksu d uksum n uyaziḍ.
Mi ara d-tessers twacult učči, tetten deg yiwen n uḍebsi.
Llal n uxxam ur yettɛedday ara fell-as uzaylal, tessrusu-d diɣen tijeɣlin n twelliyen d yiminigen akk d wid yemmuten.
Temlal-d tasa d wi ay turew akken ad mmagren aseggas amaynut ɣef tikkelt.
Arrac imeẓẓyanen, ttseṭṭilen-asen i tikkelt tamezwarut.
Deg tama n umalu n tmurt am temdint n wihran, ass-nni tetten ala tiẓidanin.
Deg Tlemsan tettili-d yiwet n tfaska iwimi semman: « Ayrad ».
D yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun i d-tturaren yimezdaɣ n taddart.
Ttɣummun-d udmawen-nsen s yisɣumen (masques) yecban iqudam n yizem.
Yiwen yizem d awessur ad yemmet (aseggas yezrin) ad yeǧǧ amkan i yiwen yizem d amecṭuḥ ara d-ilalen imiren (aseggas amaynut).
Imezdaɣ n taddart, arrac tiqcicin ad tezzin i taddart, ad cennun, ad d-jemɛen ifurasr n wučči.
Tameddit, tilawin ttnawalent-d yis-sen imensi i yesddukulen akk at taddart.
Deg tmurt n Lmaruk, qqaren-as i umenzu n yennayer: « Tamɣart ».
Mi ara d-ires yimensi n yennayer tuwi-d ɣef yal yiwen n tawacult n uxxam ad yečč ass-nni nnig n tawant.
Akka i sfiliten i lxir ad yagar kra ara yekk useggas amaynut.
Arrac, ma yella ugin ad ččen ad rwun, ssagaden-ten yimawlan-nsen s « temɣart » ara d-yasen ɣur-sen, d nutni ara tečč.
Ali !
Zerrin wussan d wayyuren, Leqbayel msakit ttnaɣen d lehmum n ddunit.
Anebdu d win iɛeddan.
Tiẓurin d tbexsisin quccent.
Legruri n lexrif bdant-d.
Ifellaḥen ttheggin iman-nsen ad kerzen tamurt-nsen am yal aseggas.
Aɣrum neɣ seksu ur nedhin ara s zzit n uzemmur mačči d učči.
Tikkelt-a azemmur yurew ma d ilindi ulac maḍi.
Akka i d-qqaren yimɣaren: Aseggas azemmur yettarew, aseggas-nniḍen xaṭi.
Alqaḍ n uzemmur d aɣbel n twacult merra.
Asemmiḍ n tnezzayt tikwal igezzem ifassen, allalen n yixeddim.
Imelqaḍen n uzemmur mi ara awḍen s ayla-nsen ssaɣayen times akken ad ẓẓiẓnen acku yenɣa-ten fuccil d qajjar.
Mi ara ten-iɛeddi uqraḥ-nni n usemmiḍ ad d-ssun icellafen ddaw n tzemmurt.
D irgazen i yettalin ɣef tzemmrin akken ad d-ccerwen iɛeqqayen n uzemmur ɣer daxel n ucerraɛ neɣ ɣer yicellafen-nni i d-ssan.
Tilawin ẓewwrent deg ulqaḍ n uzemmur n leqwaɛi.
Azemmur ma yurew ulac am ucraw-is, ma d kra kan n yiɛeqqayen i yettilin deg tseṭṭa, dɣa nzewwi-ten-id s umextaf.
Amɣar, d netta i bab n wayla amezwaru, ma mazal ɣur-s cwiṭ n tezmart ur isserkad ara iman-is, ha-t-an da iferres, ha-t-an dihin ileqqem iẓebbjan.
Arrac xeddmen-tent akk, ttɛiwinen tilawin deg ulqad n leqwaɛi, kessen lmal neɣ ttandin tixeftin d tqellaɛin i yimerga d yiẓerẓar.
Icellafen mi ara ččaren, ttarran azemmur-nni ɣer yiwen, akken i yeshel ufran-is, yeɛni tukksa n yiferrawen d yikeccaḍen.
Azemmur yettwafernen ssurugen-t ɣer teqfacin simira ad t-rren s akurbu.
Akurbu ma yeččur d azemmur, yettɛebbi-t uɣyul ɣer lemɛinesra i d-iqerben.
Tikwal, ilemẓiyen ssawaḍen alamma d kradet n ttɛbegat deg yiwen n wass.
Tameddit, send ad yeɣli yiṭij, ttuɣalen-d yimelqaḍen s axxam.
Mi ara d-mmektiɣ ayen sɛeddaɣ, ad qqimeɣ kan ad as-iniɣ deg ul-iw: « Wissen amek i d-nedder ar ass-a? ».
D tallit yebḍan ɣef sin yiḥricen.
Ur tettɣimi ara aṭas deg yiwen n umkan.
Leqbayel neɣ Imaziɣen s umata, ulac d acu ara sen-slemdeɣ ɣef tnemla.
Ma tkecmeḍ ɣer daxel-is ilaq-ak ad tekkseḍ isebbaḍen-ik ma ɣur-k zher telsiḍ-ten-id.
Tettili tɣimit ɣef yigertyal yessan ɣef tɣerɣert iselɣen s wakal.
Inelmaden ttalsen-d deffir-s i wayen i d-yeqqar.
Neqqar leqran deg lǧamaɛ mebla ma nefhem-it.
Imir-nni neččur d nneyya.
Aki!
D yiwen n uqcic yettsetḥin.
Deg wakken i yelha yuklal ad as-nsemmi asegzawal, ladɣa winna Taqbaylit/ tafransist.
Ansuf yis-k a yennayer.
A-t-an tfukk fell-ak tuffra.
Ttarran-iman-nsen d wiyiḍ mačči akken i d-tuwi ad ilin.
Terra-ten tmara ad k-id-sbegnen.
Ansuf yis-k tikkelt-nniḍen ɣer tmurt-ik tamaziɣt a Yennayer.
A yennayer, tusiḍ-d ad aɣ-d-tiniḍ, ɣas ma nekkni neḥsa s waya : « Nekkni mačči d Aɛraben, nekkni d Imaziɣen ».
Ladɣa kullec a-t-an din, syin i d-yebda kullec, d win i d yemma-s n ddunit…
Texreb-asen tirga, aɣrab-nni (lḥiḍ) i d-bnan s lektubat yezgan, iruḥ d iceqfan, yeddrem, yeftutes.
Rran-t d tilist i umezruy-nneɣ, s lqern wis sebɛa i yebda umezruy-nneɣ, akkin akk ulac kra i yellan.
Ad ak-d-rren ccan, acku azal-ik d ameqqran, d agaɛmir, d agejdur, anect-ila-t…
Terra-ten tmara ad k-rren d unsib deg tmurt-ik.
Akal-nneɣ mačči d aɛrab akken i t-uran deg tmendawt.
D yiwen n lekteb ameqqran-nniḍen i ilaq diɣen ad d-nedhu yid-s akken ala tidet ara d-yeqqimen deg tmurt-nneɣ.
Neɛya deg lekdubat.
Deg yiwet n tallit taḥarcawt (iseggasen n 60 d wid n 70) deg tmurt-nneɣ yettaɛer fell-aneɣ ad d-nebder kra n temsal yerzan amezruy, taɣerma, idles amaziɣ.
Neẓra akk d acu i aɣ-yettrajun ma yella necṭer dɣa nerkeḍ ilugan i aɣ-d-heggan ad ten-neḍfer akken i iwata, ma ulac iberdi ad yerku deg usekref neɣ ad d-wajhen medden…
Maɛna, akken qqaren agummu-nni yettwagedlen d winna i iẓiden, nettaf-d amek ad d-nini ayen i aɣ-iqerḥen melba ma ukin neɣ faqen s wayen i d-neqqar yerna s ccbaḥa n wawal : s tmedyezt.
Yennayer agellid n wayyuren.
Ahya ay Akli! Nniɣ-as ad k-xedmeɣ tamuffirt ara yerren leḥmala-k ɣur-i tugar tin n umayna.
Yezzi-as-d aɛrur i teslit, yezzeḥweḍ yeffeɣ.
Seg wass-nni ur d-iban anda yerra.
Yezzi-d useggas, slan yis-s kra, deg tmurt n Kanada i d-yeggra.
Ddayxa i ssneɣ, Ddayxa i ttarguɣ, Ddayxa i yettilin yal dqiqa yid-i, ulac-itt sdat-i ass-a.
Ala ay Akli, d nekk i d Ddayxa, ur telli tayeḍ.
Ddayxa i ssneɣ mačči d kemm.
Yebda iɛeqqel kra n yigman n wudem n ddayxa yessen am wallen-is, anyir-is, imi-s, ula d taḍsa-s.
Ddayxa mazal taḍsa-s ur teṭṭaxer ara imi-s, tenna-as i Wakli: “Qerreb-d ɣur-i, d nekk, d Ddayxa!
Akli imi d-zgant wallen-is deg wudem amaynut n Ddayxa iǧelleb timendeffirt s yiwen n usurif.
Ass n tmeɣra yewweḍ-d, d ass n ssebt.
Imawlan n Wakli usan-d deg yiṭaksiyen.
Deg ubrid ssekkren s tkerrusin-nsen d tyitiwin n lbarud d uslilew yiwen uhetwir annect-ila-t.
Tameɣra n Wakli ad s-cfun medden, ad d-teqqim deg umezruy n taddart n Tewrirt.
Aserbabuɛ-nni n tkerrusin, mi yewweḍ s axxam n Dda Ɛacur, rsen-d akk yiqeffafen d tqeffafin, tislit d tamezwarut
Tekcem axxam n urgaz-is dima gar snat-nni n tɛessasin n xwalti-s, s lbarud d uslilew.
Ayakka tzeyneḍ a Ddayxa, tgiḍ amzun d taɛelǧet!
D acu akka i txedmeḍ almi tbeddleḍ udem?
Ad ak-ikkes Rabbi aɣilif, tanemmirt a mmi.
Mi ifukk awal d yemma-s, yekcem srid ɣer texxam-is i d-yezgan ddaw n uxxam n lwacul.
Kkes aɣilif a yemma, iɣemmi-inem yettlen deg lkaɣeḍ, ha-t-an deg uḍellaɛ.
Cabḥa d yiwet n tlemẓit yettḥulfun aṭas.
Warɛad teqfil snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
Imezdaɣ n taddart n Tewrirt am yimezdaɣ n tudrin merra n tmurt n Leqbayel.
Akli yeṭṭef azrib alemmas yettarran metwal tajmaɛt.
Amek akka ihi i tturaren warrac « Dderya iqersen »?
Dderya Iqersen d urar ay tturaren warrac d teqcicin.
Tal yiwet deg-s sin neɣ ugar n yimuraren.
Yal aɛeggal n taggayt ad ibeddel isem-is
Ismawen-a imaynuten ur ten-tettissin ara taggayt niḍen.
Uraren deg tmurt n leqbayel ggten.
D yiwen n ttawil i isedhawen arrac, i d-yeslalayen assaɣen n tdukli gar-asen.
Dda ɛacur d yiwen n urgaz lɛali, meskin d aɛiban n bu yiwen n uqejjir.
- Ar timlilit-nniḍen a Caɛban.
Maɛna yiwen ur yeẓri d acu i aɣ-d-ittheggi uzekka.
Akli ameqqran d Dda Ɛacur d itirayuren deg yiserdasen n Fransa.
D acu i uran fell-asen deg tɣamsa?
Tikkelt kan ad issers taceṭṭiḍt-nni deffir n yiwen mebla ma iwala-t-id.
Wagi ma ifaq, ad yekker ad yeḍfer akken ad d-yeṭṭef win akken itezzin, ma yeɣfel ad ixelles, ad yeqqim deg tlemmast n uqusis am uqedduḥ n yimensi.
Ad neqqim kan dagi ay Akli, ad d-nuɣal ɣer lehdur n tɣeṭṭen tikkelt-nniḍen, ma d tura ɣur-i cwiṭ n ccɣel.
Ameɛdur ameɣbun yettaṭṭaf imi-s, kullec yettarra-t ɣer daxel.
Ass n ssuq d ass n temlilit d tukksa n lxiq.
Wid ur nettkeyyif ara, ass-nni keyyfen mebla cceḥḥa.
Aṭas n temsal i d-iḍerrun deg ssuq.
Ayen akk yerzan tudert n tmetti, ad t-tafeḍ deg wass n ssuq.
Zik-nni tella yiwet n teqcict d tuzzyint maca ulac ɣur-s s wacu ara d-tessken tahuski-ines.
Yiwen wass tekcem ɣer yiwen n uxxam n tmeɣra, teqqim din tettnadi, tufa tislit tgen, tekker tukra-s merra leḥwali-s n ccbaḥa.
. Dɣa seg wass-nni yerra-tt Rebbi d yiwen ugḍiḍ d amecṭuḥ. Iferrawen-is d izewwaɣen, d imellalen, d iberkanen, d iwraɣen.
Zik-nni, yella yiwen n urgaz d amakur.
Yiwen n wass yuker-d tissirt.
Seg wass-nni, ibxes-it Rebbi, yerra-t d ifker.
Amek akka i d-ittili wurar-a?
Yettel iman-is deg ubernus amellal, yeqqim ɣef uɛdil urqim, Yettraju i yiwen n yinebgi ad as-d-yečcar tawwurt.
Ad d-gren tasɣart anwa ara yebdun.
Ma yella yeṭṭef-d ulli d awkraren xelḍen, yexser.
Awi-d ad waliɣ.
Uɣal ansa i d-tekkiḍ.
Cemmer lekmam-ik.
Yezmer lḥal akken.
Ilaq ad tɛejleḍ.
Yefren ayen yebɣa.
Iteffer udem-is.
S wul-is i yettwali.
Yessared ifassen-is s waman.
Ijbed iman-is.
Ur itekki ara deg terbaɛt.
Iteffer ifassen-is.
Yeffer anda ur t-ttafen ara akk.
Yuli wass.
Isteqsay aṭas.
Yiwen ur t-yessin.
Wissen ansa i d-yusa.
Nul ne sait d'où il vient.
Wid yesɛan tikta, ulac ɣur-sen adrim; wid yesɛan adrim, ulac ɣur-sen tikta.
Tisemmirin d nutni i tent-id-ixeddmen deg tḥuna-nsen.
Deg ssuq i d-ttemlilin kra n yimdanen i d-yefka Rebbi.
Imi qwan yisurdiyen i yettruḥun seg ufus ɣer wayeḍ, ladɣa gar yimestujar n ubeqri, llan diɣen yimukar.
Wigi ttuɣaḍen msakit.
Ɣulamllah d terbaɛt-is, kkin seg widak yesseglafen mi ara tettaffeg teɣlamt srid ɣer wanda i bɣan ad tt-aznen yimawlan-is n dima.
Tifinaɣ, ttzuxxun yis-s Yimaziɣen, maca azekka ara yeǧǧuǧǧgen n tmaziɣt d tira talaṭinit.
Tirmit ifeclen n yimarukiyen tesselmed-aɣ akken ur nxeddem ara yiwet n tuccḍa ma yella nebɣa ad neddu ɣer sdat.
Ad yerwu rray-is.
D netta i yebɣan akka.
Ad yuɣal ad d-yemmekti.
Ilaq ad d-yezg d yiman-is.
Yugi ad yeɛfu.
Ɛeddan semmus n yiseggasen seg wasmi i nezwej.
Ɣeẓẓan-t-id yifassen-is, yebɣa ad yaru.
Ini-as ma ur yuḍin ara.
Ssiwel-as, testeqsiḍ fell-as.
Deg yennayer yekkat udfel.
Ad ddmeɣ anebdu wala tagrest.
Qessiḥet tegrest n useggas-a.
Yuɣ-iyi-d tamrilt.
Aya giɣ-t.
Yal ass zgant gar wallen-is.
Tugniwin am tigi, zedɣent allaɣ-is.
Ttasmeɣ ɛinani mi ara waliɣ tameṭṭut i wumi d-zzin ṭṭacma n warraw-is.
Cqerrweɣ-k!
Cabḥa ur tettthenna ara, teḥqer iman-is.
Thedder i wul-is mi tettezzem iman-is.
Ad yili Rebbi d mmi-s ara yebḍun tudert-is d yiwet am tihin.
Meɣres d ayyur n tefsut diɣen d win n tmedyezt.
Ihi mi ara d-nebder awal-agi n tmedyezt amedyaz amezwaru i d-irezzun s aqerruy d si Muḥend u Mḥend.
Walit ma yella akka i t-tettwalim ula d kunwi.
Yuḍen aṭan n tikli, yedda d ubeḥri, tefka-t tmurt i tayeḍ.
Awal yeskefkuf deg yimi, yenna-t ɛinani, ɣer wul n umdan yewweḍ.
Yerwa terzeg n yilili, ur yessin tili, tayerrust n zzman teẓmeḍ.
Yexreb targit urumi, yessnegren tayri, imeṭṭi d yidim yexleḍ.
Leḥzen, yessen-it d ilemẓi, lmut d umerẓi, adeddic yeɛmer d rrseḍ.
Mmugreɣ-d kra n wuguren akken ad d-afeɣ aṭaksi.
Mačči d yiwen usentel iɣef d-yuwi awal maca win i yeǧǧa akken i t-id-tesεa yemma-s d « Tayri ».
Ulac d acu ur d-yenni ara fell-as.
Ɣef yal tamsalt yessefra, ur yunif i kra, amur ameqqran d tayri.
Ɣef zzman ucmit yura, yessexreb tirga, ɣef widak ur nettsetḥi.
Yenna awal mačči s tuffra, yecbeḥ d isefra, yesla-t umdan yergagi.
Azal n tmeṭṭut yerna, iɛedda i usigna, abrid-is metwal itri.
Yessefra mačči d kra, mazal ar tura, lehdur-is rran tili.
Deg yiberdan yewwi asurif, yedda ur yengif, asebsi-ines d amwanes.
A-t-an iɛedda i Sṭif, Ɛennaba n lḥif, tefka-t akkin ɣer Tunes.
D asemmiḍ, d azɣal kif-kif, yezdi d uɣilif, akka i tga tudert-ines.
Amzun yettawi-t wasif, yeṭṭafar rrif, deg waluḍ n zzman yexnunes.
Asebsi yeččur d lkif, s wawal yeshetrif, imi-s yettarew-d times.
Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ mebla akukru d netta i baba-s n tmaziɣt, tagi i nesselmad akka tura.
D yiwen urgaz yuklalen tajmilt tameqqrant.
Ilaq nekkni s Yimaziɣen yal ass ara d-ilalen ad s-neqqar i Dda Lmumud: Tanemmirt!
Akka tura mlalen yimeɣmasen, ahat mmeslayen anda ddant temsal.
Sliman Azem, acennay ameqqran n teqbaylit ilul deg Ugni Geɣran ass n 18 cṭember deg useggas 1918.
Amdan yesɛan tazmert yettnadi ad steqsayen medden fell-as, ɣef tezmert-is.
D acu ara d-nini ɣef umdan yuḍnen?
Amuḍin yettsetḥi.
Imdanen i wumi yefka Rebbi tazmert, tuwi-d fell-asen ad dlun, ad rzun ɣer wid yuḍnen akken ad asen-kksen leɣben i d-yeɣlin fell-asen mi ten-teǧǧa tezmert-nsen.
Ayen akka i ixeddem umazday n Yimeddukal n Uqbu d ayen yelhan aṭas, yuklal ad t-nesnemmer.
I nessaram d tujjya iɛǰlen i kra yellan d amuḍin.
“Ɛuhdeɣ tirezzaf n meɣres d win ɣur-s alma iger-d wajdim timcaḍ”. Akka I tenna temɣart-nni irezfen ɣer yelli-s, ṭṭfen-tt yiḥumal din.
Azberbur d tiẓurin (aḍil) urɛad wwint, mazal-itent d tisemmamin. Akken i as-yenna ubareɣ imi ur yezmir ara ad yaweḍ ad d-yekkes agazu n tiẓurin yewwan akken i ilaq:"Yetbeɛ semmumit...".
Ttxil-k a εemmi furar, rḍel-iyi-d yiwen n wass (nnhar). Di taɣaḍt ad d-rreɣ ttar, ad skenfeɣ ixef-is ɣef tmest (nnar), ad εellqeɣ ijeεbuben-is ɣef usɣar.
Deg taddart n Tewrirt, ttawin-tt-id d amedya.
Tettɛenni deg Rebbi ad tt-i-iɣit ulamma s yiwen n ugrud.
Akli d agujil s baba-s, d yemma-s i ibedden ɣur-s.
Ula d nettat wissen acḥal akken i teqqim akken ad d-tarew amenzu-ines i as-d-yeɣlin uqbel lawan.
Teẓḍa iẓeḍwan s lijara, tecrek-d acḥal n tikal tixsi, telqeḍ azemmur d aɛemmal.
Teqqim d taǧǧalt, mebla argaz, teqqim ɣef mmi-s, ur tɛawed ara tissulya fell-as.
Akka i d tiqbayliyin, amur ameqqran deg-sent sebbrent, ttɣimint ɣer tarwa-nsent wala ad ɛiwdent zzwaǧ.
Tamɣart-is, Nna Mennun i tt-id-ikessen kan mebɛid, tefhem tislit-is akken i iwata.
Ma d Aɛraben i nella, ur nesteḥq ad aɣ-tɛerbem.
Ma ur nelli d Aɛraben, ayɣer aɛerreb n Tmazɣa.
Yasin, aman i d-yugem, seg uɣbalu n timuzɣa.
Ddunit merra d tamurt-is, d inebgi i ḥemmlen medden.
Iǧǧa axxam d warraw-is, yelsa isefra d arkasen.
Tamedyazt tjeggeḥ ul-is, d leslaḥ-is gar yifassen.
Idisan-is ssnen leḥbus, lḥif n ugdud-is izdeɣ-it.
Ur izmir ad yefk afus, s iniɣ ikker taṣebḥit, s wawal qeṭṭiɛen am lmus, alarmi d-teɣli tmeddit.
D amɣid seg wasmi i d-ikker, leɛmer i inuda ad yerbeḥ.
Ur isserwat berra i unrar, ur issin amek-it ccḍeḥ.
Ɛinani leɛmer yeffer, tidet yeqqar tqerreḥ.
Timeẓda yeffeɣ rruḥ, beddent ddaw n yigenni.
Tthuzzunt amdan am dduḥ, ttheggint-t kan i tguni.
Yasin ččan-t am uqedduḥ, mi d-yeqqar tidet i lɣaci.
Tafransist d aglaf n ṭṭrad, yis-s yeqqar-as i Fransa: “Nekkni ur kem-nettagad, mačči d Ifransisen i nella".
Idammen-nneɣ d lmidad, tilelli, yis-sen i tt-nura.
Yasin baba-s n Neǧma, d Amaziɣ almi d iccer.
I tmeṭṭut yefka lqima, d tayemmat am Lezzayer.
Ɣef tmurt-is acḥal yura, i wakken ad tesɛu leqder.
Akken i texdem i mmi-s i txeddem d i umeddakel-is yuɣalen amzun d gma-s.
Netta iɣurr-it ṭṭrad, ur yesɛi ara baba-s ad d-yemmeslay fell-as, ad izuxx yis-s.
Meskint terwa lḥif d terẓaganin.
Ma ksan, ad ksen akken, ma uraren ad uraren akken, ma ruḥen s aɣerbaz, ad ruḥen akken.
Deg tneɣrit ttɣimin deg yiwet n tgida.
Mačči d yiwen wugur i d-yebder.
Ttɛayaren medden yis-i, abder-iw s “ḥacakum”.
Nekk lhiɣ kan i uɛebbi, nekk d amerkub n udrum.
Tiɣrit tedber iberdi, rwiɣ-tt akken i tt-yeṛwa umcum.
Timẓin i yekrez uzger, i tent-iɛelfen d aɣyul.
Lsiɣ abernus-iw, ffɣeɣ.
Berra, tekkat lgerra.
Ad qwun waman deg unebdu.
Aserdun inker-iyi, ulac win i iyi-iḥemmlen.
“Yemma d tagmert-nni” yenna win ur nettarwen.
Aɣyul ttawin-t-id d anzi, yettcebbiḥ deg yimeslayen.
Anwa i d-yeǧǧan taḍsa? Fiḥel ma tnudam : D aɣyul.
Mačči d lǧennet ur bɣiɣ, anida akken llan warrac.
D ixef-is kan ur s-ufiɣ, i tudert n lehna ulac.
Ɣef tgecrar-iw i ɣliɣ, mi d-tres tyita s tirac.
Ɣef walim i iyi-kkaten, i wakken ad ttuɣ timẓin.
Win akken ur neḥric d aɣyul, akka i as-ssawalen.
Ass-a d amulli n uɣewwaɣ.
Fiḥel ma nenna-d.
D nekk ara am-d-yinin anta, tura kan.
Yiwen urgaz seg taddart ur yekkir yiwen n wass ad t-yelqem.
Ǧǧan-t akken imi t-ḥesben d aɛessas n taddart.
Tin ur nezwij ad tezwej.
Tin ur d-nuriw ad d-terbu.
Tin yuḍnen ad tejji.
Tin ur nesɛi zzher ad tuɣal ad tesɛu.
Tin iwmi ijaḥ urgaz-is, ad d-yuɣal s axxam-is d warraw-is.
Win i t-iwalan, ma yeṭṭal ɣer lǧedra-s i d-yettbanen meqqert nezzeh, ad as-ifek aṭas n leqrun deg leɛmer-is.
Tiqcicit n Dda Ɛacur, mmdent, tura d tilawin, ttrajunt lmektub-nsent ad d-yas.
Cbant-d ɣer yimawlan-nsent i yesɛan ssifa yelhan ula d nutni.
Ɣur-s allaɣ yukin, yessemlalay awalen tteffɣen-d d isefra.
Yettewhem deg-s Wakli amek i as-yeshel wawal, ad t-id-yeɛrek akken yebɣa.
Yezmer lḥal imezwura yebnan taddart n Tewrirt ufan-t-id din.
Mi yemmed d ilemẓi, yunag ɣer Fransa, d netta i yettɛeyyicen tawacult-is.
Yella seg yimezwura i yeffɣen s adrar d teẓgi.
Yemmut deg wayyur n yebrir 1966 deg sbiṭar n uqbu.
Lxir i yexdem ttun-t.
D lxir axir.
Lxir yuɣal-as d ixmir.
Xtir lxir.
Lxir, yettwexxir.
Ɛelxir ay udem n lxir.
S lxir ur ttmesxir.
Aṭas aya segmi yuli wass.
Deg tegrest ttiɣzifen wuḍan, ttiwzilen wussan.
Ruḥ srid.
Tezdeg gan-tt yizeddganen.
Ur qqaremt i yiwen!
Jim yeṭṭef iman-is akken ur yettmecčaw ara.
Yenna-iyi-id yiwen: "Ttaḥareɣ ad fakkeɣ taẓllit. Acimi? i as-rriɣ. -Acku deɛɛuɣ s teqbaylit.
Yennayer yuwi-d adfel.
Yennayer yuwi-d lgerra.
Yennayer yuwi-d asemmiḍ.
Imensi n yennayer d seksu s uyaziḍ.
Yeddem-d tismuqalin ad iṭill mebɛid.
Urar s tkarḍiwin yessedhaw.
Turart i bɣun uraren-tt maca ur ilaq ara ad ɣeflen, ad ǧǧen biccuḥ, akken i as-qqaren yigerdan i wuccen, ad ten-yessxixxed seg yiwen neɣ n sin n yizamaren.
Imḍebbren imeqqranen n lɛesker n Fransa, ttarran Izzayriyen, Imerukiyen d Isanigalen deg wadar amezwaru mi ttemyewaten d yiserdasen almaniyen.
Ɣellin msakit am yizan, d aḥuccu i ten-yettḥuccu rrsas.
Win yemmuten yemmut ma d wayeḍ yejreḥ.
Azal n 135000 n Yizzayriyen i yekkin deg ttrad amaḍlan wis sin ɣer tama n Fransa, tamurt tamharsant n tmurt-nsen.
Nnuɣen mgal Inaẓiyen n Alman.
Aḥric ameqqran deg-sen, teḍra yid-sen am yiberriq, seg wasmi i ffɣen i yixxamen-nsen ur d-uɣalen.
Aṭas n yimnaɣen izzayriyen i yeɣlin deg wakal n Taruft.
Kkren ɛawnen tamurt n Fransa, ḍemɛen deg-s aṭas.
Nnan-as ad nernu Inaẓiyen, ad d-teɣli telwit deg ddunit akken ma tella.
Msakit, imeɣban n Rebbi, wid tezdeɣ nneyya, ɣelḍen nezzeh imi amharsan d amharsan, amcic dayem d amcic, ur yettbeddil ara.
Deg Fransa akked tmura n ddunit, imdanen sfuggulen s ccḍeḥ d ccna, ferḥen mi yeɣli lbaṭel, mi yefra ttrad, tfukk tmenɣiwt.
Deg tmurt n Zzayer imir-nni i tebda, nnɣan Yifransisen amdan aɣersiw s ubumbardi war aḥezzeb.
Tala n tlawin, tajmaɛt d ssuq n yirgazen.
Deg ssuq i ttemlilin yimeddukal ur nemẓer ara aṭas aya.
Seg zik deg tudert n tmetti taqbaylit, tala tezga d adeg n tlawin.
Ssuffuɣent-d ayen i tent-iqerḥen, ttekksent-d ɣef wulawen-nsent.
Zizi Belɛid d amrabeḍ, abernus amellal, aqendur amellal, agennur amellal d iselsa-s n yal ass.
Deg wakken ɣezzif yerna rqiqet tiddi-s, ssawalen akk medden “Acacfal yeṭallayen”.
Tuyat n Zizi Belɛid ttbanent-d knant cwiṭ, mačči d amahil i tent-yerran akka, ahat d kra n lɛib i d-yegla mi d-ilul.
Ur mellul ur berrik wudem-is, d aras.
Allen-is tiwiɣanin d timecṭuḥin, ḥercent am tid n uzrem yeffuden.
Agman n tfekka-s i yessexdam ugar n wiyiḍ d iẓri-s.
Tebrek n ucekkuḥ-is tugar temlel, d alemmas n yirgazen.
Ifassen-is d imeqqraren, ayeffus-is yesseɣzef-it s tɛekkaz n usɣar n uẓebbuj i yesɛukkuz.
Deg tegrest, igenni d aberkan s usigna, adfel ad idel tamurt amzun d abernus.
Awal ɣur-s yegget, iteddu am wasif, rnu-as yir tikli-ines, yis-sen i izerri akud n wass akka yal ass.
Tuget n yisekla ttɣimin d ieryanen acku iferrawen-nsen yettawi-ten waḍu.
Tuget n yisekla ttɣimin d iɛeryanen acku iferrawen-nsen yettawi-ten waḍu.
Tezemmurt, nmara-s meqqret, ama d anebdu, ama d tagrest, yettaf-itt lḥal s yiferrawen-is.
Berra, asemmid igezzem, yesqaqar imdanen s yixxamen-nsen, ad ẓẓiẓnen deg tesga ɣef yiri n ukanun, times ur tettnus alama tɛedda tsemhuyt n ugris d qqajjar.
Nettḥar ɣer yizenẓaren imezwura n yiṭij.
D nutni i d ttbut n tuffɣa n tegrest neɣ akeččum n tefsut, tasemhuyt i nḥemmel merra, deg-s tettuɣal tudert deg-s yettaḍsa ugama.
Yella yiwen n ubeɛɛuc isem-is ttezrureq.
Tura ad am-in-azneɣ yiwet n tesɣunt n yiḍrisen.
Ad ig Rebbi ussan-im akk d imellalen.
Ad ig Rebbi tufiḍ ayen iɣef tettnadiḍ.
Awer tesɛuḍ aɣilif.
Ur tteffreɣ ara fell-am, aql-i ttaruɣ yiwen n ungal.
Tagi i d tirmit-iw tamezwarut.
Ig Rebbi ala tiẓeḍt ara d-tettmmagareḍ.
Ad ig Rebbi tiliḍ akken tebɣid.
Amzun yečča axerrub ur newwi, yettel yiles-is.
Yuɛer akken ad d-tafeḍ tabadut i uḥulfu.
Kra n wayen akka tessen tettmal-as-t, ama d lecɣal n uxxam ama d wid n lexla, leɛmer i tt-tɣull.
Akken qqaren: “Aqcic d ahwawi, rnan-as tiẓemmarin”.
Daɣ netta, Caɛban d amedyaz yerna yeɛceq...
Anzi-nni n ddeɛwat n temɣarin yeqqaren: « Ad ak-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛebbuḍt terwa, taɛrurt telsa ».
D tidet akka i yella lḥal maɛna taduṭ ɣef yiɛrar n wulli d yizamaren temsex.
Azekka-nni d ass n letnayen, kkrent-d zik i snat, ssewwent-d lqahwa, swant-tt s lesfenǧ i d-ɛerken-t iḍelli-nni.
Ih a Cabḥa, amahil n taduṭ yessutur-d aṭas n tɣariwin, gar-asent leḥmala n ccɣel-a, tazmert, tanekkra zik yal ass akked ssber.
Yirbaḥ a yemma Mennun, azekka ad d-kkreɣ zik. Kemm tennumeḍ, yal ass mi ara yefrari, ittaf-ikem-id lḥal tukiḍ-d.
Nna Mennun teḥmmel Akli, fell-as ad tsebbel leɛmer-is imi ala winna d Rebbi i tesɛa.
Ihi a yelli, heggi-g iman-im, azekka ad nebdu lecɣal-nni n uẓeṭṭa. I tenna Nna Mennun i teslit-is.
Ixeddim i d-iteddun ad t-teg Nna Mennun d taguri n uẓeṭṭa.
D yiwet n tegnit i d-yeɣlin ɣef teslit-is ad telmed amek i d-yettili uẓeṭṭa seg taduṭ n yilis alamma d tukksa n uɛdil.
Aṭas n tewsatin n tayri i yellan.
Trebba-tt-id yemma-s s cwiṭ n lɛezza, d taqcict n ccuq, txeddem ayen tebɣa mi tella akken d taqrurt.
Mi temmed d tilemẓit, tuɣal tetɛeqqel.
D nettat i yesnusun times n yemma-s ma tekker mi ara tennaɣ d walebɛaḍ.
Tessen akk amek ara as-truḥ alma terra-tt-id ɣer leɛqel-is, dɣa ad tendem deg wayen akk i texdem mi tella akken trekkem seg zzɛaf.
Ad as-tiniḍ d tameṭṭut-nniḍen deg wakken yettbeddil wurrif udem-is.
Ɣef waya i tt-ttkukrun medden ad hedren ula cwiṭ yid-s.
Tessen anwa lweqt i d-yessufuɣ Caɛban lmal-is, ad t-yawi ad ikes.
D yiwet n tugna, mi ara tt-iwali Caɛban, yettuɣal d wayeḍ, amzun yettferfir gar yigenni d tmurt am ufrux.
Ul-is irennu deg tyita.
Awal gar-asen ur d-yettili.
Akka i d timetti taqbaylit, maɛna tasusmi-nni i d-iɣellin fell-asen, aṭas i d-teqqar.
Tettmal-d yiwet n tmacahut n tayri gar sin myeḥmmalen aṭas aṭas.
Asteqsi d wa: Ad d-yas neɣ ur d-ittas.
Azekka-nni zik diɣen i d-kkrent akken ad awint taduṭ-nni s asif ad tt-fsunt deg waman i iteddun war aḥbas.
Taduṭ mazal tebzeg cwiṭ, ɣef yigertilen ara tt-fesren, ad as-rnunt azway s uɛekkaz alma tekkaw akk.
Mi tekkaw dayen imiren ad tebdu temhelt n umacaḍ.
Imceḍ d yiwen n wallal n uẓeṭṭa.
Ad am-d-ggalleɣ s wayen tebɣiḍ ard tikkelt tamezwarut i mecḍeɣ anect-a akk n taduṭ.
Yal tikkelt mi ara tɛeddi ad temceḍ taduṭ-nni tessuffuɣ-d tirect n tewḍufin.
Mi temceḍ acḥal d abrid d tiwḍufin i d-tettekkes Nna Mennun seg wuglan n yimceḍ.
Akka i tettwaxdam yemma Ǧuhra, yemma-s n Cabḥa.
Seg mi ara d-tekker tanezzayt d nettat d tikci n yiwellihen i yelli-s uqbel ad d-teddu d tislit s axxam n At Wulmu.
Ma ssawḍeɣ ɣer wayen akka i d-teqqareḍ, urǧin ad ttuɣ lxir i iyi-txedmeḍ seg wass-nni i d-kecmeɣ axxam-im.
Ad am-iniɣ tanemmirt tameqqrant a yemma tis snat.
Yemma Ǧuhra, aṭas nettat tettwessi deg-i, ad iliɣ deg lebɣi n temɣart-iw d urgaz-iw, kemm ufiɣ-kem-id telhiḍ xir n yemma.
Ma d Cabḥa, yal tikkelt ara tegzu yiwet n temhelt tamaynut ad teskker tamɣart-is, ad tkemmel ccɣel-nni alma ifukk.
Wisssen acḥal n wussan ara tekk fell-asen imi ttaṭṭafen-tt lecɣal-nniḍen n yal ass, abraz n lḥala, agam, tarda n yiceṭṭiḍden, aniwel…
I wakken ur yettembawal ara, Srusun fell-as kra n yiblaḍen yemmden.
Deg yiwen n yixef n tencirt-nni yenta yiwen n wadar n yisegnan n wuzzal ɣef wakk tehri-s, yettban-d iqewwes am uzgen n twinest.
Talemdalt tga am yimceḍ maca meẓẓiyet.
Akken qqaren: « Amaẓuẓ yesserkab agaẓuẓ ».
Anda lliɣ telliḍ yid-i.
Ssura-m temlek-iyi.
Ur zmireɣ ad kem-ǧǧeɣ weḥd-m.
Ttarguɣ-kem tiṭ-iw teldi.
Allaɣ yettnadi, ussan sɛeddaɣ yid-m.
Ttneqlabeɣ deg wussu weḥdi.
Iḍes yugi-iyi.
Idim deg yiẓuran irekkem.
Ssarameɣ iḍ ad yeɣli, d wass ad d-yali.
Ad ifakk fell-i yir axemmem.
Ɛzizeḍ nezzeh fell-i a Lwiza, tezgiḍ deg tidmi-w ass d yiḍ.
Tugna taneggarut i ttwaliɣ uqbel ad qemcent wallen-iw mi ara d-ires fell-i yiḍes deg yiḍ, d kemm.
Yal tikkelt ara yeffeɣ ɣer lexla, ad ikes lmal-is neɣ ad yenqec tileqqamin-is, Caɛban itekk s tẓebbujt, aɛessas n taddart.
Am leɛwayed-is yessefqad ɣer uɣalad n deffir n tẓebbujt, gar yiẓra ma ad yaf kra n tebrat i as-d-tuzen tin akken izedɣen ul-is.
Ma yufa ayen iɣef yettnadi, ad t-id-tafeḍ kra ara yekk wass yefreḥ, yettefninix kan.
Ma takwat n tebratin yufa-tt d tilemt, tagnit izeglen, yettɣaḍ-it lḥal.
Imeksawen nehren lmal-nsen s adrar anda ara ikes.
Arrac, tturaren ur ɛeyyun.
Yal tanezzayt, ifellaḥen ttruḥun ɣer yiɣewdan-nsen.
Caɛban iḥemmel Lwiza am tmemmuct n tiṭ-is.
Ur ttḥar ara, ur ttayes ara acku ala yid-m i bɣiɣ ad idireɣ, ur zmireɣ d tayeḍ a Lwiza-w.
Ḥsiɣ ula d nekk, yiwen n wass ad frunt, ad d-tekcem teḍsa s lqewwa s axxam-nneɣ, am wass-a…
Cabḥa imeṭṭawen teddun ɣef leḥnak-is izewwaɣen, tesmuzgut kan i lehdur iẓidanen i d-iteffɣen seg yimi n temɣart-is.
Ad nexdem akken akk xeddmen medden yettnadin ad d-sɛun dderya.
Ur qeḍḍeɛ ara layas a yelli, ṭṭef kan deg Rebbi, am wass-a wissen acḥal n warrac d teqcicin ara am-d-yezzin.
S yiwen n uɛekkaz azuran trewwi taduṭ-nni daxel n waman yeḥman.
Win inudan yufa
Wissen kan melmi ara n-bedden yinexḍaben ara n-azneɣ ɣef umnar n tewwurt-nwen, ad kem-iyi-d-xeḍben.
Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, kkes aɣilif ma yella yeɛkes zzher-iw, yugi ad tezdiḍ tudert-im yid-i, ur ḥsiɣ ara akk ad bḍuɣ tayla-w d tmeṭṭu-nniḍen.
A Baya ur kem-in-uwiḍeɣ ara akken ad d-tawḍeḍ yessi.
Yessi beɛdent-kem, d tiqcicin amzun d lxir, d zher kan i ulac, wanag tal yiwet ad tili deg uxxam-is.
Ula d axxam n At Wulmu ibɛed-ikem.
Awal ur t-id-terni, tezzeḥweḍ Werdiya s usagem-ines, teǧǧa-n tinagamin deg tala ttkemmilen agam d yimecriwen.
Axxam n twacult n At Wulmu yezga-d d amezwaru ɣef tama tayeffust n ubrid i issekcamen ɣer taddart n Tewrirt.

Uzneɣ-am-in awal.
Uzneɣ-as awal.
Uzneɣ-awen-in awal.
Uzneɣ-akent-in awal.
Uzneɣ-asen awal.
Uzneɣ-asent awal.
Yuzen-iyi-id awal.
Yuzen-ak-d awal.
Yuzen-am-d awal.
Yuzen-as-d awal.
Yuzen-aɣ-d awal.
Yuzen-awen-d awal.
Yuzen-awent-d awal.
Yuzen-asen-d awal.
Yuzen-asent-d awal.
Yekcem s axxam yaf-itt tgen.
Yekcem s axxam yaf-ikem tegneḍ.
Yekcem s axxam yaf-iten gnen.
Yekcem s axxam yaf-itent gnent.
Yekcem s axxam yaf-ik tegneḍ.
Yekcem s axxam yaf-iken tegnem.
Il entra à la maison, il vous trouva endormis.
Yekcem s axxam yaf-ikent tegnemt.
Il entra à la maison, il vous trouva endormies.
Kecmeɣ s axxam, afeɣ-t igen.
Kecmeɣ s axxam, afeɣ-tt tgen.
Kecmeɣ s axxam, afeɣ-k tegneḍ.
Kecmeɣ s axxam, afeɣ-kem tegneḍ.
Kecmeɣ s axxam, afeɣ-ken tegnem.
Kecmeɣ s axxam, afeɣ-kent tegnemt.
Kecmeɣ s axxam, afeɣ-ten gnen.
Kecmeɣ s axxam, afeɣ-tent gnent.
Nekcem s axxam, naf-iten gnen.
Nekcem s axxam, naf-itent gnent.
Nekcem s axxam, naf-ik tegneḍ.
Nous entrâmes à la maison, nous te trouvâmes endormi.
Nekcem s axxam, naf-ikem tegneḍ.
Nekcem s axxam, naf-it igen.
Nekcem s axxam, naf-itt tgen.
Ay akken i tecbeḥ tjeǧǧigt-a!
Tarbaɛt, tekkin deg-s mraw d yiwen n yimwuraren.
Ɣret tasekla taqbaylit a Leqbayel.
Ma yella ur teqqarem ara tasekla-nwen, mlet-iyi anwa ara tt-yeɣren.
Taɣuri-nwen n yidlisen-a i d-itteffɣen tura s waṭas, trennu asebɣes i wid i ten-yettarun.

Mliɣ-awent d acu ara txedmemt.

Mliɣ-asent d acu ara xedment.

Temliḍ-aɣ-d d acu ara nexdem.
Ur asen-temliḍ ara d acu ara xedmen.
Ur asent-temliḍ ara d acu ara xedment.
Ur iyi-d-temliḍ ara d acu ara xedmeɣ.
Nudaɣ fell-ak, ufiɣ-k.
Nudaɣ fell-am, ufiɣ-kem.
Nudaɣ fell-as, ufiɣ-itt.

Inuda fell-ak, yufa-ak.
Ur nudaɣ fell-ak, ur k-ufiɣ.
Ur nudaɣ fell-am, ur kem-ufiɣ.

Ur inuda fell-ak, ur k-yufi.

Tnuda fell-ak, tufa-k.

Tnuda fell-asent, tufa-tent.
Tnuda fell-aneɣ, tufa-aɣ.
Ur tnuda fell-i ur iyi-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-as, ur tt-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-awen, ur ken-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-akent, ur kent-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-asen, ur ten-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-asent, ur tent-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-aneɣ, ur aɣ-tufi.
Ttrad yuɣ-d akk tamurt.
Fransa i tt-ceggḍen d tamurt n Leqbayel i as-d-yettaran tiɣrit.
Deg tallit-nni, yettilin win yettuɣalen d amjahed.
Tuwi-d fell-as ad ineɣ yiwen n userdas n yicenga.
Imsebblen seg zik i llan.
D imjuhad udrigen, mačči d wid irefden leslaḥ, maca d nutni i ixeddmen akk timsal i yettarran amahil n umjahed iḍerru-d akken i iwata.
Amusebbel d argaz n umlan, ilaq kullec ad yili ɣef tiṭ-is.
Anda iḥerrek lɛesker afransis ad yeḥsu.
D isalli ara yessiweḍ s tuffra, kanakken yettfuru i yimjuhad.
Tamurt n Leqbayel, urǧin teqbil yiwen n uɛdaw, seg zik n zik, ad tt-yeḥkem.
. Llan gar-asen wid yulin s adrar, ttnaɣen mgal Fransa, sebɛa n yiseggasen uqbel ad yendeh ttrad n tesllullit taɣelnawt.
Yella diɣen win iwimi tefka tmetti isem n uḥerki, d win ixedɛen tamurt-is, yedda d uɛdaw-is, yessnuzuy deg watmaten-is.
Yal yiwen wissen d acu n tmentilt i t-yerran d aḥerki.
Ad tafeḍ yiwen, cwiṭ n trrugza ur tt-yesɛi ; winna yeshel ad yeddu d ucengu u ad d-iwwet gma-s.
Yella wayeḍ terra-t tmara ad iḥerki imi ahat yella kra n umjahed yesɛan tuḥsibt d twacult-is.
Yezmer lḥal teɣli temgerḍt gar-asen, tiririt n ttar tezga yiwen ur tt-itettu.
Ɣef waya i yextar tama s way-s yezmer ad iḥareb ɣef yiman-is d twacult-is.
Irgazen am wigi, ɣas ḥerkin, lsan, ddan d Fransa, mazal tezdeɣ deg-sen teqbaylit.
Aṭas yellan gar-asen ifen s mmeyya n yiḥricen kra n yirgazen i yettarran iman-nsen zaɛma d imjuhad.
Daɣ netta, acḥal d abrid ma bɣan yiqerray n yimjuhad ad wwten lkazirna n umkan flan, akken ad d-awin leslaḥ yellan dinna, d iḥerkiyen-a ur nebri ara i trrugza-nni taqbaylit i ttafen.
D nutni i asen-d-ileddin tawwurt n lkazirna ɣef tis snat n tezzayt mi d-tezzi nnuba-nsen n teɛessast.
Iserdasen akken ma llan tuwi-ten tnafa.
Tamhelt teḍerru-d akken kan i tt-yebɣa wul.
Caɛban d Wakli d imsebblen imecṭaḥ.
Fransa ur tettarra ara kk ddhen-is arrac imeẓẓyanen ad kkin deg ttrad i d-yeɣlin ɣef ugdud azzayri mebla lebɣi-s.
Tettwali-ten-id Fransa d imeksawen imecṭaḥ yessuffuɣen lmal-nsen ɣer udrar ad ikes, d aya kan.
D acu i yettilin daxel n yicwariyen-nni?
Medden akk ɛudden d aɛwin i ttawin yid-sen ɣer lexla.
D tidet, yella wayagi imi ttɣimin deg udrar kra ara yekk wass.
Alma alaḥal ad yeɣli yiṭij, lmal yečča-d rrbiɛ yebɣa almi yerwa, i d-ttuɣalen.
Tikwal diɣen ttaččaren tiqrinin n ucwari d leɣber n yiɣersiwen-nsen.
Maɛna yiwen ur yeẓri d acu i rran ddaw n leɣbar-nni, ala nutni deg sin yid-sen, Nna Mennun d kra n yimsebblen imeqqranen n taddart n Tewrirt i yeḥsan d acu yellan.
Imsebblen imecṭaḥ, Caɛban d Wakli, ur ukiren ara isem-a i asen-fkan s tuffra yimjuhad n udrar.
. Mi ara awḍen zaɛma ɣer wadeg n tkessawt, d yiwet n luḍa tawesɛant anda rrbiɛ ala netta imi truḥ akka d imerjan, ad serḥen i lmal-nsen ad ikes.
Yiwen ad yeqqim ad iɛass lmal ɣef wuccen, ma d wayeḍ, ad yawi akkin sin-nni n yeɣyal s ttɛebga-nsen, ɛebban-d ama d leɣbar ama d aɛwin-nsen.
Ad yaweḍ ɣer tama n yiwen n uẓru d ameqqran, yeddaray kra n win i d-yezgan ɣef yiri-s.
Ad d-yeḥbes zzwayel, ad iṭill akka d wakka, ma yettuqenneɛ yiwen ur t-id-yettwali, ala Rebbi, ad yemmeɣ ɣef ttɛebga i d-iɛebba ɣef yiɣyal-nni, ad d-yekkes tacekkart seg yal taqrint.
Yal yiwet d acu i d-teččur.
Ad tent-issers kanakken ur fsint daxel n yiwen n umruj iɣazen ddaw n uẓru-nni ameqqran.
Din ad yaf kra n tcekkarin tilmawin ara d-yerr yid-s, ala yiwet i yeččuren d iceṭṭiḍen imesxen n yimjuhad.
D acu i yellan daxel n teckkarin-nni i d-uwin yid-sen?
Deg yiwet nezmer ad naf daxel-is ddeqs n twackanin n uɣrum, zzit deg teqraɛtin, iniɣman, iɣi, ayefki d uzemmur.
Tayeḍ d iceṭṭiḍen izeddganen i d-ssardent tlawin n taddart n Tewrirt.
Ma deg tleqqaɛt-is, rsent ta ɣef ta, kra n tsendiaq yeččuren d ddwawit d lfasmat, ttunefkent-d i wid ijerḥen.
Uqbel aɣelluy n yiṭij ad d-rren lmal-nsen s axxam, ad d-rekben iɣyal-nsen.
Am wakken kra ur yeḍri, tanezzayt arrac ruḥen ad ksen lmal-nsen, tameddit nnejmaɛen-d s axxam.
Maɛna lxuf i ugaden yiwet n tikkelt iman-is, ahat leɛmer i ugaden deg ddunit-nsen am wass-nni.
Am leɛwayed-nsen teddun ɣer tkessawt, icwariyen ssetfen seg wayen i ttawin akken s adrar.
. Deg ubrid mi ffɣen cwiṭ i taddart mmugren-d yiwet n terbaɛt n yiserdasen n Fransa.
- Amek i tesɛeddam ass-nwen ay imeksawen-iw imecṭaḥ?
- Qqim kan a yemma, wa ad am-yeḥkun! I as-yerra Wakli.
Udem n Nna Mennun yebda yettbeddil ini seg wakken texleɛ uqbel ad as-d-alsen d acu yeḍran yid-sen.
Init-d ay arraw-iw, amzun tufa-tt-id tasa-w, kra yekka wass d nettat tettefriwis, nekk deɛɛuɣ s agellid ameqqran ad ffɣent deg telwit.
Ihi yesla-am-d Rebbi a yemma. I as-yerna Caɛban.
Seg wanta tawaɣit-a iseg d-tmenɛem?
Tufiḍ-tt-id a yemma, ulac tawaɣit nnig n tin i aɣ-izeglen tanezzay-a.
Neffeɣ kan cwiṭ i taddart mmugren-aɣ yimcumen-nni n lɛesker.
Ay iɛessasen n taddart, rnu-iyi-d winna.
D acu i awen-xedmen?
Amek i aken-ǧǧan tuɣalem-d s axxam?
Imir-nni i ṭṭfeɣ taɛebbuḍt-iw acku uwḍen-d almi d taddart, wwten ɛeddan s ubrid n wadda, ahat ɣer Tẓerrajt i bernen.
D leɣbar i nuwi deg ucwari i aɣ-imenɛen a yemma.
Iqerreb-d ɣur-i yiwen n userdas ad i wali d acu i d-nɛebba, rriḥa-nni n teberra d yimurruten n uɣyul tewwet-it s anzaren-is, terra-t ɣer deffir s sin neɣ kraḍ n yisurifen, netta yettwaǧab s tefransist i uɣella-ines: « Ttfuḥun-d warbaɛ-nni ».
Aɣella-nni, ahat yeɛdez, yessendeh tarbaɛt-is ad tkemmel abrid-is.
Ad xedmen i yexdem umger i yiger.
Ad xedmen ayen xedmen i taddart n Tiɣilt ilindi akka imira.
Mraw d semmus n yirgazen d kraḍet n tlawin i nɣan lɛesker n Fransa deg yiwen n wass.
Ass-nni sgujlen ma d kra d aqcic, leḥzen yesbur-d i taddart am tagut n tegrest.
Deg tleqqaɛt n ucwari, tres yiwet n tmeẓẓyant d tsenduqt n yikartucen, ttlen deg yiwen n ubeḥnuq.
D imsebblen n taddart i uznen tayemmust-a i yimjuhad, qrib i tegla yis-wen d yis-neɣ.
Ittas-d ɣer da snat n tikal deg yimalas.
Ass-nni, yemma-m ur d-tḥeččem ara yaya Xuxa d yemma Mennun, d nutenti ara n-yasen.
Ass-nni ad iliɣ d yiwen n umdan yumren ugar n yimdanen akk n ddunit.
Ad yifsus wul-iw i iɛebban aṭas n ccek.
Ad iyi-tt-id-fken At Waɛli neɣ ad agin.
Ma yella ugin dayen ur ssarameɣ ara akk ; ssebba thegga-d, mazal ur zwijent ara Zwina n Dehbiya.
Deɛɛuɣ kra yekka wass ad afent i snat yid-sent nnsib-nsent, ad kksent akkin sdat-i, zgant-aɣ-d d ugur i Lwiza d nekk.
Ssarameɣ iḍ ad yeɣli, d ass ad d-yali, ad ifakk fell-i uxemmem.
Amek Lwiza tamaẓuẓt teqqar-d imeslayen iweznen am wi?
Yiwet deg-sent ur teḥsi s wassaɣ n taywalt yellan gar-as d Caɛban, ɣef waya i nwant lehdur i d-teqqar Lwiza d lehdur-is.
Zwina d Dehbiya usment cwiṭ deg uletma-tsent tamecṭuḥt imi ɣas ugarent-tt deg leɛmer, tif-itent deg wamayendin n temsal.
Maɛna Lwiza, zzuxx ur t-tessin ara, tettqadar akken i ilaq yessetma-s i wimi tessawal i snat yid-sent Nnana.
Yettwali-iyi-d s yir tiṭ.
Yettwali-k-id s yir tiṭ.
Yettwali-kem-id s yir tiṭ.
Yettwali-tt-id s yir tiṭ.
Yettwali-t-id s yir tiṭ.
Yettwali-aɣ-d s yir tiṭ.
Yettwali-ken-id s yir tiṭ.
Yettwali-kent-id s yir tiṭ.
Yettwali-ten-id s yir tiṭ.
Il les voit d’un mauvais œil.
Yettwali-tent-id s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-iyi-d s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-k-id s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-kem-id s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-it-id s yir tiṭ.
Ils le voient d’un mauvais œil.
Ttwalin-itt-id s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-aɣ-d s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-ken-id s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-kent-id s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-ten-id s yir tiṭ.
Ttwalin-tent-id s yir tiṭ.
Zik, dagi i yezdeɣ.
Teddem-d taferkit-nni iɣef tura tabrat-is, tettel-itt ɣef ukkuẓet n tikal, tger-itt daxel n tjellabt n lkaɣeḍ teccemeɛ-itt, terra-tt daxel n yiciwi-s.
Terfed asagem imi tameddit n wass d nettat i d-yettagmen dima.
Ma truḥem-d akka d afella ala aqbal ara teqbel nnesba-nwen.
I ak-in-uzneɣ d talwit ay aɛziz-iw.
Ttrajuɣ ad iyi-d-terreḍ s wawal s lɛejlan.
Kkseɣ-d akk ayen yellan deg wul-iw mebla ma tezɛef yemma, d ayen isewhamen.
A wudu kan imi i iyi-teǧǧa fukkeɣ-d awal i bɣiɣ ad as-t-id-iniɣ deg wacḥal aya.
Yemma ɣas tettban-d tbeddel ṭṭbiɛa-s maɛna mazal cwiṭ n nnmara teẓẓa deg-s.
. Mačči d lɛid tameẓẓyant i d-izewwiren lɛid tameqqrant?
Yebna-as axxam.
Yebna-ak axxam.
Yebna-am axxam.
Yebna-aɣ axxam.
Yebna-awen axxam.
Yebna-awent axxam.
Il vous a construit une maison..
Yebna-asen axxam.
Yebna-asent axxam.
Yebna-iyi axxam.
Bniɣ-as axxam.
Fernen yifellaḥen gar lbaṭaṭa yelhan d tin n diri.
Bniɣ-ak axxam.
Bniɣ-am axxam.
Bniɣ-awen axxam.
Bniɣ-awent axxam.
Bniɣ-asen axxam.
Bniɣ-asent axxam.
Ur as-yebni ara axxam.
Ur ak-yebni ara axxam.
Ur am-yebni ara axxam.
Ur awen-yebni ara axxam.
Ur awent-yebni ara axxam.
Ur asen-yebni ara axxam.
Ur assent-yebni ara axxam.
Yuker-as tikti-s.
Yuker-iyi tikti-w.
Yuker-ak tikti-k.
Yuker-aɣ tikti-nneɣ.
Uiker-aɣ tikti-nteɣ.
Yuker-awen tikti-nwen.
Yuker-awent tikti-nkent.
Yuker-asen tikti-nsen.
Yuker-asent tikti-nsent.
Nuker-as tikti-s.
Nuker-ak tikti-k.
Nuker-am tikti-k.
Nuker-awen tikti-nwen.
Nuker-akent tikti-nkent.
Nuker-asen tikti-nsen.
Nuker-asent tikti-nsent.
Mi yekcem Wakli s axxam, yeqqim almi i as-d-sersen imensi i yenna i yemm-as ayen iɣef t-id-iwelleh Caɛban.
Ifukk kan umedyaz asiwel n usefru-s, Akli ameshanay awḥid yewwet-as afus s laɛqel akken ur d-sellen ara wid yellan ttqessiren deg tejmaɛt.
Efk-iyi cwiṭ n wakud ad t-id-mmektiɣ.
Ihi aql-i ldiɣ imeẓẓuɣen-iw i sin ma ad tebduḍ.
Yeqqim yiwet neɣ snat n tesdatin yettxemmim, yuɣal isreḥ-as am leɛwayed-is.
D aya kan, nwiɣ ad iyi-d-tessutreḍ kra iwimi ur zmireɣ ara.
D acu-t wagi diɣen i d-terniḍ ay Akli?
Ahya Caɛban, d acu i k-yuɣen akka, ɛni tettuḍ anwa i k-id-isekkren.
Ad awen-ikkes Rebbi aɣilif.
Ma txedmem-iyi akken, ur tettuɣ ara akk lxir-nwen.
Yuɣ-d baba takarust tamaynut.
Bezzef sin n yiseggasen n uraju.
Zik-nni, yella yiwen n urgaz, ssnen-t akk medden d amakur.
Ɣfel kan ɣef kra, yuwi-t.
Yuḍen meskin aṭan-a n tukerḍa, mačči deg ufus-is.
Yiwen n wass, yekker-d zik, uqbel akk imezdaɣ n taddart.
