Iger-d deg uqerruy-is yiwen uxxam ad t-yaker imi imawlan-is, ass-nni ulac-iten, wissen anda irezfen.
Yulbab ɣef ssur, iǧelleb, yufa-d iman-is deg ufrag n uxxam n medden i yettarran ssut imi yiwen ur yelli dina ala netta.
Yekcem ɣer yiwet n texxamt, deg tesga ibedd uẓeṭṭa
Iṭṭal akka d wakka ur yufi kra yesɛan azal ala sin n yiqerdacen yersen ɣef yiwen n usenduq.
Yemmeɣ fell-asen yeddem-iten-id ad ten-yawi.
Yedda kra n yisurifen deg ufrag, yettnadi ad yuɣal s wansa i d-yekka.
Maɛna uqbel ad yaweḍ ɣer ssur-nni, teḍra yid-s d acu yeḍran.
Yerra-d s lexbar s wanẓaden akk n tfekka-s ttɣaren, ttuɣalen d isennnanen.
Ula d asuɣu ur yezmir ad t-id-iger imi ula d awal iruḥ-as.
Yerna cwiṭ yekri ɣef tikkelt.
Argaz ameɣbun, ziɣen d Rebbi i t-ibexsen, seg yimir-nni i yuker aqerdac, i t-yerra d inisi.
Tamacahut-iw lwad lwad mliɣ-tt-id i warraw n lejwad.
Amacek-itt tmacahut-im a Nna Mennun, yerna temliḍ-tt-id akken i tt-yebɣa lxaṭer.
Tanemmirt a Cabḥa, walaɣ-kem-id tefkiḍ-d tameẓẓuɣt akken i ilaq.
Seg zik ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ i tmucuha mi lliɣ d taqrurt.
Tura mi ddiɣ deg leɛmer, uɣaleɣ d tamɣart, d timlin i ḥemmleɣ ad tent-id-mleɣ, ladɣa i Wakli mi yella akken d agrud.
Uqbel ad uɣaleɣ ɣer snat-nni nniḍen n tmucuha, bɣiɣ ad nehder cwiṭ ɣef tissulya n Caɛban, ahat yella kra i am-d-yenna Wakli.
Akken i yella lḥal a yemma Mennun, ulac d acu i iteffer fell-i, ladɣa ɣef umeddakel-is Caɛban i yettɛuzzu aṭas aṭas.
D tidet, akken i d-kkren amzum d atmaten neɣ xir.
Ihi, azekka ad trezfeḍ sin wussan neɣ kraḍ s axxam-nwen, ad tafeḍ tcedhaḍ imawlan-im, sellem fell-asen.
Mi d-tuɣaleḍ ini-as i yemma-m ad d-teddu yid-m akken ad nemsaɛaf s axxam n Ɛacur At Waɛli ad d-nexḍeb yelli-s Lwiza i Caɛban.
Yirbaḥ a Yemma Mennun, d tidet jjmeɣ aṭas baba d yemma, ddeqs aya ur ten-walaɣ ara.
Ayen akk i iyi-d-tenniḍ ad yaweḍ ɣer yemma, kkes aɣilif.
D lawan ad kkreɣ ad d-heggiɣ imekli.
Nqesser yerna qrib ad nfakk taduṭ-nni s uqerdec.
Taqcict-agi tuɣal d acu-tt a Cabḥa?
Zik-nni, tella yiwet n teqcict d tuzzyint maca ulac ɣur-s s wacu ara d-tesken tahuski-ines.
Wissen d tasekkurt neɣ d tabuzegrayezt?
Tikkelt-a yuwwet-ikem wugur, tuwi-d ad tbibbeḍ mi ur d-tufiḍ ara tifrat.
Ulac, nudaɣ ur ufiɣ kra.
Sbubbeɣ-am taftilt n leḥrir mačči Yamina n uzrib ufella iweznen azal n sin n yiqenṭaren.
Tanemmirt imi i iyi-tḥudreḍ acku Nna Yamina ur as-zemmreɣ ara.
Zik-nni yella yiwen n urgaz d amakur.
Yiwen wass, yekcem ɣer yiwen uxxam, yufa tissirt m sin yiɣuraf.
Yuker-itt-id, dɣa seg wass-nni ibxeṣ-it Rebbi.
Yerra-t d yiwen n uɣersiw amecṭuḥ, tafekka-s ɣummen-tt yiɣuraf, ma d taqerruyt-is am tin n uzrem.
Ad bduɣ seg tmezwarut.
Tettqerdic netta-t tḥekku-d
Elle cardait tout en racontant.
Tezzin-d i lkanun ttqessiren.
Ttmalen-d timucuha, timseḍsa, timseɛraq, d akud iḥemmlen aṭas yigerdan.
Ad d-uɣaleɣ ihi tura ɣer wawal-iw amezwaru, ɣer tmacahut-nni ara teḥkuḍ i warraw-im.
Mi tfukk tagi ad am-d-rnuɣ nsat-nniḍen meḥsub kif kif-itent akk imi uwint-d i kraḍet ɣef tukarḍa n kra n tɣawsa.
Wissen ma teẓriḍ d acu i yeḍran d urgaz-nni yukren aqerdac?
D yiwet n tmacahut tamecṭuḥt i iyi-d-tettmal yemma mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ.
Ad am-tt-id-mleɣ akken ad tt-temleḍ i warraw-im ula d kemm.
Cabḥa tesla-d kan i wawal arraw yuɣal ibeddel wudem-is.
Teɛqel-itt temɣart-is tetqelleq.
Cabḥa tesla-d kan i lehdur-a i d-yettakken tabɣest i tin amzun tellez, tecmummeḥ-d.
Ma d Cabḥa, leqdic akk n uxxam ines.
Aɛwin yettawi-t yid-s.
Segmi ara yeffeɣ tanezzay, ur d-ikeččem s axxam alma yeɣli yiṭij.
Akli d tmeṭṭut-is Cabḥa ttnekkaren-d tal tikkelt deffir n nna Mennun.
Akli ad ifakk tissitt-is n lqahwa ad yeṭṭef abrid-is n lxedma.
Ayen yufa ad t-yexdem, mačči d win iɛeddzen.
Tikkelt ad tafeḍ ikerrez, tikkelt imegger neɣ isserwat.
Deg lawan n uzemmur deg tissirt n ugummu-a i yettmahal.
Ma ulac akk, yettliwi ibennayen.
Mi ara d-yekcem ad t-waliɣ amek ara nexdem akk.
Tseww-d lqahwa, tesserkem-d ayefki n taɣaḍt i d-teẓẓeg imir-nni kan.
Tessureg ayefki s afenǧal almi d nnig n uzgen, tkemmel teččur-it s lqawa.
"Ih, iẓem n ččina ttxil-k", i d-yenna Mike.
Ad d-wweɣ aɣrum, ad d-sewweɣ leǧwaz.
Yeččur wul n Lwiza, aṭas i d-tura ɣef lkaɣeḍ.
D tidet, d yiwet n tebrat ɣezzifen.
Yeɣra-tt seg tazwara-s almi d taggara-s.
D netta kan i izemren ad tt-yefrun.
Yekker-d seg wussu-s, yelsa arkasen-is, tawwurt tefk-it
Yerra srid s axxam n Wat Wulmu.
Yekcem s tewwurt n ufrag mebla ma yesṭebṭeb imi iḥseb am wakken d axxam-is.
Yufa yemma-s Mennun, deg tesga n ufrag, teqqim ɣef ugertil tettqerdic taduṭ.
D lxir a yemma, bɣiɣ kan ad waliɣ Akli.
Azul a mmi! D acu i k-id-yuwin akka? Yak d lxir kan.
Cabḥa tɛedda ad tniwel ma d tamɣart-is tettkemmil aqerdec n tadṭ-is.
Mačči aṭas i as-mazal ad tt-tfakk akken ma tella.
Tameddit-nni kan, Cabḥa isserzef-itt urgaz-is s axxam n yimawlan-is.
Axxam n yiḍulan n Wakli yezga-d ɣef kra n tmaḍ n lmitrat uqbel ad tkecmeḍ taddart n tiɣilt ur nebɛid ara aṭas ɣef Tewrirt.
Azal n snat tmerwin ar kraḍet tmerwin n tesdatin n tikli ɣef uḍar i yellan gar snat n tudrin-a ɣef waya i ttemnasben seg zik yimezdaɣen-nsent.
Azal n snat tmerwin ar kraḍet tmerwin n tesdatin n tikli ɣef uḍar i yellan gar snat n tudrin-a, ɣef waya i ttemnasben seg zik yimezdaɣen-nsent.
Akli yeswa lqahwa, iqesser d yiḍulen-is, yeǧǧa-n Cabḥa din ɣer yemma-s d baba-s ma d netta yuɣal-d ɣer Tewrirt.
Yekka s tejmaɛt yufa din Caɛban, kemmlen akken abrid almi d axxam n Nna Mennun i ten-yettrajun ad d-kecmen i sin yid-sen.
Meqqar mi nella akk da, ad nemcawar ɣef melmi ad nerzu ɣer At Waɛli.
Wessaɣ Cabḥa ad d-tenced yemma-s ad nemsaɛaf s axxam n teqcict.
Cabḥa ad n-teqqim dihin sin n wussan, alma d wis kraḍ ara d-tuɣal, d yemma-s ara tt-id-yerren.
Akka i nehder iḍelli.
Ihi a Caɛban ad as-nanef ɣer lḥedd n yimalas i d-iteddun.
Nekk, akken i d-tennam akken.
Ihi ar ass n lḥedd ɣef tis tẓa n tnezzayt.
Ad awen-ǧǧeɣ talwit.
D talwit i awen-d-ǧǧiɣ.
Yeǧǧa-ten mi yerra ɣef uqerruy-is.
Seg wasmi i iruḥ ur d-yezzi.
Yettu imawlan-is, yettu tamurt.
Caɛban iḥar ad yaweḍ s axxam akken ad as-yaru tabrat i Lwiza.
Imir-nni kan i tt-yuwi issers-itt deg tekwat-nni n tayri gar yiẓra.
Kukraɣ kan cwiṭ yemma-m maɛna akken d-teqqareɣ tbeddel, mačči d tin akken yesraran.
Ad nedɛu ɣer Rebbi ad d-yehdu yemma-m, ad tt-yerr d tin ibelhen.
Ass n lḥedd n yimalas i d-iteddun targit-nni i kem-ttarguɣ ad teffeɣ.
Ad tafeḍ diɣen deg tebrat-a asefru « Ttarguɣ-kem » i uriɣ sendiḍelli kan.
Ad tfakk fell-i targit, ad idireɣ yid-m deg tilawt, yal ass ad tettiliḍ yid-i nekk yid-m.
Yal iḍ nekk ttarguɣ-kem.
D kemm i d tamemmuct n tiṭ-iw.
Akka i d tudert a yemma. Mačči d ayen yellan deg ufus-iw…
Ad isteqsi Rebbi fell-as s lxir.
Ad teqqimeḍ ad teččeḍ imensi yid-neɣ.
Ad awen ibarek Rebbi s lxir, ala ɣur-i cwiṭ n ccɣel ur nlaq ara ad t-zegleɣ.
Ad ken-isellem Rebbi.
Tettaǧǧa dima taxxamt-is d tazeddgant.
Ma d cabḥa d tilemẓit s tezmert-is, teqqim ɣef yiwet n tqermet.
Dda Ɛacur bu yiwen uḍar, yeqqim ɣef udekkan, isenned ɣef tɛekkazt-is yerra ddaw teɣruḍt-is.
D tiqcicin i terza temsalt n zzwaj.
Tal yiwet tessaram ɣur-s i d-usant.
Werdiya tdeɛɛu deg wul-is teqqar: « Anaɣ a Rebbi ɣer Zwina neɣ Dehbiya i d-usant ».
Dda Ɛacur yenna ula d netta deg wul-is: « Ansuf yis-kent, tin i d-tessemmamt d tin.
Awer ḥebsen yinebgawen am kunemti akken yessi, tal yiwet ad teɛnu axxam-is, laɛnaya n Rebbi.
Ala Lwiza i yeẓran tamentilt n tirza n tlawin-a.
Terra iman-is am tin ur neẓri, awal ur t-id-tenni maɛna ala nettat i d-icebbḥen iman-is.
D yiwet n tikti i d-iɛeddan ɣef akk iqerray n twacult n Dda Ɛacur.
Ḥsan akk d acu akka i d-yuwin tinebgawin-a tanezzayt-a s axxam-nsen, ladɣa Lwiza i yeẓran kullec.
Maɛna yal yiwen amek i ikemmel axemmem-ines imi yebda yettemgirid akken i ilaq seg yiwen ɣer wayeḍ.
At uxxam mi d-slan i lehdur n uberrani, ffɣen-d d tirni, bedden deg tlemmast n ufrag am lmernuna.
Ad kem-isellem Rebbi.
Lɛeslam-nkent! Kecmemt-d, ih llan, ur ffiɣen ara. I asent-terra Zwina.
Daɣ netta akka i d-kkren wid terza taluft n tissulya.
Nna Mennun, tislit-is Cabḥa d yemma-s Nna Ǧuhra heyyant iman-nsent.
Akken kan i teffeɣ tegrest, tegla s usemmiḍ-is d yideflawen-is.
Tekcem-d tsemhuyt yifen akk tisemhay, tasebbaɣt n ugama yerran ddunit d taberqact.
Tariḥt-nni lɛali tettmenṭar, tuɣ-d yal adeg.
Tafsut tettarra ama amadan, ama agama yefreḥ, yezga yettaḍsa segmi ara d-yali wass.
Seg yimir-nni i d-tettban amzun d tislit.
Mi qqiment akken ɣef umnar n tewwurt, inced-itebt-id Dda Ɛacur s axxam n lwacul.
Zwina! Dehbiya! Heyyimt-d lqahwa. I asent-tenna yemma-tsent.
Ɛeslama-nkent a tid i aɣ-d-yeččuren tawwurt, ig Rebbi s lxir d rrbeḥ.
Ssarameɣ ala ayen yelhan kan i kent-id-yuwin ɣur-neɣ.
Isellem fell-ak a Dda Ɛacur.
Ɣef lxir i nettnadi.
. Nusa-d ad ken-naseb.
Mmi Caɛban, ɣas mačči n tɛebbuḍt-iw, ḥesbeɣ-t am mmi-nniḍen Akli.
Yuweḍ leɛmer ad yeg axxam, neqsed-iken-id ad aɣ-d-tefkem yelli-twen ad tezdi tudert-is yid-s.
Caɛban d argaz lɛali, d axeddam, d aneɛmar, ulac d acu ara as-d-nessukkes.
Ala deg lxir i t-id-ttaddren Wat taddart.
Asmahat teẓriḍ a Mennun, yessi i kraḍet yid-sent ur zwijent ara.
Gar snat tmenza, Zwina d Dehbiya, xtir tin i m-yehwan, taɣeḍ-tt i Caɛban-nwen.
Ur tfukk ara awal-is Werdiya almi d-ččurent i snat-yid-sent tiɣerqert n uxxam n lwacul.
Yiwet terfed-d sniwa iɣef rsen kra n yifenǧalen n ufexxar, tabaradit n lqahwa d yiwet n tecmuxt tzeggen d ayefki n taɣaḍt.
Ma d tayeḍ tuwi-d yiwen n ṭṭbeq ameqqran isettfen d lmeqruḍ akked lesfenǧ i d-theyya Lwiza iḍelli tameddit.
A-tent-i yessi a Mennun. Mačči d zzuxx ara m-zzuxxeɣ, ma nniɣ-am ulac aṭas n teqcicin i izeyynen am yessi.
D tidet a Werdiya, ayen i d-teqqareḍ akka.
Yessi-m i kraḍet yid-sent amzun d lxir.
Lwiza teqqim tbedd ɣef umnar n tewwurt, tettnezzih-d syin kra yeḍran ɣef tɣerɣert.
Ihi anta akka i yebɣa urgaz-nwen a Mennun? D Zwina neɣ d Dehbiya?
Argaz-nneɣ, akken d-tenniḍ, yextar tamelḥant-ihin i d-yettesmumuḥen seg sgellin. Yak d tihin i d Lwiza?
Akken i yella lḥal a Mennun.
D tihin i d Lwiza, tamaẓuẓt-iw.
Werdiya d yessi-s, Zwina d Dehbiya, amzun yeɣli-d ssqef ɣef yiqerray-nsent.
Isalli i slant isreɛ-itent.
Lwiza ur d-teddi ara akk deg yiqerray-nsent, ur d-tekcim ara deg leṣab i ḥesbent.
Nwant d yiwet kan gar snat yid-sent, d Zwina neɣ d Dehbiya.
Qqiment ddeqs uqbel ad d-uɣalent ɣer yiman-nsent.
Ad asent-ikkes utewhem i twehment, ur uḥtament ad d-teḍru akken.
D werdiya i d-yernan ɣef wawal n urgaz-is mi as-yekkes cwiṭ n udhac.
Maɛna Lwiza d nettat akk i d tamecṭuḥt deg-sent.
Nwiɣ ɣer Zwina neɣ ahat ɣer Dehbiya i d-tusamt.
Nniɣ-am ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-iniɣ ɣef thuski ifazen n yessi-m, maɛna Caɛban iwelleh-aɣ-d Lwiza.
Nekkenti nuɣ-as awal, nusa-d ad nsuter deg-wen ay At Waɛli ma ad aɣ-tt-id-tefkem s tissulya n leḥlal.
D awal lɛali a Mennun.
Kunwi lxetyar-nwen ires ɣef yelli Lwiza, nekkni ad awen-in-nerr lexbar ddurt i d-iteddun.
Tanemmirt imi d-terram ɣur-neɣ mi tettnadim tameṭṭut i mmi-twen.
Ssersent taqbat-nni n tmellalin i d-uwint yid-sent d lxir, tawwurt tfek-itent.
Wissen acḥal akken i rnan akken ad ten-yeffeɣ uneɣni i d-yersen fell-asen imi ur teffiɣ ara akken i tt-nwan.
Maɛna yiwen ur yezmir ad yerwel ɣef tidet, ig Rebbi tin i ten-id-immugren ḥulfen-as rẓaget.
Akken qqaren: « Ssusef s igenni, ad d-uɣalent s udfem-ik ».
Yufa-tt ɣef yiri n lkanun iɣef ires bufraḥ, tessewway aɣrum aquran.
Yerna tissulya yettilin d lferḥ ur ilaq ara ad tent-nerr d leḥzen.
Mi ifukk ɣef tid yellan nneɣnint, yezzi ɣef tin yumren.
Ula d Werdiya tefka cwiṭ n lwi imi Lwiza d yelli-s diɣen mačči d tarbibt-is neɣ d tifin i tt-tufa.
Yuɣal ɣer tmeṭṭut-is, yeɛreḍ ad tt-isefhem d akken tikwal timsal mačči akken i nebɣa i teffɣent.
Lfayda tella imi yiwet seg teqcicin-nneɣ tufa nsib-is.
Maɛna terra-aɣ tmara ad tent-neqbel ma yella uwint-d ɣas s cwiṭ n lfayda.
Menyif akka xir n ulac.
Ula d nettat tsuden baba-s i yezgan deg wul-is.
Akken diɣen i yexdem d Dehbiya i d-yesḍes acḥal d abrid.
Lmaɛna-s tɛedda-tt tuččḥa i teččeḥ ɣef wayen i d-yeḍran.
Tenna-as diɣen tḥemmel-it aṭas aṭas.
Lehdur i as-yenna rran-d acmumeḥ s imi-s dɣa tessuden baba-s sya u sya, tesnemmer-it.
Mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut i tezwej tmecṭuḥt uqbel timeqqranin.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad icax deg tayri.
Dda Ɛacur iḥulfa i wul-is yettenfal seg lferḥ imi iwala tawacult-is teddukel am yiwen.
Srebḥent-as ula d nutenti tinexḍubegga-s.
Zwina d Dehbiya rnant-d ula d nutenti ɣer tejmaɛt n lxir d tegmat.
Ddu-d tura ɣur-i ad kem-sudneɣ a tislit-iw tamellḥant.
Ḥsiɣ baba-m ur yeqqar ara i rrbeḥ wexxer akkin, daɣ netta iban yeqbel nesba n caɛban n Wat Waquj.
Rnan cwiṭ a-tt-a tkecem-d Werdiya, tufa-ten-id akken ḥman deg lehdur, terna-d tin-is ula d netta, amzun iɛedda-tt cwiṭ n zzɛaf i tezɛef sgellin.
Sudnent-tt i snat yid-sent.
Tanemmirt a Yemma. Ig Rebbi ala asefreḥ ara aɣ-tesferḥeḍ.
Yeggra-aɣ-d kan ad nedɛu ɣer Rebbi ad d-yedhu yemma-s ad teqbel, wanag baba-s iban-aɣ-d amzun yedda-d yid-neɣ.
Nekkni nusa-d ɣer Lwiza mačči ɣer tayeḍ.
Qqimen ddeqs awal ur ten-id-yuli almi i d-yenṭeq Dda Ɛacur, yenna-aɣ-d ddurt i d-iteddun ad awen-d-nerr s wawal.
Dɣa neffeɣ-d d tirni.
Amek i tt-tefram ihi?
Tenna-d Werdiya d Lwiza maɛna d nettat i d tamaẓuẓt-iw.
Yak d tihin i d Lwiza?
Nniɣ-asen akka, awal s wawal, Caɛban yebɣa tamelḥant-ihin yeqqimen ɣef umnar n tewwurt.
D acu i asen-tennamt kunemti?
Barka ur d-beddu ara tid-ik kečč diɣen.
Tayuga am Zwina d Caɛban neɣ Caɛban d Dehbiya tgerrez.
At Waɛli nwan d yiwet gar Zwina d Dehbiya, timenza n Werdiya i nruḥ ad d-nexḍeb.
Qqim kan a Caɛban a mmi, wi ad ak-yeḥkun, wissen ad tettruḍ, wessen ad teḍseḍ.
Amek i d-yeḍra ccɣel-nkent a Yemma?
Caɛban d Wakli qqimen ɣef yideknan uɣalen-d ɣer tuttriwin-nsen, bɣan ad ḥsun kullec.
Nna Mennun d Nna Ǧuhra, ddant cwiṭ deg leɛmer ɛyant-d, qqiment ɣer ḷqaɛa, Cabḥa tuwi-asent-d aman ad kksent ffad.
Amek ihi a yemma Mennun? I nnan i sin yid-sen ɣef tikkelt.
S leɛqel a tarwa. Ɛni lexḍubegga d talqent n Blaɛjuḍ?
Mi tt-yeẓẓa, imir-nni kan yettraju ad as-d-tfek tibexsisin.
Ihi kunwi, tzemrem ad tsebrem sya ɣer yimalas i d-iteddun.
Tinexḍabin mi uwḍent s axxam, ufant Caɛban d Wakli ttrajun-tent deg tlemmast n ufrag.
Teḍra yid-sen am wid yettrajun igmaḍ n kra n ukayad yesɛan azal ameqqran.
Wisen ma uwḍen ɣer lebɣi-nsen.
Yunfa-sen ad nadin iman-nsen.
Yettwanas-iyi yal ass.
Yettwanas-ik yal ass.
Yettwanas-ikem yal ass.
Yettwanas-it yal ass.
Yettwanas-itt yal ass.
Yettwanas-aɣ yal ass.
Yettwanas-iken yal ass.
Yettwanas-ikent yal ass.
Yettwanas-iten yal ass.
Yettwanas-itent yal ass.
Ttwanasen-iyi yal ass.
Ttwanasen-k yal ass.
Ttwanasen-kem yal ass.
Ttwanasen-t yal ass.
Ttwanasen-tt yal ass.
Ttwanasen-ken yal ass.
Ttwanasen-aɣ yal ass.
Ttwanasen-kent yal ass.
Ttwanasen-ten yal ass.
Ttwanasen-tent yal ass.
Tettwanaseḍ-iyi yal ass.
Mi ara as-isel yiwen, inewwu d taqcict.
Yezmer lḥal ad d-iwwet udfel.
Yak nniɣ-ak a caɛban, ala aqbal ara d-qeblen, ur zmiren ara ad agin nnesba n yiwen am kečč.
Ad k-iɛuzz Rebbi ay Akli.
Mebruk a Caɛban, mebruk ay amedyaz-nneɣ.
Yuweḍ-d ɣur-s isuden-it sya u sya ɣef leḥnak, yewwet-it acḥal d abrid ɣef tuyat.
Tagelzimt ɣef tayet, Akli imir-nni i d-yuɣal seg lexla.
Temmuger-it tmeṭṭut-is ɣer tewwurt tenna-as hat u hat.
Syinna i d-yebda aserbeḥ.
Ig Rebbi tufiḍ fell-as a Caɛban. I as-tenna Cabḥa i n-yeǧǧan lecɣal-is mi d-tesla lexber am wa.
Tissulya timerbuḥin a mmi. I as-terna Nna Ǧuhra.
Kullec mebruk a mmi. Ig Rebbi trebḥeḍ fell-as.
Tenna-iyi-d deg yiwen n wawal awezzlan deg tebrat i iyi-d-tuzen, yemma-s d baba-s qeblen.
Ihi fiḥel ma nerja ddurt i d-iteddun Dda ɛacur ad aɣ-tt-id-yefru ɣef uqbal neɣ tugin n tikci n yelli-s.
Yirbaḥ a yemma, kemm tuklaleḍ kullec, tuwi-d d kemm ara as-yeslen d tamezwarut i yisalli i d-uwiɣ kanakken yettfuru.
Barka tura timseɛraq-inek, ini-aɣ-d tura d acu i k-yesferḥen.
Tzemreḍ ad d-tiniḍ akken, d agerruj yifen igerrujen i ufiɣ, yid-s ad idireɣ ayen i iyi-d-yeggran deg tudert.
Mel-aɣ tura ayɣer i ak-yeɛǧeb wass-a.
Ɛni yella kra n ugerruj i tufiḍ mi telliḍ tneqceḍ deg wakal-ik?
Qqim kan a yemma, ass-a, ɣur-i yif akk ussan. I as-yerra Caɛban.
D acu i k-yuɣen akka ɛni, mi tettaḍsaḍ kan iman-ik a Caḅan?
Timɣarin itelmen walant udem n Caɛban yennecraḥ, mačči akka i nnument ttwalit-t.
Mi yekcem s axxam n At Wulmu, yufa Nna Mennun d Nna Ǧuhra urɛad nuɣal s axxam-is telment taduṭ s yiẓdi.
Ttmeslayent gar-asent, ma d Cabḥa tedha-d d leqdic n yal ass.
Yeqqim Caɛban ittefninix kan iman-is.
Ikcem-it yiwen n lferḥ urǧin iḥulfa yis-s.
Tumert-is ur tt-ibeṭṭu ala d wid i t-iḥemmlen: iɛeggalen n twacult-is tis snat i yettɛuzzu tettɛuzzu-t.
Lwiza i k-iḥemmlen am leɛmer-is.
Mabruk fell-aneɣ a Caɛban, baba d yemma qeblen tissulya-nneɣ.
Am wass-a deg lehna, ad nemlil i lebda.
Yufa kan kra n wawalen uran s tira tameqqrant
Tikkelt-a mi tt-yeldi tebrat-nni deg ubrid uqbel ad yaweḍ s axxam, ur tt-yufi ara ɣezzifet am leɛwayed.
Yerra srid s amkan-nni, din yufa lamana iɣef yettnadi gar yiẓra.
Deg tekwat n tayri anda ara yessefqed ara yaf ayen iɣef iḥar ad t-yeḥsu.
Ur yezmir ara ad yesber yiwen n yimalas akken ma yella.
Daɣ netta akken i teḍra d Caɛban.
Win yeččan tiɣrit n tayri ittayes.
Ur iyi-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ur k-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
D ayen igerrzen s tidet.
Ur kem-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ur t-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ur tt-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ur aɣ-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ur ken-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ur kent-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ur ten-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ur tent-yettwanas ara yal iḍ.
Ayɣer i d-tusiḍ ass-a?
Yejreḥ iman-is mi yeɣli.
Ma yella win i d-yusan, ini-as yeffeɣ.
Terriḍ iman-ik tɛuẓẓgeḍ.
Yeḍɛef Tom aṭas.
Ssusmem, txedmem.
Ur iyi-teɛǧibeḍ ara akk.
Bezzaf i mecṭuḥet.
Nesla i tewwurt tuɣal.
Ayɣer i tettazzaleḍ?
Tugi.
Yebda Tom yettheyyi imensi.
Ur ttɛeṭṭileɣ ara ad ruḥeɣ.
Ɣef wacḥal n wuḍan?
Yusa-d yečča imensi yid-neɣ.
Ad d-yas ad iyi-iwali azekka temeddit.
Ɛǧeǧǧin i sin ad sudnen aqerruy n Dda Ɛacur
Imsaɣen n lqahwa ččan-ten-id s wallen.
Tanemmirt a Dda Ɛacur, kkes aɣilif, yelli-k ad tili akken tebɣa.
yerna twalaḍ, deg uxxam ala jeddi d yaya i yellan.
Ɣef wayagi akk ad awen-d-iniɣ qebleɣ nnesba-nwen.
Qebleɣ yelli Lwiza ad tt-yaɣ Caɛban At waquj.
Ad awen ibarek Rebbi imi ɣur-neɣ i d-terram akken ad aɣ-tnasbem.
Ɣas ma uqant teqcicin deg taddart n tewrirt, terram-d ɣur-neɣ.
Aql-aɣ akken yebɣ ugellid ameqqran.
Ihi mi ken-id-yefka Rebbi, ad wwteɣ azrem s aqerruy, fiḥel ttuzzya d tunḍa.
Imeddukal uqbel ad ten-yaweḍ kkren fell-asen i sin, ɛnan-t sudnent sya u sya.
Ur ɣliḍen ara.
Din ad swen leḥwayeǧ diɣ ad ẓren imeddukal ur walan ara aṭas aya.
Tajmilt ad tt-rreɣ i yemma i iyi-d-yemlan akk ayen ssneɣ.
Ayen ur am-tesselmed ara yemma-m d nekk ara m-t-yemlen.
Mi nekkes aɛdil-a ad nuɣal ad nẓeḍ yiwet n tbernust i Wakli, tin yettlusu akka tura teqdem deg kra n yimeḍqan tjerred.
D tagnit meqqar ad tissineḍ i uẓeṭṭa n ubernus yemgaraden aṭas ɣef win n uɛdil.
- Seg wawal-im ɣer win n Rebbi a Yemma Mennun.
Seg wawal-im ɣer win n Rebbi a Yemma Mennun.
Tal tikkelt mi ara d-tezzi ddurt, imezdaɣ n tudrin i d-yezgan deg udrar, ttsubbun s azaɣar anda i tella temdint n Tẓerrajt ad d-sewwqen.
Ihi am leɛwayed-nsen, Akli d Caɛban imi gan am yiḍudan n ufus, akken i ttddukulen ɣer ssuq seg wasmi i bdan asewweq.
Mi ara d-fakken lqeḍyan-nsen, yal wa d acu i d-yuɣ, uqbel ad d-ṭṭfen abrid n tuɣalin, ttɣimin kra n wakud deg yiwet n lqahwa.
Qqimen, zzin-d i yiwet n tgida yersen deg yiwet n tesga, heddren, ttqessiren, ttaḍsan, ttemyeḥkun timseḍsa tineggura i slan deg taddart neɣ anda-nniḍen.
Rnan kan cwiṭ, lexbar almi slan i lheffa, mačči n uḍar, ɣef leblaḍ yessan sdat tewwurt n lqahwa, maɛna d tin n tɛewwzin.
Caɛban d Wakli msefhamen deg yigenni fiḥel ma nnan-d awal, ɛeqlen d Dda Ɛacur i d-iteddun ad d-yekcem.
Ad isun Rebbi ifassen-im a Cabḥa, meɛnen nezzeh. I tenna Nna Mennun i Teslit-is.
Deg snat yid-sent, ur ttakint ara akk i wakud yettɛedday.
Ɣas ma yella d nettat i yettnawalen, i d-idhan d uxxam akk d tnebgawin, Cabḥa, kra ur as-iruḥ ɣef uheyyi n uẓeṭṭa, telmed acḥal d taɣawsa ɣer temɣarin n lbaraka.
Ad tfakk kan lecɣal-is n yal ass ad tɛeddi deffir n uẓeṭṭa, ɣef yiri n temɣart-is ad teddez s tyaẓilt.
Akka, aheyyi n uẓeṭṭa yuweḍ ɣer taggara-s.
S yisurdiyen i d-tejmeɛ, tezmer ad d-taɣ yis-sen ayen ara teḥlaǧ ass-nni ara teddu d tislit.
Ccbaḥa am tin tuklal nnig waya.
Rnan kan cwiṭ n wakud, kecment-d tlawin s lqahwa, ayefki, ifenǧalen d yiḍebsiyen yeččuren d tiḥbulin n tmellalin akked tɣerfyin n tamemt.
Ɣef waya i as-qqaren i wass am wa taḥbult.
Ččan yinebgawen s tawant.
Ass-agi n lḥedd gan sin deg waman: ččan taḥbult rnan ɛeyynen.
Tislit mi d-tekcem s axxam n lwacul anda i tt-rujan yinebgawen ad tt-ẓren akken ad as-fken tiẓri.
Win i tt-iwalan ad as-yefk kra n yidrimen, ayen i d-tefka nneyya-s.
Maɛna ass-nni, tahuski n Lwiza, terra-ten ur mliken ara iman-nsen.
Mmɣen ɣer leǧyub-nsen ddmen-d mebla ma ḥesben.
Ccbaḥa i as-yefka uxellaq ternuḍ-as azeyyen i d-tzeyyen iman-is s yiselsa imaynuten yernan fell-as.
Lwiza tesɛedda fell-asen azaylal, ur ukin ara akk acḥal i as-kemsen d tiẓri.
Laxbar ad yezreɛ deg taddart mi ara steqsayen d acu-tt tegnit-a n usuffeɣ n lbarud.
Wid iwalan neɣ slan ad inin d acu yeḍran.
Akli ur neɣfil ara yuwi yid-s tamegḥelt.
Yewwet ma d kra n lewjuh n lbarud s igenni akken ad d-isel win ur nesli s tissulya n Caɛban akked Lwiza.
Awal a-t-an ɣur-k a Dda Ɛacur.
D ayen yelhan a tarwa. Ihi ar lḥedd sdat-neɣ.
Lɛerbi At Waquj, yedda deg leɛmer aṭas.
Teǧǧa-t tezmert-is, am netta am temɣart-is Xuxa, jeddi-s d yaya-s n Caɛban.
Ur yettkil ara fell-asen ad as-d-qḍun ula d taɣawsa tamecṭuḥt deg tissulya-ines.
Ihi d twacult-is tis snat, tin n At Wulmu ara yeddun fell-as.
Uwin yid-sen ccix n taddart.
Mi uwḍen s axxam n teslit, irgazen kecmen s axxam n lwacul.
Ɣef tɣerɣert-is ssan-d yigertilen iɣef ḍelqen yiɛdilen.
Inebgawen din i qqimen, zzin-d i ccix n taddart i yebdan awal-is.
A-t-an teddiḍ deg uẓeṭṭa-inem a yemma Mennun.
Wagi kan n ccɣel i sɛiɣ, akka i as-yenna uydi i yiɣes mi as-yenna nekk d iɣes, qqureɣ, ur iyi-tezmireḍ ara.
Nekk ulac kra n ccɣel ɣur-i, ad d-dhuɣ kan yid-k.
Azekka ma tebɣiḍ ad nedlu ɣef lemqam-nni i d-ttcekkiren akk medden.
Yella yiwen n ccix din ulac d acu iwimi ur yezmir ara.
Ad nruḥ ad t-id-nẓur, ad as-nfek lweɛda, ala ayen nebɣa ara d-neqḍu ɣur-s.
Akken tebɣiḍ kan a yemma Mennun.
Anida tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ ad dduɣ yid-m, awi-d kan ad aɣ-yeffeɣ leɛtab-nneɣ ɣer tafat.
Tafat n uxxam n Wat Ulmu d aqcic ara icergen tasusmi i d-yeɣlin deg ufrag-nsen.
Ctaqen ad slen i usqulɛed n lṭufan.
Ad yezdi Rebbi tagmat-nwen.
Ad yewqem Rebbi rray-nwen.
Ad isaki Rebbi sseɛd-nwen.
Ad iceɛceɛ Rebbi tafat-nwen.
Ad ken-iseḥlu Rebbi. Ad ken-ijber Rebbi.
Deg laɛnaya-k a ccix, dɛu-as i mmi Akli d tmeṭṭut-is Cabḥa ad d-sɛun tarwa.
Din din yerra-as-d s wawal.
Ad d-icebbeḥ Rebbi axxam n Wakli s yirgazen.
Ad d-yeččar Rebbi axxam n Mennun s yimnayen n lxir, tudert-nsen tessa d leḥrir.
Ṭṭiq-nni i iḍeyqen ttbiɛa-s yettaǧǧa listaɛ i listaɛ.
Aṭas i as-ɛeǧben lehdur-nni d ddeɛwat i asent-d-yefka ccix.
Tawenza-nni nsent ikersen tbeddu tfessi cwiṭ cwiṭ alma tekkes ɣef tikkelt.
Teḍra yid-sent am win i d-yuɣalen iwala-d amsujji n tnefsit.
Udmawen-nsen akk yecreh ladɣa win n Cabḥa d win n temɣart-is i yettamnen aṭas s lecyux.
Nna Mennun d teslit-is Cabḥa am akk zziyar, mi d-tuweḍ tmeddit ttuɣalen-d ɣer tudrin-nsen.
D iɣersiwen-a i zellun akken seksu ara d-niwlen ad d-yili s uksum.
Weɛden imrabḍen n lemqam ma yerna kra n uqcic ɣur-sen, ad asen-d-awin iɣid neɣ ikerri neɣ tikwal azger.
Ma d aksum i t-id-ttseddiqen i lemqam d wid irebḥen, sɛan neɣ d wid menwala kan i d-yusan ɣer zziyara ilindi.
Yal yiwen d acu i d-yuwi yid-s.
Wa d izegza, wayeḍ d igumma, lqahwa d ssekker…
Ifuras-a akk n wučči s-way-s i d-heggan seksu-a i tetten akka tura, d nutni zziyar, i ten-id-yuwin.
Wid iqedcen ssawaḍen-d ayen i ilaqen i yinebgawen n tegnit, am seksu, lmerqa d yifettiten n uksum.
Mi d-ffɣent seg uxxam n ccix rrant ɣer yiwen n ubraḥ anda i d-rsen yiḍebsiyen d lemterdat n seksu.
Zzin-asen-d wid i d-yusan ad ẓuren, tetten.
Amin a ccix, amin, seg yimi-k ɣer Rebbi.
Ad ig Rebbi d ayen i tḍemɛem ɣur-neɣ ara tawim, laɛnaya n yiɛessasen d yibaḍniyen.
Amin ay agellid ameqqran.
Ig Rebbi anda i teddam d tafat.
Axxam n Wat Waɛli ur iggug ara aṭas ɣef win n Wat Waquj.
Ɣef uḍar i rzan yiqeffafen d tqeffafin s axxam n teslit, Lwiza, yelli-s n Dda Ɛacur.
Tules-as i tigawt-a kraḍet n tikal.
Timetti tamaziɣt tesfillit aṭas i lxir ad yili yerna ad yagar.
Qqaren-d aman d laman, ma ulac-iten, tudert ur tezmir ara ad tili.
Akal, ttwalin-t Yimaziɣen am tmeṭṭut.
Ilaq ad t-yekrez ufellaḥ, ad as-ittakk aman ad isew akken seg-s ad d-ffɣen yimɣan ara d-yefken igumma neɣ izegza.
Aman i d-ttdeggirent teslatin deffir-nsent, d asfillet i sfilliten akken Rebbi n waman, Anẓar, ur ten-yettɣullu ara s usafar-a n tudert.
S nnuba i d-ttnekkarent ɣer tqaɛet ad ceḍḥent.
Tal yiwet s wacu n taɣect ara d-tekker ad tecḍeḥ.
Imeslayen n taɣect i d-tcennu tḍebbalt akked d tlawin d iznan i ttaznent i tnuḍin-nsent i yettasmen, deg nneyya-nsent, fell-asent, neɣ i temɣarin-nsent ur tent-neḥmil ara.
D uletma-s tameqqrant i as-yettaṭṭafen afus mi tettruḥu seg tmeɣra ɣer tayeḍ.
Ad teqqim ɣef tsumta yersen ɣef tqermet deg tesga, ad tcennu tizlit deffir tayeḍ nettat ad tekkat abendayer, tilawin ad cennunt yid-s.
Yekkes-as Rebbi iẓri, ur tettwali ara, iɣrem-as-t-id s yiwen ugerjum iman-is, yessawaḍ alma d anda akken ur tenwiḍ.
Nna Messaɛd tadebbalt i iḥewwsen medden ussan n lfuruḥ deg wakken teẓẓwer deg tyita n ubendayer akked ccna i yekkaten ass-nni.
Tameɣra tettekk sin n wussan.
Deg tlemmast n ufrag i d-yettili wurar n lxalat.
Ad zzint d tawinest ɣef tqaɛet, adeg n ccḍeḥ.
Ass-nni n tissulya, wissen d acu akken i yettaɣen islan.
Yettɛedday fell-asen uzaylal s shala, amzun iteffeɣ-iten leɛqel.
Maɛna Caɛban yettkel ɣef umeddakel-is Akli ara t-id-yerren ɣer leɛqel-is tal tikelt ara yecceḍ.
D ameddakel-is neɣ gma-s Akli i tt-ittsaɛafen anda yebɣu yerr.
D tayuga n tsetmatin, Zwina akked Dehbiya i d-yezgan d lmendad i uletma-tsent Lwiza.
D nutenti i as-d-iqedcen.
Kra n wayen tebɣa, tsuter-it-id, ad tt-yaweḍ.
Ma d isli Caɛban, ula d netta icebbeḥ-d i yiman-is.
Taddart akken ma tella tettwaɛreḍ ad tečč imensi, seksu s uksum.
Akli yezla sin n wakraren imeqqranen i d-irebba Caɛban i tmeɣra-s.
Lxir yugar, lferḥ ala netta, tameɣra tettɛedday deg liser.
Tislit uwin-tt teqqim deg tesga, tilawin deg tlemmast n ufrag, kkatent urar.
I lufan ad neg yiwet n tsegunfut?
Aslilew n wuqbel ad d-yali wass yettwafham akken i ilaq.
Imezdaɣ n taddart n Tewrirt, ẓran akk s ansa i d-yekka.
Walant s wallen-nsent, ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-inint ala aslilew ma slalwent.
Ɣef uceṭṭiḍ-nni amellal ttbanent-d tseqqiɛin n yidammen izewwaɣen.
Ayen i ilaqen ad t-yexdem iḍ-nni ixdem-it s lebɣi-nsen i sin.
Uqbel ad yadan uyaziḍ, urɛad d-tefrari tafat n wass, tawwurt tefk-it.
Tilawin d tilawin, d ayen i ttrajun seg sgellin, isli ad asent-d-yeǧǧ listaɛ.
Kkes aɣilif a Caɛban, mačči d targit d tilawt, aweḍ-d ɣur-i ad twaliḍ s yiman-ik.
Ili-k tura d argaz a Caɛban!
Caɛban s ucmumeḥ kan i as-d-yerra.
Chaban lui a répondu seulement par un sourire.
Barka ur hedder ara s laɛyaḍ.
Tugem-d aman seg tala, walant-tt-id medden, twala-ten, tebren s axxam nettat d tin i tt-id-iseɛfen.
Lwiza n Tewrirt, ulac ahat win neɣ tin ur tt-nessin deg taddart-is, maɛna d lɛada, ilaq ad tt-tqadar.
Yelha, ladɣa ma tislit mačči n taddart, d taberranit.
Agam n tikkelt tamezwrut n teslit d yiwen n wansay i teggen Leqbayel.
Tin i tent-id-immugren ad tzul fell-asent, ad asent-tini: « Ad ibarek Rebbi ».
Refdent-d isugam-nsent, ffɣent-d s azrib.
Deg ubrid ttbanent-d amzun d tisekrin ittecruruden deg umrij.
Mi tfukk acebbeḥ tettban-d amack-itt, yezmer lḥal tif akk tislatin n Tewrirt.
Tufa-tt tettheyyi iman-is.
Tekker tcebbeḥ iman-is, tuɣal teɛna Lwiza almi d axxam.
D ayen tenna i texdem.
D ayen yelhan a yelli, ad kem-iɛin Rebbi.
Ruḥemt ad tzerɛemt tumert-nkent i lɛama n Rebbi.
Cabḥa seg wasmi i d-tuɣal nettat d temɣart-is seg ufakan n sidi Waɛmaur, tufa iman-is.
Yettwajreḥ deg umennuɣ.
S lehna-nneɣ akken ma nella.
Mi ara tgezzem akken tettcehhid imi aẓeṭṭa yesɛa rruḥ.
Kra n yiɣrisen ssrusun-ten ɣef yiqerray n yigerdan.
Imi ulac arrac imecṭaḥ, tessers kra n yiɣrisen ɣef uqerruy n Cabḥa d uɣerruy-is.
Ad d-tuɣal alma d tazwara, ayen akken i teǧǧa ur t-tegzim ara, ad t-tegzem alma yekkes-d akk uẓeṭṭa.
Akken-nni i d-yella lḥal, tameddit-nni kan mebla ma ttlent tiddi taneggarut, Nna Mennun s temqessin tebda agzam n yiɣrisen n uẓeṭṭa.
Ad tegzem azal n snat n terdasin n yided, ad teǧǧ snat-nniḍen, ad tegzem snat-nniḍen alma tfukk tehri n uẓeṭṭa.
Tameddit-a ad t-id-negzem.
Ihi cwi kan iman-iw kan i lliɣ deg uxxam-agi.
A-t-an mazal azal n yiwet n tiddi ad ifakk uẓeṭṭa-m.
Mi ara d-tuɣal ad d-taf tawaɣit yeḍran, tin i tt-ixedmen ad tenker, ad as-teqqar mačči d nekk d lmal taɛeggunt…
Tinuḍin twalaḍ, ttemyasament.
Tal yiwet tekkat ad d-tban tif tayeḍ akken ad teččar tiṭ i yimɣaren-is.
D acu-t uxessar-a ?
Ayɣer ɛni a Yemma Mennun ?
Cwi kan ur tesɛiḍ ara tanuḍt a Cabḥa.
Yella yiwen n ufakan aqbur deg teɣremt.
Tinna tseffeḍ ɣef wudem-is imeṭṭawen n lferḥ i as-d-iqqan war ma tuki.
Din din tbedd ɣef yiman-is, temmeɣ ɣef temɣart-is tessudun deg-s.
Cabḥa ur tumin ara s wayen akka i as-d-teqqar temɣart-is, tettaḍsa tettru ɣef tikkelt.
Nniɣ-am taḍsa-nni i tettaḍsaḍ neɣ lferḥ-nni i tferḥeḍ ussan-a ineggura ad d-awin ayen iɣef nettnadi deg wacḥal aya.
Ihi ssefreḥ Akli s yisalli-a yessefraḥen a cabḥa. Aql-ikem trefdeḍ, deg uɛebbuḍ-im yella yiman.
Bubbeɣ a yemma Mennun, nniɣ-as ma yella kra i ččiɣ d aqdim uḍelli dɣa ihlek-iyi.
Mazal-ikem meẓẓiyeḍ a Cabḥa a yelli akken ad tissineḍ akk ayen yerzan tameṭṭut.
Yemma-m tesselmed-am aniwel d uqerdec n taduṭ maca tettu ur am-d-tenni ara d acu i yuɣen tameṭṭut ireclen mi ara yettezzi leɛqel-is, tettemɛuqqu, tettarra.
Sgellin i fehmeɣ cwiṭ wala tura.
Semmeḍ yiḍ nezzeh.
Mi izeggen amecwar, yeẓra kra n warrac deg yiwen n uɣeggad, nnig ubrid, ddaw yiwet n tenqelt, d talekkakt.
Yiwen deg-sen ijebbed-d yiwen n ufurek ɣur-s almi i d-iclax.
Twalaḍ d acu akka i txedmeḍ a mmi-s n Lbacir ?
Yezmer lḥal d jeddi-k, fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem, i d-tqecmeḍ seg telqent-agi.
Ɛni ur ak-nnin ara mi ara yemmet walbaɛḍ, yettuɣal-d rruḥ-is deg kra n yimɣi neɣ deg kra n uɣersiw.
Ihi akka d tasawent ttḥadaret imɣan, iɣersiwen d wayen akk i d-yefka Rebbi acku ma tdurrem-ten, d imawlan-nwen yemmuten aṭas aya i tḍurrem.
Yirbaḥ a yemma Mennun, d kemm i iwalan.
Akli mi d-yeffeɣ seg uxxam iteddu ɣer wurti-nsen i d-yezgan berra i teddart n Tewrirt.
I yuwin asurif yid-s d yiwet n tumert tameqqrant.
Ad yeqqim kan ad d-yefnineḥ iman-is am kra n uderwic ur nemlik ara deg leɛqel-is, deg yiberdan ihemmel yettaḍsa.
Tameddit mi d-yuɣal seg yixeddim n lexla s axxam, temmuger-it Cabḥa ɣer tewwurt.
Ur t-teǧǧi ad yesgunfu, tesdduqqes-it s yisalli amaynut i iceɣben merra At Wulmu imi almi d tura izemren ad sɛun win ara iseftin tawacult-nsen.
Seg tura ad tebduḍ aḥader n yiman-im.
Mazal ɣur-i cwiṭ n tezmert, d nekk ara d-yedhun s leqdic ameqqran deg uxxam.
Akka d tasawent ur kem-ttaǧǧaɣ ara ad txedmeḍ ayen yuɛren neɣ ad teddmeḍ taɛkemt taẓayant.
Nekk walaɣ akka iman-iw d taɛelludt a yemma Mennun, a-t-a tura nnig n kraḍ n wayyuren ur d-ssardeɣ, ternuḍ ayen akk i d-yeḍran yid-i, tuzzya n leɛqel, amɛuqqu, iriran.
Ulac ccekk aql-i s tadist.
Gren-d igumma-nsen imenza deg teqbatin, uɣalen-d ɣer taddart, teddun ttaḍsan imi tarwa-nsen ara d-ilalen ur d-tgellu ara s kra n yir ccama.
Yal yiwen deg-sen ixdem-d taqbat s wuffal d tzukar i d-lmen s wusran i d-qelɛen seg yigeẓdem yellan din s waṭas.
Amzun mazal ur d-slifen ara i yiɣewdan n ugni, ɣef waya Akli d Caɛban ufan nnig n snat tmerwin n tbexsisin.
Arrac-nni i d-yemlal Wakli, ula d nutni ɣef wurgalen i ttnadin.
Nudan kra n tenqelt yellan din, d talekkakt, d taɛemrawit, d taɣanimt, d tazanǧǧart, d tiṭ n tsekkurt, d bu yeḥbulen, d abuɛenqiq, ur ǧǧin yiwet.
Ad nedɛu kan ad naf kra n wurgalen.
Uḍneɣ, qqimeɣ deg uxxam kra yekka wass.
Ihi tinitin-nsent tewwet-itent ɣef wurgalen.
Ad ak-ibarek Rebbi a Caɛban.
Amzun d yiwen n uɛekkaz i aɣ-yewwten ay Akli.
I kečč mačči d Lwiza i k-id-ixeṭṭan ad d-tewwteḍ akka igmir-ihin deg yedra n tbexsisin s ddaw yifer ?
Ad ak-d-iniɣ wissen ma ad tamneḍ, ula d nekk d aya i iyi-d-yuwin.
Ur d-qqar ara diɣen d Cabḥa i k-id-iceyyɛen ad as-d-tekkseḍ urgalen.
D acu i k-id-yuwin ɣer wurti lexrif urɛad yessenṭi ?
Ula d nekk akka i as-nniɣ.
Deg wanta tasnawit i teqqareḍ?
Timetti taqbaylit twerrek s tɣariwin yesɛan azal d ameqqran.
Mi ara d-yenfeq wakli aksum seg ssuq neɣ yuɣ-d kra n yigumma n lawan, tuwi-d fell-as ad ten-id-iɣumm.
Ur itettu ara diɣen, igellu-d dima s uḥric n Caɛban imi ula d tameṭṭut-is Lwiza s tadist, tettinit.
Caɛban, ula d netta akka i ixeddem, ur ttemɣullun ara.
Ma yella diɣen kra n unarag yesɛan tameṭṭut deg uxxam s tadist, ur ilaq ara yiwen ad d-iseww taɣawsa i iḥemmel i yiman-is war ma yezwar deg tin yellan s tadist, ad as-yefk amur-is.
Ur tessexdam ara miḥyaf, d tin yettqadaren, ur teḥmmil ara tamuḥeqranit, tettḥezzib, tettkukru.
Tekkat amek ara tili teɣdemt deg tal tamsalt yerzan tudert-is.
Tajmaɛt d yiwen n uxxam i d-izeggen s umata deg tlemmast n taddart.
D yiwen n wadeg i ttayalen akk medden, d azayez.
Din i ttennegrawen yirgazen akken ad frun timsal yerzan tudert n taddart.
Ad yettɣimi d yimdanen imeqqranen, i t-yugaren deg leɛmer d termit.
Ad d-yettagem ɣur-sen tamussni mi ara asen-yesmuzgut mi ara ttmeslayen ɣef kra neɣ kra.
Berra i tejmaɛt yettili diɣen yiwen n ubraḥ anda i tturaren warrac turart i ten-id-inefḥen imir-nni.
D win i ixesren ara igen kra ara d-yessuter win akken i t-yugaren am rrwaḥ ɣer tferkiwin-nsen ad yeččar taqbat nn tbexsisin.
Mi ara d-qqimen ɣer lfelǧa, tturaren ɣef kra neɣ kra.
Ɣer taggara, win iwimi d-ggran ugar n yilqafen d winna i irebḥen.
Tikwal d Caɛban, tikwal d Akli i irebḥen.
Amenzay n turart-a d win ara iderren kraḍ n yilqafen ɣef yiwen n ucerriḍ n lfelǧa, ad as-yekkes i uxsim-is yiwen n ulqaf.
Ilqafen s way-s tturaren mgaraden.
Acḥal d abrid i d-mqabalen Caɛban d wakli ad uraren turart-a.
Berra i tejmaɛt, ɣef yideknan, tres yiwet n teblaḍt d tahrawant diɣ d talebḍant.
Fell-as i tenqec yiwen n tewsit n turart n tiddas iwimi qqaren lfelǧa.
Yiwen ad t-tafeḍ iẓeṭṭ ildi s way-s ara yeg wissen d acwari, d aḍellaɛ neɣ d acerraɛ n uzemmur.
Wayeḍ itellem tizukar s wusran neɣ ineǧǧer tareggaɣt i tgelzimt-is.
D imdanen ur nezmir ara ad qqimen war ma xedmen kra ɣas ma ula d nutni d imɣaren.
Ig Rebbi deg tejmaɛt i llan, ɣef yideknan qqimen, imawen ur ḥebbsen ara deg lehdur maca ifassen-nsen reddḥen s lecɣal yemgaraden.
Imɣaren yeddan deg leɛmer, mazal-iten tteḥruruden, deg tejmaɛt i sɛeddayen amur ameqqran n wakud-nsen.
Ttemlilin-d din yal ass, ttmeslayen deg way-gar-asen, ttemyekksen lxiq.
Fehmeɣ iḥulfan-ik.
D kemm i iwalan a Nna Hbuba, ayen akk ara d-tessutreḍ, aql-i da.
Yeggra-d kan ad ɛeddiɣ ad tt-qableɣ. I d-tenna Nna Hbuba.
Theyyaḍ-d akk ayen i ilaqen: aman imuẓeɣlen, ussu, amrar yeqqnen s ajgu.
Tuwiḍ-d iman-im a Mennun, mačči d tin iɣeflen.
Tuzzel ɣas d tamɣart s axxam n Nna Hbuba tamqabelt n taddart n tewrirt.
Teɛna imiren Cabḥa, teṭṭef-as-d afus mi tt-id-tuwi s axxam n lwacul, tesɣam-itt ɣef wussu i as-d-tessa, tawwurt tefk-itt.
Terfed ifassen-is s igenni tedɛa s wul-is: « Ad tt-isuffeɣ Rebbi ɣer lxir ».
Tekcem s axxam n lwacul, deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert tessa-d ussu ɣef ugertil.
Tenna-as: « Ur ttagad, tura ad d-dhuɣ yid-m, d lewjuɛ n tarrawt i kem-id-yebdan ».
Din din tekkuki ɣur-s.
Yiwet n tmeddit n tsemhuyt n tefsut, Nna Mennun yellan teqqim deg ufrag, tesla i Cabḥa tettnuju-d seg texxamt-is.
Ula d Nna Xuxa tger-d tin-is ɣas ma d tamɣart tawessurt.
Argaz-is Caɛban ibedd ɣur-s.
Kra n wayen akk i as-ilaqen ad tt-yaweḍ.
D wagi i d ayyur-nsent.
Lwiza s lebɣi n urgaz-is tuɣal s axxam-is akken ad d-terbu deg wadeg n lejdud n Caɛban, maca Yemma Mennun trezzu amayendi n tikal ɣur-s imi axxam n Wat Waquj ur iggug ara aṭas ɣef win n Wat Wulmu.
S tezmert-nkent d tezmert n wid tettawimt deg yiɛeddisen-nkent.
Yemma Mennun teṭṭɣelleq deg uniwel. I d-terna Cabḥa.
Acḥal ẓid seksu-inem a yemma Mennun ! I d-tenna Lwiza.
Tawacult-nneɣ ɣur-s semmus n yiɛeggalen.
D acu i txeddmeḍ dagi?
Ass-agi nawleɣ-akent-d seksu s tɣeddiwt, mi t-tɛerḍemt rremt-d s lexbar i yemma-tkent Mennun.
Mi d-yeḥḍer yimensi tessers-asent-d yiwen n lmetred iɛetter s seksu iseqqan s lmerqa n tɣeddiwt iwimi tger kra n tqeṭṭiḍin n tcedluḥt.
Tin kan ara iɛerḍen s tejɣelt tamezwarut n usɣar seksu i d-tnawel temɣart-nsent ad d-tenṭeq s tɣuyit mmm…
Nna Mennun, s tumert tameqqrant i d-tezga d lmendad i teslatin-is.
« Buh ! Buh ! Awi-d ukan mi ffɣent ddeɛwat-nneɣ, iferreǧ Rebbi fell-aneɣ, ur negrent ara twaculin-nneɣ, ad idirent i lebda ».
Akka i teqqar deg wul-is mi ara tent-twali deg tesga n uxxam ttaḍsant, ttqessirent.
Ɣef waya akk i tguj nettat d urgaz-is s axxam n Wat Wulmu yettasɛen nezzah.
Yuɣ lḥal Caɛban din i d-yetturebba, d tuɣalin kan i d-yuɣal s adeg n temẓi-s.
Yemm-as Mennun imi tettliwi tislit-is Cabḥa yellan s tadist am tmeṭṭut-is, tezmer ad tkemmel lxir-is, ad asent-tzeg i snat imi ttunaḥsaben i snat d tislatin-is.
Tikwal, d argaz-is Caɛban i tt-yettliwin, maɛna ula d netta ɣur-s amahil-is, ladɣa lmal-is ur nlaq ara ad yettwahmel.
Maɛna skudmal iteddu lweqt, yettimɣur uɛebbuḍ-is, yettaɛer fell-as ad texdem akken tebɣa.
Yerrwaṭṭef Jim mi yella yettaker deg ukayad.
Qqiment ferḥent nezzeh snat n twaculin iwimi d-rnan sin n yirgazen ɣur-sent.
Ɛerden-d lǧiran d wid i ten-iqerben.
Wwten urar, ceḍḥent, slalwent tlawin.
Zlan yiwen n ukrar, nawlen imensi, ssuffɣen ɣer uzrib iqedḥan n seksu, win d-iɛeddan ad yečč.
Ferqen tunṭicin i yinaragen.
Ad tt-isdum Rebbi akka neɣ xir.
Ɛeddan sebɛa n wussan ɣef tlalit n Yidir d Meqqran, imawlan-nsen gan-asen sbuɛ.
D yiwen n usfugel alemmas, ur meqqer ur mecṭuḥ.
Tiwenziwin-nsent d tisaɛdiyin, nettat d Lwiza-inu, ha-tent-id s warraw-nsent.
Ad kem-iɛuzz Rebbi a Nna Ǧuhra.
Kemm tetthennaḍ, yelli-m, ḥmed Rebbi tcekkreḍ-t, teɣli-d gar yifassen yelhan.
Ig Rebbi d tissulya timerbuḥin, ig Rebbi rebḥent ufant-t, laɛnaya n yiɛessasen n snat n tudrin-nneɣ.
Ansuf yis-sent ɣur-neɣ ihi.
Amzun d tamnefla i nexdem, nekk seg yiɣil fkiɣ-d yelli ɣer Tewrirt, kemm seg Tewrirt tefkiḍ-n yessi-m ɣer Yiɣil.
Ɣer taddart-nwen n Yiɣil i n-zewjent i snat yid-sent.
Ur rnint ara aseggas, yerza-d fell-asent lmektub-nsent.
Teffeɣ-d kan Lwiza, ldint-d twwura n lxir.
Nekk akka d wakka, amɣar twalaḍ, ttrad yesɛedda yeǧǧa-as-d ccama.
Ma d yessi fell-am isteqsay lxir.
I ixeddem Rebbi i lmumnin.
Ad asen-isseɣzef Rebbi deg tudert-nsen.
Rebbi ad am-ibarek.
Taḥbult-nni n tmellalin i d-yeqlan deg zzit nbeṭṭu-tt d iḥricen i nettarra daxel n lmerqa i d-nheyya deg yiwet n tfeḍna.
Ddeqs n waman i tesɛa lmerqa-a.
Ngezzem-as kra n uẓalim akken ad tiẓid.
Nettarra-as diɣen ifelfel azewwaɣ ineɣden, zzit d lemleḥ.
Taḥbult-nni n tmellalin tettcuffu, tettbeddi tiẓeḍyt ɣef tin i d-yeqlan deg zzit.
Ad nerr ɣef lkanun ideg tuɣ tmes lmeqla izeggnen s zzit.
Mi ara d-yerkem zzit-nni, ad as-nessureg s leɛqel amaxluḍ-nni i d-nheyya ur nettɛeṭṭil ara ad yuɣal d taḥbult n tmellalin.
Amek i d-ttheyyin taḥbult-a ?
Uwint-d i snat yid-sent taḥbult n lmerqa i temnifriyin-nsent.
Nedda akken almi d taɣsert i d-iteddun.
Efk-as ayen yebɣa.
Efk-as ayen tebɣa.
Efk-iyi ayen bɣiɣ.
Efk-aɣ ayen nebɣa.
Efk-asen ayen bɣan.
Efk-asent ayen bɣant.
Yefka-as-d ayen yebɣa.
Yefka-as-d ayen tebɣa.
Yefka-awen-d ayen tebɣam.
Yefka-ak-d ayen tebɣiḍ.
Yefka-aɣ-d ayen nebɣa.
Yefka-iyi-d ayen bɣiɣ.
Yefka-am-d ayen tebɣiḍ.
Yefka-awent-d ayen tebɣamt.
Ula d imeqqranen keččmen deg turart d wawal n yigerdan.
Mi ara ad ɛeddin ad budden mmi-tsen neɣ yelli-tsen taqrurt qqaren-as: « Ldi qemmu, qmec ṭeṭṭu » Ini gren-as taɣawsa-nni taẓidant deg yimi-nsen.
Ala a Yidir a mmi, ilaq ad d-tiniḍ iniɣem.
Akken a mmi aɣrum. I wagi amek i as-neqqar ?
Ala a mmi, ini-d aɣrum.
Teddem-d tiḥdert n uɣrum seg ṭṭbeq yersen ɣef udekkan, tenna-as: « Amek i as-qqaren i wa a mmi ?
Nettat ad as-terr mačči akken a mmi, akka…
Ad as-tini amek i as-neqqar i tɣawsa-a ara as-d-tesken, netta ad tt-id-tini s tmeslayt-nni n yigerdan.
Yidir ma tnudaḍ fell-as, ɣer yaya-s kan ara t-tafeḍ.
Wissen ɣef uɛrur-is ma yella tetteddu, wissen deg yirebbi-is ma yella teqqim neɣ yetturar iman-is ɣef yiri-s.
Yal ass tettakk-as timsirin n tutlayt mi yessaweḍ akka tura ad d-yenṭeq kra n yimeslayen maɛna akken kan i ten-id-susrun yigerdan imecṭaḥ.
Tuɣal-as d taselmadt n timawt taqbaylit.
Ameḥbus ad yessaram ad d-yeffeɣ seg ṭṭiq ideg yella ɣer listaɛ akken ad icali anda yebɣu yawi-t uḍar-is.
Ma d win akken yeḍyeq wul-is yettnadi ula d netta ad yiwsiɛ lxaṭer-is, ad teldi tadimt n tesraft n wul-is akken ad as-yesbuḥru wuzwu asemmaḍ ara t-id-yedduqsen seg tnafa taɣezzfant, tuḍyiqt, ideg yezder.
Wanag win iwimi yeḍyeq wul-is, tḍerru yid-s am unekraf i d-yeggran gar ukkuẓ n yiɣraben.
Yezga yewḥel gar-asen, ala sin ɣer kraḍ n yisurifen i yezmer ad ten-iger seg yeffes ɣer zelmeḍ neɣ seg ugessar d asawen imi lḥebs bezzaf yeḍyeq, yezga am lxaṭer-is, am wul-is.
Yelha yiwen ad issewseɛ ul-is d lxaṭer-is akken ad yaf iman-is.
Tudert ad as-d-tas fessuset am tmeččint n taduṭ yettawi waḍu-nni aḥlawan n tmeddit n wussan n unebdu.
Tuččḥa ɣas ma yessen-itt, tuwi-d fell-as ad tt-yettu neɣ ad tt-id-yekkes seg-s ma yella tezdeɣ-it yagi.
D acu i k-yuɣen akka a mmi?
Ula d nettat ɣlin-as-d yimeṭṭawen.
Mi alaḥal ad awḍen tawwurt n uxxam-nsen, anelmad n tmara iwala yemma-s tettraju-t ɣef umanar n tewwurt.
Am tbuciḍant i yuzzel ɣur-s, netta yettru, yettɛeggiḍ s ṭṭelq n tgerjumt-is, imeṭṭawen anect n lbunyat ttegruffuɛen-d seg taṭṭucin-is.
Mi ara d-yuɣal s axxam, d baba-s neɣ d yemma-s ara t-id-yawin, deg ubrid ad t-steqsayen: « Amek i tufiḍ aɣerbaz? I uselmad-ik iɛǧeb-ak?
I yinelmaden turareḍ yid-sen imi d tizziwin-ik ?
Aqcic, awal ur t-id-yuli.
Baba-s ibeddu ixelleɛ imi t-yettwali ala arquqen-is i d-yeldin ɣur-s.
Liḥala ideg yella mmi-s i d tiririt ɣef merra isteqsiyen i as-d-yefka baba-s.
Tfukk ssaɛa n taɛrabt, aselmad yeffeɣ.
A-t-a ikcem-d wayeḍ.
Wagi mačči am umezwaru i yettmeslay, maɛna ula d wagi yiwen seg yinelmaden imecṭaḥ ur yefhim ayen i asen-d-yeqqar.
Ibalmuden ssusmen, leddin kan deg warquqen-nsen imi yiwen n wawal ur t-gzin segmi yebda ihedder-d s tefransist.
Akken qqaren: « Rwu berkukes ay amcic ».
Ibalmuden iqbayliyen imecṭah, imeɣban, taɛrabt ur tt-fhimen ara, rnan-asen-d tafransist.
Ma d taqbaylit, tin akken i ssnen, tin i d-ṭṭden ɣer tyemmatin-nsen, yiwen ur tt-id-yuwi umeddaḥ deg teqsiḍt.
Yebda ad asen-d-ihedder s tutlayt ur fehmen ara, s taɛrabt.
Ad yettkemmil awal ɣas ma yeḥsa am win iheddren i lḥiḍ.
D acu-t tura wagi ?
Anelmad amecṭuḥ deg tmurt-is i yella, imawlan-is slemden-as ad yemmeslay tameslayt n tmurt-is, tin i nhedder yal ass.
Yenwa meskin uqcic ameɣbun d tin ara yaf deg uɣerbaz n taddart-is, n tmurt-is.
Mačči d tin i yufa, yufa yiwet ur ifehhem ara akk, d tabarranit, mačči ines.
Ɣas akken ula d aselmad yeẓra mačči d tutlay n yinelmaden yesɣaray maɛna yettkemmil ihedder-asen-d yis-s.
Ruḥ tura kečč fhem cwiṭ…
Mi yuweḍ sḍis n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, ferḥen yimawlan-is ad yekcem s aɣerbaz, ad d-yagem tussna i wallaɣ-is.
Ad itturebba, ur iteffeɣ ara i ubrid.
Mi yuweḍ ɣer din, iger iman-is deg wadar netta d tizziwin-is, yekcem ɣer tneɣrit, yenna-asen uselmad-nsen qqimet s uwehhi n yifassen-is, qqimen.
Yidir i ḥemmlen yimawlan-is am tmemmucin n wallen-nsen yegma, yesmed semmus n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
D yiwen n uqcic iḥercen, tigzi tettban-d ɣef wudem-is, yeḥdeq d uberranni, yettaɣ awal i yimawlan-is.
Ilindi deg tefsut i as-sxetnen.
Ssuffɣen aqedduḥ n seksu ɣer uzrib maca ur as-gin ara tameɣra i tegnit-a.
Sserwan-as timellalin d ukmas n yidrimen i Yidir akken ad t-ssedhun.
D yiwen n wass n tumert ur netteǧǧa ara cwiṭ n wadeg i lkerh d tɣeccact.
D tayri ara d-yakin deg wulawen n yimdanen.
Ass n umenzu n yennayer, Akli yeddem-d mmi-s iseṭṭel-as i ucebbub-is i tikkelt tamezwarut.
Asmi i d-tezzi ddurt, issewweq ɣer Tzerrajt, infeq-d aqerruy n uzger, ad t-id-niwlen i yimensi akken Yidir ad yuɣal d aqerruy, ad izeggir i lqum.
Deg yennayer diɣen ferrun medden, d yiwet n tegnit i ttafen akken ad myeɛfun.
Ad ttun ayen i ten-yebḍan.
Ad uɣalen ad ttemlaɛin ma yella yegzem wawal gar-asen.
Ur sɛiɣ ara aṭas n yidrimen.
Iseggasen imenza n timunnent neɣ n wid n tallit-nni n ttrad, iselmaden Izzayriyen sɣarayen deg tmurt n Leqbayel tutlayt taɛrabt s teqbaylit.
S yiwet n tama wid akken i d-yedɛeq seg tmurt-is, ad yethenni seg-sen, s tama-nniḍen yebɣa ad yeẓẓu tutlayt taɛrabt akked tineslemt deg tmurt n Zzayer.
D nutni kan s tineslemt-nsen d taɛrebt-nsen i yellan, wiyiḍ i ixulfen tanfalit-nsen ur ilaq ara ad ilin, ḥlalit i tmettant.
Wigi d atmaten inselmen yebnan tudert-nsen ɣef tikta timṭerfin.
Akken i teḍra deg lqern wis mraw d yiwen mi d-hejmen Ihilaliyen ɣef tmurt n Tmazɣa, ɛerben ma d kra n yimezdaɣen-is, i teḍra assen akken i d-yuzen uselway n Maser, Ǧamal Ɛebdennaser wid i as-issekkren ccwal deg tmurt-is.
Imi llumma taɛrabt meqqert, mačči d Imasriyen kan i d-iɛewlen ad ɛerben Imaziɣen, llan diɣen Iɛiraqiyen, isuriyen, Ifalesṭiniyen…
Aɣerbaz n tmurt n Zzayer yewwet s uqadum ass-nni akken i t-ɛerben mačči s yiselmaden kan n tmurt maca s wid n tmura taɛrabin, aḥric ameqqran deg-sen d Imasriyen.
Wigi d aɣerbaz n zzayer i ten-iseɣren, i isserfen fell-asen, maca d timura tiberraniyin i yesfaydin deg-sen, am Fransa, kanada, Marikan atg…
Ur ǧǧin ara wid yeɣran ad xedmen deg tmurt-nsen, ad d-seknen ayen akk ssnen.
Maca tamurt-nneɣ, i tt-iḥekmen d wid ur nestahel ara, wid ur neɣri ara.
Aselmed deg tazwara n yiseggasen n settin, deffir n timunnent n tmurt n Zzayer d win yelhan, igerrez imi aṭas n yimussnawen i d-yessuffeɣ.
Wid yettcaxen di lawan-nni ɣullen Yidir d wid yellan am netta, ur ten-seɣren ara deg tutlayt-sen, seɣren-ten deg tutlayin tiberraniyin ɣef ugdud n tmurt.
Dayen! Dayen! Ur ttuɣaleɣ ad ruḥeɣ s aɣerbaz!...
D acu i k-yuɣen akka a mmi ? Ula d nettat ɣlin-as-d yimeṭṭawen.
Yenna-aɣ-d ujenyur amek ara nessemres tamacint.
D yiwet n tɣawsa yeggaren leɛnaya.
Akken ay uḥric, kečč d imegzi, tufiḍ-tt-id.
Ad awen-d-rnuɣ kan yiwen n umatar imir-nni d ayen.
Yidir yeḥsa d acu-tt maɛna yeffer ur tt-id-yenni.
Yettkemmil deg usefreẓ-ines.
Mačči aṭas aya yeṭṭef yiwet n tesga deg uxxam-nneɣ.
Ih, ttxil-m a yemma.
Seg sgellin nettruẓu aqerruy-nneɣ, ar tura ur tt-id-nufi.
Ma tebɣam ad ken-ɛiwneɣ cwiṭ akken ad tt-id-tafem.
Ur tt-id-qqareɣ ara imi tt-ssneɣ, d yemma i iyi-tt-id-yemlan mi lliɣ d taqrurt.
Yal yiwen yettxemmim ad d-yaf tifrat-is akken ad tt-id-yefk d amezwaru.
Tfukk kan timseɛreqt-is, teɣli-d yiwet n tsusmi izi, ma iɛedda-d ad as-tesleḍ.
S umata ttmalen-tent-id i yimdanen imeqqranen, maca ula d imecṭaḥ zemren ad kkin.
Timseɛraq ssuturent-d tigzi d truẓi n uqerruy.
Azal yellan n yitran deg yigenni i yellan n temseɛraq deg teqbaylit
Ad teqqim kan Nna Mennun ad as-tserreḥ: « Amaaacahu !... »
Aqerruy-is yeččur d timucuha, telmed-itent-id ɣer yemma-s d yaya-s.
Ḥareɣ ad myaruɣ nekk yid-k.
Ur ilaq ara i unelmad aqbayli ad yemmeslay tameslayt-is deg uɣerbaz n tmurt-is, tuwi-d fell-as deg teywalt, gar-as d yiselmaden-is ad yutlay timeslayin tijenṭiḍin am taɛrabt taseklant, tafransist akked tegnizit.
Tal tikkelt uqbel ad d-yekcem umenzu n yennayer, Nna Mennun am tlawin n Tewrirt neɣ n tmurt n Leqbayel akken ma tella tdehhu-d s tezdeg n uxxam.
Ad tesleɣ iɣerban akked tɣerɣert n uxxam s wakal amellal, ad ten-id-tecweḍ akk s tumlilt.
Tikkelt-a d tabernust tamecṭuḥt i teẓḍa i Yidir.
Tfukk aẓeṭṭa n tcuḍaḍ-is, tzeggen win n uqelmun-is.
Tettɛawaz alma tɛedda tlemmast n yiḍ d nettat d aẓeṭṭa akken ad tt-id-tekkes uqbel ad tt-id-yaf umenzu n yennayer.
Ma yella ur tessaweḍ ara ad tfakk aẓeṭṭa-ines deg lawan, ad tessiwel i tnaragin-ines ad d-asent ad tt-ɛiwnet deg-s.
Mi ara d-yaweḍ umenzu n yennayer, agdud amaziɣ, anda yebɣu yili, ama deg tmura n Tmazɣa, ama deg tmura n umaḍal d tirni, yefugul-it, yettmmagar-it s yiwet n tmeɣra yeččuren d lferḥ.
Deg tmurt n Leqbayel, tilawin ttnawalent deg yimensi n yennayer seksu s uksum n uyaziḍ i ttrebbint beddemma i wass-nni n tmeɣra.
Ass-nni tuwi-d fell-asen ad ččen nnig n tawant ladɣa Yidir, akka i sfilliten i lxir ad yagar kra ara yekk useggas.
Cabḥa tufa deg temɣart-is yiwet n tselmadt tameqqrant n uẓeṭṭa, seg tguri-s neɣ uqbel almi d tukksa-s.
Aṭas n tɣawsiwin i d-telmed ɣur-s yerna mačči d tin yettɣullun.
Asteqsi ara as-tfek ma yella ur tefhim ara kra, din din ad d-terr fell-as s yiwen n usefhem yettaǧǧan Cabḥa tceffu akken i ilaq ɣef wayen i as-d-ttmal yemma-s Mennun yuklalen asnemmer ameqqran.
Nna Mennun teggar tamawt i yixeddim n teslit-is.
Tufa tezmer ad tettkel fell-as.
Am Wakken d turagt i as-tefka ɣas ma s wawal kan, tenna-as: « Tzemreḍ a Cabḥa ad tegreḍ aẓeṭṭa iman-im, meḥsub ayen akk ssneɣ mliɣ-am-t-id".
Ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara kem-snemmreɣ a Yemma Mennun, tḥesbeḍ-iyi am yelli-m neɣ xir, yemma ur iyi-texdim ara akken i iyi-txedmeḍ.
Ulac fell-as a yelli, ayen ara teẓḍeḍ akka d tasawent, ara yesfaydin deg-s, ma mačči d kemm d Akli neɣ Yidir.
Cabḥa ur teṭṭif ara imeṭṭawen-is, lehdur n temɣart-is sseḥlulin-d tasa-s, tekker ɣer Nna Mennun tessudun deg-s nettat acḥal n awal i as-d-tessefruri.
Ad yesseɣzef Rebbi deg tudert-im, ad kem-yeǧǧ Rebbi ad kem-nerwu…
Ttakkent-d iwellihen amek i d-tuwi i yiwen ad yaru tamaziɣt akken i iwata s uqadar n yilugan-is n tira.
Aṭas n yimeɣriyen i d-yettaṭṭafen tisɣunin-a.
Win iwimi d-ɣlint gar yidassen-is, ur tent-yettaǧǧa ara kan ɣur-s, ittakk-itent akka d wakka akken ad tent-ɣren wiyaḍ.
Iḍrisen yuran deg-sent mgaraden, llan wid i d-yettawin ɣef umezruy n Yimaziɣen, tella tmedyezt.
Aselfu d usaki n yilmeẓyen n ugdud amaziɣ, mačči kan n tmurt n Zzayer maca n tmura n Tferka n ugafa akken ma llant.
Yettili-d s tuzna n kra n tesɣunin.
Dinna d yiwet n tuddsa tadelsant iwimi qqaren Agraw Imaziɣen, tqeddec akken ad d-tessekfel iẓuran n tmurt i kkaten yimḍebbren isertanen n tmurt n Zzayer ad remlen.
Llant tid i d-yettwaẓergen deg Zzayer, llant tid i d-yettasen seg tmurt n Fransa.
Di tallit-nni ddeqs n tesɣunin tidelsanin i irefden tutlayt n tmaziɣt ama s tira s yisekkilen n tifinaɣ ama s wid n tlaṭinit, maca ttruḥunt s tuffra, ddaw ufus.
Ayen igedlen, yettban-d ẓid, yal yiwen yekkat amek ara t-yaweḍ akken ad t-yeɛreḍ am ugummu-nni yečča Adem.
Yidir d wid yettxemmimen am netta faqen, ukin, ẓran anda i bɣan ad ẓuɣren arraw n tmurt.
Ttnadin ɣef yidlisen i d-yettmeslayen ɣef umezruy n tidet n tmurt.
Idlisen-a ttruḥun ddaw n ufus, ttezzin-d ɣef wid tezga deg-sen tewnafin, ttnadin ad fehmen amek ddant temsal s wudem n tidet.
Tiktabin-a ttwagedlen, taɣuri-nsen tga s tuffra.
Urǧin yefka Yidir azeɣbub n teflest i wahil aɣelnaw n usedwel n tmurt-is imi wid i t-id-imeslen, yella kan yiwen n yiswi yezdeɣ iqerray-nsen.
Ilaq imezdaɣ n Zzayer akken ma llan ad ttun tamagit-nsen, tuwi-d fell-asen ad refden tayeḍ.
Ɣef waya i dergen amezruy n tidet n tmurt.
Seg wasmi i ṭṭfen algam, ttawin-aɣ anda i bɣan, amzruy ttcewwihen-t, ttarran-as-d tiregwa n tikerkas.
Amedyaz d amdan am yimdanen-nniḍen maca tamuɣli-ines temgarad d wiyaḍ.
Ayen yettxemmim umedyaz iteffeɣ-d seg yimi-s yecbeḥ, yefren, yeṭṭef amkan-is, tikwal yettawi-d yid-s yiwen n unamek d alqayan nezzeh.
Tḍerru yid-s am tmeṭṭut yellan s tadist.
Akken ad taf iman-is tmeṭṭut yeṭṭfen addud, ilaq ad d-yeffeɣ lṭufan-nni yellan deg uɛebbuɛ-is.
Amedyaz diɣ kif kif, netta yerfed…asefru.
Akken ad d-terzu ɣur-s telwit ad t-id-yarew ma ulac ad yeqqim deg liqliq am tin ara d-yerbun.
Tamedyazt ihi d ddwa.
Amek i tettwaliḍ amedyaz ?
Amek i ak-d-ttasen akka yisefra ?
Segmi yebda iferreẓ timsal, yeḥsa s yizerfan-is imezwura ttwarekḍen, yekker ad yennaɣ s yimru, yis-s yettaru ayen i t-iqerḥen yeqreḥ kra yellan am netta.
Yessexdam diɣen awal deg yiniɣ-is imi isefra-ines yessawal-iten i wiyaḍ akken ad ten-iselfu, ad akin, ad ɛeqlen iman-nsen.
Ɣur-s yiwet n tmuɣli i iɛeddan akkin i yigli, ɣef waya ayen yettaru ur t-yettaǧǧa ara i yiman-is.
D aya kan i yezmer ad t-yexdem, d wa i yesɛa d amrig gar yiffasen-is.
Deg wakken ččuren d tugniwin n tmedyezt wawalen-nni i yettarra deg uḍris-is, ittetwehhim ansa i as-d-tekken.
Mačči tikkelt i as-teḍra akka.
Mi ara iwali kra n temsal ɛeddant tilas, lbaṭel yessemɣi-d acciwen, tamuḥeqranit txeddem i tebɣa, imir-nni kan ad yeɛnu adeg anda ara yeqqim ala iman-is, ad d-yerfed imru ad d-yernu taferkit tamellalt, ad yebdu ad yessuru iḥulfan-is fell-as, s usefru ara yaru deg tutlayt-nni iwumi immečč lheqq.
Melmi i d azemz n umulli-inek ?
Imeẓẓyanen yeqqaren Blek ssaramen ad uɣalen sya ɣer sdat am netta.
Wissen kan ma ad yeqbel tukarḍa n ujurnan i d-iḥekkun fell-as akken ad ḥsun d acu akk i ixeddem ?
Blek, d netta i d aɣella-nsen, tiɣariwin akk yelhan yeddem-itent am teɣdemt, aḥezzeb, leqder ula n ucengu, tuṭṭfa n wawal, aḥuddu n win yettuḥeqren, tikkin d win iḍeɛfen, atg…
Blek d tarbaɛt-is d iseyyaden n ubkur i yuɣalen d iferfanen imeqqranen, ttnaɣen mgal Igniziyen akken ad idiren d ilelliyen deg tmurt-nsen.
Marikan tekkat ad tawi timunnet-is sdat n tgelda tabritanikt i tt-iḥekmen.
Ullis n Blek d yimeddukal-is Roddy d Uprufisur Occultis d yiwen n usebter n umezruy n Marikan deg taggara n lqern wis mraw d ṭam.
Taɣuri n yiɣmisen am Blek tesselmad i umeɣri tutlauyt n tefransist, tettrebbi diɣen.
Azekka-nni tanezzayt, uṭṭun wis 53 n BLEK, ilaq ad yuɣal s adeg-is mebla ma ifaq usenzay.
Ḥsan akk d akken tukarḍa ur tlaq ara, maɛna ḥemmlen ad ɣren, ilaq ad t-ɣren.
Taɣuri deg ukkuẓ yid-sen tettekk yiwen n wass.
Deg uslagan i gan, d aneggaru ara t-yerren ɣer wanda akken i t-id-ukren.
Ara yeɣren d amezwru ajurnan-nni d win i t-id-yukren simira.
Ad ǧelben merra fell-as, wa ad t-icekkeḥ cwiṭ, wa ad t-id-yejbed seg tecḍaḍt n tkebbuḍt-is, wayeḍ s ufus-is ad iserfeq tidikelt n ufus-is.
Ad yaweḍ kan s tɣawsa-nni i gubren, anda akken i t-ttrajun ad d-berrḥen ɣef tikkelt : « Gedha ! Teddez, tebrez, taɣdaḍt teḍra-d ! »
Ad iruḥ ɣer tḥanut-nni, ad yerr iman-is yeqqar izwal n yiɣmisen i d-yeffɣen, lexbar kan ad d-yeddem ayen i t-yehman, ad t-yerr ddaw n tkebbuḍt-is, ibeddi din yekfa.
Missen deg waniwa ad d-teɣli tesɣart-nni tawezzlant.
Deg ukkuẓ yid-sen ggaren-d tasɣart anwa ara iruḥen ad d-yaker ajurnan uṭṭun wis 53 nn BLEK.
Iɣmisen ttrusun berra i tḥanut i ten-yessnuzun.
Lebɣi n tɣuri meqqer, yiwen ur yezmir ad asen-t-yekkes.
Bɣan ad walin amek yettkemmil wullis deg wuṭtun amaynut wis 53.
Yuɣ lḥal uṭṭunen yezrin ɣran-ten akken ma llan, aneggaru d wis 52.
Ma teɛkes fell-asen, idrimen ulac, nutni ilaq ad t-ɣren imi kanakka i t-ttrajun.
Ula d Ṭawes teggar-d iman-is imi baba-s ittakk-as-d cwiṭ n umesruf, nettat tettɛiwin imeddukal n Yidir.
Tikwal ma sɛan cwiṭ yal yiwen ad d-yebzer ayen iwimi yezmer.
Maɛna ulac ɣur-sen dima idrimen s way-s ara t-id-aɣen.
Taɣuri n yijurnanen s wunuɣen ɣur-sen d tameɣra ladɣa assen ara d-yeffeɣ ujurnan BLEK.
Ḥemmlen taqbaylit, ḥemmlen diɣen tasekla tafransist.
Taɣuri n yidlisen d yiɣmisen s tutlayt tafransist tezga ɣur-sen, ɣef waya i tt-slliken deg tmeslayt n Molière.
Efk-iyi-d ayefki.
Muqel ddexan-ihin.
Yeffeɣ uqbel ad ffɣen.
Ifaq uqbel ad faqen.
Yennuɣ mgal acengu deg tegrest d unebdu.
Yexdem kan ayen i ilaqen.
Lkaɣeḍ d netta i t-yestenyan s ufus-is ayeffus.
Tuɣal-d tlelli i yimawlan, i d-telsa d abernus.
Nenwa tfukk tudert n waklan, i nmenna yusa-d drus.
Buberrak iɣumm tamurt iskuffer-itt meskint.
Tectaq ussan n tefsut.
Tifdulin merra undint.
Tamurt n lejdud temmut ?
Awal aneṣli ugin-t.
I yixef, rran tagennurt.
Tiwurra n tatut ldint.
Metwal ccerq i nsuɣel, syin i d-nugem tiɣyulit.
I yezban d Leqbayel, ugaden aṭas tameddit.
Leɛqel iteddu ad yemxel mi i as-d-tezzi twaɣit.
Wwten-t, ḥebsen-t, regmen-t, ɛefsen-t
Yenna-d ala i lbaṭel.
Urǧin yessusem yiwen n wass, isuɣ-d ayen i t-iḍurren.
Ttnadi ad yettu yemma-s, d win-nniḍen ara t-rren.
Axxam, ttɛiwiden-as lsas, kkaten amek ad t-sddermen.
Winna akken i ifaqen, seg yimezwura yeffɣen, deg Alman i t-xenqen.
Mačči d yiwen kan i kksen.
Tamurt aṭas i tt-ɣurren, seg warraw-is ɛzizen.
I d-yeggran d lxubata, wid i d-teǧǧa fransa.
Ar tura xeddmen fell-as.
Dhan-d kan d tukarḍa.
Aṭas i iɛuden tefra, aɛdaw, ibeddel ssifa-s.
Ɣzen i tmurt aẓekka.
Ur tt-id-ittaf uzekka.
Akken i nwan ad sen-d-tas.
A belqasem ! Wi ad k-yeḥkun.
D ayen yelhan i d-iteddun.
D aseɣres i t-id-sɣersen.
Agdud yekker-d am yiwen.
Yenna i wi k-yenɣan: « Ɛeffeṭ ! »
Kkes aɣilif tamneḍ-t.
Yuwi abrid yessufuɣen.
Ad awen-yeqqar: « Tanemmirt ɣef wayen akk i txedmem ".
Deg yigenni tufeg-d tedbirt, tzul-ik-id ay izem.
Tettaker Layla lbankat.
Ur ilaq ara ad tenɣeḍ.
Tanemmirt a Tijenyurin n uẓeṭṭa.
S tbernyas i iyi-teẓḍamt i ttqabaleɣ asemmiḍ n tegrest.
Ḥemmleɣ-kent mačči d kra.
Lufan ad teẓreḍ nekkenti acḥal i k-nhemmel.
Ẓriɣ… Ẓriɣ…
Akaynu, akka i disem-is.
Ma yella yefka cwṭ n lwi uẓeṭṭa, yettarra-as-d tussda.
Winna ttuɣ isem-is, steqsi yaya-k.
I uqermud-a i ttarran ddaw-as ?
Qqaren-as tamsahelt. I as-terra yemma-s.
I yiɣes-a yettɛeddayen deg uxemmuj n tama wadda n trigli, yettseggir afeggag d agessar akken ad yejbed uẓeṭṭa ?
Amek i as-qqaren ?
Wissen ma cfiɣ-asen a mmi, takatut tebda tneqqes.
Ma yella win ttuɣ, ad t-id-temmekti yemma-k.
Initen iwimi cfiɣ d wi : amellal, aberkan, awraɣ, azegzaw, azewwaɣ, adal, aclili, amuri, azenǧari, anili, axuxi, awinaɣ, amidadi…
Ur gziɣ ara tagnizit-ik.
Snemmren akken i ilaq ameddakel-nsen Pythagore iwimi nnan kečč iban anwa abrid ara taɣeḍ deg tudert-ik tasadrit.
Myeḥmalen.
Azemz n ukayad d tazzla i d yettazzal ɣer yimzazwaren n ugerdas n ulmud alemmas.
Teǧǧa-n mmi-s Yidir yekcem deg yiwen n uxemmem alqayan segmi i as-d-tger aferṭeṭtu n timrubeḍt n teḥdayt i iḥemmel.
Yerna mačči d taswiɛt akk n tayri imi yella wayen yugaren aya.
D acu ara ak-iniɣ? Ečč abuglu-inek tuɣaleḍ ɣer leqraya-k, d tin ara k-inefɛen.
Wellah ar d tidet, ur gireɣ ara akk tamawt, netta laɛmar i d-tessebgen iman-is, akka i d-teqqareḍ d tamrabeḍt.
Bɣiɣ ad ak-d-iniɣ d tawacult n yimrabḍen.
Ihi ma baba d Si Ɛellawa, nettat d La Ṭawes.
Tinna qqaren-as Ṭawes, d yiwet n teqcict tukyist, d yelli-s n Si Ɛellawa i ixeddmen d amaray deg uxxam n tɣiwant n Tzerrajt.
D tiqcicin i iheddren deg tala, yezmer lḥal akken i teqqarem deg yiwen n uɣerbaz.
Anwa akka i am-d-yuwin amecriw-a ?
D aya kan ? Ur tettuḍ yiwen neɣ yiwet ? I mm ucekkuḥ-nni awraɣ ?
Ur ten-tessineḍ ara akk. Yella Rabaḥ, sliman akked d Qadar.
Anwa imeddukal-a ?
Ssneɣ mmi Yidir, ssneɣ d acu i iḥemmel, ssneɣ d acu i yekreh.
Ɛni ass-agi ur tettawḍeḍ ara s aɣerbaz ?
Tanemmirt a yemma, ulac aṭas i yesɛan yiwet n tyemmat am kemm.
Teẓriḍ d aya i ḥemmleɣ akk netta d udɣes i aɣ-d-tɛedleḍ ussan iɛeddan, ɣef waya i iyi-t-id-theyyaḍ.
Ax a mmi ad teččeḍ cwiṭ n ubuglu-a, tura ḥah i t-id-xedmeɣ mi d-ẓẓgeɣ tixsi-nni akken yurwen sin n yizamaren imalas yezrin.
Yeffeɣ kan a-tt-a tekcem-d yemma-s s yiwet n tegdurt teṭṭef deg ufus-is ayeffus.
Ad k-iɛin Rebbi ihi a mmi, nekk d lawan ad uɣaleɣ ɣer tmegra n tuga.
Kra ihedder d netta issemsad alewwac-is s yiwen n umsad.
Ayen yellan deg-i xeddmeɣ-t a baba, ma yebɣa Rebbi akayad-a ad d-yeddu.
Mačči am tsuta-nneɣ iwimi tezga ixuss-itt mraw d ṭza akken ad tesmed snat tmerwin.
D ayen n lɛali a mmi, ẓẓwer, d aya kan i yesɛa mmi-s n uẓawali akken ad d-yeffeɣ seg tudert n lixsas, ad yekcem tin ara as-yeddun deg lebɣi, ama i netta, ama i twacult-is.
Mačči aṭas i mazal ad d-yaweḍ wass n ukayad.
La k-ttwaliɣ ur tḥebbseḍ ara akk deg leqraya a Yidir, ula ɣer tkessawt tettawiḍ yid-k aqrab-ik.
Tikwal deg wuxxam-nsen i yeqqar Yidir.
Ayyur n yunyu d tazzla i d-yettazzal ɣer yimzazwaren n ukayad n taggara n uɣerbaz alemmas.
Inelmaden imeddukal heggan iman-nsen akken i ilaq.
Yal ass ntett imekli ɣef tis mraw d sin.
D aya i d-qqaraɣ seg tazwara.
Ad d-immager abɛaḍ n yimɣaren deg ubrid n baba Rebbi, ama yessen-it ama ur t-yessin, ad izul fell-as.
Azul a Dda crif.
Aql-aɣ akken yebɣa Rebbi, tikkelt akka, tikkelt akka.
Ḥemdullah a Dda Crif.
Deg taddart, nessen-ik akk s takut i ak-yefka Rebbi, tceffuḍ d leɛǧeb.
Bɣiɣ ad iyi-d-temleḍ kra n yinzan, timeseɛraq, timɛayin…
Nekk bɣiɣ ad ten-aruɣ akken ad d-qqiment i tsitiwin i d-iteddun.
Kečč teɛǧbeḍ-iyi a Yidir, ur telliḍ ara am tizzya-k yettxemmimen kan amek ara cebbḥen i yiman-nsen.
Kečč amzun d abrid n yimɣaren n zik, am nekk, i tḍefreḍ.
Tanemmirt a Dda Crif. Ttwaliɣ tikli-k tettarra metwal tajmaɛt, meqqar ad nehder akken nebɣa din imi akka imira ulac aṭas n lɣaci.
Ih, ɣer din i tedduɣ.
Mi ara naweḍ ɣer din, ayen tebɣiḍ deg wayen cfiɣ, ad ak-t-idiniɣ.
Ad ak-ibarek Rebbi a Dda Crif.
Mi uwḍen ɣer tejmaɛt, ur ufin ula d yiwen din.
Ufan-tt d lemziyya. Qqimen i sin ɣef yideknan.
Seg wacu i tebɣiḍ ad d-bduɣ a mmi ?
Seg wayen tebɣiḍ a Dda Crif, nekk ad aruɣ kan ɣef uzmam-iw ayen ara d-tiniḍ.
Ihi d kra n yinzan i d-mmektaɣ.
Yenna-as useklu i tgelzimt : « Tenɣiḍ-iyi ». Terra-as : « Afus-iw seg-m i d yekka ».
Ula d tixsi d idammen-is i tt-yenɣan. I as-yerra yidir.
Yak nniɣ-ak teǧbeḍ-iyi, akka i yella lḥal ladɣa nekkni s Leqbayel.
Ad ak-d-rnuɣ yiwen neɣ sin n yinzan.
« Ulac aseḍsu ma huddent tuɣmas, ulac ssber ur nesɛi tilas, ulac wi yemmuten yegla s wayla-s ».
« Win mi yekkes baba-s a-t-an deg yirebbi n yemma-s, win, iwimi yekkes yemma-s, a-t-an deg ugudi nḍent-as ».
Ad ak-d-rnuɣ aneggaru.
« Nnan-as i userdun, anwa i d baba-k? Yenna-asen, jeddi d aεudiw »
Gerrzen akk lemtul-agi a Dda Crif, zgan-d merra i wayen i d-nettmmagar deg tudert-nneɣ.
Yella kra n temɛayt yellan akka tura deg uqerruy-ik, ẓriɣ mačči yiwet, mačči snat i tessneḍ.
Mi d-tbedreḍ aserdun d uɛudiw, nekk mmektaɣ-d yiwet n temɛayt ɣef teɣyult.
Aql-i la ak-d-selleɣ a Dda Crif.
- Tgerrez diɣen tagi, yerna tesseḍsay, ulac nnig n tiɣyulit n teɣyult-a.
Tgerrez diɣen tagi, yerna tesseḍsay, ulac nnig n teɣyulit n teɣyult-a.
Ṭawes d Yidir qqimen wa iqubel-d wayeḍ.
Qqim kan, tettefriwis tama tayeffust n tɛebbuḍt-iw.
Kkes aɣilifn tugdi-nni sɛan-tt akk medden.
Tal tikkelt ara d-immager umdan kra n tegnit yesɛan azal, terza-t s timmad-is neɣ ur yebni ara fell-as, tḍerru yid-s akka.
Ad yekkat wul-is, amzun yebɣa ad d-yeffeɣ, ad tettergigi tɛeddist-is, maca ad iɛeddi kan cwiṭ n wakud, ad yuɣal akken yella, ad as-yekkes cwiṭ cwiṭ lxuf-nni yugad, ad yemlek leɛqel-is, imir-nni timsal ad tent-yefreẓ akken i ilaq.
Teḥbes-d kan, lɛama n Rebbi teggugi ɣer daxel-is, qqimen yimsukal ɣef yisɣimen n usɣar.
Wedɛen Yidir, ixelles, yeṭṭef-asen-d tinfulin.
Rnan cwiṭ, a-tt-aya temzuɣert tkeččem-d taɣsert.
Ɣef tis sḍis n tnezzayt i d-mlalen akken ma llan yiɛeggalen imzazwaren, Yidir, Ṭawes, Qadar, Rabaḥ, Sliman akked yinelmaden-nniḍen n uɣerbaz-nsen war isem.
Anwa iwimi teččur ?
Ad d-uɣaleɣ ɣef tis sebɛa.
Inelmaden ṭṭfen imukan-nsen, bdan sɛeddayen akayad-nsen.
Kraḍ n wussan d nutni d tiririt ɣef yisteqsiyen deg wayen akk ɣran kra yekka useggas.
Yerra-ten-id unemhal n uɣerbaz war isem ɣef kra n wumuɣen i isenṭeḍ ɣef yiwet n tfelwit iɛelqen ɣef uɣrab yellan sdat n temmurt n tudfa s abraḥ n likul.
Tarbaɛt n yimeddukal i igan asniles-nsen s wul-nsen, yeffeɣ leɛtab-nsen ɣer tafat.
Uwin-d akayad-nsen akken ma llan yerna s tezmilin yelhan neɣ igerrzen.
D amusnak Sliman i d-yufraren d amezwaru gar merra inelmaden n wasun n Uqbu.
Aɣerbaz war isem n Tzerrajt deg taggara n useggas aɣurbiz, ass n 04 yulyu iga tameɣra imi i d-yuwi yiwen n umfuḍi ameqqran wid irebḥen akayad n taggara n ulmud alemmas.
Yenna-iyi-d nwiɣ temmuteḍ.
Mi ara d-awḍen yimuras ur iḥebbes ara deg udelleg seg taddart ɣer tayeḍ.
Yettnadi ad d-yegmer tasekla timawt s ɣur imɣaren d temɣarin uqbel ad ten-teḥwes tin akken ad aɣ-yawin d tirni.
Yeẓra ma yuweḍ leɛfu n Rebbi umdan ameqqran am wakken d kra n temkerḍit i yerɣan.
Yidir uqbel ad d-yeḍru wayagi, iɛennu amdan ma mazal-it yella yerna mazal diɣen yesɛa leɛqel, wanag win yebbahban am win yemmuten.
Tikwal, yettaf-itt d lemziyya mi yettɣimi kan deg uxxam imi win i as-yettakken afus n tallalt ameqqran deg umahil i t-icebɣen d yaya-s Mennun.
Twalaḍ tura a baba amɣar, εewwqeɣ d waniwa ara dduɣ, nekk ḥemmleɣ-ten i sin, weḥleɣ s tidet.
Mi tuweḍ ɣur-s teḥka-as akk tadyant-is seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Amek ara texdem ?
Yiwen wass tefra-tt, truḥ ad twali Amɣar azemni.
Ad ak-d-rnuɣ yiwet, d tamɛayt, d tamseḍsut, imir-nni ad neḥbes i wass-a, ad neǧǧ kra i wussan-nniḍen.
Ihi, ulac win yettqadaren asɣan, akken yebɣu yili, am Uqbayli.
Ula d limin i yettgalla d « Jmeɛ liman », lmaɛna-s kra n ddin yellan.
Maca ddin ur d-tuwi ara fell-as ad d-yekcem deg temsal iseddawen aɣaram.
Ma tella kra n taluft iɣef d-uwin awal deg tejmaɛt mi ara qqimen deg lḥeqq, ad qqimen alma ffran-tt, ad d-ssiwlen i ccix n lǧameɛ ad yedɛu s lxir akken ad ldint tewwura ɣef wayen akk tessaram taddart.
Tagi d yiwet n teqcict, ɣur-s mraw n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, teggra-d deg yiwen uεewwiq d ameqqran.
Tewḥel.
Ad teḍfer baba-s neɣ yemma-s.
Ula d tixsi d idammen-is i tt-yenɣan. I as-yerra Yidir.
Win mi yekkes baba-s, a-t-an deg yirebbi n yemma-s, win, iwimi yekkes yemma-s, a-t-an deg ugudi nḍent-as
Nnan-as i userdun, anwa i d baba-k? Yenna-asen, jeddi d aεudiw »
Yeḥsab-iyi Rebbi ad ruḥeɣ ɣer Boston deg unebdu i d-iteddun.
Nna Mennun yeččur uqerruy-is d taqbaylit.
Ur teɣri la tafransist la taɛrabt.
D tin i tettmeslay kan seg zik ar tura.
Cennunt tizlatin n teqbaylit s ubendayer deg wuraren n tmeɣriwin.
Ula d nettat teḥmmel ad d-terr ɣef yisteqsiyen i as-d-ittakk mmi-s n mmi-s.
Yettnadi ad d-yegmer tasekla timawt s ɣur yimɣaren d temɣarin uqbel ad ten-teḥwes tin akken ad aɣ-yawin d tirni.
Yewɛer-as lḥal i Tom ad issenqes seg taẓẓeyt-is.
Neccucuf s yisɣumen n uɣemmes.
Maca drus maḍi n yimdanen i yeḥṣan s wamek i d-nnulfan yinzan.
Tamɛayt meẓẓiyet, tugar-itt tmacahut deg teɣzi, tettfakka s yiwet n tenfalit taneggarut, d nettat i d agmuḍ neɣ d tifrat n tuttriwin i nettaf deg uḍris.
Wid i sent-isellen i temɛayin ur ttɣimin ara war tasedmirt, zemren ad d-ḍsen, ad twehmen neɣ ad sen-teɛǧeb nezzeh taggara n temɛayt.
Wanag lkanun yezdin at uxxam yezga inecced deg-sen, yal iḍ ad d-ssurgen akk ayen ssnen i wiyiḍ.
Lkanun inecced ɣer wawal mačči am tliẓri i aɣ-d-ireǧǧmen kra yekka wass s tutlayt ur fehment tyemmatin-nneɣ.
Tiliẓri yukren tasga i lkanun tesrusu-d tasusmi ɣef ugraw yeṭṭafaren asaru amaṣri.
Imeqqranen d iselmaden ma d imeẓẓyanen d inelmaden.
Tamacahut d aḍris yettrebbin.
Zik, mačči aṭas aya, aɣerbaz amaziɣ d lkanun, d agraw neɣ d tala.
Imawlan n uxxam tezzin-d ɣef lkanun, ttawin-d seg-s tazɣelt, yis-s asemmiḍ yettnejli fell-asen, rnu i waya tazɣelt talsit i d-yettdeggir umdan i win yellan ɣef yiri-s.
Ayen i d-yeqqimen seg tsekla-a ad t-nerr d lsas iɣef ara ibedd uxxam n yidles amaziɣ.
Timucuha, timɛayin, inzan, tiqnaẓ d wayen yerzan akk tasekla taqburt tamaziɣt i d-izegren acḥal d lqern, tezgel-it tatut.
Tuweḍ-d ass-a ɣur-neɣ.
S tira d wallalen atraren am tasenselkimt ur tettuɣal ara ad tissin tamettant am umur ameqqran deg-s i inegren ur d-yeǧǧi lǧerra.
Ccfaya ddebb-is d tatut.
Ddeb n tatut d tira.
Ihi aru tura kra ad d-yeqqim i lebda.
Maca, akka tura, ayen i aɣ-d-yuwḍen n tmucuha drus maḍi imi agdud amaziɣ wissen acimi, ɣas ma ɣur-s tira n tifinaɣ i d-yesnulfa ur tt-issexdem ara.
I yessexdem d ccfaya-s.
Yesmed semmus n walugen : Alug n tmedyezt, win n yinzan, win n temseɛraq, win n temɛayin, d iḍrisen imecṭaḥ, aneggaru d win n tmucuha.
Din din, Yidir yules-asen tira deg uzmam anda yettaru kan isefra.
D lɛali-tt tagi, xedmen axxam n yimeyazen.
Tanemmirt a yaya, aqerruy-im yeffer igerujen n wayen akka yettcebbiḥen awal n teqbaylit.
Amedyaz ha-t deg tmurt n Fransa ixeddem akken ad iɛeyyec tawacult-is yeqqimen deg taddart.
Yemma-s tettcedhi-t aṭas, ula d nettat d tamedyazt, dɣa txeddem isefra fell-as akken ur yettkuffur ara wul-is.
Mi ara d-tsuffeɣ s wawal iweznen ayen i tt-iḍurren, tettaf iman-s, tettifsus, amzun tebra i kra n teɛkemt i tettbabba.
Ulac win ur nessin ara taɣect-a « Ini-as i mm leɛyun Ṭawes », maɛna akka d-teqqareḍ a yaya, imeslayen-is mačči, la n Yeḥyaten Akli, la n Ukil Ɛmer, d asefru i d-yesnulfa Belɛid At Urejdal.
Ihi yuweḍ-d lawan ad nerr i cesar ayen yettalas Cesar.
Ahat ulac aqbayli ur nesli ara i tezlit-a yecna Yeḥyaten Akli akked ukil Ɛmer s yimeslayen n umedyaz-nneɣ Belɛid At Urejdal, maɛna rran-tt nsen.
Yiwen seg-sen ur d-iberreḥ s tidet i d-yeqqaren d akken imeslayen n tezlit-a n umedyaz Belɛid At Urejdal, mačči n Yeḥyaten Akli neɣ n Ukil Ɛmer.
Tanemmirt a yaya ! A-t-an tlemdeḍ-t am waman usefru-a, yerna ɣezzif.
Ad nettɛebbi uzzal am yiɣyal, ad nɛeggej nettmal, am umɣar am yilemẓi.
Ssebt d lḥedd d asgunfu, ccrab ad as-neḥku, letnayen s afundri.
Ruḥeɣ almi d lagar di lyu, ay ixef-iw ssefru, wissen ma ad iyi-iqbel Werdi ?
Ggḍeɣ ɣer lmerṣa, ufiɣ lbabur ihegga, win yesɛan lkarṭa yali.
Ruḥeɣ almi d Tizi n At Ɛica, seg Tjellabin akkinna, sfuḥeɣ Lezzayer sdat-i.
Qerbeɣ ɣer Bubelluḍ ttmaleɣ, ttedhameɣ leḥyuḍ, nniɣ-as:” Ṭṭef-iyi afus a Lɛerbi”
Ruḥeɣ almi d tiɣilt n Rrjem, iḍarren-iw ɛewjen, nedheɣ ɣer Sidi Lhadi.
Ur ččiḥeɣ ara fell-asen, d tagnit i gbeddlen, ttṣellint ɣef nnbi wulli.
Qerbeɣ ɣer Yibubucen, ufiɣ kra ggemɣaren, bdan ttemwehhin fell-i.
Ggḍeɣ ɣer Uḥelwa, syin i d-tuɣal tarwa, nniɣ-asen: “Bqaɛlaxir a uladi!”
Tluɛa-iyi-d Xuxa ɛzizen, s lehdur ẓiden, tenna-iyi: “Efk-as lweɛda ad nɛeddi”.
Ggḍeɣ ɣer At Rḥab, tarwiḥt-iw deg lḥisab, lla Faḍma tebda aweṣṣi.
Tetbeɛ-d Xuxa d warraw-is, Buɛlam d ukyis, Ṭeyyeb yebda imeṭṭi.
Assen n letnayen tameddit, neffeɣ-d seg tmazirt, ɣer uẓru n ggin n Sidi Qasi.
Dɣa segmi i d-yeffeɣ seg uxxam-is deg Yibejjiwen almi d lluzin n ufundri n Werdi netta iteddu issefray.
Nnig n nnhaya-s i yerfed abrid ad iruḥ ɣer lɣerba.
Ula d nekk ass-a ad ak-d-awiɣ awal ɣef yiwen n urgaz d yemma-s, d imedyazen i sin, Belɛid At Urejdal d yemma-s, Saɛdiya At Ɛebdella.
Belɛid At Urejdal ɣur-s dderya d tamecṭuḥt, lḥal iẓenner fell-as, ilaq ad yinig ɣer tmurt n Fransa akken ad yessisi s wacu ara iɛeyyec arraw-is imeẓẓyanen.
Mazal ad iyi-d-yernu ɣef wayen i iyi-d-yefka.
Anwa ur nessin ara Crif bu wawal ur nettfakka ?
Ussan-agi i mlaleɣ Dda Crif, ayen i iyi-d-yenna seg yinzan d temɛayin ur t-id-gmireɣ deg yiwen n wayyur.
Yak tessneḍ-t a yaya.
I as-yenna yidir i d-yeqqimen ɣef yiri-s ɣef tqermet.
Aseklu yefka-d ddeqs n yiguza n tẓurin ttaglen-d seg tariwin-is, maca urɛad wwint, semmumit, d aẓberbur.
Tasemhuyt n tefsut tetteddu ad teffeɣ.
Nna Mennun am leɛwayed-is, teqqim ɣef ulemsir i tili ddaw n teɛrict n tejnant yeẓẓa urgaz-is Akli deg yiwet n teɣmert n ufrag.
Yefka-as Rebbi yiwet n tkatut iman-is.
Tecfa ɣef kra n temsal yeḍran azal n uzgen n lqern aya.
Tikwal tal tizlit ara d-tecnu, asefru-ines yettarra-tt aṭas ɣer deffir.
Tikwal ma yella kra n umahil i tt-yeṭṭfen, ma tberri ibawen neɣ tessirid iceṭṭiḍen neɣ tɛerrek taḥbult n uɣrum, tcennu-d isefra iwimi tettarra aẓawan.
Tecfa fell-asen ar ass-a.
Mi tella meẓẓiyet telmed acḥal d asefru i d-ttmalen yimdanen imeqqranen n tallit-nni.
Nna Mennun d mmi-s n mmi-s Yidir, mačči tikkelt neɣ snat i mlalen i sin yid-sen ad mmeslayen ɣef tsekla timawt taqbaylit.
Anda ara terreḍ ihi aseggas i d-iteddun ?
Alla, xemmemeɣ-as amek ara as-kkeɣ i wugur-a i d-ibedden sdat-i.
Ssneɣ-k tẓẓewreḍ a Yidir, mačči kan deg leqraya, yal agnu tettafeḍ-as-d tifrat.
Ihi ad tḥebseḍ tizrawin-ik ur tuklaleḍ ?
Iwala Caɛban ala lmaḍerra ara as-d-tawi taluft-a, dɣa yeǧǧan yiwen n yisem aqbayli, i yelli-s.
Laɛnaya-k ma ur tesneqseḍ cwiṭ seg taɣect-ik, ad aɣ-d-slen, ad d-asen yimsulta ad k-refden u ad glun yis-i.
Yeɛwweq d acu ara as-d-yini.
Imeggi-nni d Aqbayli.
D acu-t tura wagi ma mačči d astehzi deg-neɣ, d aḥqar n wayla-nneɣ.
Amek ismawen Aɛraben, Iṭerkiyen, Ifransisen, ispenyuliyen tqeblem-ten, ma d wid-nneɣ n Yimaziɣen tugim-ten.
Yettkemmil yessureg-d seg-s ayen akk yettxemmim ɣef temsalt-a.
Caɛban irekkem seg zzɛaf, iɣaḍ-it lḥal nezzeh.
Amek akka i tugim ad aɣ-teǧǧem ad nsemmi i warraw-nneɣ akken nebɣa ?
D nettat i d tagellidt n Tmazɣa, isem-a ulac win ur t-nessin.
Dihya d nettat i yellan ɣef uqerruy n tmurt-a deg yiwet n tallit.
Dihya iwimi fkan yiɛdawen-is isem n Kahina.
Yuweḍ almi i as-yefka yiwet n temsirt ɣef umezruy n tmurt.
Anta i d Dihya ?
D Ɛacur i d-yeɣran tabrat.
Tuwi-d fell-ak ad tferneḍ yiwen n yisem yellan deg utaftar-a i yelli-k.
Yenna-as-d isem-a n Dihya ulac-it ɣef utaftar aɣelnaw n yismawen.
Yugi-as umeggi n tnarit n uxxam n tɣiwant n tama-nni.
Yuwi yid-s azmam n twacult ad issers fell-as isem n yelli-s i d-yernan.
Ihi yefka-asen isem n Dihya i teqcict, Aksil i win n uqcic.
Tuwi-d ɣef ubabat ad n-yeǧǧ din i tin ara d-yerbun sin n yismawen, yiwen d amalay wayeḍ d unti.
Tura ad kem-id-sfehmeɣ.
Lṭufan ilul-d deg sbiṭar Mesṭafa deg tmanaɣt.
Amek akka ? Ur fhimeɣ ara.
- Qqim kan a Mennun, wi ad al-yeḥkun.
Qqim kan a Mennun, wi ad am-yeḥkun.
Din i tuḍen icc-is.
Ihi amek akka i as-ssemman i teqcict-nsen ?
Tanemmirt a Mennun. Ig Rebbi yerna-d ula ɣur-wen.
Ad tt-yeg Rebbi d tamerbuḥt, d tin ara d-yernun ala lxir i yimawlan-is.
Ad ibarek Rebbi, kullec mebruk.
Ara kem-icedhi win i tḥemmleḍ iḥemmel-ikem.
Wellah ma yuɣ-itt kra.
Deg tebrat-is taneggarut i aɣ-d-tuzen, tenna-aɣ-d terna teqcict ɣur-s.
Aru isem-ik dagi.
Taddart-a d agadir aneggaru n ucengu.
Tanemmirt a dda Crif, lehdur-ik ẓidit am tamemt.
Kemmlet akka, ala ayen ara yelhun ara ken-id-mmagren ɣer sdat.
Tizziwin-nwen wissen anda i sɛeddayent imuras-nsent, kunwi tekkatem amek ad tessifsusem taɛkemt i ttɛebbin yimawlan-nwen.
Ḥsiɣ tuɣalem d imasayen ɣef twaculin-nwen kanakka d imecṭaḥ.
Bɣiɣ ad ken-snemmreɣ ɣef wayen akka i txeddmen yerna kunwi meẓẓiyit.
Fiḥel ma tceṭṭneḍ iman-ik a Dda Crif.
Ɛeddim-d tura ad teswem lqawa.
I asen-yenna i kraḍ yid-sen.
Azekka-nni tanezzayt rzan s axxam n Dda Crif i ten-yettrajun.
Tanemmirt a Dda Crif.
Yidir ! D aqcic lɛali. Azekka tzemrem ad tebdum.
Yidir, mmi-s n Dda Wakli At Umalu.
Anwa akka i d ameddakel-ik ?
Mi as-nniɣ ma ad d-aseɣ ad xedmeɣ d imliwi ɣur-k, yeqbel.
Maɛna xeddmeɣ akken dima d yiwen n umeddakel-iw.
Ihi mi d-ɛeddaɣ sdat n uxxam-is, ufiɣ-t yettliwi yiwen n umaswat i as-ibennun snat n texxamin ɣer ccib-is.
Anwa deg lewnaya-k ur nessin ara argaz am winna ?
Amzun d tamkarḍit i yellan deg uqerruy-is.
Berra i yesɛedda umcic-iw iḍ akken ma yella.
Yidir d yemma-s i d asakay-ines.
Nna Mennun yuɣ-itt lḥal tbedd, tzewwir-d tadanin n uyaziḍ.
Tssewway lqahwa, tettẓalla lefjer s teqbaylit.
Ma d Cabḥa tettheyyi i uxeddam-nsen tagella ara yawi yid-s d aɛwin.
Ɣef tejmaɛt i itekk Yidir, din i yettaf Sliman yettraju-t.
Ula d netta leǧbira ideg yerra aɛwin-is tɛelleq ɣer tayet-is tayeffust.
« Anaɣ a Rebbi ferreǧ fell-aneɣ, tefsiḍ kra yellan d takerrust ».
Cabḥa ad teqqim ɣef umnar n tewwurt, ad t-teḍfer s wallen alma iɛedda akkin.
Cabḥa tḥemmel Yidir am leɛmer-is, am tmemmuct n tiṭ-is.
Segmi ara yeffeɣ tanezzayt ɣer yixeddim d nettat tdeɛɛu-as s lxir.
Ur tetthennay alma ikcem-d s axxam tameddit.
Teḥsa s tezmert n urgaz-is ur teǧhid ara am zik.
Tikkelt yexdem, tikkelt yeqqim.
Maɛna yettɣiḍ-itt mmi-s i yekcem uɣilif n yimeqqranen kanakka d ameẓẓyan, urɛad t-teǧǧi tnuba-ines.
Nettat seg tama-s txeddem ayen iwimi tezmer, leqdic n uxxam akk ines, ternuḍ-as iẓeḍwan akked tebḥirin.
Ma tkemmel akka ad tt-taɣ ula d nettat deg tezmert-is.
Maca yal ass tettɛenni ɣer Rebbi ad tt-yeǧǧ tentem akken ad tqabel lemḥani i d-yuragen ɣef twacult-is.
Tal tanezzayt ad d-tekker, mi teḥsa lqahwa tewjed, ad truḥ ad d-tsaki Yidir ad iruḥ ad yexdem.
A Yidir ! Kker a mmi, kker !
Mi d-yuki ad yessired udem-is, ad yejɣem tiqqit n lqahwa s temsemment neɣ s tesfenǧet.
Ad yerfed leǧbira ɣef tayet-is, tawwurt tefk-it.
Amahil n lebni mačči d ccɣel isehlen.
Melmi ara tuɣaleḍ ɣer tnarit ?
Tetteddu tesmuqul-d ɣer deffir, nettat tettecmumuḥ.
Ruḥ, awi tayeḍ a tasekkurt-iw.
Ad yeddu Rebbi deg lebɣi-k.
Ur as-nuki ara akk i wakud iɛedda.
Akka ihi a Yidir, ad ak-d-ǧǧeɣ lehna, ar tufat.
Iḍelli kan i d-ṭṭfeɣ taseɣra taserdasant ad awḍeɣ alma d Qsemṭina ad sɛeddiɣ tirza tasejjant.
Ad d-yefk Rebbi lehna a Yidir.
Yerbeḥ, d teɛyin i iyi-d-tefkiḍ.
Aseggas-a ad d-fakkeɣ tizrawin-iw seg Bumerdas, sin n yiseggasen n lɛesker ttarjun-iyi, imir-nni ad d-dhuɣ yid-neɣ, kemm akked nekk.
Akkagi ara iyi-tissineḍ akken i ilaq.
Amzun d tagrawla i texdem twacult-im mi tessawḍeḍ ad d-tiniḍ lehdur am wi s tmedliwin timeqqranin.
Wali ṭra amek thedder tmeṭṭut tilellit tamrabeḍt n Tzerrajt.
Ihi ay aɛeggun, kkes aɣilif, tzemreḍ ad d-tazneḍ lemmal-ik lawan i tebɣiḍ imi awal aneggaru ad d-yuɣal ɣur-i.
Yezga d axeddam meskin seg wasmi i d-yekker, yettkel ala ɣef yiman-is.
Yeǧǧa deg lḥeqq n tmurt-is d wayen-nniḍen, yerbeḥ tilelli-ines.
Ula d alaɛi ur yettlaɛi ara atmaten-is, dɣa isseɛzel-d iman-is fell-asen.
Maɛna tawacult-nneɣ tamecṭuḥt, ɣef uqerruy-is baba, tesɣers-d iman-is ɣef tikkelt ɣef twacult tameqqrant d tikli-ines.
Ɛeddant ukkuẓet tmerwin deg lɛamur-nsent ar tura ur zwijent.
Wali kan tawacult tamrabeḍt, tamerkantit At Ccurafa, aḥric ameqqran n tullas-is burent.
Ayen d-teqqareḍ akk yella aYidir, yerna yettili-d ar ass-a.
Ayagi akk yenna-as-t mi tt-yeɛna yiwen n wass s aɣerbaz-is.
Wanag amrabeḍ yuɣen taqbaylit yezmer ad d-yini ayen yebɣa ɣef lejdud-is.
Ur ilaq ara lejdud n temrabeḍt ara yaɣ uqbayli ad ten-yergem, ad ten-iɛayer neɣ ad istehzi yis-sen.
Yeḥsa d akken amrabeḍ yezmer ad yaɣ taqbaylit, ma d aqbayli ur yezmir ara ad yaɣ tamrabeḍt.
Tella yiwet n temsalt tecɣeb nezzeh Yidir, teḍra-d yagi mazal tḍerru-d ar ass-a.
Imrabḍen ḥessben iman-nsen, ttwalin iman-nsen d ihaggaren, ssnen awal n Rebbi, ifḍel-iten, akka i ttwalin iman-nsen, akka diɣen i ten-ttwalin Leqbayel.
Yidir ɣur-s lexbar ɣef wassaɣen inmettiyen yellan gar Leqbayel d Yimrabḍen.
Netta, tawacult-is d taẓawalit, ma d tin ira tettban-as-d d tamerkantit yerna d tamrabeḍt.
Yidir ɣas ma iḥemmel-itt s tidet yerna ala nettat kan i iḥemmel maɛna ikukra cwiṭ imawlan-is.
Ṭawes tettraju tal tlkkelt deg Yidir ad d-yebdu lehdur-nni n tɣeṭṭen, wanag nettat tiririt-is s ih, tiririt tanilawt, theyya-tt-id deg wacḥal aya.
I sin yid-sen ttwalin azekka-nsen d win ara ten-yezdin.
Nettat d Yidir ttemyarun tibratin d tiɣezzfanin anect n usirem-nsen.
Amahil tebda-t deg yiwen n uɣerbaz amezwaru ur nebɛid ara aṭas ɣef uxxam-nsen.
Ṭawes tfukk tizrawin-is, tuwi-d agerdas-ines ara tt-yerren d taselmadt.
Cwiṭ cwiṭ kan ad ilin wid ara yettfaqen s terkakas-nsen, ad ttakin u ad ssakayen wid mazal ar tura ṭṭsen, ɣer taggara awal-nni taddukli ad d-yuɣal s unamek-ines ameqqran.
Mi ara d-awin igerdasen-nsen ad bdun tudert turmidt, ad uɣalen d iɣella deg tkebbanit anda ara xedmen.
Tuwi-d fell-asen diɣen ad issinen amek i d-ttilin wassaɣen ilsiyen gar yixeddamen.
Deg usuday qqaren tiẓri, ma deg lluzinat lemden tasemrest.
A l'institut ils apprennent la théorie, à l'usine la pratique.
Amek i ilaq yiwen ad yexdem deg kra n tegnit ara d-yeɣlin ma yella yuɣ-it lḥal deg unrar n umahil.
Yidir yerra ɣer tama n umalu n tmurt, ɣer temdin n Wihran.
Tikkelt-a iberdan i uɣen sliman d Yidir akken ad gen tannant-nsen i uheyyi n ukatay n taggara n tezrawin, mgaraden.
Tinebgawin ffɣent, ǧǧant-n deffir-sent yiwet n tsusmi anect-ila-tt.
Dda Ɛacur i yeddren tilufa tiqesḥanin deg tudert-is, ladɣa deg ttrad amaḍlan wis sin iseg d-yemneɛ, yettwali tamsalt-nni n lexḍubegga n Lwiza mačči n yessi-s nni-nniḍen d ayen i d-yettilin anda i teddiḍ.
Aselmed deg tazwara n yiseggasen n settin, deffir n timunnent n tmurt n Zzayer d win yelhan, igerrez imi aṭas n yimussnawen i d-isuffeɣ.
Wigi d aɣerbaz n Zzayer i ten-iseɣren, i isserfen fell-asen, maca d timura tiberraniyin i yesfaydin deg-sen, am Fransa, kanada, Marikan atg…
Ad yekcem ddaw n tduli, aɣilif ad yezdi yid-s.
Ad t-yaker kan yiḍes, ad d-bdun fell-as…
Netta di tidet mačči d iḍ neɣ d tillas i yettaggad, yettaggad s wayen i d-igellu yiḍes, yettagad targit.
