Acimi i yettagad targit?
Yal iḍ mi ara qemcent wallen-is, iɣder-it yiḍes ad t-id-tesdduqes yiwet n targit.
D tinna kan i d-yettuɣalen kra kkan wayyuren yezrin.
D acu akka i yettargu yettarra-t d argaz yetretren seg lxuf ?
Yettargu amzun d yiwen i as-d-idiheddren.
Ɣas ma deg unebdu i nella, d azɣal, netta tkeččem-it tergagit, tidi tettaweḍ-as ɣer yiḍarren.
Ur yeẓri d acu-t?
Ur yeẓri amek-it ?
Win akken i as-d-ittebdaden d taqnuẓt.
Ussan imezwura, wissen d tugadin i yugad nezzeh neɣ d lxelq-nni i as-d-yettweḥḥi Rebbi ur d-nessefraẓ ara ayen i d-yeqqar.
Mi ara d-yenṭeq, yeḥsab-as Rebbi i Meqqran tettenhaz ddunit, netta bu-kerraɛ yekkat-it ɣer tgecrar, ur yezmir ara akk ad yerwel.
Ayen yettarran aglim n tfekka n Meqqran yezɣeb d tirni d agejdur n taɣect i yefka Rebbi i ugeɛmir n tesga.
Lufan ad d-yuɣal Meqqran cwiṭ ɣer leɛqel-is, ad yefreẓ cwiṭ timsal, ad yaf d iwellihen d uwessi i as-d-yettakk usebdad-nni n yiḍ.
Akken bɣun tuɣaleḍ, kečč ad tettuḍ talɣa-nni tamezwaru i ak-d-yerra Rebbi.
Tin akken i yefka i wid akk yellan am ḳečč.
Maɛna taneslit amzun tḥeffu, tetteqẓuẓur, teḥḍem, tettefruruy, ahat ala yiwen nuẓar i d-yeggran yeṭṭef tarwiḥt ur tessuhel ara anda akken urǧin yuɣal-d yiwen.
Mačči yiwet neɣ snat n tikkal i as-d-yebded win akken i as-d-yettakken iwellihen yessakayen.
Ala azaylal ur nettwedday ara fell-as.
Deg ubrid mi iteddu yemmuger-d aṭas n yimdanen.
Yal yiwen d acu i as-d-yeqqar.
Drus maḍi i yeddan yid-s, ttakken anzi ɣur-s deg wamayendin n tlufa, bɣan ayen akka ixeddem ad yaweḍ ɣer taggara-s u ad as-yeffeɣ leɛtab ɣer tafat.
Qqaren-as mi t-id-ttmmagaren : « Gedha ay ameddakel, tabɣest igerrzen, ẓẓwer, aweḍ s iswi, aql-aɣ yid-k i nella.
Ihegga-d iman-is i waya akken i ilaq.
Tawnafit-is, yiwen ur yezmir ad tt-yektil seg wakken meqqert.
Wagi ara yezger, d asif-nni n lemḥan.
Yeqqar kan deg wul-is, acḥal d abrid netta ad as-d-ittales i tenfalit-a: « Ad t-zegreɣ, ad t-zegreɣ, ad t-zegreɣ… ».
Ass-agi mi yuweḍ ɣef yiri n wasif kullec ad d-iban.
Netta ur yumin yiwen ɣef wayen i as-d-qqaren, ama iselmaden-is, ama ccix n lǧamaɛ, ama wiyaḍ i as-d-ittaddren asif-agi wis sebɛa s zuxx.
Ass-agi i d ass-is. Kullec ad d-yedher, ad t-iwali s wallen-is.
Netta amzun yeffeɣ-it leɛqel, yettaḍsa, itekkes iceṭṭiḍen i d-yelsa, yeggra-d ala deg tkiluḍt.
Yeffeɣ-d yidir d amezwaru seg uɣerbaz, terna Ṭawes cwiṭ, tuɣal ula d nettat teffeɣ-d.
Awi tayeḍ tegluḍ s wayla-w a Yidir.
Ad am-d-ǧǧeɣ talwit d wul-iw a Ṭawes.
Aql-i ad k-rajuɣ ad d-tuɣaleḍ s tezmert-ik.
Sahel deg lehna aYidir.
Ur as-nuki ara akk i lweqt iɛedda.
Uɣalen ṭṭalen ssaɛa, ufan yedda nezzeh wakud.
Tfukk kan Ṭawes inaw-is, ṭṭreḍqen i sin yid-sen s teḍsa.
Tagi ahat d tamezwarut ara d-yeḍrun deg Tzerrajt.
Ih, akken d-teqqareḍ, ula d nekk ad d-iniɣ : « Ṭawes, yelli-s n Si Ɛellawa n At Ccurafa, teqbel ad tezdi tudert-is d yiwen n Uqbayli iwimi ssawalen yidir.
Wagi d Yidir, mmi-s n Wakli n At Umalu.
Yella kan yiwen iwimi tzemrem ad as-terrem awal s tilawayt.
Waah ! D aya i ttrajuɣ deg wacḥal aya ad iyi-t-id-tiniḍ.
Tura dayen, ayen akken yellan yella maɛna yedreg, ma d tura yeffeɣ-d i tmadaɣt, iban-d akken ma yella, medden akk ad t-ḥsun.
Ṭawes yennecraḥ wudem-is seg lferḥ.
Kra n wussan uqbel ad fakkeɣ tawala n tannant taɛsekrit, imawlan-iw ad n-asen s axxam-nwen ad kem-iyi-d-xeḍben.
Ihi uqbel ad uɣaleɣ, nekk d argaz-im, kemm d tameṭṭut-iw, yella wayen i ilaqen ad t-yexdem yiwen akken ad yaweḍ ɣer waya.
Welleh ma txedmeḍ akka yelha.
Ctaqeɣ ad sleɣ i wayen i d-igellun s tumert segmi i d-tezwareḍ awal-ik s tseɣra n lɛesker.
Ad am-d-rnuɣ diɣen yiwen n yisalli-nniḍen, wagi mačči d win isseqraḥen, d win issefraḥen.
I tura, mačči d kra i yellan gar yifassen-nneɣ.
Awanek yettayal i yal aɣerman n tmurt snat tmerwin d ukkuẓ n wayyuren n umahil war talawit, d wa i d amaẓlu aɣelnaw.
Sḍis n wayyuren ur k-ttwaliɣ, bezzaf.
Ddurt i d-iteddun ad rzuɣ alma d anẓul n tmurt, tama n umalu.
Ɣer wanda akka ad k-aznen ?
Rnu-iyi-d diɣen wagi.
Melmi akka ihi ara tsahleḍ ?
D taseɣra n rrwaḥ ɣer lɛeker i d-ṭṭfeɣ ussan-agi yezrin.
Ala i kemm iwimi ara t-iniɣ.
Ula d baba d yemma akked yaya ur asen-t-nniɣ ara.
Lxir ncallah ! D acu-t diɣen tura wagi ?
Ma d tura, ala deg usugen-is i tt-yettwali, ala deg usefru yura i as-ihedder.
Aya yenna-t acḥal d abrid i wul-is.
Asmi ara fakken snat tmerwin d ukkuẓ n wayyuren n tmara, taɣawsa ara yeg d tamezwarut uqbel akk tiyiḍ d tameɣra n tuqqna n Ṭawes.
Iḥulfan-is yessrusu-ten ɣef lkaɣeḍ amellal, mseḍfaren d ifyar n usefru, qqaren-d d Ṭawes i imelken ul-is, d nettat i d ddwa n waṭṭan-is.
Ahat imi d tawsit-nniḍen n tayri, ahat diɣ mi mazal urɛad yeddir yid-s, teqqim kan d asirem.
Yassaram akka d tasawent ad yexdem axxam d Ṭawes, diɣ kra n wayen yettmenni ad yaweḍ ɣur-s.
Imdanen-a yessers deg deg wul-is, ttɛeddayen-d s nnuba deg uqerruy-is, maca tin iwimi iḥeggez amḍiq ameqqran deg wul-is d tasekkurt-is.
Winna, anef-as kan, ɣur-s i d-yelmed ssber s way-s i yettqabal akka tura taswiɛt i iẓẓemḍen fell-as.
Tesserwa-as tagzert n ujenwi, tagella i as-d-tettnawal acḥal d abrid deg yimalas imi d tin i d-ibeqqu wul-is.
Yemma-s d yemma-s, iḥemmel-itt am leɛmer-is.
Yettwali yaya-s Mennun i t-id-irebban teggar aẓeṭṭa.
Yesteqsay-itt ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin yerzan tutlayt taqbaylit.
Urǧin yettwaḥbes usugen n umadan kra n tikkelt, yezga d ilelli i lebda.
Mi ara isenned ɣef tmeḍreḥt-is tumsixt, ad iqmec kan allen, ad d-yaf iman-is deg Tewrirt.
S tira n tmedyezt itettu yir tudert i as-yerran ussan-is d irẓaganen.
Maca Yidir mačči d amdan menwala, Yidir d amedyaz, Yidir ittaru, ittaru kra i t-iqerḥen.
Ur yeḍlim ara, a-t-an d ayen akka i as-iḍerrun
Awal yenna-as-t-id uqebḍan : « Ad tt-txellseḍ ɣlayet »
Ɣef yiri-s tella diɣen yiwet n lḥila tamecṭuḥt tettaččar d aman s way-s yessirid.
Ma yebɣa ad d-isuffeɣ ayen yečča, yettarra-t deg yiwen n ssḍel yersen deg tesga n texxamt-nni kan.
Ttawin-as-d i Yidir snat n tiram n tgella ur tent-itett ula d aydi deg wakken ur lhint, deg yiwen n wass.
Ameḥbus, ur yezmir ara ad yettu ussan i d-isɛedda deg lḥebs
Tḥulfa i tasa-s tedduqqes-d acḥal d abrid.
CabḥaTexleɛ, yezɣeb akk uglim-is mi tesla i tkarrust tettwejririḥ.
Lxir ncallah, ad tt-isuffeɣ Rebbi ɣer lxir.
I tenna Nna Mennun s tugdi.
Skudmal yettqerrib-d skudmal yettsuɣu Rebbi i t-id-ixelqen.
Mi d-udrent ad d-ffɣent slan akken ma llan i yiwen n usuni yettcerrigen mebɛid tasusmi.
Akli yuɣal-d s tkarrust n yiwen n unarag-is.
Ibedd ɣef umnar n tewwurt n ufrag.
Yessawal i tlawin-is ad d-ffɣent ad sahlen ɣer Tzerrajt.
Tilawin ttheyyint iman-nsent akken i iwata akken ad d-fken udem yelhan sdat n yiɛeggalen n twacult ara yuɣalen sya ɣer sdat deg lehna d iḍulan-nsent.
Akli yeffeɣ ad d-yekru takarust ara ten-yawin ɣer Tzerrajt.
At Umalu ur d-cɣilen ara akk deg liḥala n tegnawt ɣas ma tebda-d lgerra tekkat ugar n sgellin, i ten-iceɣben d tissulya n yidir.
Ula d uḍan semmḍit cwiṭ, ɣef waya i as-qqaren i tallit-a, taqejmurt n mayyu.
Ssaɣayen tikwal ula d times deg lawan-a.
Tawacult N At Umalu, tekker-d zik mi d-yuweḍ wass n lḥedd.
Aya lxir-iw s mmi yuweḍ d argaz.
D taffugt i ttaffgen wussan, iḍelli kan i lliɣ ttrebbiɣ deg-s.
S lehna ! S lehna ! Ig Rebbi nerbeḥ nufa-t. I d-tenna Nna Mennun.
Ig Rebbi ad aɣ-ddun deg lebɣi yimrabḍen n At Ccurafa, ad ǧǧen ad idiren akken sin n yimdanen yemsebɣan s tidet.
D nekk ara ten-yawin.
D nekk ara tent-yawin.
D nekk ara ken-yawin.
D nekk ara k-yawin.
S nekk ara kem-yawin.
D nekk ara t-yawin.
D nekk ara tt-yawin.
S axxam-nsen ara terremt akken ad d-nexḍeb Yelli-tsen Ṭawes i Yidir-nneɣ.
Kkremt ad telsemt tissebbaḍin-nkent ad terzumt ɣer Tzerrajt lḥedd i d-iteddun.
D ass n ugunfu, ulac ixeddim i yinuwar am Si Ɛellawa.
Imru deg ufus-is, yebda tira ɣef tezmamt yettawi dima yid-s, yiwen n usefru i d-yeffɣen ɣef tikkelt seg yiḥulfan iḥulfa segmi yesla yemmut Yidir.
Ala amedyaz am netta ara ifehmen amek i ddant temsal almi uwḍent ɣer twaɣit am ta.
Mi fukken tanṭelt, rran zzerb d ccḍeb ɣef uẓekka n Yidir, din kan deg tmeqbert, yeɛna yiwet n tzemmurt d tameqqrant, yeqqim ddaw-as i tili, isenned ɣer lǧedras mm yikeɛruren.
Caɛban yeḥḍer i tenṭelt n mmi-s n umeddakel-ines Akli.
Ikcem-it yiwen n leḥzen, yiwen n uɣiḍi, ur yezmir yiwen ad t-id-yeglem.
Akken deg wukkuẓ yid-sen i d-rezfen mebla lebɣi-nsen ɣer taddart-nsen Tawrirt.
Ufan-d i d-ufan…
Uletma-s Dihya ur nessin ara Yidir, iɣaḍ-itt lḥal ula d nettat imi twala imawlan-is ḥeznen akken ma llan.
Ayen yuɣen caɛban i yuɣen tameṭṭut-is Lwiza.
Ula d Meqqran iban ɣef wudem-is leḥzen.
Yidir d tizzya n Meqqran-is.
Iɣaḍ-it nezzeh umeddakel-is Wakli iwimi iruḥ uwḥid i yesɛa kannaken d ilemẓi.
Caɛban mi yesla kan s yir isalli, ɣlin-as-d yimeṭṭawen d tiregwa.
Tuḍrist tunsibt i d-fkan i yimawlan n yiɛsekriwen i d-yemmuten din d akken d yiwet n twaɣit i yeglan yis-sen mi llan teggen iluɣma n urami d uqras n teldunin s temgeḥyal.
Nekk zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ, Yidir d taluft n Amgala i yeglan yis-s.
Mmuten-d deg Maser neɣ deg Falesṭin deg useggas 1973 mi tekker gar Waɛraben d wuydayen.
Aṭas seg-sen d Iqbayliyen, uznen-ten ɣer usammer alemmas.
Akka i d-teḍra ɣef ḳra n yiserdasen iwimi yeqqur uqerruy, akka i ten-ttwalin.
Tamacahut i d-uwin ɣef tmettant-is, nekk ur tt-umineɣ ara.
Tawnafit-is ɣer tmaziɣt s umata, ur as-igi ara tilisa.
Acḥal d abrid, anda i iyi-d-immuger, ad iyi-d-isteqsi ɣef kra n temsalt yerzan amezruy, tutlayt neɣ ayen-nniḍen.
D amedyaz, iteddu ad yuɣal d yiwen n umaru ameqqran lufan ur aɣ-ɣurren ara deg-s kanakken d ilemẓi.
D yiwen n umdan yecɣeb aṭas yidles-is amaziɣ d tutlayt-is almi d tama-ihin akkin.
Argaz i aɣ-iruḥen ass-a, ulac aṭas am netta.
Mi d-uɣalen seg tmeqbert, ddeqs yid-sen i qqimen deg tejmaɛt, awal-nsen itezzi ɣef tmettant n Yidir.
Inṭeq-d Dda Crif At Ḥemmu, aḥeddad n wawal n taddart n Tewrirt, d win yettmeyyizen akken i ilaq.
Anwa ara tt-isebren ?
Ula d imeṭṭawen ur ten-id-tru ara alma i d-yeɣli yiḍ, tufa-d iman-is deg wussu-s, tettru-d akk imeṭṭawen n tfekka-s.
Tssewweq wissen anda.
Teqqim tɛeqqer, tebbugla deg yiwen n umkan, tettxaẓar sdat-s, maca kra ur t-twala ɣas ma arquqen-is ldin.
Maca tumert-nni akk i tumer Ṭawes, teḍra yid-s am yiḍ i d-yeɣlin deg wass, kullec yuɣal d aberkan sdat-s.
Ṭawes mi d-teṭṭef tabrat n Yidir, tewwet deg wul-is tmeɣra.
Tefreḥ nezzeh ladɣa mi as-yenna lḥedd i d-iteddun ad n-asen yimawlan-iw s axxam-nwen.
Anda ara k-rreɣ a lferḥ ?
Am twacult n At Umalu, ula d nutni, nettat, yemma-s akked baba-s heyyan-d iman-nsen ad streḥben s yinebgawen ara yuɣalen qḍeɛ ccekk d iḍulan-nsen akka d tasawent imi Si Ɛelawa, igzem-it di rray, yeqbel yelli-s Ṭawes, ad tt-yaɣ Yidir.
Tanṭelt ara d-yilin azekka-nni, d taddart ara d-iceɣlen yid-s.
Ula seg Tjerrajt d tudrin-nniḍen, aṭas i d-yusan ad wajhen.
Imir-nni kan ffɣen-d yimezdaɣ-is akken ma llan, argaz tameṭṭut, ad ɛezzin tawacult n At Umalu, ad ḥeznen, ad ttrun yid-s.
Ula d igenni ikcem-it lɣiḍ, yettru-d s lehwa i d-yekkaten ɣas ma yella yiṭij.
Yeɣli-d leḥzen d ameqqran ɣef taddart n Tewrirt
Yesbur s yicuḍaḍ-is iberkanen merra izerban-is.
Nna Mennun, mi d-iɛedda sdat-s Yidir s daxel n usenduq, tettsuɣu, tettmeǧǧid nettat tekkat deg yidmaren-is teqqar : « Aya yemma yexla uxxam-iw, yenger uxxam-iw deg yiwen n wass ».
Iḥemmel Tom agmer n yiselman.
Nezmer diɣen s yiccer ad d-nenter kra n tamiwin n uɛeqqa, ad yuɣal amzun yeččur d tifawtin.
Talɣa-a d tin n yizimer abaṭuc.
Ihi ad as-nini turart-a n wulli d wakraren ad d-tili gar kraḍ n yimuraren.
Yal yiwen ad yesɛu mraw n wulli, d iɣeqqayen kan n uzemmur akked semmus n wakraren, yal yiwen wissen amek-iten wakraren-is, ad ilin kan mgaraden.
Win iwimi d-tṣaḥ nnuba-s d tamezwarut d netta ara yebdun.
I kraḍ n yimuraren qqimen ɣef yiman-nsen ɣer lqaɛa.
Ma ɛyan ad ḥebsen ma ur ɛyin ad rnun turar
Ad uɣalen ɣer ubeddel n wakraren s wulli.
Yal akrar yeswa snat n wulli.
S wulli i yerbeḥ yiwen ad-d-yerr akraren i as-ččan.
Mi ara fakken akk wakraren d wulli, yal yiwen deg-sen wissen acḥal i yuwi deg-sen.
Ad yeɛreḍ ad d-yettaṭṭaf tiyugiwin n wulli neɣ akraren diɣen iman-nsen, ama d wid-is ama d wid n umeddakel-is.
Tuwi-d fell-as ad d-yeṭtef tiyugiwin n wulli akken ad d-yessekcem akraren-is.
Ilaq diɣen ad yurar s mseqleb ulli-nni i d-yeggran.
Ma yella yeṭṭef-d ulli d awkraren xelḍen yexser.
Imir-nni ad d-tezzi nnuba i umurar-nniḍen.
Tikkelt-a ilaq tal tikkelt ad d-yeṭṭef ulli d tiyugiwin iman-nsent neɣ akraren akken yebɣu yili umḍan-nsen.
Syin ad yuɣal ɣer mseqleb-nni.
Ulli-nni i d-yeṭṭef ad tent-yawi, wissen acḥal.
Ma ɣer taggara yeẓẓwer icelqef-d yiwen n umḍan n wulli d azwiǧ, a-t-an yerbeḥ, yezmer ad ikemmel turart.
D turart-nniḍen i tturaren tameddit mi d-yettban ɛeyyu fell-asen.
Deg-s d turart, deg-s d asgunfu imi urar-a yettili-d s yiɣimi.
Amek akka i tturaren "Aqedduḥ n yimensi" ?
Aqedduḥ n yimensi d yiwet n turart i tturaren warrac d teqcicin deg waṭas yid-sen.
Turart urar, ha-tt-an sdat-k, maɛna ḥader ad iɛeddi fell-ak uzaylal, ad teggriḍ deg nndama tameqqrant, d acu n wudem ara t-tsekneḍ i yimawlan-ik d taddart-ik.
Turart i bɣun uraren-tt maca ur ilaq ara ad ɣeflen, ad ǧǧen biccuḥ, akken i as-qqaren yigerdan i wuccen, ad ten-yesxixxed seg yiwen neɣ seg sin n yizamaren.
Mačči kan ala turart i tturaren, am warrac n merra tudrin, tetten deg yal agummu i d-yettakk ugama deg tal tallit ɣas ma ahat ulac-it deg yisekla n tferkiwin-nsen.
Maɛna tiferkiwin n medden akk nsen.
Ihi ttmiẓẓiden mebla akukru ɣef wayla ur ttayalen, ur ttaǧǧan tibexsisin, tiẓurin, areḍlim, ladɣa ma yewwa.
Ma irdef-iten-id walbaɛḍ akken ɣef yisekla, din din ad ten-yessiweḍ ɣer leɛqal n taddart ara ixeṭṭin imawlan-nsen assen akken ara qqimen deg lḥeqq.
Tikwal d bab n wayla iwumi qelɛen igumma mebla lebɣi-s ara d-issutren leɣrem i yimawlan n yimukar imecṭaḥ.
Ayen yebɣu yessuter-it-id ad xellsen ig Rebbi yezzeɣzeɣ wayen i d-yeḍleb.
Akka i d isuḍaf n taddart i yuɣalen d leɛwayed ara yelmed yal yiwen.
Mi ara mlilen sin n yimeddukal-a i d-smektayen d ayen sɛeddan akken deg temẓi-nsen s cwiṭ n usḥissef imi ayen iɛeddan ur d-yettuɣal.
Azul a Caɛban ! I as-yenna Wakli mi i iɛedda ad yeqqim ɣef yiri-s ɣef udekkan n tejmaɛt.
Azul ay Akli ! Amek yettili yisli n useggas aya ?
Akken kan yebɣa Rebbi, mačči akken nebɣa nekkni.
Ih d tidet, yal yiwen deg-neɣ d acu yebɣa, maɛna tikwal lebɣi yeɛdez ad d-isefqed fell-aneɣ, ad as-tiniḍ amzun yettu-aɣ.
Nekk ḥsiɣ d acu i tebɣiḍ ay ameddakel aqdim.
Ula d nekk walaɣ d acu i k-iceɣben ay Akli.
D acu akka i twalaḍ ? Ur tufiḍ d acu i iyi-ixussen.
Ahya ay Akli ! D ayen ibanen am yiṭij, rnu ma llan yir yilsawen, ad d-suffɣen kan yiwen n yisalli ad d-yeslef akk i taddart.
Yerna wigi ur tufiḍ d acu i rebḥen, akkagi kan i gan am stut-nni n Nna Werdiya.
Yesla kan Wakli s yisem n tnaragt tuqbiḥt, yeɛqel d acu iwala Caɛban i t-iceɣben.
Ih a Caɛban a gma, d ayen-nni, mebla ma isfrez-d tamsalt, ur tteffreɣ ara fell-ak.
Ɣef waya i kukran medden ad tt-nasben.
Wanag yessi-s d lɛali-tent d tirni, cebḥent yerna ḥedqent, ladɣa tamecṭuḥt-nni ines, tinna iwimi ssawalen Lwiza.
. Caɛban, yesla kan i yisem n Lwiza yuɣal d azewwaɣ am tmiṭuct, ula d lehdur ɛerqen-as.
Lwiz…Lwiza, d acu yuɣen Lwiza ?
Ini-iyi-d d acu ik-yuɣen kečč a Caɛban.
D acu i iyi-yuɣen ?... Nniɣ-as d lbaḍna tuffirt, yiwen ur iyi-d-yeggar tamawt.
Akka akk i qqaren wid iɣef d-trezzu Lalla-k tayri, yiwen ur imellek iman-is.
Mačči d leɛqel-nsen i yettcaxen, d ul i yettuɣalen d imdebber, inehher bab-is ig Rebbi s asif.
D awal-is i yettɛeddayen ma d leɛqel yettarra iman-is deg ṭṭerf.
D Cabḥa i iyi-d-yennan amek i tettemxaẓarem kečč d Lwiza mi ara tt-id-temmagreḍ deg ubrid n tala.
Tettwali ddaw n tiṭ-is agejdur-nni n ucmumeḥ i d-itekken ahat seg tleqqaɛt taxejḍant n wulawen-nwen di sin, i tettembeddalem.
Mačči d kra n tuccḍa.
Timlilit tettili-d deg uɣerbaz-nsen, ussan n taggara n yimalas, ass n sed d wass n acer.
Iwakken ad tifsus teɛkemt n tiɣin n yidlisen yesɛan azal, fell-asen, imi tabaɣurt tɣull-iten, yal yiwen deg-sen yuɣ-d yiwen n unmir yerzan yiwet n tenga am tusnakt, tafransist, tagnizit, taɛrabt, tarakalt, amezruy.
Ttɛeddayen-d akk fell-asent s nnuba.
Yettxemmim diɣen ɣef ukayad-is n taggara n useggas n uɣerbaz alemmas ara d-yilin deg yimalas wis sin n wayyur n yunyu.
Ula d netta yeḥsa, Ṭawes teldi-as-d tawwurt n wul-is maca mazal ur t-id-tencid ad t-yekcem s wudem ilaway.
Myeḥmmalen s tuffra, ɛeddi tura kečč anwa ara ixedmen asurif amezwaru, ad as-yini i wayeḍ ḥemmleɣ-k neɣ ḥemmleɣ-kem.
Yidir, d netta i d argaz, d netta i ilaqen ad yezwir, ad iqerreḍ ɣef yiman-is ayen tessen yagi.
Teqqim akken…
Yidir yeẓẓwer deg tutlayin d yilugan-nsent n tira am tefransist neɣ tagnizit.
Ma d taɛrabt n Ṭawes, tessen akken i iwata tasleḍt n tefyar akked umawal.
Rabaḥ yuwi-d iman-is deg trakalt akked umezruy.
Efk-as-d asteqsi ɣef yisem n tmanaɣt n tmurt i tebɣiḍ deg umaḍal, ad t-id-yaf neɣ ma yebda lehdur ɣef umezruy, ladɣa win n Yimaziɣen, ur t-tḥebbseḍ ara akk.
« Yyaw ad awen slemdeɣ amezruy n tidet n Yimaziɣen, mačči win i wen-sɣarayen deg uɣerbaz yebnan akk ɣef tkerkas ».
Akka i yeqqar.
Qadar d Sliman bḍan tusnakt ɣef sin, amezwaru yeddem aljibr imi yetwel deg-s.
Ma d wis sin, deg wakken ɣur-s tanzeggit teshel am waman, ssawalen-as yimeddukal-is Sliman-Pythagore.
Ass-nni akken i ɣran asekkud n Pythagore, wa yegza-t cwiṭ wa ur t-yegzi ara akk, dɣa mi llan yiwen n wacer deg tneɣrit n uɣerbaz, issefhem-asen-d akken i ilaq yerna s teqbaylit.
Asekkud-a yeqqar-d akka : « Deg ukerdis amaɣud, amkuẓ n udubdis yegda timernit n yimkaẓ n yidisen-nniḍen ».
Azemz n ukayad yeɣli-d ass n warim 05 deg wayyur n yunyu, d tafsut, ifit mazal ur yessenṭi.
Wid teɛna taluft ad ruḥen ɣef temzuɣert s adeg n ukayad ara d-yilin deg uɣerbaz alemmas Mulud Ferɛun i d-yezgan deg tlemmast n temdint n Uqbu.
Tarbaɛt n yimeddukal i igan asniles-nsen s wul-nsen, yeffeɣ leɛtab-nsen ɣer tafat imi uwin-d akayad-nsen akken ma llan yerna s tezmilin yelhan neɣ igerrzen, ladɣa amusnak Sliman i d-yufraren d amezwaru gar merra inelmaden n wasun n Uqbu.
Aɣerbaz war isem n Tzerrajt deg taggara n useggas aɣurbiz, ass n 04 yulyu iga tameɣra imi i d-yuwi yiwen n umfuḍi ameqqran n wid irebḥen akayad n taggara n ulmud alemmas.
Aḥric ameqqran n yinelmaden-is ɛeddan ɣer tesnawit n Bgayet.
Tamuɣli n yidir ɣef yidles-ines s umata temgarad mačči cwiṭ kan ɣef tin n wiyaḍ ig Rebbi d wid i t-iqerben cwiṭ deg uxemmem ɣef wamayendin n temsal.
Tamentilt-a tahaggart, anda yebɣu yeddu yettawi-tt yid-s.
Ama deg uɣerbaz alemmas, din i d-testeqsa fell-as tikkelt tamezwarut, ama deg tesnawit, ama deg tesdawit, ama deg tudert-is tamsadurt, ama mi yella yesɛedday ameẓlu-ines aɣelnaw.
Imḍebbren yextaren taɛrabt n Qurayc d tutlayt tunsibt, taɣelnawt, yis-s i seddawen tadbelt tazzayrit deg tal taɣult, begsen-d mebla aḥezzeb anqaḍ n tutlayin tinasliyin n tmurt am teqbaylit, tacawit, tacenwit, tamẓabit, tamuhert.
Kra seg tutlayin-a imi ur d-dhin ara yid-sent, nnegrent neɣ teddunt ɣer din.
Yidir, ɣur-s yiwet n tefrit yukin, yeẓra anda i tetteddu tutlayt-is ma tkemmel akka.
Dɣa ayen akk iwimi yezmer ixeddem-it s tumert, tikwal irennu-tent seg lǧib-is seg cwiṭ n umesruf-nni i as-ittakk baba-s.
Deg lǧib n deffir n userwal-is tezga yiwet n tezmamt din, imru ur t-ixeṭṭu ara.
Segmi ara d-yekker netta d asteqsi n yimɣaren akked temɣarin ama n taddart n Tewrirt, ama n Tzerrajt neɣ anda yebɣu yili deg tmurt n Leqbayel.
Ad as-tiniḍ d abɛaḍ n yimsulta i itegen kra n tsestant yesɛan azal d ameqqran.
Yessutur deg-sen ad as-d-fken ama d asefru n yimedyazen iqburen, ama d anzi, ama d timseɛreqt, ama d kra n temɛayt yuklalen ad d-teqqim ur tettmettat ara.
Ayen i d-igemmer seg tsekla timawt taqbaylit yettarra-t deg tezmamt-is.
Mi ara d-yuɣal tameddit s axxam, kra n wayen akk yuran deg tezmamt-is yettarra-t s tezdeg ɣer yizmamen-nniḍen.
Ttwaliɣ s wallen-iw, selleɣ s yimeẓẓuɣen-iw.
Ifukk ulmud n uɣerbaz alemmas.
Ukkuẓ n yiseggasen wwten ɛeddan am waḍu.
Kra yellan ẓid, tɛeǧǧel-d ɣur-s taggara-s, yettfakka zik zik, yettruḥu ur t-nrewwu.
Ass aneggaru n useggas aɣurbiz i d-iɣellin deg ukkuẓ n wayyur yulyu, yiwen n wass send amulli n timunnent n tmurt n Zzayer, gan tameɣra tameqqrant deg uɣerbaz war isem n temdint Tazerrajt.
Imeɛraḍen d inelmaden, iselmaden akked kra n yimawlan n yinelmaden.
Yella-d deg tazwara tikci n warrazen i yinelmaden i d-yufraren.
Arraz n umezwaru deg ukayad n ulmud alemmas deg wasun n Uqbu, i t-yuwin d Sliman, amesnak-nneɣ.
Ma d yidir isaḥ-it-id warraz n tsekla tafransist, Ṭawes tuwi win n taɛrabt.
Inelmaden n uswir wis kraḍ uraren-d yiwet n tnezgumt s teqbaylit, d ayen iwimi yeɛǧeb i waṭas n yinebgawen imi ur nnumen ara ttwalin aya deg yiɣerbazen-nneɣ.
D tutlayt taɛrabt i yeṭṭfen tasga, akka i tetteddu tmurt.
Ikemmel Yidir ayen yugaren s tmedyezt-is taqesḥant yekkaten s aqerruy n wid ur nuki.
Anemhal n uɣrerbaz yugad ɣef umkan-is dɣa yeḥbes irmad idelsanen maca ur yessuffeɣ yiwen, yeǧǧa wid yebɣan ad qqimen deg ubraḥ n uɣerbaz.
Yella wanda ara tesriffeg tsekkurt, ad tebnu lɛecc-is anda-nniḍen ? I yenna Yidir i Ṭawes.
Ṭawes tecmumeḥ-d akken i ilaq mi d-tesla i wawal « tasekkurt ».
Buh ! Buh ! Tisekrin deg tmurt-nneɣ, seg wassen ara d-kkrent d nutenti zgant deg yiwen n lɛecc, deg-s i sɛeddayent tudert-nsent akken ma tella, deg-s ara asent-cudden aɣesmar.
Ḥanun zanun, ur beṭṭunt ɣef lkanun.
Wanag iḥiqel i k-yecban, iban anda ara yerr.
Deg tesnawit n Bgayet ara d-yeggri, din ara ikemmel tizrawin-is. I as-terra Ṭawes.
Wi ara am-yeḥkun a Ṭawes.
Tikwal qqareɣ-as acimi ur iyi-d-yefki ara Rebbi d taqcict, ad iyi-d-yernu kan cwiṭ n thuski am kemm a Ṭawes, akken ad afeɣ win iwimi ara ɛeǧbeɣ, ad iyi-yaɣ, ur ttɣimiɣ ara deg uxxam n baba ad bureɣ, ad xeddmeɣ ɣef tlawin n watmaten-iw.
Iɣeblan i d-yerzan ɣur-i, talfi ur ten-id-ttmmagareɣ ara, ad iliɣ kan am kemm ɣas ma ula d kemm tettwaḥeqreḍ.
Igmaḍ-inu iɣurbizen igerrzen ǧǧan-iyi ad ɛeddiɣ ɣer tesnawit, maca ur zmireɣ ara ad ɣreɣ din imi baba, ɣas d axeddam n ɛam tnac, ur yessaweḍ ara ad iqabel amesruf i d-tessutur tudert deg tesnawit n Bgayet.
Iceṭṭiḍen-nni i ilaqen akken ad ten-yawi yiwen yid-s, ama n tmelsiwt, ama n tduli, ur yufi ara baba amek ara iyi-ten-id-yaɣ.
Ala, xemmemeɣ-as amek ara as-kkeɣ i wugur-a i d-ibedden sdat-i.
Ṭawes iban-as-d anda ara terr.
Ɣur-s yiwet n tannant n mraw d sin n wayyuren akken ad d-teffeɣ d taselmadt n uɣerbaz amezwaru.
D imalas wis sin n wayyur n cṭember i d anekcum anmetti.
Tuget deg-sen deg tesnawit n Yiḥemmadiyen n Bgayet ara sɛeddin azal n kraḍ n yiseggasen.
Asileɣ-ines ad d-yili deg yiwen n uɣerbaz yettwasmuzzgen i waya deg temdint n Bgayet.
Yidir yebqa sslam i yimeddukal-is akken ma llan mi yekker ad iruḥ ad iɣer deg Bumerdas deg usudu aɣelnaw n tmerɣa akked tekrura i d-isuffuɣen imsatwilen iminag deg waṭas n tmezzuggin.
Win ara t-isaɛfen ukkuẓ n yiseggasen akka d tasawent d ameddakel-is Sliman.
Sliman, deg tibeddi yettban-d iɛedda cwiṭ nnig n umeddakel-is n dima Yidir.
Tafekka-s telha kan i win akka yellan d nned-is
Udem-is d aglayan, aksum-is d aras ladɣa deg unebdu mi ara t-yeqqed i yiṭij ma yufa-t-id lḥal ixeddem berra.
Allen-is timmeqranin d tiwinaɣin, iteqqen-asent yiwet n tyuga n tsekkadin acku mebɛid yenqes yiẓri-s maca s lqerb yettwali akken i ilaq.
Anzaren imecṭaḥ d uqyisen ma deg tamart-is tura kan i t-id-bdan kra n wanẓaden iwraɣen.
Sliman d mmi-s n Dda Remṭan, ameksa n taddart n Tewrirt.
D netta seg zik i isuffuɣen ajemmaɛ n tɣeṭṭen n taddart ɣer lexla ad ikes.
Axxam anda yezdeɣ yezga-d cwiṭ nnig n tejmaɛt.
Tawacult-is mačči d tin yesɛan, d taẓawalit am tin n umeddakel-is Yidir, ɣef waya ur ruḥen ara ɣer tesnawit ad kemmlen tizrawin-nsen, ɣef waya i d-myezgen, aṭas n tlufa i ten-isemlalen.
Yidir i t-iceɣben d kraḍet n temsal yerna akken i ilaq.
Tamezwarut d tizrawin-is, tuwi-d fell-as ad d-yawi iman-is deg-sent ma ulac ad t-id-sṭixren ma yezgel kra n yikayaden ur ten-id-yuwi ara.
Cwiṭ n uzaylal ur ilaq ara ad iɛeddi fell-as.
Tis snat d tira taseklant s teqbaylit, ama d tamedyezt ama d iḍrisen iɣezzfanen am tullisin, ama d timucuha.
Aya izdeɣ deg-s seg zik, ur yezmir ara ad yerwel fell-as.
Dayen ikcem-as iɣsan am yir aṭtan-nni ur nḥellu.
Tis kraḍet d turart n ddabax n uḍar.
Imeddukal-is n turart n ddabax fkan-as isem n Ayala.
Mi yessen ad yurar akken i ilaq ddabax yerna yeǧǧa acebbub-is ɣezzif, ssemman-as ɣer umurar-a n tmurt n Arjuntin.
Ass-nni amezwaru mi uwḍen netta d Sliman ɣer temdint n Bumerdas anda yella usudu anda ara ɣren, ṭṭfen yiwet texxamt deg sḍis yid-sen d inelmaden.
Deg-s llan sḍis n srirat, sḍis n tgidiwin, sḍis n yisɣimen akked sḍis n texzanin anda ara srusun iselsa-nsen d tɣawsiwin-nniḍen.
Tagemgimt n tnezzayt, imekli d imensi ttilin-d deg yiwen usečču yebḍan ɣef waṭas n tzeɣwa timeqqranin.
Tizeɣwa n tɣuri akked tnuram zgant-d deg yiwen n uzaduɣ aɣezzfan n ukkuẓ n wannagen iqublen ilel, llan diɣen kraḍ n yizaduɣen derren wa deffir wayeḍ.
Deg tama ufella, bedden mraw d yiwen n yizaduɣen n ukkuẓ n wannagen, rran-ten d isegnen.
Gar yizaduɣen n tedbelt n uɣerbaz d wid n tɣuri yella yiwen ubeṭṭeḥṭah wessiɛen.
Deg tama n umalu deffir n yizaduɣen-a d anrar n turart n ddabax n uḍar i yellan din.
Ɣef tama n usammer iweɛɛan ilel tbedd din yiwet n tzeqqa n yihanayen.
Tameddit, Yidir d Sliman mi d-ffɣen ad issinen adgen n uɣerbaz, ɛeddan-d ɣef ubeṭṭaḥṭaḥ-nni ameqqran.
Ufan-d kra n yinelmaden bedden din ttmeslayen s teqbaylit.
Rnan kan cwiṭ, tusa-d ɣur-sen yiwet n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen, yiwen deg-sen irfed-d ddabax n uḍar deg yifassen-is.
Iɛeggalen-is necden-d wid i d-ufan din ad uraren yid-sen yiwet n temlilit n ddabax n uḍar.
Nnan-asen-d s taɛrabt taɣerfant i ttmeslayen deg usammer n tmurt, Tbessa neɣ Ssuqhras, a Leqbayel ma tebɣam ad turaren mgal tarbaɛt-nneɣ yiwet n temlilit n ddabax n uḍar.
Rran-asen s ih.
Yidir deg tiddi ur meqqer ara, nezmer ad d-nini wezzil, yettban-d ulac ɣur-s aṭas n tezmert.
Tenna-as-d terbaɛt-nni n Lebayel, kečč ur tetturareḍ ara, amzun teḥqer-it.
Iɛerbawalen deg tẓa yid-sen, ma d Leqbayel deg ṭam mebla Yidir.
Akka, terra-ten tmara ad sekkin yidir deg taggayt-nsen ad yurar yid-sen.
Akken i d-teḍra.
Timlilit tekfa s ugmuḍ n mraw d yiwen ɣer sin (11 ɣer 2) i lfayda n Leqbayel.
Iswiyen-nni i ḥdac ma mačči d yidir i ten-yeswan d netta i yefkan ddabax i sliman iger sin ɣer kraḍ n yiswiyen.
Seg wass-nni, tarbaɛt-nni n Leqbayel tbeddel rray ɣef yidir, ulac timlilit ideg ur yettekki ara deg-s imi stɛerfen akken ma llan d netta i d alɣuɣ.
Tizrawin d tid yewɛren nezzeh acku ma yella tɣefleḍ kan cwiṭ ad tt-id-tawiḍ berra.
Ikayaden ttilin-d taggara n yal amesḍis.
Ma ur ten-id-tuwiḍ ara akken ma llan ad tuɣaleḍ s axxam-nwen.
Azgen n yinelmaden i d-yeṭṭixiren deg umesḍis amezwaru.
Mi ara ttqessiren gar-asen, win i cukken ur d-yettawi ara ikayaden-is yeqqar ur ḥsiɣ ara ad iyi-tezgel tmacint n furar.
Sliman d Yidir terra-ten tmara ad ẓẓewren deg tezrawin-nsen ma bɣan ad refden tiwaculin-nsen, ad tent-id-suffɣen seg lḥif ideg llant.
Ɣef waya cwiṭ n ustehzi ur tesɛin, zgan ttemɛawanen gar-asen.
Yidir yeḍfer tamuzzegt n tekrura ma d Sliman d tamikanit.
Sliman yettwawwet ɣef tusnakt, anda tella temsizzelt fell-asent ad yaweḍ ama deg usudu anda yeqqar ama anda-nniḍen.
Xeṭṭa xeṭṭa i as-yettensar warraz amezwaru.
Ma d Yidir seg zik tjeggeḥ-it tmedyezt.
Tal tikkelt ara ifakk tira n yiwen n usefru, ma deg texxamt i yella ad as-yini i Sliman : « Sel-d kan i uneggaru-agi inu".
Yegdel ukeččum !
Wissen ma tessneḍ Dda Crif n At Ḥemmu ?
Anwa deg leɛnaya-k ur nessin ara argaz am winna ?
Tanemmirt a Dda Crif, lehdur-ik ẓidit am tamemt.
Kra kkan yimuras imeqqrenen n unebdu, imeddukal-nneɣ iwimi teqɛed twenza ur tcennef ara am tayla-nneɣ, sɛeddan-ten deg Tici neɣ deg Uwqas.
Nekkni mi ara nuɣal s aɣerbaz, ussan imezwura uqbel ad d-yeɣli yixeddim s waṭas fell-aneɣ, ad nfares tagnit, ad neccucef alma ufan-aɣ-d imi deg Bumerdas taftist a-tt-ah ɣef yiri-nneɣ kan.
Ih a Yidir, ad nezwi leɛtab n uɛebbi n uẓru kra yekka unebdu.
Ula d tanezzayt uqbel ad nsew lqahwa, ad d-nekk s teftist.
Nettaf aman n yilel rsen, ad as-tiniḍ d tamda n zzit.
Meḥsub ulac akk medden imir-nni, ala yiwet n tselmadt tarusit iwimi ssawalen Kuprina, deg leɛmer tɛedda sa tmerwin n yiseggasen, i nettaf din.
Am nekkni, tḥemmel ula d nettat ad teccucef tanezzayt uqbel ad truḥ ad tesɣer.
Aseggas aɣurbiz yebda.
D wa i d wis ukkuẓ, d wa i d aneggaru.
Am leɛwayed yal amesḍis yettfakka s yikayaden.
Maca deg umesḍis wis sin, tuwi-d ɣef yinelmaden ad d-heyyin yiwen n ukatay ɣef kra n usentel ara fernen.
Ad ten-tazen tedbelt n uɣerbaz-nsen ɣer kra n lluzin, ad gen din yiwet n tannant n tsemrest ara yekken azal n wayyur d uzgen.
D yiwet n tegnit ara ten-yeǧǧen ad d-gemren isalan yerzan asentel-nsen.
Yal wa wissen anta tama n tamurt ara t-yeččen.
Yezmer lḥal deg tin n umalu am temdint n Wihran neɣ deg tin n usammer am Ɛenaba d Qsemṭina neɣ deg tneẓruft maḍi am Ḥasi Mesɛud.
Ma yella ur ɣfilen ara ɣef tezrawin-nsen ula d ayen yerzan tamagit d yidles nsen, ur ten-hmilen ara yinelmaden Iqbayliyen.
Tal taggara n yimalas, ttemlilin-d seg snat tmerwin ɣer kraḍet tmerwiyin yid-sen deg yiwet n texxamt n walbaɛḍ deg-sen.
Mi d-uɣalen seg usečču anda d-ččan imensi-nsen, ttarran srid ɣer texxamt-nni.
Bab n wadeg ad d-iheyyi lqahwa neɣ ttay, inebgawen-is ad qqimen ɣef tesɣimin i d-uwin yid-sen neɣ ɣef yiri n srir.
Asentel i ten-iceɣben akken ma llan d tamsalt n tmaziɣt neɣ n teqbaylit.
Yal iḍ yiwen yettheyyi-d kra n usentel ara d-yefk d asarag i yimeddukal-is.
Ara d-iḍefren d askasi.
Timlilit tadelsant yettakk-itt akkin uzgen n yiḍ.
Sliman mi d-tezzi nnuba-s d netta ara d-yefken asarag, kra yekka yimalas d netta d taɣuri n kra n udlis neɣ n tesɣunt i d-yettawin awal ɣef tezɣent n 1949 anda tamurt-nneɣ tuɣ abri ur nsuffuɣ, abrid ireglen imi mačči d abrid n tidet, d win n tikerkas.
Tamurt d tamaziɣt seg uẓar almi d taqacuct, nutni rran-tt d taɛrabt.
Deg wakken uḍnen tiɛerbubt, uɣalen-as d aklan ur ukin.
Ddreɣlen ɣef lasel-nsen imi ur qbilen ara ula d assemmi n tmurt « Zzayer tazzayrit ».
Ala, ilaq ara d-iḍefren d arbib-nni n tmara : Zzayer taɛrabt.
Ssusef s igenni, ad d-uɣalent s udem-ik.
Ixuss kan uẓru iɣef neqcen fell-as yimarrawen-nneɣ isekkilen n tifinaɣ neɣ akal n tmurt n Tmazɣa ad d-berrḥen s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-nsen : « Nekkni d Imaziɣen mačči d Aɛraben ! »
Asarag i d-yefka sliman s wazal-is, askasi i d-iḍefren igerrez diɣen.
D yiwen n usebter n umezruy-nneɣ yettwadergen metɛemda ɣef wamayendin n yimdanen imi urǧin slemden-t deg uɣerbaz n tmurt-nneɣ.
Mačči yiwet neɣ snat n tikal i as-d-yebded win akken i as-d-yettakken iwellihen yessakayen.
Aɛekkaz deg ufus ayeffus, iteddu yesɛukkuz yis-s.
Abrid i yuwi yeḥsa d aɣezzfan, yessa akk d uguren.
Ilaq ad yeqqim yuki ur iɣeffel ara tikkelt, ma yebɣa ad yaweḍ s iswi i d-yecreḍ seg tazwara.
Gedha ay ameddakel, tabɣest igerrzen, ẓẓwer, aweḍ s iswi, aql-aɣ yid-k i nella.
Aql-aɣ ad k-nettraju ad d-tuɣaleḍ deg telwit, ad aɣ-d-tegluḍ s yisalli yelhan, win akken i nettraju wissen acḥal aya.
Nebɣa ad tbeddel fell-aneɣ, ad d-neffeɣ seg tgennarit n tillas i yugin ad tekfu, amzun tetteddu-aɣ deg nnzaɛ, trennu deg teɣzi.
Nessaram-ak talwit ad k-tsaɛef, ad tawi yid-k asurif, d tin diɣen ara k-id-yerren s axxam-ik bxir s lexbar ara yesferḥen akk medden.
D ayen ara yesmeɣren ccan-ik d win n twacult-ik.
Ar tufat a Meqqran ! I as-nnan ɣef tikkelt.
Maca wid i d-immuger aṭas yid-sen d wid ur nebɣi ara akk ayen akka ixeddem Meqqran.
Awal i as-d-ttakken akk kif kif-it, d tanmegla n wayen i as-d-nnan yimezwura.
Wigi ula d timelsiwt-nsen temgarad ɣef tin n wid yeddan d Meqqran.
Deg ssifa ur mxalafen ara, ttemyakken anzi am watmaten maɛna tikli, tameslayt, leɛwayed i d-uwin wigi mgaradent aṭas aṭas ɣef tid n yimezwura.
D ddin i yesseddawen amdan.
Segmi ara d-ilal yiwen deg-sen d nutni dehhun-d yid-s s taččart n uqerruy-is s ddin, mačči s temsal imeɛnen am tussna, tagmat, tikli yelhan, aqader, aḥezzeb, akukru, tayri gar yimdanen, azalen yettaǧǧan amdan ad yaf iman-is…
Ihi wigi yefkan azal ameqqran i ddin d wawal-is, d acu i as-d-qqaren akka ?
Aql-aɣ yid-k ara nili, maɛna s ccerṭ, aweḍ anda i ak-d-yeɛǧeb ma d asif ur ilaq ara ad t-tzegreḍ, ad as-tɛeddiḍ akkin.
Awal n lejdud ur yelhi ara ad t-nreẓ.
Nnan-d ur ilaq ara ad nɛeddi akkin i wasif, nekkni tuwi-d fell-aneɣ ad asen-naɣ awal.
Ma ttwessin deg-neɣ akka, d nutni i iwalan d acu i yellan deffir n wasif-a.
Ala ɣef ubrid yelhan i aɣ-ttawin segmi awal-nsen iqqim ibbed ar ass-a ur yeɣli.
Kečč tekkreḍ-d ad asen-tedduḍ deg nnzeɛ, kkes aɣilif ddeɛwessu ad tt-tawiḍ ma tseɣreḍ aqerruy, nnmara ur k-teffiɣ, asif ma tzegreḍ-t.
Llan kra deg-sen ssnen-t, ssnen amek i iga, ɣas ẓran d yiwen n urgaz ma yefka awal ur t-yettruẓu, maɛna ḍemɛen ibeddel, ɣef waya ɛeyyun deg-s ttḥellilen.
Xzu cciṭan a Meqqran, uɣal-d ɣer leɛqel-ik, aql-ak teffɣeḍ i ubrid, ayen i tettedduḍ akka ad t-txedmeḍ ur ilaq ara, twalaḍ yerna tɛemdeḍ.
Nessen-ik d argaz yelhan, ma d ayen i d-tbegseḍ akka ad t-tgeḍ, diri-t.
Ur t-iqebbel la amdan la Rebbi.
Ihi bren-d s axxam-ik ad ternuḍ ayen i ak-yura uxellaq deg liser.
Wanag ma teṭṭfeḍ deg yir awal-ik, ur teḥsiḍ ara akk anda i tettedduḍ, amzun iqmec-ak Rebbi allen, yezmer ur d-tettuɣaleḍ ara akk.
Nekkni d aḥmal i k-nḥemmel, ur ak-nebɣi ara taxettart.
Qqimet kan ay atmaten-iw n tmara, nekk walaɣ d acu ara xedmeɣ.
Kunwi ẓẓut iman-nwen deg texmirt-nni n usɣan.
Aḍar i d-tekksem wayeḍ ad yewḥel alamma d taggara n ddunit.
Tugim ad d-teldim allen-nwen ad twalim tidet i wen-fren wid akken i terram ttrebbiben fell-awen yerna tessusmem, awal ur ken-id-yettali.
Tebɣam ad teqqimem akka, d aklan i lebda.
Ma d nekk ǧǧet-iyi nekk d rray-iw, yid-s ara tt-fruɣ, kunwi ibɛed-iken waluf.
Akka i asen-yerra ddaw n tuɣmest.
Ad d-yemmekti kan ageɛmir-nni i as-d-ittebdaden yal iḍ deg tirga, ad yettu akk ayen-nniḍen ala ayen iɣef t-id-iwelleh iɣef yecfa, ur yezmir ad t-yettu.
Leɛhed fkiɣ-t d yiman-iw, ad awḍeɣ anda i yessaweḍ uḍar.
Tuɣalin akk ɣer deffir ulac.
Tikkelt-a ad d-frunt temsal yeqqimen mebla tifrat ar ass-a.
Ma bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ anda i tedduɣ tuwi fell-i ad issineɣ ansa i d-kkiɣ.
Anaddal-nni n uneggez ɣef teɣzi, ma yebɣa ad yenṭeg mebɛid, ṭam neɣ tẓa n lmitrat akkin, tuwi-d fella-as ad iwesseɛ ɣer deffir s ukuẓẓet n tmerwin ar semmuset n tmerwin n lmitrat.
Yeẓra ayen i t-yettrajun mačči d ayen isehlen.
Yeẓra abrid ara yawi yundi merra, yeččur d tixeftin ara d-iserfen fell-as ma yeɣfel kan cwiṭ.
d yiwen n ubrid yessan akk d agris yesfucculen ula d ulawen.
Anida-ten?
D yiwen n ubrid yessan akk d agris yesfucculen ula d ulawen.
Maca lebɣi-s d ameqqran, ur yelli mecṭuḥ.
Tikti-a, d ayen i t-iceɣben seg wasmi i d-yekker.
Wagi ara yezger akka, d asif-nni n lemḥan.
Asif-a, yezga-d d wis sebɛa.
Akken i as-qqaren ulac kra n wasif-nniḍen deffir n wasif-a wis sebɛa.
Netta ar tura ur yefhim tigert, ayɣer akka, ulac akkin isaffen-nniḍen.
D ayen i issewhamen.
Yerna ula deg uɣerbaz, mi ara d-taweḍ tanga n umezruy d trakalt, d awal-nni kan iwimi isel ɣer yiselmaden-is, i d-yettuɣalen.
Ddunit ulac-itt akkin i wasif-a, syin i d-tuɣal, ur tufiḍ d acu yellan deffir-s, ula d amezruy-is akken, leḥsab-is syin ara t-id-nebdu.
Ulayɣer yiwen ad yesteqsay, akka i tella temsalt u frant…
Iḥulfan, yal yiwen amek-it, mmɣen-d fell-as ɣef tikkelt ad t-zedɣen.
Iḥulfa s lferḥ, s zzɛaf, s utewhem, s tewnafit, aglim-is akk yezɣeb.
Maca afray n tumert yugar-iten akken ma llan imi yeṭṭerḍeq-d s yiwet n teḍsa urǧin i tt-id-yeḍsi am wass-nni.
Ass-agi i d ass-is.
Kullec ad d-yedher, ad t-iwali s wallen-is.
Ad iẓer d acu i yellan akka deffir n wasif-agi wis sebɛa.
Imi yessen akka cwiṭ n tusnak, yenna deffir n wasif wis sebɛa ahat ad yili wasisf wis setta, deffir n wasif wis setta, ad yili wasif wis xemsa, deffir wasif wis xemsa ad yili wasif wis rebɛa atg…
Yekcem s aman, ur yecfi ara akk amek i ten-yufa, d isemmaden neɣ muẓeɣlen neɣ lhan kan deg wakken tedubbez merra tfekka-s, ur yettḥulfu s kra.
Yebda deg-sen aɛummu.
Yessen seg zik ad yeccucef, yelmed seg temẓi-s aɛummu deg tmedwin n wasif Asemmam lawan n unebdu.
Yettɛummu, yettɛummu, mazal ur yuwid ɣer tlemmast almi i iwala aman bdan ttluɣun.
Di tazwara d izeddganen, ttirriqen am lemri.
Skudmal yettẓiẓi ɣer sdat, skudmal ttɛiwiden tiɣmi, ttibriken.
Yerna cwiṭ, yexleɛ mačči d kra.
D acu akka i t-isxelɛen ?
D times i yuɣen deg waman yuɣalen amzun d tumas, aḥǧaǧu-s yuweḍ s igenni.
Times mačči iman-is i tekker.
Iwala kra n yimexluqen, ur banen d imadanen, ur banen d iɣersiwen.
Ahat d wigi iwimi qqaren imejɛuren, ifassen-nsen yeččuren d anẓaden, s yiḍudan sut waccaren iɣezzfanen, ṭṭfen isufa, yis-sen ssaɣayen times-nni ɣef waman n wasif.
Amzun din i d-mɣin, ɣur-sen ala yiwen n ccɣel, d aya kan : Ur ilaq ara yiwen iteddun ɣef sin n yiḍarren ad yezger asif-a.
Mačči d ayagi kan i yesbedden ccɛer n ucebbub-is d asawen am tsegnatin deg wakken yezɣeb imi yugad.
D acu akka diɣen i iwala nnig n wayen i iwala yagi ?
Iwala mačči yiwen, mačči sin, amayendin n lmeyytin i d-yersen d tirac, ttifriren-d ɣef waman n wasif-nni wis sebɛa.
Kra deg-sen iɛqel-iten, seg wasmi i d-ffɣen seg yixxamen-nsen ur d-uɣalen, yessen d acu i d axemmem-nsen.
Iḥulfa yeqreb ɣur-sen nezzeh, akken akk i sɛan yiwet n tikti ɣef yiman-nsen, ɣef tmurt, ɣef yiḍelli-s, ɣef wass-as, ɣef uzekka-s…
Wigi d tirni, ɛerḍen akk am netta ad zegren i wasif-a wis sebɛa, maɛna ur ssawḍen ara, ur ten-ǧǧin ara wid i ten-yenɣan mebla aḥezzeb.
Nɣan-ten, ayɣer ?
Acu n ucernan akka i xedmen yestahlen tukksa n yiziɣer-nsen ?
Tella kan yiwet n tmentilt i ten-yessawḍen ɣer tmettant.
D lebɣi-nni ameqqran i ten-yettseggiren ad sddermen aɣrab-a i d-bnan ɣef rrif wis sin n wasif wis sebɛa.
Bɣan akk ad t-kksen akkin akken ad yiɣzif , ad yihriw yigli.
Ad calint wallent alma d anda i bɣant.
Ad yiwsiɛ lxaṭer n umdan, ad tban tidet sburent tkerkas.
Tamurt ad tesnuffes, ad taf iman-is, ad myeɛqalen warraw-is, ala azekka-s ara yelhun.
Maɛna ugin akk anect-a…
Dɣa neqqen kra n win ur neddin ara yid-sen deg temsalt-a n tesnakta.
Yeɣli wazal-iw.
Wissen amek i d-yeslek iman-is umeɣbun n Rebbi.
Irwel-d ɣef uxessar i d-yeḍran, i d-iḍerrun deg wasif wis sebɛa.
Wissen acḥal yeqqim netta yettazzal ɛerbabuz am wakken i t-id-tesɛa yemma-s fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem, ala takiluḍt-is i t-yesren.
Ur yuki ara akk s leɛra n tfekka-s.
Tarewla tessemnaɛ baba-is.
Ur yeḥbis deg tazzla almi qrib ad ifelleq wul-is.
Yengef almi kan dayen.
Mi yuweḍ ɣer ddaw n yiwet n tzemmurt tameqqrant, ilexxez iman-is ɣef tmurt, amzun d alebɛad i ideggren kra n tcekkart n yizegza.
Isenned ɣef tefga n useklu-nni.
Yesnuffus irennu ma d tidi tettcercur ɣef wudem-is.
Wissen acḥal n wakud i yesgunfa din.
Mi iḥulfa yekkes-as ɛeyyu yerna yuɣal-d ɣer yiman-is, yuɣal yebra-as lxuf-nni i t-irekben deg wasif-nni, yekker ɣef yiman-is yuwi abrid n tuɣalin s axxam-is.
Asmi i ibedd ɣef umnar n tewwurt n uxxam-is, d mmi-s Meẓẓyan i as d-yeldin tawwurt.
Yemmeɣ fell-as, yessuden-is sya u sya.
Yefreḥ nezzeh mi d-yuɣal baba-s s axxam ɣef yiḍarren-is ɣas ma yettban-d yeɛya mi i t-yeṭall s udem-is werraɣen cwiṭ yerna idel-d iman-is ala s yiwen n ubeḥnuq umsix i yufa deg ubrid.
Ansuf yis-k a baba, lɛeslama-k s axxam ! I as-yenna Meẓẓyan.
Ad ak-isellem Rebbi a mmi ! I as-yerra Meqqran.
Ad neḥmed Rebbi ad t-ncekker mi d-tuɣaleḍ s tezmert-ik.
Tanemmirt a mmi. Akken i yella lḥal a mmi, ad t-neḥmed wissen acḥal d abrid imi seg tmettant i d-uɣaleɣ.
Uqbel ad isres iman-is ɣef ulemsir, iruḥ ɣer texxamt-is yelsa-d iceṭṭiḍen izeddganen.
Yettraju diɣen tamettuṭ-is, yemma-s n Meẓẓyan ad d-tedlu fell-as maɛna ulac-itt.
Ma d yemma i tettrajuḍ akka, ulac-itt.
Tanezzayt-a i terzef s axxam n xwali.
Tameddit-a, send aɣelluy n yiṭij ad d-tebren.
Anef-as a mmi mi d-tuweḍ tuweḍ-d, d yid-k i bɣiɣ ad hedreɣ cwiṭ ɣef wayen i d-ddreɣ ussan-a ineggura.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-k a baba, fehmeɣ iman-iw kan, ayen d-tesɛeddaḍ mačči d tiqecmeɛt.
Sel-iyi-id ad ak-d-alseɣ akka ayen d-sɛeddaɣ segmi i iyi-tefka tewwurt n uxxam almi i d-uɣaleɣ ɣur-s ɣef yiḍarren-iw yerna s leɛqel-iw.
Yebda la as-d-yettales tadyant-is seg tazwara-s almi d taggara-s, acemma deg-s ur t-yettu.
Yedla akk ɣef wayen yesɛedda d wayen yeḍran yid-s.
Yemla-ten-id akken i mseḍfaren, wa deffir wa, mebla ma yeɛreq ula d tikkelt.
Meẓẓyan amzun yesseblaɛ yal awal i d-iteffɣen seg yimi n baba-s.
Yal tanfalit ara isel ini yessekles-itt deg uqerruy-is.
Yettnadi ad yecfu akk ɣef wayen ara as-d-yini baba-s.
Meẓẓyan d yiwen n unelmad n tesnawit.
Mezyane était lycéen.
Ɣur-s mraw d ṭam n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
D tasekla i yeqqar deg uɣerbaz-is, ama s ttutlayt taɛrabt, ama s tin n tefransist.
Ma d taqbaylit yettwagedlen deg uɣerbaz n tmurt-is, yeqqar-itt kan iman-is s tuffra.
D yiwen n unelmad iẓewwren nezzeh yerna yuki am baba-s.
Taluft n yidles amaziɣ tecɣeb-it seg wasmi yuweḍ leɛmer s way-s yebda iferreẓ timsal.
D anect-a akk i t-iseggren s anrar n tmedyezt.
Tal tikkelt ara t-yeqreḥ kra, ladɣa mi akka ttɣullun taqbaylit-is, ad d-yerfed imru ini yessers akk iḥulfan-is ɣef usebter amellal n walug-is.
Akka i tḍerru yid-s almi yeččur yiwen n uzmam s yisefra-ines.
Yekker yenna i mmi-s i as-d-yefkan tameẓẓuɣt akken i iwata: « Tesliḍ a mmi, nekk xedmeɣ ayen i wimi zemreɣ, lebɣi-w ur t-uwiḍeɣ, yerna tazmert tettaǧǧa-iyi yal ass yettɛeddayen".
Tuɣdaṭ, tura teggra-d gar yiffasen-nwen kunwi s yimeẓẓyanen.
Abrid ilaq ad tawḍem s ixef-is.
Ma tedduklem, yiwen ur wen-izemmer.
Times ad tt-teskuffren, ad tnes iman-is.
Asif-nni n tmara ad t-tzegrem, kkset aɣilif, ad twalim d acu yellan akkin i ugemmaḍ.
Imir-nni ad d-uɣalent temsal akken i llant zik n zik.
Meẓẓyan, yiwen n wawal ur as-yensir.
Yecfa akk ɣef wayen i as-d-yeḥka baba-s.
Dɣa din din iɛedda ɣer texxamt-is, yerfed-d imru yebda yettaru ɣef walug-is asefru ara d-yalsen i wayen iga baba-s seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
I umdan n menwala tira n usefru am wa ara yilin d iken i uḍris i as-d-yules baba-s tmenna mačči d yiwet n temsalt isehlen.
I wakken ad tessiwḍeḍ ad taruḍ aḍris am wa yerna s talɣa n usefru, ilaq ad yili ɣur-k kra n yiseggasen n tirmit deg tmedyezt.
Meẓẓyan yettakk taflest tameqqrant i yiman-is ɣef waya ur ikukra ara amahil am wa.
Ad yili d yiwen n usefru ara yesɛun sebɛa n tseddarin am uzwel-ines Asif wis sebɛa, yal taseddart ad yili ɣur-s setta n yifyar.
Yebḍa awal-nni n baba-s ɣef sebɛa n yimuren, yal amur yerra-t d taseddart.
Segmi yebda tira n usefru-s ur yeḥbis ula d tikkelt almi i t-ifukk.
Mi ara t-tecɣeb kra n taluft, iɛedda ad tt-yaru d asefru, ur yettnekkar ara seg wadeg anda yeqqim alamma ifukk-itt.
Daɣ netta akka i teḍra yid-s mi yebges ɣer tira n usefru Asif wis sebɛa.
Sin ternuḍ sin, ɣur-k ukkuẓ.
Sliman yerfed tanila tanemgalt imi netta yerra ɣer usammer n tmurt, ɣer temdint n Ɛennaba.
Mi ara d-awin igerdasen-nsen ad bdun tudert turmidt ad uɣalen d iɣella deg tkebbanit anda ara xedmen.
Mi d-ffɣen seg usečču ameqqran anda i d-ččan imensi, Yidir d Sliman rran srid ɣer wadik ad d-swen leqhawi.
Ad d-awin awal ɣef wayen i ten-yerzan.
Imalas yezrin i d-uɣalen seg wadeg anda i gan tannant-nsen.
Leqḍen-d ddeqs n yisalan yesɛan azal ɣef yisental i fernen.
Yis-sen akka tura zemren ad d-heyyin ikatayen-nsen.
Tira n wissen n wacḥal d asebtar teggen-tt s ufus.
Amek ihi a Sliman ! Amek i tufiḍ tamdint n Ɛennaba ?
D acu ara ak-iniɣ ?
Twalaḍ mačči d asikel i aɣ-yuwin ama ɣer Ɛennaba, ama ahat ula kečč ɣer Wihran.
Greɣ kan yiwet n tamawt, imi qerben ɣer tmurt n Tunes, aɣdebbu-nsen d win n Yitunsiyen mi ara ttmeslayen.
D tidet, neggar aẓeṭṭa gar texxamt n usensu d lluzin.
Win yeksa uɣilif, urǧin yufa iman-is.
Kif kif ula d Iwehraniyen ttutlayen am Yimerukiyen maɛna d imdanen yelhan.
Ad nesber kan kra n wussan ad nekkes akkin aɣilif-a ɣef tikkelt imir-nni ad nethenni.
Amarezg-ik a Sliman, kečč ad tekkseḍ aɣilif n tezrawin akk d wayen i iyi-ittrajun.
Akken i yella lḥal a Yidir.
Nekk d iẓri i iyi-tt-yekksen, wanag ad dduɣ yid-k, ad nezwi akken taɛkemt n 2 n yiseggasen n lxedma baṭel.
Ad ak-d-yefk Rebbi aṭas n ssber.
Am wass-a ad d-nemlil deg tejmaɛt n Tewrirt, ad iyi-d-teḥkuḍ ayen akk tesɛeddaḍ deg 24 n wayyuren.
Ad d-yefk Rebbi lehna a Sliman.
Almend n usmihel, nekk ass n waram i d-iteddun ara sɛeddiɣ ma d kečč azekka-nni n wahad.
Akka i yella lḥal a Yidir.
Afud igerrzen d waṭas n tebɣest.
Ula d kečč, ig Rebbi tuwḍeḍ i tebɣiḍ.
Teɣli-d yiwet n tsusmi anect-ila-tt, izi ma iɛedda-d ad as-tesleḍ.
Yal yiwen d acu i d-immekta, d ayen urǧin ad yettu mi yesla i wawal n lɛesker.
Nna Mennun yugaren wiyiḍ deg leɛmer, ɛeddan-d deg uqerruy-is sin n ttradat, ttrad amaḍlan wis sin yeččan argaz-is, yeǧǧa-tt-id iman-is d ttrad n tesllullit taɣelnawt n Zzayer.
Cabḥa d Wakli, d aneggaru-a i d-mmektan.
D lwaǧeb fell-ak a mmi ad tesɛeddiḍ lɛesker.
Ilaq tamurt ad tesɛu iserdasen iẓẓewren ara tt-iḥudden ma yella kra n ucengu i tt-iqesden.
D tabɣest kan i d-yexdem i mmi-s, wanag ur yebɣi ara akk Yidir-is ad tt-iwwet alma d lqern n ddunit akken ad yuɣal d aserdas.
Yeɛya seg yiserdasen n Fransa, yeɛya seg rrsas d tmenɣiwt n yilmeẓyen Izzayriyen.
Ma d Cabḥa, tasa n tyemmat ur tt-teǧǧi ara akk ad teṭṭef imeṭṭawen-is.
Wiyiḍ sebren ɣas ma uɣen tiyita ɣer daxel, nettat ur tezmir ara.
Tenna : « Acimi akka, ala wagi kan i sɛiɣ, d netta tura i d amasay n uxxam, baba-s meqqer.
Sber a yemma, sin n yiseggasen ad xedmen kanakka ad ɛeddin. I as-yerra Yidir
Ruḥ a mmi, ig Rebbi ansa i tɛeddaḍ d talwit, ad k-id-yerr Rebbi s tezmert-ik s axxam.
Ig Rebbi ayen teqqimeḍ din deg Tinduf, d tudert n yifeṭṭiwej, ad yaɣ din, ad ines din.
Leɛnaya n yiɛessasen d yibaḍniyen.
Bɣiɣ diɣen ad awen-d-rnuɣ yiwet-nniḍen.
Mi ɛeddaɣ ɣer Tzerrajt walaɣ-d Ṭawes.
Nniɣ-as uqbel ad semdeɣ sḍis n wayyuren deg lɛesker, imir-nni ara d-awiɣ atrug-iw amezwaru, ad iyi-d-serrḥen i kra n wussan, ad n-asen yimawlan-iw s axxam-nwen akken ad kem-iyi-d-xeḍben.
S lehna-k a mmi.
Ig Rebbi trebḥeḍ fell-as, ad ak-tili d tin ara ak-ixedmen axxam imeɛnen, axxam ara d-yeččaren d arrac.
Kkes aɣilif a Yidir a mmi, err iman-ik am wakken neqḍa-ak-d taɣawsa-k.
Tanemmirt-nwen. Nezzeh i ttekleɣ fell-awen.
Imi yemla ayen yeffer i wid iḥemmel, Ṭawes d yimawlan-is, iḥulfa i yiman-is fessus am tmeččimt n taduṭ.
Tura yezmer ad isahel deg lehna, ad d-yexdem ayen d-xeddmen akk yirgazen.
Mi d-yeṭṭef lkaɣeḍ n tergin, taseɣra, ɛejlen ad t-awin, ad as-selsen lebsa n uɛsekri.
Ɣer yiwet n lkazirna yellan deg teɣremt n Tinduf i d-yezgan deg tneẓruft, deg unẓul n tmurt tama n umalu.
Din ara yeg tawala n tannant taɛsekrit n umeẓlu-ines aɣelnaw ara yekken snat tmerwin d ukkuẓ n wayyuren.
Seg wass-nni i d-yeṭṭef lkaɣeḍ amcum, d yaya-s ladɣa yemma-s ur thennant.
Nna Mennun tedder tallit-nni n ttrad, urǧin tettu ayen iɛeddan ɣef tsuta-ines n lbaṭel d ujujru d unɣal n yidammen n yilmeẓyen izzayriyen, d tukksa n sser ɣef tlawin i d-yeqqimen deg tudrin d tuǧǧal kanakken meẓẓiyit.
Tekreh ad tsel i tiyita n lwarud ula deg tmeɣriwin.
Teḥsa s Yidir d acu i t-yettrajun, ternuḍ-as abɛad n lḥal.
Ur yeqbil ara akk leɛqel-is ad yebɛed mmi-s fell-as.
Imi yella yeqqar deg Bumerdes ur neggug ara aṭas ɣef Tzerrajt, ɣas yeqqim-n din ddaw n wayyur, yemma-s yeḥsab-as Rebbi tettɣimi ur t-tettwali ara azal n lqern.
Tɣucc ad iggug fell-as.
Neqqar argaz d argaz, teqqur tasa-s.
Akka i d-yettban wudem n wakli, baba-s n Yidir.
S ufella yecbeḥ yerqem, yeḍsa, daxel, wi ak-yeḥkun.
Yezmer lḥal tasa-s telɣuɣi ugar n tin n tmeṭṭut-is, maɛna tidet yessen ad tt-yeffer.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i t-yuɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-as ad yili d amedya n tebɣest d ssber, mačči d netta ara d-yezwiren ɣer ulummu.
D netta i d argaz, d netta i d aqerruy n uxxam, d netta ara isebren yemma-s d tmeṭṭut-is
Seg Tzerrajt yerkeb yiwen n uzrug i d-yekkan seg Bgayet, yuwi-t almi d taɣsert n Xerruba i d-yezgan deg tmanaɣt Zzayer.
Din i yeṭṭef azrug-nniḍen ara t-yessiwḍen alma d tamdint n Tinduf.
Lkazirna anda i yerra tezga-d cwiṭ berra i teɣremt, tettwafreg akken ma tella s yiwen n ssur aɛlayan.
Ixxamen-is ma mačči s uẓru i bnan, bnan s ṭṭub.
Axxam yebnan s warrum-a yettaṭṭaf tasmuḍi ladɣa deg tsemhuyt n unebdu bu uzɣal ameqqran.
Ukkuẓ n yiɣraben i d-yezzin i yixxamen n lkazirna.
Yal aɣrab deg tlemmast-is teldi yiwet n tewwurt.
Yiwen deg-sen, win n sdat, ɣur-s tawwurt meqqert ɣef tiyaḍ, syin i tekken yiserdasen, keččmen, teffɣen.
D lkazirna i d-teǧǧa Fransa, d tin i d-yeqqimen, ala anay i ibeddlen.
Mi yuweḍ Yidir ɣer din, yefka lekwaɣḍ‑is n tmagit yerna taseɣra i as-d-uznen.
Iserdasen yettmmagaren wid iwimi ssawlen, fkan-asen-d talaba taɛsekrit akken ma tella.
Yal wa mlan-as axxam d wanda ara yaf srir-is iɣef ires wussu-s akked texzant-is anda ara iger iceṭṭiḍen-is d tɣawswin-nniḍen n wuɣus.
Ussan imezwura yal yiwen yedha-d d tmussni n umkan anda yella d umdan wukud ara yedder azal n sḍis n wayyuren akka d tasawent.
Akud n userdas deg lkazirna yebḍa akken i iwata.
Tanezzayt ilaq ad d-yekker zik.
Mi fukken ad ɛeddin ɣer usečču ameqqran, d lawan n tgemgemt.
Ad fakken kan ad ffɣen anda ara bdun isluɣma iɣaranen.
D addal i tegen ladɣa tazzla ɣef uḍar akken tawtilt taɣarant-nsen ad tuɣal tentem.
Lemmden diɣen amek ara sxedmen imrigen seg tal tawsit.
Deg tedwilt n urami, Yidir yeẓẓwer nezzeh, tikwal kan i izeggel iswi i yewwet.
Sin wayyuren imenza ur ɛeddan almi kan dayen.
Kra n wayen akk i xeddmen seg tafrara n wass alma yeɣli yiṭij neɣ ugar, yusa-asen-d yewɛer mačči d kra acku ur nnumen ara leɛtab am win.
Ɛeyyu am win, yesmmekta-as-d i Yidir mi yella yettliwi abennay deg tlemmast n ssmayem netta d umeddakel Sliman i icedha aṭas.
Maca skudmal ttɛeddayen wussan d yimalasen, skudmal tifekkiwin-nsen uɣalent zemrent i kra n wayen i d-ttmmagaren deg yisluɣma iserdasiyen.
Dɣa mi ara iɛeddi lḥal cwiṭ i uɣelluy n yiṭij, leɛtab-nsen yettfakka.
Mi ččan tiremt taneggarut, yeɛni imensi, ɣellin ɣef wussu-nsen am yiqlumen deg wakken yerẓa-ten ɛeyyu.
Tikwal mi fukken iluɣma iserdasiyen, ččan-d imensi dayen, ttemlilin-d deg wadek d igrawen akken msuffaɣen ṭṭbiɛa.
Ad qqimen deg tzeqqa-nni ad tturaren takarḍa, ad ttqessiren, yal yiwen amek, alma izeggen yiḍ, imir-nni ad ruḥen ad gnen.
Yidir ur t-yečči ara aṭas lxiq imi yufa din deg lkazirna n Tinduf ddeqs n yiɛsekriwen i d-yusan seg tmurt n Leqbayel.
Yexdem-d tamussni d Maǧid, yiwen n yilemẓi n taddart n Teqerrabt i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Yiɣil Ɛli.
Yekkat snitra akken i iwata yerna s taɣect-nni tazurant i as-yefka Rebbi yessen ad yecnu.
D yiwen n unaẓur i ijeggeḥ Ccix Lḥesnawi.
Myufan netta d Yidir.
Ttezzin-asen-d yiserdasen-nniḍen d agraw, yiwen yettmal-asen-d isefra ma d wayeḍ yezzuzun-iten s tezlatin-is urɛad isekles neɣ s tid n yicennayen imeqqranen am Maɛṭub neɣ Ayt Mengellat.
D ayen i isserzafen leɛqul-nsen ɣer tudrin-nsen ibeɛden fell-asen.
Ma d amedyaz n Tewrirt ad yeqqim kan ad as-iserreḥ s yiwen n usefru i yura ussan-nni kan dinna deg lkazirna mi d-isefqed ɣur-s.
Mi ara t-id-issiwel, kra n wid yellan din smuzguten-d alma ifukk-it-id acku ḥsan asentel iɣef ara t-id-yuwi d amaynut.
Yidir terḥa tutlay-is, yelmed iman-is tira n tifinaɣ.
Mi yella yeqqar deg Bumerdes, ur d-yecɣil ara kan deg tekrura akked turart n ddabax n uḍar, yedha-d diɣen d tmaziɣt i yettwali tetteddu ɣer nnger ma yella ur tt-rfiden ara warraw-is.
Daɣ netta yennum yettaṭṭaf-d yiwet n tesɣunt « Ad nreẓ wala ad neknu » i as-d-ittasen seg tmurt n Fransa.
D agraw n Yimaziɣen, kra n yimeɣnasen yettnaḍaḥen ɣef tmaziɣt tazwara n yiseggasen n settin, i as-tt-id-ittaznen.
S yis-s i yelmad ad yaru iḍrisen-is s tira n tifinaɣ, yiwet n tira i d-snulfan yimarrawen-nneɣ seg zik n zik.
Qqaren-as Afulkay.
Yemma-s i as-yefkan isem-a ur t-tezgil ara imi yefka-t-id Ugellid ameqqran d afulkay s tidet.
Ɣur-s yiwet n ssifa, yiwen n sser iman-is.
Deg tiddi d aɛlayan am wakk atmaten-is, tafekka-s rqiqet, udem-is d aras, leḥwal n uqadum-is akken ma llan qmumsen, ur meqqrit ur meẓẓiyit, d ilemmasen kan.
Netta ur yessin ad yaru la taɛrabt la tafransist.
D yemma-s i as-isslemden tira s yisekkilen n tifinaɣ ɣef yijdi seg wasmi i yella d agrud.
Dɣa ɣef waya i d-myezgen netta d yidir ɣas ma llan kra n yisekkilen yessemras Ufulkay mgaraden ɣef wid n Yidir, maca aḥric ameqqran deg-sen kif kif-iten.
Yidir-nneɣ yessen ad yextir.
Yefka-as Rebbi yiwet n ssifa iman-is.
Teɣra, tesɣaray deg yiwen n uɣerbaz dinna kan deg Tzerrajt.
Ula d netta ur ixuss ara.
Yenna-iyi-d kkes aɣilif.
Yak nniɣ-am, aṭas n temsal i ibeddlen, zik d tura mačči kif kif.
Akka i as-nniɣ i Yidir, wissen baba-s n teqcict ma ad yeqbel ad tt-taɣeḍ.
Si Ɛellawa yemgarad d yimrabḍen-nniḍen.
yezmer lḥal yeffeɣ-iten akk.
Ula d Ṭawes ur tgi ara am teqcicin-nni n zik.
Isem-is Ṭawes, d yelli-s n Si Ɛellawa n At Ccurafa.
Si Ɛellawa d amrabeḍ, ur ḥsiɣ ara ad aɣ-tt-id-ifek.
Yak timrabḍin ur ttaɣent ara Leqbayel.
Ur tt-ssineɣ ur tt-tessineḍ imi nettat, mačči n taddart n Tewrirt.
Mačči n Tewrirt ? Anisi-tt akka ihi ?
D yiwet n teqcict n Tzerrajt.
Ihi anta akka i d-iheyya Yidir ?
Ad tafeḍ ssneɣ-tt.
Ad tafeḍ tessneḍ-tt.
Ad tafeḍ yessen-itt.
Ad tafeḍ tessen-itt.
Ad tafeḍ nessen-itt.
Ad tafeḍ tessnem-tt.
Ad tafeḍ tessnemt-tt.
Ad tafeḍ ssnen-tt.
Ad tafeḍ ssnent-tt.
Ur tt-ssineɣ ara.
Ur tt-tessineḍ ara.
Ur tt-yessin ara.
Ur tt-tessin ara.
Ur tt-nessin ara.
Ur tt-tessinem ara.
Ur tt-tessinemt ara.
Ur tt-ssinen ara.
Ur tt-ssinent ara.
Tuzzleḍ.
Tuzzel.
Nuzzel.
Tuzzlem.
Tuzzlemt.
Uzzlent
Qqim kan a Nna Mennun, tfukk tmerẓiwt n uqerruy n lexḍbegga ɣef yimawlan.
Tisutiwin n tura kksent lḥif, mačči am kemm d nekk asmi irgazen i aɣ-yuɣen, ur ten-nessin almi nuweḍ s ixxamen-nsen.
D ayen yelhan a Cabḥa, Yidir tura d argaz, yuweḍ-d lawan ad yexdem axxam.
Ddurt i d-iteddun mi ara d-yuɣal Yidir seg yixeddim-is s axxam, ad as-d-bedreɣ awal ɣef tissulya-s.
Mi teqqim deffir n uẓeṭṭa-s, s tyaẓilt tetteddez aḍraf, thedder d Nna Mennun i tt-id-iqublen, nettat tsenned s adekkan.
Tamɣart n Cabḥa ɣas ma tedda deg leɛmer maɛna ur teɣli ur tebbehba.
Cwiṭ n tezmert i tt-yeǧǧan ad teḥrured yella, ma d leɛqel yeqqim akken yella, tferreẓ timsal akken i iwata.
Tettraju kan ad tesɛu tislit ara as-yekksen lecɣal n uxxam.
Anda i tettedduḍ akka ?
Ad iyi-d-tessekneḍ takalast-inek ?
Deg usuday qqaren tiẓri, ma deg lluzinat lemmden tasemrest.
Aɣella ɣur-s tamasit tameqqrant ɣef yinmahalen akked d ifecka d tmacinin n lluzin.
Amek i tufiḍ tamdint n Ɛennaba ?
D acu ara am-iniɣ ?
D acu ara as-iniɣ ?
D acu ara wen-iniɣ ?
D acu ara kent-iniɣ ?
D acu ara asen-iniɣ ?
D acu ara asent-iniɣ ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-tenniḍ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-tenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-tennam.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-nnan.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-nnant.
D acu i tebɣiḍ ad d-tiniḍ ?
D acu i yebɣa ad d-yini ?
Nniɣ-d.
Tenniḍ-d.
Yenna-d.
Tenna-d.
Nenna-d.
Tennam-d.
Tennamt-d.
Nnan-d.
Nnant-d.
Ass n wamhad, igmaḍ n yisigten-nneɣ ad ilin d wid yelhan.
Ad nexdem yiwet n tmeɣra iwimi ara necfu.
Ad d-nenced imeddukal, ad yili uẓawan, ccḍeḥ d tissit s tawant.
Isuɛef-iyi s axxam.
Tsuɛfeḍ-iyi s axxam.
Tsuɛfem-iyi s axxam.
Tsuɛfemt-iyi s axxam.
Suɛfen-iyi s axxam.
Suɛfent-iyi s axxam.
Tsuɛef-iyi s axxam.
Ur t-suɛfeɣ ara s axxam.
Ur k-suɛfeɣ ara s axxam.
Sliɣ-ak.
Sliɣ-am.
Sliɣ-as.
Sliɣ-asen.
Sliɣ-asent.
Nekkni d Imaziɣen mačči d Aɛraben !
Tudert deg tudrin tetteddu almend n tsemhay.
Tafsut ddeqs aya i teffeɣ.
Irgazen n taddart nnejmaɛen d agraw, awal yewwi-d ɣef tmegra n yigran n wat n taddart.
Gren-d tasɣart seg wanwa iger ara bdun.
Tasɣart tṣaḥ-d Dda Ɛacur Uciban.
Imɣaren fkan-d urawen n lxir rnan-d lweɛd i uzekka ɣer wayla n Dda Ɛacur.
Tal tarbaɛt n snat tmerwin n yiterrasen teṭṭef tirni tmegger timẓin.
Afus azelmaḍ ad d-issemḥilleq i tgemmict n tyedrin s tama wadda, afus ayeffus ad iwwet s umger ad tt-id-yegzem.
Tagemmict d tayeḍ ttuɣalent d tadla ara icudd ufellaḥ u ad tt-idegger ɣef tmurt ad ternu ɣer tiyiḍ i yettugalen d lḥala mi ara timɣur tirect.
Mi ččan aɛwin-nni i d-yewwi Dda Ɛacur d imekli, ur rnin ara aṭas uɣalen yer tmegra.
Maca azɣal d ɛeyyu ssefcalen tiḥerci n tnezzayt, amger yuɣal ẓẓay, afus yuɣal ur yettaɣ awal.
Bu texba i ifaqen s wannect-a yenǧeɛ Leḥlu bab n wayla ad d-yecnu akken tabɣest yebdan tettaǧǧa ifellaḥen ad sen-d-tezzi.
Nna Malḥa, tameṭṭut n Dda Ɛacur d mmi-tsen Leḥlu, sserḥen i taɣect-nsen s ṭṭelq n ugerjum.
Ay iwaziwen Rebbi ad ken-iɛiwen.
Kemmlet-aɣ-d tirni Akka d asawen.
Mḥend imegzi uḥric ibeddel-as akk i ccna-agi.
Ay iwaziwen Rebbi ad ken-iɛiwen, Qasi d win izewren, deg tmegra yugar-iken.
Qasi mi yesla i lehdur am wi, Mḥend iwenneɛ-as acuffu n uqendur, dɣa yuɣal d mraw n yifellaḥen, ad s-tiniḍ tura kan i yebda lxedma.
Assen ara tfakk tmegra, s zzwayel, iserdyan d yiɣyal ara neqlen yifellaḥen timẓin deg yicebbaken ɣer ugni n Tɣalaḍt anda i ggten yinurar, anda ara tent-ssersen d taffa.
Inurar ad qqimen zzint-asen-d taffwin n temẓin d yirden amzun ttrajun-tent ad d-kecment.
D ayen ara yeḍrun imi inurar ttwaheggan, ttwaseggmen, ttwaɣerran s leɣbar.
Afellaḥ s tazzert ad d-yessrusu timẓin seg taffa ɣer unnar.
Yuɣ lḥal sin n yizgaren ikummen qqnen s umrar ɣer lmernuna, tigejdit ibedden deg tlemmast n unnar.
Afellaḥ s uɛekkaz ad yettwehhi, izgaren ad tezzin ad sserwaten timẓin, amrar ad iberren i lmernuna.
Deg tazwara izgaren ttilin deg ṭṭerf n unnar, skudmal amrar ad itezzi i lmernuna skudmal ttẓẓiẓin ɣer tlemmast n unnar. Imiren ad yuɣal ufellaḥ ad sen-ibeddel anamek n tuzzya.
Yal ma rewtent temẓin, annar ad as-isseččay ufellaḥ timẓin seg taffa.
Ma tama n ufella n unnar tenɣed ttqelliben-t s tuzzar.
Asmi ara neɣdent akken i ilaq temẓin, ifellaḥen berrun-d i yizgaren, jemmɛen nneɛma d tirect deg unnar.
Agni d amkan ɛlayen, tameddit n wass yettili-d lɛun, abeḥri swayes zuzuren yifellaḥen timẓin d yirden.
Bab n temẓin ad d-yerfed lgelba ad yektil nneɛma, mi i ifukk ad tt-yerr ɣer daxel n teswalin ara ɛebbin yiɣyal s axxam.
Tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ ssirriwen-d tirect s yimeṣleḥ n umezzir neɣ n uẓebbuj, tekksen i lḥeb akerfa.
Nna Mennun, i tt-yecqan d aẓeṭṭa-ines.
Aḥric ameqqran n wakud-is d yid-s i t-tesɛedday.
Teǧǧa-t kra n wussan mi d-tedha d tissulya n Caɛban.
Tfukk kan tmeɣra tuɣal-d ɣer tyaẓilt-is.
Tikwal tettɣimi-d ɣef yiri-s Cabḥa, tettaṭṭaf yiwet n tama n uẓeṭṭa.
Ẓeṭṭent, ttqessirent, ur ttakint ara i wakud mi yekkat yettɛedday.
Ad qqiment kan ad d-alsent i uẓuru n lemqam n Sidi Waɛmer.
Cabḥa tufa fell-as.
Ula d Nna Mennun tfaq yella kra i ibeddlen deg teslit-is.
Tesfillit-as tal tikkelt ad ikemmel ubeddel-a ɣer wayen i bɣant.
Akli diɣen akka i yettxemmim ɣef tmeṭṭut-is.
Yeggra-as-d kan ad terfed…
Caɛban tečča-t lɣerba n deffir uxxam.
Yeqqim acḥal d aseggas ur d-yerzi ɣer taddart n Tewrirt.
Tikkelt tamezwarut mi d-yuɣal ɣer tmurt n baba-s d jeddi-s, yerra-d s axxam n yemma-s Mennun.
Axxam-is yeččeḥ fell-as imi t-yettu.
Ula d netta yettu-t.
Ttar i d-yerra seg-s d inijel akked uẓegḍuf i d-yemɣin gar leblaḍ n ufrag, ma d leḥyuḍ merra qecren.
Mi isefqed ɣur-s Caɛban, yexleɛ, yufa-t deg yir ḥala.
Agama yekreh ilem, ɣef wayagi ahat imezdaɣ imaynuten n uxxam yeǧǧa Caɛban d twacult-is d iɣersiwen am yiɣerdayen d yizerman.
Deg wass d tibunejdamin i d-yettbanen ttecruruden ɣef leḥyuḍ.
Mačči d axxam kan i ibeddlen, ula d imdanen akken.
Imɣaren ur nezmir ara i usikel qqimen-n deg Zzayer.
D tawacult tamecṭuḥt n Caɛban i d-irezfen ɣer taddart n Tewrirt.
Yidir d Meqqran d tizziwin, yugar-it yidir s kra n wussan kan deg leɛmer.
Mi t-iwala akken, ur yegzi ara, yettu taqbaylit-is, yerra-tt Yidir ɣer taɛrabt-nni yeqqar deg uɣerbaz.
Myuṭtafen deg yifassen, wa ittecmumuḥ i wayeḍ, yal wa yečča wayeḍ s tmuɣli.
Yiwen deg-sen ur t-id-yuli yiwen n wawal.
Tres-d yiwet n tsusmi gar-asen tesɛuẓẓug.
D yiwet n tsusmi i yebɣan aṭas ad t-id-tini.
Ad d-tini i wayeḍ ayen ttḥulfun wulawen mi kkaten, mi ḥebbken nezzeh almi alaḥal ad asen-d-ffɣen seg tfekkiwin-nsen.
Maca izen n tayri yuweḍ ɣer yal yiwen.
Msebran i yifassen-nsen, bran i wallen-nsen, kkren suhlen yal yiwen s axxam-is, maɛna myefken asihar ad mwalin mi weɛɛan.
Barka tura a Ṭawes, ldi-d allen-im tfakkeḍ targit-im…
A-t-an diɣen ula d kečč iḍaɛ deg-k yiwen n umastan.
Talfi, lufan lweqt ur aɣ-yeddi ara deg nnzeɛ, i sin yid-neɣ ad nili d ibugaṭuyen.
Lbaṭel ad yerfed ifassen-is, ad yeffeɣ seg tmurt tuffɣa n yiberriq, imir-nni lḥeqq ad d-yeɛjel ɣer tmetti-nneɣ.
Yal yiwen deg-neɣ ad yaf iman-is.
D tidet, akka i ttxemmimeɣ.
Amer ttafeɣ imdanen akk, anda bɣun ilin, ad idiren deg telwit.
Yal yiwen s yizerfan-is akken ma llan.
Talfi tudert tuklal ad tt-nidir deg tumert.
La kemm-ttwaliɣ tettkemmileḍ s lehdur-im tamḥaddit-im n ubugaṭu.
Ini-d tura, ma nuɣal-d ɣer tilawt, acu ara texdem Ṭawes akka d tasawent ur neggug ?
Yezmer lḥal ad ǧǧeɣ azgen deg yizerfan-iw.
Ur ttkemmileɣ ara tizrawin-iw n tesnawit deg Bgayet.
Maca ad geɣ yiwet n tannant n useggas, dima deg Bgayet.
S ugerdas ara d-awiɣ ad zemreɣ ad slemdeɣ deg uɣerbaz amezwaru ma yebɣa ugellid ameqqran.
Ad yebɣu kan a Ṭawes, d ayen igerrzen.
Aselmed seg zik d yiwet n twuri taheggart.
D yiwen n yixeddim ara yeddun d ṭṭbiɛa-m d wamek i tettxemmimeḍ.
Tisutiwin ara d-trebbiḍ, d nutenti ara yuɣalen d irgazen akked tlawin n uzekka.
Timetti iseggmen d tin i d-yettrebbi uɣerbaz.
Asedwel imeɛnen d netta ara iḍemnen tudert tazeddgant n yiseggasen i d-iteddun.
Gedha a Ṭawes !
Lufan ad tkemmleḍ tizrawin-im, ḥsiɣ d acu ara d-teffɣeḍ ɣer taggara.
Yerna yezmer ad tettwassneḍ deg umaḍal akken ma yella.
Berka, ur smesxir ara fell-i.
Assez, cesse de plaisanter.
D acu akka ara uɣaleɣ lufan…
Nettat tettaḍsa tekkat-it s ufus-is ɣer tayet.
Ula d netta yettkexkix seg teḍsa.
Ad tuɣaleḍ d tamastant, d tabugaṭut.
Ad tettḥudduḍ kra n win yettwaḥeqren, kra n wim iwimi kksen izerfan-is, kran n win iwimi ččan lḥeqq-is…
Ahya Yidir, am wakken mačči deg tmetti-nneɣ i tettidireḍ, ladɣa nekkni s yimrabḍen nerna aḥtut.
Mel-iyi-d yiwet n teqcict n Tẓerrajt neɣ n Tewrirt ifukken tizrawin-is tilemmasin, truḥ ɣer Bgayet ad tkemmel tisinan-ines.
Izerfan n tullas ttwarekḍen.
Muqel kan isuḍaf n twacult n tmurt-nneɣ ad ak-d-fken isalan ɣef liḥala n tmeṭṭut.
Tilawt temgarad aṭas ɣef tudert i nettargu.
Aṭas deg-sent ur nuwiḍ ara ula ɣer uɣerbaz alemmas.
Sṭaxren-tent-id kanakken d tiqrurin seg uɣerbaz amezwaru.
Ṭill kan ɣer ufmiḍi n yinelmaden d win n tnelmadin.
Ad t-tafeḍ ur yettɛedday ara nnig n 10%, d lbaṭel aberkan.
Ad ttɣimint deg uxxam, ttakken-tent ad zewjent meẓẓiyit urɛad sɛant kra n tikti ɣef tudert i tent-yettrajun, tudert yettwaḥetmen fell-asent.
Ad rnunt kra n yiseggasen ad d-ččarent axxam d dderya.
Ad ttarwent inilban, wa deffir wayeḍ.
D tazmert-nsent ara tent-yaɣen.
Ad asent-truḥ kanakka seg tillas ɣer tiyaḍ mebla ma ɛerḍent cwiṭ n tiẓeḍt n tudert.
Mi tfukk Ṭawes awal-is, Yidir yewwet-as afus.
Berka tura awal ala fell-i kan.
I kemm a Ṭawes, abrid iban-am-d ɣer Bgayet.
Ẓriɣ s nnmara i ak-yefka Rebbi ad tawḍeḍ ɣer wayen akk tessarameḍ.
Afud igerrzen ɣef wayen akk i tebɣiḍ ad t-txedmeḍ sya ɣer sdat.
Ad isejji Rebbi baba-k a Yidir.
D tagnit ad steɛfuɣ baba yerwan lemḥayen fell-aneɣ, ladɣa tura mi yedda cwiṭ deg leɛmer yerna ad yeqqim kan ad yaḍen.
Mi ara fakkeɣ asileɣ-a, ma ur iyi-uwin ara ɣer lɛesker ad bduɣ tudert-iw tamsadurt.
Ttayaleɣ ula d yiwet n taggazt meqqar ad kkseɣ aɣilif n umesruf.
Almend n yigmaḍ i d-yeffɣen deg tɣamsa, uwiɣ-tt-id gar yimezwura.
D nettat ara i iyi-iḍemnen yiwen n usileɣ awezzlan n ukkuẓ n yiseggasen.
Imi walaɣ tasnawit texḍa-iyi, kkreɣ sɛeddaɣ umaynagi yiwet n temsizzelt deg tmanaɣt Zzayer.
Werdiya n twacult n Wat Waɛli ur iɛedda ara fell-as uzaylal imi ur tettu ara insayen n Leqbayel.
Yidir ur yessin la taɛrabt la tafransist, yessen kan taqbaylit.
Wid yettcaxen di lawan-nni ɣullen Yidir d wid yellan am netta, ur ten-seɣren ara deg tutlayt-sen.
Seɣren-ten deg tutlayin tiberraniyin ɣef ugdud n tmurt, taɛrabt d tefransist.
Tutlayt-nneɣ d tamertkantit deg yimesla.
Ahat kra n yimesli yellan deg ddunit tesɛa-t tmeslayt n tmaziɣt.
Tutlay-nneɣ tga am ujenwi-nni n bu sin n yiran.
S yiwet n tama, imi tesɛa aṭas n yimesla, yeshel i Umaziɣ ad yelmed tutlayt-nniḍen taberranit.
S tama-nniḍen, tamurt-nneɣ tezga seg zik n zik ṭṭfen-tt yimhuras am Yifniqen, Irumyen, Ibiẓanṭiniyen, Iwandaliyen, Aɛraben, Iṭerkiyen d yifransisen.
Wigi akk, akken ma llan mi d-kecmen tamurt s yiɣil, ddmen akal n tmurt, fernen izuɣar d tɣezza ur tqeṭṭeɛ tmuɣli.
Imaziɣen uɣalen msakiit d ixeddamen n ufus n yimawlan imaynuten n wakal imi tamurt teggra-d gar yifassen-nsen.
Ihi am Yirumyen, am Waɛraben, am Yifransisen, ur ttnadin ara ad lemden tutlayt n Yibarbariyen, akka i asen-ssawalen i yimezdaɣ inasliyen n tmurt.
Ihi d imawlan n tmurt n zik i terra tmara ad lemden tameslayt n umhares i iḥekmen tamurt.
Imi tewlen i waya, tamsalt n ulmad n tutlayt tusa-asen-d teshel maḍi.
Imhuras, akken bɣun ilin, zgan leqrun deg Tmazɣa, ddeqs n Yimaziɣen i yettuɣalen am nutni.
Tettun tuytlayt-nsen, insayen-nsen, d wayen akk i ten-yettarran d Imaziɣen.
Gan am tata, refden ini n tegnit, wissen kan amek-it umhares. D Arumi ? D Aɛrab ? D Afransis ?
Amedya amiran d imezdaɣ n tmanaɣt n Zzayer.
Tuget deg-sen d Imaziɣen, d Leqbayel maca ttutlayen taɛrabt n Zzayer, ttarran iman-nsen diɣen d Aɛraben.
Ladɣa seg timunnet n tmurt ɣer da, wid yukren tagrawla deg 1962, urwen-d yiwet n tmendawt i asen-t-yezgan swa swa deg tzeqqa n sinima deg tmanaɣt.
Uran deg-s ayen bɣan, ayen yeffɣen fell-asen mačči akken yebɣa ugdud.
Beddlen tamagit s tayeḍ imi deg yiwen n umagrad-is teqqar-d : « Zzayer d tamurt taɛrabt » deg wayeḍ terna-d : « Tineslemt d asɣan n uwanek ».
Iẓuran n tmurt d Imaziɣen maɛna ccḍeb d Aɛrab, ruḥ fhem-itt tura.
Aɛerbawal yettun tutlayt-is, ibeddel-itt s tayeḍ, ulac lettkal fell-as.
Yal asentel yettarra-t deg uzmam-is.
Inzan iḥeggez-iten iman-nsen deg yiwen n uzmam, timseɛraq deg wayeḍ.
Akken diɣen i ixeddem i yisefra, timucuha akked temɛayin.
Iḥemmel tuddsa yelhan am leɛmer-is.
Ɣef waya ur itettu ara yettarra isem n win i as-d-yefkan aḍris, azemz n melmi i t-id-yuwi d wadeg anda i t-id-iḥawec.
Ad d-immager albaɛḍ n yimɣaren deg ubrid n baba Rebbi, ama yessen-it ama ur t-yessin, ad izul fell-as.
Nekk bɣiɣ ad ten-aruɣ akken ad d-qqiment i tsutiwin i d-iteddun.
Mi uwḍen ɣer tejmaɛt, ur ufin ula d yiwen din
Ufan-tt d lemziyya
Qqimen i sin ɣef yideknan.
Ula d tixsi d idammen-is i tt-yenɣan.
« Nnan-as i userdun, anwa i d baba-k ? Yenna-asen, jeddi d aεudiw »
Mi d-bedreɣ aserdun d uɛudiw, mmektaɣ-d yiwet n temɛayt ɣef teɣyult.
Ihi, Yiwet n tikkelt izem yemlal yiwet n teɣyult yenna-as: Efk-iyi-id ad ččeɣ aqerruy-im ad m-in-fkeɣ lgelba n temẓin…
Taɣyult d taseqqaḍt maɛna tkukra, dɣa truḥ tcawer uccen bu txidas.
Tenna-as: Twalaḍ tura a Mhend Uccen yessuter-d deg-i yizem ad as-fkeɣ aqerruy-iw ad t-yečč maɛna ad iyi-d-yefk s lǧiha-s lgelba n temẓin, yerna yegull-iyi-d.
D acu ara d-tiniḍ ihi ?
Taɣyult ad teqqim d taɣyult.
A nnger-im, ma yečča-am yizem aqerruy-im; i temẓin-nni ara m-d-yefk, s wacu ara tent-teččeḍ? S ubeḥlus-im? I as-yerra wuccen.
Seg Tzerrajt yerkeb yiwen n usakal i d-yekkan seg Bgayet, yuwi-t almi d taɣsert n Xerruba i d-yezgan deg tmanaɣt Zzayer.
Nna Mennun tettɣimi ɣef yiri-nsent, tleqqeḍ ayen i d-qqarent, tettɛiwin-itent diɣen deg usbuɣer.
Tettmmekti-d win neɣ tin i as-d-yemlan asefru-a.
Ass-a tebɣa ad tehder d Yidir ɣef sin n yimedyazen i tessen imi n lɛerc-is
Yidir, ɣas ma yeqqar deg uɣerbaz akka tura, kraḍet n tutlayin, tafransist, taɛrabt, tagnizit, maca tella kan yiwet terḥa-t, d taqbaylit.
Yidir deg leɛmer meẓẓi maca deg umeyyez-ines, d win icurfen.
Ad yili yeqqim deg yiwet n teɣmert n ubraḥ n uɣerbaz ad yettxemmim iman-is, ad d-ittaḳk tuttriwin iwimi ur d-yettaf ara tiririt-nsent.
Ad yeqqar deg wul-is, deg tneɣriyin inelmaden d tirni wissen d acu n tutlayt i qqaren imir-nni.
Yezmer d taɛrabt yeddmen aḥric ameqqran deg ussemres n wakud.
Yezmer d tafransist, tutlayt tis snat neɣ d tagnizit, tutlayt tis kraḍet.
Maca mi ara d-ffɣen ad sgunfun deg ubraḥ, ala yiwet n tutlayt i ttmeslayen gar-asen.
Tin akken i d-ṭṭḍen ɣer tyemmatin-nsen.
Tin akken s way-s ttaḍsan neɣ tettrun.
Tin akken tikwal s way-s reffun neɣ regmen.
Tin akken i ssegdalen yiselmaden n taɛrabt neɣ n tefransist neɣ n tegnizit ad d-tettwabdar deg tneɣrit mi sɣarayen.
Ixuss jiḥbuḍ deg tlemmast.
D jiḥbuḍ i ixussen deg tlemmast.
Deg tlemmast ixuss jiḥbuḍ.
Maɛna Caɛban yettkel ɣef umeddakel-is Akli ara t-id-yerren ɣer leɛqel-is tal tikkelt ara yecceḍ.
Nna Messaɛd, tadebbalt i iḥewwsen medden ussan n lfuruḥ deg wakken teẓẓwer deg tyita n ubendayer akked ccna i yekkaten ass-nni.
Ad teqqim ɣef tsumta yersen ɣef tqermet deg tesga, ad tcennu tizlit deffir tayeḍ nettat ad tekkat abendayer.
Tilawin ad cennunt yid-s.
Imeslayen n taɣect i d-tcennu tḍebbalt akked d tlawin d iznan i ttaznent i tnuḍin-nsent i yettasmen, deg nneyya-nsent, fell-asent, neɣ i temɣarin-nsent ur tent-neḥmmil ara.
Maɛna Nna Messaɛd taḍebbalt, tizlatin i d-tesnulfu ččurent d lferḥ d uqesser d wayen-nniḍen.
D ass wis sin n tmeɣra.
Tilawin dhant-d d wurar-nsent mi ifukk usečči-nsent.
Zwina d Dehbiya uqbel ad izeggen yiḍ uwint yid-sent tislit ɣer texxamt-is.
Taxxamt teččur d ideknan.
Yiwen deg-sen hraw, ur ɛlay ara aṭas, yezga-d deg tesga deffir n tewwurt, fell-as i d-yessa wussu.
Din dɣa i teqqim Lwiza.
Tafat i tt-id-ittakken d yiwet n teftilt yuɣen, tessisin zzit seg lmesbaḥ.
Tisetmatin n teslit sudnent uletma-tsent, skuṭṭfent-tt cwiṭ deg twejjatin-is, ḍsant-as-d uɣalent ffɣent-d, ǧǧant-tt-in iman-is deg texxamt.
Akli ḥercent taṭṭucin-is, zgant lesqent ɣer tewwurt n texxamt n Caɛban mi yella isenned ɣer yiwet n teɣmert netta d yisli.
Iwala kan Zwina d Dehbiya ɛeddant-d sdat-s war ma ẓrant-t-id, izuɣer seg ufus Caɛban isetḥan cwiṭ almi d tawwurt n texxamt.
Isuden-it sya u sya ɣef leḥnak-is, yewwet-it s leɛqel ɣef tayet, yesseggra-as-d yiwen n wawal uqbel ad t-in-yeǧǧ din: « Ili-k tura d argaz a Caɛban !»
Yesṭebṭeb tikkelt, yeldi tawwurt, yekcem, yufa tin i t-yettrajun teqqim ɣef yiwen n yiri n wussu-s.
Yenna-as: " Azul, mselxir a Lwiza ! Wi ara kem-yamnen a ddunit, Lwiza-nni i ttwaliɣ kan mebɛid neɣ deg usugen-iw, a-tt-a tura sdat-i".
Yak mačči kan d targit i ttarguɣ.
Caɛban am win i as-d-yefkan abeqqa, indekwal-d, yaf-d iman-is yettu.
Yuɣal yemmekta-d ameddakel-is Akli i t-yettrajun akkin i tewwurt.
Ad d-yeffeɣ s tɣerbalt n lfal yeččuren d leḥlawat, lkawkaw akked tmellalin tuftiyin.
Ilḥeq-as-t-in kan, iɣmez-as s tiṭ, Akli yuwi taɣerbalt-nni yebḍa-tt d ddeqs n yilmeẓyen yettrajun ula d nutni din.
Caɛban, netta yebren ɣer lɛecc-is n tayri.
Yufa lwiza-s tefka-as-d akk iman-is.
Cabḥa seg wasmi i d-tuɣal nettat d temɣart-is seg ufakan n sidi Waɛmar, tufa iman-is.
Tbeddel ṭṭbiɛa-s ɣef tikkelt, cwiṭ n wawal amecṭuḥ yezmer ad tt-id-yesḍes.
Faqen-as akk, ama d imawlan, ama d lǧiran, ttwalin-tt amzun d tayeḍnin deg wakken tɛawed tikli d uxemmem.
Akli ur itewhem ara imi akka i tt-yessen ussan imezwura mi d tedda d tislit.
Imir-nni mazal ur tt-yekcim ara uɣilif n tarrawt.
Mi ara d-yekker tanezzayt, Akli yeqqar-as: " Azul a Cabḥa n wussan imenza n tissulya-nneɣ".
Azul ay Akli, d Cabḥa n yiḍelli, Cabḥa ittaḍsan, iferḥen, yetturaren, iɛedlen akk d medden d tin n wass-a.
Yezmer akka i yella lḥal, ahat tura i d-suffuɣeɣ s shala ayen yellan deg wul-iw wala umayna.
Akka i kem-nḥemmel a Cabḥa, ḥader deg laɛnaya-m ad tuɣaleḍ ɣer yir axemmem-nni inem.
Eḍs i ddunit ad am-d-tḍes.
Wellah ar akken kan a Yemma Mennun.
Ad fakkeɣ kan leqdic i bdiɣ ad ruḥeɣ ad saɛfeɣ tislit-nneɣ tamaynut ɣer tala n taddart ad d-tagem.
Agam n tikkelt tamezwrut n teslit d yiwen n wansay i teggent Teqbayliyin.
Tetteffeɣ-d i tikkelt tamezwarut akken ad tissin iberdan, tala, tilawin n taddart imi ula d nettat akka d tasawent ad tuɣal d yiwwet n tɛeggalt gar-asent.
Tugem-d aman seg tala, walant-tt-id medden, twala-ten, tebren s axxam nettat d tin i tt-id-isaɛfen.
Mi d-uwḍent s axxam, ufant-d Nna Xuxa ɣef umnar n tewwurt.
Azul a Nna Xuxa ! I as-tenna Cabḥa.
Azul ulehna a yelli ! Ad am-ibarek Rebbi mi teddiḍ deg lebɣi n tmeṭṭut n Caɛban.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedmeɣ a Nna Xuxa, ula d Lwiza nneɣ.
Kra n wayen tebɣa tessuter-it-id, aql-i ɣer tama-s.
Tanemmirt a Caḅḥa. I as-rrant i snat yid-sent ɣef tikkelt.
Yezri yiwen n yimalas ɣef wass n tissulya-nsen, Lwiza terra sebɛeyyam s axxam-nsen.
D argaz-is Caɛban i yeddan yid-s.
D Werdiya i ten-id-immugren ɣer tewwurt n ufrag.
Teqqim tefṛeḥ nezzeh.
Wissen d acu n zuxx-nni i tt-id-yulin mi twala tinaragin-is ksant-d inebgawen.
Kecmen yislan s axxam, Dda Ɛacur yesṭerḥeb s Caḅan ma d Lwiza tekkuki ɣur-s, qrib i t-teɣḍil imi ibedd s tɛewwzin-is.
Tessuden-it akka d wakka tugi akk ad as-tserreḥ.
Tuɣal ɣer yemma-s kif kif.
Ma d yessetma-s, teɛna-tent, teṭṭef-itent-id i snat yid-sent ɣef tikkelt, tessers aqerruy-is ɣef tuyat n Nnana-s Zwina, teḍsa-d cwiṭ tuɣal tettru yid-sent.
Sefḍent-as imeṭṭawen-is, ssudnent-tt ula d nutenti.
Caɛban yeswa tiqqit n lqahwa yuɣal-d.
Ma d Lwiza teqqim-n deg uxxam-nsen ad tečč imensi.
Zlan-as-d ayaziḍ.
Tameddit deffir n uɣelluy n yiṭij ad d-yas urgaz-is ad tt-yerr s axxam-is.
Tiririt n sebɛeyyam d yiwen n unsay-nniḍen n tmetti taqbaylit.
Ẓeṭṭent, ttqessirent, ur ttakint ara akk i wakud mi yekkat yettɛedday.
Nna Mennun deffir n uẓeṭṭa s tyaẓilt tetteddez ulman tessimɣur tifuɣal, s yiles-is ur tḥebbes awal ladɣa ma tella Cabḥa ɣef yiri-s.
Mačči d yiwet i as-d-tettawi am wazal yesɛa uẓeṭṭa.
Imaziɣen s umata ttwalin-t amzun d amdan, ɣef wayagi i t-ttqadaren.
Aẓeṭṭa iggar laɛnaya.
Yiwen ma yesquqar wayeḍ akken ad t-iwwet, wagi yerwel ɣer deffir n uẓeṭṭa, ur t-yeṭṭafar ara ɣer din.
Aẓeṭṭa ihi am umdan, yettḥuddu.
Cwi kan ur tesɛiḍ ara tanuḍt a Cabḥa. I as-tenna Nna Mennun.
Ihi yiwet deg-sent ma tger aẓeṭṭa tettagad ad yeḍru uxessar fell-as.
Tanuḍt-nni yusmen ɣef lecɣal n tin isbedden aẓeṭṭa, mi ara d-tebru i tyuga n yizgaren tettanef-asen ad alin ɣer tɣerɣert ad d-sukken acciwen-nsen seg uẓeṭṭa ara d-sɣersen ɣer lqaɛa, yuɣ lḥal llal-is ulac-itt din, ahat truḥ ɣer tala ad d-tagem.
Aẓeṭṭa yettwakkes, Cabḥa d temɣart-is, tal yiwet deg tama bdant kersent iɣrisen i ǧǧant i uɛdil akken ur d-ittfessix ara, ma ulac kra n wayen akken ẓḍant ad iruḥ deg rrayeɛ.
Aṭas n tɣawsiwin i d-telmed ɣur-s imi mačči d tin yettɣullun.
Asteqsi ara as-tfek ma yella ur tefhim ara kra, din din ad d-terr fell-as s yiwen n usefhem yettaǧǧan Cabḥa tceffu akken i ilaq ɣef wayen i as-d-tettmal yemma-s Mennun yuklalen asnemmer ameqqran.
Nna Mennun teggar tamawt i yixeddim n teslit-is
Am wakken d turagt i as-tefka ɣas ma s wawal kan, tenna-as: « Tzemreḍ a Cabḥa ad tegreḍ aẓeṭṭa iman-im, meḥsub ayen akk ssneɣ mliɣ-am-t-id.
Ulac fell-as a yelli, ayen ara teẓḍeḍ akka d tasawent, ara yesfaydin deg-s, ma mačči d kemm d Akli neɣ d tarwa-nwen.
Cabḥa ur teṭṭif ara imeṭṭawen-is, lehdur n temɣart-is sseḥlulin-d tasa-s, tekker ɣer Nna Mennun tessudun deg-s nettat acḥal n wawal i as-d-tessefruri.
Tameɣra ddeqs aya i tɛedda, aẓeṭṭa yekkes, zrin nnig n kraḍ n wayyuren.
Iqureḍɛen n tleqnin mmden, meqqrit.
Tasentit-nsen ur tettɛeṭṭil ara ad d-taɣ akk isekla.
Yiwet n tnezzayt, teffeɣ-d Cabḥa s afrag, terra-tt tmara ad teqqim ɣer lqaɛa ɣef leblaḍ imi tḥulfa i yiman-is itezzi leɛqel-is.
Tufa-tt-id akken temɣart-is, tenna-as : D acu i kem-yuɣen akka a yelli ?
Ɛni tuḍneḍ ?
Ur Fhimeɣ ara d acu akka i iyi-yuɣen.
Iḍelli, am wussan yezrin ur tufiḍ d acu yellan.
Nna Mennun ur truja ara akk tislit-is ad tfakk acetki-ines, terfed ifassen-is s igenni tdeɛɛu.
S wanuz ay iɛessasen, tanemmirt tameqqrant ay Agellid ameqqran.
Ig Rebbi d win ara d-yeglun ala s lferḥ d rrbeḥ i uxxam-nneɣ.
Cabḥa ur tefhim tigert
Nettat tuḍen, tamɣart-is tdeɛɛu s lxir, ruḥ tura kemm fhem kra.
Bubbeɣ a Yemma Mennun, nniɣ-as ma yella kra i ččiɣ d aqdim iḍelli dɣa ihlek-iyi.
Ihi ssefreḥ Akli s yisalli-a yessefraḥen a Cabḥa.
Aql-ikem trefdeḍ, deg uɛebbuḍ-im yella yiman.
Nekk walaɣ akka iman-iw d taɛelluḍt a Yemma Mennun, a-t-a tura nnig n kraḍ n wayyuren ur d-ssardeɣ, ternuḍ ayen akk i d-yeḍran yid-i, tuzzya n leɛqel, amɛuqqu, iriran.
Ulac ccekk, aql-i s tadist.
Akka d tasawent ur kem-ttaǧǧaɣ ara ad txedmeḍ ayen yewɛren fell-am neɣ ad teddmeḍ taɛkemt taẓayant.
Yerbeḥ a Yemma Mennun, d kemm i iwalan.
I yuwin yid-s asurif d yiwet n tumert tameqqrant.
Ad yeqqim kan ad d-yefninex iman-is am kra n uderwic ur nemlik ara deg leɛqel-is, deg yiberdan ihemmel yettaḍsa.
Ur t-teǧǧi ad yesgunfu.
Tesdduqqes-it s yisalli amaynut i iceɣben merra At Umalu imi almi d tura izemren ad sɛun win ara iseftin tawacult-nsen.
Yiwen deg-sen ijebbed-d yiwen n ufurek ɣur-s almi i t-id-iclex.
Akli yeɛna-ten.
Yenna i win akken i ixedmen tadyant: "Twalaḍ d acu akka i txedmeḍ a mmi-s n Lbacir ?"
Ihi akka d tasawent ttḥadaret imɣan, iɣersiwen d wayen akk i d-yefka Rebbi acku ma tḍurrem-ten, d imawlan-nwen yemmuten aṭas aya i tḍurrem.
Nneḥcamen warrac-nni, ssersen i yiqerray-nsen ruḥen, tamuɣli ɣer deffir ulac.
Akli ikemmel abrid-is.
Yulbab yiwen n yigmir, mi yuweḍ akk d asawen immuger-it-id yiwen n ugni, d lemqiɛda deg udrar.
Yerna cwiṭ n tikli, dehren-as yiɣewdan n tleqnin d tjunan ur tqeṭṭeɛ tmuɣli.
Deg yiwen deg-sen, gar yisekla n tbexsisin ibedd-as-d Caɛban.
Azul a Caɛban !
Azul ulehna ay Akli !
Nniɣ-as deg wul-iw, uqbel ad awḍeɣ ɣur-s, wihinna i ttwaliɣ akka mebɛid, yezmer ad yili d win tebɣiḍ maɛna mačči d kečč.
D asteqsi-a i d-heyyaɣ ula d nekk ad ak-t-id-fkeɣ, maca ɣas ma mazal tibexsisin ur wwint ara, ttnadiɣ ɣef urgalen neɣ tibexsisin n ddaw yifer.
I kečč mačči d Lwiza i k-id-ixeṭṭan ad d-tewwteḍ akka igmir-ihin deg yedra n tbexsisin n ddaw yifer ?
Twalaḍ tilawin yellan s tadist, ma ttinitent ɣef kra, mennan-t-id ad t-ččent ur t-ččint ara, lṭufan-nni ara d-ilalen ad d-yeffreɣ deg-s, yezmer ad d-yawi yid-s kra n ccama d tazewwaɣt tikwal ɣef kra n uḥric seg tfekka-s.
Ma ulac dagi deg wayla-nneɣ ad nmiẓẓed ɣer wayla n medden, akken yenna winna i mmi-s: « Ukreɣ ayla n medden fell-ak ».
Yal yiwen deg-sen ixdem-d taqbat s wuffal d tzukar i d-yellem s wusran i d-qelɛen seg yigeẓdem yellan din s waṭas.
Mi ara d-yenfeq Wakli aksum seg ssuq neɣ yuɣ-d kra n yigumma n lawan, tuwi-d fell-as ad ten-id-iɣumm.
Ɣef waya i ttnekkaren ad reglen kra yellan d ajqiq ama s uceṭṭiḍ ama s lkaɣeḍ, akken ccyaḍ n wayen ittewwayen ad yeqqim din ur iteffeɣ ara.
Tikwal ma yella yiwen, iɣleb-it lḥal, ur yezmir ara ad ibudd lǧar-is, ladɣa ma d win yesɛan tin yellan s tadist deg uxxam-is, mi ara iɛeddi ad d-iseww aksum i twacult-is, ur ilaq ara tariḥt n uknaf n uksum ad taweḍ s anzaren n tin yettiniten.
Tajmaɛt d yiwen n uxxam i d-izeggen s umata deg tlemmast n taddart, maca tin n Tewrirt teṭṭuref cwiṭ.
Din i ttnnegrawen yirgazen akken ad frun timsal yerzan tudert n taddart.
D win i ixesren ara igen kra ara d-yessuter win akken i t-yugaren am rrwaḥ ɣer tferkiwin-nsen ad yeččar taqbat n tbexsisin.
Mi ara d-qqimen ɣer lfelǧa, tturaren ɣef kra.
Yiwen ad yerfed aqermud, yettban d azewwaɣ, wayeḍ d idɣaɣen.
Ussan zerrin, talɣa n tfekkiwin n tlawin irefden skudmal tettbeddil.
I yettbeddilen d iɛebbaḍ-nsent, tal tikkelt irennu deg ucuffu.
Tilawin am ti, ilaq ad ḥadrent iman-nsent akken i ilaq yal ass.
Zemrent ad xedment ala ayen iwimi zemrent.
Lecɣal-nni yewɛren i d-issuturen tikci n tezmert ur tent-ɛnin ara.
Ussan imenza n tadist-is, Lwiza tella deg uxxam-is, tqeddec, tettnawal, ddeqs n tɣawsiwin i txeddem iman-is.
Acḥal ẓid seksu-inem a Yemma Mennun ! I d-tenna Lwiza.
Lwiza s lebɣi n urgaz-is tuɣal s axxam-is akken ad d-terbu deg wadeg n lejdud n Caɛban.
Yemma Mennun trezzu amayendi n tikal ɣur-s imi axxam n Wat Waquj ur iggug ara aṭas ɣef win n Wat Umalu.
Argaz-is Caɛban ibedd ɣur-s
Theyyaḍ-d akk ayen i ilaqen : aman imuẓeɣlen, ussu, amrar yeqqnen s ajgu
Zedmeɣ-d.
Izdem-d.
Tezdem-d.
Tezdmeḍ-d.
Nezdem-d.
Tezdmem-d.
Tezdmemt-d.
Zedmen-d.
Zedment-d.
Ugmeɣ-d.
Tugmeḍ-d.
Yugem-d.
Tugem-d.
Nugem-d.
Tugmem-d.
Tugmemt-d.
Ugmen-d.
Ugment-d.
Swiɣ afenǧal-iw n lqahwa.
Teswiḍ afenǧal-ik n lqahwa.
Teswiḍ afenǧal-im n lqahwa.
Yeswa afenǧal-is n lqahwa.
Teswa afenǧal-is n lqahwa.
Neswa afenǧal-nneɣ n lqahwa.
Nous avons bu notre tasse de café.
Neswa afenǧal-nteɣ n lqahwa.
Teswam afenǧal-nwen n lqahwa.
