Teswamt afenǧal-nkent n lqahwa.
Swan afenǧal-nsen n lqahwa.
Swant afenǧal-nsent n lqahwa.
- Ssneɣ mmi Yidir, ssneɣ d acu i iḥemmel, ssneɣ d acu i yekreh.
Ad yeqqim kan ad t-yawi uxemmem mi ara yili akka iman-is deg lexla neɣ mi ara iɛeddi ad igen.
Igerri-d iman-is netta d tefrit-is.
Aṭas i d-ittɛeddayen deg uqerruy-is, mačči d yiwet.
Yettxemmim ɣef teqbaylit-is, acimi akka imḍebbren n tmurt, mačči kan ur tt-ḥsiben ara maca wwten-tt maḍi ɣer lqaɛa.
Laɛmar i as-unfen ad tennerni alma tufa iman-is.
D ayen yellan ay Akli, maɛna kukraɣ…
Kukraɣ…D acu i tkukraḍ ? Ulac ugur ur nesɛi tifrat.
Ugur-iw isem-is Werdiya.
Ugadeɣ ad qerbeɣ ad tagi.
Sliɣ-as d acu i teqqar i kra n win iɛeddan ad d-yexḍeb Lwiza, nettat tugi ma d yemma-s teqqar alma zewjent tmeqqranin ara d-tezzi nnuba n tmaẓuẓt.
I Dda Ɛacur, argaz n Werdiya, lufan ad as-tegreḍ awal, ad as-twedɛeḍ win yettqadar, yezmer ad ak-yeddu deg lebɣi.
Am wakken ur tessineḍ ara Nna Werdiduc, yiwen ur yettɛedday sdat-s, d netta i d Rebb n uxxam.
Argaz-is awal ur t-id-yettali sdat-s.
Ar tufat ihi.
Tudert taqbaylit tebna ɣef wakal.
Dɣa win yesɛan aṭas n wakal d win iwimi qqaren amerkanti, bab n cci, ma d win ur t-nesɛi d igellil.
D akal i d tidet, xeddmen-t yimdanen, ɣellten seg-s, yis-s ttidiren.
Deg wakal i d-imeqqi kullec, ama d irden d temẓin, ama d isekla n yigumma neɣ n yifer, ama d izegza, yal wa s lawan-is, rnu rbiɛ d tuga i lmal.
Leqbayel ttrebbin lmal, yal wa d acu n lfayda i d-yettawi i umdan.
Zzwayel, isredyan d yiɣyal ttarran-ten i ttɛebga taẓayant deg yiberdan yettalin yettṣubbun n tmurt-nneɣ.
Ma d izgaren, amahil-nsen iban am lemri : d takerza n wakal n tmurt.
Tawrirt am tudrin merra, tettheggi iman-is i tkerza.
Takerza n tegrest tbeddu taggara n wayyur number.
Ussan yezrin teswa-d ddeqs, akal yerdeb cwiṭ, d tallit n ḥertadem.
Akli d Caɛban iwimi ssawalen at n Tewrirt “Tayuga” imi ur ttemfaraqen akk, anda i teddiḍ ad ten-tafeḍ qqimen akken di sin.
Ula d tayuga n yizgaren cerken-tt.
D yiwet n tyuga I iḥerten akken I ilaq, tettaɣ awal nezzeh.
Deg ugni n Tewrirt ɣur-sen kra n wakal, azal n mraw n wussan n tkerza.
Nna Mennun tseww irden d yibawen d uftiyen.
Tessufeɣ tarbut tɛetter seg-sen, ɣer tejmaɛt n taddart ad ččen warrac d wid i d-tefka tegnit.
Ass-nni diɣen taddart tezla, tessuzzel idammen akken ad wexrent fell-asen lmaṣayeb.
Yečča win yesɛan, yečča yigellil.
Yal axxam tṣaḥ-it-id texxamt n uksum, ulac win ara yuɣalen deg ṭṭerf.
Tamsalt n uṣurdi i tt-yettqabalen d lufeq n taddart akk d yimerkantiyen.
Iswi amezwaru n tmecreḍt-a d lferḥ ara izedɣen ulawen n merra imezdaɣ n taddart deg ccaw-a n useggas n tfellaḥt.
Tetten s tawant yal lxir, sfilliten ad d-yeqwu rrezg, deɛɛun ɣer taggara ad d-megren ayen s wacu ara ččaren ikufan-nsen, ama d timẓin ama d irden ama d tazart neɣ d lɣella-nniḍen.
Llaẓ yewɛer.
Send ad ɛeddin ɣer lexla-nsen, Akli d Caɛban heyyan-d iman-nsen ad d-suffɣen izgaren seg uddaynin, ad ɛebbin diɣ allalen n tkerza ɣef uɣyul.
Ma d Nna Mennun teṭṭef abrid n umalu yettarran ɣer lemqam d yiɛessasen n Sidi Waɛmar.
Tuwi yid-s yiwen n uḍellaɛ yeččur d lewɛadi.
Mi tuweḍ ɣer lemqam bu tqubbet isenden ɣef lǧedra n uẓebbuj awessur, temlal din Dda Ɛacur, Werdiya, snat yessi-s, Zwina d Dehbiya akked kra n temɣarin.
Ula d nutni usan-d ad ssersen lwaɛda, tiqcicin ulac win i d-yusan ad tent-yexḍeb.
Lesfenǧ, lmeqruḍ, timsemnin, taḥbult n tmellalin d lqahwa d uyefki rsen-d ɣef lqaɛa.
Akka, win d-iger ubrid, d igellil neɣ d wayeḍ, ad d-yaf lxir sdat-s yettraju-t ad t-yečč.
Kra da akk d ttwab.
Ma d ayen d-yugaren seg lweɛda-nni, ttaǧǧan-t-in din, d amur n wid yemmuten.
Nna Mennun d wat n taddart ḍemɛen seg lǧiha-nsen urawen n lxir.
Allalen n tkerza ttheggin-ten-id medden kra n wussan send aweǧǧeb.
Tagersa d yiglezyam ttawin-ten ɣer umzil ad ten-id-yeḍleq diɣ ad ten-iseggem.
Nna Mennun mi d-tuɣal seg ufakan, tetteddu tdeɛɛu, tesfillit ad yelhu useggas, ad ilin waman, ad d-qwun lerbaḥ.
Akli iberdeɛ aɣyul, yerra-as akurbu, yerna iɛebba-as allalen n tkerza
Icudd-iten akken i iwata s umrar akken ur d-ɣellin ara mi ara yalbab uɣyul abrid yessawnen s agni n Tewrirt.
Ẓer kan a Caɛban ma yella kra i ttuɣ.
Waqila yiwet n tɣawsa ur txuṣṣ.
Kullec yella : Azaglu s txellalin-is, tifekkalin, tazitma, atmun, tisilit, anzel, agelzim, tagersa, zzerriɛa atg…
Anef kan, ma yella ulac kra akk ɛebbaɣ ɣef uɛrur-iw almi ɛekfeɣ am umger ur nzemmer ad nexdem acemma.
Ulac kra n tgella ur glin ara yid-sen, aɣrum, taḥbult n tmellalin, tazart, rremman, timellalin, tijujtin, zzit, abelluḍ d wayen-nniḍen.
Rnan yid-sen yiwen n uyaziḍ azewwaɣ d ameqqran.
D ayen yellan d amagnu ɣef umdan, akka i t-id-yefka Rebbi.
Ad d-yaweḍ kan yiwen n leɛmer ad ḥemmlen d tirni.
Tal tamsalt teqqen ɣer tayri.
Maɛna mačči ala yiwet n tayri kan i yellan.
Tamezwarut am tin yeqqnen Caɛban d Lwiza.
D tayri i ijebden am ddkir yiwen ɣer yiwet neɣ yiwet ɣer yiwen yerna mebla lebɣi-nsen.
Gar yiẓra-a n uɣalad-a i srusun, Caɛban d Lwiza, tibratin-nsen.
Ur ttḥar ara
Ur ttayes ara acku ala yid-m i bɣiɣ ad idireɣ.
Ur zmireɣ ad zdiɣ d tayeḍ a Lwiza-w.
Tal tikkelt ara yeffeɣ ɣer lexla, ad ikes lmal-is neɣ ad yenqec tileqqamin-is, Caɛban itekk s tẓebbujt, aɛessas n taddart.
Caɛban d Wakli d imeddukal n tidet, amzun d atmaten.
Mačči kan mi d-kkren deg yiwen n uxxam, axxam n Wakli ameqqran yemmuten deg wakal n Taruft deg ttrad amaḍlan wis sin.
D imeddukal acku yiwet n ttrebga i d-uwin segmi llan d igerdan.
D ttrebga n Nna Mennun i ḍufren, mačči d tin n urgaz-is i tesḥassef.
D ttrad amaḍlan i tt-iɣurren seg-s.
Tuwi-t mebla lebɣi-s.
Yeǧǧa-tt-id iman-is sdat wuguren n ddunit.
Nna Mennun tuɣal d nettat i d kullec deg uxxam.
D nettat i d tameṭṭut, d nettat i d argaz.
Tetteddu almend n tegnit i d-tettmmagar.
Ɣef wayen yerzan ttrebga n mmi-s Akli d ugujil Caɛban, d nettat i ten-id-isekkren.
Tettarra iman-is d argaz akken ad fehmen wid tettrebbi d acu i d azal n tirrugza.
Teqqar-asen i warraw-is d akken deg ddunit-nneɣ nettmmagar-d dima sin n yiberdan.
Ad tafeḍ yiwen isuffuɣ srid ɣer wayen yelhan ma d wayeḍ ɣer wayen n diri.
Ayen yelhan iban am leḥdaqa, tiɣin n wawal, aqader n umeqqran, aḥezzeb, leḥya, tallalt, tiwizi…
D aya i tekkat Nna Mennun ad t-teẓẓu deg wallaɣ-nsen.
Tessaram ad yaɣ, ad yimɣur sya ɣer sdat.
Daɣ netta mi uɣalen d inubiyen, ɣur-sen deg leɛmer gar 13 d 15 n yiseggasen, yufa-ten-id lḥal deg ttrad n tsellullit taɣelnawt n Zzayer.
Lɛesker n Fransa i iḥekmen tamurt d tirni, xedmen axessar deg yimezdaɣ ur neddi ara yid-sen deg tmurt n Zzayer.
Ladɣa tamurt n Leqbayel i yugin seg zik kra n uzaglu ad ires ɣef umgerḍ-is.
Tanfalit-nni n umedyaz ameqqran Si Muḥend u Mḥend yeqqaren : « Ad nreẓ wala ad neknu », mačči d awal kan.
Akken diɣ i teḍra d Caɛban akked Wakli, kanakken d imecṭaḥ uɣalen d imsebblen.
Iserdasen imhersen ur ḥmmilen ara aya, ilaq d nutni kan ara yekkaten, ara iqehren, ara ineqqen arraw n tmurt.
Tamurt, bɣan ad tt-rren d ayla-nsen s ddreɛ.
Deg tallit-nni, yettili win yettuɣalen d amjahed.
Ad as-d-yekkes tamegḥelt-is akked yikarṭucen-is.
Ad tt-yerfed ɣef tayet, ad yeffeɣ s adrar.
Ad yernu ɣer yimezwura.
Llan gar-asen wid yulin s adrar, ttnaɣen mgal Fransa, sebɛa n yiseggasen uqbel ad yendeh ttrad n tesllullit taɣelnawt.
Deg useggas 1947 ḍefren abrid yuwi umnafeq Ḥmed Umerri, netta yeḍfer win n Ureẓqi Lbacir, Ɛebdun, tedduḍ akken…
Tamurt n Leqbayel, urǧin teqbil yiwen n uɛdaw, seg zik n zik, ad tt-yeḥkem, Iṭerkiyen ɣur-sen lexbar ɣef waya.
Yella diɣen umusebbel.
D imjuhad udrigen, mačči d wid irefden leslaḥ.
Maca d nutni i ixeddmen akk timsal i yettarran amahil n umjahed iḍerru-d akken i iwata.
Asmi ara tedlu Lwiza ɣer tekwat n tayri, gar yiẓra n uɣalad deffir n tẓebbujt taɛessast, ad taf tabrat i tettraju, itteffeɣ-itt leɛqel,
Tekkat deg wul-is tmeɣra.
Ass-nni, ḥseb-it d yiwen n wass yeččuren d taḍsa, cwiṭ n ukras n unyir ur yettili.
Ad taweḍ kan s axxam, ad tessers asagem deg tesga.
Ad tekcem yiwet n texxamt.
Ad d-terr deffir-s tawwurt s tarut.
Ad teqqim din iman-is.
Ara tt-iwansen ala imeslayen ijerden ɣef lkaɣeḍ n wim akken yefren wul-is.
Teqqar-itt wissen acḥal d abrid tebrat-nni, ladɣa isefra i as-d-yettaru Caɛban-is.
Teqqar-itt wissen acḥal d abrid ladɣa isefra i as-d-yettaru Caɛban-is.
Tessen-iten am waman.
Mi ara tettnawal neɣ tberrez lḥala, tcennu isefra-a iwimi tettarra aẓwan i d-tettawi seg uqerruy-is.
Amek Lwiza tamaẓuẓt teqqar-d imeslayen iweznen am wi ?
Mi ara tfakk taɣuri n tebrat-is din din i tettaru tiritit i win tessaram ad yili d argaz-is.
D netta kan i tebɣa.
Yerna ula d nettat teḥsa ala nettat kan i yebɣa.
A lufan ad twaliḍ acḥal i iyi-iɛeǧben yisefra-k !
D tissit i ten-tesseɣ.
Lemdeɣ-ten am waman.
Ad qqimeɣ kan ad as-serrḥeɣ i yiwen deg-sen s ccna.
D nutni i iyi-tekksen urfan ma yella izɛef-iyi-d kra neɣ kra deg uxxam.
Tessneḍ amek i tga yemma.
Awalen-ik sserkaden lxaṭer-iw ma teḍyeq-it tegnit n wass.
Nekk mačči d tamedyazt maca ḥemmleɣ aṭas ad asen-fkeɣ tameẓẓuɣt i yisefra.
Ad qqimeɣ kan ad d-afeɣ iman-iw, ma yella lliɣ qeddceɣ, cennuɣ isefra iwimi ttarraɣ kra n uẓawan ahat i sliɣ deg temẓi-w.
Lemdeɣ aṭas n yisefra n umedyaz-nneɣ ameqqran Si Muḥend u Mḥend i d-yuwin aṭas ɣef usentel n tayri neɣ n tmeṭṭut.
Yettɣimi wul-iw amzun yettferfir mi ara isel awal i d-turiḍ aṭas n tikal deg tebrat-ik: « Ḥemmleɣ-kem ».
Ula d nekk lufan ad twaliḍ acḥal i teɛzizeḍ fell-i.
Allaɣ-iw d wul-iw tezgiḍ deg-sen kra itekk wass.
Tabrat-ik ttarraɣ-tt deg yiciwi-w, ttḥulfuɣ amazun teddiḍ-d deg-s.
Maɛna yif-it lufan i nettidir akken, ulac d acu i ssarameɣ am waya.
Rnu ihi kra n wussan tazneḍ-d imawlan-ik ad iyi-n-xeḍben i kečč a Caɛban-iw.
Lufan ad teẓreḍ d acu i d-iḍerrun skudmal akud iteddu.
Ḥulfaɣ am wakken yemma tbeddel cwiṭ tikli-s.
Tuɣal mačči d tinna n umayna, tinna akken ur nettaǧǧa yiwen ad d-yehder sdat-s.
Ala awal-is kan ara iɛeddin.
D tanezzayt, tawacult n At Umalu tekker-d d tirni maca d Nna Mennun, dima d nettat i d tamezarut.
Tsaɣ times deg lkanun iɣazen deg tesga, s yisɣaren i d-izeddem Wakli mi ara d-yuɣal seg lexla.
Segmi ara yeffeɣ tanezzayt, ur d-ikeččem s axxam alma yeɣli yiṭij.
Ad tebrez lḥala.
Ad tenneḍ tiɣreɣrin, addaynin d ufrag.
Ad tessired iceṭṭiḍen ma llan ddeqs n wid yumsen.
A-t-an teddiḍ ddeqs deg uqerdec n taduṭ-im. I tenna i Nna Mennun.
Aql-akem tettwaliḍ, yerna mačči aṭas-aya i bdiɣ.
Iqardacen-nniḍen a-ten-i ɣef usenduq yersen ɣef udekkan.
Ruḥ ddem-iten-id ad waliɣ ma tessneḍ ad tqredceḍ.
Texdem ayen i as-d-tenna.
Teqqim-d ɣef ugertil, teẓẓel i yidarren-is.
Tebda tettqerdic taduṭ i tesseččay i uqerdac-nni yettaṭṭafen tama wadda.
Ziɣ tẓẓewreḍ a tinnat.
Ur walaɣ ara akka, meqqar ad as-nezzi i taduṭ-a deg snat yid-nteɣ.
Ad nfakk zik aqerdec-ines akken ad nɛeddi ɣer tulma-s.
Ih, nettat d yaya Melɛez seg wasmi i lliɣ d taqrurt.
Wissen ma teẓriḍ d acu i yeḍran d urgaz-nni yukren aqerdac ?
Anwa argaz-agi ? N dagi ? N Tewrirt ?
Ala, d yiwet n tmacahut tamecṭuḥt i iyi-d-tettmal yemma mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ.
- Ur qeṭṭeɛ ara layas a Cabḥa,
Ur qeṭṭeɛ ara layas a Cabḥa a yelli.
Ilaq ad teqqareḍ i yiman-im ad d-yaweḍ yiwen n wass ad uɣaleḍ d yemma.
Rebbi ad am-d-isel ad am-yeddu deg lebɣi.
Nekk umneɣ yiwen wass kan ad ilin wid ara iyi-d-yessiwlen yaya.
Yak a Yemma Mennun qqaren-d ur ilaq ara yiwen ad d-imel timucuha deg wass ma ulac arraw ara d-yesɛu ad d-ffɣen d igugamen.
Maɛna lehdur-nni inem, ḥemmleɣ nezzeh ad asen-sleɣ imi ttarran-iyi-d asirem i yebdan yettruḥu-iyi cwiṭ cwiṭ.
Ahya nneyya, tunwiḍ tin iɛeddan i uzgen n lqern deg tudert-is mazal-itt ad terfed, ladɣa ma ulac argaz-is ɣef yiri-s.
- Ahya nneyya, tunwiḍ tin iɛeddan i uzgen n lqern deg tudert-is mazal-itt ad terfed, ladɣa ma ulac argaz-is ɣef yiri-s.
Kkes aɣilif, ala tarrawt ur d-ttarweɣ, la aɛeggun la win iheddren.
Taqsiḍt-a qqaren-tt i warrac imecṭaḥ.
Amer ttafen deg yiḍ deg wass d timucuha.
Imdanen imeqqranen ur stufan ara, ččuren d lecɣal kra yekka wass.
Alma iɛedda lawan n uɣelluy n yiṭij i d-keččmen s ixxamen-nsen akken ad sgunfun.
Mi tfukk tagi ad am-d-rnuɣ snat-nniḍen meḥsub kif kif-itent akk imi uwint-d i kraḍet ɣef tukarḍa n kra n tɣawsa.
Tettqerdic netta-t tḥekku-d…
Amacahu, ad yelhu, ad yeḍbeɛ am usaru, ad yuɣal anect n ujgu.
Ihi isem-is ufrux-a urqim ?
Ulac, nudaɣ ur ufiɣ kra. Bubbeɣ ihi...
Mačči d tabuzegrayezt, mačči d tasekkurt.
Tikkelt-a yewwet-ikem wugur, tuwi-d ad tbibbeḍ mi ur d-tufiḍ ara tifrat.
Wissen d tasekkurt neɣ d tabuzegrayezt ?
Nna Ǧuhra uqbel ad tuɣal s axxam-is tɛawen taḍeggalt-is Nna Mennun deg tulma n taduṭ.
Tulma tesra iẓdi iwimi nettarra deg tama wadda yiwet n tjerrayt n usɣar.
Neqqar-as tagecrirt.
Tettqerriɛ aḍraf yettlen ɣef yiẓdi ur d-itekkes ara syin.
Nna Mennun mi ara tɛeddi ad tellem taduṭ, ad d-teddem tikulal, taduṭ iqredcen, ad d-ternu iẓdi.
Taklalt tamezwarut ad tt-tezzi deg tlemmast n yiẓdi-nni yersen ɣef tama wadda ines deg kra n tqedduḥt tamecṭuḥt.
Afus azelmaḍ ad yeṭṭef ixef wis sin n teklalt ara ijebbed cwiṭ cwiṭ.
Ma d tidikelt n ufus ayeffus ad tberren iẓdi-nni ɣef teglut-is n uḍar-is ayeffus.
Taklalt-nni ad tettirqiq, ad tettiɣzif, isirigen-is wa ad yebren ɣef wayeḍ, ad tuɣal d aḍraf.
Ad tfakk kan s yiwet n teklalt yettwallmen, ad as-tsečč tayeḍ alma yeččur yeẓdi-nni.
Mi ara tɛeddi ad d-tekkes aḍraf-nni yettlen ɣef yiẓdi, ixef arqaq n tama ufella n yiẓdi ad t-tesɛeddi gar snat n tfednin n uḍar-is ayeffus.
Ad d-tejbed aḍraf s yixef-is, ad t-tawi ad d-yezzi i yiɣil n ufus aẓelmaḍ, ad tuɣal ad t-id-terr s iɣil n ufus ayeffus, akkenni alamma ifukk-d uḍraf yettlen ɣef yeẓdi.
Ɣer taggara ad yuɣal d ayen iwimi neqqar afus n uḍraf.
Tikulal n taduṭ ttuɣalent d aḍraf, aḍraf teggen-t d ifassen.
S tama-nniḍen, ulman n uẓeṭṭa d ided i tettellem Nna Mennun.
Tamhelt-a tessutur-d taruka igan am yiwen n uɛekkaz yesɛan azal n lmitra deg teɣzi.
Yiwen n yixef yebḍa ɣef sin n yifurkan n mraw ar mraw d semmus n yisenṭimen.
Gar-asen i d-tettɛedday tewḍuft n taduṭ yettwaqqen deg tlemmast-is ɣer truka s kra n ṭṭelqa.
Nna Mennun ad terr ddaw n teɣruḍt-is tazelmaḍt tama wadda n truka-nni.
S ufus-is ayeffus ad d-teskuṭṭef cwiṭ n taduṭ seg tewḍuft-nni ara tebren ɣef yiẓdi d amecṭuḥ.
S udebbuz n telkin d umcaḥ n terbutin ad tberren iẓdi-nni.
Isirigen n taduṭ ad ttelmen, ad uɣalen d yiwen n lxiḍ arqaq yettlen ɣef yiẓdi.
Mi ara yeččar, ided-nni ines ad t-id-tesker.
Akka tura, Nna Mennun theyya-d ifassen n uḍraf d kra n tkurin n yided.
Nna Mennun theyya-d akk leḥwal n uẓeṭṭa acku azekka n ssebt ad tger aẓeṭṭa-ines.
D aɛdil ara tẓeḍ.
Way Akli ! Kker ad tezluḍ ayaziḍ-ihin azewwaɣ.
Ternuḍ amellal-ihin, azekka d imensi n tsegrut.
Yerbeḥ a yemma.
I as yerra Wakli i yemma-s.
I tenna Nna Mennun.
Imir-nni kan i d-isuffeɣ Wakli ayaziḍ-nni azewwaɣ amaɣbun seg ukantu-ines.
Yesqaqay s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is amzun yeɛqel s wayen ara yeḍrun yid-s akka n kra n ddqayeq ɣer sdat deg ufrag.
Mi yessers yiwen n uḍar-is ɣef wafriwen-is yeldin, yemma-s teṭṭef iqejjiren-is s ufus azelmaḍ.
S ufus-is ayeffus teṭṭef tama wadda n temgerḍt n uyaziḍ.
Akli s ufus-is azelmaḍ ɣeṭṭef tama ufella.
S ufus-is ayeffus yeṭṭef afus n ujenwi n Dukduk i yessemsed imir-nni kan ɣef yiwen n ublaḍ.
Isemma, yenna ayen zliɣ d leḥlal, Issers tama taqeḍɛant n lmus ɣef yiri n ufrux.
Itekka fell-as yuɣal ijbed-d s lexfafa lmus-nni ɣur-s, din din yerra-t akkin, idammen ẓgen-d.
I sin yid-sen i serrḥen i uyaziḍ immezlen, iman iteffeɣ seg-s netta ittexbibiḍ ɣef leblaḍ n ufrag.
Mi fukken s uyaziḍ azewwaɣ, din din uɣalen s amellal i iḍefren gma-s.
Cabḥa tesseḥma-d aman, deg-sen ara terr iyuzaḍ-nni akken ad ten-treyyec s shala.
Mi d-yeggra ala uqesbuḍ-nsen, teldi-ten i sin deg uɛebbuḍ s ujenwi, tekkes-d ijeɛbuben-nsen, tefka-ten i yimcac.
Ma d tisiswa, tiqinsawin, ulawen, tger-iten deg tqedduḥt, ad ten-id-teqlu ɣef yimensi.
Amek i tt-tefram ihi ?
Qqimen ddeqs awal ur ten-id-yuli almi i d-yenṭeq Dda Ɛacur.
Yenna-aɣ-d ddurt i d-iteddun ad awen-d-nerr s wawal.
Dɣa neffeɣ-d.
Yeggra-aɣ-d kan ad nedɛu ɣer Rebbi ad d-yehdu yemma-s ad teqbel, wanag baba-s iban-aɣ-d amzun yedda-d yid-neɣ.
Ig Rebbi ala asefreḥ ara aɣ-tesferḥeḍ.
Iyuzaḍ yeldin, ad asen-tzurer aɛeqqa n tisent akken ad iẓiden.
Ad tuɣal ad ten-tger deg uḍebsi ameqqran, fell-asen ad tkub taccuyt ma ulac ad tt-qqden yimcac.
Azekka ad ten-id-tniwel i yimensi n tsegrut ara ččen yinebgawen ara d-yasen d iwaziwen ad ɛiwnen Nna Mennun deg tguri n uẓeṭṭa-s.
Nna Mennun kullec ɣef tiṭ-is, ayen akk i ilaqen ad d-yewjed theyya-t-id.
Qqnent ɣer tsariwin n ssqef s temrart.
Iɣunam, axdur, tijebbadin, tayaẓilt neɣ snat, isegra, ilni, tikurin n yided, ifassen n uḍraf, timsuhal, ikuyna, ur tufiḍ d acu i tettu.
Azekka-nni n ssebt, zik akk i d-kkren.
Deg tala, Nna Mennun twala Werdiya n At Waɛli, tessuter-as ad d-tas, ur tt-tɣull ara, ladɣa mi akka ara uɣalen d iḍulan.
Fukkent kan tissit n lqahwa-nsent ɛeddant ɣer umahil i tent-yettrajun.
D Nna Mennun i d tamrayt fell-asent, d nettat i d-yettakken iwellihen ma tella yiwet iɛedda fell-as uzaylal neɣ tettu kra.
D Akli i isemren isegra s tefḍist, yeǧǧa gar-asen azal n ṭam neɣ tẓa n yiɣallen.
Nna Ǧuhra teqqim ɣef yiman-is, teṭṭef asegru azelmaḍ.
Nna Mennun teṭṭef asegru ayeffus.
Werdiya tbedd deg tlemmast, takurt n yided deg ufus-is, tettawi lxiḍ-nni akka d wakka.
Tikkelt ad truḥ ɣer Nna Ǧuhra, ad as-telḥeq ided ara tesɛeddi gar tisegra.
Tikkelt-nniḍen ad tuɣal ɣer Nna Mennun ad texdem akken i texdem tmezwarut.
Tettruḥu, tettuɣal.
Ur yethenna ara.
Ad yettruḥu ad yettuɣal deg yiwen n umkan, neqqar-as yeggar aẓeṭṭa.
Yeggar aẓeṭṭa.
Ḥader ad tettuḍ ur tessexsayeḍ ara times.
Tal tikkelt mi ara d-tezzi ddurt, imezdaɣ n tudrin i d-yezgan deg udrar, ttsubbun s azaɣar anda i tella temdint n Tẓerrajt ad d-sewwqen imi din i d-yettili ssuq yal imalas.
Yerra srid ɣur-sen s leɛqel.
Argaz bu yiwen n uḍar yuweḍ-d s amnar n tewwurt, ibedd din ddqiqa neɣ snat, yeṭallay, yesmeɛqil, almi i iwala udmawen yessen.
Lɛeslama-k a Dda Ɛacur ! I as-nnan i sin.
Isellem fell-awen s lxir. I asen-yerra.
Caɛban yekkuki ɣer yiwen n usɣim.
Yerra-t-id ɣer tgida-nsen ad yeqqim fell-as Dda Ɛacur.
Yeqqim maɛna mačči s shala imi s yiwen n uḍar d snat n tɛewwzin yettaɛer i yiwen ad yeg ayen yebɣa.
Nnan-as d acu ara isew.
Yebɣa-d afenǧal n lqahwa.
Ssawlen i uqehwaǧi yuwi-as-t-id.
Qqimen i kraḍ yid-sen ttemxaẓaren.
Yuɣal inṭeq-d Dda ɛacur.
- Amek ihi a tarwa ?
Amek ihi a tarwa ?
Tẓẓewrem akka kra ?
Ihi mi ken-id-yefka Rebbi, ad wwteɣ azrem s aqerruy, fiḥel tuzzya d tunḍa.
Nnan-as deg wulawen-nsen i sin: « Uqbel ad d-teldiḍ imi-k a Dda Ɛacur, neẓra d acu ara d-tiniḍ ».
Ad awen ibarek Rebbi imi ɣur-neɣ i d-terram akken ad aɣ-tnasbem ɣas ma uqant teqcicin deg taddart n Tewrirt.
Nekk ssneɣ akken i ilaq imawlan-nwen.
Llan wid i xulḍeɣ nezzeh, d irgazen lɛali akken ma llan.
Akli ameddakel-iw n ttrad d Muḥend aɣrib fell-asen yeɛfu yerḥem, Dda Lɛarbi ad idker Rebbi s lxir, ternuḍ kunwi ur txussem ara i sin.
Ɛǧeǧǧin i sin ad sudnen aqerruy n Dda Ɛacur, imsaɣen n lqahwa ččan-ten-id s wallen.
Tanemmirt a Dda Ɛacur, kkes aɣilif, yelli-k ad tili akken tebɣa, yerna twalaḍ, deg uxxam ala jeddi d yaya i yellan.
Ur netteffer ara fell-ak a Dda Ɛacur, nettraju seg-k lexbar am wa ɣef waya i nemcawar ɣef wanwa ass ara nas-n ad nečč taḥbult.
Ihi anwa ass-a ara n-tasem akken ad nheyyi iman-neɣ.
Lḥedd i d-iteddun ma yebɣa Rebbi, ad naweḍ-n ɣur-wen
Ad d-neɛreḍ wid iqerben tiwaculin-nneɣ, yid-sen ad neg snat n tɣawsiwin ɣef tikkelt: taḥbult d tteɛyin.
Ad d-teggri tiwin, ad d-tili deg unebdu i d-iteddun.
Lɛarbi At Waquj, yedda deg leɛmer aṭas, teǧǧa-t tezmert-is, am netta am temɣart-is Xuxa, jeddi-s d yaya-s n Caɛban.
Nna Mennun tezga deffir n uẓeṭṭa-s.
Win yettnadin fell-as, fiḥel ma yerẓa aqerruy-is, ad yerr s azeṭṭa, ad tt-yaf din.
A-t-an teddiḍ deg uẓeṭṭa-inem a Yemma Mennun.
Nekk ulac kra n ccɣel ɣur-i, ad d-dhuɣ kan yid-k. I as-yerra uydi.
Azul a Cabḥa n wussan imenza n tissulya-nneɣ.
Ad am-ibarek Rebbi mi teddiḍ deg lebɣi n tmeṭṭut n Caɛban.
Am wakken d turagt i as-tefka ɣas ma s wawal kan.
Tzemreḍ a Cabḥa ad tegreḍ aẓeṭṭa iman-im, meḥsub ayen akk ssneɣ mliɣ-am-t-id.
Ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara kem-snemmreɣ a Yemma Mennun.
Yemma ur iyi-texdim ara akken i iyi-txedmeḍ.
Tufa-tt-id akken temɣart-is, tenna-as: « D acu i kem-yuɣen akka a yelli ?
Tameɣra ddeqs aya i tɛedda, aẓeṭṭa yekkes, zrin nnig n kraḍ n wayyuren. Iqureḍɛen n tleqnin mmden, meqqrit.
D acu-t akka tura wagi ?
Cabḥa ur tefhim tigert.
Nekk walaɣ akka iman-iw d taɛelluḍt a Yemma Mennun.
A-t-a tura nnig n kraḍ n wayyuren ur d-ssardeɣ.
Ternuḍ ayen akk i d-yeḍran yid-i, tuzzya n leɛqel, amɛuqqu, iriran.
Ɣurwet ad tecḍem.
Tesdduqqes-it s yisalli amaynut i iceɣben merra At Umalu.
Almi d tura izemren ad sɛun win ara iseftin tawacult-nsen.
Yufa-tt-id wul-is daymi i yeḍsa kra yekka wass.
Ndegger yagi aṭas n wakud.
Akud iteddu, aɛebbuḍ n tlawin irennu deg ucuffu almi akken qqaren: icekkeḍ.
Yeggra-d kan ad ɛeddiɣ ad qableɣ tislit-im a Mennun.
Tqerreb temqabelt ɣer Cabḥa, tessen amek ara as-truḥ, ala awalen iẓidanen i d-iteffɣen seg yimi-s.
Ṭṭef ihi a yelli deg umrar-nni, err nnefs ɣer daxel tseggreḍ.
Ttxil-k ur salay ara taɣect-ik.
Tezzi-d ddurt, lḥedd-nni amcum yuweḍ-d.
Yiwen ur t-yebɣi imi lawan n faruq gar watmaten yedla-d.
Akli isuɛef Caɛban d twacult-is almi d taɣsert n tẓerrajt.
Din i ṭṭfen tamacint ara ten-yawin ɣer tmanaɣt Zzayer.
Yiwen ur yeṭṭif imeṭṭawen-is
Segmi ttrajun tamzuɣert ara d-yasen seg Bgayet, Meqqran yezga ɣef tgecrar n Wakli.
Yessuden-it akka d wakka, yuɣal ɣer baba-s, gma-s, ameddakel-is n dima.
Segmi i myuṭṭafen akken ugin ad myesserrḥen, netta tamacint tendeh-d.

Aṭas n tlufa i d-yernan.
Yal yiwen anda yerra.

Amihi yezga d agmawan.

Ad as-yini i wayeḍ ḥemmleɣ-k neɣ ḥemmleɣ-kem.
Yidir, d netta i d argaz, d netta i ilaqen ad yezwir.
Ad iqerreḍ ɣef yiman-is ayen tessen yagi.
Teqqim akken.
Asniles n temsirin n wahil aɣurbiz n uswir wis ukkuẓ n uɣerbaz alemmas itegg-it iman-is neɣ akked yimeddukal-is n dima, Qadar, Sliman Rabaḥ.
Ternuḍ-d tikwal Ṭawes ɣur-sen.
Yeɛya, yengef, azal n snat tsaɛtin netta yettazzal.
Ɛellawa mačči d anaddal yettnadin ad yuɣal d alɣuɣ deg tazzla n Marathon.
Mačči d win yettazzalen akken ad isenqes seg taẓeyt-is acku Ɛellawa ɣur-s tafekka rqiqen ikeɛcen am umesmar.
Deg tiddi-ines d alemmas n yirgazen.
Deg tlemmast n wudem-is aglayan tezga tyuga tazurant n cclaɣem iberkanen.
Acebbub-is diɣ d aberkan, yellufḍa yerna yekerṭeṭṭi, ad s-tiniḍ laɛmar tekka deg-s temceḍt.
Ɣas ma tettban-d tfekka-s d tuḥqirt maca ɣur-s tazmert yessewhamen.
D tin i tittaǧǧan ixeddem ayen iwimi ur yezmir kra yekka wass.
Tazmert-is yettliwi-tt s wadda n tazzla imi yezga dima d amerwal.
Yerna-as učči i d-ittḥewwiṣ sya u sya.
Yercel abrid amezwaru d yiwet tmeṭṭut i yessnen akken i ilaq.
Ur itett ara Tom aḥelluf.
Suddsen iman-nsen segmi bdan asniles akken d agraw.
Cerḍen yiwen n ussemres n wakud, akken ma llan qudren-t.
Gren-d deg-s ula d imezlan yebnan ɣef turart, adelleg neɣ tiɣimit maḍi.
Daɣ netta ɣas ma xeddmen aṭas ur ttḥulfun ara i ɛeyyu.
Netta i t-iceɣben akken i ilaq d tamsalt-a n tmaziɣt neɣ n teqbaylit.
Win yedlan ɣer yizmamen-is ad ten-yaf wa izeggen, wayeḍ iɛedda akkin i uzgen.
Iḥemmel-itt mi i t-tḥemmel.
Yefreḥ nezzeh mi i as-tt-idyefka Rebbi d yaya-s.
Iḥemmel-itt mi t-tesselmad deg teqbaylit imi yeḥsa d akken ulac win yeṭṭfen deg teqbaylit-is deg tal tamsalt am yaya-s Mennun.
Dɣa ayen yettɣimi yid-s yugar ayen yettɣimi d yemma-s akked baba-s.
I teɣra ala tin i d-teṭṭeḍ ɣer yemma-s.
Teḥmmel nezzeh ad teddu d wid neɣ tid yessnen i wawal n teqbaylit.
Yeẓra ma yuweḍ leɛfu n Rebbi umdan ameqqran am wakken d kra n temkarḍit i yerɣan.
Tikwal, yettaf-itt d lemziyya mi yettɣimi kan deg uxxam imi win i as-yettakken afus n tallalt deg umahil i t-icebɣen d yaya-s Mennun.
Taselmadt-is tamezwarut n teqbaylit d yaya-s Mennun.
Ass-a tebɣa ad tehder d Yidir ɣef sin n yimedyazen i tessen imi n lɛerc-is.
Mi ara d-tsuffeɣ s wawal iweznen ayen i tt-iḍurren tettaf iman-s.
Tettifsus, amzun tebra i kra n teɛkemt i tettbabba.
Yal anaw n tsekla deg uzmam iman-is.
Dɣa deg uzmam-a n tmucuha, yura yiwen n uḍris yerra-t am tazwart, azwel i as-yefka d « Awal ɣef tmucuha »
Ad d-nsekfel skenjbir.
Ur ttuɣaleɣ ara ad mmteɣ seg llaẓ.
Err-iyi-d ayen i ak-n-fkiɣ.
Err-iyi-d ayen i am-n-fkiɣ.
Rrem-iyi-d ayen i awen-n-fkiɣ.
Rremt-iyi-d ayen i awent-n-fkiɣ.
Yerra-iyi-d ayen i as-fkiɣ.
Yerra-aɣ-d ayen i as-nefka.
Yerra-awen-d ayen i as-tefkam.
Yerra-awent-d ayen i as-tefkamt.
Yerra-asen-d ayen i as-fkan.
Yerra-asent-d ayen i as-fkant.
Rran-iyi-d ayen i asen-fkiɣ.
Rran-aɣ-d ayen i asen-nefka.
Rran-awen-d ayen i asen-tefkam.
Rran-awent-d ayen i asen-tefkamt.
Rran-ak-d ayen i asen-tefkiḍ.
Rran-am-d ayen i asen-tefkiḍ.
Iwala-t i tikkelt taneggarut.
Efk-iyi lehna.
Ffɣemt-iyi sya.
Sortez-moi d'ici.
Ur ilaq ara ad sudneɣ Tom.
Ɣur-k zzher s tidet.
S teqbat n tmellalin i tekcem s axxam n Wakli n Wat Umalu akken ad asen-tesserbeḥ rrbeḥ n yidir-nsen ɣef ukayad i d-yuwi.
Deg uxxam ssawalen-as Dihya, Caɛban yeṭṭef deg wawal-is, ma deg lekwaɣeḍ tres Jeǧǧiga.
Tafekka-s telha kan i win akka yellan d nned-is.
Acebbub-is yeččur, ikerṭeṭṭi, iruḥ akk d tixutam.
I sin yid-sen yiwen n uɛekkaz i ten-yewwten, aɛekkaz n tiẓawalit.
Yal axxam ɣur-s ulamma yiwet n taɣaḍt, yal ayyur ttakken-as azal-is n lijara.
Sliman d Yidir terra-ten tmara ad ẓẓewren deg tezrawin-nsen ma bɣan ad refden tiwaculin-nsen.
Ad tent-id-suffɣen seg lḥif ideg llant.
Ɣef waya cwiṭ n ustehzi ur tesɛin.
Zgan ttemɛawanen gar-asen.
Akayad ara sɛeddin ini awin-t-id yerna s tezmilt igerrzen.
D asefru igerrzen a Yidir.
Tal tikkelt tettawiḍ-d amaynut deg tmedyezt-ik, wissen d asentel, wissen d talɣa n usefru, wissen d amawal i tessemraseḍ.
Maɛna akken yebɣu yili usefru-k, ittaɛǧab-iyi aṭas ad as-sleɣ.
Ḥemmleɣ ad iyi-isenqed walbaɛḍ akken ad ẓreɣ ma yesɛa cwiṭ n wazal wayen i d-snulfuyeɣ akka.
La ak-qqareɣ yella si Muḥend u Mḥend, telliḍ kečč.
Sliman iḥemmel ad iqesser maɛna yesṭeɛref s tidet s wayen yettaru Yidir.
Yidir, deg uɣerbaz-is yettɣimi-n din azal n wayyur uqbel ad d-yas ɣer Tewrirt.
Yettcedhi aṭas Tawrirt d yimawlan-is, yemma-s, baba-s d yaya-as.
Baba-s yettnaɣ d uɣrum yal ass i d-yettakk Rebbi.
Yectaq ad yesteɛfu.
Ula d tazmert-is tettaǧǧa-t cwiṭ cwiṭ.
Ad yeqqim kan ad tt-id-yawi deg ussu wissen ɣef wacḥal n wussan.
Yidir ur itett ara akk taggazt-is, ittakk-d aḥric deg-s i baba-s,
Aḥric-nni yugaren, s yis-s i d-yettaɣ ayen yesteḥq am d iselsa-s neɣ d imagraden iɣurbizen.
Ula d yemma-s ur temniɛ ara.
Ččan-tt yiẓeḍwan d unqac n tebḥirin anda i d-tettawi amur ameqqran n yizegza i tetten.
Ma d Nna Mennun meqqert, teggra-d kan i wawal aẓidan d ddeɛwat n lxir.
Yezri useggas yerna wayeḍ, Yidir yettawi-d ikayaden-is akken ma llan.
Yettɛedday ɣer uswir imineg.
Akka ula d Sliman, ɣas ma zgan tturaren ddabax i sin, tizrawin-nsen i d timezwura.
Mi ara d-awḍen yimuras, medden yellan am nutni, mi ifukk useggas aɣurbiz i ten-yettseddiɛen, tteffɣen anda ara sɛeddin imuras-nsen.
Wissen ɣef teftist n yilel Agrakal deg Tici neɣ deg Tegzirt neɣ deg udrar maḍi anda mazal tasmuḍi teqqim-d ur tesuhel ara ɣas ma deg tlemmast n ssmayem i nella.
Yidir d Sliman, d targit i ttargun imuras am wigi.
Ur ten-id-isaḥ ara yilel, ula d tiɣimit kan deg tejmaɛt tegdel fell-asen.
Yečča-ten yixeddim kanakken meẓẓiyit akken ad ɛiwnen imawlan-nsen ur nessaweḍ ara ad kfun iman-nsen.
Maɛna ɣas ma ḥsan deg yir n ddunit i zedren, ttafen-d dima amek ara d-ifriren s uqesser i ttqessiren, s taḍsa i ttaḍsan.
D irmad idelsanen neɣ ussnanen i teggen ma yugar-asen-d cwiṭ n wakud.
Amahil yezgan deg unebdu d tamegra n tuga neɣ n yirden akked temẓin ddaw n yiṭij ur nettqili.
Ixeddim-nniḍen i teggen d aliwi n ubennay imi lebni n yixxamen urǧin yeḥbis tikkelt.
Seg mi ara ffɣen tanezzayt alma yeɣli yiṭij i d-ttuɣalen s ixxamen-nsen.
Ula d imekli din i t-tetten.
ttawin yid-sen aɛwin.
Lmeḥna tettrebbi-d irgazen.
D tidet, akka i yella lḥal imi arrac-a ur ddiren ara tanuba-nsen.
llan d igerdan ufan-d iman-nsen d irgazen ɣef mraw d sa neɣ mraw d ṭam n yiseggasen deg tudert-nsen.
Maca akken qqaren : « Yiwen ur yeẓri anida i yella leslaḥ ? »
Ig Rebbi ɛetben nezzeh, ttarran iman-nsen amzun d addal n usmeẓwel i teggen.
Daɣ netta tifekkiwin-nsen ttnnernint gar wass d yiḍ.
Mi ara fakken ixeddim deg yiwen n umkan, imir-nni kan ad nadin anda-nniḍen.
Akka i as-yenna yiwet n tikkelt Sliman i Yidir mi sulin amahil ɣer yiwen : « Wissen ma tessneḍ Dda Crif n At Ḥemmu ?
Qesreɣ yid-s wissen d acu-t wass-nni, ddeqs n temɛayin d yinzan i iyi-d-yemla, nekk uriɣ-ten deg yizmamen-iw.
Maɛna xeddmeɣ akken dima d yiwen n umeddakel-iw. I as-rniɣ.
Anwa akka i d ameddakel-ik ? I iyi-d-yenna.
Abennay yella diɣ dinna.
Fiḥel ma tceṭṭneḍ iman-ik a Dda Crif. I as-yerra Yidir.
Tizziwin-nwen wissen anda i sɛeddayent imuras-nsent.
Kunwi tekkatem amek ad tessifsusem taɛkemt i ttɛebbin yimawlan-nwen.
Kemmlet akka, ala ayen ara yelhun ara ken-id-immagren ɣer sdat.
Bɣiɣ ad sweɣ aman.
Bɣiɣ ad dduɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad ččeɣ imekli.
Bɣiɣ ad ffɣeɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad ṭṭseɣ tura.
Bɣiɣ ad mmeslayeɣ yid-m.
Bɣiɣ ad urareɣ yid-m.
Melmi ara d-taseḍ ?
Melmi ara d-taseḍ ɣer Zzayer ?
Yebɣa ad iruḥ tura.
Tebɣa ad truḥ tura.
Tura i d-uɣaleɣ seg uɣerbaz.
Wagi d mmi.
Tagi d yelli.
Ḥemmleɣ tikli.
Ḥemmleɣ ad urareɣ.
Ḥemmleɣ ad qessreɣ.
Ḥemmleɣ ad ɣreɣ.
Ḥemmleɣ ad ɣreɣ idlisen.
Ḥemmleɣ ad urareɣ ddabax n uḍar.
Ččiɣ imensi-w.
Aql-i uḍneɣ.
Ur iyi-yuɣ ara.
Uḍneɣ ass-agi.
Ad ruḥeɣ azekka.
Ttarguɣ tafsut yal ass.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i sɛiɣ.
Ur swiɣ ara aman.
Ddiɣ deg ubrid.
Lliɣ ttazzaleɣ.
Amek i ttilin ?
Nadi-d fell-i.
Ini-as ḥemmleɣ-k.
Ini-asen ḥemmleɣ-tt.
Ad kem-rajuɣ berra.
Rujaɣ-kem, ur d-tusiḍ ara.
Awi-t-id yid-k.
Ufiɣ-t iḍelli.
Tura i yeffeɣ.
Qqim fell-ak !
Mi yekcem, yufa-t igen.
Ur yekcim, ur yeffiɣ.
Ur iqqim, ur iruḥ.
Ur d-yuri, ur d-iceyyeɛ kra neɣ kra.
Ur d-yuɣ, ur yessniz.
Ur yugi, ur yebɣi.
Tura tuwi-d fell-aneɣ ad d-nedhu deg yigemmir-nneɣ i aɣ-yettrajun.
Yidir yeqfel snat tmerwin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is deg unebdu-nni iɛeddan.
Ixeddim yebda-t deg tkebbanit tameqqrant n tmurt n Zzayer.
Talawit i ittaɣ tekkes ɣef tikkelt lḥif i d-yeɣlin ɣef twacult-is seg wasmi i yuḍen cwiṭ baba-s.
Akli diɣen testeqsa-d ɣur-s temɣer, tufa-t-id yeɛya cwiṭ.
Leɛtab yeɛteb seg wasmi i d-yekker, ikfel-d seg tezmert-is.
Maɛna tura yettkel, yella mmi-s, yeṭṭef amkan-is.
Yezmer ad yesteɛfu.
Ad yettqessir kra ara yekk wass deg tejmaɛt d yimɣaren imecṭaḥ am netta.
Issefqad kan tikwal ɣef tmurt-is.
Cabḥa mazal-itt teṭṭef cwiṭ.
Lecɣal n uxxam d wid n berra tqam-iten.
Mazal-itt teggar iẓeḍwan, txeddem tibḥirt.
Yidir yuɣal d argaz, d lawan ad as-tezwej.
Cwiṭ n tezmert i tt-yeǧǧan ad teḥrured yella.
Ma d leɛqel yeqqim akken yella, tferreẓ timsal akken i iwata.
Maɛna tella kra n teqcict i tessneḍ dagi deg Tewrirt tuklal Yidir-nneɣ ?
Qqim kan a Nna Mennun, tura tfukk tmerẓiwt n uqerruy n lexḍbegga ɣef yimawlan.
Tisutiwin n tura kksent lḥif.
Mačči am kemm d nekk, asmi irgazen i aɣ-yuɣen, ur ten-nessin almi nuweḍ s ixxamen-nsen.
Wanag wid n tura ttemyussanen d iseggasen uqbel ad ten-ssemlilen wassaɣen n tissulya.
Nga yiwet n temlilit s tuffra.
Yensa deg usensu iḍelli.
Ur ḥsiɣ ara ad aɣ-tt-id-ifek.
Akka i tt-id-nufa.
Akken i ɣran deg yiwen n uɣerbaz mi yella d anubi.
Le bon Dieu l'a dotée d'une beauté unique.
Ur teqqim deg sser, ur teqqim deg ccbaḥa, acekkuḥ awraɣ almi d ammas, taṭṭucin tizegzawin…
Ad ken-isellem Rebbi akken ma tellam.
Ferḥeɣ nezzeh imi i ken-id-ufiɣ ur ken-yuɣ wara.
Mi iwala imawlan-is, iteffeɣ s azrib.
Yettarra srid ɣer tejmaɛt anda ittaf kra n widak akk yessen.
Ama din ama deg ubrid, win d-immuger ad izul fell-as.
Tikwal ad ttemsteqsayen amek tga tezmert-nsen.
Mi d-yeḥḍer yimensi, yemma-s tettnawal-as-d akk ayen i iḥemmel ad t-yečč.
Yeqqim ɣef tqermet sdat n lmetred.
Cabḥa tebbeɣ tiflut daxel n teccuyt n ufexxar, teɛmer-d snat n tikal tagzert n ujenwi i d-temsel tameddit-nni.
Terna-as kra n tqeṭṭiḍin n tcedluḥt akken ad tiẓid lmerqa.
S tejɣelt n usɣar i yeɣli ɣef tegzert-nni maɛna ad yeqqim kan ad iruḥ deg-sent.
Afus yeṭṭef tijɣelt, iteddu ad d-iɛemmer yis-s tagzert akken ad tt-yawi s imi-s, maca ad teqqim din teẓẓa wissen acḥal n tesnin imi leɛqel-is wissen anda isewweq.
Tanila n tmuɣli-s terra metwal lmetred, maca ur yettwali la tagzert la aqedduḥ.
Yella wayen iɣef yettxemmim kra yekka wass, maca ar tura ur t-yenni i yiwen.
Yeǧǧa-t i yiman-is ad t-yeqber.
Ayen i t-yerḥan, yeṭṭef lbal-is d tuṭṭfa i d-yeṭṭef taseɣra n rrwaḥ ɣer lɛesker.
Ala win yewwten d win yeččan tiyita i yeḥsan, netta seg widak yeččan tiɣrit.
Yuki-d mi d-yuli wass.
Yuɣ-d izimer.
Yettu iman-is.
Ur ččin, ur swin, iḍelli.
Yugad.
Theyyaḍ iman-ik ad tgeḍ aya ?
Tettban-d tenneɣna.
Deg lehna, ad d-yefk kan Rebbi tazmert d teɣzi n leɛmer.
Usiɣ-d, tamezwarut bɣiɣ ad kem-waliɣ imi kem-jmeɣ lufan ad twaliḍ amek.
Tis snat, uwiɣ-d yiwen n yisalli mačči ur issefraḥ ara maɛna yeḥsab-iyi Rebbi d yiwen n wakud i yettruḥun kan deg rrayeɛ i umdan.
Lxir ncallah !
D acu-t diɣen tura wagi ?
D taseɣra n rrwaḥ ɣer lɛesker i d-ṭṭfeɣ ussan-agi yezrin.
Ɣer wanda akka ara k-aznen ?
Deg temdint n Tinduf ara sɛeddiɣ sḍis n wayyuren imenza, d tawala n tannant taɛsekrit.
Maɛna terra-aɣ tmara, wa d alas aɣelnaw yerzan akk ilmeẓyen yellan d nned-ik.
Ad kkreɣ ad ruḥeɣ, ugadeɣ ad xedmen aɣilif deg uxxam.
D mm ucebbub awraɣ i tesɛeddaḍ tameddit-ik akken ma tella.
Lɛeslam-k a Yidir ! Anda akka i terriḍ kra tekka tmeddit n wass-a ?
D yemma-s i t-id-immugren ɣer tewwurt n ufrag.
Ur as-yuki ara akk i ubrid.
Yiwet n teswiɛt yufa-d iman-is deg taddart-is Tawrirt.
Yekka s tejmaɛt.
Ur yufi ula yiwen din.
Yerra srid s axxam-nsen.
Ulac d acu i am-ittruḥun a stut n yemma.
Qreb-d kan ay argaz, aql-i deg uxxam n lwacul nekk d yaya-k.
Kecmen netta d yemma-s.
Qqimen ɣef ugertil.
Qublen Akli d Nna Mennun.
Mselxir a yaya ! Mselxir a baba !
Mselxir a mmi ! I as-nnan i sin ɣef tikkelt.
Uɣeɣ-d taqerɛet n waman.
Yuɣ-d taqerɛet n waman.
Tuɣ-d taqerɛet n waman.
Nuɣ-d taqerɛet n waman.
Uɣen-d taqerɛet n waman.
Yura tabrat i tin i iḥemmel.
Aru tafyirt ɣef tfelwit.
Aru isem-ik ɣef usebter amezaru n walug-ik.
Mel-iyi-d melmi i tluleḍ.
Ini-iyi-d anda i tluleḍ ?
Anda i tzedɣeḍ akka ?
Yal imalas rezzuɣ ɣer ssuq.
Anwa ur neḥmmil ara ad yurar ddabax n uḍar ?
Ssneɣ anda i tzedɣeḍ.
Caɛban meḥsub d tizzya n wakli i t-yugaren s kra n wayyuren kan.
Deg tbeddi d alemmas, tafekka-s telha kan.
Udem-is d aččuran yezga yennecraḥ dima.
Aksum-is d aras, acebbub-is d aberkan am rric n tgerfa.
Allen-is d tberkanin, d timeqqranin.
Anzaren-is ɣas meqqrit cwiṭ qeɛden.
Nnig ucenfir ufella arqaqan ttbanen-d kra n wanẓaden n cclaɣem.
Imi-s amecṭuḥ amzun yettheggi-d kan iman-is i taḍsa.
Akli yufa ameddakel-is Caɛban yeqqim ɣef yiwen n udekkan n berra isenden ɣer lḥiḍ n tama n umalu n tejmaɛt.
Din i yessummuc iṭij mi qrib ad yeɣli simira ad yaweḍ Wakli.
Akken i d-kkren netta d Wakli, uraren, nnuɣen, undin tixeftin i yimerga, ɣran cwiṭ deg yiwen n uɣerbaz, deg yiwet n tgida i ttɣimin.
Tawacult n At Waquj, yeɛni tin n Caɛban, akked twacult n At Umalu, tin n Wakli n yiwen n udrum.
Teḥbes tmasragt, ilaq-as idɣaɣen imaynuten.
Daɣ netta Akli d Caɛban yefka-asen yiwet n tezmert tgerrez ɣas ma deg temẓi-nsen ur ččin ara ad rwun.
Maɛna ma yekkes-as Rebbi i yiwen kra, kkes aɣilif, ad as-t-id-yeɣrem s tama-nniḍen.
Ssebba tameqqrant i d-ufan d abɛad i yebɛed uɣerbaz ɣef taddart ternuḍ-as ulac ttawilat n usiweḍ.
Ula d timezduɣin-nsen mqarabent.
Tezgiḍ dima d amḥadri.
Ahat d ayen yellan akka gar-asen i ten-isemlalen yerna d nned.
Ḥebsen zik tizrawin-nsen i sin yid-sen imi imawlan-nsen steḥqen-ten ad d-fken ifassen-nsen ad ten-ɛiwnen deg usasi n temɛict yewɛren di lawan-nni ama s tkessawt n lmal, alqaḍ n uzemmur d wayen akk iwimi zemren.
Ɣran sin neɣ kraḍ n yiseggasen, urɛad uwḍen ad arun neɣ ad d-ɣren tabrat, sṭaxren-ten-id yimawlan-nsen.
Turart-a qqaren-as “Aqedduḥ n yimensi”.
Din i yeṭṭef asakal-nniḍen ara t-yessiwḍen alma d tamdint n Tinduf.
Wellhen-asen anda ara rren.
Tuwi-d ɣef yal yiwen ad yissin ilugan n tikli deg lkazirna, amek i ilaq ad yeddu userdas deg tudert-is tamaynut.
Yeswa lqahwa-s n tnezzayt.
Yuki-d zik uqcic.
Ad d-yaweḍ iḍ-a.
Skaddbeɣ-as i Tom.
Ttarguɣ yal iḍ.
Yeffer deffir tewwurt.
Yekcem s axxam.
Yusa-d mi akken i truḥeḍ.
Yeffeɣ-d seg tmesgida.
Zik i d-yekcem s axxam.
Tafaska-m d tin n twacult-im d tamerbuḥt.
Tafaska-nwent d tin n twacult-nwent d tamerbuḥt.
Tafaska-nwen d tin n twacult-nwen d tameggazt.
Tafaska-nwent d tin n twacult-nwent d tameggazt.
Tafaska-nwen d tin n twacult-nwen d tamerbuḥt.
Ttɛasan-ten s ddaw n tiṭ.
Ixdem-d tamussni diɣen d yiwen n yilemẓi n Yilizi, d Amuhar, d Amaziɣ am netta.
Myeɛqalen yidammen i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nsen ɣas ma mbaɛadent tmura-nsen deg Tmurt n Tmazɣa tageɛmirt.
. Ula d kra n yilmeẓyen, d iserdasen am nutni, d iɛerbawalen, ṭallayen-d ɣur-sen s yir lxeẓra.
Ula d kra n yilmeẓyen, d iserdasen am nutni, d iɛerbawalen, ṭallayen-d ɣur-sen s yir lxeẓra.
Akken yeqqar wanzi-nni : « S wayen i tettagadeḍ ara temmteḍ ».
Akken yebɣu iḥuder yiwen, iɛuss iman-is akken i ilaq, tikkelt kan ad d-yaf iman-is ɛedda fell-as uzaylal.
Ad yettu iman-is.
Ayen iɣef ur yebni ara akk ad d-yeḍru yid-s.
Yeḍra-d wayen i d-yeḍran d acu-t wass-nni.
Yiwen n userdas yufa yiwet n tferkit, yezmer lḥal i Yidir iwimi truḥ.
Tura s kra n yisekkilen ur yegzi ara akk.
Mačči d isekkilen aɛraben, mačči d isekkilen ilaṭiniyen i yessen.
Mi iwala asekkil «ⵣ», yenna deg wul-is : « Wacnu hadi lferciṭa ? »
Ur inuda ara akk ad yefhem maca yeḥsa taferkit-nni seg widak-nni ur yettawi ara deg wul-is.
Dɣa din din yuwi-tt i uqebḍan.
Aɛsekri aɣella, iṭall akken i ilaq tawriqt-nni, yeffes zelmeḍ, zelmeḍ yeffes, d asawen, d agessar, iqleb-itt acḥal d abrid.
Ad d-iɣer ayen yuran fell-as, ur yessin ara, maca ula d netta yeɛqel kan asekkil-nni ⵣ, ur yeḥsi ara azal-is d « Z », yecfa kan ɣef talɣa-s i d-yettmamagar yura ɣef kra n yiɣraben deg tmanaɣt.
Yeḥsa d tira n tmaziɣt.
Win ur nessin ara iḍelli-s neɣ ur yettnadi ara ad t-yissin amek i tebɣiḍ ad yelhu uzekka-s.
Amezruy-nneɣ nerra fell-as timedlin, nettseggiḥ s wayeḍ ur nelli d ayla-nneɣ.
Aqebḍan ur yeḥsi ara ahat d tifinaɣ i d tira tamezwarut i d-yennulfan deg umaḍal akken ma yella.
Lǧerra-s ha-tt-an anda tebɣuḍ tiliḍ deg wakal n Tmazɣa.
Neqcen-tt yimezwura-nneɣ ɣef yidɣaɣen ladɣa deg tneẓruft.
Neḥmmel ad necnu.
Yuɣal ur icennu ara akk.
Tecna ɣef tmurt-is.
Yessen ad yecnu akken i ilaq.
Zrin ɛecrin n wussan n uɛaqeb n Yidir.
Yeffeɣ-d seg usekraf, yettban-d yeḍɛef cwiṭ.
Tamart-is i d-yegman ddeqs, terra-t amzun d wayeḍ imi yennum yettseṭṭil-itt meḥsub yal ass.
D imeddukal-is Maǧid akked Ufulkay i t-immugren, netta immuger-iten-id s ucmumeḥ sdat n waṭas n yiserdasen, imecṭaḥ akked wid iwimi yuli usellun.
Iɣellaten n lkazirna ṭallayen-d ɣer yidir d yimeddukal-is s yir tiṭ.
Kra dagi akk acimi ur llin ara am nutni.
Acimi ur ttmeslayen ara am nutni ?
Acimi ur ttxemmimen ara am nutni.
Ilaq ad ttun iman-nsen, ad ssneslen am uzrem, ad ǧǧen kra n wayen i ten-yettarran akken llan ma ulac diri-ten.
Netta lufan fehmen, yal ass i d-ittakk Rebbi ad ten-snemmiren imi ar ass-a ṭṭfen deg tjadit-nsen.
Ṭṭfen deg wansayen-nsen.
Ṭṭfen deg tmeslayt-nsen.
Ṭṭfen s yiwen n wawal, deg timuzɣa-nsen.
Tawala n tannant taɛsekrit tettnejbad, tugi ad tekfu akk.
Tuweḍ ɣer wayyur-is wis ukkuẓ.
Yidir yuzen snat n tebratin.
Yiwet i baba-s, yenna-as deg-s d lawan ad truḥem s axxam n Si Ɛellawa n At Ccurafa ad iyi-d-txeḍbem Ṭawes.
Tis snat yura-tt i tsekkurt-is i icedha aṭas aṭas.
Yenna-as ass n flan ad n-asen yimawlan-iw ɣur-wen ad ssutren deg baba-m ad d-yefk yelli-s Ṭawes i mmi-tsen i tessneḍ.
Yettawi-kem deg wul-is anda yebɣu yinig, win iwimi qqaren Yidir.
Yerna-as asefru-nni i yura fell-as mi mazal-it yella deg usekraf.
Akli mi d-yeṭṭef tabrat n mmi-s, yenna i tmeṭṭut-is d yemma-s : “Kkremt ad telsemt tissebbaḍin-nkent ad terzumt ɣer Tzerrajt lḥedd i d-iteddun, d ass n usgunfu, ulac ixeddim i yinuwar am Si Ɛellawa.
S axxam-nsen ara terremt akken ad d-nexḍeb yelli-tsen Ṭawes i Yidir-nneɣ.
D nekk ara kent-yawin.
Ig Rebbi ad aɣ-ddun deg lebɣi yimrabḍen n At Ccurafa.
Ad ǧǧen ad idiren akken sin n yimdanen yemsebɣan s tidet.
Tawacult n At Umalu, tekker-d zik mi d-yuweḍ wass n lḥedd.
Tebda-d lgarra tesxicliw-d maca yugar-itt yiṭij.
Akka i d ussan n taggara n wayyur n mayyu.
Akken neqqar : « Iṭij d lgerra, tameɣra n wuccen telha » mi ara mlilent snat n tlufa d tinemgalin…
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-uwiɣ yid-i.
Nniɣ-as i Tom ad nerzef kra n yimalasen ɣer Usṭralya.
Teḍra yid-s amzun yedderwec deg wakken yeḥzen.
As-d ɣur-i.
Ẓriɣ ixdem-itt Tom imalas yezrin.
Ass-agi d azɣal.
Tewwet lgerra idelli.
Ttrebbin lmal.
Xeddmen tafellaḥt.
Llan wid yettinigen ɣer tmurt n Fransa.
Ulac axxam ur nesɛi ara ulamma yiwet n taɣaḍt i tuẓẓga n uyefki.
Tameṭṭut timnifrit yettrebbin lṭufan, ma yella iruḥ-as uyefki ur as-d-ittnuj ara, tettakk i mmi-s akken ad yimɣur, ayefki n taɣaḍt.
Acemma n uḥulfu-s, ama d lferḥ ama d lqerḥ, ur t-id-yesskan ad t-walin medden.
Iɣersiwen yezdin addaynin d ulli, izamaren, taɣaḍt d yiɣiden d tɣidaḍ ma turew, aɣyul d tyuga n yizgaren deg kra n yixxamen kan ur nxuss.
Aɣyul d yiwen n uɣersiw assebri, segmi ara d-yekker alamma yemmut netta d aɛebbi.
Iberdan ḍeyqen, ssawnen, ala zzayla-a i itewlen ad tɛeddi syin akken ad tessiweḍ ayen ara as-ɛebbin deg tal tamsalt, ladɣa tin n lebni n yixxamen.
Akli, argaz n Cabḥa mazal-it d ilemẓi.
Deg tiddi d alemmas n yirgazen.
Seg cwiṭ n sser, ur t-iɣull ara Rebbi.
Yefka-as azal-is swayes ara yeččar tiṭ i tmeṭṭut-is ur t-nessin ara almi i tt-yuɣ tedda-d d tislit s axxam-is, a-t-a iɛedda useggas tura.
Axxam n twacult n At Umalu yezga-d d amezwaru ɣef tama tayeffust n ubrid i issekcamen ɣer taddart n Tewrirt.
Tawrirt ur meqqert ara, taxlijt tɛedda-as, taddart ur tuwiḍ ara, d talemmast n tudrin.
Ansa i as-d-tekkiḍ d asawen.
Tebna ɣef tqacuct n yiwet n tiɣilt tamecṭuḥt.
Ɣef waya i as-fkan yimezdaɣ imezwura isem-a n Tawrirt.
Wa isenned ɣef wayeḍ.
I ten-yebḍan ɣef sin n yiḥricen d azrib alemmas yettawin srid ɣer tejmaɛt yellan deg tama meḥsub teqernit n taddart n Tewrirt.
Din i ttnejmaɛen yimezdaɣ n taddart ma tella kra n temsalt i ten-iceɣben ad tt-frun s wawal i d-yettilin gar-asen tal tikkelt mi ara qqimen deg lḥeqq.
Ɣef tama n umalu i d-yettqabalen d tala n taddart.
Tsenned ɣef yiwen n uẓru d ameqqran yuɣalen d yiwen uɣrab n tesqif i as-bnan.
Abrid yettawin ɣur-s yesgesser cwiṭ mi ara d-tekkeḍ syin.
Ma ɣef tama n usammer d yiwen n uxxam d ahrawan i rran at taddart d lǧamaɛ.
Lǧamaɛ n taddart n Tewrirt yesɛa sdat-s yiwen n ubraḥ d ameẓẓyan.
Fergen-t-id ukkuẓ n leswar.
Deg tlemmast n win yessuffuɣen s abrid i tella tewwurt n usɣar n ukerruc mm sin n lelwaḥ.
Syin i d-keččmen diɣ i teffɣen yimẓulla.
Win iḍefren tanila n ugafa ad yerr srid s adrar anda i ttawin yimeksawen n taddart lmal-nsen ad ikes.
Akal i d-yezzin i taddart d tiferkiwin n yimezdaɣ-is.
Deg-s nezmer ad naf ddeqs n tewsatin n yisekla.
Tuget deg-sen d tizemmrin yuwin amur ameqqran.
Syin akkin d tineqlin akked tjunan.
Ma d isekla n Ulmu d uslen i d-yettakken leɛlef i lmal, ẓẓan ɣef leryuf n yiɣewdan deg umkan n yinijel i d-imeqqin anda i as-yehwa.
Tuɣal tikli n Sami tbeddel.
Tom, d netta i d amezwru.
Cwiṭ kan ad tt-issefreḥ neɣ ad tt-isneɣni, wissen kan amek ara d-yas.
Yezga yewḥel gar-asen, ala sin ar kraḍ n yisurifen i yezmer ad ten-iger.
Ameḥbus yessaram ad d-yeffeɣ seg ṭṭiq yella ɣer listaɛ akken ad icali anda yebɣu yawi-t uḍar-is.
Ma d win akken iwimi yeḍyeq wul-is yettnadi ula d netta ad yiwsiɛ lxaṭer-is.
Ad yeldi tadimt n tesraft taxejḍant n wul-is akken ad as-yesbuḥru wuzwu asemmaḍ ara t-id-yesdduqqsen seg tnafa taɣezzfant, tuḍyiqt, ideg yezder.
Mi d-yuweḍ ɣer tewwurt n ufrag n uxxam-is, yesṭebṭeb sin n yiberdan.
Iruja cwiṭ yerna yesṭebṭeb kraḍet n tikal ɣef lluḥ n tewwurt-is n usɣar n ukerruc.
D tameṭṭut-is i as-d-yeldin.
Tsellem fell-as, izger-d amnar n tewwurt, yečča-tt s wallen.
Iwala mačči d Cabḥa-nni i yennumen teskan-d udem yennecraḥen, win i iḥemmel ad iẓer.
Yerra-as sslam, awal ur as-t-yerni, iwwet iɛedda.
Yufa yemma-s teqqim ɣef ulemsir i d-tessa deg teɣmert ufella n ufrag.
Izenzaren n yiṭij uɣen-d akk tama-nni.
Ɣef yiri-s tres yiwet n tirect n taduṭ tazeddgant.
Teṭṭef gar yifassen-is sin n yiqerdacen ttruḥun ttuɣalen.
Taduṭ yellan tekmec, ttarran-tt tsennanin n uqerdac teḍleɣ, tseggem, teddukel, tettuɣal d tikulal tesrusu Nna Mennun ta ɣef tayeḍ.
D tigi i tellmen d ifassen n uḍraf.
Azul a yemma ! I as-yenna Wakli.
Azul a Mmi ! Wissen ma tuɣeḍ-iyi-d ayen iɣef nehder iḍelli ? I as-d-terra Nna Mennun.
Uwiɣ-am-d amuri, aclili azenǧari ma d anili ifukk-as.
Yenna-iyi-d bab n tḥanut n yiɛeqqaren, imalas i d-iteddun ad d-yawi akk initen gar-asen anili.
Ad ak-ikkes Rebbi aɣilif. Tanemmirt a mmi.
Ur ttɛṭṭileɣ ara ad greɣ aẓeṭṭa.
Ur ilaq ara ad d-yaf umenzu n yennayer, tawwurt n useggas amaynut n YImaziɣen, aẓeṭṭa deg tesga.
Mennun yemma-s n Wakli neɣ Nna Mennun akken akk i as-ssawalen, d yiwet n tmeṭṭut yeǧǧlen zik.
Argaz-is yemmut d aserdas deg wadar afransis yennuɣen mgal Alman deg ttrad amaḍlan wis sin.
Ur tuwiḍ ara snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is mi tt-id-yuweḍ yisalli ur nessefraḥ, yemmut Wakli n At Umalu deg ugni n yiseɣ.
Yeǧǧa-tt-id s uɛebbuḍ n Wakli.
Iruḥ kanakken ur yessin mmi-s, ur yerwi tudert.
Terna kra n wussan kan deffir n tmettant-is terba-d.
D tin i d tadist-is tamezwarut,d tin i d taneggarut imi ur tɛawed ara tissulya.
Teqqim ɣef mmi-s i d-teskker s lqella u lɛella.
Mazal ar tura ur ten-sɛiɣ.
Ɣur-neɣ tamlellit n tmettant akked d wanuz.
Yeǧǧa Wakli mmi-s yettmurud, yesqelɛud.
Akken kan i yebda ineṭṭeq-d kra n wawalen am mama i yemma, ba i baba, ya i yaya.
Yerra s uqerruy-is ɣer unẓul n tmurt, ɣer tneẓruft.
Wissen kan melmi ara n-bedden yinexḍaben ara n-azneɣ ɣef umnar n tewwurt-nwen.
Ad kem-iyi-d-xeḍben.
Ass-nni, yemma-m ur d-tḥeččem ara yaya Xuxa d Yemma Mennun.
D nutenti ara n-yasen.
Ma yella ugin dayen ur ssarameɣ ara akk.
Ssebba theyya-d, mazal ur zwijent ara Zwina n Dehbiya.
Deɛɛuɣ kra yekka wass ad afent i snat yid-sent nnsib-nsent.
Ad kksent akkin sdat-i.
Zgant-aɣ-d d ugur i Lwiza d nekk.
Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, kkes aɣilif ma yella yeɛkes zzher-iw.
Yugi ad tezdiḍ tudert-im yid-i.
Ur ḥsiɣ ara akk ad bḍuɣ tayla-w d tmeṭṭut-nniḍen.
Ɣer asefru-a ad twaliḍ d acu i iyi-texdem tayri-m.
Tayri-w isem-is Lwiza.
S times-is ul-iw yezza.
Wissen ma ad tt-tebɣu twenza ?
Ad nekrez am tyuga n tkerza.
Ddaw n yiwen n uzaglu, ad nezdi ass-a d uzekka.
Mačči kan mi d-kkren deg yiwen n uxxam, axxam n Wakli ameqqran yemmuten deg wakal n Taruft deg ṭṭrad amaḍlan wis sin.
D ṭṭrad amaḍlan i tt-iɣurren seg-s.
Nna Mennun tuɣal d nettat i d kullec deg uxxam, d nettat i d tameṭṭut, d nettat i d argaz.
Tessen melmi d wanwa ad d-tesken iman-is d argaz neɣ ad teqqim d tameṭtut.
Ɣef wayen yerzan ttrebga n mmi-s Akli d ugujil Caɛban, d nettat i ten-id-isekren.
Teqqar-asen i warraw-is d akken deg ddunit-nneɣ nettmmagar-d dima sin n yiberdan, ad tafeḍ yiwen isuffuɣ srid ɣer wayen yelhan ma d wayeḍ ɣer wayen n diri.
D aya i tekkat Nna Mennun ad t-teẓẓu deg wallaɣ-nsen, tessaram ad yaɣ, ad yimɣur sya ɣer sdat.
Ma d ayen tekkat amek ara d-yeffeɣ ma yella yekcem cwiṭ, seg wallaɣ-nsen neɣ urɛad yekcim d leqbaḥa, tuzert n wudem, tukarḍa, lehmum, iniɣ deg ubrid, akcam ɣer wayla n medden…
Daɣ netta mi uɣalen d inubiyen, ɣur-sen deg leɛmer gar 13 d 15 n yiseggasen, yufa-ten-id lḥal deg ṭṭrad n tsellullit taɣelnawt n Zzayer.
Amzun theyya-ten-id Nna Mannun i wayen ara xedmen deg lgirra-a.
Nebda-tt s wulac.
Yufa iman-is.
Ur yufi ara iman-is.
Urǧin yufi iman-i.
Yuɣal sami ɣer gma-s ameẓẓyan.
Anda teddiḍ deg ddunit tella telwit.
Telzem-iyi tkeffart seg wass-a d afella ur tettuɣalem ad tessiwḍem kra s adrar ala leɣbar d uɛwin-nwen.
Deg tleqqaɛt n ucwari, tres yiwet n tmeẓẓyant d tsenduqt n yikartucen, ttlent deg yiwen n ubeḥnuq.
D imsebblen n taddart i uznen tayemmust-a i yimjuhad.
Qrib i tegla yis-wen d yis-neɣ.
Cwi kan iḥudd Rebbi.
Asmi ara tedlu Lwiza ɣer tekwat n tayri, gar yiẓra n uɣalad deffir n tẓebbujt taɛessast, ad taf tabrat i tettraju, itteffeɣ-itt leɛqel, tekkat deg wul-is tmeɣra.
Ass-nni, ḥseb-it d yiwen n wass yeččuren d taḍsa.
Cwiṭ n ukras n unyir ur yettili.
Ad d-tger lamana n wul-is deg yiciwi-is tama n wul-is.
Ad taweḍ kan s axxam, ad tessers asagem deg tesga, ad tekcem yiwet n texxamt.
Ama d yemma-s, ama d yessetma-s, dehcent akk deg-s.
Yiwet deg-sent ur teḥsi s wassaɣ n taywalt yellan gar-as d Caɛban.
Nwant lehdur i d-teqqar Lwiza d lehdur-is.
Meɛna Lwiza, zuxx ur t-tessin ara, tettqadar akken i ilaq yessetma-s i wimi tessawal i snat yid-sent Nnana.
Mi ara tfakk taɣuri n tebrat-is din din i tettaru tiritit i win tessaram ad yili d argaz-is imi d netta kan i tebɣa.
D tissit i ten-tesseɣ, lemdeɣ-ten am waman.
D awalen yeddan d lxaṭer-iw d lebɣi n wul-iw.
Ih ḥemmleɣ nezzeh ad sleɣ i tmedyezt-ik.
Meɛna yif-it lufan i nettidir akken, ulac d acu i ssarameɣ am waya.
Lufan ad teẓreḍ d acu i d-iḍerrun skudmal akud iteddu, ḥulfaɣ am wakken yemma tbeddel cwiṭ tikli-s.
Ula d nekk s tama-w, ur tt-ǧǧiɣ ara s tuzzmiwin imi tesmuzgut kan i yiman-is.
Mi ara as-mmeslayeɣ fell-anteɣ, nekk d yessetma, ula d Rebbi iqelleb kra n tlufa am umseḍfar n leɛyudat.
Mačči d lɛid tameẓẓyant i d-izewwiren lɛid tameqqrant ?
Ulac fell-as ma ddiɣ nekk d tislit d tamezwarut imi ɣur-i meḥsub i d-ttasen yinexḍaben.
Kemm tettarraḍ deg-sen.
Ḥemmleɣ ad cebbḥeɣ taxxamt-iw s yijeǧǧigen.
Ur lliɣ d tameṭṭut.
Nekk d aqcic.
Nekk mačči d taqcict.
Tturaren warrac d teqcicun akken.
Mi twala ulac ayen-nniḍen ara teg simira ad d-yaweḍ lawan n uheyyi n yimekli, truḥ teqqim ɣef yiri n temɣart-is yettkemmilen aqerdec n taduṭ.
A-t-an teddiḍ a tinnat ddeqs deg uqerdec n taduṭ-im.
Aql-akem tettwaliḍ, yerna mačči aṭas-aya i bdiɣ aqerdec.
Texdem ayen i as-d-tenna, teqqim-d ɣef ugertil, teẓẓel i yidarren-is, tebda tettqerdic taduṭ i tesseččay i uqerdac-nni yettaṭṭafen tama wadda.
Taklalt tamezwarut i d-tekkes seg uqerdac tseggem.
Tikulal i d-terna wenɛent akken ma llant.
Ziɣ tẓẓewreḍ aṭas a tinnat.
Ahat d yemma-m i am-islemden aya ?
Cabḥa tɛedda ad tniwel ma d tamɣart-is tettkemmil aqerdec n taduṭ-is.
Ma teɛya kan deg uqerdec d yiɣimi, ad tbedd.
Ad d-terfed tawḍuft n taduṭ ad tt-teqqen ɣer truka ara terr ddaw n teɣruḍt-is, ad d-teskuṭṭef seg tewḍuft cwiṭ n taduṭ ara tebren ɣef yeẓdi amecṭuḥ, imir-nni ad tebdu tulma n yided swayes ara tger aẓeṭṭa-s.
Nna Mennun tefka-as mraw n tmellalin n tyuzaḍ-is, tuwi-tent d tarzeft i yemma-s.
Axxam n yiḍulan n Wakli yezga-d ɣef kra n tmaḍ n lmitrat uqbel ad tkecmeḍ taddart n Yiɣil ur nebɛid ara aṭas ɣef Tewrirt.
uwḍen deg sin yid-sen, kecmen s axxam.
Deg ufrag ddaw n teɛrict n tejnant i d-ssan agertil, fell-as i qqimen, senden ɣef lḥiḍ, Nna Ǧuhra d urgaz-is Dda Ḥmed.
Walan-ten-id kan kkren-d.
Akli isuden-iten nnuba nnuba deg uqerruy ma d Cabḥa, yelli-tsen i cedhan aṭas ḥencen-tt almi alaḥal ad tt-skuffren.
« Ɛeslam-nwen ! ɛeslam-nwen ! I nnan i sin ɣef yiwen n ubrid.
Ad ken-isellem Rebbi. I asen-yerra Wakli.
D ayen tettuḍ taddart-im n Yiɣil, tbeddleḍ-tt s Tewrirt a Cabḥa. I tenna yemma-s.
I kečč ay Akli, yemma-k, ur ken-yuɣ wara ?
Labas ma tkemmel akka. Testeqsay-d fell-awen aṭas aṭas.
-Akken tebɣiḍ, meɛna afenǧal n lqahwa ad t-tesweḍ akken ur as-teqqareḍ ara i yemma-k iḍulan-iw ur iyi-d-ɛriḍen ara ula ɣer ufenǧal n lqahwa.
Cwiṭ n lqahwa ur d-qqareɣ ara ala.
Akli yeswa lqahwa, iqesser d yiḍulan-is, yeǧǧa-n Cabḥa din ɣer yemma-s d baba-s ma d netta yuɣal-d ɣer Tewrirt.
Yekka s tejmaɛt yufa din Caɛban, kemmlen akken abrid almi d axxam.
D Nna Mennun i ten-yettrajun ad d-kecmen i sin yid-sen.
Mselxir a yemma. I as-nnan i sin yid-sen ɣef tikkelt.
Timlilit deg ugadez.
Tura i d-ffɣeɣ seg uɣerbaz.
Azekka, ad t-waliɣ.
Iḍelli i t-walaɣ.
Nwala asaru-nni akken.
Yeqqim ɣef udekkan sdat n tgida tamecṭuḥt, irfed-d imru yerna-d tiferkit i d-isseɣres seg walug-is aɣurbiz aqbur, imir-nni yebda tira.
Yemma Mennun d yemma-s n Cabḥa, Nna Ǧuhra, ad n-asent s axxam-nwen.
Ad nedɛu ɣer Rebbi ad d-yehdu yemma-m.
Ad tt-yerr d tin ibelhen.
D tin ara d-yerren s wawal aẓidan i tid ara n-yasen ad kem-iyi-d-xeḍben.
Ad tfakk fell-i targit.
Ad idireɣ yid-m deg tilawt.
Yal ass ad tettiliḍ yid-i nekk yid-m.
Dda Ɛacur ttekleɣ fell-as, ala beqqu ara yebɣu.
Kukraɣ kan cwiṭ yemma-m, meɛna akken d-teqqareɣ tbeddel, mačči d tin akken yesraran.
Ar ass-nni a Lwiza i ḥemmleɣ am leɛmer-iw.
Yeẓra akka imira i d-tettagem deg tala.
Mi ara d-tebren s axxam ad d-tekk deffir n uɛessas n taddart, ad tsefqed s aɣalad ad taf din lamana i teggar deg yiciwi-s.
Tekcem-d tsemhuyt yifen akk tisemhay.
Tasebbaɣt n ugama yerran ddunit d taberqact.
Uriɣ aṭas n tefyar.
Yeggra-as-d kan ad tɛeddi ad tger aẓetta-s.
Way Akli ! Kker ad tezluḍ ayaziḍ-ihin azewwaɣ, ternuḍ amellal-ihin, azekka d imensi n tsegrut.
Yerbeḥ a yemma. I as yerra Wakli i yemma-s.
Yesqaqay s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is amzun yeɛqel s wayen ara d-yeḍrun yid-s akka n kra n ddqayeq ɣer sdat deg ufrag.
Yuwi-d aman, yessared-as iḍarren yis-sen, iqebbel-it.
Yella kra i tettu Layla.
Yella kra i tesha Layla.
Yeggra-d kan tura ad as-d-nsiɣ.
ad d-nger lxiḍ amezwaru n uḍraf gar wulman n uẓeṭṭa, ad t-neddez s tyaẓilt.
Mi ara d-nẓeḍ yiwet n tfuɣelt, aḥric n yini iman-is, ad d-nernu tayeḍ fell-as s yini-nniḍen alma nessaweḍ azal n tiddi ara nettel ɣef ufeggag wadda mi d-nserreḥ azal-is seg ufeggag ufella.
Ɣas ma yella d nettat i yettnawalen, i d-idhan d uxxam akk d tnebgawin, Cabḥa, kra ur as-iruḥ ɣef uheyyi n uẓeṭṭa.
Telmed acḥal d taɣawsa ɣer temɣarin n lbaraka.
Yebda d amezwaru.
Awal yettawi-d wayeḍ alma ufant-d iman-nsent ɣeḍlent-d yiwet n tiddi.
Ad isun Rebbi ifassen-im a Cabḥa, meɛnen nezzeh.
Mi nekkes aɛdil-a ad nuɣal ad nẓeḍ yiwet n tbernust i Wakli.
tTn yettlusu akka tura teqdem deg kra n yimeḍqan tjerred.
Tuwi-d fell-am diɣen ad teẓdeḍ i yal aqcic ara d-tesɛuḍ yiwen n ubernus.
Yeɣra-d unelmad aḍris.
Tura-iyi-d tabrat ilindi.
Tuḍen meskint.
Akken-nni i d-yella lḥal.
Tameddit-nni kan mebla ma ttlent tiddi taneggarut, Nna Mennun s temqessin tebda agzam n yiɣrisen n uẓeṭṭa.
Ad tegzem azal n snat n terdasin n yided, ad teǧǧ snat-nniḍen.
Ad tegzem snat-nniḍen alma tfukk tehri n uẓeṭṭa.
Ad d-tuɣal alma d tazwara, ayen akken i teǧǧa ur t-tegzim ara, ad t-id-tegzem alma yekkes-d akk uẓeṭṭa.
Imi ulac arrac imecṭaḥ, tessers kra n yiɣrisen ɣef uqerruy n Cabḥa d uqerruy-is.
Aẓeṭṭa yettwakkes, Cabḥa d temɣart-is, tal yiwet deg tama bdant kersent iɣrisen i ǧǧant i uɛdil akken ur d-ittfessix ara.
Kra n wayen akken ẓḍant yezmer ad iruḥ deg rrayeɛ.
Asteqsi ara as-tefk ma yella ur tefhim ara kra, din din ad d-terr fell-as s yiwen n usefhem yettaǧǧan Cabḥa tceffu akken i ilaq ɣef wayen i as-d-tettmal Yemma-s Mennun yuklalen asnemmer ameqqran.
Tenna-as: « Tzemreḍ a Cabḥa ad tegreḍ aẓeṭṭa iman-im, meḥsub ayen akk ssneɣ mliɣ-am-t-id.
Tḥesbeḍ-iyi am yelli-m neɣ xir.
Kunwi ma tellam akken ma tellam bxir, nekk imir-nni i ttafeɣ iman-iw.
Cabḥa ur teṭṭif ara imeṭṭawen-is.
Lehdur n temɣart-is sseḥlulin-d tasa-s.
Tekker ɣer Nna Mennun tessudun deg-s nettat acḥal n wawal i as-d-tessefruri.
Ur t-id-nniɣ ara.
Nneḥcamen warrac-nni.
Ssersen i yiqerray-nsen ruḥen, tamuɣli ɣer deffir ulac.
Yettewhem mi t-id-yufa din.
Nniɣ-as deg wul-iw, uqbel ad awḍeɣ ɣur-s, wihinna i ttwaliɣ akka mebɛid, yezmer ad yili d win tebɣiḍ meɛna mačči d kečč.
Wihin akka i d-iteddun ɣur-i d alebɛaḍ meɛna mačči d kečč.
D asteqsi-a i d-heyyaɣ ula d nekk ad ak-t-id-fkeɣ.
Maca ɣas ma mazal tibexsisin ur wwint ara, ttnadiɣ ɣef urgalen neɣ tibexsisin n ddaw yifer.
Ma yella d ayen yeḍran yid-i i yeḍran yid-k, ad ak-iniɣ seg tura kullec mebruk mi ara tuɣaleḍ akka d baba.
Ad ak-ibarek Rebbi a Caɛban. Ula d kečč, s teɣzi n tudert, n mmi-ḳ neɣ n yelli-k ara d-ilalen.
Twalaḍ tilawin yellan s tadist, ma ttinitent ɣef kra, mennant-t-id ad t-ččent ur t-ččint ara, lṭufan-nni ara d-ilalen ad d-yeffreɣ deg-s, yezmer ad d-yawi yid-s kra n ccama d tazewwaɣt tikwal ɣef kra n uḥric seg tefkka-s.
Ihi, d acu i d-yeḍran yid-s ?
Ussan zerrin, talɣa n tefkkiwin n tlawin irefden skudmal tettbeddil.
Tilawin am ti, tuwi-d ad ḥadrent iman-nsent akken i ilaq yal ass.
Maca wid fessusen, ulac fell-as ma gant-ten akken ad dhunt, ur sent-yettuɣal ara wakud ẓẓay i usɛeddi.
Meɛna skudmal iteddu lweqt, yettimɣur uɛebbuḍ-is, yettaɛer fell-as ad texdem akken tebɣa.
Tikwal, d argaz-is Caɛban i tt-yettliwin, meɛna ula d netta ɣur-s amahil-is, ladɣa lmal-is ur nlaq ara ad yettwahmel.
Ɣef waya akk i tegguǧ nettat d urgaz-is s axxam n Wat Umalu yettasɛen nezzah.
Yuɣ lḥal Caɛban din i d-yetturebba.
D tuɣalin kan i d-yuɣal s adeg n temẓi-s.
Yemm-as Mennun imi tettliwi tislit-is Cabḥa yellan s tadist am tmeṭṭut-is, tezmer ad tkemmel lxir-is.
Ad asent-tzeg i snat imi ttunaḥsaben i snat d tislatin-is.
Buh ! Buh ! Awi-d ukan mi ffɣent ddeɛwat-nneɣ.
Iferreǧ-d Rebbi fell-aneɣ.
Ur neggrent ara twaculin-nneɣ.
Ad idirent i lebda.
Tilawt teskan-d kan snat n tlawin, nettat tettwali deg usgen-is ukkuẓ n yimdanen.
Tefreḥ nezzeh imi tiwaculin i tettɛuzzu teddunt ad ftint.
Tenna-as: « Ur ttagad, tura ad d-dhuɣ yid-m, d lewjuɛ imenza n tarrawt i kem-id-yebdan ».
Tsaɣ times deg lkanun akken ad d-tesseḥmu aman.
Teɛna imiren Cabḥa, teṭṭef-as-d afus mi tt-id-tuwi s axxam n lwacul.
Tesɣam-itt ɣef wussu i as-d-tessa, tawwurt tefk-itt.
Tuzzel ɣas d tamɣart s axxam n Nna Hbuba tamqabelt n taddart n Tewrirt.
Yeggra-d kan ad ɛeddiɣ ad qableɣ tislit-im a Mennun. I d-tenna Nna Hbuba.
Ṭṭef ihi a yelli deg umrar-nni ternuḍ deg Rebbi, terreḍ nnefs ɣer daxel tseggreḍ.
Ahat ula d Lwiza yettrajun ula d nettat ad d-tarew, tesla-as-d.
Lṭufan i d-ilulen d aqcic.
Nna Mennun teslalew s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is seg wakken tefreḥ.
Turbin mačči d ayen isehlen.
Iwellihen i d-tettakk temqabelt, kra n tin i ten-iḍefren ad d-tarew akken yebɣa wul.
Ama d lṭufan, ama d timnifrit, ur ten-ittaɣ kra n wayen n diri.
Akken i d-teḍra d Cabḥa.
Tuṭṭfa deg umrar-nni yeqqnen s ajgu alemmas n uxxam d assaɣ ara yilin gar lṭufan ara d-ilalen d lejdud imezwura n twacult-is.
Akka i tettamen tmetti taqbaylit, yeqqim-d d ansay.
Nna Hbuba uqbel ad as-gezmen timiḍt i uqcic i d-ilulen, tefka-t i yaya-s i t-irefden s lemḥadra.
Tuɣal tessubb taqerruyt-is almi alaḥal ad taweḍ ɣer lqaɛa, tessers ticenfirin-is ɣef tɣerɣert n uxxam, d lqaɛa n tmurt, tamurt ara iḥemmel am leɛmer-is.
Fell-as yezmer ad isebbel tudert-is ma yella kra i d-yeḍran sya ɣer sdat.
D yaya-s Mennun i as-igezmen timiḍt.
Teddem-it-id diɣen tessared-as akken i iwata s waman imuẓeɣlen, tɣumm-it s uceṭṭiḍ azeddgan, tuɣal telḥeq-as-t i yemma-s i d-yettbanen ɣef wudem-is teɛya cwiṭ.
Cabḥa mi-d-teṭṭef mmi-s, yuli-tt-id yiwen n ufra urǧin tḥulfa yis-s.
D tayri tamaynut i d-yettlalen gar tayemmat d mmi-s amezwaru.
Tzeyyert-it-id s lemḥadra almi d idmaren-is akken ad d-isfuḥ tidi n yemma-s.
Tenna deg wul-is: « Nujent-ak-d tebbucin-iw a mmi ».
Dɣa tger-as ixef n yiwet seg-sent deg yimi-s.
Yebda ajbad n yizir amezwaru n uyefki, d adɣes, d yiwen n ufaris ara iḥarben nezzeh ɣef tazmert-is.
Dge uzrib mi d-iteddu s axxam i d-yesla i uslilew n yemma-s.
Yella ileḥḥu s leɛqel, yuɣal isseɣzef asurif.
Tefka-t-id kan tewwurt n ufrag, temmuger-it yemma-s s ubarek n mmi-s.
Mebruk argaz ay Akli ! Ad t-yeg Rebbi d tawenza tasaɛdit.
Swiɣ akk aman n tqerɛet.
Yura asefru n tayri.
Tabrat yura ɣezzifet.
Zik i yettruḥu s aɣerbaz.
Yidir ur yessin la taɛrabt la tafransist.
Yessen kan taqbaylit.
Wid yettcaxen di lawan-nni ɣullen Yidir d wid yellan am netta.
Ur ten-seɣren ara deg tutlayt-sen.
Ɣas akken mačči d tutlayin-nsen meɛna s tigzi i sɛan ssawḍen ad tent-issinen tikwal xir n waɛraben neɣ n yifransisen.
D azɣal ass-agi.
Yidir yeẓẓwer deg tutlayt tafransist.
D iselmaden ifransisen i as-isselmaden tameslayt-a seg wasmi yekcem aɣerbaz alemmas almi i t-yeffeɣ.
Yal aseggas aɣurbiz, deg yal aswir, netta d yimeddukal-is inelmaden, teggen yiwet n temkarḍit deg yiwet n tesga n tneɣrit.
Yal yiwen deg-sen yettawi-d s ɣur-s adlis neɣ ugar ad t-yernu ɣer wid yersen yagi daxel n texzant-nni.
Aḥric ameqqran n yidlisen-a d ungalen.
Yal imalas, s nnuba, yiwen ad yefren yiwen n uzwel, ad t-yawi s axxam ad t-iɣer.
Ad d-tezzi ddurt, ad d-yuɣal s ugzul n wullis yeɣra, ad t-id-ifek i merra inelmaden.
Mi ifukk taɣuri n uḍris-is, yeṭṭafar-it-id uskasi gar-asen.
Tuttriwin ad d-ɣlint ɣef yimeɣri n tegnit, tuwi-d fell-as tiririt fell-asent.
Aselmad, d afransis, ur d-iggar yiwen n wawal alma d taggara.
Din ad d-yefk rray-is ama ɣef ugzul n ungal ama ɣef uskasi i d-yernan deffir.
Acḥal d abrid i yettewhem ɣef uswir i uwḍen yinelmaden-is imi yeḥsa tutlayt tafransist mačči d tutlayt tamezwarut nsen, yezmer lḥal d tis snat neɣ tis kradet i wid yessnen taɛrabt xir n tefransist.
Yidir, ɣas ma ula d netta ireṭṭel yal imalas yiwen n ungal seg temkarḍit n tneɣrit, yeqqar-it alma d taggara-s , mi d-tuweḍ nnuba-s ad d-yeg agzul i ungal yeɣra, yettmenyif ad d-isuqqel yiwet n tmacahut i as-d-temla yaya-s Mennun, seg teqbaylit ɣer tefransist.
Tamsalt-a n tsuɣelt n uḍris seg tmeslayt-nneɣ, i nettmeslay kan ɣer tefransist ɣur-s azal d ameqqran deg nneyya n Yidir.
Izen yebɣa ad issiweḍ yidir d akken ula d taqbaylit ɣur-s tasekla.
Yenna-as uselmad mi ifukk uskasi n yinelmaden : « D ayen igerrzen a Yidir. Tessawḍeḍ ad tessemlileḍ sin n yiɣerbazen s tmacahut-ik, aɣerbaz aqbayli d uɣerbaz afransis ».
Ifaq d akken tamacahut taqbaylit am tmucuha n tefransist neɣ n tutlayin-nniḍen, ɣur-sent yiwen n uɣawas.
Azwel n tmacahut i d-yemla Yidir d « Tamacahut n udrar aberkan », d yiwen n uḍris d aɣezzfan.
Aṭas n temsal tinmettiyin i yellan deg-s, am tuṭṭfa deg wawal, tabɣest, tirrugza, asetḥi, aḥezzeb, tallalt, ceffu ɣef lxir d tiririt-ines, diɣ ayen yellan d anemgal i wazalen-a iɣef tbedd tmetti taqbaylit.
Yesḥassef aṭas aṭas imi ur tt-yufi ara am tid yeqqar deg uɣerbaz n tmurt-is.
Ad yeqqar deg wul-is, deg tneɣriyin inelmaden d tirni wissen d acu n tutlayt i qqaren imir-nni, yezmer d taɛrabt yeddmen aḥric ameqqran deg usemres n wakud, yezmer d tafransist, tutlayt tis snat neɣ d tagnizit, tutlayt tis kraḍet.
Maca mi ara d-ffɣen ad sgunfun deg ubraḥ, ala yiwet n tutlayt i ttmeslayen gar-asen, tin akken i d-ṭṭḍen ɣer tyemmatin-nsen, tin akken swayes ttaḍsan neɣ tettrun, tin akken tikwal swayes reffun neɣ regmen, tin akken i ssegdalen yiselmaden n taɛrabt neɣ n tefransist neɣ n tegnizit ad d-tettwabdar deg tneɣrit mi sɣarayen.
Ma yella kra n unelmad ur nuɣ ara awal, ur neḍfir ara aslagan agensan n uɣerbaz, terwi fell-as, tezmer ad as-d-tawi lmaḍerra tameqqrant.
Ur ilaq ara i unelmad aqbayli ad yemmaslay tameslayt-is deg uɣerbaz n tmurt-is.
Tuwi-d fell-as deg teywalt, gar-as d yiselmaden-is ad yutlay timeslayin tijenṭaḍin am taɛrabt taseklant, tafransist akked tegnizit.
Tamsalt-a n tezwawt-is ur nesɛi ara amkan unsib deg tmurt-is teqqim-as am tkerrust yugin ad tefsi, maca skudmal tẓemmeḍ.
D ayagi akk i t-yerran yessefray, yettaru tamedyezt s tutlayt-is yettwaḥeqren.
Mi ara iwali kra n temsal ɛeddant tilas, lbaṭel yessemɣi-d acciwen, tamuḥeqranit txeddem i tebɣa, imir-nni kan ad yeɛnu adeg anda ara yeqqim ala iman-is, ad d-yerfed imru ad d-yernu taferkit tamellalt, ad yebdu ad yessrusu iḥulfan-is fell-as, s usefru ara yaru deg tutlayt-nni iwumi immečč lḥeqq.
Yessawaḍ-it i wiyaḍ deg kra n tegnatin tidelsanin i d-yettuɣalen yal aseggas.
Segmi yebda iferreẓ timsal, yeḥsa s yizerfan-is imezwura ttwarekḍen.
Yekker ad yennaɣ s yimru, yis-s yettaru ayen i t-iqerḥen yeqreḥ kra yellan am netta.
Mi t-yesteqsa yiwen yenna-as: « Amek i tettwaliḍ amedyaz ? Amek i ak-d-ttasen akka yisefra ?
Tin ḥemmleɣ tuzen-iyi-d tabrat.
Ur iyi-d-tuzin ara tabrat.
Dayen, yeḥbes aselmed.
Yesselmed nnig n ukkuẓet tmerwin n yiseggasen.
Yuwi tastaɣt-is ilindi.
Ur yeẓri tura d acu ara yexdem.
Ad tt-yerr kan i tira.
D tamara ad d-yali wass.
Mačči deg ufus-nneɣ i tella.
Azemz n ukayad yeɣli-d ass n warim 05 deg wayyur n yunyu.
D tazwara n unebdu, ifit mazal ur yessenṭi.

Yefka-asen-t.

Yefka-asen-tent.
Tefka-asen-t.
Tefka-asen-tt.
Tefka-asen-ten.
Tefka-asen-tent.
Ur asen-tent-yefki ara.
Ur asen-ten-yefki ara.
Ur asen-tt-yefki ara.
Ur asen-t-yefki ara.
Ur asen-tent-tefki ara.
Ur asen-ten-tefki ara.
Ur asen-tt-tefki ara.
Ur asen-t-tefki ara.
Ur as-t-fkiɣ ara.
Ur as-tt-fkiɣ ara.
Ur as-ten-fkiɣ ara.
Ur as-tent-fkiɣ ara.
Ur asen-t-fkiɣ ara.
Ur asen-tt-fkiɣ ara.
Ur asen-ten-fkiɣ ara.
Ur asen-tent-fkiɣ ara.
Ur ak-t-fkiɣ ara.
Ur am-t-fkiɣ ara.
Ur awen-t-fkiɣ ara.
Ur awent-t-fkiɣ ara.

Ur ak-ten-fkiɣ ara.
Ur ak-tent-fkiɣ ara.

Ur am-tent-fkiɣ ara.
Yidir d anelmad imegzi.
Mliɣ-ak-d tamacahut
Mliɣ-am-d tamacahut.
Mliɣ-as-d tamacahut.
Mliɣ-awen-d tamacahut.
Mliɣ-awent-d tamacahut.
A bu Rreb d acu i txeddmeḍ akka ?
Temliḍ-asen-d tamacahut.
Temliḍ-asent-d tamacahut.
Temliḍ-as-d tamacahut.
Temliḍ-iyi-d tamacahut.
Ad iyi-d-temleḍ tamacahut.
Ad ak-d-mleɣ tamacahut.
Ulac ɣur-k akebbuḍ azegzaw ?
Iḥemmel Tom ad iqesser.
Twalaḍ tura ! Din i tuḍen icc-is.
Twalam tura ! Din i tuḍen icc-is.
Twalamt tura ! Din i tuḍen icc-is.
Yuweḍ-d ulmeẓ.
Yuzen-iyi-d yiwen n wawal.
Tuzen-iyi-d yiwen n wawal.
Uznen-iyi-d yiwen n wawal.

Ur ẓriɣ ara anda i tedduɣ.
Ur teẓriḍ ara anda i tettedduḍ.
Cabḥa teɛna leqdic-is netta ur yuki ara akk anda i tɛedda tegzert yečča imi ur yemlik ara iman-is.
Yessebleɛ ala azgen n wayen i d-iseqqa.
Yessebleɛ ala azgen n wayen i d-iseqqa, azgen wis sin yugi ad iɛeddi deg ugerjum-is ɣas ma tagzert d tagella i iḥemmel nnig tiyiḍ.
Dɣa yekker yeffeɣ, yufa-d iman-is deg uzrib.
Yiwen n rray itezzi deg uqerruy-is, ilaq ad yaweḍ alma d Tazerrajt s aɣerbaz anda tesɣaray Ṭawes.
Yebɣa ad tt-ixebber ɣef wayen i t-yettrajun ussan i d-iteddun.
Tal tikkelt mi ara d-yuɣal seg Bumerdes d nettat i yettwali d tamezwarut
Itekk-d fell-as uqbel ad d-yeqreb ɣer Tewrirt.
Abrid-a iruja almi d lǧemɛa tameddit uqbel ad tebdu taggara n yimalas.
Yerza ɣur-s mi tfukk tadwilt-is taneggarut n wass.
Inelmaden d yinedbalen n uɣerbaz ffɣen akk, i d-yeggran ala anadaf i yessen imi d mmi-s n taddart-is.
Inelmaden-is tsuffeɣ-iten, Ṭawes tuɣal ɣer tneɣrit akken ad tesseɣti kra n yiluɣma n yizmamen n tneɣrit.
Tella allen-is ntant deg yisbetren imellalen iɣef urant kra n tefyar n yiluɣma i asen-d-tefka i yinelmaden-is.
Mi d-terfed aqerruy-is, tufa-d ibedd-d sdat-s win iɣef tettxemmim deg tesdat n yimir-nni kan.
Tenwa d targit i tettargu neɣ d axemmem-is i yettkemmilen sdat wallen-is…
Mi i tt-iɛedda udhac-nni tsuɣ abrid : « Yidir ! »
Tebra i yimru-s azewwaɣ.
Tger-d ɣur-s, myegren i sin irebbi.
Wa yeṭṭef wayeḍ, uɣalen amzun d yiwen n umdan deg wakken myeẓẓmaḍent tefkkiwin-nsen.
Ugin akk ad msebrun.

Yugi Tom ad t-tessendeh Mary.
Mi d-yeṭṭef lkaɣeḍ n tergin, taseɣra tamcumt, ɛejlen ad t-awin, ad as-selsen lebsa n uɛsekri.
Ɣer yiwet n lkazirna yellan deg teɣremt n Tinduf i d-yezgan deg tneẓruft, deg unẓul n tmurt tama n umalu i t-uznen.
Nna Mennun tedder tallit-nni n ṭṭrad, urǧin tettu ayen iɛeddan ɣef tsuta-ines n lbaṭel d ujujru d unɣal n yidammen n yilmeẓyen izzayriyen, d tukksa n sser ɣef tlawin i d-yeqqimen deg tudrin d tuǧǧal kan akken meẓẓiyit.
Cabḥa ttmermiɣen-d imeṭṭawen-is s shala.
Ad d-temmekti kan mmi-s aɛziz n tasa-s, ad yeqqim azal n sḍis n wayyuren ur t-tettwali ad iwwet lewjeɛ deg tɛebbuḍt-is i t-id-yurwen, tama n tasa-s.
Tikwal ma yella tqeddec deg tnawalt neɣ deffir n uẓeṭṭa ad teqqim kan ad tessawal s yisem-is : « A yidiiiir ! A Yidir a mmi… »
Akka i d-yettban wudem n Wakli, baba-s n Yidir.
Yezmer lḥal tasa-s telɣuɣi ugar n tin n tmeṭṭut-is, meɛna tidet yessen ad tt-yeffer.
Tabɣest yellan a-tt-an ɣur-s.
D netta i d argaz, d netta i d aqerruy n uxxam, d netta ara isebren yemma-s d tmeṭṭut-is.
Ma d mmi-s, seg wasmi i d-yekker d netta yettakk-as iwellihen ɣef trrugza, ɣef yiseɣ, ɣef ssber, ɣef talsa…
Nesri-tt.
D acu ara ččeɣ i yimekli, ass-agi.
Ur neẓri anda i nteddu.
Agummu d tidekt ma d aseklu d amadaɣ.
Mi ara teww tidekt, tettuɣal d taberkant.
Ad tt-is-nekkes, ad tt-id-nezzu deg bufraḥ ini nečč-itt.
D tidet akka i yella lḥal meɛna taduṭ ɣef yiɛrar n wulli d yizamaren temsex.
Ulli d wakraren deg uddaynin, ɣef tberra d ibeccicen-nsen i gganen.
Deg lexla, ulac ansa ur d-tekken, kra yellan d afarar neɣ d rrsaḍ ad ten-id-yenṭeḍ.
Ternuḍ taweddaɛt i d-itekken seg tidi d tassemt-nsen, tettarra taduṭ d tawraɣt.
Taduṭ akken ad tuɣal d tamellalt, lewsex-agi akk tuwi-d ad as-yettwakkes s tarda-s.
Aman n wasif seg udrar nnig n Tzerrajt i d-uzzlen s azaɣar.
Tal yiwet deg-sent ad d-ttaddam cwiṭ cwiṭ n taduṭ, ad tt-tfessu s leɛqel.
Mi tesmed kra n tkemmict ad tt-tawi ad tt-tefser ɣef yiẓra imeqqranen yeggten deg wasif.
Mi ara fakkent tarda d fessu n taduṭ, ad tt-id-grent deg tlemdilin ara d-bibbent d tayemmust ɣef yiɛraren-nsent alma d axxam.
Taduṭ mazal tebzeg cwiṭ, ɣef yigertilen ara tt-fesrent, ad as-rnunt azway s uɛekkaz alma tekkaw akk.
Mi tekkaw dayen imiren ad tebdu temhelt n umcaḍ.
Ad yili ɣur-s deg teɣzi azal n yiwet n lmitra n tencirt tazurant, snat tmerwin ar kraḍet tmerwin n yisanṭimen deg tehri.
Deg yiwen n yixef n tencirt-nni yenta yiwen n wadar n yisegnan n wuzzal ɣef wakk tehri-s.
Yettban-d iqewwes am uzgen n twinest.
Imceḍ yettrusu deg tesga n uxxam ɣef kra n tdekkant tamecṭuḥt.
Nna Mennun ad d-teddem takemmict n taduṭ yerwin, ad tt-tessewḥel gar wuglan n yimceḍ.
Ad d-terfed talemdalt ad tebdu yis-s amcaḍ n taduṭ seg usawen d agessar.
Deg teɣzi ad tesɛu azal n uzgen n lmitra.
Tettwaxdam ula d nettat s usɣar yeqwan.
Tettfakka ula d nettat am yimceḍ s yiwen n wadar n yisegnan yezzin am uzgen n umeqyas i d-yesmektayen timceḍt.
Mi ara tewḥel taduṭ deg yimceḍ s tlemdalt i nmecceḍ taduṭ-nni.
Nnettarra isirigen-is ḍelqen, ntekkes-asen diɣen aɛkaf d ukmac.
Ma d Cabḥa, tal tikkelt ara tegzu yiwet n temhelt tamaynut ad tesker tamɣart-is, ad tkemmel ccɣel-nni alma ifukk.
Meḥsub ilisen-nni akk n taduṭ ad d-ɛeddin ɣef ufus-is.
Wissen acḥal n wussan ara tekk fell-asen imi ttaṭṭafen-tt lecɣal-nniḍen n yal ass, abraz n lḥala, agam, tarda n yiceṭṭiḍden, aniwel…
Tal tikkelt mi ara tɛeddi ad temceḍ taduṭ-nni tsuffuɣ-d tirect n tewḍufin.
A-t-an ziɣ tessneḍ-as i yimceḍ a Cabḥa.
Ad am-d-ggalleɣ s wayen tebɣiḍ ar d tikkelt tamezwarut i mecḍeɣ anect-a akk n taduṭ.

Ad iliɣ deg lebɣi n temɣart-iw d urgaz-iw.
kemm ufiɣ-kem-id telhiḍ xir n yemma.
Yemma diɣen d lḥeqq-is ad taɛer deg ttrebga n yelli-s akken ad teḥrec deg uxxam n medden anda ara tesɛeddi ayen akka ara ternu deg tudert-is.
Seg mi ara d-tekker tanezzayt d nettat d tikci n yiwellihen i yelli-s uqbel ad d-teddu d tislit s axxam n At Umalu.
« Ḥader a yelli, tuwi-d fell-am ad tqadreḍ tamɣart-im, argaz-im, imawlan n urgaz-im, inaragen-im, taddart n Tewrirt akken ma tella akken ad d-tezgeḍ deg lxaṭer deg wid-agi akk i d-bedreɣ akk ladɣa argaz-im d temɣart-im ».
Kkes aɣilif a yelli, tuɣeḍ awal akken i ilaq i yemma-m, yerḥem taɛebbuḍt i kem-id-yurwen.
Nekk, s ɣur-i ayen yellan fell-i ad am-t-xedmeɣ akken ad tidireḍ deg telwit kemm d urgaz-im d warraw-im.

Tura a-t-an d argaz.
Ad as-tiniḍ d abɛaḍ n Yimaziɣen (netta d Akerdi) i d-yettmeslayen acku yiwen n uɛekkaz i aɣ-yewwten. Nugi ad neɛqel iman-nneɣ, nugi ad nezwi ɣef yiɛrar-nneɣ kra i aɣ-ɛebban a-t-a nnig n 14 n leqrun aya.
Nedda-asen deg lebɣi.
Nettaɣ-asen awal.
Akken i d-nnan akken.
Melmi ara d-neldi allen ?
Nugi ad neɛqel iman-nneɣ.
Ccah deg-neɣ !
Anda-tt tkufit ? Anda-tt txabit ? Anda ucbayli ? Anda-t Uqbayli ?
Amer temɣer tezmer, amer temẓi tessen.
Ceux qui se rassemblent se ressemblent.
Qmec ṭeṭṭu, ldi qemu !
Masi-t, ddem-it.
Nadi ad tafeḍ.
Fiḥel ma nniɣ-d kra.
Tifeḍ-iyi.
Ur iyi-tewqiɛ ara.
Anef-as kan.
Aweḍ ɣur-s.
Xdem am netta.
Fakk zik.
Ruḥ s leɛqel.
Srefqen akk medden.
Nekkni netturar turart-a iwimi neqqar leɣruḍ, tarbaɛt n 3 n yiɛeggalen mgal tarbaɛt-nniḍen. Tal yiwet ad d-tessebded ktaḍet n tɣalaḍin s yiẓra, gar-asent ad ilint gar 30 ar 40 n lmitrat. Yal aɛeggal ad d-yerfed 3 n yiẓra s way-s ara yerjem leɣruḍ-nni. Tarbaɛt i iɣeḍlen d tamezwarut 3 nni n leɣruḍ n terbaɛt taxsimt d nettat i irebḥen. Yal aɛeggal i irebḥen ad t-ibibb yiwen n tarbaɛt ixesren ɣef 40 n lmitrat-nni gar leɣrud.
Ala win yewwten d win yeččan tiyita i yeḥsan.
Yewwet-it wugur, yeɣli.
Ur kkat ara deg gma-k.
Ur kkat ara deg gma-m.
Ur kkat ara deg uletma-m.
Ur kkatet ara deg watmaten-nwen.

Yefka-as tiyita, iɣḍel-itt.

Tefka-as tiyita, teɣḍel-itt.
Tefka-iyi tiyita, teɣḍel-iyi.
Yewwet, iɛedda.
Tewwet, tɛedda.

Acimi i tt-iwwet ?

Yewwet-iyi Rebbi.
Yewwet-aɣ Rebbi.
Wwet-as afus.
Yewwet-iten lqu.
Yewwet-itent lqu.

Yewwet-ikem lqu.
Yewwet-iken lqu.
Yewwet-ikent lqu.

D acu i akent-d-tenna ?

D acu i asen-d-tenna ?
D acu i asent-d-tenna ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i am-d-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i as-d-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i aken-d-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i akent-d-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i aṣen-d-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i asent-d-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i iyi-d-yenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i ak-d-yenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i am-d-yenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i aken-d-yenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i akent-d-yenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i as-d-yenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i asen-d-yenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i asent-d-yenna.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i aɣ-d-yenna.
Yenna :"Ssentaɣ tisegnit deg ddjaj, win i d-ineṭqen yebɣa zzwaj".
Yenna :"Ssentaɣ tisegnit deg ssqef, win i d-ineṭqen ad isselqef".
Yenna :" Ttakiɣ-as i nnda mi tekkat".
Udreɣ i wallen-iw, awal ur iyi-id-yuli.
Nuder i wallen-nneɣ, awal ur aɣ-id-yuli.
Tudreḍ i wallen-ik, awal ur ak-id-yuli.
Tudreḍ i wallen-im, awal ur am-id-yuli.
Tudrem i wallen-nwen, awal ur ken-id-yuli.
Tudremt i wallen-nwent, awal ur kent-id-yuli.
Tudremt i wallen-nkent, awal ur kent-id-yuli.
Udren i wallen-nsen, awal ur ten-id-yuli.
Udrent i wallen-nsent, awal ur tent-id-yuli.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-ak uzaylal.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-am uzaylal.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-asen uzaylal.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-asent uzaylal.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-awen uzaylal.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-awent uzaylal.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-akent uzaylal.
Urǧin iɛedda fell-i uzaylal.
Ad qqimeɣ kan ad iɛeddi fell-i uzaylal.
Yettɛedday fell-am uzaylal.
Yettɛedday fell-aneɣ uzaylal.

Yettɛedday fell-akent uzaylal.
Yettɛedday fell-as uzaylal.
Yettɛedday fell-asent uzaylal.
Awer yaweḍ !
Awer taweḍ !

Nadi fell-as alma tufiḍ-t.
Nadimt fell-as alma tufamt-t.

Ad tnadi fell-am alma tufa-kem.
Ad tnadi fell-asen alma tufa-ten.
Ad tnadi fell-asent alma tufa-tent.
Ur tnuda fell-ak idelli, ur k-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-am idelli, ur kem-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-akent idelli, ur kent-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-awen idelli, ur ken-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-as idelli, ur t-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-as idelli, ur tt-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-asen idelli, ur ten-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-asent idelli, ur tent-tufi.
Ur tnuda fell-aneɣ idelli, ur aɣ-tufi.
Ḥemmleɣ-kem a Yemma.
Ilem i d-teǧǧiḍ meqqer a yemma.
Sgunfu deg telwit a yemma.
Yemma tif akk tiyemmatin.
Yemma truḥ teǧǧa-iyi.
Yemma d tameṭṭut yifen tilawin.
Yenna-as i yemma-s :"Ḥemmleɣ-kem a yemma".
Tenna-as i yemma-s :"Ḥemmleɣ-kem a yemma".
Nniɣ-as i yemma :"Ḥemmleɣ-kem a yemma".
Tenniḍ-as i yemma-k :"Ḥemmleɣ-kem a yemma".
Tenniḍ-as i yemma-m :"Ḥemmleɣ-kem a yemma".
Nenna-as i yemma-tneɣ :"Nḥemmel-ikem a yemma".
Nnan-as i yemma-tsen :"Nḥemmel-ikem a yemma".
Nnant-as i yemma-tsent :"Nḥemmel-ikem a yemma".
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma d yemma.
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma-k d yemma-k.
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma-m d yemma-m.
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma-s d yemma-s.
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma-tneɣ d yemma-tneɣ.
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma-twen d yemma-twen.
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma-tkent d yemma-tkent.
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma-tsen d yemma-tsen.
Akken tebɣu tili, yemma-tsent d yemma-tsent.

Awi-tt-id ziɣ ad tt-nwali
Awi-ten-id ziɣ ad ten-nwali
Awi-tent-id ziɣ ad tent-nwali

Ayen akk i d-tenniḍ, sliɣ-as.
Ayen akk i d-yenna, sliɣ-as.
Ayen akk i d-tenna, sliɣ-as.
Ayen akk i d-tennam, sliɣ-as.
Ayen akk i d-tennamt, sliɣ-as.

Ayen akk i d-nnant, sliɣ-as.

Akka neɣ ruḥ ad tekseḍ tizit !
Yir tudert, fell-aneɣ tezga.
Yezga ṭṭrad ur yeḥbis.
Yezga uɣilif yezdeɣ imdanen.
Acḥal i d-tezgiḍ ?
Wissen ma ad am-d-zgen yisebbaḍen-a ?
Zgan-iyi-d akken i ilaq.
Lsiɣ aserwal, yezga-iyi-d.
Ssentu amesmar deg tfelwit.
Ezg-iyi-d da simira ad d-uɣaleɣ.
Tajmaɛt ass-nni teččur am tmellalt.
Asrugmet d leɛyaḍ, ad asen-d-tesleḍ anda i telliḍ.
D acu yeḍran akka ?
D izgaren i yennejmaɛen d agraw.
Ɣef wacu akka i ttemceqlalen ?
Amer yettuɣal lxir talfi yuɣal i nekkni s yizgaren i d-yenna yiwen seg-sen.
Segmi ara d-nekker d takerza, laɛtab yezga d amwanes.
Yettagi ad yeṭṭixer fell-aneɣ.
Asmi ara aɣ-tfakk tezmert, ad d-ɣlin fell-aneɣ yijenwiyen ur nettḥezzib.
Aksum, ad t-aɣen d tarbaɛt, ad t-ččen, ma d aglim, ad t-lsen d icifaḍ. I d-yerna wayeḍ.
Wellah ar nettuɣaḍ, neɛteb nezzeh, azaglu acḥal d aẓayan ires ɣef umgerḍ uḍbir nekkni ad nernu asiker n lmaɛun s tgersa yentan deg wakal yeqquren.
Wa d lbaṭel, ilaq ad nerfed yiwen wawal ɣef tikkelt s way-s ara nesṭixxer wa i aɣ-d-ittenǧaren akka lmaɛun.
Dayen, tiyita tuweḍ ɣer yiɣes, neɛya mačči d kra, ilaq ur tettɣimi ara kanakka fell-aneɣ, ilaq ad tt-tbeddel.
Yiwen n uzger yeqqimen deg teɣmert n tejmaɛt, yemmed ɣef wiyiḍ, ar tura ur d-igir yiwen n wawal.
D acu i ken-yuɣen akka ?
Ur d-tezgiḍ ara yid-s.
Ur d-nezgi ara yid-s.
Yiwen ur d-yezgi yid-s.
Ur d-tezgim ara yid-s.
Ur d-tezgimt ara yid-s.
Ur d-tezgim ara yid-sen.
Ur d-tezgimt ara yid-sen
Ur d-tezgim ara yid-sent.
Ur d-tezgimt ara yid-sent

Tetteddu, tettemduduɛ.

Teddunt, ttemduduɛent.

Teffer fell-as, ur as-Tenni ka.

Yeffer fell-asent, ur asent-d-yenni kra.

Yeffeɣ-iyi leɛqel.
Timeqbert Imeḥmuden, wa tinnegnit, wa ɣef wudem. D aqermud n tɣanimt.
Iberdan ččuren d medden.
Agdud yebra i tugdi-s.
Nteddu ad d-nawi tilelli.
Amecwar ɣezzif.
Amulli ameggaz a Amin.
Amin yesfugel amulli-ines wis snat tmerwin deg lḥebs.
Anekruf akk ameẓẓyan d Amin.
Yeffeɣ-iten leɛqel wigi iḥebbsen arrac imecṭaḥ.
Aqcic n ɛecrin n yiseggasen ṭṭfen-t ɣer lḥebs.
Lexḍar n 86 n yiseggasen deg tudert-is akked Amin n 20 n yiseggasen, gren-ten deg yiwen n lḥebs.
Anida akka i tetteddu tmurt ?
Imdebbren n tmurt ɛefsen icuḍaḍ-nsen.
Ala aɣelluy kan ara ɣlin.
Ǧǧem amkan i yimeẓẓyanen.
Dayen taggara-nwen tuweḍ-d.
Dayen, kullec ifukk fell-awen.
Swiɣ sin n yifenǧalen n lqahwa.
Swiɣ sin n yifenǧalen n lqahwa iḍelli.
Swiɣ afenǧal n lqahwa iḍelli.
Swiɣ afenǧal n lqahwa segellin.
Snat n teḥjurin n ssekker i as-rriɣ i ufenǧal n lqahwa i swiɣ.
Yeffeɣ leɛtab ɣer tafat.
D acu i tebɣiḍ ad ak-t-xedmeɣ ?
D acu i tebɣiḍ ad am-t-xedmeɣ ?
D acu i tebɣa ad as-t-xedmeɣ ?
D acu i yebɣa ad as-t-xedmeɣ ?
D acu i tebɣam ad awen-t-xedmeɣ ?
D acu i tebɣamt ad awent-t-xedmeɣ ?
D acu i bɣan ad asen-t-xedmeɣ ?
D acu i bɣant ad asent-t-xedmeɣ ?
Ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i bɣiɣ.
Ur teẓriḍ ara d acu i tebɣiḍ.
Ur yeẓri ara d acu i yebɣa.
Ur teẓri ara d acu i tebɣa.
Ur teẓrim ara d acu i tebɣam.
Ur teẓrimt ara d acu i tebɣamt.
Ur ẓrin ara d acu i bɣan.
Ur ẓrint ara d acu i bɣant.
Awer taḍneḍ.
Awer naḍen.
Awer taḍnem.
Awer taḍnemt.
Awer aḍnen.
Awer aḍnent.
Awer aḍneɣ.
Uḍneɣ iḍelli, jjiɣ ass-a.
Ttarguɣ allen-iw ldint.
Nettargu allen-nneɣ ldint.
Tettarguḍ allen-ik ldint.
Tettarguḍ allen-im ldint.
Tettargum allen-nwen ldint.
Tettargumt allen-nwent ldint.
Tettargumt allen-nkent ldint.
Ttargun allen-nsen ldint.
Ttargunt allen-nsent ldint.
Ṭṭseɣ almi i iyi-id-ufan.
Neṭṭes almi i aɣ-id-ufan.
Teṭṭsem almi i ken-id-ufan.
Teṭṭsemt almi i kent-id-ufan.
Ṭṭsen almi i ten-id-ufan.
Ṭṭsent almi i tent-id-ufan.
Yerra iman-is kan igen.
Terra iman-is kan tgen.
Nerra iman-nneɣ kan ngen.
Rriɣ iman-iw kan gneɣ.
Terriḍ iman-ik kan tegneḍ.
Terriḍ iman-im kan tegneḍ.
Terram iman-nwen kan tegnem.
Terramt iman-nwent kan tegnemt.
Terramt iman-nkent kan tegnemt.
Rran iman-nsen kan gnen.
