Rrant iman-nsent kan gnent.
Sin wussan deffir n umenzu n wamber, amestul yewwet amzarfu deg tnefrut.
Sin wussan deffir n umenzu n wamber, ajadermi yewwet amzarfu deg tnefrut.
Sin wussan deffir n umenzu n wamber, amestul yewwet amzarfu deg uxxam n ccraɛ.
Sin wussan deffir n umenzu n wamber, ajadermi yewwet amzarfu deg uxxam n ccraɛ.
Ijadarmiyen wwten imzarfa.
Yewwet ujadermi imzarfa deg wahran.
Imzarfa deg Wahran, wwten-ten yimestalen.
Imzarfa deg Wahran, wwten-ten yijadermiyen.
Deg Wahran, amzarfu yečča tiɣrit.
Tiɣrit i as-tt-yefkan i umzarfu, d amestal.
Tiɣrit i as-tt-yefkan i umzarfu, d ajadermi.
Ijadarmiyen wwten imzarfa deg wahran.
Deg wahran i wwten yijadermiyen imzarfa.
Deg wahran i wwten yimestalen imzarfa.
Taɣdemt, tečča tiɣrit deg tnefrut n wahran.
Tettwwet teɣdemt deg tmurt n zzayer.
Tettwwet teɣdemt deg uxxam-is.
Aserdas azzayri, yewwet taɣdemt n tmurt-is.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-yeggran imi wwten ula d taɣdemt.
Alla deg tmurt n Zzayer i d-ḍerrunt tigi.
D wagi i d adabu yeṭṭef userdas.
Ajadermi yerra amgerḍ n temzarfut d azewwaɣ.
Ijadermiyen n Zzayer, rekḍen taɣdemt n tmurt-nsen.
Deg uxxam n teɣdemt n temdint n Wahran yekker wahruḥu.
Tuwi-d fell-aneɣ, amzarfu ad t-nqader mačči ad t-nqedder.
Ur tuklal ara tmurt-iw ayen akka i as-iḍerrun.
Rebbi deg lqaɛa, netta deg yigenni.
Ur yugad Rebbi.
Ɣer Rebbi kullci frant.
Yella Rebbi.
Yettgalla s Rebbi yeskiddib.
Yuɣ-it-id seg ssuq.
Yuɣ-itt-id seg ssuq.
Yuɣ-iten-id seg ssuq.
Yuɣ-itent-id seg ssuq.
Tuɣ-it-id seg ssuq.
Tuɣ-itt-id seg ssuq.
Tuɣ-iten-id seg ssuq.
Tuɣ-itent-id seg ssuq.
Mačči seg ssuq i t-id-yuɣ.
Mačči seg ssuq i tt-id-yuɣ.
Mačči seg ssuq i ten-id-yuɣ.
Mačči seg ssuq i tent-id-yuɣ.
Mačči seg ssuq i t-id-tuɣ.
Mačči seg ssuq i tt-id-tuɣ.
Mačči seg ssuq i ten-id-tuɣ.
Mačči seg ssuq i tent-id-tuɣ.
Meɛna yiwen ur yezmir ad yerwel ɣef tidet, yeg Rebbi tin i ten-id-immugren ḥulfan-as rẓaget.
Dda Ɛacur i yeddren tilufa tiqesḥanin deg tudert-is, ladɣa deg ṭṭrad amaḍlan wis sin iseg d-yemneɛ, yettwali tamsalt-nni n lexḍubegga n Lwiza mačči n yessi-s nni-nniḍen d ayen i d-yettilin anda i teddiḍ.
Tayri txeddem i tebɣa, tferren win neɣ tin tebɣa.
Dda Ɛacur iruja almi i d-tuɣal cwit n tudert-nni uqbel ad d-asent tnexḍabin ɣer Lwiza, iruḥ deg tazwara ɣer Zwina, iḥell-itt, yenna-as am wass-a ula d kemm ad-asen yinexḍaben ɣur-m.
Zwina mm zzin ifazen mačči d tin ara iburen.
Lmeɛna-s tɛedda-tt tuččḥa i teččeḥ ɣef wayen i d-yeḍran.
Yuɣal ɣer tmeṭṭut-is, yeɛreḍ ad tt-isefhem d akken tikwal timsal mačči akken i nebɣa i teffɣent meɛna terra-aɣ tmara ad tent-neqbel ma yella uwint-d ɣas cwiṭ n lfayda.
Mi ifukk s tid yellan nneɣnint, yezzi ɣef tin yumren.
Twala-t-id temmuger-it s yiwen n ucmumeḥ i d-isefhamen acḥal i tefreḥ.
Azul a yelli. I as-yenna.
Azul a Baba. I as-terra.
Ulac ɣezzifen am wass-a, nniɣ-as ur yettfakka ara akk.
Yettnadi amek ara yebdu ayen akken i yebɣa ad as-t-yini.
Ihi a yelli akken tesliḍ d Caɛban n At Waquj i yebɣan ad kem-yaɣ.
Ur asent-n-rriɣ la s ih la s ala i tnexḍabin i d-yusan.
Ilaq ad waliɣ ma ad tqebleḍ neɣ ala.
Nekk ad am-d-iniɣ tidet, d aqcic i iyi-iɛeǧben aṭas.
Teggra-d ɣur-m tura, akken d-tenniḍ akken.
Ddurt i d-iteddun ad asen-rreɣ s wawal, akka i ten-weɛdeɣ.
Ihi d acu ara d-tiniḍ a Lwiza? Ih neɣ ala ?
Lwiza yellan tbedd sdat n baba-s, terra ifassen ɣer deffir, allen-is ttwalint kan isebbaḍen n baba-s, ur d-terfid ara akk aqerruy-is.
Amek a Lwiza ? D acu ara asen-rreɣ ?
La ttwaliɣ awal ur t-id-tenniḍ, lmeɛna-s tqebleḍ.
Ur ifukk ara awal-is almi i tt-id-yufa tɛelleq deg umgerḍ-is, tessudun deg-s sya u sya.
Dayen ur tufiḍ d acu ara as-d-ternu nnig way-a.
Dayen a yelli, fehmeɣ-kem akken i ilaq, ad d-tezzi ddurt, tiririt ara rreɣ i Wakli d Caɛban ad tili kan d tanilawt.
Kullec mebruk a yelli, lufan ad teẓreḍ acḥal i am-ferḥeɣ.
Yeg Rebbi ussan ad ǧǧuǧǧgen d urgaz ara taɣeḍ.
Ad ken-yessiweḍ Rebbi ɣer kra n wayen tebɣam, ladɣa tarwa tumɛint.
Tanemmirt a Baba ! Ferḥeɣ nezzeh imi k-sɛiɣ d baba.
Yal ass senmmareɣ Rebbi imi k-id-yefka d baba.
Yezmer lḥal ulac taqcict yesɛan baba-s am kečč, ahat deg lɛerc-nneɣ akken ma yella.
Rnan cwiṭ a-tt-a tkecem-d Werdiya, tufa-ten-id akken ḥman deg lehdur terna-d tin-is ula d netta, amzun iɛedda-tt cwiṭ n zzɛaf i tezɛef sgellin.
Ḥsiɣ baba-m ur yeqqar ara i rrbeḥ wexxer akkin, daɣ netta iban yeqbel nnesba n Caɛban n Wat Waquj.
Ula d nekk qebleɣ seg wul azeddgan a Lwiza.
Tesla kan Lwiza i yimeslayen iẓidanen i d-yekkan seg yimi n yemma-s ur tennum ara tsel-asen, tuzzel am tbuciḍant metwal tin i tt-is-yesɛan
Netta tettru tettaḍsa, tinna tger-as-d irebbi, tḥennec-itt-id ɣur-s.
Teslef-as akk i yimezran-is.
Akken i iḥemmel ad tt-ittwali yal ass.
Qqim kan a Caɛban a mmi, wi ad ak-yeḥkun, wissen ad tettruḍ, wissen ad teḍseḍ.
Tiririt i yettraju mačči d Dda Ɛacur ara tt-id-yefken, maca d yelli-s Lwiza i tecɣeb ula d nettat am Caɛban, temsalt-a n tissulya.
Tumert-is ur tt-ibeṭṭu ala d wid i t-iḥemmlen : iɛeggalen n twacult-is tis snat i yettɛuzzu tettɛuzzu-t.
Mi yekcem s axxam n At Umalu, yufa Nna Mennun d Nna Ǧuhra urɛad nuɣal s axxam-is tellment taduṭ s yiẓdi.
Timɣarin itellmen walant udem n Caɛban yennecraḥ, mačči akka i nnument ttwalint-t.
D acu i k-yuɣen akka ɛni, mi tettaḍsaḍ kan iman-ik a Caɛḅan ?
Ɛni yella kra n ugerruj i tufiḍ mi telliḍ tneqceḍ deg wakal-ik ?
Yerbeḥ a yemma, kemm tuklaleḍ kullec, tuwi-d d kemm ara as-yeslen d tamezwarut i yisalli i d-uwiɣ kan akken yettfuru.
Ihi fiḥel ma nerja ddurt i d-iteddun Dda Ɛacur ad aɣ-tt-id-yefru ɣef uqbal neɣ tigin n tikci n yelli-s.
Tenna-iyi-d Lwiza deg yiwen n wawal awezzlan deg tebrat i iyi-d-tuzen, yemma-s d baba-s qeblen.
Kullec mebruk a mmi. Yeg Rebbi trebḥeḍ fell-as.
D acu akka i t-yuɣen urgaz-a ?
D acu akka i ten-yuɣen yirgazen-a ?
D acu akka i tt-yuɣen tmeṭṭut-a ?
D acu akka i tent-yuɣen tlawin-a ?
D acu akka i tent-yuɣen tullas-a ?
D acu akka i tt-yuɣen teqcict-a ?
D acu akka i t-yuɣen uqcic-a
Nna Mennun kullec ɣef tiṭ-is.
Ayen akk i ilaqen ad d-yewjed, theyya-t-id.
Tirigliwin n uẓeṭṭa beddent, qqnent ɣer tsariwin n ssqef s temrart.
Tayuga n yifeggagen ɣef wudem n ufus.
Nna Ǧuhra telḥeq-d iḍelli tameddit, ɣur-sen i tensa.
Tikwal kan ini twunes-itt teslit-is ma tfukk d leqdic-is n yal ass.
D ttebyita ara yilin deg Lemqam n Sidi Waɛmar.
Tafat n uxxam n Wat Umalu d aqcic ara icergen tasusmi i d-yeɣlin deg ufrag-nsen.
Yuweḍ-d lawan ad tent-xedmen d tirni akken tislit i d-yeddan nnig n useggas aya ad terfeḍ, ad asen-d-tarew yiwen n yilemẓi.
Kra n win neɣ n tin i d-yettmmagaren kra n wugur deg tudert-is, yettruḥu ɣer lemqam n Sidi Waɛmar ad d-iẓur.
Llan wid iwimi yeɛkes zzher, ad n-tafeḍ uḍnen, ulac tazmert neɣ tid ur nessuli ara ar tura nutenti ddant deg leɛmer.
Wigi akk iwimi iteddu wakud deg nnzeɛ, zgan ttruḥun ttuɣalen seg lemqam ɣer wayeḍ akken ad awḍen ɣer lebɣi-nsen.
Lebɣi n Cabḥa d temɣart-is d tarwa ur d-nessefqed ara ɣur-sent ariḍa.
Uqbel ad ṭṭfent abrid n ufakan, kkant s uɛessas n taddart, ssutrent deg-s ad yerr tirezzaf-nsent d tin ara d-yagmen ala urawen n lxir i twacult-nsen.
D tirezzaf ara d-yerren tumert s axxam-nsent.
Knant, uɣalent sudnent i snat yid-sent lǧedra n tẓebbujt taɛessast nutenti qqarent, ttalsent i tenfalit « S awnuz ay aɛessas ! S wanuz ay aɛessas ! »
Mi uwḍent ɣer lemqam n Sidi Waɛmar, ufant-t yeggemggem seg lɣaci, tuget d tilawin.
Keččment s nnuba ɣer yiwen n uxxam, iɣerban-is d imellalen, cewḍen s tumlilt, aqermud azewwaɣ n tɣanimt, tiwwura n usɣar azuran.
Yebna deg tlemmast n yiwen n umrij iqeɛden, d agni deg udrar.
Tiɣerɣert tessa akken ma tella d igertilen, yiwen n ccix yeqqimen ɣef usɣim ideɛɛu s lxir irennu.
Ad ken-iseḥlu Rebbi.
Ad ken-ijber Rebbi.
Wissen d acu i aɣ-d-ittheyyi uzekka ?
Azekka wissen amek-it ?
Azekka ad yif iḍelli.
Iḍelli yif-it wass-a.
Ass-a yif iḍelli.
Azekka wissen amek ara yili ?
Nessaram azekka ad yif iḍelli d wass-a.
Nettru ass-a mi d-nemmekta iḍelli.
Eǧǧ iḍelli, ternuḍ azekka, tidireḍ ass-a.
Ẓẓiɣ tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-iyi-tt.
Teẓẓiḍ tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-ak-tt.
Teẓẓiḍ tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-am-tt.
Teẓẓam tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-awen-tt.
Teẓẓamt tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-awent-tt.
Ẓẓan tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-asen-tt.
Ẓẓant tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-asent-tt.
Yeẓẓa tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-as-tt.
Teẓẓa tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-as-tt.
Neẓẓa tibḥirt ɣef yiri n wasif, ffɣen-d yiselman ččan-aɣ-tt.
Ad k-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Ad kem-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Ad iyi-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Ad aɣ-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Ad as-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Ad asen-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Ad asent-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Ad awen-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Ad awent-yeg Rebbi am tixsi n udrar, taɛrurt telsa, teɛebbuḍt terwa.
Mi ten-twalaḍ, ad d-terreḍ.
Mi ten-twalam, ad d-terrem.
Mi ten-twalamt, ad d-terremt.
Mi ten-walan, ad d-rren.
Mi ten-walan, ad d-rrent.
Mi ten-iwala, ad d-yerr.
Mi ten-twala, ad d-terr.
Mi ten-walaɣ, ad d-rreɣ.
Mi ten-nwala, ad d-nerr.
Iwala-ten kan, yerra-d.
Twala-ten kan, Terra-d.
Iwala-tent kan, yerra-d.
Twala-tent kan, terra-d.
Walaɣ-ten kan, rriɣ-d.
Walaɣ-tent kan, rriɣ-d.
Nwala-ten kan, nerra-d.
Nwala-tent kan, nerra-d.
Twalam-ten, terram-d.
Twalam-tent, terram-d.
Walan-ten, rran-d.
Walan-tent, rran-d.
Walant-ten, rrant-d.
Walant-tent, rrant-d.
Segmi ten-walaɣ, d nekk d iriran.
Segmi tent-walaɣ, d nekk d iriran.
Segmi ten-nwala, d nekkni d iriran.
Segmi tent-nwala, d nekkni d iriran.
Segmi ten-nwala, d nekkenti d iriran.
Segmi tent-nwala, d nekkenti d iriran.
Segmi ten-iwala, d netta d iriran.
Segmi tent-iwala, d netta d iriran.
Segmi ten-twala, d nettat d iriran.
Segmi tent-twala, d nettat d iriran.
Segmi ten-twalam, d kunwi d iriran.
Segmi tent-twalam, d kunwi d iriran.
Segmi ten-twalamt, d kunemti d iriran.
Segmi tent-twalamt, d kunemti d iriran.
Segmi ten-walan, d nutni d iriran.
Segmi tent-walan, d nutni d iriran.
Segmi ten-walant, d nutenti d iriran.
Segmi tent-walant, d nutenti d iriran.
Terniḍ ccbaḥa i teqbaylit s usefru.
Ddeqs n yiḍrisen n teqbaylit i uriɣ.
Mi ara d-yeɣli udlis n teqbaylit gar yifassen-iw, qqareɣ-t.
Tasekla taqbaylit, skudmal tettnnerni.
Aṭas i yettarun tura s teqbaylit.
"Iḍ d wass" d yiwen seg ungalen imezwura n tsekla taqbaylit.
"Iḍ d wass" d ungal n umaru ɛmar Mezdad.
Tira d tikci n tlelli i wallaɣ ad icali.
Ma yella ass-a ffɣeɣ d tilellit, azekka ad refdeɣ diɣen anay amaziɣ.
Wigi d lehdur n yirgazen ɣas ma kkan-d seg yimi n tmeṭṭut.
Mačči d tukarḍa i ukreɣ, mačči d timenɣiwt i nɣiɣ.
Ur dnibeɣ ur ɛsiɣ, ufiɣ-d iman-iw deg lḥebs.
Kksen-iyi tilelli-w kan akka.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad iyi-ikkes tamagit-iw.
Anay amaziɣ d azamul n tmagit-iw.
Tugi tmurt ad teɛqel iman-is.
Neǧǧa iman-nneɣ, neḍfer wiyaḍ.
Wissen acimi i teḍra yid-neɣ akka ?
Amzun nuwi ddeɛwessu.
Lawi iman-ik, ad tiɣzif tudert-ik.
Lawi iman-im, ad tiɣzif tudert-im.
Lawim iman-nwen, ad tiɣzif tudert-nwen.
Lawimt iman-nwent, ad tiɣzif tudert-nwent.
Lawimt iman-nkent, ad tiɣzif tudert-nkent.
Lawit iman-nwen, ad tiɣzif tudert-nwen.
Nudaɣ ɣef tidet ur tt-ufiɣ.
Tnudaḍ ɣef tidet ur tt-tufiḍ.
Tnudam ɣef tidet ur tt-tufim.
Tnudamt ɣef tidet ur tt-tufimt.
Nudan ɣef tidet ur tt-ufin.
Nudant ɣef tidet ur tt-ufint.
Nnuda ɣef tidet ur tt-nufi.
Inuda ɣef tidet ur tt-yufi.
Tnuda ɣef tidet ur tt-tufi.
Ufiɣ-t yettandi i yimerga.
Ufiɣ-tt tettandi i yimerga.
Ufiɣ-ten ttandin i yimerga.
Ufiɣ-tent ttandint i yimerga.
Wa ileqqeḍ azemmur, wa yettandi i yimerga.
Ta tleqqeḍ azemmur, ta tettandi i yimerga.
Wi leqqḍen azemmur, wiyiḍ ttandin i yimerga.
Ti leqqḍent azemmur, tiyiḍ ttandint i yimerga.
Yessenqeb umergu, tesref fell-as texfet.
Yessenqeb uẓerẓur, tesref fell-as texfet.
Yessenqeb uɛeẓwan, tesref fell-as texfet.
Iruḥ ad d-iɣiz tiwekkiwin.
Iɣaz amruj akken ad yandi taxfet.
Ɣazen imerjan akken ad andin tixeftin.
Mi yessefqed ɣer txeftin-is, yufa snat ṭṭfent-d imerga, yiwet ɛeẓẓi, ma d snat-nniḍen zeglent.
Qleɣ tixeftin-ik !
Yeṭṭef-d mraw n yimerga tameddit-a.
Yundi s llazuq.
Ass-a ad andiɣ tiqellaɛin.
Ass-a ad nandi tiqellaɛin.
Ass-a ad yandi tiqellaɛin.
Ass-a ad tandi tiqellaɛin.
Ass-a ad andin tiqellaɛin.
Ass-a ad andint tiqellaɛin.
Iḍelli, d tixeftin i undiɣ.
Yundi lmedif, yeṭṭef-d uccen.
Undiɣ tafdult i uberkan uqerruy.
Reyceɣ amergu, sewweɣ-t-id deg yirij.
Ṭṭameɛ ẓẓerẓur s ufus.
Ṭṭfeɣ-d ɛeẓẓi bu ẓrubat.
Ass-agi uɣaleɣ-d akken, ur d-ṭṭifeɣ ula d ɛeẓẓi.
Ma ur ufiɣ ara tiwekkiwin, ttandiɣ s uɛeqqa n uzemmur.
Ɛemmi Mḥend, akka i as-ssawalen wid i t-yessnen, d yiwen urgaz yeddan ddeqs deg leɛmer.
Nezmer ad t-nesmel gar yimɣaren yellan ɣef tizi n tewser.
Imdanen am netta, tettaǧǧa-ten tezmert ɣas ma netta mazal-it yeṭṭef cwiṭ, ar tura yezga yetteḥrurud acku terra-t tmara.
Aqerruy-is iffelɣed deg tama n sdat d ayen yessehrin anyir-is, ayen d-yeggran seg-s, zerɛen kra n wanẓaden imellalen smektayen-d tawḍuft.
Iseggasen iɛebba ggten, daymi i yeɛkef uɛrur-is, iga am tqellaɛt i ttandin warrac i umergu deg tsemhuyt n tegrest.
Ɛemmi Mḥend iɛedda-d akk fell-asent.
Urǧin ixemmem abrid ad d-yeggri anda akka i d-yeggra.
Yella yettidir deg telwit d twacult-is, tameṭṭut-is, iwumi yessawal “azgen-iw”, nettat isem-is Tasaɛdit, akk d mmi-s Sliman, d winna kan i yesɛa.
Tameṭṭut n Sliman qqaren-as Mennun.
Tudert yedder d twacult-is deg tazwara teččur d tumert.
Yesɛedda kra n yiseggasen n lferḥ ur d-ttuɣalen ara akk.
Kra din yefsi am udfel i d-iwala yiṭij, amzum d targit i yurga.
Ad yeqqim kan ad d-iggar nnhati ta deffir tayeḍ mi ara d-yemmekti izri-s.
Yella kullec yugar fell-as: tazmert, adrim, imeddukal, tarwa, tayri, kra din…
Tayri-s d Tasaɛdit, azgen-is, yid-s yuwi-d abrid n tudert nnig n uzgen n lqern.
Yebḍa yid-s ussan tezdeɣ tezdeg d tafat d wussan zedɣent tillas.
Am wass-a i d-tedda d tislit, d nettat i ira seg wasmi i d-zgant wallen deg wallen.
Ula d nettat tedda deg lebɣi n wayen akken i tt-yettseggiren ad teḥmmel Mḥend Urabaḥ d kra akk i t-id-yesmektayen: tikli-s, taḍsa-s, awehhi-ines, aqesser-is, iselsa-s, udem-is…
Kullec yedda.
Ɣer taggara akken qqaren: “Yemlal uzduz afus-is” neɣ ahat ilaq yella akka wanzi-a: “Temlal tmehrazt azduz-is”.
Qqimen akken azal n uzgen n lqern d azduz iteddez tamehrazt-is war ɛeyyu.
Iseggasen-nni kan imenza, leɛtab yeffeɣ ɣer tafat, d Sliman i d-yernan ad issemɣer tawacult.
Ma d tura, anef-as kan, Ɛemmi Mḥend yerwa-tent.
Ula d axxam yuɣal ur t-yesɛi.
Kra n teswiɛt ddaw n tqenṭyar i yesɛedday uḍan-is.
Wissen acḥal yeqqim akken, yuɣal yufa yiwet n tɛecciwt, yerra-tt d taxxamt-is.
Meqqar din yedduri, ur kkatent ara fell-as legruri n umewan d tegrest.
Cwi kan diɣen tugar-as-d cwiṭ n tezmert s way-s yettmetra učči-ines.
Itteḥrurud seg wadeg ɣer wayeḍ, win t-iɣaḍen ad as-d-yelḥeq kra n yiččenččunen n sserf.
S yis-sen ittaɣ-d ayen ara iqewwet iman-is d wayen ara issizdeg tafekka-s.
Ɣas ma ixuss deg kullec, maca tezdeg yerra-tt nnig akk n tlufa, iḥemmel ad yili zeddig.
Kulfeɣ-as Rebbi i temɣer.
Akka i yennum yeqqar mi yezzuɣur iman-is deg yiberdan, yessutur medden ad t-id-ɣiten s cwiṭ n usurdi s way-s ara d-yaɣ tegella n wass.
Yal ass ideɛɛu ɣer Rebbi ad t-ikkes akkin, ad d-yeǧǧ listeɛ i wid yessagren tazmert.
Iteddu s leɛqel yettxemmim, ugur i t-izeglen wayeḍ ad t-yelḥeq.
Yettemderkal deg yiberdan.
Acḥal n tikkelt i yemceḥ aɣebbar ɣer ccib-is.
Am yiwen ubrid mi yeɣli tibelfudemt, yeqqim ddeqs akken ur d-yekkir ara, yerna yiwen ur d-yejbi ad t-id-isbedd.
Mi ifukk asiwel n usefru, yenna deg wul-is: “Ur ẓriɣ ara ad d-immeslay umedyaz fell-i akkagi, ad as-tiniḍ amzun yettkacaf”.
Yeɛreḍ ad yekker ur yezmir ara.
Yeḥsa mi tuweḍ tfekka-s ɣer lqaɛa, teddez akken i ilaq.
Yemneɛ ur dgedgen ara yiɣsan-is iwessuren iḥeḍmen am usɣar aqdim.
Teḍra yid-s am wakken idux cwiṭ.
Tagut-nni i yedlen allen-is tbeddu tettekkes almi yuɣal yezmer ad iwali sdat-s.
Dɣa imiren kan idher-as yiwen urgaz, acamar-is iɣumm akk udem-is, yettaweḍ-as-d ɣer yidmaren deg wakken ɣezzif.
Iteddu-d srid ɣur-s.
Yeg Rebbi yugad-it, acemma ur yezmir ad t-yexdem.
Yeqqim kan yettraju d acu ara s-yeg wagi i d-yerran srid ɣur-s.
Winna mi d-yuweḍ ɣur-s, yeṭṭef-it ddaw n tɣerdin s yixabbazen-is, irfed-it-id am tmeččimt n taduṭ, isbedd-it-id, yezwi-as akk aɣebbar, maca awal ur t-id-yuli.
Mḥend mi t-tɛedda lxelɛa-nni n tazwara acku yenwa d ayen ur nelhi ara s-yexdem uterras-nni bu ucamar, yebda yettuɣal-d ɣer yiman-is akken i ilaq, yuweḍ almi d-yecmumeḥ i usellak-ines iwumi yenna: “Tanemmirt !”
Winna awal ur as-t-id-yerri.
Yeṭṭef-as kan afus i Ɛemmi Mḥend mi yebda yetteḥrurud cwiṭ cwiṭ.
Tanila i ṭṭfen d tin ara ten-yawin ɣer tɛecciwt n umɣar amattar.
Taɛecciwt-a d yiwet n texxamt n yiwet lḥara yehruran, teddrem akk meḥsub, ala taxxamt-a i d-yeggran tbedd, ssqef-is yettiqi kan cwiṭ mi ara d-teqwu lgarra, wanag yezmer umdan ad yidir daxel-is ma terra-t tmara ur yesɛi ara xir.
Tezga teṭṭurref cwiṭ ɣef temdint, tebɛed ddeqs ɣef uxxam-is amezwaru anda yedder ussan-is n tefsut netta d uzgen-is Tasaɛdit.
“Ayen yelhan ur d-yettɣama”. Akka i yennum yeqqar deg wul-is.
Yella yettidir akken i as-yehwa.
Yexdem, yeɛteb nezzeh, isekker-d tawacult-is deg lɛezza, acemma ur tt-ixuss ɣas ma tixeddimt-is mačči d tin ifazen.
Urǧin yerri taqejjirt-is ɣer deffir, ayen i as-d-tefkiḍ ad t-yexdem, yeṭallay kan ɣer lexlas n leɛtab-is.
Meskin ur yessin ara akk asteɛfu, ihebber yal ass, yugar azger deg umahil.
Ula d Rebbi ur t-iɣull ara, tarzeft s way-s i t-id-iɣat d tazmert n ddkir.
Leqraya ur yeɣri ara aṭas, zik i d-yeṭṭaxer asmi akken i yemmut baba-s Ɛacur.
Din din yeṭṭef amkan-is, ilaq ad yili win ara ixedmen fell-as akk d yemma-s.
Ibges ɣer yixeddim s tidet, daɣ netta, netta d yemma-s ddren deg liser, yerna akukru d leɛdez ur ten-yessin ara akk.
Ala iɣallen-is i yesɛa, d axeddam seg wasmi i d-yekker.
Ɣef wudem-is tidi d takka, fkant-as sser n uzger.
Yemma-s tejba-d ɣur-s tewser, rnan-d ɣur-s wissen acḥal d aṭanen.
Yal ass teqqar i mmi-s awḥid: “Kker a mmi ad tgeḍ axxam akken ad yeɛmer d irgazen, ad d-teǧǧeḍ wid ara irefden isem-ik.
Nekk bɣiɣ ad ferḥeɣ s tissulya-k send ad rzuɣ s axxam-iw aneggaru, axxam-iw n dima.
Welleh-iyi-d kan anda ad rreɣ, ad ruḥeɣ imiren ad ak-tt-id-xeḍbeɣ.
Mḥend ilemẓi yedda deg lebɣi n yemma-s d win-is netta, dɣa yuzen-itt ɣer tin i as-yeččuren tiṭ, tin akken i d-yettmmagar deg ubrid mi ara yeffeɣ neɣ mi ara d-yekcem s axxam.
Tezga amzun tettraju-t ad d-iɛeddi sdat-s akken ad as-tazen yiwen n ucmumeḥ yesmarayen lferḥ s ul-is.
Tasaɛdit, akka i d isem-is, tban teḥmmel Mḥend.
Mḥend ula d netta, iḥemmel Tasaɛdit, yessaram ad tili d tin ara yidiren yid-s, d tin ara yilin d tamwanest-is kra ara tekk tudert.
Nna Xelfiya, yemma-s n Mḥend, ula d nettat teɛǧeb-as teqcict.
Ɣur-s ssifa, leḥdaqa yerna d yelli-s n twacult n nnif.
Tenna i mmi-s: “Ziɣen tessneḍ ad textireḍ a winnat!”
D kemm i iyi-d-irebban a yemma, seg wasmi i d-kkreɣ d kemm tekkateḍ ad ferẓeɣ gar wayen yelhan d wayen n diri.
Tasaɛdit ttwaliɣ-tt deg tama-nni yelhan.
Akka i yella lḥal a yemma neɣ mačči akka? I as-yerra Mḥend s teḍsa.
Akka a mmi, ayen-nniḍen d ayen yuran.
Imalas i d-iteddun ad ɛnuɣ Wardiya Tayidirt, yemma-s n Tsaɛdit, ad tt-ssutreɣ ad iyi-d-tfek yelli-s i mmi.
Maččii kan i uydi i ttarran takmamt, ttarrant-tt diɣen i yiɣid akken ur iteṭṭeḍ, i uzger akken ur itett ara alim mi ara yesserwat, i uqjun akken ur itteɣẓaẓ ara.
Ksiɣ deg temẓi-w.
Ur terni ara aṭas, Nna Xelfiya, amzun tettraju ad tɛeddi tmeɣra akken ad tɣab ɣef wallen.
Truḥ war tuɣalin anda akken ara naweḍ d tirni.
Lṭufan mazal ur d-ilul ara maca Tasaɛdit terfed.
Mḥend yettaǧǧa-t leḥzen n tmettant n yemma-s, yebda yettali-t-id lferḥ n tmeṭṭut-is yellan s tadist.
Yeqqar i Tseɛdit: “Meqqar ad d-ɣermeɣ isem n yemma Xelfiya ma d taqcict neɣ Ɛacur, isem n baba ma d aqcic”.
Xelfiya ur d-tlul ur d-tettlala, d Ɛacur i d-yernan ad issemɣer tawacult.
Argaz bu ucamar aɣezzfan, yiwen ur yessin isem-is, yezga yettektili iberdan kra yekka wass.
Mačči d win yekkaten, maca mi d-yenṭeq s wawal ad yeffeɣ.
Medden akk ssawalen-as “Abudali”.
Seg wasmi akken i yekcem daxel n uqeccabi-ines aberkan ur d-yeffiɣ seg-s.
Mebɛid yettban-d d argaz aberkan, kullec deg-s berrik, iselsa, acekkuḥ, tamart…
Nezzeh i t-ttagaden warrac imecṭaḥ, ma d imeqqranen ttagaden-t i d-yeqqar kra fell-asen acku ma yenna-d kra ɣef wabɛaḍ, ama yelha ama diri-t, iteffeɣ.
Seg wasmi yemlal d Ɛemmi Mḥend ur msefraqen.
Ɛemmi Mḥend yuɣal yeṭṭaxar i tmetrit, ɛeyyunt tgecrar-is.
D Bu ucamar i t-ittliwin, isurdiyen i as-d-ttaken medden ggten, kfan-asen-d i sin yid-sen.
Qqaren-d Bu ucamar d amneɣ n ṭṭrad-nni n tsellullit taɣelnawt, ijuhed mgal Fransa.
Bu ucamar ur yettu ara lxir i as-yexdem Ɛemmi Mḥend deg tallit-nni n tegrawla.
Ula d netta yella d amusebbel, yexdem ayen iwumi yezmer i tegrawla n tmurt-is.
Bu ucamar ur yettu ara tadyant i t-isemlalen d Ɛemmi Mḥend.
Yecfa squqren-t-id yiserdasen n Fransa ad t-nɣen, d netta i d-yufa isellek-it, wanag ur yettidir ara ar ass-a.
Mi d-yettazzal yufa-t-id deg yiwen n leɛzib anda i yettmahal.
Yeɛqel amexluq-a i irewlen, d iserdasen i t-id-iḍefren.
Mi d-yuweḍ ɣer yiri-s ilehhet am uydi deg ɛeyyu, yuwi-t din din ɣer yiwet n teẓwayt, yeffer-it din ddaw n tseṭṭa n uzemmur.
Mi d-leḥqen widak-nni s lemkaḥel-nsen, ula d nutni iban-d ɛeyyu ɣef wudmawen-nsen, nnan-as i Ɛemmi Mḥend ma iwala yiwen umerwal.
Yerra-asen s tilawt netta yettwehhi s ufus-is ɣer sdat akken ad fehmen mazal-it irewwel win akken iɣef ttnadin ad t-id-ṭṭfen.
Kemmlen s tazzla abrid-nsen.
Mi ten-iwala ɛeddan, yedla ɣef win yeffer, yessufeɣ-it-id seg tekwat-is, yefka-as aɛwin-is i d-yuwi i yimekli, yerna-as akebbuḍ i d-yelsa, winna ɣlin-as-d yimeṭṭawen, isuden Ɛemmi Mḥend sya u sya, yennezraq mi yuwi tanila tanemgalt.
Urǧin ad yettu lxir i as-yexdem umɣar amattar.
Bu ucamar neɣ Abudali, tikwal ma yeḥsa leǧyub-is ččuren d sserf, ad iwali kan kra n yinelmaden i ixussen, iban imawlan-nsen d iẓawaliyen, aya yettban-d deg yiselsa i d-ttlusun, iɛennu iqraben-nsen yersen deg teɣmert mi ara tturaren, yettarra daxel-nsen sserf-nni n leǧyub-is i as-d-fkan medden.
Yeḥsa ddunit tɛawed, win yesɛan yedha-d kan d yiman-is, yekkat ad yesɛu ugar.
D Sliman i d-as-gan d isem i uqcic amenzu.
Taseɛdit timnifrit, yeqqim yettfeǧǧiǧ wudem-is.
Deg tmetti Taqbaylit, tameṭṭut yettali-as ccan ma turew-d, ladɣa ma d aqcic ara ikemmlen arfad n yisem n twacult.
Maca tameṭṭut tiɛiqert, tuwi ddnub meskint, tettuɣal ur teswi ara akk, yif-itt wulac.
Leqrar-is d inebran neɣ d ssber ma terna-d fell-as takna, ladɣa ma yella d tin ara d-yeččaren tiɣerɣert d arrac.
Tasaɛdit d Sliman-is i d amenzu, tessaram ad d-ḍefren wayetma-s d yiwet n uletma-s.
Mḥend yettezmumug irennu, yettban-d ɣef wudem-is yefreḥ mi d-yerna ɣur-s urgaz, akken qqaren: “Yerna-d urgaz, terna-d tmegḥelt”.
Maca tamasit tuɣal tegma, ilaq mmi-s ad yekker akken i iwata, acemma ur t-yettxass akken ad igem.
Ad yaf iman-is, ad beɛden fell-as waṭṭanen, ad yennerni, ad yif tizziwin-is.
Mḥend, tikwal irennu ixeddem ula deg yiḍ, aḥbas ulac, yugar azger.
Acḥal d abrid, mi ara d-yuɣal seg lxedma s axxam, d azuɣer i d-yezzuɣur iman-is deg wakken yeɛya.
Wid yesɛan kerrzen fell-as, walan-t lḥif ikbel-it.
S tuzert n wudem ttwenniɛen-as, ttaččaren imi-s s tiẓẓit.
Deg yiḍ ɛeyyu yerna-as, yerwa terẓeg n ddunit.
Ɛemmi Mḥend d Bu ucamar ttɣimin sswayeɛ deg tɛecciwt.
Ɣas ma d taɛecciwt, temmed cwiṭ, tuwi sin yimderḥen yersen ɣef lqaɛa.
Deg tesga d lkanun-nni n zik, akka yugar-d cwiṭ n listeɛ gar sin wussawen-nni d wadeg n tmes.
Ahric ameqqran n wakud sɛeddayen-t i sin yid-sen ẓẓlen tinnegnit deg wussawen-nsen.
Awal gar-asen ur d-yettili, maca yal wa ifhem wayeḍ imi yiwen uɛekkaz i ten-yewwten.
Kra n teswiɛin, segmi ara ffɣen tanezzayt, alma yeɣli yiṭij i d-ttemlilin ɣer tekwat-nsen.
D Bu ucamar i d-iqeṭṭun kra steḥqen, d netta diɣen i yettnawalen tikwal ma yella yiwen deg-sen ur d-yegli ara s tgella yettwaheggan yagi, i asen-d-ttaken wat laɛraḍ n Rebbi.
Bu ucamar iḥemmel ad idelleg, anda i t-uwin yiḍarren-is ad yaweḍ.
Yezga kra yekka wass ittektili iberdan war ɛeyyu.
Daɣ netta, ɣas ma yedda ddeqs deg leɛmer, tazmert-is mazal-itt teǧhed, yettliwi-tt s tikli n dima.
Tuget n yimdanen imeqqranen, ladɣa wid yessen ijerreb-iten, ur ten yettawi ara deg wul-is, aṭas aya i ten-id-yessufeɣ syin, ula d isurdiyen-nsen ur ten-id-yettaṭṭaf ara.
Maca ilemẓiyen d warrac imecṭaḥ, yedda yid-sen acku yeḥsa-ten d imelsiyen, mazal urɛad ten-tekcim twekkiwt isserkayen allaɣ-nsen.
Tikwal ittuẓum awal.
Yettɣimi wissen acḥal, d awal ur d-itteffeɣ seg yimi-s.
Ul yerḥa tazmert ulac, asunded yeɣli ɣef yimi.
Iḥemmel ad yeqqim d warrac, yessen ul-nsen d amelsi.
Walan-t deg yifassen-is ixebbec, ur as-nnin d abudali.
Mḥend ilemẓi s lqella d lɛella i d-yesker mmi-s Sliman.
Yettɣullu iman-is deg waṭas n tɣawsiwin akken mmi-s kra ur t-ittxussu.
Tazmert-is akk yefka-tt ɣef Sliman d Tseɛdit.
Sliman-is, isles-it, isečč-it, isɣer-it, ayen akk i ilaqen ixdem-as-t.
Iḥemmel-it nnig n llazem.
Ula d Sliman iḥemmel baba-s.
Yettaɣ-as awal.
Ur as d-yettawi ara iberriyen.
D aqcic yettɣimin ɣer yiman-is.
D aqcic yeṭṭafaren iwellihen n yimawlan-is d yiselmaden-is.
Daɣ netta yuwi-d iman-is deg uɣerbaz, ulac win ur t-ncekker ara.
Iseggasen ttɛeddayen, netta yettɛeddi seg uswir aɣurbiz ɣer wayeḍ almi yuweḍ ɣer tesdawit ad yeg tizrawin-is tinafellatin.
Netta yuɣal d ilemẓi ma d baba-s d yemma-s terza-d ɣur-sen temɣer.
Mi d-yeqleɛ tixeftin-is seg tesdawit dayen ifukk tizrawin-is, issawel-as-d uwanek ad yeg leqdic-is aɣelnaw.
Isɛedda sin yiseggasen n lɛesker deg tneẓruft n tmurt.
Taggara yuɣal-d ɣer Tzerrajt, anda i as-teɣli timiḍt d wanda i yezdeɣ tezdeɣ twacult-is, i icedha nezzeh.
Yestaɛfa kra n wussan i yestahel aṭas, inuda ɣef yixeddim yufa.
Tixeddimt-is tessuli-d ddeqs aswir n tudert n twacult-is.
Ula d baba-s mi yettkel fell-as, tikkelt yexdem, tikkelt yeqqim, ur t-yeɣsib ara lḥal am zik.
Daɣ netta yefreḥ nezzeh s wamek teffeɣ ttrebga i d-irebba Sliman.
Lxir i as-yexdem mi mecṭuḥ yettuɣal-it-id ass-a yal ass.
D asureg i as-yessurug ddeɛwat n lxir i mmi-s.
Leɛtab i yeɛteb fell-as, yeffeɣ-as ɣer tafat.
Ula d Nna Tasaɛdit, yemma-s, tefreḥ s mmi-s mačči d kra.
Ala isem n Sliman i yezgan deg yimi-s, d acekker deg-s kra yekka wass.
Twala-t tura yuɣal d argaz, Rebbi ad as-ibarek, Lɛesker yesɛedda-t-id, ixeddim ixeddem, yeggra-d kan tura ad as-neg axxam…
“Ilaq tura a Sliman a mmi ad tecbuḍ tizziwin-ik, ha-tent-id s dderya-nsent". I as-tenna yiwet n tikkelt.
D acu ara m-in-iniɣ a yemma? Anect-a d tidet, maca kullec yura.
Wissen kan melmi ara d-yeḍru ? Ahat ɣef wayen i iyi-irzan tura i d-yuweḍ lawan. I d-as-yerra Sliman.
Ih a mmi, meqqreḍ, yerna bɣiɣ ad urareɣ s warraw-ik send ad nɛeddi akkin…
Lebɛid ccer a yemma, yezmer ad tidireḍ lqern.
Qqim kan a mmi, ala win yeččan tiyita i yeḥsan d acu i t-yuɣen.
Anef-iyi tura nekk, nella nhedder fell-ak d tissulya-inek i d-iteddun ma yebɣa Rebbi.
Mel-iyi-d kan taqcict iɣef rsent wallen-ik, ires lxaṭer-ik, ad kkreɣ fell-i ad ak-tt-id-xeḍbeɣ.
Imi tḥerseḍ akka tirni a yemma, ihi tin bɣiɣ ad bḍuɣ tudert-iw yid-s d yelli-s n Dda Maḥmud Uẓebbuj, argaz n Ṭimuc at Wakli.
Anta deg-sent ? Ssneɣ Ṭimuc, ssneɣ yessi-s.
Mačči d tamenzut, tinna ahat tugar-iyi deg leɛmer yerna iɣurr-itt Rebbi deg ssifa.
D tin id-yernan fell-as, qqaren-as Mennun.
Mačči d tin yesɣrayen akken ?
D tin a yemma, tufiḍ-tt-id. D acu ara d-tiniḍ fell-as ?
Ssifa-ines tfaz, tessneḍ ad textireḍ ay aqcic.
Ṭṭbiɛa-s, ur k-skiddibeɣ ara, ur tt-ssineɣ ara.
Kkes aɣilif a yemma, ala aɛǧab ara m-teɛǧeb.
Ad ak-yekkes Rebbi aɣilif.
Awudu kan ad ak-teɛǧeb i kečč, wanag yemma-k a-tt-an ɣef tizi n rrwaḥ…
Uh a Yemma ! Ad teqqimeḍ kan ad d-tuɣaleḍ ɣer lehdur-nni ur ḥmmileɣ ara akk ad asen-sleɣ.
Buh ! Buh ammi ! Maca ɣur-k lḥeqq, d tissulya-inek i d lferḥ-iw ameqqran, mi ɛeddant, ansuf s wayen i d-yefka.
Yuweḍ-d unebdu, tasemhuyt n lfuruḥ, yiwet n tmeɣra talemmast tessemlal sin yimdanen yemyeḥmmalen ad bḍun tudert-nsen sya d tasawent.
Iḥiqel-agi d tsekkurt d Sliman akked Mennun.
Imawlan n yisli yuwi-ten uḥmal n tnufli, taḍsa tugi ad teffeɣ udmawen-nsen.
Islan, iban wayen i asen-yezzin meqqer, ladɣa Sliman yefkan akk ul-is i Mennun.
Lferḥ yessawal i gma-s, ur iɛedda ara useggas, yerna-d urgaz ɣer twacult Urabaḥ.
D Ɛacur i as-fkan d isem, semman-as ɣer jeddi-s.
Nna Tasaɛdit temmut seg lferḥ simira ad temmet s tidet.
Yuwi-tt waṭan tuḍen seg waṭas aya.
Ɛemmi Mḥend yeqqim-d iman-is.
Ur t-tuwi ara ddunit, anda yeqqim mačči din.
Yebḍa fell-as uzgen-is, yeggra-d ala iman-is.
Yeqqar: “Lufan i zwareɣ nekk xir, maca, wa d lebɣi n Rebbi, yiwen ur yeẓri melmi i d nnuba-s”.
Sliman yekkat amek ara yessenqes cwiṭ n leḥzen ameqqran i d-yeɣlin ɣef baba-s teǧǧa yemma-s maca iɛǧeb-as kan acku tiyita yečča umɣar tḥuza-t akken i ilaq.
Iḥar deg-s mmi-s.
Mennun tuɣal ur tezmir ara akk i tegnit tamaynut i d-ixelqen deffir n tmettant n temɣart-is i irefden taɛkemt taẓayant mi tezga yal ass tettliwi amɣar-is.
Mennun d taxeddamt, d taselmadt deg yiwen uɣerbaz ur neggug ara ɣef uxxam-is, ma d Sliman yettmahal deg tneẓruft deg unẓul n tmurt.
Itekk din azal n sin wayyuren neɣ ur uwiḍen ara, mi tfukk twala-a, yettawi-d sin yimalasen n yimuras.
Yesɛedday-iten d twacult-is, baba-s, tameṭṭut-is, ladɣa Ɛacur i yettcedhi aṭas aṭas.
Lawan i txeddem Mennun, tettak mmi-s i yiwet n tnaragt tettɛassa-as-t.
Almi ara d-teffeɣ seg umahil i t-id-tettarra s axxam.
Mi ara yili Sliman ur ixeddem ara d netta i yettrebbin Ɛacur, idehhu-d yid-s ahat xir n yemma-s.
Jeddi-s Mḥend, iḥemmel nezzeh ad yetturar yid-s, ladɣa mi yuweḍ azal n sin yiseggasen d uzgen deg tudert-is.
Yettaṭṭaf-it deg yirebbi-s.
Ulac turart ur igi ara yid-s.
Tin ahat i ḥemmlen i sin, ama d Ɛacur ama d jeddi-s d turart n “zleɣmani kiṭ…kiṭ…” neɣ “lbaḥ… lbaḥ…”
Ad yili uqcic yeqqim fell-as, jeddi-s ad as-d-yerfed afus-is ayeffus, ad as-yeldi iḍudan, ad as-yeslaf i tdikelt n ufus-is netta yeqqar: “Lbaḥ… lbaḥ…”
Ad yuɣal ad yebdu aɛkaf n yiḍudan-nni s nnuba, ad yebdu seg umecṭuḥ, ad ikemmel: “Meẓẓi meẓẓi meskin, Saɛid usakin, Ṭṭelba n lexzin, Amcaḥ n terbutin, Adebbuz n telkin, lbaḥ… lbaḥ…”
Lferḥ ameqqran n Ɛemmi Mḥend d akud yesɛedday d mmi-s n mmi-s.
Iḥemmel-it am leɛmer-is.
Taḥawact-is akk yefka-tt deg tiɣin n tqaqacin d yilellucen i Ɛacur.
Ahat d dehhu i idehhu d uqcic amecṭuḥ i as-itettun ilem-nni ameqqran i as-d-teǧǧa Tseɛdit-is.
Yella teɛreq-as akk amek-itt tudert, ikcem-it-id yir axemmem ara yeglun yis-s.
Cwiṭ cwiṭ yuɣal ittaf-d i tudert anamek amaynut mi yettwanas Ɛacur.
Ladɣa deg tidet d Ɛacur i yettwanasen jeddi-s.
Maca mi ara fakken yimuras i Sliman, Ɛacur ttaken-t i tǧaret-nni i t-yettɛassan, yemma-s tdehhu-d d uselmed-ines, ala Ɛemmi Mḥendi d-iggerrin iman-is deg uxxam.
Iɛewweq d acu ara yexdem kra itekk wass.
Yettidir deg liqliq.
Yiwen umkan ur t-yuwi.
Yettkuffur.
Yettḍeyyiq lxaṭer-is.
Yekreh ula d iman-is.
Yal ass akken i t-yesɛedday, d ayen i t-yerran d taɛkemt taẓayant ɣef teslit-is.
Mačči d tikkelt i d-teffeɣ seg uɣerbaz, teǧǧan ixeddim-is, tettazzel-d s amɣar-is mi as-d-ssawalen medden wissen d acu akka i t-yuɣen.
Ad d-tekkuki s lxelɛa, ad t-id-taf deg uxxam ad as-tiniḍ yessukuf, amzun ad t-iffeɣ rruḥ.
Imiren kan ad t-tessiweḍ ɣef tkarrust ara d-tekru ɣer wammas n tdawsa ad t-iwali umsujji.
Akka i d-tḍerru acḥal d abrid.
Mennun teɛya, tesber acḥal almi d yiwen wass tuweḍ tfidi ɣer yiɣes, mi d-yusa urgaz-is, temla-as-d akk ayen yellan.
D acu i d tifrat n uɣbel am wa ? I d-as-tenna.
D acu ara m-d-iniɣ ? Nekk asmi ara d-uɣaleɣ seg tneẓruft, ttafeɣ-t-id ur t-yuɣ ara.
Ibedd ɣer yiman-is akken i ilaq.I d-as-yerra.
D tidet akka i yella lḥal, maca ad tuɣaleḍ kan ɣer sseḥra, Ɛacur ttawiɣ-t ɣer tin i as-d-izeggen, ad t-id-yebdu imiren umejnun-is.
Ad as-tinid d wayeḍ, mačči akk d Dda Mḥend ukyis yuklalen leqder.
Ihi amek ara nexdem ?
Nekk ma yella ruḥeɣ sya, lxaṭer-iw ilaq ad yerked, ad yethedden, mačči aɣbel n lbeɛd d yixeddim ad d-yernu win n uxxam.
I lufan ad t-nawi ad yidir deg uxxam n yimɣaren, aṭas n tmital-is i yellan din, meqqar ad yaf d wanwa ara yehder akken ur yettaẓẓay ara fell-as wakud.
Sliman yeqqim ddeqs yettxemmim, ur yebɣi ara ad yazen baba-s i t-id-yesɛan, i t-id-irebban ɣer uxxam yeččuren ala d iwessura.
Maca, s tama-nniḍen, yugad i d-iḍerrun yid-s mi yettɣimi iman-is deg uxxam.
Nnig n nnhaya-as i yeɛfes ɣef wul-is, yeqbel asumer n tmeṭṭut-is.
Ihi azekka ad t-nawi ɣer din, ahat ad yennam, ad yuɣal ad yaf iman-is gar tizziwin-is.
Azekka-nni, cebbḥen-as, uwin-t deg sin yid-sen s axxam n yimɣaren.
Tsuɛef-it yiwen n tbalizt yeččuren d yiselsa d tɣawsiwin ara yesteḥq.
Uwḍen ɣer din, Sliman iwala anemhal n usɣur-nni, iɛemmer kra n lekwaɣeḍ, yestenya-ten, yuɣal yedda yid-sen yiwen n uxeddam.
Issekcem-iten daxel n yiwet n texxamt, ur meqqret ur mecṭuḥet, d talemmast.
Deg yiwet n tesga yella yiwen srir, fell-as ussu, deg tayeḍ tbedd yiwet n texzant, ldin-d tawwurt-is, gren tabalizt-nni n Ɛemmi Mḥend.
Segmi i d-bdan abrid, yiwen ur t-id-yuli wawal, ladɣa Ɛemmi Mḥend.
Deg texxamt-nni tamaynut ines, yeqqim ɣef yiri n srir netta yeldi kan arquqen-is yeṭallay kan ɣer yiwet n tama.
Ruḥen-d, ǧǧan-t-in din iman-is.
Ɛemmi Mḥend yeṭṭes yiwen yiḍ deg uxxam-nni neɣ xir, yesɛedda din yiwen yiḍ imi allen-is ur tent-yeqmic tikkelt.
Azekka-nni yesseɣfel anadaf n tewwurt tameqqrant n uxxam n yimɣaren, yeffeɣ syin yiwen ur t-id-yeẓri.
Mi izeggen wass, d lawan n yimekli, rujan-t ad d-iɛeddi ɣer tzeqqa n wučči, ulac.
Sfeqden kra n yiɛessasen n din ɣer texxamt-is ufan-tt d tilemt.
Nudan fell-as akk anda-nniḍen, ur t-ufin ara.
Ssawlen i Sliman, ulsen-as ayen yeḍran.
Din din yerra s axxam n temsulta anda yeccetka ɣef rrwaḥ n baba-s.
Nudan ddeqs yimsulta ɣef Ɛemmi Mḥend maca lexbar-is ur d-iban ara.
Ha-t akka tura deg tɛecciwt-is m yiɣiɣden, isenned deg wussu-s, iwunes-it umeddakel Bu ucamar i yerra d ameddakel yifen akk imeddukal segmi i t-id-isuɛef ɣer tekwat-is mi yeɣli akken yir aɣelluy.
Ɛemmi Mḥend yuɣal d amattar wala ad yidir deg uxxam n yimɣaren d temɣarin yettrajun din ala lmut ad d-tas ad ten-tawi.
Netta yebɣa ad yeddu, ad icali, ad iwali medden, medden ad t-id-walin mebla ma ɛeqlen-t-id neɣ ma ulac ad t-ssiwḍen ɣer mmi-s.
Ɣas akken d amɣar, yal imalas yettaweḍ s tuffra alma d axxam-is akken ad iwali mmi-s n mmi-s Ɛacur i iḥemmel am leɛmer-is.
Mi ara yaweḍ ɣer din, ad d-yezg deffir n yiwen useklu, syin d lmendad ɣer texxamt anda yettili Ɛacur d yemma-s.
Ma yeldi usfaylu, syin i yeṭṭallay.
Tekkat deg wul-is tmeɣra s yiḍbbalen mi ara iwali aqcic amecṭuḥ deg yirebbi n yemma-s.
Amer ittaf, deg yirebbi-s ara yili akken ad yurar yid-s zleɣmani kiṭ kiṭ.
Ur irewwu ara tamuɣli deg-s.
Tikwal ittuɣal-d akken ur t-iwala, ittaf asfaylu-nni yuɣal.
Yettɣaḍ-it lḥal nezzeh, kra yekka wass netta teḍra yid-s amzun d kra neɣ kra i t-ixussen.
Ih, d tudemt n Ɛacur i t-ixussen.
Ittuɣal akken ɣer tɛecciwt-is.
Bu ucamar yessen Ɛemmi Mḥend akken i ilaq, amzun yeɣra-t.
Yeḥsa d acu i t-yettawin s axxam-is, yeḥsa d acu i yettarran tawenza-s tekres, acku acḥal d abrid i t-yeḍfer, yettawi yid-s asurif mebla ma iwala-t-id.
Izegg-as-d mebɛid, yettɛassa-t akken ttɛassan lṭufan.
Ɛemmi Mḥend ma yezgel ur iwala ara mmi-s n mmi-s deg uzal, yettwali-t deg yiḍ deg targit mi t-yuwi nnadam.
Yiwen wass akken yuɣ tannumi, yeḥrured s axxam-is.
Yuweḍ kan yeɛna lǧedra-nni n useklu anda i yettddari akken yiwen ur t-id-yettwali.
Yusa-d ad iṭallay Ɛacur war ɛeyyu.
Idher-as ɣef wussu yeqqim, iẓẓel tiqejjirin-s tibahdaduzin, yetturar s fettusin-s yerfed d asawen, netta yesqelɛud, yettaḍsa.
Amzun i jeddi-s i d-yettazen taḍsa-nni ines.
“Akken a mmi mmi, akken…” Tislit-is Mennun, ur d-tɛedda ara akk ɣer mmi-s segmi i t-teǧǧa yetturar ɣef srir.
Yeqqim akken Ɛemmi Mḥend yesmuqul deg tugna yifen akk tugniwin, tin i d-yesskanen tayri n tasa-s, Ɛacur-is, almi iwala ddexxan iteffeɣ-d seg ṭṭaq-nni.
Mebla ma ixemmem yekkuki ɣer daxel n uxxam-is.
Yerra srid ɣer texxamt n uniwel, yufa tekker deg-s tmes, teṭṭef deg tgida d yisɣimen n usɣar d kra n yifecka igan s plastik akk d tewwurt yeldin.
Yeɛreḍ ad tt-yesnes s yiwen n ssḍel i d-yeččur d aman maca skudmal tzehher.
Tuɣal tenṭeg ɣer texxamin-nniḍen, ma d ddexxan yeɣli-d am tagut ɣef lḥara merra, ur tezmireḍ ad twaliḍ lmitra sdat-k.
Mennun, tislit-is, wissen anda i terra, teffeɣ ahat ad d-taɣ kra neɣ kra, teǧǧa times deg tnawalt tuɣ, wissen d acu i d-tettheggi i yimekli, teǧǧa diɣ mmi-s yetturar ɣef wussu n texxamt n yiḍes.
Ɛemmi Mḥend yeskuffer-it ddexxan i d-yuɣen akk axxam.
Mi iwala kan ur yezmir ara ad yesnes times-nni tagejdurt, dɣa imiren kan yerra ɣer texxamt-nni n yiḍes.
Idher-as Ɛacur deffir n ddexxan yuwḍen ɣer din, iwala-t amzun yecmumeḥ-d i jeddi-s.
Yuweḍ kan ɣur-s, irfed-it-id seg tɣerdin, yerra srid ɣer ṭṭaq-nni yeldin, isfel-it-id syin, ma d netta ma d kra n ddexxan i isebleɛ, yerna ur yezmir ara ad d-yeffeɣ s usfaylu, yeqqim din, yeɣli tibelfudemt ɣef wussu.
Mennun, imiren i d-tuɣal s teqbat n tmellalin.
Mi twala ddexxan iteffeɣ-d sya u sya seg uxxam-is, yeffeɣ-itt leɛqel.
Tzeḥlelli timellalin-nni, tezzeɛbeḍ s axxam-is.
Yuɣal-it-id rruḥ mi twala mmi-s berra i uxxam, ddaw n ṭṭaq yettmurud ɣef rrbiɛ.
Temmeɣ terfed-it-id, nettat tettuɣal ɣer deffir ɣef ddexxan-nni i d-tettdeggir tmes inetɛen akken i ilaq deg uxxam-is.
Mi akken tettarra aḍar ɣer deffir, twala yiwen urgaz bu ucamar yekcem mebla aḥezzeb ɣer daxel n uxxam iwumi d-tezzi merra tmes.
Bu ucamar, am leɛwayed-is, yeṭṭafar dima Ɛemmi Mḥend, ass-nni wissen d acu i t-in-yeṭṭfen, iɛeṭṭel-n cwiṭ.
Send ad yekcem, iger aqeccabi-ines deg yiwet n tbettit n waman yersen tbedd ɣef yiri n yiwet n tḥanut, yuɣal yelsa-t kan akken yeẓbubi d aman, imiren dɣa yudef s axxam ireqqen.
Inuda akka d wakka almi iwala yiwet n tfekka teẓẓel ɣef wussu.
D tin n Ɛemmi Mḥend i d-ssukk s usfaylu, yerna-d netta deffir-s syin.
Medden i d-yettnezzihen deg ubrid ttserfiqen i sin-nni n yimɣaren, Bu ucamar d Ɛmmi Mḥend yeẓẓlen tinnegnit mi t-yessers umeddakel-is deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Argaz asellak teṭṭef-it tusut.
Mi t-iɛedda cwiṭ lḥers ideg yella, yeddem-d Ɛemmi Mḥend, iḥbes-d takerrust tamezwarut i d-iɛeddan, iger-it daxel-is ɣer deffir, netta yerkeb ɣer sdat, anehhar yefhem yerra srid ɣer sbiṭar mebla kra n usteqsi.
Uwḍen bih bih ɣer sbiṭar, amsujji mi iṭall amuḍin, yufa-t mazal yessnuffus, dɣa iga-as akk tigawin n win yella deg waddad-is.
Yuɣal yessendeh kra n yixeddamen, rran-t ɣer yiwet n texxamt anda ara yesgunfu.
Tafekka-s temneɛ, ur tt-id-tuwiḍ ara tmes, d idmaren-is i yečcan tiyita mi ijexxer ma d kra n ddexxan.
Deg yiwen wussu n texxamt anda i t-rran, isenned tinnegnit, iggar-d nnefs s leɛqel, ma d ameddakel-is Bu ucamar yeqqim ɣef usɣim ɣer yiri-s, yettraju-t ad d-yerr s lexber.
Izeggen yiḍ, i sin yid-sen yuwi-ten nnadam.
Mennun mazal ur tt-tɛedda ara lxelɛa, tbedd deg tlemmast n ubrid am lmernuna deg tlemmast n unrar.
Teṭṭef mmi-s ur yuɣ kra, deg yiɣallen.
Teṭṭallay deg yisexsayen snusun times akken ad d-smenɛen axxam-is ur yettkemmil ara timerɣiwt.
Ɣer taggara, irgazen n tmes, ssawḍen ad rnun lɛafya, axxam mazal-it ibedd, d kra n tlufa igan s usɣar neɣ s plastik i yerɣan.
Mennun mi tfaq tuɣal-d akk ɣer yiman-is, tessawel imiren i urgaz-is, tules-as-d akk ayen yeḍran.
Yeqqim Sliman yesqewqiw deg usawal, ɛerqen-as lehdur deg wakken yexleɛ.
lufan mačči d netta i d-iseflen Ɛacur s ṭṭaq ɣer berra talfi yerɣa.
D acu ara k-iniɣ?
Timerɣiwt ur yerɣi ara ma d ddexxan aṭas i ijexxer, akka tura a-t-an deg sbiṭar.
Tameddit-a ad n-awḍeɣ, d asafag ara n-ṭṭfeɣ.
D Ɛemmi Mḥend i d-yukin d amezwaru, yufa-d ɣef yiri-s yeqqim umeddakel n tidet.
Ula d Bu ucamar yerna cwiṭ, yuki-d ula d netta.
Yecmumeḥ-as-d yiwen ucmumeḥ Ɛemmi Mḥend urǧin t-iwala ɣer yiwen, ula d netta yerra-as-t.
Udem n umuḍin yerna deg tewreɣ.
Tettaṭṭaf-it yiwet n tusut, tetthuccu akk tafekka-s, ad as-tiniḍ ad d-ddun yidmaren-is.
Addad n tdawsa-s ur isefraḥ ara.
Azekka-nni tanezzayt, Sliman d Mennun bedden-asen ɣef umnar n tewwurt n texxamt n sbiṭar i umuḍin d Bu ucamar.
Sliman yemmeɣ ɣef baba-s yessudun deg-s sya u sya netta yeqqar yettales-as: “Suref-iyi a baba ayen akk i ak-xedmeɣ, ččiɣ-ak lxir, nfiɣ-k seg uxxam-ik yerna tesmenɛeḍ-d mmi Ɛacur seg lmut”.
Mennun, awal ur tt-id-yuli, xenqen-tt yimeṭṭawen.
Bu ucamar iwexxer cwiṭ ɣer deffir, ula d netta ɣlin-as-d yimeṭṭawen ɣas ma ahat seg wasmi i yefra ṭṭrad yuwi mgal Fransa ur d-yettru tikkelt almi d ssa-a.
Sebɛa n yiseggasen d uzgen, yettnaɣ deg yidurar n tmurt akken ad as-d-tuɣal tlelli-is i d-as-rekḍen.
Isebbel tarwiḥt-is seg wass amenzu mi yeffeɣ, almi tefra.
Tirga ffɣent mxalfa, kra n wayen-nni akk yenwa ur d-yelli ara seg wussan imenza n timunnent ar ass-a.
Yerra tamegḥelt-is i lḥukuma, ur isteqsa ɣef yiwen neɣ ɣef kra, dɣa yerra-tt d amenṭer deg yiberdan.
Yeẓra ɣef wacu i ttseqqin.
Ur yeɣfil seg zik yuki.
Ur yegzi acimi i ɣlin, kra nnan-as ɣef tlelli.
Yexsi wul-is am tergin, ur yelli d abudali.
Ɛemmi Mḥend, ula d netta, allen-is teddunt d imeṭṭi amzun d leḥmali.
Inṭeq-d s leɛqel yenna-asen: “Acimi ur d-tuwim ara yid-wen Ɛacur, cedhaɣ ad t-ẓreɣ".
D ayen d-yenna i yexdem.
Sliman ur iɛeṭṭel ara, yerna kra yuɣal-d s mmi-s Ɛacur, ǧǧan-t yinadafen n tewwurt n sbiṭar iɛedda-d.
Iwala-t kan jeddi-is, yuzen-as yiwet n teḍsa teččur d tayri.
Iweddeɛ ifassen-is ɣur-s ad as-t-id-leḥqen.
Yeṭṭef-it-id, iḥnec-it-id ɣer yidmaren-is.
Isuden-it sya u sya netta yettales kan i tenfalit “A Ɛacur a mm ! A Ɛacur a mmi !”
Maca tusut i t-yerwin ur t-teǧǧi ara akk ad yerwu mmi-s n mmi-s.
Iḥulfa i yiman-is tettaǧǧa-t tezmert-is cwiṭ cwiṭ.
Yenna i mmi-s Sliman: “Awit-t tura akkin s axxam, ssufɣet-t sya”.
Laɛqel ur t-yeffiɣ ara, yeḥsa d tamettant i t-id-yettqassan.
Sliman yefka mmi-s i yiwet n tnaragt n umsujji, tuwi-t yid-s anda-nniḍen.
Ɛemmi Mḥend yezzi-d merra ɣef wudmawen n wid iḥemmel, mmi-s sliman, tislit-is Mennun, d umeddakel-is Bu ucamar, yerna kra yessusem amzun d iḍes i yeṭṭes, netta ziɣ d lamana i yuwḍen ɣer bab-is.
Bu ucamar, acḥal d abrid i iga tigawt am ta deg udrar mi iẓaẓ ɣer umedakel-is i t-yeǧǧan, imdel-as allen, yesseggra-as-d awal: “Ɣer din a tirrugza”. Yeṭṭef tawwurt yeffeɣ…
Iɣaḍ-it aṭas umeddakel-is yemmuten.
Yettru mi i t-yeǧǧa iruḥ.
Ur yenwi ara akka ara ad as-teḍru.
Ur as-yeṭṭif ara cceḥna i mmi-s.
Yegguma ad yettu lxir i as-yexdem.
Isebbel tudert-is ɣef mmi-s n mmi-s.
Tudert-is yefka-tt d asfel ɣef mmi-s n mmi-s.
Awi-as-t yebɣa ad t-iẓer.
Awit-as-t yebɣa ad t-iẓer.
Awimt-as-t yebɣa ad t-iẓer.
Yuwi-as-t, yeẓra-t.
Tuwi-as-t, yeẓra-t.
Uwiɣ-as-t, yeẓra-t.
Nuwi-as-t, yeẓra-t.
Tuwim-as-t, yeẓra-t.
Tuwimt-as-t, yeẓra-t.
Ur as-t-uwiɣ, ur t-yeẓri.
Ur as-t-tuwiḍ, ur t-yeẓri.
Ur as-t-tuwim, ur t-yeẓri.
Ur as-t-tuwimt, ur t-yeẓri.
Ur as-t-uwin, ur t-yeẓri.
Ur as-t-uwint, ur t-yeẓri.
Ur as-t-nuwi, ur t-yeẓri.
Taḍsa d lheffa n yiḍarren d ugrireb n yiẓra imecṭaḥ ad sen-d-tesleḍ mebɛid.
D ilemẓiyen n taddart n Tɣalaḍt i d-yuɣalen seg teẓgi i d-yezgan deffir n udrar.
Abrid yesgesser, teddun ttaḍsan ɣas ma ɣef wudmawen-nsen banen-d ɛyan nezzeh.
Refden-d ɣef tuyat-nsen ijga.
Tal tarbaɛt n tlata n yirgazen tɛebba-d yiwen n ujgu, yiwen deg-sen ɣer sdat, yiwen ɣer deffir, aneggaru deg tlemmast.
Tlata n yijga i yettemḍafaren deg ubrid yeččuren d ikeddran.
Ihi tẓa n medden i d-idhan s taluf-a n uɛebbi n yijga ma d semmus-nniḍen uwin-d yid-sen allalen n uqedder d ugzam n usɣar am icuqar d tgelziyam d tmenčarin.
Tarbaɛt yeɛyan ad tt-tesseɛfu tayeḍ alamma uwḍen ɣer taddart anda yella uxxam n Dda Meqqran.
Ajemmaɛ n lmal n taddart n Tɣalaḍt meqqer.
Yal axxam yekki deg-s s yiwen n yixef neɣ ugar.
Ilemẓiyen n taddart kessen s nnuba almend n umḍan n waxfiwen i sɛant twaculin-nsen.
Ma ɣur-sent yiwen n yixef n lmal am taɣaḍt neɣ tixsi d tayessawt n yiwen n wass, ma ɣur-sent sin waxfiwen d tayessawt n sin wussan atg...
Imeksawen iwimi d-tuweḍ nnuba ttnekkaren-d zik send tafrara.
Ttɛeddayen-d ɣef yixxamen si tama wadda alamma d tin n ufella n taddart.
Yidir d Leḥlu d nnuba-nsen, yal yiwen iɛleq-d leǧbira n wusran anda i d-iger aɣrum aquran d kra n yiniɣman d zzit n uzemmur.
Yal axxam iɣef d-kkan berrun-d wa i taɣaḍt wayeḍ i txsi d warraw-is.
Asɣar n uẓebbuj aquran deg ufus ayeffus yis-s sɛukkuzen neɣ ttwehhin ɣer wulli ad d-uɣalent s abrid ma ffɣent-t.
Leḥlu yezwar sdat n tqeḍɛit, ma d Yidir d sin yiḍan ggran.
Aydi yetturebban yeẓẓwer i tyessawt, yessen ad d-yerr izimer neɣ iɣid ma yeɛzel ɣef tqeḍɛit ma ulac ad t-izuɣer wuccen ɣer yiɣẓer ad t-yečč.
Mi ara awḍen yimeksawen ɣer wadeg anida ara ikes lmal, ttserriḥen i tɣeṭṭen d wulli ad calint akken ad d-nadint ɣef yimɣi i iḥemmlent ad t-ččent.
Rrbiɛ yegget acku deg tsemhuyt n tefsut i nella.
Imeksawen ad d-bedden mebɛid ad ttɛassan ma ur d-ixutel wuccen iɣid neɣ ma ur yewḥil ara yizimer deg yinijel.
Kra yekka wass d tagi i d lxedma-nsen.
Imdanen imeksawen ssexdamen allen-nsen deg tyessawt ma d iḍan imeksawen ssexdamen allen d wanzaren-nsen, seg wanda i d-tejba rriḥa n wuccen ad tt-mmagren s useglef.
Biccuḥ, akken i as-qqaren warrac, yeḥṣa ur yezmir ara i uqjun, dɣa ad yerwel d taffugt.
Maca ala tuɣalin ara d-yuɣal, wissen kan melmi.
Ad yeǧǧ alamma yeɣfel uydi ad yeḥweṣ izimer amecṭuḥ, ad t-yawi ɣer wabɛaḍ icudax ad t-yečč deg lisser.
Ḥacama kan dayen wanag imeksawen d yiḍan ur yettɛedday ara fell-asen uzaylal, aɣfal ur t-ssinen, zgan dima ukin.
Kra yeḍran sdat-sen ɣef tiṭ-nsen.
Ččan-as wuccanen tixsi i umeksa.
Yečča-as wuccen tixsi i umeksa.
Izimer-nni d uccen i t-yeččan.
Mi d-yeḥḍer yiḍ, yeggar umeksa lmal-is s asensu.
Aqḍar, deg unebdu, ikes deg udrar.
Mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ, ksiɣ.
Ttidiren Leqbayel s tfellaḥt d ttrebga n lmal.
Yemla-as amek ara yeddu deg tudert-is.
Yemla-as amek ara teddu deg tudert-is.
Yemla-asen amek ara ddun deg tudert-nsen.
Yemla-asent amek ara ddunt deg tudert-nsent.
Mliɣ-as amek ara yeddu deg tudert-is.
Mliɣ-ak amek ara tedduḍ deg tudert-ik.
Mliɣ-am amek ara tedduḍ deg tudert-im.
Mliɣ-awen amek ara teddum deg tudert-nwen.
Mliɣ-awent amek ara teddumt deg tudert-nwent.
Mliɣ-asen amek ara ddun deg tudert-nsen.
Mliɣ-asent amek ara ddunt deg tudert-nsent.
Yewwet-ik wugur teɣliḍ.
Yewwet-ikem wugur teɣliḍ.
Yewwet-iken wugur teɣlim.
Yewwet-ikent wugur teɣlimt.
Yewwet-iten wugur ɣlin.
Yewwet-itent wugur ɣlint.
Yewwet-iyi wugur ɣliɣ.
Yewwet-aɣ wugur neɣli.
Ttrajuɣ simira ad d-yaweḍ.
Ttrajuɣ simira ad d-taweḍ.
Ttrajuɣ simira ad d-tawḍem.
Ttrajuɣ simira ad d-tawḍemt.
Ttrajuɣ simira ad d-awḍen.
Ttrajuɣ simira ad d-awḍent.
Lunis d yiwen uqcic n mraw n yiseggasen deg tudert-is
D yiwen ugrud am yigerdan akk n taddart i iḥemmlen aṭas turart imi tamasit n ddunit mazal ur ten-id-tuwiḍ.
Tudert tettban-asen-d d talewwɣant.
Aɣilif ur t-ssinen, ur ttnadi ad t-issinen.
Amzun zren daxel n temda n tiqecmaɛt, asellek ulac.
Turart tezga kra itekk wass.
Lufan ad iyi-ssextiren ad qqimeɣ kan d aqcic.
Ddunit n warrac iman-is.
D netta i d-yufraren d amezwaru gar sat tmerwin n yimeddukal-is.
D ayen i yesferḥen aṭas imawlan-is ladɣa baba-s i t-iḥemmlen nnig n llazem imi ala netta i yesɛa.
Yemma-s akken diɣen, tra-t am tmemmuct n tiṭ-is.
Ayen i d-yessuter yawi-t.
Bedden ɣur-s i sin akken i iwata, ahat lufan ad d-imenni awezɣi, ad as-t-id-ɣeḍlen seg yigenni neɣ seg lqaɛa.
Deg yimuras imeqqranen, anda yedda baba-s ad t-yawi yid-s.
Isselmad-as ayen ur d-yettmmagar ara deg uɣerbaz.
Ɣas ma ssaɛezzen-t netta d tmeṭṭut-is maca ttrebga-s d tamezwarut.
Bɣan ad t-id-sekren d argaz ara inefɛen timetti mačči d win ara tt-iḍurren.
Kra yettawi yid-s asurif ama ɣer lexla ama ɣer ssuq yettak-as baba-s dima timsirin yerzan tudert n umdan d wamek ara tt-iqabel.
Caɛban ur yeɣri ara, maca, baba-s netta, jeddi-s n lunis, yesɣer-it deg teqbaylit.
Taqbaylit mačči d tameṭṭut neɣ d tameslayt kan.
Taqbaylit d tikli n umdan, d aqader, d akukru, d aḥezzeb, d tirrugza, d nnif, d sswab, d aqili, d insayen, d asuref d tɣariwin akk yelhan.
A-t-an anda i yebɣa Caɛban ad yebbeɣ mmi-s.
Tikli-s iseggmen, netta, iwret-itt-id ɣer baba-s.
Ula d lḥirfa n ubennay ɣur-s i tt-id-yuwi, akken qqaren: “Issers umzil afḍis, irfed-it mmi-s”.
Caɛban yeddem tafḍist n baba-s, ibennu ixxamen i medden.
Tamɛict deg tmurt n Leqbayel tewɛer nezzeh.
Tuget n yilmeẓyen-is ttinigen ɣer tmura n utaram, ladɣa ɣer Fransa.
Wid i d-yeqqimen ttmecččawen yal ass d ddunit ur nettqili akken ad sɣezzfen cwiṭ deg tudert-nsen.
Cwi kan tella tmestla gar yimdanen, wa yettɛiwin wa, taɛkemt i ttbabban tettifsus.
Akka tura, ddeqs n tefyar i uriɣ.
Akka tura, mačči drus n tefyar i uriɣ.
Akka tura, buhan n tefyar i uriɣ.
Akka tura,drus maḍi n tefyar i uriɣ.
Akka tura, drus n tefyar i uriɣ.
Akka tura, cwiṭ n tefyar i uriɣ.
Akka tura, mačči aṭas n tefyar i uriɣ.
Yenna-iyi-d, azekka ad awḍeɣ alma d taddart.
Yenna-ak-d, azekka ad yaweḍ alma d taddart.
Tenna-ak-d, azekka ad Taweḍ alma d taddart.
Yenna-am-d, azekka ad yaweḍ alma d taddart.
Tenna-am-d, azekka ad taweḍ alma d taddart.
Nnan-ak-d, azekka ad awḍen alma d taddart.
Nnan-am-d, azekka ad awḍen alma d taddart.
Nnant-ak-d, azekka ad awḍent alma d taddart.
Nnan-am-d, azekka ad awḍent alma d taddart.
Nnan-awen-d, azekka ad awḍen alma d taddart.
Nnan-akent-d, azekka ad awḍen alma d taddart.
Nnan-asen-d, azekka ad awḍen alma d taddart.
Nnan-asent-d, azekka ad awḍen alma d taddart.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i as-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i am-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i asen-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i asent-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i awen-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i awent-nniɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i iyi-d-tenniḍ.
Ayen akken i iyi-d-tenniḍ, ttuɣ-t.
Ayen akken i iyi-d-tenna, ttuɣ-t.
Ayen akken i iyi-d-yenna, ttuɣ-t.
Ayen akken i iyi-d-tennam, ttuɣ-t.
Ayen akken i iyi-d-tennamt, ttuɣ-t.
Ayen akken i iyi-d-nnan, ttuɣ-t.
Ayen akken i iyi-d-nnant, ttuɣ-t.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad ttuɣ ayen i iyi-d-yenna.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad ttuɣ ayen i iyi-d-tenna.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad ttuɣ ayen i iyi-d-tennam.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad ttuɣ ayen i iyi-d-tennamt.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad ttuɣ ayen i iyi-d-nnan.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad ttuɣ ayen i iyi-d-nnant.
Ur yezmir ara ad yettu ayen i as-nniɣ.
Ur tezmir ara ad tettu ayen i as-nniɣ.
Ur zmiren ara ad ttun ayen i asen-nniɣ.
Ur zmirent ara ad ttunt ayen i asent-nniɣ.
Ur tezmirem ara ad tettum ayen i awen-nniɣ.
Ur tezmiremt ara ad tettumt ayen i awent-nniɣ.
Tɛedda ddurt, yezzi-d wass n lḥedd, d ass yelhan i useqqef, tignewt teṣfa, ulac asemmiḍ ulac azɣal d akud n tefsut.
Ilemẓiyen n taddart n Tɣalaḍt jebbun-d yiwen yiwen s axxam n Dda Meqqran.
Wid i d-issawḍen ijga seg udrar ussan-d merra, rnan-d kra-nniḍen meẓẓiyit cwiṭ ɣef yimezwura i izmren i tlufa tiẓayanin am tuddma n yijga ɣef umecwar aɣezzfan.
Mi d-ttawḍen ufan-d Dda Meqqran d mmi-s Yidir rekkin-d tixmirt ara rren i ssqef.
Tixmirt am ta ttheggin-tt akka : ad d-refden akal yifafen, ad d-rnun alim, ad ten-rwin deg sin, ad uɣalen ad ten-ssebzagen cwiṭ cwiṭ s waman nutni ad rekkin, ad ɛerken s yiḍarren-nsen alamma ssawḍen ad skurruyen tikurin.
Send ad ɛeddin ɣer umahil i ten-yettrajun, Nna Cabḥa temmuger-iten s lqahwa d uyefki akk d tesfenǧtin d tmeqruḍin.
Mačči d tameɣra n Yidir, d tin n Mejɛar imi d-yufa lqahwa s lesfenǧ d lmeqruḍ; wissen ma ad d-yekker akk ass-agi fell-as, i d-yenna Mḥend s teḍsa.
Iɛeggalen merra n ugraw ttemyewwaten ɣef tuyat ttaḍsan.
Aha kan a Mḥend, yiggas tilset-nni inek taqerḥant ad k-tt-id-gezmeɣ s lmus n duk-duk ad tt-fkeɣ i yimcac yelluẓen akken ur ttuɣaleɣ ara ad sleɣ i taɣect-ik.
Akka i as-yerra Qasi i d-ibedden mebla lebɣi-s ɣer yixeddim; wiyiḍ cergen seg teḍsa, ula d nutni kkren-d ɣef tikkelt ɣer useqqef.
Amahil n useqqef mačči d ayen yuɛren maca d ayen ẓẓayen ɣef waya i ilaq aṭas n yifassen ijehden akken ad ssersen ixfawen n krad n yijga-nni ɣef leswar yettemgadalen.
Mi tfukk tmersiwt n yisulas, alemmas d yiqerniyen, ad cudden tisariwin fell-asen; s yin ad fesren aẓeṭṭa n uɣanim fell-asent, ma ulac aɣanim ttarran ccḍeb n uzebbuj.
S tzukar neɣ s yigeḍman n semmar teqqnen aɣanim-nni ɣer tsariwin.
Dɣa mi fukken cced ad ɛeddin ad ḍelqen akal-nni n texmirt ɣef merra n uẓeṭṭa-nni n uɣanim.
Ilemẓiyen yellan deg lqaɛa ttdeggiren tikurin n wakal s leɛyaḍ i wid yellan ɣef ssqef, akka alamma yessa merra d akal ibezgen.
Ad uɣalen ad ɛeddin imir-nni ɣer usrusu n uqermud n tɣanimt.
Neqqar deg yiwet n temseɛreqt: D acu-tt ? D acu-tt ? Timeqbert Imeḥmuden wa tinnegnit wa ɣef wudem.
Tifrat n teqnuẓt-a d lqermud.
D tidet akka i ttseqqifen s lqermud n tɣanimt.
Ttweddiɛen abennay yessnen i umahil am wa.
D amahil ara yilin igerrez.
Tiqit n waman n ugeffur ur ilaq ad d-tɛeddi ɣer tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Ɣer taggara akken aḍu ur ireffed ara aqermud-a, ssrusun fell-as kra n yiẓra iẓayanen deg kra n tamiwin n ssqef.
Akka i tetteddu tudert deg tudrin-nneɣ.
Ilemẓiyen n taddart dduklen-as i umahil.
Zzin-as akken ara t-rnun.
Agmuḍ i d-yeffɣen ɣer taggara d wa : ass-a ssawḍen ad sdarin yiwen deg-sen, heggan-as-d adeg anda ara yidir netta d twacult-is; azekka ad d-tezzi nnuba n yiwen-nniḍen, wissen d Mḥend, wissen d Qasi neɣ…
Dda Meqqran, Nna Cabḥa d Yidir d wat uxxam akk ferḥen nezzeh, ččan d yiwaziwen ayen i d-nawlen, nnan leɛquba ɣur-wen ay arrac-nneɣ.
Am leɛwayed-is d Mḥend i d-ineṭqen d amezwaru.
Yella yiwen dagi iḥar ad d-yaweḍ unebdu.
Neṭqen-d ɣef tikkelt : “D Yidir, d netta ara yilin d isli”.
Awaaah ! Yewwet-iken merra wugur, d Mejɛar neɣ Qasi akken i wen-yehwa, iḥar ad d-taweḍ tmeɣra n Yidir akken ad iwet seksu alamma yezleg.
Ruḥ kan a ɛeẓẓi bu tqemmuct yettawḍen, i as-yerra Qasi.
Xedmen aṭas ḍsan-d cwiṭ.
Ddeqs aya i iɛedda uɣelluy n yiḍ.
Yal yiwen yuɣal s axxam-is yeɛya maca iḥulfa i yiman-is ɣer daxel fessus am tmeččimt n taduṭ acku ayen akk i iga ass-a igerrez.
Aql-i yid-k ara iliɣ.
Aql-i yid-m ara iliɣ.
Aql-i yid-s ara iliɣ.
Aql-i yid-wen ara iliɣ.
Aql-i yid-went ara iliɣ.
Aql-i yid-kent ara iliɣ.
Aql-i yid-sen ara iliɣ.
Aql-i yid-sent ara iliɣ.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara ad tiliḍ yid-i.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara ad yili yid-i.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara ad tili yid-i.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara ad tilim yid-i.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara ad tilimt yid-i.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara ad ilin yid-i.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara ad ilint yid-i.
Yettarra iman-is d aɛeẓẓug.
Melmi akka ara d-slen wigi.
Melmi akka ara d-slent tigi.
Wigi ur ttsetḥin ara.
Wigi ur ḥmmilen ara tamurt.
Wigi ttnadin ɣef twaɣit.
Wigi sḍen.
Wigi ɣelten.
Talwit mgal tawaɣit.
S telwit ara tawḍeḍ ɣer lebɣi-k.
S telwit ara tawḍeḍ ɣer lebɣi-m.
S telwit ara yaweḍ ɣer lebɣi-s.
S telwit ara taweḍ ɣer lebɣi-s.
S telwit ara tawḍem ɣer lebɣi-nwen.
S telwit ara tawḍemt ɣer lebɣi-nwent.
S telwit ara tawḍemt ɣer lebɣi-nkent.
S telwit ara awḍen ɣer lebɣi-nsen.
S telwit ara awḍent ɣer lebɣi-nsent.
S telwit ara awḍeɣ ɣer lebɣi-iw.
S telwit ara naweḍ ɣer lebɣi-nneɣ.
Deg tmurt-iw ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-ik ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-im ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-is ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-nwen ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-nwent ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-nkent ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-nsen ulac izerfan.
Deg tmurt-nsent ulac izerfan.
Win iwimi ččlefxent wallen, deg texnanasin yettnawal.
Yenɣa deg Leqbayel acḥal, yettnadi akken ad t-seyden.
D aselway ara yuɣal, ayen yeggran ad t-ikemmel.
Yuḍen aṭan n wid yettcaxen.
Tifernin am tin, fkiɣ-tent i wid i tent-yebɣan.
Win ideɣren, yexdeɛ tamurt-is.
Tin ideɣren, texdeɛ tamurt-is.
Wid ideɣren, xedɛen tamurt-nsen.
Tid ideɣren, xedɛent tamurt-nsent.
D akal i yettɛeyyicen imezdaɣ n tmurt n Leqbayel.
Tiɣeṭṭen d wulli d wakraren ttaken-d ayefki, aksum, taduṭ d uglim.
Ma d izgaren, amahil-nsen iban am lemri: d takerza n wakal n tmurt.
Taɣalaḍt am tudrin merra, tettheggi iman-is i tkerza.
Imɣaren d yimrabḍen n taddart gezmen-tt deg rray, ɣef wayen ḥesben, yekcem leḥlal, ifellaḥen zemren ad bdun takerza.
Qqaren-d win iɣef bedden ɣer tama-s yiɛessasen ur yettagad ara.
Tal tasemhuyt s tegnewt-is d lecɣal-is.
Werǧeǧǧi anza n unebdu, seg wasmi yebda ccna-s ur yeḥbis.
Ihi tawacult n bab n wayla ad teqqim deg uxxam ad d-theggi učči n waɛwin ara n-tawi ɣer lexla mi ara izeggen wass.
Anebdu d win iɛeddan, tiẓurin d tbexsisin quccent.
Deg taggara n tmenzut akken qqaren i lexrif watmaten-nneɣ Icawiyen, timetti taqbaylit s umata tebges iman-is ɣer ulqaḍ n uzemmur.
Iɛǧeb-asen kan.
A winnat mačči akken.
Ɛni teɣliḍ-d ɣef uɣyul.
Anda i teqqimeḍ mačči din.
Anda i teqqim mačči din.
Anda i neqqim mačči din.
Anda i yeqqim mačči din.
Anda i qqimen mačči din.
Anda i qqiment mačči din.
D acu i iyi-tewqeɛ deg-s.
Awi-tt-id neɣ glu-d yis-s.
Awi-t-id neɣ glu-d yis-s.
Awi-ten-id neɣ glu-d yis-sen.
Awi-tent-id neɣ glu-d yis-sent.
Awit-t-id neɣ glut-d yis-s.
Awit-tt-id neɣ glut-d yis-s.
Awit-ten-id neɣ glut-d yis-sen.
Awit-tent-id neɣ glut-d yis-sent.
Awim-ten-id neɣ glum-d yis-sen.
Awim-tent-id neɣ glum-d yis-sent.
Awim-t-id neɣ glum-d yis-s.
Awim-tt-id neɣ glum-d yis-s.
Awimt-ten-id neɣ glumt-d yis-sen.
Awimt-tent-id neɣ glumt-d yis-sent.
Awimt-t-id neɣ glumt-d yis-s.
Awimt-tt-id neɣ glumt-d yis-s.
Hder neɣ qqim !
Hedret neɣ qqimet !
Hedrem neɣ qqimem !
Yuli-d wulk-iw.
Tergagi tasa-w.
Tergagi tasa-s.
Rgagint tsiswa-nwen.
Rgagint tsiswa-nwent.
Rgagint tsiswa-nkent.
Yezɣeb uglim-iw.
Yezɣeb uglim-ik.
Yezɣeb uglim-im.
Yezɣeb uglim-nneɣ.
Yezɣeb uglim-nwen.
Yezɣeb uglim-nwent.
Yezɣeb uglim-nsen.
Yezɣeb uglim-nsent.
Yezɣeb uglim-nkent.
Ruḥ ad tekseḍ tizit !
Ruḥem ad teksem tizit !
Ruḥemt ad teksemt tizit !
Ad ruḥen ad ksen tizit !
Ad ruḥent ad ksent tizit !
Ad truḥem ad teksem tizit !
Ad truḥemt ad teksemt tizit !
Ad iruḥ ad ikes tizit !
Ad truḥ ad tkes tizit !
Ad truḥeḍ ad tekseḍ tizit !
Ddu-as deg lebɣi.
Ddum-as deg lebɣi.
Ddumt-as deg lebɣi.
Ddut-as deg lebɣi.
Urǧin ad as-dduɣ deg lebɣi.
Urǧin ad asen-dduɣ deg lebɣi.
Urǧin ad asent-dduɣ deg lebɣi.
Urǧin ad awen-dduɣ deg lebɣi.
Urǧin ad awent-dduɣ deg lebɣi.
Urǧin ad akent-dduɣ deg lebɣi.
S tuffra i yekcem s axxam-is.
S tuffra i yeffeɣ seg taddart.
Wissen anda i nteddu akka ?
Wissen anda i teddun akka ?
Wissen anda i teddunt akka ?
Wissen anda i tedduɣ akka ?
Wissen anda i tettedduḍ akka ?
Wissen anda i tetteddum akka ?
Wissen anda i tetteddumt akka ?
I tura amek ara as-nexdem ?
I tura amek ara as-xedmeɣ ?
I tura amek ara as-txedmeḍ ?
I tura amek ara as-txedmemt ?
I tura amek ara as-xedmen ?
I tura amek ara as-xedment ?
I tura amek ara asen-xedment ?
I tura amek ara asen-xedmeɣ ?
I tura amek ara asen-txedmeḍ ?
I tura amek ara as-txedmem ?
I tura amek ara asen-txedmem ?
I tura amek ara asen-txedmemt ?
I tura amek ara asen-xedmen ?
Yuder i wallen-is, awal ur t-id-yuli.
Kra n warrac d yiwet n tlemẓit ha-ten deg lḥebs n tmurt-nsen.
Acimi ? Ukren ? Nɣan ? Ssenzen tamurt-nsen ?...
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedmen deg wayagi akk.
Ufan-d iman-nsen deg bu ikurdan d wid yukren s tukarḍa tameqqrant tamurt.
I nutni d acu akka i xedmen ?
Seknen-d iman-nsen d akken nutni mačči d Ifransisen, mačči d Ihendiwen, mačči d Iṭerkiyen, mačči d Aɛraben...
Nnan-d s leɛyaḍ d urfad anay Amaziɣ, azamul n tmagit-nsen, win yesdduklen Taferka n Ugafa akken ma tella :"Nekkni d Imaziɣen".
Agrawliw-nni ameqqran i rnan ɣur-sen, d Mass Buregɛa, amɣar n 86 n yiseggasen.
Anef-as ad asen-iselmed amezruy n tidet mačči winna i d-snulfan.
Tira tceṭṭeḥ gar wallen-iw
Yefla lkaɣeḍ seg yimeṭṭi.
Dderbuka tekkat deg wul-iw.
Udem-iw yeɣreq deg tidi.
A yemma aql-i iman-iw, yenɣa-iyi yiɣimi weḥd-i.
Mačči d timenɣiwt i nɣiɣ, mačči d tukerḍa i ukreɣ.
Lmut tneqq ayen i sɛiɣ, nekk, nnan-d ilaq ad ɛemmdeɣ.
Refdeɣ anay n yimeɣrasen, d nutni i d-yuwin tilelli.
Ddmeɣ anay n Yimaziɣen, yeẓẓan ɣef wakal n jeddi.
Yettrefrif akken ad d-iban, ddunit merra ad t-id-twali.
Anay n Yimaziɣen d azamul n tmagit-iw.
Ma tekkseḍ-iyi anay-iw, am wakken tekkseḍ-iyi tamagit-iw.
Ur d-yerri agelzim s axxam.
Nerra-d agelzim s axxam.
Rran-d agelzim s axxam.
Ur d-rrin agelzim s axxam.
Ur d-rrint agelzim s axxam.
Ur d-nerri agelzim s axxam.
Mi ɛeddan ad neṭlen yemma-s, yeffer-asen agelzim.
Mi kkren ad ɣizen aẓekka i yemma-s, yeffer fell-asen agelzim.
Yettɣizi lsas s ugelzim.
Yettqeddir azeqqur s ugelzim.
S ugelzim i yettqeddir azeqqur.
Yessemsad agelzim yeḥfan.
Iruḥ ad d-yezdem isɣaren.
Seg teẓgi i d-yezdem isɣaren.
Tɛebba-d tazdemt n yisɣren ɣef uɛrur-is.
Ɛebbant-d tizedmin n yisɣaren ɣef yiɛrar-nsent.
Iɛebba-d leḥmel n yisɣaren ɣef uɣyul.
Yebra-d i yizgaren.
I yizgaren iwimi d-yebra.
Izgaren-nni, yebra-asen-d.
Yebra-d i uɣyul, yeqqen izgaren.
Yeqqen aɣyul, yebra-d i yizgaren.
Yuwi-t ad d-isew.
Yuwi-tt ad d-tsew.
Yuwi-ten ad d-swen.
Yuwi-tent ad d-swent.
Yuwi izgaren ad d-swen deg tala.
Yuwi tisita ad d-swent deg tala.
Yuwi aɣyul ad d-isew deg tala.
Yuwi-ten yid-s ad ksen.
Yuwi-tent yid-s ad ksent.
Yuwi-t yid-s ad ikes.
Yuwi-tt yid-s ad tkes.
Uwiɣ-ten yid-i ad ksen.
Uwiɣ-tent yid-i ad ksent.
Uwiɣ-t yid-i ad ikes.
Uwiɣ-tt yid-i ad tkes.
Uwin-t yid-sen ad ikes.
Uwin-tt yid-sen ad tkes.
Uwin-ten yid-sen ad ksen.
Uwin-tent yid-sen ad ksent.
Nuwi-ten yid-neɣ ad ksen.
Nuwi-tent yid-neɣ ad ksent.
Nuwi-t yid-neɣ ad ikes.
Nuwi-tt yid-neɣ ad tkes
Nebɣa ad tt-nwali.
Bɣiɣ ad tt-waliɣ.
Tebɣiḍ ad tt-twaliḍ.
Tebɣam ad tt-twalim.
Tebɣamt ad tt-twalimt.
Bɣan ad tt-walin.
Bɣant ad tt-walint.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad tt-waliɣ.
Ur tebɣiḍ ara ad tt-twaliḍ.
Ur tebɣim ara ad tt-twalim.
Ur tebɣimt ara ad tt-twalimt.
Ur bɣin ara ad tt-walin.
Ur bɣint ara ad tt-walint.
Uwḍen ɣer uɣeggad n Dda Wakli, ufan-t din yettraju-ten s yiwen n uyaziḍ azeggaɣ.
Ur rnin ara aṭas n wakud, afellaḥ aqdim yessuli akk allalen n tkerza akken i ilaq, kullec ihegga akken ad bdun takerza.
Dɣa imiren yemmeɣ ɣef uyaziḍ-nni yezla-t.
Neɣlen yidammen ɣef wakal.
Yedɛa ad yelhu useggas.
Yeg Rebbi d win ara d-yeglun ala s wayen yelhan ma d ayen n diri ad yebɛed akkin.
Imi i ifukk azraɛ n temẓin n yiwet n temṭirt n wakal yekker ɣer tkerza n uḍref amezwaru n useggas-a deg tmurt-is.
Mi yuweḍ ɣer tqernit n uɣeggad-is, yeǧǧa-n din izgaren, yuɣal-d anda yezla ayaziḍ-nni d wanda i yebda uḍref amenzu, din, netta d mmi-s Qasi d umeddakel-is Mḥend, rnan cwiṭ n uɣizi s yifassen-nsen almi gan amruj ameẓẓyan, deg-s gren lfal-nni i d-uwin yid-sen.
Daxel-is meḍlen tiremmanin, tijujtin, timellalin, abelluḍ i wakken ad terbeḥ nneɛma.
Tiyedret ara d-yemɣin ssaramen ad tetmer am tremmat d tjujet.
Mi izeggen wass ḥebsen amahil-nsen, ssersen-d aɛwin-nsen ddaw n tzemmurt ad ččen imekli.
Lxir yugar, ččan aɣrum s zzit d tazart, timellalin d yiɣi, ma d tiremmanin d asegri.
Akud iteddu, iṭij alaḥal ad yeɣli.
Yenṭeq Dda Wakli ɣer mmi-s yenna-as: “Rnu-d aḍref neɣ sin tebruḍ-asen-d i yizgaren.
Ass-a dayen, nekrez ayen i iqessem.
Izgaren ɛyan cwiṭ acku akal amzun yeqqur cwiṭ ɣas ma tewwet-d lgerra ussan yezrin.
Tameddit n wass mi yejba yiṭij akkin, bran-d i yizgaren, ɛebban-d lmaɛun d wayen-nniḍen ɣef uɣyul, ṭṭfen-d abrid n tuɣalin.
Uwḍen-d s axxam, tayuga terra srid ɣer uddaynin ad tesgunfu yerna ad tečč tuga-nni yelhan i yeffer Dda Wakli i yiwen wass am wa.
Yuwi-d ɣef yizgaren ad ɛelfen s tawant akken ad d-yerzu wafud ɣur-sen, steḥqen-t.
Yis-s ara mmagren ussan n laɛtab n tkerza, ussan yezgan i ujbad n lmaɛun d tgersa yentan deg wakal.
D akal i d-ttfeggilen akken ad tɣumm tzerraɛt ara d-yemɣin.
Ad tefti, ad tuɣal d tiyedret ara yimɣuren mi ara tsew aman n legruri ara d-yeqlin seg yigenwan.
Wellah ma tekkiḍ-t alma teččiḍ imensi. I tenna Nna Melxir, yemma-s n Qasi, i Mḥend i iteddun ad iruḥ.
Iban yeɛya, akal n ddaw n tzemmrin, anda izgaren ur zmiren ara ad kecmen acku ifurkan rxan-d, d netta akk i t-ineqcen.
Lxir yugar, aksum ala netta, qqim-d ad twanseḍ Qasi d umɣar.
Tseqqa-asen-d i tlata, ččan almi rwan.
Tuɣal teffeɣ ɣer uzrib, tuwi yid-s lmetred ameqqran n berkukes d temrawt n tjeɣlin n usɣar.
Win d-yefka ubrid ad teɛreḍ ad yečč berkukes i d-tnawel akken timẓin d yirden ẓẓan ugaz-is d mmi-s ad ftin am berkukes dɣa ad d-mmɣin.
Deg wakken d azɣal, iṭij amzun iṣubb-d cwiṭ ɣer tmurt, dɣa netta igran n temẓin d yirden ḥeḍmen, yuweḍ-d lawan n tmegra-nsen.
Ass-a, iwaziwen dhan-d d yiger n Dda Ɛacur azekka d yiger n Dda Meqqran win akin d yiger n Nna Werdiya yiwet n taǧǧalt n taddart, akka alamma igran merra n taddart ad teḍru yid-sen am win n Dda Ɛacur.
Iger-iten ɣer usekraf ɣas ur xdimen kra.
Iger-itent ɣer usekraf ɣas ur xdiment kra.
Iger-it ɣer usekraf ɣas ur yexdim kra.
Iger-itt ɣer usekraf ɣas ur texdim kra.
Gren-t ɣer usekraf ɣas ur yexdim kra.
Gren-tt ɣer usekraf ɣas ur texdim kra.
Gren-ten ɣer usekraf ɣas ur xdimen kra.
Gren-tent ɣer usekraf ɣas ur xdiment kra.
Ur tufiḍ d acu yexdem, gren-t deg usekraf.
Ur tufiḍ d acu texdem, gren-tt deg usekraf.
Ur tufiḍ d acu xedmen, gren-ten deg usekraf.
Ur tufiḍ d acu xedment, gren-tent deg usekraf.
Ur tufiḍ d acu xedmen, ufan-d iman-nsen deg usekraf.
Ur tufiḍ d acu xedment, ufant-d iman-nsent deg usekraf.
Ur tufiḍ d acu yexdem, yufa-d iman-is deg usekraf.
Ur tufiḍ d acu texdem, tufa-d iman-is deg usekraf.
Ur yenɣi, ur yukir, ṭṭfen-t ɣer usekraf.
Ur tenɣi, ur tukir, ṭṭfen-tt ɣer usekraf.
Ur nɣin, ur ukiren, ṭṭfen-ten ɣer usekraf.
Ur nɣint, ur ukirent, ṭṭfen-tent ɣer usekraf.
Ur nɣiɣ, ur ukireɣ, ṭṭfen-iyi ɣer usekraf.
Ur nenɣi, ur nukir, ṭṭfen-aɣ ɣer usekraf.
Ur tenɣim, ur tukirem, ṭṭfen-ken ɣer usekraf.
Ur tenɣimt, ur tukiremt, ṭṭfen-kent ɣer usekraf.
Ur tenɣiḍ, ur tukireḍ, ṭṭfen-k ɣer usekraf.
Ur tenɣiḍ, ur tukireḍ, ṭṭfen-kem ɣer usekraf.
Lukan ad tili temsizzelt n tlawin tucmitin akken i d-ttilint temsizzlin n tlawin icebḥen d Ddayxa melba akukru ara yawin arraz amezwaru deg wakken tecmet.
Ɣas akken medden akk ɣef tikkelt gezmen-tt deg rray, ttwalin Ddayxa d tameṭṭut icemten yella yiwen qqaren-as Akli, netta rray-is ahat yeffeɣ i ubrid, yettwali Ddayxa s tiṭ n win iḥemmlen.
Qqaren-d: « Ayen idergen ɣef tiṭ idreg ɣef wul ».
Ddayxa d tin i yettwali yal ass s wallen-is.
D ul-is i t-yettseggiren ad iḥemmel Ddayxa yal ass ugar n wass yezrin.
Tayri taderɣalt asmi ara tezzi ɣef wabɛaḍ dayen frant fell-as.
Ur yezmir ad ixemmem s leɛqel n leɛqel-is, yettxemmim s leɛqel n wul-is yeččan tiyita n tayri ur njebber.
Daymi i deɛɛun yimezwura qqaren: “Awer neɛceq deg udɣaɣ”.
Adɣaɣ ṣṣifa ulac ma d taẓẓayt ala nettat, win t-iḥemmlen ad t-ittbibbi kra ara tekk tudert-is war ma yenna-d : “Aḥ !”
Tizziwin-is ha-tent-id ttrebbint dderya-nsent deg yixxamen-nsent, taneggarut ɣur-s sin neɣ tlata gar warrac d teqcicin.
Nettat mazal-itt deg uxxam n baba-s tettidir d yemma-s Mennun yeǧǧlen ur tuklal kan akken d tilemẓit deg ṭṭrad n tsellullit taɣelnawt n tmurt n Zzayer.
Argaz-is Yidir, baba-s n Ddayxa, yemmut d ameɣras deg udrar n Jerjer.
Ayen yellan deg ufus-is, ixdem-it, yuwi-d timunnent i yelli-s d tmeṭṭut-is akken ad idirent d tilelliyin deg tmurt-nsent.
D aya i yezmer ad t-yexdem, d aɣan-is.
Ayen i d-yernan ɣef waya d tilufa n Rebbi.
Rebbi yerna-d Ddayxa ɣer twacult-is.
Akka i as-yefka baba-s isem, s yis-s yebɣa ad d-yerr isem n yemma-s yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi mačči aṭas aya.
Yemma-s, imi d tahuskayt, isemma-as ɣur-s akken ad d-tecbu deg-s,
Nnan-d yimezwura : “Imɣi n ṣṣaba meɛqul, mebɛid i d-yesmuqul”.
Ihi tlul-d teqcict tuwi-d yid-s ayen i ttagadent teqcicin ad tt-sɛunt: ccmata.
Lṭufanat akk ttemyaken anzi mi ara d-lalen, ɣur-sen yiwet n ṣṣifa.
Maca skudmal yeggam lṭufan, iferreẓ-d wudem-is, yettuɣal d win ara yettawi yid-s kra ara tekk tudert-is.
Akka i teḍra ɣef Ddayxa.
Tura, temmed, tuweḍ d tameṭṭut, ɣur-s yiwet n tfekka mennu ḥedd-itt.
Tiddi-s d talemmast, iḍarren grurzen, taglult taččurant, idmaren ccekḍen amzun ttawḍen, amzur awraɣ am ukbal yuweḍ-as-d ɣer wammas, aglim-is amellal tuwi-t-id ɣer yemma-s.
Udem-is ɣur-s sin yiḥricen mgaraden am yiḍ d wass neɣ am tqejjirin n bururu.
Qqaren-d agḍiḍ-a n yiḍ ɣur-s snat tqejjirin ur ɛdilent ara.
Yiwet temmed, telha d tamagnut, ma iṭall ɣur-s ad d-iḍes.
Ma d tayeḍ ur tuwiḍ ara, tejjex, ɣef waya mi ara tt-iṭill amzun yettru yeqqar : “Bururuu! Bururuu !”
Ihi, Ddayxa teḍra yid-s am bururu, yefka-as Rebbi kra n wallen d timeqqranin, d tizegzawin am yigenni n tefsut.
Maca sser n wallen-is d teqmumes n tqemmuct-is terna-ten ccmata n wanzaren-is
Rsen deg tlemmast n wudem n Ddayxa am win yessentan din tabaṭaṭat tameqqrant nnig ucenfir ufella.
“Anzaren n lbaṭaṭa” akka i tt-ttɛayaren, ṭṭfen aḥric ameqqran deg tlemmast n wudem-is, amzun ččan-d deg tlisa n yiḥricen-nniḍen.
Tectaq ad d-terfed aqerruy-is am nettat am tlawin-nniḍen, yezga dima yuder akken ad teffer lɛib-is.
Allen-is tettent lqaɛa war tawant, amzun tettɛanad ilef yefkan lɛehd ur yeṭall s igenni ma ulac ad tenger ddunit.
Ddayxa teqqar deg wul-is : “Anef-as ad tenger ad teglu yis-i, wissen d acu i ixedmen yimawlan-iw n wayen ur nelhi imi d-gliɣ s ṣṣifa am ta assen akken i d-luleɣ”.
Tekreh iman-is s tidet, nettat d lemri ur d-mmezgen ara acku teḥṣa d acu n wudem ara s d-yessken ma yella teṭall deg-s.
Tekreh iman-is s tidet, nettat d lemri ur d-mmezgen ara acku teḥṣa d acu n wudem ara s d-yesken ma yella teṭall deg-s.
Teẓra lbaṭaṭa-nni yeččan meḥsub akk aqadum-is yezga din alma d lmut anda ara d-yeqẓuẓer seg-s ad yefruri d aɣebbar.
D aya i tessaram i wanzaren-is.
Yemma-s n Ddayxa, Mennun akka i d isem-is, teqmumes, tahuski i s-yefka Rebbi tɛedda.
Akken i tecmet Ddayxa i tezzyen yemma-s.
Ala allen-is tizegzawin i d-tewret Ddayxa sɣur yemma-s, wanag igejduren-nni n wanzaren-is tuwi-ten-id sɣur baba-s.
Ɣas akken meqqrit wanzaren-is, baba-s s ṣṣifa n urgaz ur yecmit ara yis-sen, yerna cclaɣem-is izuranen ɣummen cwiṭ deg-sen.
Amer tettaf ur tettwali ara anzaren-is.
Amer tettaf ur ten-tettwali ara.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin qmumsen.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin d ilemmasen kan.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin d wid ur necmit.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin am wid n teqcicin-nniḍen.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin am wid n yemma-s.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ur ttilin ara am wid n baba-s.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin mecṭuḥit.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin akken i ten-yebɣ wul.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ur ttuɣalen ara d lemɛayrat.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin lhan kan.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin seggmen.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin qeɛden.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin meẓẓiyit.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin d wid ara tt-icebbḥen.
Amer tettaf anzaren-is ad ilin mačči d wid ara tt-icemten.
Ddayxa, ala nettat kan i tesɛa yemma-s.
Teḥmmel-itt nezzeh.
Acḥal n lehmum i d-tewwi fell-as mi ara tt-id-ttɛayarent tizziwin-is.
Sqaqarent-tt-id teqcicin alma d amnar n tewwurt s yiwen uḥiḥa yeqqaren : “Anzaren n lbaṭaṭa ! Anzaren n lbaṭaṭa !”
Ad as-d-tsel kan yemma-s tettwejririḥ ad d-teffeɣ deffir n uẓeṭṭa ad tazzel deffir n tteryulat ad tent-tesqaqer.
Akka i asent-tsemma i tidak icenfen tawenza i yelli-s.
Mi ara d-tuɣal ɣer yelli-s ad tt-tḥell.
Ad as-d-tfek s wacu ara tedhu nettat ad as-teqqar : “Tifeḍ-tent a yelli, ma yella d tanzarin-inem i d-ttɛayarent ɣur-i fazent, yerna ad timɣureḍ kan ad yimɣur wudem-im nutenti ad d-banent meẓẓiyit”.
Kra n wayen d-tcar Mennun i yelli-is ur yeffiɣ, d tanmegla i d-yeḍran, mačči d temẓi i meẓẓiyit wanzaren n Ddayxa, rnan deg temɣer.
Nna Mennun tesker-d yelli-s akken i ilaq, deg lɛezza, acemma ur tt-ixuṣṣ.
Tefka-tt teɣra yerna tewwi-d iman-is.
Lxersum ur tufiḍ deg wacu i tt-tɣull.
S yiṣurdiyen i tettaɣ ɣef urgaz-is yemmuten d ameɣras ɣef tmurt-is, tefka i yelli-s yiwet n ttrebga igerrzen.
Kra n wayen d-tessuter yelli-s yuweḍ-itt.
Ala yiwet n temsalt iwimi ur tezmir ara, ur d-as-tufi ara tifrat : Talɣa tameqqrant n wanzaren n Ddayxa.
Wa d lamer n Rebbi, mreḥba s wayen i ɣ-d-yefka.
S wawalen-a i tettṣebbir yelli-s d yiman-is.
Nna Mennun tbedd ɣer yelli-s akken i iwata.
Txemmem ula ɣef uzekka-s, teldi-as amiḍan deg lbanka anda i as-tesrusu yal ayyur cwiṭ seg yidrimen-is.
Teqqar deg wul-is : “Ad ten-taf ɣer sdat mi ara naweḍ anda ur d-nettuɣal”.
Ddayxa mi d-tuwi akayad n Bak s tezmilt igerrzen tga tizrawin tunnigin deg tesdawit.
Ɣer taggara tessaweḍ ad d-tawi agerdas n turagt n tutlayin.
D ayen i tt-yeǧǧan ad tuɣal d taselmadt n tutlayt tafransist deg uɣerbaz alemmas.
Kra kkan yiseggasen deg tesdawit ur d-temmuger ugur amectuḥ deg leqraya-s acku Ddayxa d taqcict timegzit.
Yefka-as Rebbi yiwen uqerruy fessus nezzeh.
Tezga d timezgit, urǧin fell-as iɛedda uzaylal, ɣur-s tiririt yelhan thegga i yal asteqsi.
Ugur ameqqran i d-temmuger d tamuɣli n tmetti s umata d tin n yinelmaden n tesdawit wukud teqqar.
Iẓri-nsen amzun yettwali kan yiwen n ugman n tfekka n Ddayxa : Anzaren-is.
Iḥricen-nniḍen ur sen-ččuren ara tiṭ, ad as-tiniḍ dergen ɣef wallen-nsen.
D annect-a akk i tt-yerran terra-d ẓẓerb ɣef yiman-is.
Tawala n ukkuẓ n yiseggasen i tesɛedda deg tesdawit ur tt-tebḍi d yiwen, teqqim tedder d yiman-is.
Ulac ɣur-s ameddakel am teqcicin-nniḍen i d-yefka Rebbi ṣṣifa-nsent tseggem.
Dɣa ula d tagnit yefka-asent Rebbi ad ttbeddilent imeddukal akken i ttbeddilent iselsa.
Ddayxa meskint, ur tt-id-iṣaḥ ara ad tẓeḍ assaɣen n tdukli d teḥdayin i yettsetḥin ad tent-id-afen medden qqiment yid-s.
Dɣa ula d nettat trewwel fell-asent.
Aseklu-nni ines n wafrayen, tefres-it akk, i d-teǧǧa ala afurek-nni n lebɣi n leqraya.
Afrayen-nniḍen yecban tayri, tagmat, aḥezzeb, aqader, tadukli, aɣiḍi atg… twala-ten amzun sennan-ten medden d taẓwayt tameqqrant, ssaɣen deg-sen times yekkren d aḥǧaǧu, yis-s ẓẓaẓnen ula d itran imi ilizeq-ines yewweḍ s igenni.
Tɣaḍ-itt yemma-s nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-it yemma-s nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-iten yemma-tnsen nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-itent yemma-tnsent nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-ik yemma-k nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-ikem yemma-m nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-iken yemma-twen nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-ikent yemma-twent nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-ikent yemma-tkent nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-iyi yemma nezzeh.
Tɣaḍ-aɣ yemma-tneɣ nezzeh.
Yunef-as ad terwu rray-is.
Yunef-as ad yerwu rray-is.
Yunef-asen ad rwun rray-nsen.
Yunef-asent ad rwunt rray-nsent.
Yunef-ak ad terwuḍ rray-ik.
Yunef-am ad terwuḍ rray-im.
Yunef-awen ad terwum rray-nwen.
Yunef-akent ad terwumt rray-nwent.
Yunef-akent ad terwumt rray-nkent.
Tunef-ak ad terwuḍ rray-ik.
Tunef-am ad terwuḍ rray-im.
Tunef-awen ad terwum rray-nwen.
Tunef-awent ad terwumt rray-nwent.
Tunef-awent ad terwumt rray-nkent.
Tunef-asent ad rwunt rray-nsent.
Tunef-asen ad rwun rray-nsen.
Tunef-as ad yerwu rray-is.
Tunef-as ad terwu rray-is.
Tunef-iyi ad rwuɣ rray-iw.
Tunef-aɣ ad nerwu rray-nneɣ.
Yunef-iyi ad rwuɣ rray-iw.
Yunef-aɣ ad nerwu rray-nneɣ.
Yal iḍ mi ara tɛeddi ad tgen, send ad tt-yawi yiḍes, tafat tensa am leɛwayed akken ur tettwali ara iman-is, dɣa ad d-terr asaru n wass-is yezrin ɣer deffir, tettales-d i tmuɣli n yir tugniwin yerzan timetti merra d nettat.
D ayen n diri i yezgan kan.
Tikwal tettargu allen-is ldint teqqar : “Lufan imdanen s umata ttaken azal mačči i ṣṣifa maca i lxedma, i tmussni, i kra n wayen yezdin imdanen ur ten-ibeṭṭu, talfi tuklal tudert ad tt-nidir”.
Mi ara tfakk targit-is ur netteffeɣ tettuɣal-d ɣer tidet-nni tarẓagant s yiwet n nnehta taɣezzfant i d-yessefhamen akken i ilaq ṭṭiq ideg tella ddayxa.
Tettezzem deg zzman d wayen akk yuran fell-as, maca urǧin teqḍiɛ layas, dɣa teqqar : “Mazal lxir ɣer sdat, yiwen wass ad d-rreɣ ttar deg wayen akk yexdem deg-i wakud”.
Ddayxa tezdeɣ d yemma-s deg taddart Tawrirt anda i d-teldi allen-is i tikkelt tamezwarut a-t-ah kraḍ tmerwin n yiseggasen aya.
Txeddem deg uɣerbaz alemmas ameɣras Ɛmiruc deg temdint Tazerrajt iggugen ɣef Tewrirt azal n temrawt n yikilumiṭren.
Akken ad taweḍ ɣer wadeg n umahil tettaṭṭaf tal tanezzayt aṭaksi.
Trekkeb deg tkerrust n Muḥend Akli, yiwen n yilemẓi n taddart-is.
Imeddukal n lxedma ama d iselmaden neɣ d tiselmadin ttbanen-d akka ḥedqen, ttqadaren-tt.
Maca teḥṣa rwan taḍsa deffir-s, srusun-d anzaren-is d asentel n uqesser n kra n teswiɛt.
Nettat telha-d d ccɣel-is i txeddem seg wul-is.
Inelmaden ɣas gan am yimdanen-nniḍen, ssnen ad gen amgired gar uselmad ixeddmen akken ad yali uswir-nsen, aselmad i ten-ifehmen d win yekkaten kan ad iɛeddi wakud.
Massa Ddayxa ssersen-tt yinelmaden-is deg terbaɛt tamezwarut, tin yettnadin ad issinen.
Dɣa azal ameqqran n yiwellihen-is n tal tamsirt issettu-asen talɣa n wanzaren n tccixet-nsen.
Uɣalen nnumen-ten.
Dehhun-d kan deg wayen i ten-iceɣben : leqraya-nsen.
Yal ass mi ara tekker ad truḥ ɣer Tzerrajt ad texdem, tettṣubbu ɣer tlemmast n taddart-is Tawrirt anida i tettaf aṭas n yiṭaksiyen derren din, ttrajun wid ara awin.
Ddayxa seg wasmi tebda amahil tetteddu kan deg yiwen uṭaksi, win n Muḥend Akli.
Ma, tal tikkelt d netta i tferren gar amayendin n yinehharen, tella ssebba.
Teḥmmel ad terkeb aṭaksi n Wakli neɣ Bakli akken i as-ssawalen yimeddukal-is.
Mi ara tali ɣer daxel n tkerrust ad teqqim deffir ad teṭallay ɣer lemri yessexdam unehhar ad yettwali d acu i iḍerrun deffir-s.
Ddayxa tettwali udem n Wakli ɣer lemri-nni yettaḍsa-as-d, nettat diɣ, mačči am leɛwayed-is tesrusu aqerruy-is, tettarra-as-d taḍsa.
Yal yiwen itett wayeḍ s yiwet n tmuɣli talqayant almi ur ttakin ara akk i ubrid, amzun mraw n yikilumiṭren d amecwar wezzilen.
Wissen d acu akka yeḍran d Ddayxa ?
Mačči am yimdanen-nniḍen i tettwali Muḥend Akli, amzun yella kra n wafud i tt-ijebbden ɣur-s.
Akli iḥemmel Ddayxa.
Ddayxa tḥemmel Akli.
Tal tikkelt ara t-id-temmager yekkat wul-is abedayer, amzun ibeqqu ad d-yeffeɣ seg yidmaren-is.
Meskint teɛder iman-is, ur tenwi ara yiwen wass ad as-teḍru akka : yedla-d ɣur-s waṭan n tayri.
Aṭan-a tebɣa-t, urǧin yerza-d uḥulfu am wa ɣur-s, ur t-tessin ara, teḍra yid-s am tin yeffuden teswa.
D yiwet n tumert tamaynut, tusa-d am temhersant ad teṭṭef tafekka-s.
Taḍsa-nni i tectaq kra n wussan uqbel, tuɣal tezdeɣ imi-s.
Ad as-tiniḍ mɣin-as-d wafriwen, tettafeg deg yigenni n tumert.
Ula d yemma-s Mennun tfaq-as tbeddel.
Tugad ma yella d acu i tt-yuɣen imi texdem kan akka yelli-s tezwi fell-as aɣebbar n leḥzen-nni i yezgan yal ass.
Tuɣal teldi-d tawwurt n wul-is akken ad as-tanef ad t-yekcem lferḥ ur tennum.
Rwiɣ ass-agi imi tent-ṛwiɣ.
Tameṭṭut yeččuren d sser, ifassen-is ččuren d ṣṣer.
Kif kif win i d-yeffɣen ass n lǧemɛa, ad tewwteḍ agejdur.
Tanemmirt i kra n win yefkan azal i yiman-is deg tal tamsalt, ladɣa tin n tsekla-s.
Taḍsa ad d-tuɣal s imi n umdan.
Ččiɣ seg-s almi merǧeǧǧiɣ .
Ɣer deffir ulac tuɣalin, azgen n umecwar iɛedda.
Ur nettekki deg tefranin i ttawin dima s tukarḍa.
D aselway n yiwet n tgemmict win ad d-yeffɣen ass n lǧemɛa.
Tenṭeq ɣur-s yemma-s ur nesbir tenna-as: “Yak ur tehlikeḍ ara a yelli?
Tenṭeq ɣur-s yemma-s ur nesbir tenna-as : “Yak ur tehlikeḍ ara a yelli?
Xaṭi a yemma, kkes aɣilif, tazmert-iw tgerrez.
Ttwaliɣ-kem mačči am umayna, anyir-nni inem yezgan yekres yuɣal yekkes-as ukras, d taḍsa i d-yerzan s udem-im.
Ih a yemma, bɣiɣ ad tbeddel fell-i, ɛyiɣ seg leḥzen.
Ih a yelli, ula d nekk ferḥeɣ nezzeh mi kem-ttwaliɣ tettaḍsaḍ.
Ttu lhemm ad kem-yettu, akken yeqqar winna.
Nna Mennun ur telli d taɛeggunt, ula d nettat tɛedda-d syin.
Tfaq yella win i ibeddlen akka tudert n yelli-s maca terra iman-is am tin ur neẓri.
Teǧǧa-tt ad d-tekkes seg ddunit-is ur tt-nqal cwiṭ n lferḥ i tuklal.
Lferḥ-nni i d-yerzan ɣer Ddayxa ur yessaweḍ ara ad isuffeɣ ɣef tikkelt leḥzen-nni i d-yufa izdeɣ deg-s
Yeggra-d cwiṭ yerna d win yestufan, yeqqim-d ad as-d-yesmektay amek i iga wudem-is, d acu-tt tɣawsa-nni yeṭṭfen talemmast.
Imiren-nni kan ad tuɣal ɣer yir axemmem.
Yir axemmem i as-yettarran ddunit-is akk d taberkant am tgerfa yersen ɣef tirect n tẓuẓant deg tlemmast n yiḍ n dujember.
Asirem-is ifeččel, tugad azekka am teqcict tamecṭuḥt yugaden tteryel n tmucuha.
Teqqar deg wul-is : Wissen amek i iyi-d-yettwali Wakli ?
Ḥṣiɣ tamuɣli-ines ḥninet, temgarad aṭas d tin n yimedɣal maca yiwen deg ddunit-a ur yezmir ad yidir tudert-is akk d tmeṭṭut yesɛan inzer am wayla-w, d awezɣi.
