Nnhati ta deffir tayeḍ gezzment axemmem-is aɣezzfan.
Yettfakka warmuy-is s wawal-a : “Ulac aɣbel ur nesɛi tifrat”.
Aɣbel n Ddayxa iban am lemri: d anzaren-is d wamek i gan.
Tifrat iɣef tettnadi d amek ara tuɣal am teqcicin-nniḍen.
Tiqcicin rran wanzaren-nsent qmumsent, cebbḥent, ttiqint seg sser.
Mačči am nekk rran-iyi wanzaren-iw d tucmit, d tin iɣef rewwlent wallen, d tin yemɣunfan.
D yir ddunit. “Maca yella ttawil, ttawil yella” i teqqar i yiman-is.
Muḥend Akli d yiwen n yilemẓi urɛad yessaweḍ tlatin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, netta d Ddayxa i ihemmel s tuffra d tizziwin.
Ula d netta iga tizrawin tisdawanin, ɣur-s agerdas n turegt n tutlayt taɛrabt.
Ɣur-s tazmert ad imahel deg yiɣerbazen maca yefren tanhart.
seg wasmi yella d amecṭuḥ iḥemmel-itt almi i tt-yerra d tawuri-s, yis-s yettawi-d aɣrum-is.
Yeqqar deg wul-is : “Lufan mačči d tanhart ur ttissineɣ ara Ddayxa”.
Yiwen n wass n yebrir, Akli yessaweḍ Ddayxa almi d tawwurt n uɣerbaz tenna-s : “Raju-iyi, tura kan ad d-uɣaleɣ”.
Tekcem ɣer uxxam n tedbelt n uɣerbaz, tura isem-is deg umuɣ n yiselmaden i igan asunded teffeɣ-d.
Sdat n tewwurt tufa-d Akli yettkeyyif agaru n Rim yettraju-tt.
Ass-a d ass-inek, nekk d timessindedt, ulac ixeddim, kečč aṭas aya i d-ɣriɣ deg wallen-ik tettnadiḍ ad d-teɣli tegnit am ta. I d-as-tenna.
Aḥeqq Rebbi ar d tidet, ur ufiɣ ara amek ara m-in-iniɣ ɣur-i tesɛiḍ azal annect-ilat, a-t-an tifeḍ-iyi, d kemm i d-igan asurif amezwaru.
Ula d kečč ur txusseḍ ara, s taṭṭucin-ik i iyi-d-theddreḍ imi k-in-ttwaliɣ ɣer lemri n tkerrust.
D tidet d ayen yellan, ihi ini-iyi-d d acu i m-in-qqareɣ.
Ass-a ad neɛnu takwat idergen ɣef wallen n widak akk nessen, din ad iyi-d-tiniḍ akk s yimi-k ayen i iyi-d-teqqareḍ s wallen-ik tuḥricin.
Kkan s yiwet n tḥanut uɣen kra n wučči d tissit d tẓidanin, ṭṭfen abrid n Tala n Wudi i d-izgan deg yiwet n teẓgi send ad tawḍeḍ ɣer tizi n Tirurda.
Mi uwḍen ɣer din, ddan ddeqs ddaw n yisekla n ukerruc n teẓgi-nni almi i d-ɣlin deg yiwet n talmat.
D yiwen wadeg iwimi d-zzin yisekla, d tamrijt yeččuren d rrbiɛ, d yijeǧǧigen.
Aman ggten, igḍaḍ seg yal zzin ččewččwen-d seg tal tama.
Anda i rran ufan d lḥiḍ, qqimen d imeḥbas n zzman.
Uḍnen aṭan n usemmiḍ, nutni deg unebdu i llan.
Kra dagi akk yeqqar-aɣ-d deg tsemhuyt n tefsut ideg nella.
Tafsut d tallit n tayri n kra i d-yexleq Rebbi.
Dɣa Ddayxa d Wakli d ayen yellan gar-asen i ten-yuwin ɣer din ad mlilen akken ad myussanen ugar.
Tawrirt d taddart meẓẓiyen, myussanen akk yimezdaɣen-is.
Akli d Dayxa d arraw n yimeɣrasen i sin.
Dda Yidir baba-s n Ddayxa d Dda Ɛacur baba-s n Wakli d imeddukal n ttrad n tsellullit taɣelnawt, akken i mmuten deg udrar n Jerjer send ad tefru s kra n wayyuren kan.
Nna Mennun yemma-s n Ddayxa tessen Nna Ṭawes yemma-s n Wakli yerna ttemyekcament.
Zwaren-d deg wawal s usmekti n yimawlan-nsen send ad d-uɣalen ɣur-sen : “Teẓriḍ ttḥareɣ ad yali wass akken ad d-kkreɣ ad kem-awiɣ deg tkerrust-iw s ixeddim-im. I d-as-yenna Wakli.
Ula d nekk, kra n wuḍan ttawiɣ-d tafat s wallen-iw, ulac ddqiqa n wakud-iw ur d-tɛedda tugna-inek s yimi-k yettaḍsan, amer ttafeɣ ur teṭṭixir ara akk deg lexyal-iw. I as-d-terra Ddayxa.
Ihi tḥemmleḍ-iyi ?
Ah ay Akli ma ḥemmleɣ-k ? Awal-a “ḥemmleɣ” drus n wazal i yesɛa deg wakken i k-ḥemmleɣ aṭas aṭas, ilaq i d-yennulfa wawal ijehden ugar wa.
Ula d nekk, lufan ad twaliḍ acḥal i kem-riɣ.
I sin yid-sen qqimen s tuẓẓla n yiḍarren wa ɣef yiri n wa ɣef rrbiɛ n temrijt.
Uqbel ad ifakk awal i as-yenna ijbed-itt-id ɣur-s netta yeṭṭef-itt-id ddaw n tɣerdin, nettat tefka-as lebɣi, tessenda ticenfirin-is tizeggaɣin am usisnu i tid n Wakli.
Akli mi iḥulfa anzaren-is rsen ɣef wanzaren n Ddayxa iruḥ leɛmer-is, yesraffeg s igenni wis sebɛa, amzun d ayen-nniḍen yugaren aya i d-yeḍran yid-s.
Tɣaḍ-iyi tmurt-iw.
Tɣaḍ-aɣ tmurt-nneɣ.
Wissen anida akka i tetteddu tmurt-nneɣ ?
Ulac win iɛuẓẓgen am win ur nebɣi ara ad d-isel.
Ulac win iddreɣlen am win ur nebɣi ara ad iwali.
Nkulfa-s Rebbi i zzman-a.
Yugi uydi ad as-yebru i yiɣes.
Yugi uydi ad as-iserreḥ i yiɣes.
Yugi uydi ad as-yanef i yiɣes.
Tuwi ddnub tmurt-nneɣ.
Tuḍen tmurt-iw.
Wissen melmi ara d-yali wass ?
Ɣezzif yiḍ, yugi ad yekfu.
Nettraju tafat n wass.
Tebda tidet tettban-d.
Tikerkas rrant tamurt d ayla-nsent.
Tamurt zedɣent tkerkas, urǧin tufi iman-is.
Ur tettaf ara iman-is tmurt zedɣent tkerkas.
Tamurt yebnan ɣef tikerkas ur tettili akken i tt-bɣan warraw-is.
D yir imdanen i kem-iseddawen a tamurt-iw.
Teɣliḍ-d gar yir ifassen a tamurt-iw.
Melmi ara d-tuɣaleḍ ɣer wid i kem-iḥemmlen ?
Akli mi yuɣal s axxam d yemma-s i t-id-yemmugren, teldi-as-d tawwurt.
Twala-t ibeddel, mačči d win tessen yettarran kullec ɣer daxel ama d lferḥ ama d lqerḥ.
Tikkelt-a ur yezmir ara ad yeffer addad ideg yella.
Lferḥ n tayri yerna aḥtut.
Tiyita n tayri i as-d-tefka Ddayxa tessenguga-t akk amzun teshucc-it akk almi t-terra d wayeḍ.
Yeɛreq i yiman-is.
Nna Ṭawes ur tesbir ara, tebɣa ad teḥṣu d acu akka yeḍran d mmi-s ɣas ma tekkes aɣilif mačči d ayen n diri, maca d ayen yessefraḥen nezzeh.
Ssaɛa uqbel i d-tetteffeɣ Ddayxa seg uɣerbaz ṭṭfen-d abrid n tuɣalin s taḍsa n tidet yeččuren d tayri.
Annect-a d udem n Wakli yettaḍsan i t-id-isbegnen, yerna urǧin t-twala deg waddad am wa anagar ass-nni i d-yuwi ikayaden-is n bak akked turegt.
Lferḥ n tikkelt-a d win izaden, mazal tiẓeḍt n yicenfirin n tqemmuct n Ddayxa ur tekkis ara deg ddehn n wakli.
Yemma-s truja-t ad d-yuɣal d mmi-s tessen, winna yeṭallay s igenni, issenhaz aqerruy-is, yettecmumuḥ irennu.
Mi d-yekcem ur tesfuḥ ara tariḥt n tesmem maca tettwali-t amzun yesker.
Tenṭeq ɣur-s tenna-s : “Ɛni teswiḍ-d ay argaz imi ur temlikeḍ ara iman-ik ?
Ih a yemma swiɣ-d maca mačči d aman n tẓurin ixemren yettarran amdan ur yettayal ara deg yiman-is, swiɣ-d aman n Tala n Wudi yeččuren d tayri…
Tegzem-as awal tenna-as : Buuh ! D acu-tt akka tala n yetri i aɣ-terniḍ akka ?
Mačči itri a yemma, tayri, tayri… Iɛedda ad s-d-ifek tabadut n wawal-a yuɣal yeẓra i yiman-is kan i yettmeslay.
Yekker isseshel fell-as tamsalt yenna-as : D ayen a yemma ufiɣ-d tin ara yidiren yid-i ayen i iyi-d-yeqqimen deg tudert-iw.
Ɣas ma segmi yebda awal i yettfelsif yid-s, tefhem-it.
Terfed yiwen uslilew issezɣaben aglim.
Anta akka a mmi, ini iyi-d wi tt-ilan ad lseɣ tiṣebbaḍin tura ḥḥah ad ruḥeɣ ad ak-tt-id-xeḍbeɣ.
Nnig n temrawt n yiseggasen i ttrajuɣ yiwen n wass am wa.
Ikukra abrid amezwaru yuɣal amzun yeffi-d ɣef tikkelt.
Ddayxa a yemma, yelli-s n Dda Yidir At Wulmu ameddakel n baba, yelli-s n Nna Mennun.
Mazal ur ifukk ara awal tɛeyyeḍ s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is.
D acu-t ? Fukkent akk teqcicin almi d-teɣliḍ deg m wanzaren n lbaṭaṭa ?
Imiren yeqqim yeddhec, awal ur t-id-yuli ma d nettat tugi ad teḥbes deg lehdur d lemɛayrat deg Ddayxa.
Yuɣ lḥal, akka i s-yenna wuccen : “I mecṭuḥeḍ a ddunit i meqqreḍ ay aqerruy-iw”, ulac tin ad d-yeɣlin d tislit-iw ala ddayxa n At Wulmu.
Yelsa isebbaḍen-is.
Ur tufiḍ d acu yexdem Sami.
Tom akked Mary sfehmen-d ayɣer i xedmen aya.
Annaɣ a mmi amzun d lxir-ik, wehhi-d kan ad d-teddmeḍ, tin i iyi-d-twellheḍ ur d-teqqar ara ala.
Ur ifut ara lḥal, tzemreḍ ad tbeddleḍ rray.
Tesliḍ a yemma, nekk ad am-d-iniɣ yiwen wawal : d Ddayxa neɣ tissulya-w ad tebṭel, yerna ur d-tḍerru ara akk ma mačči d nettat.
Iṣṣeɛṣṣeɛ tawwurt deffir-s yeffeɣ s zzɛaf.
Tikkelt-a, yemma-s tekkes aɣilif, tceyyeɛ-it srid ɣer tberna tamezwarut ad d-yuɣal ur iɛeqqel ara abrid-is.
Ddayxa d Wakli ttemwalin mi ara tt-isserkeb deg tkerrust-is, yettawi-tt ad tesɣer.
Maca mi ara mmcedhin, acḥal d abrid i d-teɣli tegnit, ttuɣalen ɣer teẓgi n Tala n Wudi iwimi fkan isem “Adeg n tayri-nneɣ”.
Ttɣimin din ur s-ttakin i wakud yettɛedday.
Awal gar-asen yettezzi ɣef yimira, amek i llan, d acu i ixeddmen deffir n umahil n yal ass.
Ttmeslayen diɣen ɣef uzekka-nsen.
Asentel i ten-iceɣben deg sin ɣas ma yal yiwen deg-sen ala fell-as i yettxemmim maca yeqqim yeffer-it deg wul-is.
Wissen timlilit i d-yettilin gar-asen ma ad tuɣal d tunṣibt neɣ d tiqecmaɛt kan.
Ddayxa ur tezmir ara ad d-tebder nettat awal ɣef lexḍubegga-ines.
Deg tmetti taqbaylit tilawin ssusument, ur sɛint ara awal deg temsalt-a n tissulya.
Ihi tettraju Akli ad d-yebder ayen yellan yugar akk ayen tedder yagi imi taluft-a d ayen ara tidir sya d afella.
Akli yeṭallay-itt ɣer wallen-is tizgzawin s yiwet n tmuɣli yeččuren d tayri n tidet yenna-as : “Teẓrid ala kemm i ḥemmleɣ a Taddexduxt-iw.
Ẓriɣ, ula d nekk ala kečč i sɛiɣ.
Akk i as-terra s yiwet n taɣect yettergigin acku teḥṣa d acu i iteddu ad as-d-yini nettat ur thegga ara iman-is i yiwen n yisalli am wa.
Ihi, imalas i d-iteddun, yemma ad n-tas s axxam-nwen ad kem-id-texḍeb i mmi-s.
Anwa akka mmi-s? I s-terra s udhac.
Anwa akka n mmi-s? I as-terra s udhac.
Am wakken ur tessineḍ ara yemma. Yemma am yemma-m, tal yiwet tesɛa-d yiwen.
Mennun turew-d Ddayxa ma d Ṭawes turew-d Akli.
Akli yeḥmmel Ddayxa, yebɣa ad yebḍu iseggasen ineggura n tudert-is yid-s.
Tura tebɣiḍ ad am-d-geɣ unuɣ ɣef lkaɣeḍ akken ad tegzuḍ ?
Akli ihedder nettat tleddi deg yimi-s d warquqen-is izegzawen.
Ur tezmir ara ad teffer lferḥ i d-yettdeggir wudem-is.
Imeṭṭawen n tumert serrḥen-d d tiregwa ɣef leḥnak-is ixuxiyen.
Deg yimir-nni tettu akk anzaren-is.
Mi i tesla s yimeẓẓuɣen-is i wulɣu-a n tayri temmeɣ ɣef Wakli tekker tessuden-it deg yimi, deg wanzaren, deg unyir, ur teǧǧi aḥric n wudem-is.
D tagi i d tiririt-s i Wakli mi i as-yessuter ad tuɣal d tameṭṭut-is.
Deg ubrid mi tetteddu ad tuɣal s axxam ur tefhim ara akk d acu akka i d-yeḍran yid-s.
Uwḍeɣ d aneggaru.
Nezdeɣ deg Nancy.
Ur tettkeyyif ara akk.
Wissen d acu ara d-yeḍrun azekka ?
Azekka, wissen d acu ara d-yeḍrun ?
Wissen azekka d acu ara d-yeḍrun ?
Wissen melmi ara fakkent fell-aneɣ tkerkas ?
Wissen amek ara iɛeddi uzekka ?
Azekka, wissen amek ara iɛeddi ?
Wissen azekka, amek ara iɛeddi ?
Azekka ad iɛeddi, maɛna wissen amek.
Ad iɛeddi uzekka, maɛna wissen amek.
Aṭas yellan ur nettalas ara deg yiman-nsen.
Ḥudden-kem warraw-im s wayen iwimi zemren.
Tafat iɣef tettnadiḍ tugi ad d-tejbu.
Ččant-kem tillas.
Wissen melmi ara ṭṭixrent fell-am ?
Tectaqeḍ tafat ad tt-teẓreḍ.
Tettrajuḍ tafat ad kem-id-twali.
Targa-nneɣ, tsuffuɣ ɣer berra.
Yerwa yilemẓi lemḥani deg tmurt-is.
Rwan yilmeẓyen lemḥani deg tmurt-nsen.
Rwant telmeẓyin lemḥani deg tmurt-nsent.
Nettnadi fell-am, ar tura ur kem-nufi.
Nettnadi fell-ak, ar tura ur k-nufi.
Nettnadi fell-awen, ar tura ur ken-nufi.
Nettnadi fell-awent, ar tura ur kent-nufi.
Nettnadi fell-akent, ar tura ur kent-nufi.
Nettnadi fell-asent, ar tura ur tent-nufi.
Nettnadi fell-asen, ar tura ur ten-nufi.
Nettnadi fell-as, ar tura ur t-nufi.
Nettnadi fell-as, ar tura ur tt-nufi.
Inuda fell-am ur kem-yufi.
Inuda fell-ak ur k-yufi.
Inuda fell-awen ur ken-yufi.
Inuda fell-awent ur kent-yufi.
Inuda fell-akent ur kent-yufi.
Inuda fell-asen ur ten-yufi.
Inuda fell-as ur t-yufi.
Inuda fell-as ur tt-yufi.
Ur tt-yufi ara mi inuda fell-as.
Ur t-yufi ara mi inuda fell-as.
Ur k-yufi ara mi inuda fell-ak.
Ur kem-yufi ara mi inuda fell-am.
Ur ken-yufi ara mi inuda fell-awen.
Ur kent-yufi ara mi inuda fell-akent.
Ur ten-yufi ara mi inuda fell-asen.
Ur tent-yufi ara mi inuda fell-asent.
Ur iyi-yufi ara mi inuda fell-i.
Ur aɣ-yufi ara mi inuda fell-aneɣ.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ tidersi tugar tigti.
Tigti tugar-itt tdersi deg tmurt-nneɣ.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ, tigti tugar-itt tdersi.
Tikwal ur nemlik ara iman-nneɣ, ladɣa ussan-a ineggura.
Yugi ad aɣ-yebru lḥif.
Yugi ad aɣ-yebru miḥyaf.
Yugi ad aɣ-yebru ddel.
Yugi ad aɣ-yebru ustehzi deg-neɣ.
Tugi ad aɣ-tebru twaɣit.
Tugi ad aɣ-tebru tmuḥeqranit.
Tugi ad aɣ-tebru tfuhrit.
Ssarameɣ akken neqqar : "Yiwet n tikkelt kan i tettɛedday ɣef wuccen".
Tugi ad teɛqel arraw-is.
Tettakk azal i wid ur nuklal.
Tettakk azal i wid ur nestahel.
Aydi iḥemmel win i t-ixenqen.
D wid ur neswi i iɛeddan.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-k.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-m.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-wen.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-went.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-sen.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-sent.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-s.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-kent.
Mel-iyi-d anida i nteddu akka.
Mel-iyi-d anida i teddun akka.
Mel-iyi-d anida i teddunt akka.
Mel-iyi-d anida i tettedduḍ akka.
Mlet-iyi-d anida i tetteddum akka.
Mlemt-iyi-d anida i tetteddumt akka.
Ur yeẓri anda akka i iteddu.
Ur ẓrin anda akka i teddun.
Ur ẓrint anda akka i teddunt.
Tuwi-d fell-ak ad tembiwleḍ.
Bɣiɣ ad lemdeɣ ugar n tɣawsiwin.
Nekk, ar tura ur fhimeɣ.
I tura, amek ?
Ur ẓriɣ anwa i tt-yeksan.
Ur teẓriḍ anwa i tt-yeksan.
Ur teẓrimt anwa i tt-yeksan.
Ur yeẓri anwa i tt-yeksan.
Ur teẓri anwa i tt-yeksan.
Ur ẓrin anwa i tt-yeksan.
Ur ẓrint anwa i tt-yeksan.
Wissen amek akken i t-yufa ?
Wissen amek akken i tt-yufa ?
Wissen amek akken i ten-yufa ?
Wissen amek akken i tent-yufa ?
Wissen amek akken i d-yuweḍ almi d da ?
Wissen amek akken i d-tuweḍ almi d da ?
Wissen amek akken i d-uwḍen almi d da ?
Wissen amek akken i d-uwḍent almi d da ?
Anef-as akken.
Anfet-as akken.
Anfem-as akken.
Anfemt-as akken.
Anfemt-asen akken.
Anfet-asen akken.
Anef-asen akken.
Anef-asent akken.
Iqreḥ-iyi usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Deg unebdu, iqreḥ-iyi usemmiḍ.
Iqreḥ-iyi deg unebdu usemmiḍ .
Iqreḥ-ik usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Iqreḥ-ikem usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Iqreḥ-iken usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Iqreḥ-ikent usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Iqreḥ-iten usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Iqreḥ-itent usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Iqreḥ-aɣ usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Iqreḥ-it usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Iqreḥ-itt usemmiḍ deg unebdu.
Cceḍeɣ, ɣliɣ.
Necceḍ, neɣli.
Teccḍemt, teɣlimt.
Ccḍen, ɣlin.
Ccḍent, ɣlint.
Ur cciḍeɣ, ur ɣliɣ.
Ur cciḍent, ur ɣlint.
Ur tecciḍ, ur teɣli.
Ur tecciḍeḍ, ur teɣliḍ.
Ur tecciḍem, ur teɣlim.
Ur tecciḍemt, ur teɣlimt.
Ur necciḍ, ur neɣli.
Ini-as ayen i ak-d-nniɣ.
Ini-as ayen i am-d-nniɣ.
Init-as ayen i awen-d-nniɣ.
Inimt-as ayen i awent-d-nniɣ.
Inim-as ayen i awen-d-nniɣ.
Ini-asen ayen i ak-d-nniɣ.
Ini-asent ayen i ak-d-nniɣ.
Ini-asen ayen i am-d-nniɣ.
Ini-asent ayen i am-d-nniɣ.
Tugna i d-yesken lemri, tɣaḍ-iyi mačči d kra.
Anda-t sser-nni n zik-nni ? Acmat, iɣumm-it tura.
Tazmert-nni izedɣen deg-i, teffeɣ seg-i s tuffra.
Ccib yuɣ-tt-id d tirni, d affar ur neǧǧi tama.
Yiwen n uḍar ifel s agni, anda ad nesteɛfu i lebda.
Mačči d lemri i d ssebba, ɣef wayen i aɣ-iḍerrun.
Lemri yettakk-d yiwet n tugna, d zzman i tt-id-ibennun.
Yezdi lqedd, nuɣal nekna am win iɛebban leqrun.
Tudert amzun d ddqiqa, ulac win ara tt-yernun.
Nettɛedday wa deffir wa am yisɣaren deg lkanun.
Udem-iw, ziɣ iɛreq-iyi, yal ass yettbeddil talɣa.
D aciban melba uglan, akka kan ara yuɣal umdan.
Yuḍen meskin tewser.
Ur d-tettɣimi temẓi.
Tekkat tettɛedday temẓi.
Anida-kem a temẓi-w ?
Tɛedda temẓi ur tt-nwala.
A wi ara d-yerren temẓi.
Tɛedda temẓi amzun d targit.
Teǧǧa-iyi temẓi-w, uɣaleɣ akk cabeɣ.
Teǧǧa-aɣ temẓi-nneɣ, nuɣal akk ncab.
Teǧǧa-k temẓi-k, tuɣaleḍ akk tcabeḍ.
Teǧǧa-kem temẓi-m, tuɣaleḍ akk tcabeḍ.
Teǧǧa-ken temẓi-nwen, tuɣalem akk tcabem.
Teǧǧa-kent temẓi-nwent, tuɣalemt akk tcabemt.
Teǧǧa-kent temẓi-nkent, tuɣalemt akk tcabemt.
Teǧǧa-t temẓi-s, yuɣal akk icab.
Teǧǧa-tt temẓi-s, tuɣal akk tcab.
Teǧǧa-ten temẓi-nsen, uɣalen akk caben.
Teǧǧa-tent temẓi-nsent, uɣalent akk cabent.
Tɛedda temẓi-w amzu d targit.
Tɛedda temẓi-k amzu d targit.
Tɛedda temẓi-m amzu d targit.
Tɛedda temẓi-s amzu d targit.

Tɛedda temẓi-nwen amzu d targit.
Tɛedda temẓi-nwent amzu d targit.
Tɛedda temẓi-nkent amzu d targit.
Tɛedda temẓi-nsen amzu d targit.
Tɛedda temẓi-nsent amzu d targit.
Testeqsa-d fell-i temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-ak temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-am temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-as temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-aneɣ temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-anteɣ temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-awen temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-awent temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-akent temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-asen temɣer.
Testeqsa-d fell-asent temɣer.
Ttuɣ temẓi-w.
Tettuḍ temẓi-k.
Tettuḍ temẓi-m.

Tettumt temẓi-nwent.
Tettumt temẓi-nkent.
Yettu temẓi-s.
Tettu temẓi-s.
Ttun temẓi-nsen.
Ttunt temẓi-nsent.
Temẓi ma tɛedda ur d-tettuɣal.
Ur d-tettuɣal temẓi ma tɛedda.
Times, d iɣed i d-tettaǧǧa.
Yesmentig isufa.
Smentigeɣ isufa.
Tesmentigeḍ isufa.
Tesmentig isufa.
Tesmentigem isufa.
Tesmentigemt isufa.
Smentigen isufa.
Smentigent isufa.
Nesmentig isufa.
Yensa usafu.
Yuɣ usafu.
Neɣlen waman ɣef yirij.
Ssiɣ-d tafat.
Snes tafat.
Ssexsi tafat.
Ssexsi times.
Tugem-d aman deg uɣerbal.
Tefka-as aɣerbal ad d-tagem aman seg tala.
Ali ɣef lqermud ad d-terreḍ tiqit.
Yuli ɣef lqermud, yerra-d tiqit.
Tuli ɣef lqermud, terra-d tiqit.
Tulim ɣef lqermud, terram-d tiqit.
Tulimt ɣef lqermud, terramt-d tiqit.
Ulin ɣef lqermud, rran-d tiqit.
Ulint ɣef lqermud, rrant-d tiqit.
Nuli ɣef lqermud, nerra-d tiqit.
Uliɣ ɣef lqermud, rriɣ-d tiqit.
Ur uliɣ ɣef lqermud, ur d-rriɣ tiqit.
Ur tuliḍ ɣef lqermud, ur d-terriḍ tiqit.
Ur tulim ɣef lqermud, ur d-terrim tiqit.
Ur tulimt ɣef lqermud, ur d-terrimt tiqit.
Ur ulin ɣef lqermud, ur d-rrin tiqit.
Ur ulint ɣef lqermud, ur d-rrint tiqit.
Ur nuli ɣef lqermud, ur d-nerri tiqit.
Ur yuli ɣef lqermud, ur d-yerri tiqit.
Ur tuli ɣef lqermud, ur d-terri tiqit.
Laɛmer i d-yerri agelzim s axxam.
Laɛmer i d-terri agelzim s axxam.
Laɛmer i d-nerri agelzim s axxam.
Laɛmer i d-rriɣ agelzim s axxam.
Laɛmer i d-terram agelzim s axxam.
Laɛmer i d-terramt agelzim s axxam.
Laɛmer i d-rran agelzim s axxam.
Laɛmer i d-rrant agelzim s axxam.
Mi tetteddu Mennun deg ubrid srid ɣer yimawlan-is, d argaz-is Caɛban i tt-isuɛfen.
Aqcic yenneɣna, yugi ad yečč, iruḥ ɣer umḍiq-is.
Arrac nneɣnan, ugin ad ččen, ruḥen ɣer yimeḍqan-nsen.
Tiqcicin nneɣnant, ugint ad ččent, ruḥent ɣer yimeḍqan-nsent.
Aṭas aya ur terzif ɣur-sen, tcedha nezzeh iẓuran-is.
Axxam n baba-s yezga-d deffir n tɣaltin.
I wakken ad tawḍeḍ ɣur-s yesḍuli fell-ak ad tɛeddiḍ ɣef kra n yiɣewdan i yebḍa yiwen n wasif i d-yuɣen aẓar seg udrar.
Iserreḥ-d wasif i yiman-is mehli mehli almi d luḍa.
Din, tiregwa n waman ggtent, ttarrant ɣer yiɣewdan.
Iɣewdan-nni, yal wa d acu i d talɣa-s, wa d akerḍis, wihin d akuẓdis…
Tallit n yimir-nni d ṣṣmayem, akken kan i ifukken yifellaḥen tamegra n yigran n temẓin d yirden.
Ssawaḍen nnaɛma-agi ɣer yinurar n taddart anda ara terwet.
Ihi, igran ttbanen-d merra ttwamegren, ala iɣlel i d-yugaren.
Argaz d tmeṭṭut-is teddun ttmeslayen acku abrid ɣezzif.
Yekker yenna i tmeṭṭut-is : Ṭill a tameṭṭut, iger-ihin wenɛen-as tamegra s umger.
D tidet ay argaz, wenɛen-as tamegra maca mačči s umger s temqessin i t-gezmen, i as-terra tmeṭṭut-is.
D acu akka i kem-yuɣen akka a tameṭṭut ?
Am wakken ur teḥsiḍ ara s wacu i megren medden igran.
Nekk la ak-d-qarreɣ iger-ihin d timqessin i t-igezmen.
Waqila tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ.
Timqessin ur tent-ssexdamen ara deg tfellaḥt maca deg ugnay.
Ayen i d-teqqareḍ yella, maca iger-ihin ur t-imusa ara umger, d timqessin i t-yekksen.
Wiyam a temeṭṭut ur iyi-suffuɣ ara seg laɛqel-iw.
Nekk nniɣ-ak akka, ma d kečč ini ayen tebɣiḍ.
Netta yeqqar d amger, nettat teqqar d timqessin, teṭṭef deg wawal-is, tugi ad as-tebru.
Zzɛaf n urgaz skudmal yettali almi ur yeḥṣi i ixeddem.
Yeṭṭef tameṭṭut-is deg wagus d ucekkuḥ, idegger-itt ɣer wasif.
Tama anda teɣli d tamda, texjeḍ ddeqs.
Tameṭṭut tettezder trennu.
Aman sseblaɛen tafekka-s almi i d-yugar ala ufus-is ayeffus.
D afus-is kan i d-ibanen, tlata n yiḍudan kemsen ma d sin ldin (amcaḥ n terbutin d ṭṭelba n lexzin).
Sin-nni n yiḍudan cerɛen, smektayen-d… timqessin.
Yufa ayen ara yeffɣen fell-as.
Tufa ayen ara yeffɣen fell-as.
Ufiɣ ayen ara yeffɣen fell-i.
Nufa ayen ara yeffɣen fell-aneɣ.
Tufiḍ ayen ara yeffɣen fell-ak.
Tufiḍ ayen ara yeffɣen fell-am.
Tufam ayen ara yeffɣen fell-awen.
Tufamt ayen ara yeffɣen fell-awent.
Tufamt ayen ara yeffɣen fell-akent.
Ufan ayen ara yeffɣen fell-asen.
Ufant ayen ara yeffɣen fell-asent.
Ar tura ur ufiɣ ayen ara yeffɣen fell-i.
Ar tura ur tufiḍ ayen ara yeffɣen fell-ak.
Ar tura ur tufiḍ ayen ara yeffɣen fell-am.
Ar tura ur tufim ayen ara yeffɣen fell-awen.
Ar tura ur tufimt ayen ara yeffɣen fell-awent.
Ar tura ur tufimt ayen ara yeffɣen fell-akent.
Ar tura ur yufi ayen ara yeffɣen fell-as.
Ar tura ur tufi ayen ara yeffɣen fell-as.
Ar tura ur ufin ayen ara yeffɣen fell-asen.
Ar tura ur ufint ayen ara yeffɣen fell-asent.
Ar tura ur nufi ayen ara yeffɣen fell-aneɣ.
Yenna-as : "Awer tawḍeḍ".
Iǧeyyeb aserwal-is ad as-d-izeg.
Tǧeyyeb aserwal-is ad as-d-izeg.
Ittazzal am wayis.
Iṭukkeḳ uzger.
D tagent i t-yeqqsen.
Uqbel ad bduɣ ddunit, rujan-iyi ad d-laleɣ.
Tettraju-iyi tmeddit, wissen kan amek ara tt-afeɣ.
Tanezzayt, tmmuger-d ṭṭrad, tamhersa tjeggef tamurt.
Deg wallaɣ ccama teggra-d, acḥal d win nessen yemmut.
Ayen yuran s lmidad, yeggra-d deg umezruy d ttbut.
Mi nruja ṭṭrad ad yefru Nenwa ad nissin tilelli.
Yir tudert ad as-nebru, tin yelhan ad aɣ-d-twali.
Ziɣen ur tekfi ddeɛwessu, ass-a yif-it yiḍelli.
Nruja ad nekfu tizrawin, tizrawin n uẓawali.
Ɣef uxxam n lwacul d akli, ixeddim nebda-t ɣef ɛecrin.
Tagmat tessemɣi-d tisennanin, ar tura nettunt deg-i.
Nerja tamurt ad tseggem Mi d-tuɣal s afus n mmi-s
Lhemm irennu-d ɣef lhemm Ar tura ur tufi iman-is
Nettraju ad d-yali wass, n tmaziɣt d Yimaziɣen.
Ar tura sɛerqen layas, rran iman-nsen d Aɛraben.
Rennun i tyerrust akras, rrebg n lasel ad t-sɣersen.
Yenta-iyi usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-k usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-kem usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-ken usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-kent usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-t usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-tt usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-ten usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-tent usennan deg uḍar.
Yenta-aɣ usennan deg uḍar.
Ur iyi-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur k-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur kem-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur ken-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur kent-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur ten-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur tent-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur t-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur tt-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Ur aɣ-yenti ara usennan deg uḍad.
Yekkes-d asennan s tneqqaḍin.
Tekkes-d asennan s tneqqaḍin.
Nekkes-d asennan s tneqqaḍin.
Kksen-d asennan s tneqqaḍin.
Kksent-d asennan s tneqqaḍin.
Tekkseḍ-d asennan s tneqqaḍin.
Tekksem-d asennan s tneqqaḍin.
Tekksemt-d asennan s tneqqaḍin.
Yugi usennan ad d-yekkes.
Yekcem usennan gar yiccer d uksum.
Gar yiccer d uksum i yekcem usennan.
Yedda ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Tedda ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Nedda ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Teddam ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Teddamt ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Teddiḍ ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Ddan ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Ddant ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Tedduɣ ḥafi ɣef usennan.
Tamedyezt d yiwen n uḥric agejdan n tsekla.
Seg zik n zik Imaziɣen ḥemmlen ad uraren s wawalen.
Taqbaylit d awal.
S wawalen i dehhun, yis-sen i ttnaɣen, yis-sen i ferrun, yis-sen i ttɛezziren, yis-sen…
Awal d arekti, ad t-id-yeddem umedyaz ini imsel-it, yettak-as talɣai i d-ssunuɣen yiḥulfan-is n yimiren.
Wissen yeḍsa, wissen yennuɣna, wissen…
Awalen i d-iberru wul-is ttazzalen am waman n tregwa lawan n tefsut, s yiwen n ucewwiq ijebbden ameẓẓuɣ n umdan ma yella d tanufli i t-izedɣen imiren.
Ma yella d zɛaf i yeṭṭfen tasga n wul-is, lehdur i d-yettdeggir cban asif-nni n tegrest yeskefkufen s waman-is iluɣen.
Kra i d-immuger yawi-t, ulac aḥezzeb, ulac akukru, d iḥuccan, d rrbu, d ifurkan neɣ d leǧdari, kullec yedda.
Daɣ netta, Malek teḍra yid-s am wasif-a.
Tamedyezt-is d tin n zɛaf, d tin n ddemmar.
Iban d yiwen n umdan yettaken aṭas n wazal i teɣdemt, d tin yettqadar mačči cwiṭ kan.
Amer yettaf imdanen merra anda bɣun ilin kif kif-iten.
Iɣucc akken i ilaq anemgal n teɣdemt : lbaṭel.
Anect-a yenna-t-id deg waṭas n yisefra-s.
Ulac yir abrid bu yicrufen neɣ tiẓgi taɛemriwt m yisennanen ur t-id-issukk ara syin.
Yeḥṣa s wansa i d-yekka waya, dɣa urd as-yeǧǧi kra i win akken yeṭṭfen algam yezzuɣur agdud-is i iḍebber yal ass.
Tagnit mačči d tin yersen, tenceggal, terwi…
Azwel i yefka i ummud-is wis krad d TIRWAYIN, d asget n yisem i d-yuɣen aẓar seg umyag « RWI ».
Talɣiwin n yisefra n ummud-a mgaradent akk, ulac tin icuban tayeḍ.
Tiddi n usefru diɣen ur teɛdil ara, akken llan imecṭaḥ maḍi i llan yilemmasen d wid yemmden.
Tella tmedyezt s tmeɣruḍt, tella tlellit.
Akka tura ulac aṭas n yimedyazen Imaziɣen i yettarun tamedyezt tilellit.
Malek iga isurifen-is imenza deg termit-a tamaynut.
Yura kra n yisefra yesɛan talɣiwin yettakken anzi ɣer kra tɣawsiwin.
Amedyaz-nneɣ diɣen yebda isurifen-is imenza deg taɣult n tira n tullisin.
Nettraju akken i tent-yettraju ad d-ffɣent ad tent-nɣer.
Netta iruḥ akk d afrayen, d anafray ameqqran, yettḥulfu mačči d kra.
Ansa i d-kkan akka yizerman-a ?
D acu-t akka tura wagi ? Izerman deg tsemhuyt n tegrest.
Ad nelqeḍ azemmur neɣ ad nɛas izerman.
Tamurt n Leqbayel ur tessidir ara arrw-is.
Truḥ akk d adrar, rnu akal-is mačči d win yelhan i wuẓẓu.
D anect-a i yerran ilmeẓyen-is ttinigen ɣer tmura tiberraniyin akken ad ssenzen afud n umahil-nsen.
Tadrimt i d-ttaṭṭafen ttazen-tt-id i twaculin-nsen yeqqimen deg tmurt.
Ihi, tudrin i tent-iɛemren ala tilawin d temɣarin d yimɣaren d teqcicin d warrac imecṭaḥ.
Tilawin deg taddart dehhunt deg lecɣal n yal ass am leqdic, aniwel, tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen, rennunt teẓẓunt izegza deg tmizar i ttarrant d tibḥirin.
Maca yella wayen-nniḍen testeḥq tmeṭṭut ladɣa ayen yerzan tahuski-ines, am taẓult, agusim aman n rriḥa, lemri neɣ kra n wallalen i tessexdam deg ugnay am tsegnatin, lqez, d wayen-nniḍen.
Win i d-yettawin ɣer tudrin n Leqbayel tilufa-a akk iwumi neqqar taɛeṭṭart d aɛeṭṭar.
Ihi, yiwet n tikkelt yiwen uɛeṭṭar, Ibubben aḍellaɛ yettenfalen seg leḥwal n tɛeṭṭart, iteddu deg tzerbatin n yiwet n taddart, yettɛeggiḍ ad as-d-slen yimezdaɣ-is ad d-asen ad aɣen ayen akken yessnuzu.
Yassawal acḥal d abrid : « Ad taɣem taɛeṭṭart ! Ad taɣem taɛeṭṭart ! »
Dɣa yerna kra a-t-a yeffeɣ-d yiwen uqcic d ameẓẓyan seg yiwen uxxam, yenna-as i uɛeṭṭar-nni : « Ur nettaɣ ara ! Ur nettaɣ ara ! »
Ala a mmi, aweḍ s axxam-nwen testeqsiḍ yemma-k ma ad taɣ neɣ ur tettaɣ ara » I as-yerra uɛeṭṭar-nni.
Tuɣ fell-as cwiṭ n taẓult.
Ad dduɣ anda i teddiḍ.
Ad neddu anda teddam.
Tɛewqeḍ d acu ara txedmeḍ.
Tɛewqem d acu ara txedmem.
Tɛewqemt d acu ara txedmemt.
Ɛewqen d acu ara xedmen.
Ɛewqent d acu ara xedment.
Yelha win iceffun ɣef lxir.
Xdem lxir ad t-tafeḍ.
Xedmemt lxir ad t-tafemt.
Xedmem lxir ad t-tafem.
Xedmet lxir ad t-tafem.
Walaɣ-t mi iɛedda.
Walaɣ-tt mi tɛedda.
Walaɣ-ten mi ɛeddan.
Walaɣ-tent mi ɛeddant.
Walaɣ-k mi tɛeddaḍ.
Walaɣ-kem mi tɛeddaḍ.
Walaɣ-ken mi tɛeddam.
Walaɣ-kent mi tɛeddamt.
Twala-t mi d-iɛedda.
Twala-tt mi d-tɛedda.
Twala-k mi d-tɛeddaḍ.
Twala-kem mi d-tɛeddaḍ.
Twala-ken mi d-tɛeddam.
Twala-kent mi d-tɛeddamt.
Twala-ten mi d-ɛeddan.
Twala-aɣ mi d-nɛedda.
Twala-iyi mi d-ɛeddaɣ.
Twala-tent mi d-ɛeddant.
Ur iyi-d-twala ara mi d-ɛeddaɣ.
Ur aɣ-d-twala ara mi d-nɛedda.
Ur k-id-twala ara mi d-tɛeddaḍ.
Ur kem-id-twala ara mi d-tɛeddaḍ.
Ur ken-id-twala ara mi d-tɛeddam.
Ur kent-id-twala ara mi d-tɛeddamt.
Ur ten-id-twala ara mi d-ɛeddan.
Ur tent-id-twala ara mi d-ɛeddant.
Yettazzal ad t-yaweḍ.
Yettazzal ad tt-yaweḍ.
Yettazzal ad ten-yaweḍ.
Yettazzal ad tent-yaweḍ.
Tettazzal ad t-taweḍ.
Tettazzal ad ten-taweḍ.
Tettazzal ad tent-taweḍ.
Tettazzal ad ken-in-taweḍ.
Tettazzal ad kent-in-taweḍ.
Tettazzal ad aɣ-d-taweḍ.
Tettazzal ad iyi-d-taweḍ.
Nekk i ssneɣ d wagi.
Aseggas iteddu ad yeffeɣ, ad yeǧǧ amḍiq-is i wayeḍ.
Ihi deg tlemmast n wayyur nunber ideg nella.
D tallit n tkerza.
Yiwen ukerraz d mmi-s, kerrzen urti-nsen s tyuga n yizgaren.
Izeggen wass lluẓen, ssersen-d ddaw n tzemmurt i tili aɛwin tetten.
A-t-aya iteddu-d yiwen n umdan.
Nwan-t i sin yid-sen d amsebrid.
Ttrajun ad ten-izul u ad iɛeddi deg ubrid-is.
Akken kan i d-yuweḍ yeqqim-d ɣur-sen yebda tuččit.
Baba-s d mmi-s ttemxaẓaren.
Mi ten-iɛedda udhac amezwaru yenṭeq ukerraz yenna i mmi-s : "Tessneḍ-t ?" Netta yettwehhi ɣer uberrani-nni.
Mmi-s yerra-as-d s tibawt.
I kečč a baba yella kra n tikkelt i twalaḍ amexluq-agi ?
D tikkelt tamezwarut i d-zgant wallen-iw deg-s. I as-yerra ukerraz.
Yekker iluɛa aterras-nni i d-yeqqimen yid-sen.
Yella win i tessneḍ deg-neɣ ay aɛerḍi ?
Argaz udrig yerra-asen-d : "Kunwi ur ken-ssineɣ ara, i ssneɣ d wa !" Netta yettwehhi ɣer uɣrum.
Yefka-as ad yečč.
Yefka-as ad tečč.
Yefka-asen ad ččen.
Yefka-asent ad ččent.
Yefka-awen ad teččem.
Yefka-awent ad teččemt.
Yefka-akent ad teččemt.
Yefka-ak ad teččeḍ.
Yefka-am ad teččeḍ.
Yefka-iyi ad ččeɣ.
Yefka-aɣ ad nečč.
Tefka-iyi-d ad ččeɣ.
Tefka-aɣ-d ad nečč.
Tefka-am-d ad teččeḍ.
Tefka-ak-d ad teččeḍ.
Tefka-aken-d ad teččem.
Tefka-akent-d ad teččemt.
Tefka-awen-d ad teččem.
Tefka-awent-d ad teččemt.
Tefka-asen-d ad ččen.
Tefka-asent-d ad ččent.
Ur asen-tefki kra.
Ur asent-tefki kra.
Ur iyi-d-tefki kra.
Ur aɣ-d-tefki kra.
Ur as-tefki kra.
Ur awen-tefki kra.
Ur awent-tefki kra.
Aken akk i as-yefka, yettu-t.
Aken akk i as-tefka, yettu-t.
Aken akk i as-yefka, tettu-t.
Kra i as-yefka, yettu-t.
Kra i as-tefka, yettu-t.
Kra i as-tefka, tettu-t.
Ahat yuḍen.
Asmahat yuḍen.
Yezmer lḥal yuḍen.
Qqaren-d yuḍen.
Ma ur d-yettban ara yuḍen.
Aṭas aya netta d amuḍin.
Aṭas aya i yuḍen.
Nessaram-as tujjya i win yuḍnen.
Win yuḍnen, d tujjya i as-nesaram.
Yuḍen meskin.
Tuwi-d fell-i ad t-qadreɣ agama deg tal tama ɣas d azrem i yella.
Ad fell-as yeεfu yerḥem yazen-awen-d ssber.
Yeg Rebbi i awen-d-yeǧǧa d lbaraka.
Aṭas n yinsayen i yeqqnen ɣer useggas amaziɣ.
Seg tura ad awen srebḥeɣ akk aseggas amaynut, d win ara wen-d-yeglun ala s wayen tebɣam.
Fkem-d azemz n wass amenzu d wass aneggaru n useggas amaziɣ ara d-ikecmen (ass, ayyur, aseggas).
Bedrem-d tisemhay n useggas amaziɣ, tefkem-d sin (2) wayyuren n tal yiwet.
Mi ara d-ires yimensi n yennayer, iwumi d-ttrusunt tjeɣlin ?
Ayɣer i d-yerḍel wayyur n yennayer yiwen wass sɣur ayyur n furar ?
Melmi i bdan Yimaziɣen ssiḍinen ussan ?
Anwa i d agellid neɣ i d aferɛun n yimir-nni ?
D netta i isbedden tagelda tis 22 Tamasrit, Yenbez Falesṭin, deg Jerusalem, yemmeɣ ɣef uwraɣ d yigerrujen n ufakan n Mass Sliman, yerra-ten d ayla-s; isem-is yedda-d deg udlis n Mass Ɛisa.
Amek i as-qqaren diɣen i umenzu n yennayer ?
Imezdaɣ n Bni Snus yettidiren deg ugezdu n Tlemsen deg umalu n tmurt n Lezzayer sfugulen-as i umenzu n yennayer.
Amek i t-ttmmagaren ?
I wacu i sfiliten Yimaziɣen mi tetten nnig n tawant ass n umenzu n yennayer ?
D acu i ilaqen akken iduba n tmura n ugafa n Tferka ad t-gen iwakken amenzu n yennayer ad yuɣal ɣur-s azal ?
Mazal abrid iḍul, arkasen d yiḍarren amzun d yiwen, i tikli dima begsen.
Kker ad neddu ass n lǧemɛa.
Mi ara d-ires yimensi n yennayer, ttrusunt-d tjeɣlin i yiɛeggalen n twacult yellan iḍ-nni din akked wid yunagen (iminigen d twelliyin) neɣ wid yemmuten.
Bdan Yimaziɣen ssiḍinen ussan deg useggas 950 send talalit n Mass Ɛisa.
Deg umenzu n yennayer ttseṭilen tikkelt tamezwarut i warrac imecṭaḥ.
Deg umenzu n yennayer ttnawalen seksu s uksum n uyaziḍ.
Deg umenzu n yennayer nefqen-d aqerruy n uzger.
Deg umenzu n yennayer tettili-d temlilit n tasa d wi ay turew.
Deg umenzu n yennayer tetten deg yimensi-nni aṭas, akka i sfiliten i lxir ad yagar akka d tasawent.
Ssizdigent tlawin axxam akken i iwata, akka i ttmmagarent amenzu n yennayer.
Tameṭṭut i d-yufa lḥal teggar aẓeṭṭa, yuwi-d fell-as ad t-tfakk send ad d-yekcem useggas amaynut, ma ur tezmir ara iman-is ttɛawanent-tt tnaragin-is.
Deg Uwris, tamurt n Yicawiyen, tilawin ttbeddilent inyen d tgejda n uqiḍun ɣef waya i s-qqaren i umenzu n yennayer « Buyni ».
Irgazen icawiyen, tturaren ddabax n uḍar neɣ ɣeṭṭlen leɣruḍ s tyitiwin n lbarud s temgeḥyal.
Deg Tlemsan tettili-d yiwet n tfaska iwimi semman : « Ayrad ».
D yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun i d-tturaren yimezdaɣ n taddart, ttɣummun-d udmawen-nsen s yisɣumen (masques) yecban iqudam n yizem.
Imezdaɣ n taddart, arrac tiqcicin ad tezzin i taddart, ad cennun, ad d-jemɛen isufar n wučči, tameddit, tilawin ttnawalent-d yis-sen imensi i yesddukulen akk at taddart.
Yufa fell-as.
Tufa fell-as.
Ufiɣ fell-as.
Nufa fell-as.
Ufan fell-as.
Ufant fell-as.
Tufan fell-as.
Tufant fell-as.
Tufiḍ fell-as.
Ur ufiɣ ara fell-as.
Ur nufi ara fell-as.
Ur yufi ara fell-as.
Ur tufi ara fell-as.
Ur ufin ara fell-as.
Ur ufint ara fell-as.
Ur tufim ara fell-as.
Ur tufimt ara fell-as.
Ur tufiḍ ara fell-as.
Wissen ma ad afeɣ fell-as ?
Wissen ma ad naf fell-as ?
Wissen ma ad afen fell-as ?
Wissen ma ad afent fell-as ?
Wissen ma ad tafeḍ fell-as ?
Wissen ma ad tafem fell-as ?
Wissen ma ad tafemt fell-as ?
Qqim ɣef yiman-ik.
Qqimet ɣef yiman-nwen.
Qqimem ɣef yiman-nwen.
Qqimemt ɣef yiman-nwent.
Qqimemt ɣef yiman-nkent.
Sliɣ-as i tezlit-a, teɛǧeb-iyi.
Akken d-tenniḍ ulac am tayri.
Ma ulac tayri, ur tufiḍ d acu i yellan.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i yellan ma ulac tayri.
Mi ara ifakk wass,iɣelli-d yiḍ.
Iɣelli-d yiḍ mi ara ifakk wass.
Yuweḍ s anda ara naweḍ.
Ala lmut ur nesqizzib.
Yenwa ur yettmettat ara.
Amdan, yettmettat.
Mi ara yemmet yiwen, nettadder-it-id ala deg wayen yelhan.
Dayen, yemmut...
Anda telliḍ ad k-in-taweḍ.
Anda telliḍ ad kem-in-taweḍ.
Anda tellam ad ken-in-taweḍ.
Anda tellamt ad kent-in-taweḍ.
Mačči d win iɣef ad nettru.
I ak-nessaram d tujjya iɛejlen.
D tujjya iɛejlen i ak-nessaram.
Mel-as abrid.
Mel-asen abrid.
Mel-asent abrid.
Ur as-yemli ara abrid.
Ur asen-yemli ara abrid.
Ur asent-yemli ara abrid.
Ur awen-yemli ara abrid.
Ur awent-yemli ara abrid.
Ur ak-yemli ara abrid.
Ur am-yemli ara abrid.
Ur iyi-yemli ara abrid.
Ur aɣ-yemli ara abrid.
Anwa abrid ara taɣeḍ ?
Anta ara taɣeḍ ?
D acu-tt tawla-a i k-yuɣen ?
Wissen ma yuɣ lḥenni-s ?
Yettaɣ-as awal s urfad n timmi.
Yettwaḥbes deg lbaṭel.
Akken txedmeḍ, tweḥleḍ.
Akken txedmem, tweḥlem.
Akken txedmemt, tweḥlemt.
Akken xedmen, weḥlen.
Akken xedment, weḥlent.
Akken yexdem, yewḥel.
Akken texdem, tewḥel.
Akken xedmeɣ, weḥleɣ.
Akken nexdem, newḥel.
Sebrem, kullec ad iɛeddi.
Sebremt, kullec ad iɛeddi.
Sebret, kullec ad iɛeddi.
Kullec ad iɛeddi ma tsebreḍ.
Kullec ad iɛeddi ma tsebrem.
Kullec ad iɛeddi ma tsebremt.
Zdi lqedd-ik.
Ili-k d argaz !
Tissulya timerbuḥin.
Yejba akkin i udrar.
Tejba akkin i udrar.
Nejba akkin i udrar.
Anef-as ad yeddu yid-k ɣer ssuq.
Anef-as ad yeddu yid-m ɣer ssuq.
Anfet-as ad yeddu yid-wen ɣer ssuq.
Anfem-as ad yeddu yid-wen ɣer ssuq.
Anfemt-as ad yeddu yid-went ɣer ssuq.
Anfemt-as ad yeddu yid-kent ɣer ssuq.
Yedda yid-sen ɣer ssuq.
Tedda yid-sen ɣer ssuq.
Yufa ssuq yefra.
Tufa ssuq yefra.
Nufa ssuq yefra.
Ufant ssuq yefra.
Ufɣ ssuq yefra.
Tufiḍ ssuq yefra.
Tufam ssuq yefra.
Tufamt ssuq yefra.
Mi nufa ssuq yefra, nuɣal-d.
Mi yufa ssuq yefra, yuɣal-d.
Mi tufa ssuq yefra, tuɣal-d.
Mi ufiɣ ssuq yefra, uɣaleɣ-d.
Mi ufam ssuq yefra, tuɣalem-d.
Mi tufamt ssuq yefra, tuɣalemt-d.
Mi ufan ssuq yefra, uɣalen-d.
Mi ufant ssuq yefra, uɣalent-d.
Nadi fell-as, ad t-tafeḍ.
Nadi fell-asen, ad ten-tafeḍ.
Nadi fell-asent, ad tent-tafeḍ.
Ur nudaɣ fell-asen, ur ten-ufiɣ.
Ur nudaɣ fell-asent, ur tent-ufiɣ.
Ffɣeɣ mi d-tkecmeḍ.
Teffɣeḍ mi d-kecmeɣ.
Neffeɣ mi d-tkecmem.
Teffɣem mi d-nekcem.
Ffɣeɣ mi d-tkecmem.
Teffɣem mi d-kecmeɣ.
Ur ffiɣeɣ, ur d-tekcimeḍ.
Anda i terriḍ, ad k-in-awḍeɣ.
Anda i terriḍ, ad kem-in-awḍeɣ.
Anda i terram, ad ken-in-awḍeɣ.
Anda i terramt, ad kent-in-awḍeɣ.
Wi ad kem-yamnen a ddunit !
Ffɣen-d seg lḥebs iḍelli.
Refden anay amaziɣ, uwin-ten ɣer lḥebs.
Anay amaziɣ d azamul n tmagit.
Anay amaziɣ yesddukul ur ibeṭṭu.
Yenɣa, iwujeh.
Ad nɣen, ad wajhen.
Tuker-it ddunit.
Tuker-itt ddunit.
Ukreɣ ayla n medden fell-ak.
Tukreḍ aylan n medden fell-i.
Nuker aylan n medden fell-ak.
Nuker aylan n medden fell-am.
Efk azal i umdan.
Diri-tt tmuḥeqranit.
Diri win yejjujran.
Diri win yettɛeddayen tilas.
Ugint wallen-iw ad amnent ayen walant.
Ugint wallen-iw ad amnent ayen ttwalint.
Ur d-zgin ara wallen-iw deg-s.
Ur d-zgin ara wallen-iw deg-sen.
Ur d-zgin ara wallen-iw deg-sent.
Ǧǧiɣ-t-in deg taddart.
Ǧǧiɣ-tt-in deg taddart.
Ǧǧiɣ-ten-in deg taddart.
Ǧǧiɣ-tent-in deg taddart.
Ǧǧiɣ-ken-in deg taddart.
Ǧǧiɣ-kent-in deg taddart.
Ǧǧiɣ-ken-in deg ssuq.
Ǧǧiɣ-kent-in deg ssuq.
Ǧǧiɣ-t-in deg ssuq.
Ǧǧiɣ-tt-in deg ssuq.
Ǧǧiɣ-ten-in deg ssuq.
Ǧǧiɣ-tent-in deg ssuq.
Ikcem-it s teɣrit.
Ikcem-itt s teɣrit.
Ikcem-iten s teɣrit.
Ikcem-itent s teɣrit.
Yewwet-it akken ad yecfu.
Kra yekka yiḍ d adfel yekkat.
D isemmaḍen wuḍan mi yekkat ugris.
Mi yekkat ugris, semmḍit wuḍan.
Asemmiḍ n tegrest igezzem.
Igezzem usemmiḍ n tegrest.
Iqreḥ-iyi fuccil.
Fucclen yifassen-iw.
Qujjren yiḍarren-iw.
Tewɛer tira i win yefucclen.
Win ifucclen, tewɛer-as tira.
Gan tameɣra, yeqres ṭṭbel, yefrar wurar.
Tislit terra-d sebɛiyyam s axxam-nsen deg Tgemmunt.
Tuɣal kan s axxam-is d win n urgaz-is ɣer taddart Ufella tebda leqdic d lecɣal ama d wid n uxxam ama d wid n lexla.
Ur teqqim ara aṭas akken ad taɣ tannumi n tudert-is tamaynut.
Win tt-iwalan tqeddec ad yenwu din i d-tlul, d taqcict n taddart Ufella.
Zrin kra n wayyuren, Ṭawes terfed; d ayen i yeččuren ul n temɣart-is Mennun s lferḥ.
Tenna-a yemma-s : «Ɣur-m a Ṭawes! Mačči d argaz-im kan ara taɣeḍ, ad ternuḍ ad taɣeḍ imɣaren-im ara tettqadareḍ, ad taɣeḍ inaragen-im, insayen n taddart… »
D ayen i texdem, tuɣ awal i yemma-s, daymi ur d-tettban ara d tabarranit.
Dɣa, tal tikkelt ara tfakk taẓallit n yal akud seg tin n lefjer ɣer tin n lɛica, ur tettettu ara ddeɛwat n lxir i merra arraw-is, amur ameqqran tettak-it i win yellan deg uɛebbuḍ n teslit-is.
Lehdur deg yimi-s teddun am waman deg wasif iḥemlen mi ara tdeɛɛu acku awal-is teqqar-it-id s tutlayt-is, s teqbaylit.
Tettɛenni ɣer Rebbi ad d-ilal d aqcic.
Ṭawes d Muḥend akken i bɣan ula d nutni.
Amenzu-nsen bɣan-t d aqcic akken assen ara yimɣur ad yexdem fell-asen.
Akka i d timetti tamaziɣt i ifernen arrac ɣef teqcicin.
Qqaren-d deg yiwen wanzi : "Ad d-yefk Rebbi llaẓ yernu-d arrac".
D arrac yettuɣalen azekka d irgazen i izemren ad rren akkin llaẓ d lihana.
Tawacult n At Lḥif bḥal isem-is, am twaculin yettidiren deg tudrin ickenṭḍen ɣer yidurar.
Muḥend, argaz n Ṭawes ɣur-s yemma-s Mennun d baba-s Salem, d imɣaren i sin, rnu sin watmaten-is ddaw-as : Yidir d Caɛban.
Ma d uletma-s Melɛez terna-d fell-as, tezwej ɣer yiwet n taddart ur neggug ara ɣef taddart n Tgemmunt.
Asmi i d-tlul Ṭawes, amzun kra ur d-yeḍri, d taqcict ulac aslilew.
Ula d tebrek i d-yeɣlin ɣef taddart n Tgemmunt ass-nni terna-d tin-is, yerna mačči deg tsemhuyt n tegrest ideg nella.
Ad as-tiniḍ tagrest d tefsut mcawarent, gant ayen gan wayyuren n yennayer d furar : furar yerḍel yiwen wass i yennayer ma d tafsut, nettat terḍel kra n wussan i tegrest.
Ma neṭall azemz n wass ad naf tekcem tefsut maca tignewt d tin n tegrest, asigna yezga kra yekka wass, asemmiḍ yestufa-d iteqqes.
D taswiɛt ur nessefraḥ i textar Ṭawes akken ad d-tas ɣer ddunit, terna-d d taɛeggalt ɣer twacult n At Uwrir.
Muḥend yuɣ Tawes.
Ṭawes yuɣ-itt Muḥend.
Tedda d taqeffaft.
Iḍelli i tedda d taqeffaft.
Iḍelli i tedda d tislit.
Lxersum telha-d yid-s akken i iwata.
Trebba-tt-id akken ttrebbin tiqcicin deg tmurt n Leqbayel.
Taqcict tettimɣur trennu, tetturar am tizziwin-is.
Turarin ggtent, maca tḥemmel aṭas ad turar ilqafen neɣ tiɛecciwin.
Qqaren-asent diɣen tixxamin, d yiwen wurar i yettaǧǧan arrac d teqcicin ttarran iman-nsen d imdanen imeqqranen.
Bennun ixxamen imecṭaḥ s wakal d udɣaɣ, ttnawalen, ssrusun-d učči-nni i d-heggan iwimi qqaren tibezziḥt deg tḥektin n ccemma ma d aman i tissit deg tduma n ukawču, ttrebbin mmi-tsen i d-neǧǧren seg wuffal.
S umata ttɛanaden imeqqranen, ttheggin iman-nsen akken ad zemren i wuguren ara d-mmagren deg tudert-nsen ur nettqili.
Ṭawes tetturar am tizzya-s maca tettɛawan yemma-s deg tal taɣult n yimuhal n yal ass.
Tettagem-d aman seg tala, tettenneḍ tiɣeɣert, tesselmad-as cwiṭ cwiṭ yemma-s aniwel, tettheggi-tt ad tuɣal d tameṭṭut ara izemren i uxxam-is d warraw-is.
Aɣerbaz azayez ulac-it imiren.
Yuɣ-itt d tameẓẓyant.
Yuɣ-itt meẓẓiyet.
Yeqqim-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Teqqim-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Neqqim-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Teqqimeḍ-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Teqqimem-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Teqqimemt-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Qqimem-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Qqimen-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Qqiment-as deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Qqimen-asen deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Qqimen-asent deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Mačči akka i ilaq ad tili.
D at iqerray d ilmawen i yeṭṭfen taqaɛet.
Wissen anda i tetteddu akka ?
Beddlen udem i tmurt.
Tamurt-nneɣ tuɣal d tayeḍ.
Ttuɣaḍen wid yettun iman-nsen.
Ɣaḍen-iyi wid d tid yettun iman-nsen.
Ayen i d-nenna drus.
Ayen d-nniɣ, wissen ma ad yaweḍ.
Yuli-d ɣef wul-iw.
Dayen, ɛyiɣ !
Rran iman-nsen ɛuẓẓgen.
D iɛeẓẓugen i rran iman-nsen.
D nutni kan i iɛeddan.
I iɛeddan ala nutni.
Llan nutni, wiyiḍ ulac-iten.
Llant nutni, tiyiḍ ulac-itent.
Akud iteddu ur iḥebbes; Ṭawes tewwi-d asurif yid-s.
Mazal ur teqfil ara xemseṭṭac n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, bdan-d yinexḍaben ttasen-d ad tt-aɣen.
Ddeqs n temɣarin i d-irezzun s axxam n At Uwrir ad xeḍbent Ṭawes acku ta twala-tt deg tala tayeḍ deg tmeɣra.
Ḥsant merra s thuski n teqcict d sser i as-yessureg Uxellaq ur icuḥḥ.
ɣef waya i d-ttemseḍfarent ta deffir tayeḍ s axxam n At Uwrir, s uɛenni ɣer Ugellid Ameqqran ad tent-id-tṣaḥ.
Maca d yiwet n temɣart kan iwimi d-yesla Rebbi.
Ɣur-s mmi-s amenzu yuweḍ-d d argaz, tufa-as Ṭawes d tamwanest n tudert-is.
Tudert zeddigen, tin yettɛeddayen deg liser tettas-d seg tferkiwin ma ggtent yerna ma ttwaxedment.
At Lḥif xuṣṣen, ulac ɣur-sen aṭas n wakal, ɣef waya i yekker Muḥend ad yinig ɣer tmurt n Fransa.
Meqqar din ad yexdem, yugar umahil, yis-s yezmer ad d-yerfed cwiṭ tawacult-is i d-iɛelqen kan ɣer yiri-s.
Akka i d tamurt n Leqbayel, tuget n yilmeẓyen-is tečča-ten tmurt n Fransa.
Ala imɣaren d tlawin i iɛemren tudrin.
Imiren, aseggas send (16) ṭṭrad n tsellullit (17) n Lezzayer, yeshel yinig ɣer Fransa, ala s tkerḍa n tmagit (18) i ikeččmen s akal-is acku Izzayriyen ttunaḥsaben deg tallit-nni meḥsub d Ifransisen.
Imiren, aseggas send ṭṭrad n tsellullit n Lezzayer, yeshel yinig ɣer Fransa, ala s tkarḍa n tmagit i ikeččmen s akal-is acku Izzayriyen ttunaḥsaben deg tallit-nni meḥsub d Ifransisen.
Ihi ad truḥeḍ ad iyi-teǧǧeḍ iman-iw. I tenna Ṭawes i urgaz-is
Ur uksaneɣ ara ula d nekk, lufan i d-teggra deg ufus-iw, talfi ur ttɛeddayeɣ ara i umnar n tewwurt n ufrag-nneɣ, maca akka i d ddunit ssusef s igenni ad d-uɣalent ɣer wudem-ik, i s-yerra Muḥend.
Ttḥadar ɣef yiman-ik, qqaren-d yuɛer usemmiḍ n Fransa.
Kkes aɣilif, ussan imezwura ad rreɣ ɣer xali Ɛmer, d netta ara iyi-d-inadin tamezduɣt d lxedma.
Ma d dagi kečč diɣen kkes aɣilif, ad beddeɣ akken i ilaq ɣer yimawlan-ik.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara ten-ixaṣṣen.
Fkiɣ-ak lemɛahda n Rebbi d ayen i ak-d-nniɣ ara yeḍrun.
Ḥader cwiṭ iman-im tḥadreḍ wagi, netta yessers afus-is ayeffus ɣef uɛebbuḍ icuffen n Ṭawes-akken qqarent tlawin aɛebbuḍ-is icekkeḍ.
D wagi i d ayyur-is.
Akka i as-yura i Muḥend deg twenza-s, ad yinig ur iḥeṭṭer i tlalit n mmi-s neɣ yelli-s.
Mi yuweḍ ɣer Fransa yeqqim yesteɛfa sin wussan simira ad innam cwiṭ tamdint n Paris.
Ur yekki ara aṭas yufa-as xali-s Ɛmer ixeddim.
Muḥend d axeddam seg zik-is, ur d-immuger ara kra n wugur ameqqran deg tudert-is tamaynut.
Zrin kra n wussan, ur uwiḍen ara ahat sin n yimalasen almi i d-yeṭṭef tabrat tamezwarut, tusa-d seg tmurt, d baba-s i as-tt-id-yuznen.
Akka i as-d-yenna Mesɛud mmi-s n xali-s Ɛmer mi i as-tt-id-yeɣra.
Mesɛud yessen tafransist ma d netta kra n yisekkilen kan iwimi yecfa.
Yenna-as : “Mebruk ay ayaw ! Yerna uqcic ɣur-k, semman-as Akli, rran-d isem n jeddi-k, yemma-s Ṭawes ur tt-yuɣ ara, tekker ɣef yiman-is”.
Kra tekka tɣuri-nni n tebrat, Muḥend ayen iḥulfa wul-is ur yeffir ara, yettban-d ɣef wudem-is i yellan ussan-agi ineggura yekres.
Ma d tura d talwit d tnufli i t-izedɣen, acmumeḥ ɣef yimi-s yezga ur yeṭṭixir.
Imi deg lqahwa i ten-yuɣ lḥal, ixelles tissit i merra imeddukal n mmi-s n xali-s Ɛmer.
Mi i d-yuɣal ɣer texxamt-is, yessers iman-is ɣef srir, yuɣal lferḥ-nni yekkan tudert n yifeṭṭiwej yeffeɣ udem-is, yeǧǧa-d amkan-is i cwiṭ n leḥzen.
Yeṭṭef aqerruy-is gar yifassen-is yettxemmim.
Yeqqar deg wul-is : Amek a ɛaǧaba a Rebbi, mmi amenzu ur t-walaɣ amek i iga, ur t-sudneɣ ur as-slifeɣ.
Yeqqim akken ddeqs yuwi-t uxemmem almi yettu ula d aheggi n yimensi-s.
Ṭawes, tayemmat n Wakli, ula d nettat yenṭeḍ ufus-is ɣef uɣesmar-is.
Tettxemmim ɣef urgaz-is i yettidiren akkin i lebḥur.
Akka i ilaq ad ddunt temsal maca Ṭawes teqqim ala sin n yimalasen deg wussu, tufa cwiṭ iman-is cwi tekker ɣer leqdic-is.
D nettat i d aqerruy n uxxam yerna ur tezmir ara ad tettu, tefka lemɛahda n Rebbi i urgaz-is ur tettaǧǧa ara imawlan-is ad yeḍru yid-sen wayen n diri.
D imdanen iwessuren, ur zmiren ara i yiman-nsen, d nettat i ittadden ɣur-sen, amzun tettrebbi tlata: mmi-s Akli d sin yimɣaren-is.
Nna Mennun, ala ddeɛwat n lxir i tettak i teslit-is Ṭawes.
Amɣar-is diɣen kif kif : Ad yeg Rebbi ussan-im d imellalen, sansa i tekkiḍ d tafat.
Akka i as-yeqqar ɣer wudem-is tal tikkelt ara as-d-teqdec neɣ ad d-telhu yid-s.
Ṭawes txeddem am taklit.
Mi ara tfakk lecɣal n lexla, d anqac deg tebḥirt n tmazirt, d alway n yiniɣman neɣ d amahil n tegnit, ad d-tuɣal imiren ɣer wid n uxxam ur nettfakka ara akk.
Kra n leqdic yellan d afus-is i t-iteggen yerna tettrebbi.
Tikwal, mmi-s Akli isuffuɣ-as laɛqel mi ara t-yeṭṭef uḥrun n yimeṭṭawen nettat tettfaras lecɣal-is ad ten-tessali.
Maca lṭufan yelluẓ yugi ad yessusem.
Ad teǧǧ akken leqdic-is d azgen ad t-id-terfed seg dduḥ ad as-teslef i tqerruyt-is s ufus yeččuren d tayri, netta ticenfirin-is ad ttnadint anda ara d-mmagrent iff n tebbuct n yemma-s.
Ad yeṭṭeḍ s sqaḍa alamma yerwa.
Yemma-s ad as-tcennu ad t-zzuzun alma yuɣal ɣer yiḍes, ma d nettat ad tebren ɣer lxedma-s ur nesɛi taggara.
Muḥend iḥemmel xali-s Ɛmer nezzeh, yeṭṭafar iwellihen-is akken i ilaq.
Mi i t-iwala yeṭṭef ixeddim-is yerna yezdeɣ, iweddeɛ-it ɣer kra n yimeddukal-is ad iɣer yid-sen deg uɣerbaz n yiḍ.
Inelmaden-a n yiḍ mi ara d-ffɣen seg uɣerbaz ttarran ɣer yiwet n lqahwa anda i tessen leḥwayeǧ u ttmeslayen ɣef wamayendin n temsal.
Asentel yeddmen amur ameqqran n uskasi-nsen d tasertit yerzan tamurt-nsen Zzayer i yettidiren ddaw n uzaglu amhersan afransis.
Ṭṭafaren isalan s wallalen n rradyu d tliẓri, maca wid i d-yessawaḍen ayen yeḍran s tidet seg tmurt-nsen Zzayer d atmaten-nsen iɣensen deg ukabar FLN.
Muḥend, mačči d timsirin kan n tutlayt tafransist i ilemmed, irennu tid n umeɣnas i yekkaten akken tamurt-is Zzayer ad tawi tlilelli-is am Lmaruk d Tunes.
Muḥend fessus uqerruy-is, ur yeqqim ara aṭas yuɣal yeqqar iɣmisen, yettmeslay d yimeddukal-is n lxedma Ifransisen war akukru, tibratin yettazen ɣer tmurt d netta i tent-yettarun mačči d Mesɛud mmi-s n xali-s Ɛmer.
Dɣa deg-sent yettarra ayen i as-yehwan ama d lbaḍna neɣ d ayen-nniḍen.

Ur d-ireffed ara aqerruy-is sdat-sen.
Ur d-treffed ara aqerruy-is sdat-sen.
Ur d-reffden ara iqerray-nsen sdat-sen.
Ur d-reffdent ara iqerray-nsent sdat-sen.
Ur d-reffdent ara iqerray-nsent sdat-sent.

Yeg Rebbi aseggas amaynut ara d-ikecmen d win ara d-yeglun i kečč d twacult-ik ayen akk i tebɣam.
D aseggas ara d-yeglun s wayen nessaram.
D aseggas ara d-yeglun s wayen akk nebɣa.
D aseggas ara d-yeglun s wayen i nettraju.
D aseggas ara d-yeglun s wayen yelhan.
D aseggas ara d-yeglun s waṭas n tayri.
D aseggas ara d-yeglun ala s tẓidanin.
I nessaram d aseggas yelhan.
I nessaram d aseggas igerrzen.
Yeg Rebbi ad d-yeglu useggas amaynut s waṭas n telwit i tmurt-nneɣ.
Aseggas-nwen(t) merra d ameggaz, d win ara wen(t)-d-yeglun ala s wayen tebɣam(t) ladɣa ayen yerzan teɣzi n tudert, talwit, tayri d tezmert.
Yeffeɣ uqbur, ikcem-d umaynut.
Ikcem-d umaynut mi yeffeɣ uqbur.
Ittaḍsa ɣef zzman amcum, ireggem s yiqenṭaren.
Awi-d kan ad yaf aɣrum, i warraw-is ad ččen.
Yid-s, lḥif yezga d amwanes.
Yezga lḥif yid-s d amwanes.
Seg wasmi i d-yekker d netta d lḥif.
D axeddam maca ur yekfi ara iman-is.
S tebɣest d nnif i yettqabal yir ussan.
Yir ussan zgan ɣef yiri-s.
Yexdem ccɣel-is, yewwet iɛedda.
Yenna-as tɛeddaḍ ur k-nerwi.
Tewwteḍ kan tɛeddaḍ.
Wissen d acu ara aɣ-d-yawi umaynut ?
Wissen d acu ara aɣ-d-yawi win yeṭṭfen amkan-ik ?

Wissen d acu ara aɣ-d-yawi win yeṭṭfen amḍiq-ik ?
Ddu-aɣ deg lebɣi leɛnaya-k.
If win yezrin, deg leɛnaya-k.
Yezri, yeǧǧa-d deg-neɣ ccama-s.

S asekraf gren-t war tamentilt.

Cah ! Iɛǧeb-iyi !
Bɣu,neɣ awer tebɣuḍ !
Yennayer ameggaz i ddunit akken ma tella.
Azul i Djamal yuklalen mačči yiwet kan n tejmilt.
D yiwen n unaẓur i d-yefkan aṭas i tmaziɣt.
Yuɣ-itent ula deg tezmert-is.
I as-nessaram d tujjya iɛejlen.
Ad d-yaweḍ umenzu n yennayer ad as-neg asfugel.
Ad d-yaweḍ umenzu n yennayer ad as-neg tameɣra.
Seksu d uksum n uyaziḍ, d wa i d imensi n yennayer.
Yennayer d inebgi n tazwara n useggas.
Imaziɣen n ddunit merra sfugulen amenzu n yennayer.
Aseggas-im d win twacult-im d ameggaz, d win ara wen-d-yeglun ala s wayen teb^qam ladɣa tazmert, talwit, tumert, teɣzi n tudert d tumert.
Aseggas-ik d win twacult-ik d ameggaz, d win ara wen-d-yeglun ala s wayen tebɣam ladɣa tazmert, talwit, tumert, teɣzi n tudert d tumert.
Melliḥet s tidet s tqendurt-nni n leqbayel yernan fell-am.
Ad yeg Rebbi tissulya-m d timerbuḥin, d tid ara yeqqimen i lebda.
Yeffeɣ-d ad iwali tafat.
Teffeɣ-d ad twali tafat.
Neffeɣ-d ad nwali tafat.
Teffɣeḍ-d ad twaliḍ tafat.
Teffɣem-d ad twalim tafat.
Teffɣemt-d ad twalimt tafat.
Ffɣen-d ad walin tafat.
Ffɣent-d ad walint tafat.
Ffɣeɣ-d ad waliɣ tafat.
D tafat i bɣiɣ ad waliɣ.
D tafat i nebɣa ad nwali.
D tafat i bɣan ad walin.
D tafat i bɣant ad walint.
Sɛeddan azgen n useggas deg usekraf.
Sɛeddant azgen n useggas deg usekraf.
Yesɛedda azgen n useggas deg usekraf.
Tesɛedda azgen n useggas deg usekraf.

Yeqqar deg uɣerbaz alemmas war isem i d-izgan tama n ugafa n temdint n Tzerrajt.
Taselmadt n tutlayt tafransist, Tamsiwt Tameqqrant, akka i d isem-is, tefka-d i yinelmaden-is aɣan ara d-heggin deg uxxam.
Amahil-a d asluɣmu i ukayad n taggara n ulmud alemmas ara d-yilin deg wayyur n yunyu n useggas 1973.
Aɣan-a ara d-xedmen Caɛban d yimeddukal-is d tira n yiwen n uḍris s tutlayt tafransist, asentel i sen-d-tefren Temsiwt tameqqrant d wa : «Yal yiwen deg-wen wissen amek i d-isɛedda temẓi-s, ḥkut-d… ».
Caɛban d anelmad iẓẓewren, d win ur nettkukru ara ixeddim.
Laɛmer yeɣfil neɣ iɛedda fell-as uzaylal.
Dɣa ma neṭall ɣer uswir-is aɣurbiz, nezmer ad t-nessers deg terbaɛt n yimezwura n usmil.
Mi yettaru asentel-nni ɣef uzmam-is yemmekta-d yiwen n usentel-nniḍen, d tira n uḍris deg ukayad n ulmud alemmas yezrin i d-yeqqaren akka : « D acu-tt ɣur-wen tebɣest ? Arut-d ɣef waya… ».
Yiwen n umenkad yura yiwet n tefyirt ɣef usebter n tferkit n ukayad, yerra-as-tt i umaggal yeffeɣ.
Tafyirt yura unelmad-nni ur teqqim ara d axemmem kan, maca tɛedda ɣer tigawt imi teqqar : « Tabɣest ɣur-i d tiririt n yisbetren n tferkit-a n ukayad d imellalen ».
Caɛban mačči d timellalin ara yerr tiferka n waɣan-is i tselmadt-is n tefransist maca yeḥṣa akken i iwata d acu ara yexdem.
Dɣa ur yerni ara aṭas n wakud, yebda yettaru aḍris-is.
Tikta ččurent-d aqerruy-is, d agruffeɛ i d-ttegruffuɛent am wasif i d-iḥemlen deg tsemhuyt n tegrest netta yettseggim-itent, yessrusu-tent s shala, ta deffir tayeḍ akken i d-myezwarent, ɣef lkaɣeḍ-is amellal.
Teḍra yid-s am win yeffuden yeswa yerna ɣef yiwen n ujeqqim.
Yiwen n ugur amecṭuḥ ur t-id-immuger segmi yebda almi i ifukk.

Ur tt-id-tufimt almi i terẓamt aqerruy-nkent.

Yufa-t-id yennayer ihegga iman-is ad t-immager.

Yufa-kent-id yennayer theggamt iman-nwent ad t-tmmagremt.

Ɛerri lǧamaɛ, del taqerrabt.
Refdeɣ-t yijjaq, sserseɣ-t yijjaq. Amek ara as-xedmeɣ ay axellaq ?
Ikka-d umcic seg tewwurt, ittberriq deg waṭṭucen-is.
Anida i tettedduɣ a baba amɣar ? Yenna-iyi-d ɣer lɛin n teqerruyt-iw.
Ur ḥmmileɣ gma, ur ḥmmlieɣ wi ara t-yewwten.
Wi ur nuriw yugad nnger, win yurwen yeṛwa amdegger.
Temlal tasa d wi ay turew.
D lqella n yirgazen i yerran Faḍma d-argaz.
Menyif tidet yesseqraḥen, wala lekdeb yessefraḥen.
Adfel yekkat deg udrar, ssem-is deg uzaɣar.
A bu snat, yiwet ad ak-truḥ.
Akerfa, yella deg tal tirect.
Sɛiɣ jeddi, maɛna yemmut.
Issers umzil afḍis, irfed-it mmi-s.
Teǧǧa-d argaz-is yemmut, truḥ ad tɛezzi tayeḍ.
Bɣiɣ ad k-steqsiɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad kem-steqsiɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad ken-steqsiɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad kent-steqsiɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad ten-steqsiɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad tent-steqsiɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad t-steqsiɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad tt-steqsiɣ.
Yebɣa ad iyi-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad aɣ-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad k-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad kem-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad ken-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad kent-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad t-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad tt-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad ten-isteqsi.
Yebɣa ad tent-isteqsi.
Yettnadi ad yefhem.
Tettnadi ad tefhem.
Nettnadi ad nefhem.
Ttnadiɣ ad fehmeɣ.
Tettnadim ad tfehmem.
Tettnadimt ad tfehmemt.
Ttnadin ad fehmen.
Ttnadint ad fehment.
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ.
Nekk i d argaz n uzekka.
Timetti akken ma tella tettkel fell-i.
Sɛiɣ azref ara iyi-d-yefken akk izerfan-iw.
Izerfan-iw, bɣiɣ-ten tura.
Tura i bɣiɣ izerfan-iw.
Ax tibbucin slef-asent, ticenfirin ssuden-itent, nnig waya ad d-yeɣli yiḍ.
Ma yella tebder-d awal “iḍ” deg tseddart n usefru-a, ur d-teqsid ara iḍ i d-iteddun maca iḍ-nni amezwaru mi ara d-teddu d tislit s axxam n win ara yuɣalen d argaz-is.
Qqimen akken ddeqs, yal imi amzun yelseq deg wayeḍ.
Ticenfirin ssudunent taqemmuct n Ddayxa iwimi yessuhel leɛqel, ifassen n wakli slafayen i tebbucin yettnadin ad ǧǧent llal-nsent seg wakken i d-beddent.
Rnan ddeqs akken, uɣalen msebran-d yal yiwen seg wayeḍ amzun amrar-nni n tayri i ten-yurzen d ssnasel n wuzzal.
Msewɛaden ad d-bernen ɣer temrijt-nsen n tayri deg wussan i d-iteddun.
Msewɛaden ad d-bernen ɣer temrijt-nsen deg wussan i d-iteddun.
Yuɣ lḥal, akka i as-yenna wuccen : “I mecṭuḥeḍ a ddunit i meqqreḍ ay aqerruy-iw”, ulac tin ad d-yeɣlin d tislit-iw ala ddayxa n At Wulmu.
Anzi-a yuɣ-d aẓar seg yiwet n temɛayt i d-qqaren yimɣaren.
Deg uɛerqub-nsen yella yiwen n umeksa yeksa kra n wulli d yizamaren.
Yeqqim isenned ɣer lǧedra n yiwet n tzemmurt yetturar, ireǧǧem yiwet n tmadaɣt yellan sdat-s s yiẓra yemmden.
Lexber kan iǧelleb-d yiwen wuccen seg tmadaɣt-nni, irewwel yeskiɣwiw.
D yiwen udɣaɣ i t-imeknen deg tlemmast n uqerruy-is.
Uccen n twaɣit d agaber i d-iguber ad as-yečč yiwen n yizimer.
Mi yuweḍ ɣer tiɣilt, yeḥbes yenna-as : “I mecṭuḥeḍ a ddunit, i meqqreḍ ay aqerruy-iw. Yuqa anda ara d-teɣli teblaḍt i d-idegger umeksa almi d-tres ɣef uqerruy-iw”.
Ruḥ tura sgunfu, azekka ad yexdem Rebbi ttawil.

D acu i txeddem deg tudert-is ?

D acu i ixeddem deg tudert-ines ?
D acu i txeddmeḍ deg tudert-inek ?
D acu i txeddmeḍ deg tudert-inem ?
Kker ɣef yiman-ik.
Kker ɣef yiman-im.
Kkret ɣef yiman-nwen.
Kkremt ɣef yiman-nwent.
Kkremt ɣef yiman-nkent.
Kkrem ɣef yiman-nwen.

Tugi ad as-terr s wawal.

Tugiḍ ad as-terreḍ s wawal.
Tugim ad as-terrem s wawal.
Tugimt ad as-terremt s wawal.
Ayɣer i yugi ad as-yerr s wawal ?
Ayɣer i tugi ad as-terr s wawal ?
Ayɣer i nugi ad as-nerr s wawal ?
Ayɣer i ugiɣ ad as-rreɣ s wawal ?
Ayɣer i ugin ad as-rren s wawal ?
Ayɣer i ugint ad as-rrent s wawal ?
Ayɣer i tugiḍ ad as-terreḍ s wawal ?
Ayɣer i tugim ad as-terrem s wawal ?
Ayɣer i tugimt ad as-terremt s wawal ?
Wissen amek ?
Ahat akken.
Anda i ẓriɣ nekk ?
Ḥader ad d-ternuḍ awal !

Ɛeddimt deg ubrid-nwent !
Ɛeddit deg ubrid-nwen !

Nleqqeḍ azemmur.
Ncerrew azemmur mi ara yarew.
Nzewwi azemmur s ucacfal.

Ttnudumeɣ, bɣiɣ ad ṭṭseɣ.

Akli ɣer yemma-s, yif win i t-ittayalen.
Akli ɣer yemma-s, yif bab-is.
Akli ɣer yemma-s, yif akerwa-s.
Akli, yif bab-is ɣer yemma-s.
Akli, yif akerwa-s ɣer yemma-s.
Akli, yif win i t-yettayalen ɣer yemma-s.
Akli, terwel fell-as tlelli.
Ur yettayal-ara deg yiman-is wakli.
Terra-t tmara ad yaɣ awal.
Terra-t tmara ad yettaɣ awal.
Terra-t tmara ad yeɛfes ɣef wul-is.
Akli meskin, yettuɣaḍ.
Akli, yettnekkar-d d amezwaru, yeggan d aneggaru.
Akka i d tudert n wakli.
Aklan, ssnuzun-ten.
Ḥesben aklan am yiɣersiwen.
Tikwal iɣersiwen ifen akklan.
Rebbi yefka-t-id d ilelli, amdan yerra-t d akli.
Yerwa tiɣrit wakli.
Win iɛeddan yekkat akli.
Akli yerwa tiyitiwin.
Sserwan-as tiyitiwin i wakli.
Sserwan-as tiɣrit i wakli.
Tidet ur tesɛi asget.
Tidet ulac ɣur-s asget.
Tidet ur tesɛi talɣa n usget.
Tidet ulac ɣur-s talɣa n usget.
Ttif tidet isseqraḥen wala lekteb issefraḥen.
Tidet ma tella, lekteb ur d-ittban ara akk.
Ulac lekteb ma tella tidet.
Tidet ma tella, lekteb ulac.
Tidet ma tella, lekteb ulac-it.
Tamurt yebnan ɣef tidet, tettaf iman-is.
Tettaf iman-is tmurt yebnan ɣef tidet.
Win yeskiddiben yegall neɣ yeqqim, yiwen ur t-yettamen.
Bu tidet yettsewwiq.
Bu tidet yettɛedday wawal-is.
Tidet, tessimɣur ccan n bab-is.
Tidet, tessimɣur ccan n win i tt-yennan.
Tidet, tessimɣur azal n bab-is.
Tidet, tessimɣur azal n win i tt-yennan.
Ini tidet, ad iɛeddi wawal-ik.
Ini tidet, ad iɛeddi wawal-im.
Yeqqar tidet, yettɛedday wawal-is.
Teqqar tidet, yettɛedday wawal-is.
Neqqar tidet, yettɛedday wawal-nneɣ.
Teqqareḍ tidet, yettɛedday wawal-ik.
Teqqareḍ tidet, yettɛedday wawal-im.
Teqqarem tidet, yettɛedday wawal-nwen.
Teqqaremt tidet, yettɛedday wawal-nwent.
Teqqaremt tidet, yettɛedday wawal-nkent.
Qqaren tidet, yettɛedday wawal-nsen.
Qqarent tidet, yettɛedday wawal-nsent.
Yeddem aqrab-is, iruḥ s aɣerbaz.
Teddem aqrab-is, truḥ s aɣerbaz.
Neddem iqraben-nneɣ, nruḥ s aɣerbaz.
Teddmeḍ aqrab-ik, truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz.
Teddmeḍ aqrab-im, truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz.
Teddmem iqraben-nwen, truḥem s aɣerbaz.
Teddmemt iqraben-nwent, truḥemt s aɣerbaz.
Teddmemt iqraben-nkent, truḥemt s aɣerbaz.
Ddment iqraben-nsent, ruḥent s aɣerbaz.
Ddmen iqraben-nsen, ruḥen s aɣerbaz.
Ddmeɣ aqrab-iw, ruḥeɣ s aɣerbaz.
Friɣ-tt d yiman-iw.
Tefriḍ-tt d yiman-ik.
Tefriḍ-tt d yiman-im.
Nefra-tt d yiman-nneɣ.
Tefram-tt d yiman-nwen.
Teframt-tt d yiman-nwent.
Teframt-tt d yiman-nkent.
Ffrant-tt d yiman-nsent.
Ffran-tt d yiman-nsen.
D yiman-iw i tt-friɣ.
D yiman-nneɣ i tt-nefra.
D yiman-ik i tt-tefriḍ.
D yiman-im i tt-tefriḍ.
D yiman-is i tt-yefra.
D yiman-is i tt-tefra.
D yiman-nwen i tt-tefram.
D yiman-nwent i tt-teframt.
D yiman-nkent i tt-teframt.
D yiman-nsent i tt-frant.
D yiman-nsen i tt-fran.
Yak nniɣ-awen !
Yak nniɣ-awent !
Yak nniɣ-akent !
Akka i asen-nniɣ.
Akka i asent-nniɣ.
Akka i as-nniɣ.
Akka i awen-nniɣ.
Akka i awent-nniɣ.
Terra-k tmara ad as-tedduḍ deg lebɣi.
Terra-kem tmara ad as-tedduḍ deg lebɣi.
Terra-ken tmara ad as-teddum deg lebɣi.
Terra-kent tmara ad as-teddumt deg lebɣi.
Anda i walaɣ nekkini ?
Qqareɣ-ak macči akken.
Qqareɣ-am macči akken.
Qqareɣ-awen macči akken.
Qqareɣ-akent macči akken.
Qqareɣ-awent macči akken.
Qqareɣ-asen macči akken.
Qqareɣ-asent macči akken.
Bibb !
Ibubb ayen iwimi ur yezmir.
Tbubb ayen iwimi ur tezmir.
Nbubb ayen iwimi ur nezmir.
Tbubbeḍ ayen iwimi ur tezmireḍ.
Tbubbem ayen iwimi ur tezmirem.
Tbubbemt ayen iwimi ur tezmiremt.
Bubben ayen iwimi ur zmiren.
Bubbent ayen iwimi ur zmirent.
Bibb-iyi ad k-bibbeɣ.
Ur yezmir ad ibibb kra.
Ur tezmir ad tbibb kra.
Tbubb mmi-s ɣef uɛrur-is.
Ɣef uɛrur-is i tbubb mmi-s.
Ɣef uɛrur-is i tbubb yelli-s.
Tbubb yelli-s ɣef uɛrur-is.
Jeddi ibubb jida, jida tbubb tiqcicin.
Tettbabbay ayen i as-tɛebbaḍ.
Yettbabbay ayen i as-tɛebbaḍ.
Nezga nettɛebbi urfan.
Zgiɣ ttɛebbiɣ urfan.
Zgan ttɛebbin urfan.
Zgan ttɛebbint urfan.
Tezgiḍ tettɛebbiḍ urfan.
Tezgam tettɛebbim urfan.
Tezgamt tettɛebbimt urfan.
Ur tufiḍ anwa ara k-ibibben.
Ur tufiḍ anwa ara kem-ibibben.
Bubben, ssusmen.
Bubbent, ssusment.
Taɛkemt i bubbeɣ ẓẓayet.
Taɛkemt i bubben ẓẓayet.
Taɛkemt i bubbent ẓẓayet.
Taɛkemt i tbubbeḍ ẓẓayet.
Taɛkemt i tbubbem ẓẓayet.
Taɛkemt i tbubbemt ẓẓayet
Taɛkemt i tbubbem d taẓayant.
Taɛkemt i tbubbemt d taẓayant.
Taɛkemt i tbubbeḍ d taẓayant.
Taɛkemt i bubben d taẓayant.
Taɛkemt i bubbent d taẓayant.
Axxam yeččur d isɣaren, ulac s wacu ara nehren izgaren.
Yettseffir uxxam.
Yessafay udfel.
Tessafay iẓid.
Tessafay timẓin.
Tessafay irden.
Sɛeddan-t seg yixef n tsegnit.
Seg yixef n tsegnit i t-sɛeddan.
Seg yixef n tsegnit i tt-sɛeddan.
Sɛeddan-tt seg yixef n tsegnit.
Sɛeddan-ten seg yixef n tsegnit.
Sɛeddan-tent seg yixef n tsegnit.
Amedyaz urǧin yemmut.
Nɣan amedyaz.
Amrig n umedyaz d awal.
Amrig n umedyaz d asefru.
Awalen n umedyaz ttḍurrun.

Yugi lbaṭel, ad t-iɛebbi.
Yugi ad as-selsen agennur.

D Tamaziɣt kan i bɣiɣ, tayeḍ urd iyi-d-tecqi.

Ur yenwi ad d-yemneɛ.

Anda i tseggem, teqɛed ur tmal, ad d-yennulfu kan wawal ad t-gren deg usegzawal.
Awal-a "tittin" mačči n taddart-iw kan, maca n leɛruc : At Mlikec, At Ɛebbas, At Ɛidel, At Waɣlis...
D imelyunen n yimdanen i t-isemrasen.
Nekk ussan-a i d-suffɣen ungal "Ccḍeb akked yiẓuran", acḥal d abrid i sxedmeɣ awal-a "tittin".
Asegzawal-ik imi i t-yettu terra-t tmara ad t-yernu d aknaw n "tatut" am kra n wawalen yettbeddilen seg temnaḍt ɣer tayeḍ : tiẓurin = aḍil; azɣal = aɣamac atg...
Tutlayt-nneɣ d tamesbhaɣurt, ɣef wayen akka i ttwaliɣ tettnadim ad tuɣal d taẓawalit.
JMDalet Yebna asegzawal-is s tmeslayt n At Megellat iqerben aṭas tin n At Mlikec, nutni qqaren "tuttin" nekkni "tittin".
Rzut ɣer usegzawal n JMDalet, asebter wis 818, ad tafem yerna-d aknaw wis kraḍ : "timettawt".
Akken qqaren : "Rwu berkukes ay amcic"...

Ad msefhameɣ yid-sen.
Nniɣ-as ma yella ad iyi-d-ternuḍ azal n 50 n yidlisen "Ccḍeb akked yiẓuran" akken ad kkiɣ yis-sen deg rreḥba n yidlisen ara d-yilin ussan 20, 21 22 deg furar deg Uqbu.
Ussan 21 d 22 n furar, Tiddukla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu ad d-tesuddes yiwet n rreḥba n udlis.
Anda ddant temsal ɣef ungal-nni ?
Tenniḍ-d ddurt tamezwarut n dujember ad d-yeffeɣ, a-t-an alaḥal ad ifakk useggas.
Amenzu n yennayer yuweḍ-d, d ass n ungal amaziɣ, adlis urɛad d-yeffiɣ.
Tanicca d yiwen n tewsit n udɣaɣ ( le silex).
Isem-is deg leɛnya-k uselmad-nni n tesdawit n Tubiret i d-yeqqimen yid-neɣ ass-nni, d Aqerbuzi.
D Mhenni xalifa i igan yiwet n tdiwennit.
Wali tasɣunt-a, yella yiwen n uḍris ɣef tegrawla 54.

Ilmend n wass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut 8 deg meɣres, ssrameɣ i tlawin anda bɣunt ilint, ladɣa deg tmura n Tmazɣa, kra n wayenn ara yesǧǧuǧǧgen ussan-nsent.
Ad ssutreɣ deg-sent ad ḥerzent tutlayt-nsent imi tameslayt tamezwarut n umdan ɣur-sent i as-fkan isem “tutlayt n tyemmat”.
Ad asent-hduɣ asefru-a i uriɣ ɣef yiwet n tmeṭṭut tasebrit yessagren tissas. Tagi d Ḥnifa.

D ssebba ad t-yečč.

Mi tt-iwala , yečča yeswa.

Ali fell-asen alamma d taqacuct, tekkseḍ-d agazu.

Cwiṭ kan, tuɣal-d teqcict akken tella.

Maca , uɣal-d ɣer tilawt, d tidet ahat tella twaɣit ideg yella leṣlaḥ.

Tanemmirt ay Aksil mi d-terziḍ s ablug.

Yelha diɣen ma tmmeslayeḍ fell-as i wid d tid tessneḍ.
Ur tezmireḍ ara ad tɣelṭeḍ, tebbet iman-ik mliḥ.
A-t-an nekk d ultma ara neṭṭes deg yiwen wussu.

D tin i aɣ-yessemgarrden.
Mi d-kkreɣ ad nerwel.
Ma nettwaṭṭef, ad nemmečč.
Ma nettwaṭṭef, ad nemmečč. Baba d yemma kwan fell-aneɣ.
Kra tesxerxur twacult n waɣzen, aqcic yegguni lawan iɣef yettuweṣṣa, kra d tigdi, kra d asirem n trewla.
Izeggen kan yiḍ, ṭṭlam yesbur axxam, yekker uqcic yexdem akken i as-tenna tmeddakelt-is.
Tuki-d kan tsendeh-it : “Azzel ɣer uddaynin tebruḍ-d i ugmer bu yiḍarren imezwura d lebraq, ineggura d aḍu”.
Yexdem akken, rekben fell-as, rewlen akken i tillas.
Lawan ideg ilaq ad ttwaččen yilmeẓyen-nni, yendekwal-d waɣzen.
Yessefqed ɣer wussu n yelli-s, ur tt-yufi ara.
Yedla ɣer umkan n uqcic, yufa ala Rebbi d tegnit.
Iwwet deg yifassen-is seg ddemmar, yessuɣ s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is : “Tɣurr-aɣ yelli-m a tameṭṭut !”
Yebra s tɣawla i uɛudiw , yenna “ha!” deffir-sen.
Ar tafrara, fkan yimerwula tamuɣli ɣer deffir, walan waɣzen qrib ad ten-yaweḍ, yerna teɛqel teqcict zzayla i d-yerkeb : d arurad-nni.
Tenṭeq ɣer umddakel-is : “Ad k-yexdeɛ Rebbi, d bu yiḍarren imezwura d lebraq ineggura d aḍu i n-teğğiḍ.
Ihi, tura ad aɣ-d-yelḥeq baba, i tesḥassef.
Amek ihi ? I tt-yesteqsa s uḥeccir.
Wissen ma teqqim-d kra n lqedra, i as-terra war ma tekkes-as aɣilif.
Tɛezzem tikkelt, terra iman-is d tibḥirt, ameddakel-is d ajennan.
Yaweḍ-iten waɣzen, yesteqsa bab n tebḥirt-nni : - Ay amdan-agi, ur d-zgint ara wallen-ik ɣef yiwen urgaz d tmeṭṭut ɣef uɛudiw ?
Afeqqus yewwa ma d ddellaɛ mazal , i as-yerra ujennan.
Imiren yebren waɣzen s axxam, yules tadyant-is i tmeṭṭut-is.
Tinna tesfaq-it : “A nnegr-ik , d nutni.”
Tenna-as : “Ɣiwel, uɣal ɣur-sen.”
Waɣzen kan yeṭṭef abrid s axxam, nutni qqlen akken llan, kemmlen tarewla.
Cwiṭ kan almi a-t-aya waɣzen-nni deffir-sen.
Taqcict tuɣal d taqerrabt, aqcic d ccix-is.
Yesteqsa-t : - Ur twalaḍ ara ansa kkan yiwen umnay d tmeṭṭut-is ?
Lɛaser yudan, ṭṭhur mazal , i t-iğaweb ccix .
Am tikkelt tamezwarut, yebren syin waɣzen s axxam, ad yales i tmeṭṭut-is ayen yeẓra.
Tesla kan i wullis n lɣara-s, tenṭeq ɣur-s : “D nutni! Uraren yis-k.”
Abrid-a ad dduɣ yid-k.
Abrid-a ad dduɣ yid-m.
Abrid-a ad dduɣ yid-s.
Abrid-a ad dduɣ yid-wen.
Abrid-a ad dduɣ yid-went.
Abrid-a ad dduɣ yid-sen.
Abrid-a ad dduɣ yid-sent.
Abrid-a ad tedduḍ yid-sen.
Abrid-a ad tedduḍ yid-sent.
Abrid-a ad tedduḍ yid-s.
Abrid-a ad tedduḍ yid-i.
Abrid-a ad tedduḍ yid-neɣ.
Tamerwalt-nni, di tbaḍnit, tesla i lehdur n yimawlan-is.
Dɣa tenguga tasa-s.
Teẓra tikkelt-a mačči am tid yezrin.
Ur tezmir ara ad turar ɣef yemma-s.
Temmuqel aqcic-nni , tebɣa ad as-tmel i ten-yettajun, ččurent-d wallen-is d imeṭṭawen.
Maca, ur d-teqqim tuffra.
Maɛa, ur d-teqqim tuffra.
Maca, ur d-teggri tuffra.
Maɛa, ur d-teggri tuffra.
Tenṭeq ɣur-s : - Tura teggra-d sɣur-k ma yella wayen iwimi tzemreḍ.
Ttxil-m ula i iyi-d-ternuḍ, i as-yerra.
Yeqqel inuda ɣef tissas-is, ikemmel awal : Lemmer imawlan-im d imdanen am nekk, tili acemma ur kem-ittḥaz , imi d waɣzen d teryel, ini-yi-d kan d acu ara xedmeɣ, ad t-xedmeɣ.
Ur d-ssutur ara deg-i awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutur ara deg-neɣ awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutur ara deg-nteɣ awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutur ara deg-sen awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutur ara deg-sent awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutureɣ ara deg-sen awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutureɣ ara deg-sent awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutureɣ ara deg-k awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutureɣ ara deg-m awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutureɣ ara deg-wen awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutureɣ ara deg-went awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutureɣ ara deg-kent awezɣi.
Ur d-ssutureɣ ara deg-s awezɣi.
Tikkelt-a ad yaɛer lḥal i usenser.
Ad d-teddu yemma.
Ad as-d-naf tifrat i ugnu-a amaynut maca sel-d mliḥ.
Ad naf yiwet tala ɣer sdat, mi tt-nuweḍ ad nuɣal d imqerqar i sin.
Yemma ad aɣ-teɛqel.
Ad teɛreḍ ad d-tesserḍeb ul-iw s umeslay ẓiden d usmekti n wayen akk tɛetteb fell-i almi d-meqqreɣ.
Nekk, mi ara iyi-d-tettmeslay, ad iyi-d-yuɣal uyefki, dɣa ad d-ttifrireɣ.
Kečč ilaq ad iyi-tettarraḍ d agessar ar tleqqaɛt.
Ɣas ad d-tuɣal ar wawal n tasa d win ay turew, ar uḥellel d uɣiḍi, ar yal tamsalt izemren ad d-tesserḍeb ul-iw, ara d-yesselɣuɣin tasa-w i wakken ad d-ffɣeɣ seg waman, ad ɣliɣ deg yirebbi-ines ad iyi-tečč.
Kečč ur ilaq ara ad k-iḥaz wawal-is.
Ttarra-iyi ɣer tleqqaɛt n tala yal tikkelt ara iyi-d-twaliḍ ttifrireɣ-d.
Akken tebɣa i d-teḍra.
Tteryel ur tuwiḍ ara ɣer wayen tessarem.
Maca, akken ad teqqed tasa-s, tḍegger yiwet txatemt ɣer waman n taḍunt-nni, teɣli swaswa s aḍad n umqerqur-nni.
Terna terfed ifassen-is s igenni, tesfallet i yelli-s : “Ruḥ a yelli! Ad kem-yettu akka i iyi-tettuḍ.”
Waɣzen d temeṭṭut-is, s wulawen yeččuren d zɛaf d ddemmar, bernen s axxam, awal ur ten-id-yuli deg ubrid.
Igra-nni n taḍunt uɣalen-d d imdanen, ffɣen-d seg waman.
D acu kan, iḥuza-ten usfillet n twaɣzent : Myettun.
Yal yiwen yuɣ abrid-is iman-is.
Ageldun yuɣal s aɣrem n baba-s.
Yelli-s n waɣzen teqqel d tamentrut deg yiberdan, almi d asmi tufa yiwet n temɣart yettidiren ala iman-is rrif n taddart n ugellid, teqqim ɣur-s ad mwanasent, ad myerfadent.
Agellid iga tameɣra meqqret.
Yefreḥ s mmi-s i d-yuɣalen seg Udrar Aberkan, ur yemmečč ara.
Kra n win iruḥen ɣer din ur d-yebrin s axxam.
Amek ara yexdem, amek ur ixeddem, yegzem ad yezweğ i mmi-s.
Am leɛwayed, tislit ad tt-yextir yisli, ass n tmeɣra, gar teḥdayin n tgelda ara iḥedren.
Dɣa, yal tawacult yellan deg wakal-is yefka-as aɛejmi ad t-teɛlef.
D azger ara d-yifriren gar wiyiḍ, ɣer yixf useggas, ara yemmezlen i tmeɣra yerna ad yawi bab-is arraz ameqqran.
Taqcict-nni yettwattun tebɣa ad d-teṭṭef ula d nettat yiwen uɛejmi ad t-id-trebbi.
Tamɣart tugi-as : Lḥala-s rqiqet, tugad lɛar d ddnub ma yemmut-as deg laẓ segmi ur tli d acu ara as-tefk ad t-yečč.
Tinna tettru-as yal ass, teqqar-as : “ Ṭṭef-it-id kan, ayen-nniḍen d ccɣel-iw.”
Tamɣart tedda deg lebɣi i tnebgit-is.
Tuwi-d ula d nettat aɛejmi, tger-it s addaynin.
Tinebgit-nni yuɣ lḥal ayen i as-yehwan ad tɛezzem fell-as ad d-yers ɣur-s.
Yal tawsit n yimɣan yečča-tt uɛejmi-s.
Yeqqim yettnnerni gar yiḍ d wass.
Zerrin wagguren, tameɣra n ugeldun tettaẓ-d.
Tiqcicin merra n tgelda ttheggint iman-nsent i wass-nni; yal yiwet tesgamay asirem ad tt-yefren mmi-s n ugellid.
Almi mazal kra n wussan, ffɣen yiqeddacen n ugellid ad dlun ɣef yizgaren i ferqen ɣef yixxamen n taddart.
Yal wa amek i t-ufan : wa yekɛec banen-d yiberdiyen-is, wa yelluẓ, wa yerwa irebba tacriḥt…
Fernen yiwen uzger yeččuren tiṭ ad t-zlun.
Yiwen uqeddac yemmekta-d win akken i fkan i temɣart-nni tameɣbunt.
Qqimen la ttaḍsan wiyiḍ fell-as.
Wa yeqqar-as ahat yemmurḍes, wa yenna ahat ala acciwen i d-yeggran deg-s.
Xerṣum yal yiwen deg yiqeddacen-nni amek i d-yenṭeq s umeɛlek.
Nnan-as : “ Yak ur yelli i aɣ-iruḥen ma nerza ad d-nwali!”
Kkren ruḥen s axxam n temɣart-nni tigellilt.
A lhejna-k a rruḥ mi kecmen ufan-n azger urğin d-zgint wallen-nsen ɣef lemtel-is; annect ila-t.
Seg wakken yeččur, ur yezmir ara i yibeddi; yeggan kan.
Awal seg yimi s ameẓẓuɣ, taddart akk tenɣel s amkan ad twali leɛğeb-agi i d-trebba temɣart tameḥqurt.
D wa kan i d-iɛeddan deg uqerruy-iw
Uɣal cwiṭ ɣer yizmamen-im mi telliḍ d tanelmadt.
Ur teḥriceḍ ara.
Ahat tura tnedmeḍ.
Anda i tuffeg i tres.
Aql-aɣ nettraju.
Ahat yiwen n wass ad seggment tlufa.
Ur teḥricemt ara.
Ur tezmireḍ ara akk ad taruḍ Kra ?
Terra-k tmara ad teldiḍ amiḍan-nniḍen.
Yura-d adlis ɣef waya.
Nniɣ-am-d ur cfiɣ ara.
Nniɣ-ak-d ur cfiɣ ara.
Kra ɛerḍen ad t-sekren ur zmiren ara.
Ala tin t-iɛelfen iwumi yuɣ awal.
Tendeh fell-as, tenna-as :” Ay a mmi ay! Kker ay azger n yettu, ma ttuɣ-k Rebbi ad i-yettu .”
Yekker fell-as uzger, uwin-t ɣer uɣrem n ugellid.
Ufan-t d win kan i yessefken ad yemzel i tmeɣra n ugeldun.
Ayen akka akk yeḍran yuweḍ isli d baba-s.
Fkan “arraz n uzger yufraren” i temɣart d yelli-s, yerna necden-tent-id ɣer tmeɣra.
Iḍ n tmeɣra, tcebbeḥ teqcict, tezyen iman-is, tger snat tmellalin n tetbirt deg yiciwi-s, tuwi-tt temɣart ad nezhent urar.
Teqqim almi yeḥma ubendayer, tekker ad tecḍeḥ.
Tezzi abrid neɣ sin deg tqaɛet, tebra i tmellalin-nni ɣer tmurt, rrẓent.
Din din yeffeɣ-d deg-sent yitbir d tetbirt, uffgen, rsen ɣef yiwen ṣṣur, qqimen din.
Urar yeḥbes, allen merra zzint ɣur-sen.
Wehmen argaz tameṭṭut.
Cwiṭ kan slan i yiwen deg yigḍaḍ-nni (d titbirt) yeqqar i wayeḍ s taɣect tareqqaqt tɣeṭṭel-d targagayt : “ Tecfiḍ ay itbir tecfiḍ! Ayen akk i ak-xedmeɣ d lxir tettuḍ-t!“
Isli-nni yessuter deg medden tasusmi, yeqqim yesmuzgut i tetbirt-nni yezzin ɣer umdakel-is.
Teqqar-as : Tecfiḍ ay itbir ass-nni i ak-yefka baba agelzim n wuffal akken ad tgeḍ deg udrar abrid yebrez iseggem ?
Ass-nni d nekk i tufiḍ wanag i k-yečča.
Tecfiḍ ay itbir tecfiḍ ass-nni i ak-yenna baba ad terreḍ tiẓgi d lejnan, yerna tameddit n wass ad as-d-tekkseḍ tibexsisin neɣ ad k-yečč ?
Tecfiḍ, ass-nni diɣ d nekk i tufiḍ.
Tecfiḍ ɣef wass-nni i ak-yefka meyya yiwtal ad ten-tekseḍ, yečča-ak sin deg leqmar ?
Lemmer mačči d nekk tili yečča-k.
Fkiɣ-ak-d taseffart, tessegruriḍ-ten-id akk s ṣṣut-is.
Tecfiḍ ay itbir tecfiḍ ɣef wass-nni i iḥettem baba fell-ak ad as-d-tekkseḍ agazu n ttmer ɣef tqacuct n tezdayt yessudnen igenni ?
Mačči d iɣsan-iw i terriḍ d tikeddanin akken ad tawḍeḍ ixf n tezdayt ?
Yeɣli fell-as s wučči almi i tt-ifukk.
Teɣli fell-as s wučči almi i tt-tfukk.
Neɣli fell-as s wučči almi i tt-nfukk.
Ɣliɣ fell-as s wučči almi i tt-fukkeɣ.
Ɣlin fell-as s wučči almi i tt-fukken.
Ɣlint fell-as s wučči almi i tt-fukkent.
Teɣliḍ fell-as s wučči almi i tt-tfukkeḍ.
Teɣlim fell-as s wučči almi i tt-tfukkem.
Teɣlimm fell-as s wučči almi i tt-tfukkemt.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-ak.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-am.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-as.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-asen.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-asent.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-awen.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-awent.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-akent.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-i.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-aneɣ.
Ahat aka ara teffeɣ fell-anteɣ.
Ɛiwed i leḥsab-ik yexser.
Ɛiwed i leḥsab-im yexser.
Ɛiwdem i leḥsab-nwen yexser.
Ɛiwdemt i leḥsab-nwent yexser.
Ɛiwdemt i leḥsab-nkent yexser.
Ɛiwdet i leḥsab-nwen yexser.
Win ixedmen kra, ad t-yaf.
Tin ixedmen kra, ad t-taf.
Wid ixedmen kra, ad t-afen.
Tid ixedmen kra, ad t-afent.
Ayen yexdem yufa-t.
Ayen texdem tufa-t.
Ayen nexdem nufa-t.
Ayen xdmen ufan-t.
Ayen xdment ufant-t.
Ayen txdmeḍ tufiḍ-t.
Ayen txdmem tufam-t.
Ayen txdmemt tufamt-t.
Ayen xedmeɣ ufiɣ-t.
Leɛyaḍ yellan ɣef wuccen yuɣal ɣef umeksa.
Tecfiḍ ?
Ad waliɣ amek, maɛna tɛedda-d fell-i temsalt-a aṭas aya.
Yella d acu ara nelmeḍ ɣef yiɣersiwen.
Di trusi-k, tettuḍ-n iɣes n tefdent-iw tamecṭuḥt n uḍar azelmaḍ, tecfiḍ ?
Tecfiḍ ay itbir tecfiḍ asmi nerwel i baba d yemma yettnadin fell-aneɣ ad aɣ-ččen ?
Tecfiḍ mi k-weṣṣaɣ ɣef wayis bu yiḍarren imezwura d lebraq, ineggura d aḍu, tebriḍ-d i wayeḍ ?
Wissen ma tecfiḍ ?
Baba yezga deffir-neɣ, yal tikkelt yettlaḥaq-aɣ-d, tecfiḍ ?
Tecfiḍ ay itbir tecfiḍ mi uɣleɣ d tibḥirt, kečč d ajennan-is ?
Tenniḍ i baba, mi k-id-yesteqsa : Afeqqus yewwa, ddellaɛ mazal.
Tecfiḍ mi uɣaleɣ d taqerrabt, kečč d ṭṭaleb ?
Tenniḍ i baba mi k-id-yesteqsa : Lɛaṣer yudan ṭṭhur mazal
Tecfiḍ mi nuɣal i sin d imqerqar ?
Yemma tebɣa ad iyi-d-tsuffeɣ seg waman, kečč tettarraḍ-iyi ɣer tleqqaɛt, tecfiḍ ?
Tecfiḍ ay itbir tecfiḍ ? Ayen akk i ak-xedmeɣ tettuḍ-t. Tecfiḍ ay itbir, tecfiḍ…
Itbir yesmuzgut i tuzzmiwin n tetbirt, yessader i wallen-is.
Am wakken yeḥṣa yeḍlem-itt.
Yeqqim yesgurduy, am win yettrun.
Ageldun ibedd i tuzzmiwin-nni am win ikecmen ɛemrayen, yettales tudert i kra iɣef d-yekka, afus ayeffus ijebbed deg taxatemt-nni n twaɣzent i yeqqen saɛid usakin n ufus azelmaḍ.
Tenser-d kan, izeḥlelli-tt anda ur tt-yettaf yiwen.
Yuɣal-d imiren ɣer lɣerḍ-is.
Yemmekta-d akk ayen ideg t-id-tessenser yelli-s-nni n waɣzen.
Yekker ibedd mebla akukru yenna i wid i d-yezzin fella-as : “ D taqcict-ihin deg tlemmast n tqaɛet ara aɣeɣ."
D nettat ara yilin d tameṭṭut-iw.
Ma yebɣa Sidi Rebbi, ad tili d yemma-s n warraw-iw.
I tebɣuḍ tiɣzifeḍ ay iḍ, d ulaqrar ad d-yali wass.
Kra tedder di lḥif n tatut tin akken yeğğan imawlan-is, deg yedra n tudert n win yuran deg yixef-is, yeffeɣ-as ɣer tafat.
Ha-tt d tameṭṭut n ugeldun.
Wissen azekka d tagellidt, ad ternu kra n talsa i tudert n yimdanen.
Tameɣra tekka sebɛa wussan d sebɛa wuḍan d ṭṭbel ireddeḥ.
Tamacahut-iw lwad lwad, mliɣ-tt-id i warraw n lejwad.
Tura ad kem-in-taweḍ.
Waqila ma tesfeqdeḍ ɣer tsenduqt-it Email ad tt-tafeḍ.
Mi as-tefkiḍ tamuɣli tamezwarut, err-iyi-d s wawal.
Ayen ad d-yernun d ccɣel-ik.
Tura ad ken-in-taweḍ.
Tura ad kent-in-taweḍ.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-ak.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-am.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-as.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-asen.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-asent.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-i.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-aneɣ.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-anteɣ.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-awen.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-awent.
Tasa-s tettefriwis fell-akent.
Tasa-w tettefriwis fell-ak.
Tasa-w tettefriwis fell-am.
Tasa-w tettefriwis fell-as.
Tasa-w tettefriwis fell-awen.
Tasa-w tettefriwis fell-akent.
Tasa-w tettefriwis fell-awent.
Tasa-w tettefriwis fell-asen.
Tasa-w tettefriwis fell-asent.
Yak nniɣ-am akka i iga lḥal.
Yak nniɣ-ak akka i iga lḥal.
Yak nniɣ-as akka i iga lḥal.
Yak nniɣ-awen akka i iga lḥal.
Yak nniɣ-awent akka i iga lḥal.
Yak nniɣ-akent akka i iga lḥal.
Yak nniɣ-asen akka i iga lḥal.
Yak nniɣ-asent akka i iga lḥal.
Yewwet almi yuweḍ lebɣi-s.
Tewwet almi tuweḍ lebɣi-s.
Newwet almi nuweḍ lebɣi-nneɣ.
Wwten almi uwḍen lebɣi-sen.
Wwtent almi uwḍent lebɣi-sent.
Wwteɣ almi uwḍeɣ lebɣi-w.
Wwteɣ almi uwḍeɣ lebɣi-inu.
Tewwteḍ almi tuwḍeḍ lebɣi-k.
Tewwteḍ almi tuwḍeḍ lebɣi-m.
Tewwtem almi tuwḍem lebɣi-nwen.
Tewwtemt almi tuwḍemt lebɣi-nwent.
Tewwtemt almi tuwḍemt lebɣi-nkent.
Tewwteḍ almi tuwḍeḍ lebɣi-inek.
Tewwteḍ almi tuwḍeḍ lebɣi-inem.
Yewwet almi yuweḍ lebɣi-ines.
Caɛban At Meẓyan d yiwen n uqcic n xemseṭṭac neɣ n seṭṭac n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
Ulac ɣur-s azemz n tlalit-is.
Ur tezmireḍ ara ad t-tzegleḍ ma tnudaḍ fell-as acku d netta kan i yellan deg tɣiwant n Tazerrajt deg tazwara n yiseggasen n sebɛin.
Ayen i iyi-iǧǧan uriɣ aḍris-a s tutlayt n yemma, s Teqbaylit, ahat d tiririt i unemhal i iyi-iwwten mi as-nniɣ tidet: nekk d Amaziɣ.
Ẓriɣ yenuda ad ineɣ deg-i timuzɣa.
Bɣiɣ diɣen a Massa ad kem-steqsiɣ : Ayɣer ur neqqar ara tameslayt-nneɣ deg uɣerbaz am tmeslayin-nniḍen am taɛrabt, tafransist, tagnizit…
Aḍris-a ara teɣreḍ, ẓriɣ s shala, d ttbut n tezmert n tutlayt-nneɣ Tamaziɣt, ara ikecmen, kkes ccek s aɣerbaz.
Yiwen n wass zgiɣ-d d aqerruy n udur-nneɣ.
Lliɣ beddeɣ, ha-t-an iteddu-d ɣur-i yiwen uqcic Asṭayfi, ad yili d nned-iw.
Yuweḍ-d kan ɣer yiri-w yeskuṭṭef-iyi deg uɛebbuḍ, yenna-iyi-d s taɛrabt taɣerfant : “Ah ay Aqbayli, uɣal tura ɣer deffir!”
Nekk rriɣ iman-iw ur as-sliɣ ara akk.
Yuɣal yessuli taɣect-is, iɛawed-iyi-d dima s taɛrabt : “Ɛni tɛuẓẓgeḍ, la k-d-qqareɣ uɣal ɣer deffir!”
D acu ara as-rreɣ i wa yebɣan ad iyi-iḥqer ?
Ttrajun akk wid i d-ittnezzihen ad xedmeɣ ayen i iyi-d-yessuter.
Ɣelḍen nezzeh acku ur xemmemeɣ ara aṭas, rriɣ afus-iw i kemsen d lbunya ɣer deffir, ssawḍeɣ-as-tt s aɛebbuḍ-is akken i ilaq.
Isuɣ Rebbi i t-id-ixelqen, yeɣli ɣef rrmel.
Nekk mi as-sliɣ iɛeggeḍ akken yuɣal yeɣli ugadeɣ cwiṭ i as-xedmeɣ, blettxeɣ ɣef rrmel, am netta tteglilizeɣ.
Din din imhuras ssawlen i yiwen umasay, yufa-aɣ-d i sin nefser ɣef rrmel neṭṭef iɛebbaḍ-nneɣ nettnazaɛ.
Isker-aɣ-d i sin, mi d-nebded iwesseɛ afus-is ɣer deffir yefka-iyi-d iskiḍ.
Ḥulfaɣ imiren i lḥenk-iw azelmaḍ yeḥma maca, ul-iw teččur-it-id tebɣest, acemma deg-i ur d-yeḥrik.
D acu kan ttrajuɣ deg umasay-nni ad isekkeḍ amhares-nni wis sin.
Mi walaɣ kra ur as-t-yexdim, nekk nwiɣ ad t-isekkeḍ akken i iyi-isekkeḍ, d aya kan, kkreɣ luɛaɣ-t s tefransist : “Acimi ur tewwiteḍ ara wihin akken i iyi-tewwteḍ?”
Ula d wis tlata ur ixuṣṣ ara.

Neklef-as Rebbi i ddunit taɣeddart.
Neklef-as Rebbi i yinehharen n tkerrsin ur nesɛi tafrit.
Neklef-as Rebbi i temsulta n tmurt-nneɣ ur nxeddem ara akken iwata ccɣel-is.
Teǧǧa yiwet n tkerrust tameḍbubt, taqdimt, taceqquft mazal-itt tetteddu almi tegla s teqcict ur nesmid ara mraw n yisegasen deg tudert-is taferṭeṭṭut…
Neklef-as Rebbi i ugacur (hasard) i yerran Meryem deg wadeg anda i d-teḍra twaɣit d wakud melmi i d-teḍra.
Meryem d aneglus.
Ineglusen ur ttidiren ara d yimdanen.
Rezzfen i lebda ɣer tmurt n yineglusen, ttɣimin din iman-nsen,
Rriḥa n wid iteddun ɣef sin n yiḍarren tenger, ulac-itt din.
Meryem, teǧǧa-aɣ, teǧǧa-aɣ-d ilem meqqer anect n leqher.
Iɣurr-itt zzman, tɣurr imeddukal-is d temddukal-is n uɣerbaz.
Inelmaden run ma d kra iba-ines.
Tɣurr imawlan-is iwumi tteḥdiqqirent ar ass-a tsiswa-nsen.
Ad nessuter deg Rebbi ad asen-yazen ssber swayes ara mmagren taswiɛt-a yeččuren d leḥzen.
Ad nessuter deg ugellid ameqqran ad issifsus taɛkemt taẓayant i d-yeɣlin fell-asen ur uḥtamen.

Ddunit ur tettɣimi akken tella.

Wissen ma tfukeḍ s tɣuri ungal-nni "Ccdeb akked yiẓuran" ?

Lqahwa i tesseɣ rẓaget.

Ssekker fell-i yegdel.

Qqimem deg yixxamen-nwen.

Ur teffɣet ara, qqimet deg uxxam.
Terra-iyi tmara ad kemneɣ deg uxxam.
Terra-ken tmara ad tkemnem deg uxxam.

Terra-ten tmara ad kemnen deg uxxam.
Teɣriḍ-t akken ma yella ?
Taggara-s ur tessefraḥ ara.
Asefru-nni aneggaru i yura umedyaz Caɛḅan uriɣ-t deg Fransa deg useggas 1981.
Tanemmirt a Ɛadel ɣef umbadal n wawal-a gar-aneɣ.
