Bdiɣ taɣuri-nsen nnig n waggur aya.
Wissen ma yeɣli-d gar yifassen-im ungal-iw aneggaru "Ccdeb akked yiẓuran" ?
Ɣur-s nnig n snat tmaḍ n yisbetren.
Ccdeb d iferrawen, d taseṭṭa n useklu, irekku, ittawi-t waḍu, ma d iẓuran ttɣimin-d, d nutni i d sseḥḥ.
S yiwen n wawal : Nekkni s Yimaziɣen d iẓuran, ma d Naɛima Salḥi d tmital-is d ccdeb.
Uwiɣ-d ɣef tudert s umata d yinsayen deg tmurt n Leqbayel deg yiseggasen 50 ɣer wid n 70.
Raju ad t-teɣreḍ tiniḍ-d ma yelha neɣ diri-t.
Yella wayen teɣriḍ deg wayen uriɣ ?
Uriɣ aṭas n tullisin. Wissen ma teɣriḍ kra deg-sent.
Ma tebɣiḍ ad am-in-azneɣ yiwet n tullist ad tt-teɣreḍ.
Ḥsiḥ ad m-teɛǧeb. Ɣer-itt terreḍ-iyi-d s lexbar.
Ddunit merra islef-as-d.
Ddunit akken ma tella islef-as-d.
Ad isteqsi fell-am s lxir.
Ma tkemmel akka yelha.
Ssarameɣ kemm d twacult-m tgerrzem.
Ad fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem yazen ssber i yimawlan-is akked yimedyazen i tt-yessnen.
Sgellin kan i t-fukkeɣ s tira.
Mi t-teɣriḍ akken ma yella, err-iyi-d s wawal.
Tameṭṭut ɣur-sen yif-itt uydi.
Tebɣiḍ ad kem-tif teydit a Zkuka lɛali ?
Ih, tageldunt taqbaylit yeṭṭafaren tineslemt taqbaylit mačči tasaɛudit, neɣ taɛrabt.
Ihi ɣer asafru-a terreḍ-iyi-d s wawal, ttrajuɣ-kem.
Sgellin i tfukkeɣ, nniɣ-as ad t-azneɣ i ddunit.
Yella cwiṭ n usirem ɣer taggara-s.
D tezmert-im a Zkuka d win akk i tḥemmleḍ.
D asefru-nni ara d-ihedren deg umkan-iw.
Ttḥadar iman-im kemm diɣen.
Ifukk ucemmar n lekmam, deg yiberdan ifukk ucali.
Ur ḥmmileɣ ara s tidet aksum n uyaziḍ.
Imawen ɣummen s ukmam, alday akken ur d-iɣelli.
Nuɣal akkin i umnar, nugad tuffɣa ɣer berra.
Inulfa-d yiwen n mejɛer, d abirus n kuruna.
Deg terwiḥin la imegger, inuda-d akk timura.
Akken ma tella islef-as, ddunit yebɣa ad tt-isenger.
Tarwiḥt tegrareb lqima-s, deg temda n tmettant tezder.
Ddunit, anqaḍ ur tebni fell-as, d amdan i d ssebba n nnger.
Yuwi-d lhemm s ufus-is, deg tussniwin mi yetturar.
D amussnaw, yefti yixef-is, yessers ddunit ɣef yimurar.
Wissen ma ad taf iman-is neɣ ad as-yezzem aɣesmar.
Imjuhad n tidet, nɣan-ten d tirni.
Ala lxubata i d-yeggran, yerna twalaḍ.
Ad nwali sya ɣer sdat.
Qqaren-d imezdaɣ zaden, amaḍal ur ten-yettawi.
Kkren deg-sen la fersen, mi d-xelqen abirus-nni.
Deg uzekka d nutni ad icaxen, mi uɣalen akka d lerbub.
Ma yella tezgel-aɣ lmut, ilaq ad as-nɛiwed i leḥsab.
Ddunit ad tecbu tafsut, ma nebna-tt ɣef wawal n sswab.
Tudert ad temmet d tawessurt, tussna, ma yekkes-as uslab.
Tudert ad temmet s tewser, tussna, ma yekkes-as uslab.
Ddunit ad tuɣal tafsut, ma nebna-tt ɣef wawal n sswab.
Ddunit ad tuɣal akk tafsut, ma nebna-tt ɣef wawal n sswab.
Ddunit ad tuɣal akk tafsut, ma nebna-tt ɣef uzref.
Ur yeǧǧi tiɣmert deg ddunit.
Ur yeǧǧi amkan deg ddunit.
Ur yeǧǧi tiɣmert deg umaḍal.

Aɣersiw imegzi, ixdem-itt.
Ad nɣelli am yizan.

Ala tikerkas i yeṭṭfen taqaɛet.

Urǧin d-teḍri twaɣit am ta.
D yir netta waṭṭan-a.

Nečča tiɣrit d tameqqrant.

Terwi ma tkemmel akka.

Tejba-d tewser, truḥ temẓi.

Yeg Rebbi, kra n usirem i tesɛiḍ, yiwen n wass ad t-tawḍeḍ ɣur-s, laɛnaya n yiɛessasen.
Rẓan afriwen i usirem.
Asirem, rẓan-as afriwen.
Afriwen-nni n usirem, rẓan-ten.
Teɣli-d gar yifassen n wid ur tt-nuklal.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-m a tamurt-iw.
Tamurt-iw, yettu-tt Rebbi.
Rebbi, yettu tamurt-iw.
A tamurt yettu Rebbi, abrid-im, anda yettawi ?
Deg wulawen, yemmut usirem.
Icerrig n tmurt-iw, yugar tafawet.
Seg wass-nni i d-tlul, d nutni d acerreg deg-s.
Terwi u mazal ar terwi ugar.
Ulac kra yessefraḥen.
Tumert, wissen d wanwa i tedda.
Tumert, ur d-terzi tikkelt ɣer tmurt-nneɣ.

Yella kra n tikkelt i d-testeqsa tumert fell-as ?
Yella kra n tikkelt i d-testeqsa tumert fell-asen ?
Yella kra n tikkelt i d-testeqsa tumert fell-asent ?

Yella kra n tikkelt i d-testeqsa tumert fell-awent ?

Yella kra n tikkelt i d-testeqsa tumert fell-anteɣ ?
Yeffer fell-ak, ur ak-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-am, ur am-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-i, ur iyi-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-asen, ur asen-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-asent, ur asent-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-awen, ur awen-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-awent, ur awent-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-akent, ur akent-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-aneɣ, ur aɣ-yenni kra.
Yeffer fell-anteɣ, ur aɣ-yenni kra.
Teffer fell-as, ur as-tenni kra.
Teffer fell-ak, ur ak-tenni kra.

Mmi-m, ur itturebba ara akken i ilaq.
Yelli-m, ur tetturebba ara akken i ilaq.

Yessi-m, ur itturebba ara akken i ilaq.
Yuker-iyi tikti-iw.
Tikti-w, yuker-iyi-tt.
Tikti-k, yuker-ak-tt.

Ɛacur mi yezger iɣzer ad yaf iman-is deg wayla-nsen.

Tettmmektim-d Rebbi mi ara teɛkes fell-awen(t).
Mi ara teɛkes fell-awen i d-tettmmektim Rebbi.
Mi ara teɛkes fell-awent i d-tettmmektimt Rebbi.

Afellaḥ-nneɣ ma yuwi aɛwin yid-s, ixeddem kra yekka wass.

Ma yeẓra ad d-yerr azal ussan n ssmayem, fiḥel ma yuwi učči yid-s.
Ma yeẓra ad d-yerr azal ussan n ssmayem, fiḥel ma yuwi aɛwin yid-s.

Fiḥel ma yuwi učči yid-s ma yeẓra ad d-yerr azal ussan n ssmayem.

Ur yettawi yid-s aɛwin ma yeẓra ad d-yerr azal.

Dda Wakli yetteqfufuyen, din din yeɛna ameddakel aqdim Maxluf.

Yiwen ad d-yebdu awal ɣef yiwet n tedyant wayeḍ ad tt-id-ikemmel.
Ḍsan almi ttegririben.
Tura dayen, kra din ifukk, aql-aɣ neɣli d imɣaren s dderya-nneɣ. I as-yenna Maxluf.
D dderya-nni i iyi-d-yuwin ass-a ɣur-k ay ameddakel.
Ɛacur-iw yegma, tura d argaz, acimi ur nettemnasab ara akken ad ternu deg temɣer leḥmala yellan gar-aneɣ.
Bɣiɣ ad iyi-d-tefkeḍ yelli-k Sekkura i mmi Ɛacur ad tuɣal d tameṭṭut-is ma yebɣa Rebbi.
Maxluf yessusem ddeqs am wakken issedhec-it yisalli am wa, yerra iman-is yettxemmim send ad d-yerr awal i Wakli.
Yeḥsa mmi-s s tezmert-is, d axeddam, yettarra-d agelzim s axxam, d netta i irefden tawacult-is, aṭas aya i yettraju seg umeddakel-is ad t-id-yeqsed akka am wass-a.
Teẓriḍ ay Akli, nekk yid-k mačči d imeddukal n wass-a, maca tamsalt n tissulya ur telli d tiqecmeɛt neɣ d urar n warrac, ilaq ad ciwreɣ at uxxam.
Akka i yella lḥal a Maxluf a gma, ihi imalas i d-iteddun mi ara nemlil deg ssuq ad iyi-d-terreḍ s wawal.
Ma yebɣa ugellid ameqqran ay Akli.
Mfaraqen leḥbab n temẓi, yal wa yules i twacult-is ayen yenna d wayeḍ.
A Sekkura a yelli, awi-iyi-d agdur n waman ad sweɣ fuddeɣ.
Akka i yenna Maxluf i yelli-s mi yessers iman-is ɣef ulemsir ifesren ɣef yiwen udekkan n uxxam n lwacul.
Yerbeḥ a baba. I as-terra Sekkura.
D acu ara d-tiniḍ deg yilemẓi Ɛacur mmi-s n Wakli Urabaḥ ?
Yeswa, yesfeḍ cclaɣem-is, yeṭall yelli-is ddeqs.
Iruḥ deg ttexmam alqayan.
Truḥ deg ttexmam alqayan.
Nruḥ deg ttexmam alqayan.
Ruḥeɣ deg ttexmam alqayan.
Ruḥen deg ttexmam alqayan.
Ruḥent deg ttexmam alqayan.
Truḥeḍ deg ttexmam alqayan.
Truḥem deg ttexmam alqayan.
Truḥemt deg ttexmam alqayan.
Yemmekta-d mi tella d taqrurt yettbibbi-tt ɛirquc mi ara ffɣen s ayla-nsen ad leqḍen azemmur.
Mi ara ffɣen s ayla-nsen ad leqḍen azemmur, yettbibbi yelli-s taqrurt ɛirquc.
Yuɣal am wakken yendekwal-d seg yiḍes, yufa-d sdat-s Sekkura d tameṭṭut mačči d taqcict tamecṭuḥt.
Teẓriḍ a yelli, tura meqqreḍ, tuɣaleḍ d tameṭṭut, yuweḍ-d lawan ad txedmeḍ axxam.
Segmi i yebda lehdur n tɣeṭṭen, yeɛni n tissulya, tebra i wallen-is ɣer lqaɛa.
Ur d-terfid tikkelt allen-is.
Allen-is, tikkelt ur tent-terfid.
Awal ur as-t-id-terri i baba-s.
Iwala-tt ddaw tiṭ tecmumeḥ-d cwiṭ, d ayen i d-yeqqaren ur tugi ara.
Yugi ad yamen ayen yeḍran yid-s.
Tugi ad tamen ayen yeḍran yid-s.
Nugi ad namen ayen yeḍran yid-neɣ.
Tugiḍ ad tamneḍ ayen yeḍran yid-k.
Tugim ad tamnem ayen yeḍran yid-wen.
Tugimt ad tamnemt ayen yeḍran yid-went.
Tugimt ad tamnemt ayen yeḍran yid-kent.
Ugiɣ ad amneɣ ayen yeḍran yid-i.
Ugin ad amnen ayen yeḍran yid-sen.
Ugint ad amnent ayen yeḍran yid-sent.
Tugiḍ ad tamneḍ ayen yeḍran yid-m.
Dɣa imiren kan i d-tekcem Nna Mennun, yemma-s n Sekkura.
Ur as-iruḥ yiwen wawal n udiwenni-nni i d-yellan gar urgaz-is d yelli-s.
Teffer deffir n tewwurt n uxxam n lwacul akken ad asen-tesmuzget.
Ɛacur d aqcic imeɛnen, amzun d lxir-it.
Ɣur-m zher a yelli imi i d-yerra ɣur-m mačči ɣer tayeḍ.
Ruḥ ay amɣar, ini-as i umeddakel-ik Maxluf, aql-aɣ neqbel nnesba-nwen.
Nna Mennun, ulac d acu i iteffren ɣef tiṭ-is.
Tger tamawt ma tedda d yelli-s ɣer tala ad d-agment neɣ ad ssirdent iceṭṭiḍen, d acu i d-ittilin gar yelli-s d Ɛacur mi ara d-yuɣal seg lexla, syin i d-itekk.
Yal yiwen deg-sen yettak yiwet n tmuɣli yeččuren wissen akken d acu i wayeḍ.
Amɣar-nni yefka-asen, di tazwara, i yal yiwen n warraw-is asɣar asɣar.
Yessuter deg-sen ad t-rẓen. Yusa-asen-d yeshel.
Yuɣal yeddem-d isɣaren, azal n warraw-is, ahat 7 neɣ ugar, yerra-ten d tazdemt, yenced yiwen yiwen ad ireẓ tazdemt-nni. Ur zmiren ara.
Dɣa imiren kan ad d-tili tririt seg wa ɣer wayeḍ s yiwen n ucmumeḥ ur neskiddib.
Iban yella d acu yeqqnen sin-agi i tenna Nna Mennun deg wul-is.
Nettat tɛemmed i waya, ddaw n tiṭ kan i ten-id-teksa, ɣef waya i twessa argaz-is ad yerr awal s yerbeḥ i usuter n Wakli.
Arrac msebɣan, d wagi i d sseḥḥ.
Msebɣan warrac, d wagi i d sseḥḥ.
Arrac msebɣan, d tagi i d tidet.
Msebɣan warrac, d tagi i d tidet.
Akli d Maxluf yellan d imeddukal n zzman uɣalen d iḍulan.
Sekkura tedda d tislit.
Tamaɣra tɛedda deg liser d lferḥ.
Deg liser d lferḥ i tɛedda tmeɣra.
Tɛedda tmeɣra deg liser d lferḥ.
Tɛedda tmeɣra deg liser d tumert.
Tezri tmeɣra deg liser d tumert.
Tezri tmeɣra deg liser d lferḥ.
Deg liser d lferḥ i tezri tmeɣra.
Tamaɣra tezri deg liser d lferḥ.
Iban fell-as yugad.
Iban fell-i ugadeɣ.
Iban fell-asen ugaden.
Iban fell-asent ugadent.
Iban fell-awen tugadem.
Iban fell-awent tugademt.
Iban fell-aneɣ nugad.
Iban fell-anteɣ nugad.
Iban fell-as tugad.
Iban fell-ak tugadeḍ.
Iban fell-am tugad.
Iban ɣef wudem-ik tferḥeḍ.
Iban ɣef wudem-im tferḥeḍ.
Iban ɣef wudem-iw ferḥeɣ.
Iban ɣef wudmawen-nsen ferḥen.
Iban ɣef wudmawen-nsent ferḥent.
Iban ɣef wudmawen-nwen tferḥem.
Iban ɣef wudmawen-nwent tferḥemt.
Iban ɣef wudmawen-nkent tferḥemt.
Iban ɣef wudmawen-nneɣ nefreḥ.
Iban ɣef wudmawen-nteɣ nefreḥ.
Ayen i nteg akka dagi d tira mačči d awal.
Deg tal tutlayt yella umgired gar tira d ususru.

Maca anef-as, yal yiwen amek.
Iḥudd fell-ak, ad ḥudden fell-as yiɛessasen.
Ihi, nekk yid-m seg yiwet n taddart.

Yenna-as kaligula amenkad n Rome, lufan ddunnit akken ma tella tesɛa yiwen n uqerruy, ad as-t-id-ɣeḍleɣ s yiwet n tyita n tkuba.
Yenna-as kaligula amenkad n Rome, lufan ddunnit akken ma tella tesɛa yiwen n uqerruy, ad as-t-id-ɣeḍleɣ s yiwet n tyita n yiskin.
Yenna-as kaligula amenkad n Rome, lufan ddunnit akken ma tella tesɛa yiwen n uqerruy, ad as-t-id-ɣeḍleɣ s yiwet n tyita n lemca.
Tanufli-nni n tissulya ur teqqim ara aṭas.
Tumert-nni n tissulya ur teqqim ara aṭas.
Lferḥ-nni n tissulya ur yeqqim ara aṭas.
Ɛacur amzun d targit yelhan i yurga.
Amzun d targit yelhan i yurga Ɛacur.
Maca tudert tamaɛurt tesfeḍ targit-nni yelhan, terna lǧerra-s.
Ur tufiḍ d acu id-yeqqimen.
Ulac kra i d-yeqqimen.
Ddunit teldi-d allen n yisli, terra-t-id ɣer tidet akken ad yennaɣ d uɣrum n yal ass.
Ur iɛedda ara useggas, yerna-d uqcic s axxam n Dda Akli, d mmi-s n Ɛacur d Sekkura.
Yidir i as-fkan d isem.
Isem i as-fkan d Yidir.
Fkan-as isem n Yidir.
Fkan-as isem n Yidir akken ad yidir.
Isem i as-fkan d Yidir akken ad yidir.
Yidir i as-fkan d isem akken ad yidir.
D yaya-s Melxir i itewlen deg temsalt-a n usemmi n lṭufanat.
Deg temsalt-a n usemmi n lṭufanat, d yaya-s Melxir i itewlen.
Tsemma i mmi-s n mmi-s « Yidir » akken ad yidir, ad yiɣzif leɛmer-is.
Txemmem ad as-teg isem n « Akli » am yisem n jeddi-s.
D yiwen yisem yellan deg lbal-is, lmut tettɣunfu ad d-tqerreb win i t-yesɛan, tettanef-as ihi ad yidir.
Maca d Yidir i as-yeččuren tiṭ.
Maca d Yidir i as-iɛeǧben.
Ɛacur d axeddam, ikerrez akal-is d win n medden segmi ara kecmen iweǧǧiben.
Asgunfu ur t-yessin.
Ur yessin ara d acu i d asgunfu.
Ur yessin ara d acu i d astaɛfu.
Daɣ netta yessaweḍ ad iɛeyyec tawacult-is i yetteklen kan fell-as.
Maca yejba-d yiwen useggas yiwen ur yezmir ad t-yettu.
D yiwen n useggas igan ticraḍ ur ntekkes deg wallaɣen n yimdanen.
Sin wayyuren deffir n tkerza yeɣli-d yiwen uɣurar iman-is.
Yeɣli-d yiwen uɣurar iman-is sin wayyuren deffir n tkerza.
Irden d temẓin akken ad gmen, steḥqen aṭas n waman.
Aseggas-nni tiqqit n waman ur d-teɣli amzun ayen i d-yeḍran yedda deg lebɣi n wanzi-nni yeqqaren : « Ay asmi akken i terɛed ur tewwit, ɛamayen ur d-tgir tiqqit, akured yebra i telkit… »
Teddun deg lebɣi n uqcic n ccuq.
Teddunt deg lebɣi n uqcic n ccuq.
Teddunt tlawin deg lebɣi n uqcic n ccuq.
Yenna-as iɛǧeb-ak kan.
Yenna-as iɛǧeb-am kan.
Yenna-as iɛǧeb-as kan.
Yenna-asen iɛǧeb-awen kan.
Yenna-asent iɛǧeb-awent kan.
Win yebɣan ad yiɣzif leɛmer-is, ad yeqqim deg uxxam-is.
Tin yebɣan ad yiɣzif leɛmer-is, ad teqqim deg uxxam-is.
Wid yebɣan ad yiɣzif leɛmer-nsen, ad qqimen deg yixxamen-nsen.
Tid yebɣan ad yiɣzif leɛmer-nsent, ad qqiment deg yixxamen-nsent.
Imɣi-is qqaren-as waḥrir, ma d ajeǧǧig-is jiḥbuḍ.
Jiḥbuḍ d azewwaɣ am yidammen.
Jiḥbuḍ d ajeǧǧig azewwaɣ am yidammen.
Aɣbel yessawal i gma-s.
Aɣurar ur tt-yeqqid ara, yerna-d sufella ujrad i d-iɣellin am usigna ɣef yimɣan.
Kra yellan d azegzaw yečča-t ujrad.
Iɛreqyab, urtan d tebḥirin, teḍra-yid-sen am win ifreḍsen, ttaken anzi ɣer tneẓruft.
Lḥal yuɣal yessewḥac.
Akka tura, yessewḥac lḥal.
Lḥal, yuɣal yessexlaɛ.
Ɛacur akken ad iqewwet tawacult-is, issenz war lebɣi-s tayuga-s n yizgaren meblac.
Tuga imi qlilet, azal-is d uraɣ.
Tamurt d adrar, teḍyeq ternuḍ ma yerna-d nnig waya n wayen ur nessefraḥ ara, ur tezmir ara ad tessider arraw-is.
Yeggra-d yiwen ubrid i Uqbayli akken ad iɛeyyec tawacult-is : Inig.
Akken ad d-yerr tiferkiwin d tyuga-s n yizgaren yessenz, tuwi-d fell-as ad yinig.
Tagi d tamsalt n nnif.
Akken i yexdem Ɛacur d waṭas n tizziwin-is n taddart, unagen ɣer tmurt n Fransa.

Amzun d targit i yurga.

Kullec ɣur-i d amaynut.

Urǧin issugen abrid ad as-teḍru akka.
Urǧin tessugen abrid ad as-teḍru akka.
Urǧin nessugen abrid ad aɣ-teḍru akka.
Urǧin tessugnem abrid ad awen-teḍru akka.
Urǧin tessugnemt abrid ad awent-teḍru akka.
Urǧin ssugnen abrid ad asen-teḍru akka.
Urǧin ssugnent abrid ad asent-teḍru akka.
Urǧin ssugneɣ abrid ad iyi-teḍru akka.
Maca akken qqaren : « Ulac ugur ur nesɛi tifrat ».
Yuwi yid-s yiwet n tansa anda ttidiren warraw n tmurt-is, yufa-ten.
Yufa-ten, refden-t, nudan-as-d tamezduɣt.
Yečča, yeswa, yelsa send ad as-d-afen ixeddim.
Insayen-nni n tegmat, d uḥebber ɣef wayeḍ, unagen ula d nutni ɣer tmura tiberraniyin.
Ɛacur, ur tufiḍ d acu i t-ixussen.
Mḥend, ur tufiḍ d acu i t-ixussen.
Iminig amaynut, ur tufiḍ d acu i t-ixussen.
Yufa iman-is akken i iwata ladɣa mi yebda amahil.
Mi yebda amahil, yufa iman-is akken i iwata.
Tufa iman-is akken i iwata ladɣa mi tebda amahil.
Nufa iman-nneɣ akken i iwata ladɣa mi nebda amahil.
Ufiɣ iman-iw akken i iwata ladɣa mi bdiɣ amahil.
Ufan iman-nsen akken i iwata ladɣa mi bdan amahil.
Ufant iman-nsent akken i iwata ladɣa mi bdant amahil.
Tufiḍ iman-im akken i iwata ladɣa mi tebdiḍ amahil.
Tufiḍ iman-ik akken i iwata ladɣa mi tebdiḍ amahil.
Tufam iman-nwen akken i iwata, ladɣa mi tebdam amahil.
Tufamt iman-nwent akken i iwata, ladɣa mi tebdamt amahil.
Tufamt iman-nkent akken i iwata, ladɣa mi tebdamt amahil.
Kra n wussan kan, iminig amaynut ibeddu izemmer i yiman-is.
Tuɣal-as-d tlelli-s swayes iteg ayen yebɣa war ma icawer yiwen.
Mi yella ɣur-s mraw n yiseggasen deg tudert-is mačči kan d takessawt i yeksa.
Yelmed azal n krad n yiseggasen tutlayt tafransist send ad d-yeṭṭixer.
Ad tt-yerr imaren-nni kan i uɛiwen n baba-s deg tkessawt d yimuhal-nniḍen n lexla.
Yeḥsa s yiman-is d inebgi n tmurt i t-irefden, dɣa yegza d netta ara iḍefren kra yerzan taɣara n tudert n Fransa am yinsayen d tutlayt.
Ɣef waya, tal tikkelt mi ara d-yeffeɣ seg yixeddim-is tameddit, yettarra ɣer yiwen uɣerbaz anda i irennu almad n tutlayt tafransist.
Ma yessen-itt akken i iwata, ad yemsefham d yimawlan n tmurt.
Tal tamsirt ara yerfed, ttuɣalen-d s aqerruy-is wawalen-nni yelmed deg temẓi-s.
Ɛacur d win i iḥemmlen ad iɣer, dɣa kra n uḍris yufa sdat-s yeɣra-t.
Adlis ifukk s tɣuri ad iɛeddi ɣer wayeḍ.
Yezri useggas, yufa-d iman-is yettmeslay tafransist am yimawlan n tmurt.
Ula d aselmad-is, Mass Robert, itwehhem deg-s.
Deffir n teglimt-nsen taberkant, yeffer uqcic yebɣan ad yurar.
Deffir n teglimt-nsen yeḍlan d imbuxen, yeffer uqcic yebɣan ad yurar.
Deffir n teglimt-nsen ijeddren seg tebrek, yeffer uqcic yebɣan ad yurar.

Tettqessirem ziɣen.
Tettqessiremt ziɣen.
Tettqessir ziɣen.
Yettqessir ziɣen
Nettqessir ziɣen
Ttqessireɣ ziɣen.
Ttqessiren ziɣen.
Yezzi-d yibrir.
Sliɣ-as iḍ-nni akkin.
D yiwet n tezlit yuklalen ad as-yesmuget yiwen.
Eǧǧ kan abrid sansa ad d-tɛeddiḍ, teẓriḍ berra tiwwura qeflen-tent akken ma llant.
Akka yal aseggas irezzu srid ɣer ccfaya n ugdud ad t-id-yesmmekti ɣef wayen yeḍran yid-s.
Yebrir, yesmmektay-d tisiswa yeqqden ar ass-a.
Yebrir, yesmmektay-d lbaṭel ur nesɛi tawant,
Ad d-yesmmekti yebrir agdud yerran ɣer ṭṭerf tagmat, yesmuqul awal ur t-id-yuli.
Yesmuqul awal ur t-id-yuli mi as-gezmen tagmat am tegzart n ujenwi, netta yeṭallay am umergu amesruɛ.
Anza n yilemẓi yeɣlin s tyitiwin n rrsas n umestul aɣeddar, ha-t yettnazaɛ tal tikkelt mi ara d-yezzi lawan ideg yeɣli kanakken d aleqqaq.
Wissen? Ahat nestahel ayen akka iḍerrun yid-neɣ imi nugi ad necɛef, imi nɣunfa tagmat, imi akka tura yal yiwen ikkat i Muḥend-is…
Daɣ netta, acḥal d abrid i t-id-yeɛreḍ s axxam-is.
Yettnadi ad iserreḥ ugar n waya yiles n unelmad-is Ɛacur ma yettmeslay d yinebgawen-is.
Aseggas amenzu n lɣerba, ɣas ma yedha-d akken i ilaq d yiman-is, ur yettu ara axxam-is yeǧǧa deg tmurt.
Yettazen i twacult-is idrimen d yiselsa i yettawi walbaɛḍ yuwin imuras deg unebdu neɣ deg tallit-nniḍen, ɣer taddart-is.
Qqaren-d : « Win iɛerḍen aksum n tsekkurt ur iqenneɛ ara ».
Yettkukru wul-iw ad iḥemmel.
Wissen acimi i yettkukru wul-iw ad iḥemmel.
Yewwet agejdur mi d-teǧǧa tayri-s.
Ɣli-d ay adrar fell-imi ur d-zgiɣ ara d tayri.
Tayri d tilellt, tferren win tebɣa.
Yiwen ur yeẓri melmi i d-testeqsay tayri.
Rriɣ tawwurt ɣef wul-iw, deggreɣ tasarut.
Deggreɣ tasarut mi rriɣ tawwurt ɣef wul-iw.
Tdegger tasarut mi terra tawwurt ɣef wul-is.
Idegger tasarut mi yerra tawwurt ɣef wul-is.
Tdeggreḍ waqila tasarut mi terriḍ tawwurt ɣef wul-ik.
Tdeggreḍ waqila tasarut mi terriḍ tawwurt ɣef wul-im.
I xedmeɣ n lxir ur d-iban.
I nexdem n lxir ur d-iban.
Akka i teḍra d Ɛacur, yal aseggas yezrin amzun yettbaɛad cwiṭ cwiṭ ɣef tmurt-is, maca skudmal yettqerrib ɣer tin i t-irefden, tin i t-yerran d wayeḍ.
Ula d tutlayt ala tafransist i yekkat imi seg tnezzayt alma yeɣli-d yiḍ d imdanen ifransisen i yettxalaḍ, ama deg wadeg n umahil-is, ama deg leqhawi.
Anda akken i yezdeɣ, ala netta i d aqbayli.
Anda akken i yezdeɣ, ala netta i d aberrani.
Temlel n uglim-is yeǧǧan iṭij n tmurt, ssifa-nni taqmumsant i as-yefka Rebbi d yiles-is iserrḥen s sshala i wawal mi ara yettutlay tafransist, rran-t amzun d yiwen seg yirumyen.
Inaragen-is ur faqen ansi-t.
Ula d netta iɛǧeb-as wanect-a imi irennu-d cwiṭ sɣur-s akken ad yekkes kra n ccek i izemren ad t-id-yefḍeḥ.
Iseggasen ttɛeddayen am lebreq netta ur sen-yuki.
Yedha-d kan d yiman-is acku tuwi-t jjyaḥa.
Tedha-d kan d yiman-is acku tuwi-tt jjyaḥa.
Nedha-d kan d yiman-nneɣ acku tuwi-aɣ jjyaḥa.
Axxam-nni ines deg tmurt, tameṭṭut-is, mmi-s yuɣalen tura d anubi, amɣar n baba-s, yemma-s, yettu-ten akken ma llan.
Tedhiḍ-d kan d yiman-ik acku tuwi-k jjyaḥa.
Tedhiḍ-d kan d yiman-im acku tuwi-kem jjyaḥa.
Tedham-d kan d yiman-nwen acku tuwi-ken jjyaḥa.
Tedhamt-d kan d yiman-nwent acku tuwi-kent jjyaḥa.
Tedhamt-d kan d yiman-nkent acku tuwi-kent jjyaḥa.
Dhan-d kan d yiman-nsen acku tuwi-ten jjyaḥa.
Dhant-d kan d yiman-nsent acku tuwi-tent jjyaḥa.
Dhiɣ-d kan d yiman-iw acku tuwi-iw jjyaḥa.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba-s yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-yeḥḍir ara.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba-s yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-teḥḍir ara.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba-nneɣ yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-neḥḍir ara.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba-tsen yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-ḥḍiren ara.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba-tsent yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-ḥḍirent ara.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-ḥḍireɣ ara.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba-twen yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-teḥḍirem ara.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba-twent yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-teḥḍiremt ara.
Ula d tanṭelt n baba-tkent yuwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi, ur as-teḥḍiremt ara.
Tameṭṭut-is tuzen-as acḥal d abrid tibratin, tceyyeɛ-as arraw n tmurt ɣur-s, maca yiwen ur yessin tansa-s.
Sekkura teɛsa Rebbi, d nettat i d-isekkren mmi-s Yidir.
D Sekkura i yellan d lmendad i temɣart-is, acemma ur tt-ixuss.
D acu i k-yuɣen ?
Lmut teggar-d afus-is.
D acu i kem-yuɣen ?
D acu i t-yuɣen ?
D acu i tt-yuɣen ?
D acu i ten-yuɣen ?
D acu i tent-yuɣen ?
D acu i ken-yuɣen ?
D acu i kent-yuɣen ?
D acu i aɣ-yuɣen ?
D acu i iyi-yuɣen ?
Segmi ara d-yali wass, nettat tferren, tessirid, tettellem taduṭ, teggar iẓeḍwan.
Tẓeṭ tibernyas d yiɛdilen i tessnuzu.

Iseggasen imenza tḥulfa ixuss-itt Ɛacur.
Tedder yid-s ala aseggas.
Yedder yid-s ala aseggas.
Tedder yid-i ala aseggas.
Tedder yid-k ala aseggas.
Yedder yid-m ala aseggas.
Mazal ur t-terwi ara yeffeɣ-as afus.
Mazal ur tt-yerwi ara teffeɣ-as afus.
Mazal ur tt-terwiḍ ara teffeɣ-ak afus.
Mazal ur t-terwiḍ ara yeffeɣ-am afus.
Tkullef-as Rebbi i Fransa i tt-iɣurren deg win i tt-yettwanasen.
Ad t-id-temmekti kan ad tt-terr i yiẓri-s s tuffra n temɣart-is i yettarran nettat leɣbayen-is ɣer daxel.
Tura a-tt-an teqqim d yiman-is, i tt-yettwanasen d iɣeblan n ddunit.
D akud i d ddwa n yifeddixen n wul.
Zerrin yiseggasen, nnig n wraw d semmus i iruḥen am leffar deg yigenni.
Icekkeḍ wufrik-ik a winnat.
Icekkeḍ yikerri-ik a winnat.
Icekkeḍ wakrar-ik a winnat.
Ickeḍ-it wakrar.
Ickeḍ-it wufrik.
Ickeḍ-it yikerri.
Ickeḍ-itt wakrar.

Ickeḍ-itt wufrik.
Acengu n umdan d akud, yezga yid-s yettmurud, ɣer taggara neẓra akk d acu ara as-ibudd.
Ickeḍ-ik yikerri.
Ickeḍ-ikem yikerri.
Ickeḍ-iyi yikerri.
Argaz-is ur d-yuri ur d-iceyyeɛ ur d-yedli fell-asen.
Sekkura dayen tellez.
Iɣeblan i tt-iceɣben yal ass ur t-ǧǧin ara ad yeṭṭef kra n umkan deg wul-is, iteffeɣ-it cwiṭ cwiṭ almi ahat amzun urǧin t-yekcim.
Ula d at n taddart ikcem-iten lḥir.
Qqaren d tirni : "D acu-t akka tura wagi ?"
Qqaren akk : "D acu-t akka tura wagi ?"
Taqcict amzun d lxir-itt, leḥdaqa, rrẓana, ssifa i as-yefka Rebbi ur icuḥḥ, netta ha-t ijaḥ deg Fransa.
Maca awal yettazzalen seg yimi ɣer wayeḍ, yuɣ-d akk lebrari d wa : argaz-a ur d-nefki lexbar seg waṭas aya ahat yemmut.
Llan kra gezmen-tt deg rray, dayen yemmut acku ala win yuwḍen sanda ara naweḍ akk iwumi yettmettat ssut-is azal n mraw d semmus n yiseggasen.
Kra n yirgazen n taddart ur ffiren ara lferḥ-nsen imi Ɛacur, argaz n Sekkura iɣab ur d-iban ara.
Muḥend Useɛdi iwumi temmut tmeṭṭut-is mačči aṭas aya yufa-tt d lemziyya mi iɣab yisem n Ɛacur.
Aǧǧal yettnadi ad yezwej, allen-is seg wassen akken i rsent ɣef Sekkura ur d-subbent.
Yebɣa-tt wul-is seg zik ɣas ma yesɛa tameṭṭut i t-iɣaḍen kan mi temmut wanag tudert-is ira ad tt-yebḍu d tsekkurt-is n yiḥerqan, akka i as-yeqqar i yiman-is kan.
Muḥend Useɛdi ula d netta iɣat-it-id Rebbi s tezmert tuntimt, ssifa d tiddi yelhan, deg leɛmer-is d alemmas n yirgazen.
Tamurt-is meqqert, ɣur-s taqeḍɛit n wulli d yizamaren, d yuga n yizgaren i d-yufraren deg taddart.
Afud igerrzen s adrar yeffren aṭas n lesrar.
Tameṭṭut i as-yemmuten ur as-d-teǧǧi ara dderya, d tiɛiqqert ur tettarew ara.

D ayen i ixemmem i yeḍran.
Yugad ad as-tenser afus.

Nnan-as ad nciwer tamacult-nneɣ.

S wusran nezmer ad nẓeḍ iḍellaɛen, icwariyen, icerraɛen...

Ass-nni, i snat twaculin tufa-tent din.
I tt-id-immugren d Nna Mennun. Ansuf yis-m a Lǧida! I d-as-tenna i tnebgiwt.

D taẓayant tegnawt.

Terra-tt tmara ad tuɣal deg wawal-is.

Terra-kem tmara ad terreḍ aḍar.

Ma d tuqqna ad d-tili i uzekka-nni lǧemɛa.

Lufan amdan yettkacaf, talfi ad iɛiwed leḥsab i lecɣal-is.

Deg Fransa, win akken rran yemmut imi aṭas aya ur d-yefki lexbar, yettkemmil yesɛedday ussan-is akken yuɣ tannumi.
Amdan ur as-yessken ara Rebbi, maca yefka-t-id d aqemmar.
Akken yebɣu yili lḥal cwiṭ n ccek n tilin n Ɛacur yella yella, maca, aqemmar, ccek-nni itekkes-it ɣef tikkelt u yettkemmil ayen akken i d-yessers ad t-yexdem.
Ihi, Ɛacur deg taddart yemmut ma deg tmurt n Fransa mazal-it yettidir.
Ihi, Ɛacur deg tmurt n Fransa mazal-it yettidir, ma deg taddart-is yemmut.
Tadyant-a iḍerrun fell-as ur yeẓri am wakken yufa-tt wul-is.

Uḍan-is ur rkiden ara, acḥal d abrid i d-yedduqqes seg yiḍes mi ara izgen yiḍ.

Kunemti a Ticawiyin, ur tettsetḥimt ara ad temmeslayemt s tutlayt-nkent tacawit.

Yurga tamurt, deg umwan i yella, imiren d iweǧǧiben.
Tanezzayt zik i yeffeɣ s ayla-nsen « Tinujal » ad yekrez akken yuɣ tannumi.
Tameddit mi d-yeṭṭef abrid n tuɣalin s axxam, teɣli-d yiwet n lgerra d icercuren, din din kkren-d yiḥumal.
Netta iḍfer-iten s wallen almi i jban akkin.
Mi iɛedda ad yezger iɣzer s yizgaren-is i iḥemmel am tmemmuct n tiṭ-is, izwer-iten i sin yid-sen sdat-s.
Netta mazal ur igir ara iḍarren-is deg waman, lexbar kan gruffɛen-d waman ɣef tikkelt, uɣalen d yiwet n lḥemla tameqqrant.
Lḥemla tuwi izgaren d agessar, kkaten-ten waman iluɣen seg ublaḍ ɣer wayeḍ.
La ttwaliɣ tettiḍ tanfalit-nni yeqqaren : Ɣli-d ay adrar fell-i. Terriḍ-tt : Ad qqimeɣ ay adrar fell-ak.

Bubekker d bu tneɛḍab.
Iḥemmel diɣen ad d-yesḍes wiyaḍ.
Tigzi-ines tɛedda talemmast.
Udem-is ur yettbeddil ma yemla-d i yimeddukal n tegnit kra n temseḍsut.
Imeddukal-is ad ttegririben ɣef tmurt seg teḍsa amzun d tteryel i ten-yeskikiḍen deg tleqqaɛin n yiḍarren-nsen ma d netta ad yettkemmil ad d-iḥekku am wakken kra ur yeḍri.
Bubekker mačči d amesbaɣur n lǧib maca d win n tqulhatin, n uskeɛrer, n usmesxer, n tandiyin, n tedyanin yessewhamen ama wid iɣef ḍrant ama ɣef yinigan.
Tidyanin-a zemrent ad ilint s wawal am wakken zemrent diɣen ad ilint s tigawin bḥal lɛefsa yexdem i umeddakel Salaḥ i yebbɣen afus-is anda akken ur yebni ara akk fell-as.
Deg tsemhuyt n tefsut deg tmurt n Leqbayel, agama yettuɣal-d s wudem amaynut.
Kullec yettlal-d, ddunit merra tettberqic.
Ideflawen n yidurar fessin.
Tiregwa n waman teddunt.
Iɣewdan swan almi rwan, daɣ netta amzun dlen s liẓarat izegzawen.
Igdaḍ yal yiwen s tiɣmi-ines ɣef yisekla cennun yal wa s taɣect i as-yefka Rebbi.
Iferṭeṭṭa, tizizwa d kra ubeɛɛuc s wafriwen, ttafgen seg ujeǧǧig ɣer wayeḍ, ttsummun-d aman iẓidanen.
Ma d wid itteḥruruden kan deg lqaɛa am tweḍfin zzuɣuren neɣ ttseggiren iɛeqqayen n yirden neɣ n temẓin ɣer yixemjan anda ttidiren ad ten-sxeznen i tallit n usemmiḍ.
S umbiwel akka d wakka n tɣennawt i d-yefka Rebbi, amaḍal deg tefsut yettban-d yettidir.
Bubekker ass-nni yezwar s lmal-is.
Yella yiwen n uqcic, d nned-is, d mmi-s n yiwen iqelben akebbuḍ-is, yettawi yettarra i ucengu n tmurt.
Yuɣal-as d mejɛer.
Ijɛer-it.
Ijeɛɛer deg wakken yecmet.
Tjeɛɛer deg wakken tecmet.
Tjeɛɛreḍ deg wakken tcemteḍ.
Njeɛɛer deg wakken necmet.
Jeɛɛreɣ deg wakken cemteɣ.
Jeɛɛren deg wakken cemten.
Jeɛɛrent deg wakken cemtent.
Tjeɛɛrem deg wakken tcemtem.
Tjeɛɛremt deg wakken tcemtemt.
Ad as-tiniḍ d amejɛur.
A-t-an yettmeslay d Rebbi-s, yeqqar-as ass-a ad d-tbaneḍ ma yella telliḍ neɣ ulac-ik.
Akken tebɣuḍ tɛasseḍ iman-ik, yiwen wass kan ad tettwiṭṭfeḍ.
Akken tebɣum tɛassem iman-nwen, yiwen wass kan ad tettwiṭṭfem.
Akken tebɣumt tɛassem iman-nwent, yiwen wass kan ad tettwiṭṭfemt.
Daɣ netta, akka i teḍra i Bubekker ur nessin aɣfal.
Tidmi n Bubekker tettezzi kan ɣef yiwet n tikti kra yekka wass.
Itett-it-id wul-is, yebɣa ula d netta ad yeffeɣ s adrar.
Ḥemmlen-t yimjuhad s tidet, tteklen fell-as aṭas, yerna isseḍsay-iten-id mi ara yeqqim yid-sen.
Tiɣzert Iqeḍɛan d yiwet n teɣzert igezmen yiwen ubrid iɣef d-ttɛeddayent tkerrsin.
D yiwen umḍiq ibrebren, yeččur d isekla, am tselnin, akerruc, amemmay, wa ikcem daxel n wa.
Ifurkan-nsen myurzen, dɣa gan yiwen ucadux asemmaḍ ur d-tettwali ara akk tafat.
Ɣef waya acḥal d abrid i sxedmen yimjuhad adeg-a d amkan n tuffra, syin ttwalin-d maca yiwen ur ten-id-yettwali.
Ad qqimen din ad ttrajun lɛesker n Fransa ad d-iɛeddi syin s tkerrsin-nsen.
Ad d-awḍen kan ɣer teɣzert-nni ad d-ɣlin fell-asen s rrsas i d-itekken ddaw n ccḍeb anda i ffren.
Ur ttaǧǧan yiwen ibedd ɣef yiḍarren-is.
Maca akken yeqqar wanzi-nni: “Qqsen-t warẓaẓen yerra zɛaf ɣef yibẓiẓen”.
Lɛesker amesbaṭli i yeččan tiɣrit acḥal d abrid din, yuwi-d iglezyam, tuẓẓal, icuqar d tmenččarin, yekker yegzem, iqedder akk isekla d yimɣan n teɣzert.
Tiɣzert tameɣbunt amzun kksen-as iselsa-s, ǧǧan-tt d taɛeryanyt.
Bubekker amedyaz, iɣaḍ-it lḥal nezzeh, maca qqnen yifassen-is, ur yezmir ad yeg kra ma d iles-is iserreḥ.

Urǧin walaɣ yiwen n ugḍiḍ am wa deg wakken yerqem.
Laɛmer walaɣ yiwen n ugḍiḍ am wa deg wakken yerqem.
Mi akken yeḥma useqqi i uriɣ asefru-a.
Asefru-a uriɣ-t mi akken yeḥma useqqi.
Imiren banen-d Leqbayel amzun dduklen.
Kra din d aɣebbar s allen.
Ladɣa kra din d astehzi ɣef umur ameqqran n Yiqbayliyen i yenwan aṭas deg widak i d-sbedden d iqerray n leɛrac.
Maca twalam akk amek teḍra, amek i qelben akebbuḍ.
Twalam amek i beddlen adrum s uɣrum.
Salaḥ yeḍlan tabacemmaqt n leɣber n tsita i ufus-is amzun d tislit yewwten lḥenni, yessenhaz kan deg uqerruy-is yeqqar :” Yiwen ur ak-yezmir a Jeḥḥa!”.
Twalam amek i ssenzen idammen n watmaten-nsen imecṭaḥ.
Asefru-a d yiwen n usebter n umezruy-nneɣ.
Yeqqar-aɣ-d amek yexdem udabu n tmurt-nneɣ Zzayer deg yilmeẓyen n tmurt n Leqbayel deg useggas 2001.
Nɣan-ten mi i-d-ssutren izerfan-nsen imezwura : tamagit tamaziɣt, tutlayt tamaziɣt, idles amaziɣ, tilelli, tugdudt...
Ur nezmir ara ad nettu d acu yeḍran yid-sen deg 2001.
Ur nezmir ara ad nettu ayen yeḍran yid-sen deg 2001.

Nɣan deg-sen nnig n 128 n yilmeẓyen.

Ɛegben mačci d kra i kra ara tekk tudert i asen-d-yeggran.
Ur nezmir ara ad nettu neɣ ad nesmeḥ aya.
Bezzaf i ḍaqen wulawen.
Seg wasmi yessaweḍ nnig n sḍis n yiseggasen deg tudert-is yekcem s aɣerbaz n Yirumyen.

Qqaren fell-asen deg tefsut, yerna mazal ur mmuten.
Qqaren fell-asent deg tefsut, yerna mazal ur mmutent.

Qqaren fell-awent deg tefsut, yerna mazal ur temmutemt.
Qqaren fell-as deg tefsut, yerna mazal ur yemmut.
Qqaren fell-as deg tefsut, yerna mazal ur temmut.

Qqaren fell-akent deg tefsut, yerna mazal ur temmutemt.

Ur yeǧǧi tama deg tmuɣli i d-yefka.

I tal tigawt tettili-d yiwet n tsedmirt.

Tfaq s tlelli-nni iwumi tefka azal, tettwakkes-as.

Ur yettili uḥeqqar mebla ma yella umeḥqur.
Ulac ameḥqur ma ulac aḥeqqar.

Winna yedduqqes akken i ilaq, ur yuḥtam ara s tihewt n Lunis.
Lunis yuweḍ kan ɣur-s, s yiwen ufus yeṭṭef-it deg tayet, s wayeḍ deg lkem n ukebbuḍ-is, ikɛel-as iḍarren, idegger-it ɣef yiblaḍen n wasif am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.

Iḥulfa am wakken yella kra i yettɛessiren taɣect-is.
Imi iwala idammen n Smaɛil teddun ɣef umgerḍ-is mi i t-ilḥeq cwiṭ s leqḍeɛ n lmus, tuɣal-d gar wallen-is tugna-nni n Smaɛil mi yessentay tafrut deg yidmaren n baba-s d ucercur-nni n yidammen i d-yeẓẓgen amzun d azger n tmecreḍt i yezla.
Dɣa imiren i d-iger yiwet n nnehta anect n ddemmar i yezgan yid-s d amwanes azal n mraw n yiseggasen.
Deffir n nnehta-nni taɣezzfant amzun d aṭṭerḍeq i d-ṭṭreḍqen lehdur seg taɣect-is.
Ad kkseɣ iziɣer-ik tura kan a Dda smaɛil. I as-yeqqar netta yettales-as-d i tefyirt-a acḥal d abrid s leɛyaḍ yesɛuẓẓugen.
Tagnit-nni mi yerra ddaw-as Smaɛil Uqasi aqettal n baba-s urǧin tɛedda fell-as, tesfeḍ-as tiggugemt-is, yuɣal-it-id wawal.

Lunis ur yesli ara akk i uḥellel i t-yettḥellil Smaɛil akken ur yesɛedday ara ajenwi ɣef yiri-s.
Yettraju afus-is ad izzelkeḍ akka d wakka maca yeqqim ur iḥerrek ara akk, amzun d bukerraɛ i t-irekben.
Lunis ɣas ma yeẓra yekwa wul-is seg wasmi yesmed mraw n yiseggasen deg tudert-is maca ifaq s yiman-is ur yelli d aqettal, iḥemmel tudert, iḥemmel taɣdemt, iḥemmel imdanen.
Ur t-teǧǧi ara tefrit-is ad yenker neɣ ad yeɛfes ayen ẓẓan deg-s baba-s d yemma-s ala deg wayen yelhan mi llan ttrebbin deg-s.
Ma iga ccɣel am wa, ad ikkes tarwiḥt i umadan, ig Rebbi amdan-a d win yestahlen agim n tikkal tamettant, tigawt am ta ad t-terr am netta.
Lunis-nni yetturebban, ukyis, ttqadaren medden, bu ccan ameqqran, ad yemmet ad d-yennulfu deg-s Lunis yenɣan tamgerḍt, amdan ur nettḥezzib, ur nettkukru, win igan ayen ur nqebbel leɛqel.
Amdan am wa, Lunis ur yettnadi ara akk ad yefk anzi ɣur-s ulamma s cwiṭ.
Xdem "j'aime" yelha, tekki ɣef wassaɣ asenselkam, yif-it.
Xdem "j'aime" yelha, yif-it ma tettekkaḍ ɣef wassaɣ asenselkam.
Wissen acḥal tekka tmersiwt-is ɣef tfekka n uneḍlib Smaɛil, yuɣal yekkes-d ajenwi-nni ɣef umgerḍ-is, isfeḍ idammen-is fell-as ɣef tebluzt-is tamellalt, yecfa amek i as-yexdem i baba-s, dɣa akken i d-as-iga.

Yezzi s axxam, iteddu ur yuki.
Deg ubrid mi yettseggir iman-is akken ad yelḥu ur yerri i yiwen azul mi t-id-zulen.
Mi yuweḍ s axxam-is, izger kan amnar yerra srid s anda yesrusu tiɣawsiwin yesteḥqay.
Mi yuweḍ s axxam-is, izger kan amnar yerra srid s axxam n lɛicc.
Irfed-d amrar aɣezzfan, at uxxam yiwen ur d-yelhi yid-s.
Issuk-d ixef n umrar-nni ɣef ujgu alemmas, yerra-as timeddict n wazal ad iɛeddi uqerruy-is, yuli ɣef yiwen n usɣim, isseɛluleq-d iman-is.
Lamana tuweḍ bab-is.
Dini din yuweḍ s anda akk ara naweḍ.
Ad ken-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, kečč d twacult-ik.
Ad kent-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, kunemti d twaculin-nkent.
Ad kent-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, kunemti d twaculin-nwent.

Ad k-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, kečč d twacult-ik.
Ad kem-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, kemm d twacult-im.
Ad t-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, netta d twacult-is.
Ad tt-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, nettat d twacult-is.
Ad ten-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, nutni d twaculin-nsen.
Ad tent-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, nutenti d twaculin-nsent.

Ad aɣ-yemneɛ Rebbi seg yir aṭṭan-a, nekkenti d twaculin-nteɣ.

Yal imalas tettazen tabrat i umeddakel-is.

Yal imalas tettazneḍ tabrat i umeddakel-im.

Tabrat i as-tura d taɣezzfant.

Ur walaɣ ara akk d acu i xeddmeɣ.
Ur walan ara akk d acu i xeddmen.
Ur walant ara akk d acu i xeddment.
Ad yeqqim kan ad isewweq leɛqel-is.
Ad teqqim kan ad isewweq leɛqel-is.
Ad qqimeɣ kan ad isewweq leɛqel-iw.
Kra tḥell yemma-s ad d-tuɣal akken tella am zik, tugi.
Kra tḥell yemma-s ad d-yuɣal akken yella am zik, yugi.

Amzun tekcem ɛemrayen.

Awal ur t-id-ittali, yeggugem am yisɣi.

Awal ur tent-id-ittali, ggugment am yisɣi.

Ula d mmi-s n tasa-s ihmel-it, amzun mačči d ayla-s.

Cwi kan talla yaya-s Melɛez i d-yedhan yid-s akken i ilaq.

Amzun ulac-itt akk din, leɛqel-is isewweq.

D nettat i as-yessiriden.
D nettat i as-d-ittheggin ayefki ad yeṭṭeḍ.

Tuɣal i mmi-s yennuɣnan d tamejjayt n tnefsit.

Yuɣal i mmi-s yennuɣnan d amejjay n tnefsit.

Tenṭeq diɣen tenna i baba-s nettat tettru : « Ulac win i ḥemmleɣ am kečč a baba ».
Ulac win i ḥemmleɣ am kečč a baba.
Ulac tin i ḥemmleɣ am kemm a yemma.

Teḥmmel baba-s am leɛmer-is.

Imi teḥsa igregeɛ-d Rabaḥ mi akken tetturar yid-s, teddem-it-id tettel-it, tezzuzen-it cwiṭ, tuɣal tger-it ɣer daxel n dduḥ.
Tger-it ɣer daxel n dduḥ ad yeṭṭes.
Mazal ur t-tuwi ara tnafa yeṭallay-d ɣer yemma-s.

Tura yiwen usefru n tayri iṭag mi tɣill tezga-d d win akken i tt-iɣurren.

Tuɣal thuzz-it s leɛqel almi i t-yuwi nnadam, yeṭṭes.

Ulac ɣur-s ayefki, qquren yidmaren-is.
Deg snat yid-sent i zzint i yir ddunit tamaɛurt ur nettqili yiwet.
Melɛez s waṭas n tebɣest i tettqabal tudert acku tuḍen.
Ur tt-yeǧǧi ara waṭan-is ad taweḍ ɣer lebɣi-s ad texdem ayen tessaram akken ad tsali aswir n tudert n yelli-s d mmi-s n yelli-s i tḥemmel nnig n leɛmer-is.
Yal ass tettkellif Rebbi i ddunit i tt-iɣurren seg urgaz-is kan akken d tilemẓit.
Tettkellif-as Rebbi i ddunit tis snat tikkal mi tɣurr yelli-s deg zzher.
Yelli-s tuɣal-d s axxam n baba-s mi as-d-yebra yir argaz i iɛedmen temẓi-s.
Iqceɛ-itt-id urgaz-is s lṭufan ur nesmid aseggas deg tudert-is.

Ad fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem, ɣas yeǧǧa-aɣ, yeǧǧa-d.
Ad fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem, ɣas teǧǧa-aɣ, teǧǧa-d.

Ad fell-awen yeɛfu yerḥem, ɣas teǧǧam-aɣ, teǧǧam-d.
Ad fell-awent yeɛfu yerḥem, ɣas teǧǧamt-aɣ, teǧǧamt-d.

Ad fell-asent yeɛfu yerḥem, ɣas ǧǧant-aɣ, ǧǧant-d.
Ad fell-asen yeɛfu yerḥem, ɣas ǧǧan-aɣ, ǧǧan-d.

Ur ɣfileɣ ara, faqeɣ i kullec.
Ur ɣfilen ara, faqen i kullec.
Sdergen amezruy-nneɣ.
Tsel kra itekk yiḍ yemma-s tettnazaɛ seg teqreḥ n waṭan-is aqdim.
Kra yekka yiḍ d nettat d anazaɛ.
Kra yekka yiḍ d netta d anazaɛ.

Teffɣemt-d seg uxxam-nwent mebla ma teṭallemt ula d tikkelt timendeffirt.
Teffɣemt-d seg uxxam-nkent mebla ma teṭallemt ula d tikkelt timendeffirt.
Teffɣemt-d seg uxxam-nkent mebla ma teṭallemt ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Teffɣemt-d seg uxxam-nwent mebla ma teṭallemt ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Amattar yettnadi, itetter.
Aɛeṭṭar yessnuzu taɛeṭṭart am taẓult, agusim, lemri, timceḍt, i tlawin n tudrin.
Teffɣem-d seg uxxam-nwen mebla ma teṭallem ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Teffeɣ-d seg uxxam-nsen mebla ma teṭall ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Yeffeɣ-d seg uxxam-nsen mebla ma yeṭall ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Neffeɣ-d seg uxxam-nneɣ mebla ma neṭall ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Ffɣeɣ-d seg uxxam-nneɣ mebla ma ṭalleɣ ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Ffɣent-d seg uxxam-nsent mebla ma ṭallent ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Ffɣen-d seg uxxam-nsen mebla ma ṭallen ula d tikkelt ɣer deffir.
Tazmert teɣli, aqerruy icab.
Lemri ur yeskiddib ara.
Ur yeskiddib lemri.
Aqerruy icab, tazmert teɣli.

Ixelles lḥeqq n rrekba, yekcem timzuɣert ur nɛeṭṭel ara teqleɛ.
Txellseḍ lḥeqq n rrekba, tkecmeḍ timzuɣert ur nɛeṭṭel ara teqleɛ.
Xellseɣ lḥeqq n rrekba, kecmeɣ timzuɣert ur nɛeṭṭel ara teqleɛ.

I kent-id-issakin seg yiḍes d imeṭṭawen n lṭufan yettrun.
I ten-id-issakin seg yiḍes d imeṭṭawen n lṭufan yettrun.
I tent-id-issakin seg yiḍes d imeṭṭawen n lṭufan yettrun.
I iyi-d-issakin seg yiḍes d imeṭṭawen n lṭufan yettrun.
I aɣ-d-issakin seg yiḍes d imeṭṭawen n lṭufan yettrun.
Ikker-d seg wussu s lemḥadra akken ur issexrab ara iḍes i Werdiya tameṭṭut-is.
Yeldi-d tawwurt n ufrag, imeṭṭawen-nni ḥebsen maca iwala yiwen uḍellaɛ aberqac, iẓaẓ ɣur-s, icreɛ-it kan iwexxer ɣer deffir amzun yexleɛ cwiṭ.
Mi yuɣal s aḍellaɛ-nni iban-as-d lṭufan-nni yettrun.
Mi tuɣal s aḍellaɛ-nni iban-as-d lṭufan-nni yettrun.
Mi tuɣaleḍ s aḍellaɛ-nni iban-ak-d lṭufan-nni yettrun.
Mi tuɣaleḍ s aḍellaɛ-nni iban-am-d lṭufan-nni yettrun.
Mačči akken nebɣa, maɛna aql-aɣ nella.
Iwala diɣen tabrat-nni tura Saɛdiya, iger-itt ɣer lǧib.
Ma tebɣiḍ lweqt ad yeḥbes, sewwer...
Akken qqaren : yiwen n uɛekkaz i aɣ-yewwten.
Akken qqaren : yiwen n uɛekkaz i aɣ-yefkan tiɣrit.
Ur skiddiben ara yimezwura-nneɣ.
Imezwura-nneɣ qqaren-d ala tidet.
Yedla ɣer tebrat-nni, yeɣra-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Tedla ɣer tebrat-nni, teɣra-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Nedla ɣer tebrat-nni, neɣra-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Tedliḍ ɣer tebrat-nni, teɣriḍ-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Tedlam ɣer tebrat-nni, teɣram-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Tedlamt ɣer tebrat-nni, teɣramt-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Dliɣ ɣer tebrat-nni, ɣriɣ-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Dlan ɣer tebrat-nni, ɣran-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Dlant ɣer tebrat-nni, ɣrant-tt ɣef tikkelt.
Tabrat-nni, yeɣra-tt, yegza-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Tabrat-nni, teɣra-tt, tegza-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Tabrat-nni, neɣra-tt, negza-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Tabrat-nni, teɣram-tt, tegzam-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Tabrat-nni, teɣramt-tt, tegzamt-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Tabrat-nni, teɣriḍ-tt, tegziḍ-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Tabrat-nni, ɣriɣ-tt, gziɣ-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Tabrat-nni, ɣran-tt, gzan-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Tabrat-nni, ɣrant-tt, gzant-tt seg tazwara ɣer taggara.
Mi tt-ifukk s tɣuri yerra-tt ɣer lǧib-is.
Mi tt-tfukk s tɣuri terra-tt ɣer lǧib-is.
Mi tt-tfukkeḍ s tɣuri terriḍ-tt ɣer lǧib-ik.
Mi tt-tfukkeḍ s tɣuri terriḍ-tt ɣer lǧib-im.
Irfed-d Rabaḥ mmi-s, isuden-it akk, ɣlin-as-d yimeṭṭwen n lferḥ imi aṭas aya ur t-yeddim, ur t-iwala maḍi.
Maxluf ifukk kan asfaḍ n yimeṭṭawen terdef-it-id tmeṭṭut-is.
Wi t-ilan akka uqcic-nni i trefdeḍ ? I d-as-tenna mebla ma tzul fell-as.
Qqim kan, ahat d Rebbi i aɣ-d-iɣaten s lṭufan imi ur nesɛi ara dderya. I as-yerra.

Awal ur tt-id-yuli ɣef tebrat-nni i d-yeddan d mmi-s.

Awi-ten-id kan.
Awi-tent-id kan.

D rray, meqqar ad tesɛuḍ s wacu ara tedhuḍ.
D rray, meqqar ad tesɛu s wacu ara tedhu.
Ussan ttbanen-iyi-d ttnejbaden imi ulac d acu ara xedmeɣ.
Ussan ttbanen-ak-d ttnejbaden imi ulac d acu ara txedmeḍ.
Ussan ttbanen-am-d ttnejbaden imi ulac d acu ara txedmeḍ.

Ussan ttbanen-as-d ttnejbaden imi ulac d acu ara yexdem.

Ussan ttbanen-asent-d ttnejbaden imi ulac d acu ara xedment.

Ihi akka, kker seg tura ad as-d-theggiḍ ayefki ad yeṭṭeḍ ahat yelluẓ.
Ufiɣ deg uḍellaɛ-nni sin n yiquṭinen n uyefki n tewrent d yiwet n tbibrunt.
Ufan deg uḍellaɛ-nni sin n yiquṭinen n uyefki n tewrent d yiwet n tbibrunt.
Ufant deg uḍellaɛ-nni sin n yiquṭinen n uyefki n tewrent d yiwet n tbibrunt.

Tuɣal temmut yemma-s ayyur deffir n tissulya-nsen.
Tuɣal temmut yemma-m ayyur deffir n tissulya-nwen.
Ihi akka, ad d-dhuɣ yid-s am mmi-tneɣ neɣ xir.
Ihi akka, ad d-tedhuḍ yid-s am mmi-m neɣ xir.
Ihi akka, ad d-tedhuḍ yid-s am mmi-k neɣ xir.

Ilaq ad d-yedhu yid-s am mmi-s neɣ xir.
Ilaq ad d-nedhu yid-s am mmi-tneɣ neɣ xir.

Iḥulfa i yiman-is fessus, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba ɣef uɛrur-is.
Iḥulfa i yiman-is fessus, amzun tekkes teɛkemt taẓayant yettbabba ɣef uɛrur-is.
Iḥulfa i yiman-is fessus, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba ɣef uzagur-is.
Iḥulfa i yiman-is fessus, amzun tekkes teɛkemt taẓayant yettbabba ɣef uzagur-is.
Tḥulfa i yiman-is fessuset, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba uɛrur-is.
Iḥulfa i yiman-is fessust, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba uɛrur-is.
Nḥulfa i yiman-nneɣ fessusit, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba uɛrur-nneɣ.
Tḥulfaḍ i yiman-ik fessuseḍ, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba uɛrur-ik.
Tḥulfaḍ i yiman-im fessuseḍ, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba uɛrur-im.

Tḥulfamt i yiman-nkent fessusit, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba uɛrur-nkent.

Ḥulfan i yiman-nsen fessusit, amzun tekkes teɛkemt ẓẓayen yettbabba uɛrur-nsen.

Ur ifaq ara, isemma-as s yisem n jeddi-s s yemma-s.

Werdiya tessusem teǧǧa-tt akken.

Meẓẓi, netta yettḍebbir, ad iqewwet atmaten-is.
Meẓẓi, netta yettḍebbir, amek ara iqewwet atmaten-is.
D ameẓẓyan, netta yettḍebbir, ad iqewwet atmaten-is.
D ameẓẓyan, netta yettḍebbir, amek ara iqewwet atmaten-is.
Acḥal i yuli d igmir, izmer-as neɣ ur as-yezmir, ilaq ad tt-yefru d laẓ-is.
Acḥal i tuli d igmir, tezmer-as neɣ ur as-tezmir, ilaq ad tt-tefru d laẓ-is.
Acḥal i nuli d igmir, nezmer-as neɣ ur as-nezmir, ilaq ad tt-nefru d laẓ-nneɣ.
Acḥal i tuliḍ d igmir, tezmreḍ-as neɣ ur as-tezmireḍ, ilaq ad tt-tefruḍ d laẓ-ik.
Acḥal i tuliḍ d igmir, tezmreḍ-as neɣ ur as-tezmireḍ, ilaq ad tt-tefruḍ d laẓ-im.
Acḥal i tulim d igmir, tezmrem-as neɣ ur as-tezmirem, ilaq ad tt-tefrum d laẓ-nwen.
Acḥal i tulimt d igmir, tezmremt-as neɣ ur as-tezmiremt, ilaq ad tt-tefrumt d laẓ-nwent.
Acḥal i tulimt d igmir, tezmremt-as neɣ ur as-tezmiremt, ilaq ad tt-tefrumt d laẓ-nkent.

Acḥal i ulin d igmir, zemren-as neɣ ur as-zmiren, ilaq ad tt-frun d laẓ-nsen.
Acḥal i ulint d igmir, zemrent-as neɣ ur as-zmirent, ilaq ad tt-frunt d laẓ-nsent.

Ṭṭrad, yufa-tt-id d tilemẓit, tedda d tama yettnaɣen.

Iniɣ-im ɣef tlelli, tin akken i am-yettwaḥewwsen.

Iniɣ-nteɣ ɣef tlelli, tin akken i aɣ-yettwaḥewwsen.
Iniɣ-nwen ɣef tlelli, tin akken i awen-yettwaḥewwsen.
Iniɣ-nwent ɣef tlelli, tin akken i awent-yettwaḥewwsen.

Mi tefra xedɛen Ɛli, ttun iniɣ-is n yiḍelli.
Mi tefra xedɛen-k a Ɛli, ttun iniɣ-ik n yiḍelli.

Mi tefra xedɛen-ken ay irgazeni, ttun iniɣ-nwen n yiḍelli.
Mi tefra xedɛen-kent a tilawin, ttun iniɣ-nwent n yiḍelli.
Mi tefra xedɛen-kent a tilawin, ttun iniɣ-nkent n yiḍelli.

Tebges tedda d yiɣriben.

S temɣer yerza ɣer Fransa, d akli acḥal yettbabba, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.
S temɣer terza ɣer Fransa, d taklit acḥal tettbabba, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.
S temɣer nerza ɣer Fransa, d aklan acḥal nettbabba, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.
S temɣer terzam ɣer Fransa, d aklan acḥal tettbabbam, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.
S temɣer terzamt ɣer Fransa, d aklatin acḥal tettbabbamt, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.
S temɣer terziḍ ɣer Fransa, d taklit acḥal tettbabbaḍ, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.
S temɣer terziḍ ɣer Fransa, d akli acḥal tettbabbaḍ, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.

S temɣer rzan ɣer Fransa, d aklan acḥal ttbabban, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.
S temɣer rzant ɣer Fransa, d taklatin acḥal ttbabbant, almi ḥfant tqerniyin.

Iɛedda akkin i tmanyin, temmut-as tmeṭṭut-is.

Tis snat mi s-tt-id-uwin, terwi axxam-is ɣef lsas.
Terwi axxam-is ɣef lsas, tmeṭṭut-is tis snat.
Ula d tameṭṭut-is tis snat yečča-tt.
Yečča snat n tlawin uqbel ad yemmet.
Yečča snat n tlawin uqbel ad tent-yetḅeɛ.
Yečča snat n tlawin uqbel ad tent-yeḍfer.

Tiɣmert iɣef isenned d uffal.
Tiɣmert iɣef tsenned d uffal.
Tiɣmert iɣef nsenned d uffal.

Tiɣmert iɣeff tsenndem d uffal.
Tiɣmert iɣeff tsenndemt d uffal.
Tiɣmert iɣeff senndeɣ d uffal.
Tiɣmert iɣeff sennden d uffal.
Tiɣmert iɣeff senndent d uffal.
Yezga yeẓẓel deg wussu, deg sbiṭar neɣ deg uxxam.
Tezga teẓẓel deg wussu, deg sbiṭar neɣ deg uxxam.
Tezga teẓẓel deg wussu.
Nezga teẓẓel deg wussu.
Tezgam teẓẓlem deg wussu.
Tezgamt teẓẓlemt deg wussu.
Zgiɣ ẓẓleɣ deg wussu.
Zgan ẓẓlen deg wussu.
Zgant ẓẓlent deg wussu.
Yeẓẓel deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la yettraju.
Teẓẓel deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la tettraju.
Neẓẓel deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la nettraju.
Teẓẓleḍ deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la tettrajuḍ.
Teẓẓlem deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la tettrajum.
Teẓẓlemt deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la tettrajumt.
Ẓẓleɣ deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la ttrajuɣ.
Ẓẓlen deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la ttrajun.
Ẓẓlent deg wussu, deg tɣeddart la ttrajunt.
Win ixedɛen atmaten-is, am win ixedɛen Rebbi.
Tin ixedɛen atmaten-is, am Tin ixedɛen Rebbi.
Tid ixedɛen atmaten-nsent, am Tid ixedɛen Rebbi.
Wid ixedɛen atmaten-nsen, am wid ixedɛen Rebbi.
Awer yaf iman-is
Awer yaf ixef-is.
Awer taf ixef-is.
Awer naf ixfawen-nneɣ.
Awer tafeḍ ixef-ik.
Awer tafeḍ ixef-im.
Awer tafem ixfawen-nwen.
Awer tafemt ixfawen-nwent.
Awer tafemt ixfawen-nkent.
Awer afeɣ ixef-iw.
Awer afen ixfawen-nsen.
Awer afent ixfawen-nsent.
Azul a Meqqran, yeg Rebbi lferḥ deg uxxam-nneɣ ad yettimɣur yal ass.
Yeg Rebbi lferḥ deg uxxam-nneɣ ad yettimɣur yal ass.
Maxluf mačči d win n zik, iɛawed akk.
Saɛdiya mačči d tin n zik, tɛawed akk.

Neṭṭaxer-as i tissit n ccrab.

Tuɣaleḍ d taxeddamt seg wasmi i temmut temɣart n yemma-m.
Tuɣaleḍ d axeddam seg wasmi i temmut temɣart n yemma-k.

Tettlummu deg yiman-is mi yebḍa d Maxluf.
Tettlummu deg yiman-is mi yebḍa d urgaz-isf.

Nettaru ayen i nettḥulfu deg tmurt ur nesɛi ara ul.
Nettaru ayen i nettḥulfu deg tmurt war tayri.
I uzekka amek ara yili ?
Yiwen ur iwala amek ara yili uzekka.

Amzun deg ṭṭlam i nteddu.

Mi ara d-temmekti kan win i tt-yeǧǧan ad as-ɛerqent akk.
Mi ara d-temmektiḍ kan tin i k-yeǧǧan ad ak-ɛerqent akk.
Mi ara d-temmektiḍ kan win i kem-yeǧǧan ad am-ɛerqent akk.
Mi ara d-mmektiɣ kan tin i iyi-yeǧǧan ad iyi-ɛerqent akk.
Mi ara d-mmektiɣ kan win i iyi-yeǧǧan ad iyi-ɛerqent akk.
Tura mi as-t-id-yerra Rebbi iḥulfa s yiwet n telwit n daxel, s yiwen n lferḥ ur yezmir ara akk ad d-yeglem.
Tura mi as-t-id-yerra Rebbi tḥulfa s yiwet n telwit n daxel, s yiwen n lferḥ ur tezmir ara akk ad d-teglem.
Tura mi ak-t-id-yerra Rebbi tḥulfaḍ s yiwet n telwit n daxel, s yiwen n lferḥ ur tezmireḍ ara akk ad d-tegleḍ.
Tura mi am-t-id-yerra Rebbi tḥulfaḍ s yiwet n telwit n daxel, s yiwen n lferḥ ur tezmireḍ ara akk ad d-tegleḍ.

Ula d Wardiya tfaq-as.
Ula d imawlan-is faqen-as.

Ulac tin ur as-nfaq ara.

Yuɣal d win yettnadin ad issishil tudert ɣef tmeṭṭut-is.
Yezga d win yettnadin dima ad yefhem.
Tezga d tin yettnadin dima ad tefhem.
Zgant d tid yettnadin dima ad fehment.
Tezgiḍ d win yettnadin dima ad yefhem.
Tezgiḍ d tin yettnadin dima ad tefhem.
Tezgam d wid yettnadin dima ad fehmen.
Tezgamt d tid yettnadin dima ad fehment.
Zgiɣ d win yettnadin dima ad yefhem.
Zgan d wid yettnadin dima ad fehmen.
I txeddem dderya tamecṭuḥt!
Dderya tamecṭuḥt tettbeddil tikli n umdan.
Tettarra tikli n umdan tseggem.
Tettawi dima ɣer wayen yelhan.
Akken i tettseggim ɣef yiwen i tettmal ɣef wayeḍ.
Ma yella ɣef yiwen tseggem, wayeḍ ad t-tafeḍ tmal-as.
Ma kečč fell-ak tseggem, nekk tmal.
Ma kemm fell-am tseggem, nekk tmal.
Akken i tseggem fell-ak i tmal fell-i.
Akken i tseggem fell-am i tmal fell-i.
Akken i tseggem fell-as i tmal fell-i.
Akken i tseggem fell-awen i tmal fell-i.
Ma yella fell-ak tseggem, nekk fell-i tmal.
Ma yella fell-am tseggem, nekk fell-i tmal.
Ma yella fell-as tseggem, nekk fell-i tmal.
Ma yella fell-awen tseggem, nekk fell-i tmal.
Maxluf yufa iman-is imi t-yufa mmi-s.

Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-i.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-ak.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-am.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-as.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-awen.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-awent.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-akent.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-asen.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-asent.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-aneɣ.
Skudmal ttibriken wussan fell-anteɣ.
Yesbeɛbeɛ neɣ mazal ?

Seg wasmi i d-yekker akka.

Yuɣal iseggem rray-is acku tamasit ɣef twacult-is tuɣal meqqert.
Tuɣal iseggem rray-is acku tamasit ɣef twacult-is tuɣal meqqert.
Nuɣal iseggem rray-nneɣ acku tamasit ɣef twacult-nneɣ tuɣal meqqert.
Yuɣal iseggem rray-ik acku tamasit ɣef twacult-ik tuɣal meqqert.
Yuɣal iseggem rray-im acku tamasit ɣef twacult-im tuɣal meqqert.
Yuɣal iseggem rray-iw acku tamasit ɣef twacult-iw tuɣal meqqert.
Yuɣal iseggem rray-nwen acku tamasit ɣef twacult-nwen tuɣal meqqert.
Yuɣal iseggem rray-nwent acku tamasit ɣef twacult-nwent tuɣal meqqert.
Yuɣal iseggem rray-nkent acku tamasit ɣef twacult-nkent tuɣal meqqert
Yuɣal iseggem rray-nsen acku tamasit ɣef twacult-nsen tuɣal meqqert.
Yuɣal iseggem rray-nsent acku tamasit ɣef twacult-nsent tuɣal meqqert.
Yuɣal iseggem rray-nneɣ acku tamasit ɣef twacult-nneɣ tuɣal meqqert.
Timzuɣert yesnnejlan Saɛdiya tekcem taɣsert n taggara.

Yuweḍ ɣer temdint n Wahran mi i izgen yiḍ.

A-t-an yudder-ikem-id a tinnat!

Saɛdiya ur tesɛi anda ara terr, dɣa teqqim din daxel n teɣsert.
Ur tesɛi anda ara terr, dɣa teqqim din daxel n teɣsert.
Ur yesɛi anda ara yerr, dɣa yeqqim din daxel n teɣsert.
Ur nesɛi anda ara nerr, dɣa neqqim din daxel n teɣsert.
Ur tesɛim anda ara terrem, dɣa teqqimem din daxel n teɣsert.
Ur tesɛimt anda ara terremt, dɣa teqqimemt din daxel n teɣsert.
Ur sɛiɣ anda ara rreɣ, dɣa qqimeɣ din daxel n teɣsert.
Ur sɛin anda ara rren, dɣa qqimen din daxel n teɣsert.
Ur sɛint anda ara rrent, dɣa qqiment din daxel n teɣsert.
Deg teɣsert i tesɛedda iḍ.
Deg teɣsert i yesɛedda iḍ.
Deg teɣsert i nesɛedda iḍ.

Deg teɣsert i tesɛeddamt iḍ.
Deg teɣsert i sɛeddaɣ iḍ.
Deg teɣsert i sɛeddan iḍ.
Deg teɣsert i sɛeddant iḍ.
Azekka-nni teffeɣ-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Azekka-nni teffeɣ-d s izenqan n yiɣrem, tetteddu anda i tt-uwin yiḍarren-is iwumi tefka lebɣi.
Tetteddu anda i tt-uwin yiḍarren-is iwumi tefka lebɣi.
Itteddu anda i t-uwin yiḍarren-is iwumi yefka lebɣi.
Netteddu anda i aɣ-uwin yiḍarren-nneɣ iwumi nefka lebɣi.
Iettedduḍ anda i k-uwin yiḍarren-ik iwumi tefkiḍ lebɣi.
Iettedduḍ anda i kem-uwin yiḍarren-im iwumi tefkiḍ lebɣi.
Ietteddum anda i ken-uwin yiḍarren-nwen iwumi tefkam lebɣi.
Ietteddumt anda i kent-uwin yiḍarren-nwent iwumi tefkamt lebɣi.
Ietteddumt anda i kent-uwin yiḍarren-nkent iwumi tefkamt lebɣi.
Tedduɣ anda i iyi-uwin yiḍarren-iw iwumi fkiɣ lebɣi.
Teddun anda i ten-uwin yiḍarren-nsen iwumi fkan lebɣi.
Teddunt anda i tent-uwin yiḍarren-nsent iwumi fkant lebɣi.
Azekka-nni yeffeɣ-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Azekka-nni neffeɣ-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Azekka-nni teffɣeḍ-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Azekka-nni teffɣem-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Azekka-nni teffɣemt-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Azekka-nni ffɣeɣ-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Azekka-nni ffɣen-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Azekka-nni ffɣent-d s izenqan n yiɣrem.
Ur teḥsi anda ara terr neɣ anda i tella.
Ur yeḥsi anda ara yerr neɣ anda i yella.
Ur neḥsi anda ara nerr neɣ anda i nella.
Ur teḥsiḍ anda ara terreḍ neɣ anda i telliḍ.
Ur teḥsim anda ara terrem neɣ anda i tellam.
Ur teḥsimt anda ara terremt neɣ anda i tellamt.
Ur ḥsiɣ anda ara rreɣ neɣ anda i lliɣ.
Ur ḥsin anda ara rren neɣ anda i llan.
Anebdu d anebdu s uzɣal-is maca seg yilel Agrakal tettali-d yiwet n tasmuḍi i yerran tignewt tebbuḥra cwiṭ.
Ɣef waya izenqan ttaččaren d imsebriden ur nḥar ara, teddun s lebɣi-nsen.
Imsebriden ur ḥaren ara, teddun s lebɣi-nsen.
Ur iḥar ara, iteddu s lebɣi-s.
Ur tḥar ara, tetteddu s lebɣi-s.
Ur nḥar ara, nteddu s lebɣi-nneɣ.
Ur nḥar ara, nteddu s lebɣi-nteɣ.
Ur tḥareḍ ara, tettedduḍ s lebɣi-k.
Ur tḥareḍ ara, tettedduḍ s lebɣi-m.
Ur tḥarem ara, tetteddum s lebɣi-nwen.
Ur tḥaremt ara, tetteddumt s lebɣi-nwent.
Ur tḥaremt ara, tetteddumt s lebɣi-nkent.
Ur ḥareɣ ara, tedduɣ s lebɣi-iw.
Ur ḥaren ara, teddun s lebɣi-nsen.
Ur ḥarent ara, teddunt s lebɣi-nsent.
Saɛdiya teɛya, telluẓ, lembat ur teẓri anda.
Teɛya, telluẓ, lembat ur teẓri anda.
Yeɛya, yelluẓ, lembat ur yeẓri anda.
Neɛya, nelluẓ, lembat ur neẓri anda.
Teɛyam, telluẓem, lembat ur teẓrim anda.
Teɛyamt, telluẓemt, lembat ur teẓrimt anda.
Ɛyiɣ, lluẓeɣ, lembat ur ẓriɣ anda.
Ɛyan, lluẓen, lembat ur ẓrin anda.
Ɛyant, lluẓent, lembat ur ẓrint anda.
Tebɣa nezzeh ad tesgunfu, dɣa tekcem ɣer yiwen uzaduɣ yehruran cwiṭ.
Yebɣa nezzeh ad yesgunfu, dɣa yekcem ɣer yiwen uzaduɣ yehruran cwiṭ.
Nebɣa nezzeh ad nesgunfu, dɣa nekcem ɣer yiwen uzaduɣ yehruran cwiṭ.
Yettban-d amzun yiwen ur yezdiɣ din, d ilem.
D yiwen n uzaduɣ ur nettwazdeɣ.
Mi tt-tefka tewwurt, tufa-d iman-is daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi t-tefka tewwurt, yufa-d iman-is daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi aɣ-tefka tewwurt, nufa-d iman-nneɣ daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi k-tefka tewwurt, tufiḍ-d iman-ik daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi kem-tefka tewwurt, tufiḍ-d iman-im daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi ken-tefka tewwurt, tufam-d iman-nwen daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi kent-tefka tewwurt, tufamt-d iman-nwent daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi kent-tefka tewwurt, tufamt-d iman-nkent daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi iyi-tefka tewwurt, ufiɣ-d iman-iw daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi ten-tefka tewwurt, ufan-d iman-nsen daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi tent-tefka tewwurt, ufant-d imant-nsen daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Mi aɣ-tefka tewwurt, nufa-d iman-nteɣ daxel n yiwen uxxam.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i tettqeddim ɣer sdat almi i tt-id-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i yettqeddim ɣer sdat almi i t-id-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i nettqeddim ɣer sdat almi i aɣ-d-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i tettqeddimeḍ ɣer sdat almi i k-id-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i tettqeddimeḍ ɣer sdat almi i kem-id-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i ttqeddimeɣ ɣer sdat almi i iyi-d-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i tettqeddimem ɣer sdat almi i ken-id-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i tettqeddimemt ɣer sdat almi i kent-id-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i ttqeddimen ɣer sdat almi i ten-id-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Tafat ulac, s usferfed i ttqeddiment ɣer sdat almi i tent-id-terra yiwen teɣmert.
Din i tdegger iman-is am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i tdegger iman-is am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i idegger iman-is am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i ndegger iman-nneɣ am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i ndegger iman-nteɣ am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i tdeggreḍ iman-ik am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i tdeggreḍ iman-im am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i tdeggrem iman-nwen am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i tdeggrem iman-nwent am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i tdeggrem iman-nkent am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i deggreɣ iman-iw am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i deggren iman-nsen am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Deg yiwet n teɣmert i deggrent iman-nsent am tcekkart n lbaṭaṭa.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d nettat i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur terni ara aṭas yuwi-tt nadam, teṭṭes.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d netta i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur yerni ara aṭas yuwi-t nadam, yeṭṭes.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d nekkni i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur nerni ara aṭas yuwi-aɣ nadam, neṭṭes.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d kečč i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur terniḍ ara aṭas yuwi-k nadam, teṭṭseḍ.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d kemm i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur terniḍ ara aṭas yuwi-kem nadam, teṭṭseḍ.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d kunwi i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur ternim ara aṭas yuwi-ken nadam, teṭṭsem.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d kunemtii i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur ternimt ara aṭas yuwi-kent nadam, teṭṭsemt.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d nekk i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur rniɣ ara aṭas yuwi-iyi nadam, ṭṭseɣ.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d nutni i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur rnin ara aṭas yuwi-ten nadam, ṭṭsen.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d nutenti i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur rnint ara aṭas yuwi-tent nadam, ṭṭsent.
Ɛeyyu n medden akk amzun d nekkenti i t-ibubben ɣef waya ur nerni ara aṭas yuwi-aɣ nadam, neṭṭes.
Mi d-tuki ur teẓri acḥal n sswayeɛ i tgen.
Mi d-yuki ur yeẓri acḥal n sswayeɛ i igen.
Mi d-nuki ur neẓri acḥal n sswayeɛ i ngen.
Mi d-tukiḍ ur teẓriḍ acḥal n sswayeɛ i tegneḍ.
Mi d-tukim ur teẓrim acḥal n sswayeɛ i tegnem.
Mi d-tukimt ur teẓrimt acḥal n sswayeɛ i tegnemt.
Mi d-ukiɣ ur ẓriɣ acḥal n sswayeɛ i gneɣ.
Mi d-ukin ur ẓrin acḥal n sswayeɛ i gnen.
Mi d-ukint ur ẓrint acḥal n sswayeɛ i gnent.
D yiwet n temsirt n umezruy n tegzirin Tikanariyin.
Nekk ɣur-i ablug ma ad tkecmeḍ ɣur-s.
D yiwet n tmeṭṭut i twala Saɛdiya tazwara tɣumm tafekka-s daxel n uḥayek amellal.
Tuɣal mi tekkes aḥayek-nni tettban-d s yiwet n tmelsiwt taqermaḍt.
Uɣalent mi kksent iḥuyak-nsen ttbanent-d s yiwet n tmelsiwt taqermaḍt.
Tuɣal mi tekkes aḥayek-is tettban-d s yiwet n tmelsiwt taqermaḍt.
Tuɣal mi tekkseḍ aḥayek-im tettban-d s yiwet n tmelsiwt taqermaḍt.
Tuɣalemt mi tekksemt iḥuyak-nwent tettbanemt-d s yiwet n tmelsiwt taqermaḍt.
Tuɣalemt mi tekksemt iḥuyak-nkent tettbanemt-d s yiwet n tmelsiwt taqermaḍt.
S tezmert n yimensi-k ula d kečč.
Mačči aṭas aya i d-yeffeɣ ungal-iw "Ccḍeb akked yiẓuran".
S tezmert n yimensi-nwen ula d kunwi.
S tezmert n yimensi-nwent ula d kunemti.
S tezmert n yimensi-nkent ula d kunemti.
S tezmert n yimekli-m ula d kemm.
S tezmert n yimekli-nkent ula d kunemti.
S tezmert n yimekli-nwent ula d kunemti.
S tezmert n yimekli-nwen ula d kunwi.
Ɣef wudem-is aras terra yiwen uzriri qessiḥ nezzeh.
Ɣef wudem-im aras terriḍ yiwen uzriri qessiḥ nezzeh.
Ɣef wudem-iw aras rriɣ yiwen uzriri qessiḥ nezzeh.
Ɣef wudmawen-nwent arasen terramt yiwen uzriri qessiḥ nezzeh.
Ɣef wudmawen-nkent arasen terramt yiwen uzriri qessiḥ nezzeh.
Ɣef wudmawen-nsent arasen rrant yiwen uzriri qessiḥ nezzeh.
Tessewhem-itt tmexluqt-a i d-tufa deg uxxam-is.
Yessewhem-it umexluq-a i d-tufa deg uxxam-is.
D acu i txeddmeḍ akka da ? I as-tenna.
D acu i txeddmem akka da ? I asen-tenna.
D acu i txeddmemt akka da ? I asent-tenna.
Saɛdiya tikkelt tamezwarut am wakken ur tegzi ara acu i as-d-tenna tinna imi s taɛrabt taɣerfant i as-d-tutlay.
Ɛyiɣ, ur sɛiɣ anda ara rreɣ almi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw dagi. I as-terra s taɛrabt taseklant i telmed deg uɣerbaz.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-tessin ara imi urǧin txuleḍ win i tt-yettmeslayen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-yessin ara imi urǧin ixuleḍ win i tt-yettmeslayen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-nessin ara imi urǧin nxuleḍ wid i tt-yettmeslayen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-ssinen ara imi urǧin xulḍen wid i tt-yettmeslayen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-ssinent ara imi urǧin xulḍent wid i tt-yettmeslayen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-tessin ara imi urǧin txuleḍ iɛerbawalen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-ssinent ara imi urǧin xulḍent iɛerbawalen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-ssinen ara imi urǧin xulḍen iɛerbawalen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-nessin ara imi urǧin nxuleḍ iɛerbawalen.
Taɛrabt taɣerfant, ur as-yessin ara imi urǧin ixuleḍ iɛerbawalen.
Tameṭṭut-nni yezririn nnig n llazem, ad tili tugar deg leɛmer Saɛdiya, ahat urɛad teqfil tlatin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, teṭṭerḍeq d taḍsa mi tesla i tnebgiwt ur tuḥtam tettmeslay s taɛrabt n uɣerbaz.
Tameṭṭut-nni yezririn nnig n llazem, ad tili tugar deg leɛmer Saɛdiya.
Ahat urɛad teqfil tlatin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is
Ahat urɛad yeqfil tlatin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is
Ahat urɛad teqfileḍ tlatin n yiseggasen deg tudert-ik.
Ahat urɛad teqfileḍ tlatin n yiseggasen deg tudert-im.
Tameṭṭut teṭṭerḍeq d taḍsa mi tesla i tnebgiwt ur tuḥtam tettmeslay s taɛrabt n uɣerbaz.
Argaz yeṭṭerḍeq d taḍsa mi yesla i tnebgiwt ur yuḥtam tettmeslay s taɛrabt n uɣerbaz.
Tameṭṭut teṭṭerḍeq d taḍsa mi tesla i tnebgiwt ur tuḥtam thedder s taɛrabt n uɣerbaz.
Waqila seg tmurt n Leqbayel i d-tusiḍ akka imi ur as-tessineḍ ara i taɛrabt. I as-tenna tikkelt-a s tefransist.
Seg yiḍelli i d-ṭṭfeɣ tamacint, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-usiɣ ɣer Wahran.
Seg yiḍelli i d-yeṭṭef tamacint, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-yusa ɣer Wahran.
Seg yiḍelli i d-teṭṭef tamacint, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-tusa ɣer Wahran.
Seg yiḍelli i d-neṭṭef tamacint, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-nusa ɣer Wahran.
Seg yiḍelli i d-teṭṭfem tamacint, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-tusam ɣer Wahran.
Seg yiḍelli i d-teṭṭfemt tamacint, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-tusamt ɣer Wahran.
Seg yiḍelli i d-ṭṭfen tamacint, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-usan ɣer Wahran.
Seg yiḍelli i d-ṭṭfent tamacint, d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-usant ɣer Wahran.
Ur ssineɣ yiwen dagi, rewleɣ-d ɣef lehmum-iw, almi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw dagi ɣur-m.
Ur ssinen yiwen dagi, rewlen-d ɣef lehmum-nsen, almi i d-ufan iman-nsen dagi ɣur-m.
Ur ssinent yiwen dagi, rewlent-d ɣef lehmum-nsent, almi i d-ufant iman-nsent dagi ɣur-m.
Ur yessin yiwen dagi, irwel-d ɣef lehmum-is, almi i d-yufa iman-is dagi ɣur-m.
Ur tessin yiwen dagi, terwel-d ɣef lehmum-is, almi i d-tufa iman-is dagi ɣur-m.
Ur tessineḍ yiwen dagi, trewleḍ-d ɣef lehmum-ik, almi i d-tufiḍ iman-ik dagi ɣur-s.
Ur tessineḍ yiwen dagi, trewleḍ-d ɣef lehmum-im, almi i d-tufiḍ iman-im dagi ɣur-s.
Tiririt i as-terra ula d nettat s tefransist i tessen akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-yerra ula d netta s tefransist i yessen akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-nerra ula d nekkni s tefransist i nessen akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-nerra ula d nekkenti s tefransist i nessen akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-rriɣ ula d nekk s tefransist i ssneɣ akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-rran ula d nutni s tefransist i ssnen akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-rrant ula d nutenti s tefransist i ssnent akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-terriḍ ula d kečč s tefransist i tessneḍ akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-terriḍ ula d kemm s tefransist i tessneḍ akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-terram ula d kunwi s tefransist i tessnem akken i ilaq.
Tiririt i as-terramt ula d kunemti s tefransist i tessnemt akken i ilaq.
Nekk, isem-iw Xeyra. I kemm amek i am-qqaren ?
Nekk qqaren-iyi Saɛdiya At Waɛli.
Tura ad am-d-awiɣ ad teččeḍ iban ɣef wudem-im telluẓeḍ.
Tura ad ak-d-awiɣ ad teččeḍ iban ɣef wudem-ik telluẓeḍ.
Tura ad awen-d-awiɣ ad teččem iban ɣef wudem-nwen telluẓem.
Tura ad awent-d-awiɣ ad teččemt iban ɣef wudem-nwent telluẓemt.
Tura ad awent-d-awiɣ ad teččemt iban ɣef wudem-nkent telluẓemt.
Tura ad as-d-awiɣ ad tečč iban ɣef wudem-is telluẓ.
Tura ad as-d-awiɣ ad yečč iban ɣef wudem-is yelluẓ.
Tura ad asen-d-awiɣ ad ččen iban ɣef wudem-insen lluẓen.
Tura ad asent-d-awiɣ ad ččent iban ɣef wudem-insent lluẓent.
Tura ad aɣ-d-tawiḍ ad nečč iban ɣef wudem-nneɣ nelluẓ.
Tura ad aɣ-d-tawiḍ ad nečč iban ɣef wudem-nteɣ nelluẓ.
A-tt-an texxamt n usucef ad tessizedgeḍ iman-im imiren ad iyi-d-teḥkuḍ tadyant-im.
A-tt-an texxamt n usucef ad tessizedgeḍ iman-ik imiren ad iyi-d-teḥkuḍ tadyant-ik.
Aṭas i sliɣ n tedyanin n tid i kem-yecban.
Aṭas i sliɣ n tedyanin n wid i k-yecban.
Aṭas i sliɣ n tedyanin n tid i kent-yecban.
Aṭas i sliɣ n tedyanin n wid i ken-yecban.
Tzemreḍ ad teqqimeḍ yid-i ayen i am-iɛeǧben, meqqar ufiɣ tin ara iyi-ittwanasen.
Tzemreḍ ad teqqimeḍ yid-i ayen i am-iɛeǧben.
Tzemreḍ ad teqqimeḍ yid-i ayen i am-yehwan
Tzemreḍ ad teqqimeḍ yid-i ayen i ak-yehwan
Meqqar ufiɣ tin ara iyi-ittwanasen.
Meqqar ufiɣ win ara iyi-ittwanasen.
Ini-iyi-d ttxil-m ma yella d kemm i iyi-d-yuznen tinnubga-agi.
Ini-iyi-d ttxil-k ma yella d kečč i iyi-d-yuznen tinnubga-agi.
Lufan akken ad qebleɣ 100 i wass.
Efk kečč taqemmuct i uzrem.
Am win yefkan taqemmuct i uzrem.
Am tin yefkan taqemmuct i uzrem.
Efk kemm taqemmuct i uzrem.
Saɛdiya tesmuzgut i teḥdayt tazrirant, tḥulfa i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-tt, skuffuren-tt imi tesla i yimeslayen i as-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Tḥulfa i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-tt.
Iḥulfa i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-t.
Tḥulfaḍ i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-k.
Tḥulfaḍ i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-kem.
Tḥulfam i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-ken.
Tḥulfamt i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-kent.
Ḥulfaɣ i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-iyi.
Ḥulfan i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-ten.
Ḥulfant i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-tent.
Nḥulfa i yimeṭṭawen xenqen-aɣ.
Skuffuren-tt yimeṭṭawen imi tesla i yimeslayen i as-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Skuffuren-t yimeṭṭawen imi yesla i yimeslayen i as-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Skuffuren-ten yimeṭṭawen imi slan i yimeslayen i asen-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Skuffuren-tent yimeṭṭawen imi slant i yimeslayen i asent-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Skuffuren-k yimeṭṭawen imi tesliḍ i yimeslayen i ak-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Skuffuren-kem yimeṭṭawen imi tesliḍ i yimeslayen i am-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Skuffuren-ken yimeṭṭawen imi teslam i yimeslayen i awen-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Skuffuren-kent yimeṭṭawen imi teslamt i yimeslayen i awent-yuwḍen srid ɣer wul.
Tanemmirt a Xeyra. Tbedd ɣur-s tessuden-itt sya u sya.
Tbedd ɣur-s tessuden-itt sya u sya.
Ibedd ɣur-s issuden-itt sya u sya.
Nbedd ɣur-s nessuden-itt sya u sya.
Tbeddeḍ ɣur-s tessudneḍ-tt sya u sya.
Tbeddem ɣur-s tessudnem-tt sya u sya.
Tbeddemt ɣur-s tessudnemt-tt sya u sya.
Beddeɣ ɣur-s ssudneɣ-tt sya u sya.
Bedden ɣur-s ssudnen-tt sya u sya.
Beddent ɣur-s ssudnent-tt sya u sya.
Tamsalt n tmezduɣt tefra, d yiwen uɣilif agejdan i yekksen, i d-yeggran tura d amɛic.
Ahat tidyanin ddrent tlawin am ti, kifkif-itent akk.
Ussan imenza tecba inebgi-nni afessas.
Ussan imenza yecba inebgi-nni afessas.
Ussan imenza necba inebgi-nni afessas.
Ussan imenza cbiɣ inebgi-nni afessas.
Ussan imenza cban inebgi-nni afessas.
Ussan imenza cbant inebgi-nni afessas
Ussan imenza tecbam inebgi-nni afessas.
Ussan imenza tecbamt inebgi-nni afessas.
Uqbel ad as-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-taf ixeddim.
Uqbel ad as-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-yaf ixeddim.
Uqbel ad ak-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-tafeḍ ixeddim.
Uqbel ad am-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-tafeḍ ixeddim.
Uqbel ad awen-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-tafem ixeddim.
Uqbel ad awent-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-tafemt ixeddim.
Uqbel ad aɣ-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-naf ixeddim.
Uqbel ad iyi-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-afeɣ ixeddim.
Uqbel ad asen-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-afen ixeddim.
Uqbel ad asent-teḍru am yinebgi-nni amessas ilaq ad d-afent ixeddim.
Taseddart deg usefru tezmer ad tesɛu 3,4, 6... n yifyar.
Asefru-a ɣur-s 3 n tseddarin, tal taseddart ɣur-s 3 n yifyar. Asefru-a d ameṭẓa, yesɛa ṭẓa (9) n yifyar.
Deg wulawen-nneɣ mazal-it yella.
Anzi-nni ɣef yinebgi yeqqar : « Inebgi n yiwen wass d afessas, inebgi n sin wussan d amessas, inebgi n wussan aṭas ddem-d adebbuz tedduḍ fell-as »
Inebgi-nni n sin wussan d amessas.
Inebgi n wussan aṭas ddem-d adebbuz teɣliḍ fell-as
Tebges ad texdem ayen tufa akken ad tidir d tilellit ur nettuɣal d ttɛebga ɣef walebɛaḍ.
Yebges ad yexdem ayen yufa akken ad yidir d ilelli ur nettuɣal d ttɛebga ɣef walebɛaḍ.
Kemm d taselmadt deg ugezdu n Tubiret.
Azen-iyi-d isefra-a, ad ten-waliɣ.
Yal yiwen ɣur-s tilelli ad yawi ddunit-is akken yebɣa, yamen neɣ yeqqim.
Yal yiwen ɣur-s tilelli ad yawi tudert-is akken yebɣa, yamen neɣ yeqqim.
Ula d kunwi ur txussem ara.
Deg beṭṭu n tmurt-nneɣ, tella tɣiwant, asun, agezdu neɣ aɣir.
Ula d kečč ur txusseḍ ara.
Ula d kemm ur txusseḍ ara.
Ula d kunemti ur txussemt ara.
Tagi d tamedyezt tilellit. Ulac ɣur-s ilugan, aru-tt akken tebɣiḍ.
Wissen ansa i yebda ?
Wissen ansa i tebda ?
Yezmer taktabt akk d yiwen n usefru.
Yezmer adlis akk d yiwen n usefru.
D kemm i yeɣran asefru-a.
Wali ɣef wacu i d-yettmeslay usefru-a. Yezmer lḥal ɣef yiwen n usentel.
D kečč i yeɣran asefru-a.
D netta i yeɣran asefru-a.
D nettat i yeɣran asefru-a.
D nekk i yeɣran asefru-a.
Ula d nekk ur xusseɣ ara.
Ula d nutni ur xussen ara.
Ula d nutenti ur xussent ara.
Maca anta lḥirfa i tessen, ulac anager tin n yiẓeḍwan i d-yessuturen amayendin n ttawilat.
Teksa-tt-id Xeyra, twala-tt-id tcax deg uxemmem, tefhem ɣef wacu akka i tettḥebbir:
Yeksa-tt-id urgaz-is, iwala-tt-id tcax deg uxemmem, yefhem ɣef wacu akka i tettḥebbir:
Ur testeḥqeḍ ara kra n ugerdas i umahil aqdim akk deg ddunit, akka am nekk, d lxedma i xeddmeɣ seg wasmi i lliɣ d tanubit.
D acu-t akka yixeddim-a aqdim akk deg ddunit ?
Saɛdiya txuss cwiṭ deg yidles n timunɛelt.
Ɣriɣ cwiṭ deg-s aṭas aya, waqila tamedyazt-nni d tasurit.
Qqim kan, ad am-slemdeɣ amek ara tezririḍ iman-im, d ayen ara yerren tahuski-nni i am-d-yefka Rebbi tufrar-d, ad d-tjebdeḍ ɣur-m akk imsaɣen yellan.
Qqim kan, ad am-slemdeɣ amek ara tezririḍ iman-im.
Yefka-am Rebbi yiwen tkuski iman-is.
Tamedyazt tilelliit, am tagi, ulac ɣur-s ilugan. Aru-tt akken tebɣiḍ. Tamedyezt tezga deg wawalen.
Xeyra tettkemmil thedder s uwehhi akken ad as-tfek timsirin timenza n usnuzu n tfekkiwin n tlawin deg teẓgi tabuhyut n yimdanen yexḍan tineɣremt.
Tzemreḍ ad t-testeqsiḍ netta xir imi d netta i igan tasuɣelt-a.
Akka kan i as-d-tetarra Saɛdiya s wawal neɣ s usubbu d usalay n uqerruy, d yiwen uwehhi i yebɣan ad d-yini « ih » ɣer Yimaziɣen.
Daɣ netta Imaziɣen iwumi truḥ tutlayt-nsen tamaziɣt uɣalen ttwaɛerben, yezmer yiwen ad ten-yeɛqel ɣer yiwet n tɣawsa, d tigawt i itegen ur ntekkes ara kra ara yekk wakud...
Ma d awal amaziɣ ifessi deg waman aɛrab neɣ afransis am teḥjurt n ssekker, ma yella d awehhi-nni n uqerruy yettalin yettsubbu i d-yeqqaren « ih » yettɣama-d d ticreḍt neɣ d anza n timuzɣa.
Ɣas akken Xeyra tettban-d d taɛrabt s wawal-is aɛrab izerben, maca win igren tamawt ɣef tririt s uwehhi n « «ih » neɣ n « ala » (asenhez n yixef yeffes zelmeḍ d tin i d tiririt ɣef « ala ») i kra n yiseqsiyen ad ifaq d akken d tamaziɣt yettwaɛerben, ɣas ma nettat teḥseb iman-is mačči d tamaziɣt, d taɛrabt.
A-t-an anda i yuḍen yicc-is uɣerbaz n Zzayer ur nselmad ara amezruy n tmurt i tarwa-s.
Ma yella-d uselmed n umezruy n tmurt, ad t-tafeḍ s ucewweh d uɣurru d ubeddel n tidet s tkerkas.
Aḥric ameqqran n yimezdaɣ n Tferka n Ugafa d Imaziɣen, maca nwan iman-nsen d Aɛraben yerna ad ak-d-ggallen imi umnen s waya.
Tuget n yimezdaɣ n Tferka n Ugafa d Imaziɣen, maca nwan iman-nsen d Aɛraben yerna ad ak-d-ggallen imi umnen s waya.
Imezdaɣ n Tferka n Ugafa d Imaziɣen, maca nwan iman-nsen d Aɛraben yerna ad ak-d-ggallen, imi umnen s waya.
Wissen melmi ara d-ldin allen-nsen ad ḥesben iman-nsen akken i ten-id-yefka Rebbi mačči akken i ten-yerra umdan.
Wissen melmi ara d-akin, ad ḥesben iman-nsen akken i ten-id-yefka Rebbi mačči akken i ten-yerra umdan.
Wissen melmi ara faqen, ad ḥesben iman-nsen akken i ten-id-yefka Rebbi mačči akken i ten-yerra umdan.
Tura Saɛdiya iban fell-as, teḥrez awal, awehhi, ansay tkemmleḍ akkin imi imezwura-s srewlen tiḥjurin n ssekker-nsen ɣer tqucac n yidurar akken ur tent-yettawi ara kra n wasif i d-itteḥmalen seg tallit ɣer tayeḍ.
Daɣ netta, tiḥjurin ssekker ar ass-a qqiment akken, beddent, seggment ur fsint, ahat nnmara i izedɣen imawlan-nsent meqqert anect n yidurar i ten-yesdurin, diɣen amzun teddun deg nnzeɛ i wakud aɣeddar ur nettḥezzib i usenger n tgemmi n talsa akken ma tella.
Saɛdiya seg wass ɣer wayeḍ tlemmed aṭas n tɣawsiwin timaynutin am tmeslayt, ansayen d wayen akk yerzan tudert deg temdint tameqqrant am Wahran.
Almi zrin ddeqs n wussan i tegza amek i d-tessasay Xiyra amɛic-is, almi d tura i tefhem d acu-tt lḥirfa taqdimt akk deg ddunit.
Almi d tura i tefhem d acu-tt lḥirfa-a taqdimt akk deg ddunit.
Almi zrin ddeqs n wussan i tegza amek i d-tessasay Xiyra amɛic-is.
Teẓra tura d acu i tt-yettrajun sya d tasawent ma tebɣa ad d-teḥwes taleqqimt n uɣrum-is.
Xiyra tawahranit, txeddem berra, ad tezriri kan iman-is akken i iwata tanezzayt ad tt-tfek tewwurt, alma yeɣli-d yiḍ i d-tkeččem.
Tgellu-d yid-s s lqeḍyan n tɣawsiwin i steḥqent deg snat yid-sent.
Igellu-d yid-s s lqeḍyan n tɣawsiwin i steḥqent deg sin yid-sen.
Tgellud-d yid-k s lqeḍyan n tɣawsiwin i testeḥqem deg sin yid-wen.
Tgellud-d yid-m s lqeḍyan n tɣawsiwin i testeḥqemt deg snat yid-went.
Tgellud-d yid-m s lqeḍyan n tɣawsiwin i testeḥqemt deg snat yid-kent.

Netta yessen ad yextir iceṭṭiḍen ara yernun ɣef sser n Saɛdiya.

Kemm tessneḍ ad textireḍ iceṭṭiḍen ara yernun ɣef sser n urgaz-im.
Nettat tessen ad textir iceṭṭiḍen ara yernun ɣef sser n urgaz-is.

Nekk ssneɣ ad xtireɣ iceṭṭiḍen ara yernun ɣef sser n tmeṭṭut-iw.
Tanemmirt a Xiyra, bezzaf fell-am imi i iyi-d-tuɣeḍ anect-agi akk n lqecc.
Yuɣ-d aṭas n lqecc i umeddakel-is.
Tuɣ-d aṭas n lqecc i umeddakel-is.
Yuɣ-d aṭas n lqecc i tmeddakelt-is.
Tuɣ-d aṭas n lqecc i tmeddakelt-is.
Uɣen-d aṭas n lqecc i uxxam.
Uɣent-d aṭas n lqecc i uxxam.
Uɣent-d aṭas n lqecc i yiman-nsent.
Uɣen-d aṭas n lqecc i yiman-nsen.
I wakken ad d-asen yimsaɣen ɣur-m ilaq tafekka-m igerrzen ad tcebbḥen ugar yiselsa-a yeččuren d initen yemgaraden.
Kkes aɣilif, a wudu kan ad as-zemreɣ i yixeddim i cfiɣ xedmeɣ-t kan d urgaz-iw.

Ur ttagad, aql-i ɣer yiri-m, ayen akk ara twaliḍ d ugur, ssiwel-iyi-d kan ad am-t-kkseɣ sdat-m.
Ur ttagad, aql-i ɣer yiri-k, ayen akk ara twaliḍ d ugur, ssiwel-iyi-d kan ad ak-t-kkseɣ sdat-k.
Ur ttagadet, aql-i ɣer yiri-nwen, ayen akk ara twalim d ugur, ssiwlet-iyi-d kan ad awen-t-kkseɣ sdat-wen.
Ur ttagadem, aql-i ɣer yiri-nwen, ayen akk ara twalim d ugur, ssiwlem-iyi-d kan ad awen-t-kkseɣ sdat-wen.
Ur ttagademt, aql-i ɣer yiri-nwent, ayen akk ara twalimt d ugur, ssiwlemt-iyi-d kan ad awent-t-kkseɣ sdat-went.
Ur ttagademt, aql-i ɣer yiri-nkent, ayen akk ara twalimt d ugur, ssiwlemt-iyi-d kan ad akent-t-kkseɣ sdat-kent.

Tanemmirt, ẓriɣ ula d nekk ala fell-ak i ttekleɣ imi ala kečč kan i sɛiɣ.

Tanemmirt, ẓriɣ ula d nekk ala fell-awent i ttekleɣ imi ala kunemti kan i sɛiɣ.
Tanemmirt, ẓriɣ ula d nekk ala fell-akent i ttekleɣ imi ala kunemti kan i sɛiɣ.

Ayen ara d-yasen yusa-d.

Wehhan-asent i ukkuẓet yid-sent, qerbent-d, yeffeɣ-d yiwen seg-sen, yeldi tawwurt n deffir, kecment, ssersent iman-nsent, takerrust teqleɛ.
Tedda ddeqs deg yizenqan n temdint.
Ddeqs i tedda deg yizenqan n temdint.
