Mi tuweḍ sdat n yiwen usensu i d-yettbanen yeqdem aṭas, teḥbes, subben-d seg-s i rebɛa yid-sen, kecmen ɣef tikkelt daxel n uzaduɣ-nni yehruran.
Mi tuweḍ sdat n yiwen usensu i d-yettbanen yeqdem aṭas, teḥbes, subben-d seg-s i ukkuẓ yid-sen, kecmen ɣef tikkelt daxel n uzaduɣ-nn yehruran.
Mi tuweḍ sdat n yiwen usensu i d-yettbanen yeqdem aṭas, teḥbes, subben-d seg-s i kraḍ yid-sen, kecmen ɣef tikkelt daxel n uzaduɣ-nn yehruran.
Mi tuweḍ sdat n yiwen usensu i d-yettbanen yeqdem aṭas, teḥbes, subben-d seg-s i semmus yid-sen, kecmen ɣef tikkelt daxel n uzaduɣ-nn yehruran.
Ufan din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-sen d acu i bɣan.
Ufant din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-sent d acu i bɣan.
Ufiɣ din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-i d acu i bɣiɣ.
Yufa din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-s d acu i yebɣa.
Tufa din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-s d acu i tebɣa.
Nufa din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-nneɣ d acu i nebɣa.
Nufa din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-nteɣ d acu i nebɣa.
Tufam din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-wen d acu i tebɣam.
Tufamt din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-went d acu i tebɣamt.
Tufamt din yiwen uxeddam deffir n udekkan ameqqran n termest deg ufus yeṭṭef imru, yessuter-d deg-kent d acu i tebɣamt.
Snat n texxamin. I as-yerra yiwen seg yilmeẓyen-nni.
Snat n texxamin. I as-terra yiwet seg telmeẓyin-nni.
Fkan lekwaɣeḍ-nsen i rebɛa, rnan xellsen azal n snat n texxamin, refden tisura, ulin s annag wis krad, nudan ɣef wuṭṭunen 46 d47 n texxamin.
Fkant lekwaɣeḍ-nsent i rebɛa, rnant xellsent azal n snat n texxamin, refdent tisura, ulint s annag wis krad, nudant ɣef wuṭṭunen 46 d47 n texxamin.
Tefkam lekwaɣeḍ-nwen i rebɛa, ternam txellsem azal n snat n texxamin, trefdem tisura, tulim s annag wis krad, tnudam ɣef wuṭṭunen 46 d47 n texxamin.
Tefkamt lekwaɣeḍ-nwent i rebɛa, ternamt txellsemt azal n snat n texxamin, trefdemt tisura, tulimt s annag wis krad, tnudamt ɣef wuṭṭunen 46 d47 n texxamin.
Fkiɣ lekwaɣeḍ-iw, rniɣ xellseɣ azal n yiwet n texxamt, refdeɣ tasarut, uliɣ s annag wis krad, nudaɣ ɣef wuṭṭun 46.
Yefka lekwaɣeḍ-is, yerna ixelles azal n yiwet n texxamt, yerfed tasarut, yuli s annag wis krad, inuda ɣef wuṭṭun 46.
Tefka lekwaɣeḍ-is, terna txelles azal n yiwet n texxamt, terfed tasarut, tuli s annag wis krad, tnuda ɣef wuṭṭun 46.
Saɛdiya tekcem ɣer yiwet n texxamt nettat d win akken i d-inehren takerrust ma d Xiyra d wayeḍ.
Xiyra tekcem ɣer yiwet n texxamt nettat d win akken i d-inehren takerrust ma d Saɛdiya d wayeḍ.
Tal yiwet tekcem ɣer texxamt-is nettat d yiwen n yilemẓi.
Rran-d tawwurt deffir-sen, netta yeqqim ɣef yiri n srir n sin n yimdanen yeṭṭfen talemmast n tɣerɣert, nettat mazal-itt tbedd sdat n tewwurt.
Rran-d tawwurt deffir-sen, nettat teqqim ɣef yiri n srir n sin n yimdanen yeṭṭfen talemmast n tɣerɣert, netta mazal-it ibedd sdat n tewwurt.
Qreb-d tura teqqimeḍ-d yid-i. I as-issuter i Saɛdiya.
Qreb-d tura teqqimeḍ-d yid-i. I as-tessuter i yilemẓi-nni.
Yeɛreḍ ad d-yeṭṭef yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-as gar yiffasen.
Teɛreḍ ad d-teṭṭef yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-as gar yiffasen.
Neɛreḍ ad d-neṭṭef yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-aɣ gar yiffasen.
Ɛerḍeɣ ad d-ṭṭfeɣ yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-iyi gar yiffasen.
Ɛerḍen ad d-ṭṭfen yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-asen gar yiffasen.
Ɛerḍent ad d-ṭṭfent yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-asent gar yiffasen.
Tɛerḍeḍ ad d-teṭṭfeḍ yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-ak gar yiffasen.
Tɛerḍeḍ ad d-teṭṭfeḍ yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-am gar yiffasen.
Tɛerḍem ad d-teṭṭfem yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-awen gar yiffasen.
Tɛerḍemt ad d-teṭṭfemt yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-awent gar yiffasen.
Tɛerḍemt ad d-teṭṭfemt yiwet n sselbaḥa, tecceḍ-akent gar yiffasen.
Saɛdiya truḥ akk deg-sent.
Tilemẓit truḥ akk deg-sent.
Tameṭṭut truḥ akk deg-sent
Taqcict truḥ akk deg-sent
Taḥdayt truḥ akk deg-sent
Saɛdiya truḥ akk deg-sent, almi i as-iɛawed i d-tenddekwal, ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i tella.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i tella.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i yella.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i nella.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i lliɣ.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i llan.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i llant.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i tellam.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i tellamt.
Ad as-tiniḍ mačči akk din i telliḍ.
Tẓaẓ ɣur-s, teqqim ɣer yiri-s, netta ur iɛeṭṭel ara, afus-is yebda yeslaf-as i umzur-is, ahat d acekkuḥ-a i t-yeǧǧan yefren Saɛdiya wala Xiyra.
Ur iɛeṭṭel ara, afus-is yebda yeslaf-as i umzur-is.
Afus yeslafay, icenfiren ssudunen udem n teqcict, tikkelt d taqemmuct, tikkelt, d taḥnakin, tikkelt d tamgerḍt d tferḍaḍt n yimeẓẓuɣen.
Tazɣelt n urgaz skudmal tettali, dɣa yebda itekkes-as iselsa i d-telsa s leɛqel, yeǧǧa-tt ala deg tzerdant taxuxit.
Tayuga n tebbucin-is bḥal snat n teččintin tifayanin rnant-as deg sser i Saɛdiya, iɣeẓẓa-tent deg yixfawen-nsent.
Isgen-itt tinnegnit, mi iɛedda ad as-isubb tazerdant-is, tugi, teṭṭef-it deg ufus-is, tuwi-t ɣer texxamt n waman, tessared-as uzzuf-ines s waman d ssabun, tesfeḍ-as, tesles-as taɣlabt-nni n plastik, terra-t imiren s ussu.
Teṭṭes tinnegnit, yuli fell-as, teldi iḍarren-is s lebɣi-s winna ikcem-itt.
Ittruḥu yettuɣal deg-s almi i t-id-tusa, dɣa idegger-d akk ddemmar-is daxel n tɣellabt-nni n uḥuddu.
S tezmert n yimensi-m a Tajeǧǧigt icebḥen.
Yak ur kem-yuɣ wara ?
Yelha ihi. Ad tt-ikemmel Rebbi akka.
Mi fukken, uɣalen ɣer texxamt-nni n waman, tessared-as tikkelt-nniḍen.
Iḍ ameggaz a Tajeǧǧigt targuḍ i tebɣiḍ.
Yemmeɣ ɣer tteẓdam-is yeddem-d tawriqt n wagim n yidinaren yefka-as-tt, lsan-d iceṭṭiḍen-nsen, ffɣen-d, ufan-d sin-nni ttrajun-ten.
Lsan-d iceṭṭiḍen-nsen, ffɣen-d.
Lsant-d iceṭṭiḍen-nsent, ffɣent-d.
Lsiɣ-d iceṭṭiḍen-iw, ffɣeɣ-d.
Yelsa-d iceṭṭiḍen-is, yeffeɣ-d.
Telsa-d iceṭṭiḍen-is, teffeɣ-d.
Nelsa-d iceṭṭiḍen-nneɣ, neffeɣ-d.
Nelsa-d iceṭṭiḍen-nteɣ, neffeɣ-d.

Telsamt-d iceṭṭiḍen-nkent, teffɣemt-d.

Amek ihi a Saɛdiya? Dayen terẓiḍ asalu.

Ɛawdent irgazen-nniḍen, tikerryas-nniḍen, isensa-nniḍen, xedment akken i ilaq, taggara uɣalent s axxam n Xiyra.
Uwḍent kan s axxam, ssardent iman-nsent s uneqqi, nawlent-d imensi, ččant-t, qessrent cwiṭ.
Uwḍen kan s axxam, ssarden iman-nsen s uneqqi, nawlen-d imensi, ččan-t, qessren cwiṭ.
Nuweḍ kan s axxam, nessared iman-nteɣ s uneqqi, nnawel-d imensi, nečča-t, nqesser cwiṭ.
Ɛawdent-d akk ayen yeḍran yid-sent kra yekka wass.
Ɛawden-d akk ayen yeḍran yid-sen kra yekka wass.
Nɛawed-d akk ayen yeḍran yid-nteɣ kra yekka wass.
Nɛawed-d akk ayen yeḍran yid-nneɣ kra yekka wass.

Saɛdiya send ad tt-yawi yiḍes, d tugna n mmi-s Rabaḥ i d-yettɛeddayen sdat wallen-is.

Ussan imezwura itewwhem, iḥar deg tmeslayt i asen-d-ihedder uselmad-nsen netta d yimeddukal-is.
Yeqqar dima i yemma-s : " Ayɣer ur asen-d-ihedder ara uselmad-nsen s teqbaylit akken nhedder akk deg yixxamen-nneɣ?"
Akka i d tamurt-nneɣ a mmi ur nefki azal i yiman-is.

Tanezzayt igerrzen ɣef win i d-yekkren.
Tanezzayt igerrzen ɣef tin i d-yekkren.
Tura a mmi, ṭṭafar kan ayen i ak-d-yeqqar uselmad-ik akken ad takiḍ, wwet ad tissineḍ akk timeslayin i wen-sɣrayen deg uɣerbaz.
Tura a mmi, ṭṭafar kan ayen i ak-d-yeqqar uselmad-ik akken ad takiḍ.
Wwet ad tissineḍ akk timeslayin i wen-sɣrayen deg uɣerbaz.
Wwtem ad tissinem akk timeslayin i wen-sɣrayen deg uɣerbaz.
Wwtemt ad tissinemt akk timeslayin i went-sɣrayen deg uɣerbaz.
Wwtet ad tissinem akk timeslayin i wen-sɣrayen deg uɣerbaz.
Tura a yelli, ṭṭafar kan ayen i am-d-yeqqar uselmad-im akken ad takiḍ.
Tura ay arraw-iw, ṭṭafarem kan ayen i awen-d-yeqqar uselmad-nwen akken ad takim.
Tura ay arraw-iw, ṭṭafaret kan ayen i awen-d-yeqqar uselmad-nwen akken ad takim.
Tura ay yessi, ṭṭafaremt kan ayen i awent-d-yeqqar uselmad-nwent akken ad takimt.
Tura ay yessi, ṭṭafaremt kan ayen i akent-d-yeqqar uselmad-nkent akken ad takimt.
Ma d tutlayt-ik ma yella ur ak-tt-sslemden ara d nekk i d yemma-k, ihi tuwi-d fell-i d nekk ara ak-tt-isskecmen s aqerruy-ik.
Taqbaylit, d nekk ara k-tt-isslemden a mmi.
Taqbaylit, d nekk ara m-tt-isslemden a yelli.
Taqbaylit, d nekk ara awen-tt-isslemden ay arraw-iw.
Taqbaylit, d nekk ara awent-tt-isslemden a yessi.
Taqbaylit, d nekk ara akent-tt-isslemden ay arraw-iw.
Kkes aɣilif a mmi, ad ak-ẓẓuɣ taqbaylit deg uqerruy-ik u ad temɣi.
Kkes aɣilif a yelli, ad am-ẓẓuɣ taqbaylit deg uqerruy-im u ad temɣi.
Kksem aɣilif ay arraw-iw, ad awen-ẓẓuɣ taqbaylit deg yiqerray-nwen u ad temɣi.
Kkset aɣilif ay arraw-iw, ad awen-ẓẓuɣ taqbaylit deg yiqerray-nwen u ad temɣi.
Kksemt aɣilif a yessi, ad awent-ẓẓuɣ taqbaylit deg yiqerray-nwent u ad temɣi.
Kksemt aɣilif a yessi, ad akent-ẓẓuɣ taqbaylit deg yiqerray-nkent u ad temɣi.
Ahat yiwwas ad d-yehdu Rebbi imḍebbren n tmurt ad ten-id-tuɣal tayri n tmurt, tamurt-nni n yimezwura-nneɣ.
Azul a Muḥendu, tura ad k-in-awḍen yisefra-a.
D isefra ɣef tefsut n Yimaziɣen.
Mačči d Zzayer kan, ddunit merra terwi.
Mačči d Zzayer kan, ddunit akk terwi.
Mačči d Zzayer kan, ddunit akken ma tella terwi.

Mačči d Zzayer kan, amaḍal merrayerwi.
Mačči d Zzayer kan, amaḍal akken ma yella yerwi.

Ma d tura a yelli mazal-iten ttserrifen s wayeḍ mačči s wayla-nsen i ttɣunzun.
Ma d tura ay arraw-iw mazal-iten ttserrifen s wayeḍ mačči s wayla-nsen i ttɣunzun.
Ma d tura a yessii mazal-iten ttserrifen s wayeḍ mačči s wayla-nsen i ttɣunzun.

Uwin-tt srid s axxam n temsulta.
Uwin-kem srid s axxam n temsulta.
Refden ismawen-nsent, gan-asent tiwlifin, taggara rrant izmal-nsent ɣef uneqqis yettwajerden fell-asent, imiren-nni kan uwin-tent ɣer uxxam ameqqran n Wahran.
Refden isem-is, gan-as tawlift, taggara terra azmul-is ɣef uneqqis yettwajerden fell-as, imiren-nni kan uwin-tt ɣer uxxam ameqqran n Wahran.
Refden isem-im, gan-am tawlift, taggara terriḍ azmul-im ɣef uneqqis yettwajerden fell-am, imiren-nni kan uwin-kem ɣer uxxam ameqqran n Wahran.
Tanemmirt, ɣur-i aṭas n lecɣal idelsanen.
Neɛya deg lecɣal.
Ur d-neṭṭif yiwet.
Ruḥent-aɣ akk.
Ruḥent-aɣ akken ma llant..
Ruḥent-aɣ merra.
Ur d-teggri yiwet.
Yiwet ur d-teqqim.
Ur d-teqqim yiwet.
Yiwet ur d-teggri.
Din i d-ggerrint akk tmital-nsent, akka i d taggara n lxedma n uzniq.
D axxam ameqqran i d leqrar n tmenɛal.
Deg uxxam ameqqran i d-ggerrint akk tmital-nsent, akka i d taggara n lxedma n uzniq.
Deg uxxam ameqqran i d-ggerrint akk tmital-im, akka i d taggara n tin i ixeddmen deg uzniq.
Tin i ixeddmen deg uzniq, taggara-s d axxam ameqqran.
Kra n tin i ixeddmen deg uzniq, taggara-s d axxam ameqqran.
Agrud, ɣur-s tutlayt iman-is.
Igerdan, ɣur-sen tutlat-nsen iman-nsen.

Ur qqaren ara yigerdan aksum, qqaren jijju.
Ur qqaren ara yigerdan timellalin, qqaren balala.
Ur qqaren ara yigerdan imi neɣ aqemmuc, qqaren qemmu.

Ur qqaren ara yigerdan ddu, qqaren ddac ɛqac.

Iɣaḍ-it kan lḥal imi ad yebḍu d tmeddakelt-is taqbaylit.
Iɣaḍ-ik kan lḥal imi ad tebḍuḍ d tmeddakelt-ik taqbaylit.

Qqaren: « Ur tettissineḍ anida i yella leslaḥ ».
Wissen anda i yettili leslaḥ ?
Ahat deg yixxamen am wigi i fessus umahil, i tella tezdeg, i temneɛ tezmert seg waṭṭanen izfiyen i ineṭḍen acku tal taggara n yimalas, kra n tmeṭṭut yettmahalen din yettwali-tt umsujji ma yella tuḍen kra n waṭan unṭiḍ s wudem n tuzzuft imi mačči d yiwen i yettɛeddayen fell-as.
Ahat deg yixxamen imeqqranen i fessus umahil, i tella tezdeg, i temneɛ tezmert seg waṭṭanen izfiyen i ineṭḍen acku tal taggara n yimalas, kra n tmeṭṭut yettmahalen din yettwali-tt umsujji ma yella tuḍen kra n waṭṭan unṭiḍ s wudem n tuzzuft imi mačči d yiwen i yettɛeddayen fell-as.
Ahat deg yixxamen imeqqranen i fessus umahil.
Ahat deg yixxamen imeqqranen i tella tezdeg.
Ahat deg yixxamen imeqqranen i temneɛ tezmert seg waṭṭanen izfiyen i ineṭḍen.
Kra n tmeṭṭut yettmahalen deg uxxam ameqqran yettwali-tt umejjay ma yella tuḍen kra n waṭṭan unṭiḍ s wudem n tuzzuft imi mačči d yiwen i yettɛeddayen fell-as.
Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, aḍfar n umejjay yesḍuli i uḥuddu n tmetti akken ma tella imi anṭaḍ n lehlakat am wi ur zegglen yiwen.
Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, aḍfar n umsujji yesḍuli i uḥuddu n tmetti akken ma tella imi anṭaḍ n waṭṭanen am wi ur zegglen yiwen.
Amek ? Mi as-d-tewdeɛ abeḥlus-is ?

Amek i d-yettili yixeddim n tiquḥbit ?

Deg tesga, i yellan d tazeqqa n waman anda i tessirid tmenɛult uzzuf n umsaɣ.
Mi t-tessazdeg ad ɛeddin imiren ɣer wayen i t-id-yuwin.
Tazwara akk ad ixelles ayen ara as-tessuter.

Nettat s yiman-is ur teẓri ara ar tura amek i d-teggra da.

Ar tura ur aɣ-ǧǧin ad nɛeddi.

Yemma d baba tuwi-ten tmettant.

Ɣer wissen melmi ?

Ur rniɣ ara aṭas uɣaleɣ xeddmeɣ am nettat deg yizenqan almi i iyi-d-rran yimsulta ɣer da.
Ur terni ara aṭas, tuɣal txeddem am nettat deg yizenqan almi i tt-id-rran yimsulta ɣer da.
Ur terniḍ ara aṭas, tuɣaleḍ txeddmeḍ am nettat deg yizenqan almi i kem-id-rran yimsulta ɣer da.
Taqsiḍt-im, kemm a Ǧamila teḍra-d i wamayendi n tullas. Ḥku-aɣ-tt-id kan ma ulac aɣilif.
Taqsiḍt-im teḍra-d i wamayendi n tullas.
Taqsiḍt-is teḍra-d i wamayendi n tullas.
Taqsiḍt-nteɣ teḍra-d i wamayendi n tullas.
Yemma tɛawed tissulya mi yemmut baba.
Yemma-s tɛawed tissulya mi yemmut baba-s.
Yemma-m tɛawed tissulya mi yemmut baba-m.
Nekk d uletma Faṭima iɣat-aɣ-d Rebbi s ubabat-nniḍen, akka i nenwa deg tazwara, ziɣen neɣleḍ aṭas.
Mi ara teffeɣ yemma, ittruḥu-d ɣur-nteɣ s tqaqacin, nekkenti ad nettsummu deg-sent netta ad isferfud s ufus-is ddaw yibraɛ-nteɣ, gar yiḍarren-nteɣ.
Akken akken almi d yiwen wass ifleq-iyi, tedduɣ d idammen kra yekka wass, awal ur t-nniɣ la i yemma la i Faṭima.
Akken akken almi d yiwen wass ifleq-itt, tetteddu d idammen kra yekka wass, awal ur t-tenni la i yemma-s la i uletma-s.
Akken akken almi d yiwen wass ifleq-ikem, tettedduḍ d idammen kra yekka wass, awal ur t-tenniḍ la i yemma-m la i uletma-m.
Ula d Faṭima meskint diɣen ur tt-yezgil ara.
Ula d uletma Faṭima meskint diɣen ur tt-yezgil ara.
Ula d uletma-s Faṭima meskint diɣen ur tt-yezgil ara.
Ula d uletma-m Faṭima meskint diɣen ur tt-yezgil ara.
Argaz n yemma yuɣal d argaz n kradet tlawin, yemma d nekkenti deg snat yid-nteɣ.
Argaz n yemma-s yuɣal d argaz n kradet tlawin, yemma-s d nutenti deg snat yid-sent.
Argaz n yemma-m yuɣal d argaz n kradet tlawin, yemma-m d kunemti deg snat yid-kent.
Mi uwḍeɣ settac n yiseggasen deg tudert-iw, rziɣ-d ɣer Wahran ttkemmileɣ ayen yebda deg-i urgaz n yemma.
Mi tuwḍ settac n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, terza-d ɣer Wahran tettkemmil ayen akken yebda deg-s urgaz n yemma-s.
Mi tuwḍeḍ settac n yiseggasen deg tudert-im, terziḍ-d ɣer Wahran tettkemmileḍ ayen akken yebda deg-m urgaz n yemma-m.
Am Saɛida, tamsulta teḥbes fell-i iberdan, tenher-iyi-d ɣer da.
Am Saɛida, tamsulta teḥbes fell-as iberdan, tenher-itt-d ɣer da.
Am Saɛida, tamsulta teḥbes fell-am iberdan, tenher-ikem-id ɣer da.
Tamacahut-iw, i d-terna Rqiya, am tin n Ǧamila maca mačči d argaz n yemma i iyi-ibdan, maca d baba aɛziz.
Tamacahut-is, i d-terna Rqiya, am tin n Ǧamila maca mačči d argaz n yemma-s i tt-ibdan, maca d baba-s aɛziz.
Tamacahut-im, i d-terna Rqiya, am tin n Ǧamila maca mačči d argaz n yemma-m i kem-ibdan, maca d baba-m aɛziz.

Ula d kečč ttḥadar ɣef yman-ik.
Ula d kunwi ttḥadarem ɣef yman-nwen.
Ula d kunemti ttḥadaremt ɣef yman-nwent.
Ula d kunemti ttḥadaremt ɣef yman-nkent.

Ula d nekkni ilaq ad nḥader iman-nneɣ.
Ula d nekkenti ilaq ad nḥader iman-nteɣ.
Ula d netta ilaq ad iḥader iman-is.
Ula d nettat ilaq ad tḥader iman-is.

Ula d kem ilaq ad tḥadreḍ iman-im.

Ma yella mačči d kemm i iyi-tt-id-yuznen ad tt-agiɣ.

Tura a Saɛida ad d-uɣaleɣ ɣur-m. Nesla s tmedyezt-im, aha kan ssiwel-aɣ-d yiwen seg yisefra-inem i d-yettarran abeḥri i turet. I tenna Nna Yamna.
Aha kan ssiwel-aɣ-d yiwen seg yisefra-inem i d-yettarran abeḥri i turet.
Ssiwel-aɣ-d kan yiwen seg yisefra-inem.

Timeddukal n lḥif ɣas ma yella ur fhiment ara taqbaylit, ḥulfant i uglim-nsent yezɣeb imi slant i ssut n tmedyazt tamenɛult yettali yettsubbu.
Hulfant i uglim-nsent yezɣeb imi slant i ssut n tmedyazt.
Hulfan i uglim-nsen yezɣeb imi slan i ssut n tmedyazt.
Iḥulfa i uglim-is yezɣeb imi yesla i ssut n tmedyazt.
Tḥulfa i uglim-is yezɣeb imi tesla i ssut n tmedyazt.
Nḥulfa i uglim-nneɣ yezɣeb imi nesla i ssut n tmedyazt.
Nḥulfa i uglim-nteɣ yezɣeb imi nesla i ssut n tmedyazt.
Ḥulfaɣ i uglim-iw yezɣeb imi sliɣ i ssut n tmedyazt.
Ḥulfan i uglim-insen yezɣeb imi slan i ssut n tmedyazt.
Ḥulfant i uglim-insent yezɣeb imi slant i ssut n tmedyazt.
Tḥulfam i uglim-nwen yezɣeb imi teslam i ssut n tmedyazt.
Tḥulfamt i uglim-nwent yezɣeb imi teslamt i ssut n tmedyazt.
Tḥulfamt i uglim-nkent yezɣeb imi teslamt i ssut n tmedyazt.
Tḥulfaḍ i uglim-ik yezɣeb imi tesliḍ i ssut n tmedyazt.
Tḥulfaḍ i uglim-im yezɣeb imi tesliḍ i ssut n tmedyazt.

Deg tezrawin-is yettkel aṭas ɣef yiman-is acku mačči d amdan aɛeddaz neɣ yettkukrun ixeddim.
Deg tezrawin-iw ttekleɣ aṭas ɣef yiman-iw acku nekk mačči d amdan aɛeddaz neɣ yettkukrun ixeddim.
Deg tezrawin-ik ettekleḍ aṭas ɣef yiman-ik acku kečč mačči d amdan aɛeddaz neɣ yettkukrun ixeddim.
Deg tezrawin-im tettekleḍ aṭas ɣef yiman-im acku kemm mačči d amdan aɛeddaz neɣ yettkukrun ixeddim.
Deg tezrawin-is tettkel aṭas ɣef yiman-is acku nettat mačči d amdan aɛeddaz neɣ yettkukrun ixeddim.
Deg tezrawin-nneɣ nettkel aṭas ɣef yiman-nneɣ acku nekkni mačči d imdanen iɛeddzen neɣ yettkukrun ixeddim.
Deg tezrawin-nteɣ nettkel aṭas ɣef yiman-nteɣ acku nekkenti mačči d imdanen iɛeddzen neɣ yettkukrun ixeddim.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, Rabaḥ d amaɣzal, yefka-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-is.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, netta iga d amaɣzal, yefka-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-is.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, nettat tga d tamaɣzalt, tefka-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-is.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, kečč tgiḍ d amaɣzal, tefkiḍ-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-ik.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, kemm tgiḍ d amaɣzal, tefkiḍ-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-im.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, nekk giɣ d amaɣzal, fkiɣ-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-iw.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, nekkni nga d imaɣzalen, nefka-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nneɣ.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, nekkenti nga d timaɣzalin, nefka-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nteɣ.
Nefka-as i tlelli yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nteɣ.
Nefka-as i tlelli yiwen wazal meqqren deg tudert-nteɣ.
Nefka-as i tlelli yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nneɣ.
Nefka-as i tlelli yiwen wazal meqqren deg tudert-nneɣ.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, kunwi tgam d imaɣzalen, tefkam-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nwen.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, kunemti tgamt d timaɣzalin, tefkamt-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nwent.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, kunemti tgamt d timaɣzalin, tefkamt-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nkent.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, nutni gan d imaɣzalen, fkan-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nsen.
Leqraya ɣas ma tga d aɣilif ɣef medden merra, nutenti gant dt imaɣzalin, fkant-as yiwen wazal ameqqran deg tudert-nsent.

Tettnadi dima ad tegzu tal tamsalt ara d-temmager ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-is n yal ass.
Nettnadi dima ad negzu tal tamsalt ara d-nemmager ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-nneɣ n yal ass.
Nettnadi dima ad negzu tal tamsalt ara d-nemmager ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-nteɣ n yal ass.
Tettnadiḍ dima ad tegzuḍ tal tamsalt ara d-temmagreḍ ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-ik n yal ass.
Tettnadiḍ dima ad tegzuḍ tal tamsalt ara d-temmagreḍ ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-im n yal ass.
Tettnadim dima ad tegzum tal tamsalt ara d-temmagrem ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-nwen n yal ass.
Tettnadimt dima ad tegzumt tal tamsalt ara d-temmagremt ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-nwent n yal ass.
Tettnadimt dima ad tegzumt tal tamsalt ara d-temmagremt ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-nkent n yal ass.

Ttnadint dima ad gzunt tal tamsalt ara d-mmagrent ama deg uɣerbaz, ama deg tudert-nsent n yal ass.

Tura iɛedda i snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, d argaz.
Tura tɛedda i snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, d tameṭṭut.
Tura tɛedda i snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, d tameṭṭut.
Tura tɛeddaḍ i snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-im, d tameṭṭut.
Tura tɛedaḍ i snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg tudert-im, d tameṭṭut.
Tura tɛeddaḍ i snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg tudert-ik, d argaz.
Tura tɛeddaḍ i snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-ik, d argaz.
Tazmert i as-yefka Rebbi tgerrez, ssifa tamelḥant, tiddi iɛeddan talemmast, d anaddal iẓẓewren ladɣa deg turart n ddabax n uḍar, yezga d aɛeggal agejdan n terbaɛt n tesdawit.
Yezga d aɛeggal agejdan n terbaɛt n ddabax n uḍar n tesdawit.
Yezga d anaddal iẓẓewren deg tal turart.
Tezga d tanaddatl iẓẓewren deg tal turart.
Tezgiḍ d anaddal iẓẓewren deg tal turart.
Tezgiḍ d tanaddalt iẓẓewren deg tal turart.
Seg tɣariwin-a i as-issureg Rebbi ur icuḥḥ, tella yiwet tufrar-d : d akayes, yettsetḥi almi kan dayen.
Seg tɣariwin-a i as-issureg Rebbi ur icuḥḥ, tella yiwet tufrar-d : d akayes, tettsetḥi almi kan dayen.
Kliki da : https://aghucaf.wordpress.com/2020/04/30/tutlayt-n-ugrud/ Tutlayt n ugrud Teddem-d tiḥdert n uɣrum seg ṭṭbeq yersen ɣef udekkan, tenna-as: « Amek i as-qqaren i wa a mmi ? -Papa a ya ! -Ala a mmi, ini-d aɣrum. -Aɣ… Aɣrum. -Akken a mmi aɣrum. I wagi amek i as-neqqar ? -Jaja. -Ala a Yidir a mmi, ilaq ad d-tiniḍ iniɣem. -Ini…ɣem. Iniɣem. -Akken a mmi. Ad ibarek Rebbi. Terfed-it-id seg tɣerḍin tessuden-it akk terna tefka-as yiwet n teḥlawat.
Seg tɣariwin-a i as-issureg Rebbi ur icuḥḥ, tella yiwet tufrar-d: d akayes, tettsetḥi almi kan dayen.
Seg tɣariwin-a i ak-issureg Rebbi ur icuḥḥ, tella yiwet tufrar-d: d akayes, tettsetḥiḍ almi kan dayen.
Seg tɣariwin-a i am-issureg Rebbi ur icuḥḥ, tella yiwet tufrar-d: d akayes, tettsetḥiḍ almi kan dayen.

Urǧin tɣull abɛaḍ seg wayen tesɛa neɣ seg wayen tezmer ad t-teg.
Urǧin iɣull yiwen seg wayen yesɛa neɣ seg wayen yezmer ad t-yeg.
Urǧin tɣull yiwen seg wayen tesɛa neɣ seg wayen tezmer ad t-teg.
Urǧin tɣulleḍ abɛaḍ seg wayen tesɛiḍ neɣ seg wayen tzemreḍ ad t-tgeḍ.
Urǧin tɣulleḍ yiwen seg wayen tesɛiḍ neɣ seg wayen tzemreḍ ad t-tgeḍ.
Urǧin nɣull yiwen seg wayen nesɛa neɣ seg wayen nezmer ad t-neg.

Melliḥeḍ armi kan dayen.

Tinin yebɣa ad asen-yini tidet i sin, maca yugad ad yerwi uxxam-is, ad as-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-as.
Tinin tebɣa ad asen-tini tidet i sin, maca tugad ad yerwi uxxam-is, ad as-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-as.
Tinin tebɣiḍ ad asen-tiniḍ tidet i sin, maca tugadeḍ ad yerwi uxxam-ik, ad ak-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-ak.
Tinin tebɣiḍ ad asen-tiniḍ tidet i sin, maca tugadeḍ ad yerwi uxxam-im, ad am-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-am.
Tinin tebɣam ad asen-tinim tidet i sin, maca tugadem ad yerwi uxxam-nwen, ad awen-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-awen.
Tinin tebɣamt ad asen-tinim tidet i sin, maca tugademt ad yerwi uxxam-nwent, ad awent-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-awent.
Tinin tebɣamt ad asent-tinim tidet i sin, maca tugademt ad yerwi uxxam-nkent, ad akent-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-akent.
Tinin bɣiɣ ad asen-tinim tidet i sin, maca ugadeɣ ad yerwi uxxam-iw, ad iyi-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-awent.
Tinin bɣan ad asen-inin tidet i sin, maca ugaden ad yerwi uxxam-nsen, ad asen-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-asen.
Tinin bɣant ad asen-inint tidet i sin, maca ugadent ad yerwi uxxam-nsent, ad asent-tenser telwit i d-yersen fell-asent.

Acḥal d abrid i yeɛreḍ ad d-issenz iman-is, ad d-issureg akk ayen yeffer deg wacḥal aya, maca yettuɣal ɣer deffir, wissen d acu akken i t-id-iḥebbsen ur yettkemmil ara asurif-nni aneggaru ara yerren tilufa akken llant.
Acḥal d abrid i yeɛreḍ ad d-issenz iman-is akken ad yifsus.
Acḥal d abrid i teɛreḍ ad d-tessenz iman-is akken ad tifsus.
Acḥal d abrid i neɛreḍ ad d-nessenz iman-nneɣ akken ad nifsus.
Acḥal d abrid i neɛreḍ ad d-nessenz iman-nteɣ akken ad nifsus.
Acḥal d abrid i ɛerḍeɣ ad d-ssenzeɣ iman-iw akken ad ifsuseɣ.
Acḥal d abrid i ɛerḍen ad d-ssenzen iman-nsen akken ad ifsusen.
Acḥal d abrid i ɛerḍent ad d-ssenzent iman-nsent akken ad ifsusent.

Acḥal d abrid i tɛerḍeḍ ad d-tessenzeḍ iman-im akken ad tifsuseḍ.

Acḥal d abrid i tɛerḍemt ad d-tessenzemt iman-nwent akken ad tifsusemt.
Acḥal d abrid i tɛerḍemt ad d-tessenzemt iman-nkent akken ad tifsusemt.
Wissen d acu akken i t-id-iḥebbsen ur yettkemmil ara asurif-nni aneggaru.
Wissen d acu akken i tt-id-iḥebbsen ur tettkemmil ara asurif-nni aneggaru.

Wissen d acu akken i kem-id-iḥebbsen ur tettkemmileḍ ara asurif-nni aneggaru.

Yenna-as : “Meqqar ad nemwanas, ad tifsus cwiṭ teɛkemt n yinig ma yella tufiḍ win tessneḍ ladɣa ma yettmeslay am kečč".
Yidir, nenwa ad yidir; ad nidir nekkni yid-s.
Deg yigenni, itri yella yettferfir, ɣer lqaɛa, ass-a i d-ires.
Tikli-nni-nneɣ ɣer deffir, s ccna-s, yegull ad tt-yekkes.
Mi yesččeččen tizegatin, iɛeẓẓugen bdun sellen.
Wid yegnen bdan ttakin, ttfaqen mi d-ldin allen.
Mi d-isekfal tiqdimin, nufa-d nesɛa azal ziɣen.
Mi d-isekfal tiqdimin, nufa-d nesɛa ziɣen azal .

Tizlatin-is ffɣent i tlisa, nudant igenni agreɣlan.

Nugi ad necbu medden, nteddu timendeffirt.
Nugi ad necbu medden, nleḥḥu timendeffirt.
Nugi ad necbu medden, tikli-nneɣ timendeffirt.
Deg tɣerɣert-nni n tzeqqa ggran-d ala sin : Rabaḥ d tmenɛult-nni timserrit i t-yugaren ddeqs deg leɛmer maca mazal ɣur-s s wacu i d-tjebbed irgazen.
Deg tɣerɣert-nni n tzeqqa ggran-d ala deg sin yid-sen.
Ɣas ma tettban-d tedda cwiṭ deg leɛmer, maɛna mazal ur tt-yeǧǧi ara sser.
Ɣas ma tettbaneḍ-d teddiḍ cwiṭ deg leɛmer, maɛna mazal ur kem-yeǧǧi ara sser.
Ɣas ma tettbanemt-d teddamt cwiṭ deg leɛmer, maɛna mazal ur kent-yeǧǧi ara sser.
Ɣas ma ttbanent-d ddant cwiṭ deg leɛmer, maɛna mazal ur itent-yeǧǧi ara sser.
Ɣas ma nettban-d nedda cwiṭ deg leɛmer, maɛna mazal ur aɣ-yeǧǧi ara sser.
Wissen d acu i tesɛa tmeṭṭut-nni ur nefriz ijebbed-it ɣur-s am ddkir ijebbed uzzal.
Wissen d acu i tesɛa teqcict-nni ur nefriz ijebbed-it ɣur-s am ddkir ijebbed uzzal.
Wissen d acu i tesɛa teḥdayt-nni ur nefriz ijebbed-it ɣur-s am ddkir ijebbed uzzal.
Wissen d acu i tesɛa tmenɛult-nni ur nefriz ijebbed-it ɣur-s am ddkir ijebbed uzzal.
Nettat diɣ kif kif, d Rabaḥ i tra ad teg yid-s lecɣal-nni.
Nettat diɣ kif kif, d Rabaḥ i tebɣa ad teg yid-s lecɣal-nni.
Nettat diɣ kif kif, d uqcic-nni aqmumsan i tra ad teg yid-s lecɣal-nni.
Nettat diɣ kif kif, d uqcic-nni aqmumsan i tebɣa ad teg yid-s lecɣal-nni.
Acḥal d abrid i as-d-tecmummeḥ akken ad as-tehwu, netta diɣ ur yeqqim ara melba ma yerra-as sserf.
Acḥal d abrid i as-d-yecmummeḥ akken ad as-yehwu, nettat diɣ ur teqqim ara melba ma terra-as sserf.
Iẓaẓ ɣur-s, tefka-as-d afus-is, am yimeddukal iqdimen, kecmen taxxamt-is ur newsiɛ ara aṭas.
Iẓaẓ ɣur-s, tefka-as-d afus-is, am yimeddukal iqdimen, ddan akken cwiṭ deg ugnir aɣezzfan.
Tayuga-a tettban-d amzun tezdi akka seg zik.
Mi ara ten-twaliḍ, ttbanen-d amzun akken i ttidiren seg zik.
Mi ara ten-twaliḍ, ttbanen-d amzun akken i ttidiren aṭas aya..
Win ara ten-id-iwalin akken, ad yenwu d imeddukal iqdimen neɣ tameṭṭut d urgaz-is ɣas ma tettban-d meqqert fell-as.
Ad tenwuḍ, ma twalaḍ-ten, d imeddukal iqdimen.
Ma twalaḍ-ten, ad tenwuḍ, d imeddukal iqdimen.
Yella kra neɣ kra yeffren i yerran timlilit-a gar-asen am wakken aṭas aya i d-tella.
Yella kra neɣ kra d uffir gar-asen.
Gar-asen yella kra neɣ kra d uffir .
Ula d leḥya teɣli-d gar-asen, yiwen ur iṭall wayeḍ srid ɣer wallen.
Ula d leḥya teɣli-d gar-asen, yiwen ur iṭall wayeḍ srid ɣer wudem-is.
Yiwen ur iṭall wayeḍ srid ɣer wallen acku teɣli-d yiwet n leḥya gar-asen anect-ila-tt.
Yiwen ur iṭall wayeḍ srid ɣer wallen acku teɣli-d gar-asen yiwet n leḥya anect-ila-tt.
Maca ḥsan i sin d acu i ten-yettrajun.
I sin yid-sen ḥsan d acu i teddun ad t-xedmen.
Walan d acu ara d-yilin sya ɣer sdat.
Tuwi-t yid-s ɣer texxamt n waman, isubb aserwal-is, yerna tazerdant-is taberkant, yeqqim akken ɛeryan.
D yiwen n usebter n umezruy n yiniɣ ɣef yizerfan n Yimaziɣen.
Walaɣ-tt mi d-tetteddu ɣur-i.
Walaɣ-tt-in mi n-tetteddu ɣur-k.
Walaɣ-tt-in mi n-tetteddu ɣur-m.
Walaɣ-t-in mi n-iteddu ɣur-k.
Walaɣ-t-in mi n-iteddu ɣur-m.
Walaɣ-t-in mi n-iteddu ɣur-wen.
Walaɣ-t-in mi n-iteddu ɣur-went.
Walaɣ-t-in mi n-iteddu ɣur-kent.
Walaɣ-tt mi d-tetteddu ɣur-sen.
Walaɣ-tt mi d-tetteddu ɣur-sent.
Walaɣ-tt mi d-tetteddu ɣur-neɣ.
Nettat, teṭṭef-d amelwaɣ-is s yiwen ufus s wayeḍ teḍla-as ssabun, tessared-as s waman, taggara tesfeḍ-as s usames azeddgan.
Tessared-as uzzuf-ines s waman d ṣṣabun.
Uzzuf-ines, s waman d ṣṣabun i t-tessared .
Tuwi-t ɣer texxamt n waman, tessared-as din leḥwal-is.
Imi tessisdig uzzuf n Rabaḥ, akken ad as-tekkes leḥya i d-yeɣlin fell-as, teɛreḍ amek ara t-id-tessenṭeq akken ad tifsus tegnawt gar-asen, tenna-as : Amek i ak-qqaren ?
Teɛred amek ad t-id-tessenṭeɣ akken ad as-tekkes leḥya i d-yettbanen ɣef wudem-is.
Isem-iw Rabiɛ. I as-yeskaddeb.
Isem-iw Rabiɛ. Netta mačči akka i d isem-is.
Yenna-as isem-is Rabiɛ, netta mačči akken i as-qqaren.
Yenna-as isem-is Rabiɛ, netta mačči akken i as-ssawalen.
Anda i tzedɣeḍ a Rabiɛ ?
Deg tmurt n Leqbayel. I kemm amek i am-ssawalen ?
Deg tmurt n Leqbayel. I kemm amek i am-qqaren ?
Deg tmurt n Leqbayel. I kemm amek i d isem-im ?
Nekk qqaren-iyi Ssusu, d asemẓey n Saɛida.
Nekk ssawalen-iyi Ssusu, d asemẓey n Saɛida.
Nekk isem-iw Ssusu, d asemẓey n Saɛida.
Ula d nettat ur d-tenni tidet ɣef yisem-is.
Ula d nettat teffer fell-as isem-is n tidet.
Ula d nettat, fell-as teffer isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-i isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-ak isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-am isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-as isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-awen isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-awent isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-akent isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-asent isem-is n tidet.
Teffer fell-asen isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-i isem-is n tidet.
Maca i sin ttmeslayen gar-asen s teqbaylit.
Maca i sin heddren gar-asen s teqbaylit.
Maca i sin ttutlayen gar-asen s teqbaylit.
Myeɛqalen d iqbayliyen seg tazwara.
Seg tazwara i myeɛqalen d iqbayliyen .
Uɣalen ɣer tlemmast n texxamt anda yella srir, tekkes ula d nettat tazerdant-is taxuxit, terra iman-is tinnegnit ɣef wussu, tecreɛ imesḍan-is imellalen am udfel iban-d ubeckennar-is iwumi d-zzin wanẓaden iwezzlanen.
Tekkes ula d nettat tazerdant-is taxuxit.
Terra iman-is tinnegnit ɣef wussu.
Tecreɛ imesḍan-is imellalen am udfel, iban-d ubeckennar-is iwumi d-zzin wanẓaden iwezzlanen.
Ɣer lemri n texzant-is i d-iqublen ussu-s tezmer ad twali timeccacin tiɛeryanin, tubrinin n unaddal Rabaḥ.
Yeffer fell-ak isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-am isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-as isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-aneɣ isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-anteɣ isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-awen isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-awent isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-akent isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-asen isem-is n tidet.
Yeffer fell-asent isem-is n tidet.
Nuda-d fell-i, ufiɣ-ten.
Nuda-d fell-ak, tufiḍ-ten.
Nuda-d fell-am, tufiḍ-ten.
Nuda-d fell-as, yufa-ten.
Nuda-d fell-as, tufa-ten.
Nuda-d fell-aneɣ, nufa-ten.
Nuda-d fell-anteɣ, nufa-ten.
Nuda-d fell-awen, tufam-ten.
Nuda-d fell-awent, tufamt-ten.
Nuda-d fell-akent, tufamt-ten.
Nuda-d fell-asent, ufant-ten.
Nuda-d fell-asen, ufan-ten.
Aṭas aya nekk ttnadiɣ fell-ak.
Aṭas aya nekk ttnadiɣ fell-am.
Rabaḥ ibedd sdat-s, mazal ur t-yeffiɣ ara ukukru ɣas ma mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut ara yeṭṭef tameṭṭut.
Ɣas ma mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut ara yeṭṭef tameṭṭut, mazal ur t-yeffiɣ ara ukukru.
ɣas ma mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut ara yeṭṭef tameṭṭut, mazal ikukra cwiṭ.
Assaɣen izfiyen ijerreb-iten d kra n tmeddukal-is n tesdawit, maca tikkelt-a iḥulfa amzun yella yiwen wafud udrig i t-yettseggiren ɣer deffir, yeqqar-as : “Ur keččem ara uzzuf-ihin i k-id-inecden”.
Assaɣen izfiyen ijerreb-iten d kra n tmeddukal-is n tesdawit.
Iḥulfa amzun yella yiwen wafud udrig i t-yettseggiren ɣer deffir.
Ssusu yenwan mazal ar tura ur as-tekkis ara leḥya, tenna-as : « D acu tettrajuḍ ? Awi-d tura lemleḥ-nni n ufus tɛeddiḍ ay amelḥan ad txedmeḍ ayen i k-id-yuwin.
Ɛeddi-d ay amelḥan ad txedmeḍ ayen i k-id-yuwin.
Awi-d tura lemleḥ-nni n ufus.
Awi-d tura cwiṭ n lweɛda.
Sdduqqsen-t-id lehdur i yesla, dɣa imiren kan yemmeɣ ɣer lǧib n tebluzt-is, irfed-d snat tmaḍ n yidinaren yefka-as-tent.
Sdduqqsen-t-id lehdur i yesla.
Imi d-teqɛed ɣef yiman-is akken ad d-teṭṭef idrimen-nni, teṭṭef-d diɣen Rabaḥ deg ufus-is azelmaḍ, tejbed-it-id s leɛqel akken ad d-yali fell-as.
D ayen i yexdem mebla lebɣi-s.
Yekcem daxel-is, ittruḥu yettuɣal acḥal d abrid deg waskiwen-is almi i t-id-tusa s unazeɛ, abunɣal yetturug ɣer daxel n tɣellabt n uḥuddu i as-terra send ad tt-iqerreb.
Yekcem daxel-is, ittruḥu yettuɣal acḥal d abrid deg waskiwen-is almi i t-id-tusa s unazeɛ.
Mi t-id-tusa abunɣal yetturug ɣer daxel n tɣellabt n uḥuddu i as-terra send ad tt-iqerreb.
Azul a Djamal! S teɣzi n tudert-ik.
Mazal yeɣli fell-as imi imiren-nni kan teǧǧa-t cwiṭ tezmert-is, nettat terfed-d cwiṭ iman-is, afus-is yeslaf deffir uqerruy i ucekkuḥ alewwɣan n Rabaḥ, tettnadi ad d-temmager icenfiren-is, tebɣa ad ten-tessuden.
Mazal yeɣli fell-as imi imiren-nni kan teǧǧa-t cwiṭ tezmert-is, nettat terfed-d cwiṭ iman-is, afus-is yeslaf deffir uqerruy i ucekkuḥ alewwɣan n Rabaḥ.
Dɣa mi d-teqɛed iman-is tuwi-tt lwelha ɣer lemri i d-yesskanayen timeccacin tiɛeryanin n urgaz.
Twala ɣef yiwet deg-sent, d tayeffust am yiwet n ccama imalen ɣer tiɣmi taqahwit.
Teqqim tettḥekkir deg ccama-nni, udem-is yettbeddil ini, yettizwiɣ irennu, ul-is yesrubbug s lexfafa, tuɣal tǧelleb-d seg wussu-s ɣer lqaɛa am temcict, teqqim ɣef tgecrar-is deffir n Rabaḥ aɛeryan yettnezzihen kan yerna yedda-as deg lebɣi, teṭall akken i ilaq ccama-nni i twala ɣer lemri ɣef tmeccact tayeffust n urgaz i igan sgellin yid-s assaɣen izfiyen.
Udem-is yettbeddil ini seg zzɛaf.
Udem-is yettbeddil tiɣmi seg zzɛaf.
Udem-is yettbeddil tiɣmi, ittizwiɣ irennu.
Ul-is yesrubbug s lexfafa seg lxelɛa i texleɛ.
Ul-is yesrubbug s uɣiwel seg lxelɛa i texleɛ.
Teṭall akken i ilaq ccama-nni i twala ɣer lemri ɣef tmeccact tayeffust n urgaz i igan sgellin yid-s assaɣen izfiyen.
Amzun yeffeɣ-it leɛqel, tafekka-s merra tettergigi, ladɣa ifassen-is yettmassin tameccact n Rabaḥ.
Amzun yeffeɣ-it leɛqel, tafekka-s merra tettergigi.
Terḥa-tt ccama-nni taqahwit, d yiwen unuɣ yettaken anzi s aferṭeṭṭu.
Ccama-nni taqahwit ɣef tmeccact n urgaz i tt-yeṭṭfen kan sgellin, d yiwen unuɣ yettaken anzi s aferṭeṭṭu.
Tikkelt ad tmuqel ɣur-s tikkelt-nniḍen ɣer lemri i d-yesskanayen tameccact-ines tayeffust yesɛan ula d nettat yiwet n ccama, d unuɣ n uferṭeṭṭu teɣma am tament.
Snat ccwami-a, tin n Rabaḥ d tin n Saɛida neɣ n Saɛdiya xir, kif kif-itent.
Ccwami-nni n sin yid-sen, yettakken anzi s aferṭeṭṭu, kif kif-ient i snat. Ad as-tiniḍ d yiwet.
Tuɣal tcax deg ttexmam…
Tuɣal am wakken truḥ deg-sent.
Temmekta-d amelwaɣ n Rabaḥ, mmi-s ur teẓri acḥal aya, inuda-d akk askiwen-is.
Askiwen i t-irefden seg wasmi i t-yessers baba-s din d tazerraɛt.
Taẓerraɛt yezreɛ ufellaḥ n baba-s Maxluf, tettnnerni trennu almi tuɣal d amdan.
Teddem-it akken Sawdiya deg uɛebbuḍ-is, deg yiman-is, azal n tẓa n wayyuren.
Mi yemmed terwa tiyitiwin i as-d-ittak s daxel-is netttat teqqar : “Anda ara k-rreɣ a lferḥ ?”
Mi tt-id-yebda lewjeɛ n tarrawt, teɛsa Rebbi.
Iteffeɣ-d Rabaḥ seg waskiwen-is, yuɣ-d tawwurt n tuffɣa, nettat tettwajab, tetteqliliḥ, tettebririḥ ɣer Rebbi i tt-id-ixelqen.
Maca mi tessaweḍ ad t-id-tessuffeɣ ɣef tikkelt s yiwen uẓemmi ameqqran, kra din n uqraḥ yuɣal-as d lferḥ.
Tefreḥ mi tella tettrebbi deg-s mazal-it d lṭufan, teqreḥ imi t-in-teǧǧa asmi akken i tennejla ɣer Wehran.
Ass-a, Rabaḥ, yuɣalen d argaz, mebla ma yuki neɣ ifaq ula d cwiṭṭaḥ, yebren ɣer wansi i d-yekka, ɣer daxel n uɛebbuḍ-is, ɣer daxel n waskiwen-is ahat d aya i t-yerran deg tazwara ikukra ad yekcem abeckennar n tin i t-id-yesɛan : yemma-s.
Rabaḥ yuẓam awal, yeqqim yesxecc, ur yefhim d acu i yuɣen Saɛida.
Inwa tedderwec neɣ ɣur-s kra n tezɣent i tt-id-yuɣalen.
Saɛdiya mi tečča tamasalt akken i ilaq, lexbar kan s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is tettberriḥ, tettwejririḥ nettat tettales-d kan i yiwet n tenfalit : “A tadyant i xedmeɣ! A tadyant i xedmeɣ!”
Yidir ad yidir deg wul, yeǧǧa-d ayen ara d-yeqqimen i lebda.
Atmaten ttakken-ak-in azul, ruḥ rnu ɣer ugellid Yugurten.
Atmaten ttakken-ak-in azul, ruḥ rnu ɣer ugellid Massnsen.
Yidir yeǧǧa-d agerruj adelsan.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad yegzem iẓuran-iw.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad iyi-beddel s wayeḍ.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad iyi-yerr d wayeḍ.
Akken i lliɣ ara qqimeɣ.
Tebɣam ad aɣ-tneṭlem, maca nekkni nga am yirden.
Wissen acimi i tebɣam ad aɣ-tekksem akken ma nella.
Teḍra yid-wen am yiɣyal, deg tbardiwin-nwen i tettettem.
Yekreh iman-is, yekker yuɣal d wayeḍ.
Iɣucc iman-is, yekker yuɣal d wayeḍ.
A win ur nesɛi ara nnif, ayɣer i tettuḍ iman-ik.
A win ur nesɛi ara anzaren, ayɣer i tettuḍ iman-ik.
A win ur nesɛi ara nnif, ayɣer i tkerheḍ iman-ik.
A win ur nesɛi ara nnif, ayɣer i tɣucceḍ iman-ik.
A win ur nesɛi ara anzaren, ayɣer i tkerheḍ iman-ik.
A win ur nesɛi ara anzaren, ayɣer i tɣucceḍ iman-ik.
Ruḥem ad teskeydem iman-nwen, ad tafem iman-nwen, ad tafem mačči d widak i tenwam ad tilim.
Xedmeṭ akayad n ADN, ad twalim d acu-ken.
Ẓẓewrem txedmem akayad n ADN, ad twalim d acu-ken.
Ẓẓewret txedmem akayad n ADN, ad twalim d acu-ken.
Ẓẓewrem xedmet akayad n ADN, ad twalim d acu-ken.
Ẓẓewrem xedmem akayad n ADN, ad twalim d acu-ken.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ asefru, win yessakayen tafrit.
Asefru i bɣiɣ ad aruɣ d win yessakayen tafrit.
Anda yella lbaṭel ad t-yeɛnu, ad t-yeqleb tinnegnit.
Anda yella miḥyaf ad t-yeɛnu, ad t-yeqleb tinnegnit.
Anda tella tmuḥeqranit ad tt-yeɛnu, ad tt-yeqleb tinnegnit.
Anda yella ujujru ad t-yeɛnu, ad t-yeqleb tinnegnit.
Anda tella truɣdemt ad tt-yeɛnu, ad tt-yeqleb tinnegnit.
Fell-as imru ad yettaru alma ur t-id-tettaf tmeddit.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ asefru, ad t-ɣren merra medden.
Asefru ara aruɣ, bɣiɣ ad t-ɣren akk medden.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i nettaru, amek i kuffren wulawen.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i nettḥulfu mi nettaru.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i yettḥulfu mi yettaru.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i tettḥulfu mi tettaru.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i ttḥulfuɣ mi ttaruɣ.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i ttḥulfun mi ttarun.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i ttḥulfunt mi ttarunt.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i tettḥulfuḍ mi tettaruḍ.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i tettḥulfum mi tettarum.
Ad ḥsun medden d acu i tettḥulfumt mi tettarumt.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ asefru, laẓ ur yettaf iman-is.
Laẓ ad yexleɛ ma yesla i usefra ara aruɣ fell-as.
Laẓ ad yerfed ifassen-is ma yesla i usefra ara aruɣ fell-as.
Ɣef yigellil kullec ad yefru, tawant ad d-terzu s ixef-is.
Tawant ad terzu s ixef n yigellil.
Iman-is kan ad icennu, dayen yerwa uɛebbuḍ-is.
Ad yuɣal yigellil ad icennu, dayen yerwa uɛebbuḍ-is.
Ad yuɣal umeɣbun ad icennu, dayen yerwa uɛebbuḍ-is.
Ad yuɣal umattar ad icennu, dayen yerwa uɛebbuḍ-is.
Ad yuɣal ubudali ad icennu, dayen yerwa uɛebbuḍ-is.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef yiwaɣezniwen, mačči wid n tmucuha.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef tteryulat, Mačči tid n tmucuha.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef yiwaɣezniwen, wigi iteddun ɣef yiḍarren, ttarran imdanen bbehban.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef yiwaɣezniwen iteddun ɣef sin n yiḍarren.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef tteryulat iteddun ɣef sin n yiḍarren.
Iwaɣzniwen, s udrim ssemɣin-d afriwen, ttaffgen amzun i lebda.
Tteryulat, s udrim ssemɣint-d afriwen, ttaffgent amzun i lebda.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef ugdud, yettuɣalen kan deg rrif.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef ugdud, yettaṭtafen kan taqernit.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef ugdud, iwimi rrant takmamt ɣef yimi.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef ugdud, yettwaɣurren deg tlelli-s.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef ugdud, yettwaɣurren deg tutlayt-is.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef ugdud, yettwaɣurren deg yizerfan-is.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef ugdud, yettwaɣurren deg umezruy-ines.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef ugdud, yettwaɣurren deg wayla-s.
D agdud i yewwten lbarud, yeggra-d tura meskin deg uɣilif.
D agdud i yennuɣen d ucengu, yeggra-d tura meskin deg uɣilif.
D agdud i yennuɣen d ucengu, tura yeggra-d meskin deg uɣilif.
Ad as-tiniḍ yuwi ugdud ddnub, mi as-ɛebban zzebra n lḥif.
Ad as-tiniḍ agdud yuwi ddnub, mi as-ɛebban zzebra n lḥif.
Ɛebban-as i ugdud ẓẓebra n lḥif.
Ɛebban-as i ugdud ẓẓebra n wurfan.
Ɛebban-as i ugdud ẓẓebra n yiɣilifen.
Ɛebban-as i ugdud ẓẓebra n ddemmar.
Ɛebban-as i ugdud ẓẓebra n lmeḥna.
Ɛebban-as i ugdud ẓẓebra n lemḥani.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef uzekka, wissen iṭij ma ad d-yali.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef uzekka, wissen ma ad t-id-iwali wass.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef uzekka, wissen ma da iseggem.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef uzekka, wissen ma ad yeɣli lbaṭel.
Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ɣef uzekka, wissen ma ad yekkes lbaṭel.

Tudert i nedder tfuḥ, tafat ur aɣ-d-tettwali.
Tudert i nedder ur telhi, tafat ur aɣ-d-tettwali.
Tudert i nedder terka, nerwa tillas.

Ur nettɣimi kan akka nugad, tlaq tebɣest ad aɣ-d-tali.
Ur nettɣimi kan akka nettagad, tlaq tebɣest ad aɣ-d-tali.

Ggugin-d ɣef tikkelt ɣer berra.

Tameṭṭut ur nemlik ara iman-is teẓdem ɣer berra kan akken d taɛeryant.
Taḥdaytt ur nemlik ara iman-is teẓdem ɣer berra kan akken d taɛeryant.
Taqcict ur nemlik ara iman-is teẓdem ɣer berra kan akken d taɛeryant.

Taqcictt yeffeɣ leɛqel teẓdem ɣer berra kan akken d taɛeryant.
Taḥdayt yeffeɣ leɛqel teẓdem ɣer berra kan akken d taɛeryant.

Tameṭṭut ur nemlik ara iman-is, kan akken d tabuɛeryant tettrabaɛ deg yizenqan n Wahran nettat tettberriḥ: « A tawaɣit i xedmeɣ! A tawaɣit i xedmeɣ! »
Tameṭṭut, kan akken d tabuɛeryant tettrabaɛ deg yizenqan n Wahran.
Tettazzal, tettberriḥ : « A tawaɣit i xedmeɣ! A tawaɣit i xedmeɣ! »
Ittazzal, ittberriḥ : « A tawaɣit i xedmeɣ! A tawaɣit i xedmeɣ! »
Nettazzal, nettberriḥ : « A tawaɣit i nexdem! A tawaɣit i nexdem! »
Tettazzaleḍ, tettberriḥeḍ : « A tawaɣit i xedmeɣ! A tawaɣit i xedmeɣ! »
Tettazzalem, tettberriḥem : « A tawaɣit i nexdem! A tawaɣit i nexdem! »
Tettazzalemt, tettberriḥemt : « A tawaɣit i nexdem! A tawaɣit i nexdem! »

Ttazzalent, ttberriḥent : « A tawaɣit i nexdem! A tawaɣit i nexdem! »

Ma yebɣia ad iɣer asefru akken ma yella, Tuwi-d fell-as ad yekcem s ablug-iw "aghucaf".
Ma nebɣa ad nɣer asefru akken ma yella, tuwi-d fell-aneɣ ad nekcem s ablug "aghucaf".
Ma nebɣa ad nɣer asefru akken ma yella, tuwi-d fell-anteɣ ad nekcem s ablug "aghucaf".
Tanemmirt i tis snat tikal.
Tessneḍ tura tansa.
Tura tessneḍ tansa.
Tansa, tura tessneḍ-tt.
Deg ublug-a tella tmedyezt s waṭas, timucuha, tullisin d kra n yiḍrisen imeẓẓyanen.
Ɣer ɣef yiman-ik.
Ɣrem ɣef yiman-nwen.
Ɣremt ɣef yiman-nwent.
Ɣret ɣef yiman-nwen.
Ɣremt ɣef yiman-nkent.
Aru ɣef yiman-ik.
Aru ɣef yiman-im.
Ɣer ɣef yiman-im.
Mi ara ɣreɣ asefru yesɛan azal, ttafeɣ iman-iw.
Mi ara iɣer asefru yesɛan azal, ittaf iman-is.
Mi ara tɣer asefru yesɛan azal, tettaf iman-is.
Mi ara nɣer asefru yesɛan azal, nettaf iman-nneɣ.
Mi ara nɣer asefru yesɛan azal, nettaf iman-nteɣ.
Mi ara ɣren asefru yesɛan azal, ttafen iman-nsen.
Mi ara ɣrent asefru yesɛan azal, ttafent iman-nsent.
Mi ara teɣreḍ asefru yesɛan azal, tettafeḍ iman-ik.
Mi ara teɣreḍ asefru yesɛan azal, tettafeḍ iman-im.
Mi ara teɣrem asefru yesɛan azal, tettafem iman-nwen.
Mi ara teɣremt asefru yesɛan azal, tettafemt iman-nwent.
Mi ara teɣremt asefru yesɛan azal, tettafemt iman-nkent.
Ar tura ttakken azal i tkerkas, ǧǧan tidet.
Yiwen n ubrid kan i ttaɣen.
D abrid-nni kan i ten-yettawin.
Lekteb ameqqran yersen deg tmendawt n Zzayer : Zzayer d tamurt taɛrabt.
Akal n Zzayer d aɛrab, a-t-a lekteb n usenfar n tmendawt n tmurt-nneɣ.
Ar ass-a neqqen ɣer tmura taɛrabin ɣas ma mačči d Aɛraben i nella.
Ar ass-a neqqen ɣer tmura taɛrabin ɣas ma nekkni d Imaziɣen.
Ar tura neqqen ɣer tmura taɛrabin ɣas ma nekkni d Imaziɣen.
Ar tura neqqen ɣer tmura taɛrabin ɣas ma mačči d Aɛraben i nella.
Melmi akka tura ara aɣ-d-walin akken nella ?
Melmi akka tura ad ḥebsen lekdubat-nsen ?
Nekk d Amaziɣ, nutni ttwalin-iyi-d d Aɛrab.
Ala, nekk mačči d Aɛrab.
Nekk d Amaziɣ.
Nekk d Aqbayli, bɣu neɣ qqim.
Nekk d Amaziɣ, bɣu neɣ qqim.
Amezruy yeqqar-d nekk d Amaziɣ, kečč s tsertit tebɣiḍ ad iyi-terreḍ d Aɛrab.
D acu-t tura Wagi ? La ak-d-qqareɣ nekk d Amaziɣ.
D acu-t tura Wagi ? La ak-d-qqareɣ nekk mačči d Aɛrab.
D acu-t tura Wagi ? La ak-d-neqqar nekkni mačči d Aɛraben.
D acu-t tura Wagi ? La ak-d-neqqar nekkni d Imaziɣen.
D acu-t tura Wagi ? La awen-neqqar nekkni d Imaziɣen.
D acu-t tura Wagi ? La awen-neqqar nekkni mačči d Aɛraben.
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-aneɣ ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-anteɣ ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-i ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-ak ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-am ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-as ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-awen ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-awent ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-akent ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-asen ?
Wissen melmi ara kfun lekdubat-a fell-asent ?
Lufan ur telli ara tmurt n Leqbayel, wigi ad tt-id-snulfun.
Taqbaylit tezga d tiẓẓit deg taɣect n udabu.
Taqbaylit am tiẓẓit, tezga tewḥel deg taɣect n udabu.
Taqbaylit am tiẓẓit, tezga tewḥel deg taɣect n yimdebbren-nneɣ.
Tberri yemma ibawen s tessirt.
Yezmer lḥal "abruy" seg umyag-a "berri" i d-yekka imi abruy yebɣa ad d-yini taɣawsa-nni tamecṭuḥt akk.
Ttekleɣ fell-ak.
Ala fell-am i ttekleɣ.
Ala fell-as i ttekleɣ.
Ala fell-awen i ttekleɣ.
Almi i k-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-ak.
Ala fell-awent i ttekleɣ.
Ala fell-akent i ttekleɣ.
Ala fell-asen i ttekleɣ.
Ala fell-asent i ttekleɣ.
Ala fell-i i yettkel.
Ala fell-i i tettkel.
Ala fell-aneɣ i yettkel.
Ala fell-aneɣ i tettkel.
Ala fell-anteɣ i yettkel.
Ala fell-anteɣ i tettkel.
Ala fell-awen i yettkel.
Ala fell-awen i tettkel.
Ala fell-awent i yettkel.
Ala fell-awent i tettkel.
Ala fell-akent i yettkel.
Ala fell-akent i tettkel.
Ala fell-asen i tettkel.
Ala fell-asen i yettkel.
Ala fell-asent i tettkel.
Ala fell-asent i yettkel.
Almi i kem-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-am.
Almi i t-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-as.
Almi i tt-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-as.
Almi i ten-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-asen.
Almi i tent-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-asent.
Almi i ken-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-awen.
Almi i kent-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-awent.
Almi i kent-ssneɣ i ttekleɣ fell-akent.
Almi i iyi-yessen i yettkel fell-i.
Almi i iyi-tessen i tettkel fell-i.
Almi i aɣ-yessen i yettkel fell-aneɣ.
Almi i aɣ-tessen i tettkel fell-aneɣ.
Almi i aɣ-yessen i yettkel fell-anteɣ.
Almi i aɣ-tessen i tettkel fell-anteɣ.
Almi i k-yessen i yettkel fell-ak.
Almi i k-tessen i tettkel fell-ak.
Almi i kem-yessen i yettkel fell-am.
Almi i kem-tessen i tettkel fell-am.
Almi i t-yessen i yettkel fell-as.
Almi i t-tessen i tettkel fell-as.
Almi i tt-yessen i yettkel fell-as.
Almi i tt-tessen i tettkel fell-as.
Almi i ten-yessen i yettkel fell-asen.
Almi i ten-tessen i tettkel fell-asen.
Almi i tent-tessen i tettkel fell-asent.
Almi i tent-yessen i yettkel fell-asent.
Almi i kent-tessen i tettkel fell-awent.
Almi i kent-yessen i yettkel fell-awent.
Almi i kent-yessen i yettkel fell-akent.
Almi i kent-tessen i tettkel fell-akent.
Tanemmirt a Sehrane mi d-trezfeḍ s ablug-iw.
Ssarameɣ kemm d twacult-im tgerrzem.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad k-isemmi akka neɣ akken-nniḍen.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad m-isemmi akka neɣ akken-nniḍen.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad s-isemmi akka neɣ akken-nniḍen.
Kečč tumneḍ s yiman-ik, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Kemm tumneḍ s yiman-im, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Netta yumen s yiman-is, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Nettat tumen s yiman-is, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Nekkni numen s yiman-nneɣ, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Nekkenti numen s yiman-nteɣ, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Kunwi tumnem s yiman-nwen, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Kunemti tumnemt s yiman-nwent, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Kunemti tumnemt s yiman-nkent, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Nekk umneɣ s yiman-iw, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Nutni umnen s yiman-nsen, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Nutenti umnent s yiman-nsent, anef i wiyiḍ ad hedren.
Taferka n Ugafa akken ma tella d tamaziɣt ɣas ma aḥric ameqqran ihedder taɛrabt dderǧa.
Ulac amgired gar tmendawt i d-seḥlulin deg sinima d tin n wass-a.
Nniɣ-awen-d, akk i d nutni.
Akka i d nutni seg zik n zik.
Wissen acimi ugin ad ɛeqlen iman-nsen.
Wissen acimi ugint ad ɛeqlent iman-nsent.
Wissen acimi tugim ad tɛeqlem iman-nwen.
Wissen acimi tugimt ad tɛeqlemt iman-nwent.
Wissen acimi tugimt ad tɛeqlemt iman-nkent.
Wissen acimi tugiḍ ad tɛeqleḍ iman-ik.
Wissen acimi tugiḍ ad tɛeqleḍ iman-im.
Wissen acimi tugi ad teɛqel iman-is.
Wissen acimi yugi ad yeɛqel iman-is.
Wissen acimi ugiɣ ad ɛeqlen iman-iw.
Wissen acimi nugi ad neɛqel iman-nneɣ.
Wissen acimi nugi ad neɛqel iman-nteɣ.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-i : Terra-iyi tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-k : Terra-ak tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-am : Terra-kem tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-as : Terra-t tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-as : Terra-tt tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-asen : Terra-ten tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-asent : Terra-tent tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-awen : Terra-ken tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-awent : Terra-kent tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-akent : Terra-kent tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-aneɣ : Terra-aɣ tmara.
Wissen melmi ara ifakk fell-anteɣ : Terra-aɣ tmara.
Ur iyi-terri ara tmara ad ǧǧeɣ tamagit-iw.
Ur aɣ-terri ara tmara ad neǧǧ tamagit-nneɣ.
Ur aɣ-terri ara tmara ad neǧǧ tamagit-nteɣ.
Ur ten-terri ara tmara ad ǧǧen tamagit-nsen.
Ur ten-terri ara tmara ad ǧǧent tamagit-nsent.
Ur t-terri ara tmara ad yeǧǧ tamagit-is.
Ur tt-terri ara tmara ad teǧǧ tamagit-is.
Ur k-terri ara tmara ad teǧǧeḍ tamagit-ik.
Ur kem-terri ara tmara ad teǧǧeḍ tamagit-im.
Ur ken-terri ara tmara ad teǧǧem tamagit-nwen.
Ur kent-terri ara tmara ad teǧǧemt tamagit-nwent.
Ur kent-terri ara tmara ad teǧǧemt tamagit-nkent.
Win yettcaxen deg-i ur yettmeslay ara tameslayt-iw.
Win yettcaxen deg-i ur yettutlay ara tutlayt-iw.
Win yettcaxen deg-i ur ihedder ara akken heddreɣ.
Win yettcaxen deg-k ur ihedder ara akken theddreḍ.
Win yettcaxen deg-m ur ihedder ara akken theddreḍ.
Win yettcaxen deg-s ur ihedder ara akken ihedder.
Win yettcaxen deg-s ur ihedder ara akken thedder.
Win yettcaxen deg-nneɣ ur ihedder ara akken nhedder.
Win yettcaxen deg-nteɣ ur ihedder ara akken nhedder.
Win yettcaxen deg-sen ur ihedder ara akken heddren.
Win yettcaxen deg-sent ur ihedder ara akken heddrent.
Win yettcaxen deg-wen ur ihedder ara akken theddrem.
Win yettcaxen deg-went ur ihedder ara akken theddremt.
Win yettcaxen deg-kent ur ihedder ara akken theddremt.
Mi ara yaḍen yiwen, ladɣa deg uqerruy, ur iẓerr ara d acu i d-iqqar.
Mi ara yaḍen yiwen, ladɣa deg yixef, ur iẓerr ara d acu i d-iqqar.
Mi ara taḍen yiwet, ladɣa deg uqerruy, ur tẓerr ara d acu i d-teqqar.
Mi ara taḍen yiwet, ladɣa deg yixef, ur tẓerr ara d acu i d-teqqar.
Yewɛer waṭṭan.
Ulac ayen n diri am waṭṭan.
Tamurt-nneɣ tuḍen.
Tamurt-nneɣ, ar ass-a ur tufi iman-is.
Tamurt-nneɣ, ar tura ur tufi iman-is.
Wissen d acu akka i tt-yuɣen tmurt-iw ?
Wissen d acu i yuɣen tmurt-iw ?
Walaɣ-t yettaker, mi yegull umneɣ-t.
Walaɣ-tt tettaker, mi tegull umneɣ-tt.
Walaɣ-ten ttakren, mi gullen umneɣ-ten.
Walaɣ-tent ttakrent, mi gullent umneɣ-tent.
Walaɣ-k tettakreḍ, mi tegulleḍ umneɣ-k.
Walaɣ-kem tettakreḍ, mi tegulleḍ umneɣ-kem.
Walaɣ-ken tettakrem, mi tegullem umneɣ-ken.
Walaɣ-ketn tettakremt, mi tegullemt umneɣ-kent.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara fell-am.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara fell-as.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara fell-asen.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara fell-asent.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara fell-awen.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara fell-awent.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara fell-akent.
Win i iyi-iḥemmlen yeddu yid-i.
Tin i iyi-iḥemmlen teddu yid-i.
Wid i iyi-iḥemmlen, ddun yid-i.
Tid i iyi-iḥemmlen, ddutn yid-i.
Tin i k-iḥemmlen teddu yid-k.
Tid i k-iḥemmlen ddunt yid-k.
Win i k-iḥemmlen yeddu yid-k.
Wid i k-iḥemmlen ddun yid-k.
Win i kem-iḥemmlen yeddu yid-m.
Tin i kem-iḥemmlen teddu yid-m.
Wid i kem-iḥemmlen ddun yid-m.
Tid i kem-iḥemmlen ddunt yid-m.
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad k-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad kem-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad t-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad tt-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad iyi-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad ten-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad tent-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad ken-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Amek i tebɣiḍ ad kent-iḥemmel win ikerhen iman-is ?
Win ikerhen iman-is, ur izemmer ad yeḥmmel wayeḍ.
Tin ikerhen iman-is, ur tzemmer ad teḥmmel wayeḍ.
Tid ikerhen iman-nsent, ur zemmrent ad ḥemmlent wiyaḍ.
Wid ikerhen iman-nsen, ur zemmren ad ḥemmlen wiyaḍ.
Yenna-as : "Tamurt-iw tuḍen, ugadeɣ d nekk i d asfel-ines."
Yenna-as : "Tamurt-iw tuḍen, ugadeɣ d tamaziɣt i d asfel-ines."
Yenna-as : "Tuḍen tmurt-iw, ugadeɣ d tamaziɣt i d asfel-ines."
Yenna-as : "Tuḍen tmurt-iw, ugadeɣ d nekk i d asfel-ines."
Yenna-as : "Tuḍen tmurt-iw, ugadeɣ d timuzɣa i d asfel-ines."
Yenna-as :"Tamurt-iw tuḍen, ugadeɣ d timuzɣa i d asfel-ines."
Yeqber wul.
Ttḥulfuɣ am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-iw.
Ttḥulfun am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nsen.
Ttḥulfunt am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nsent.
Tettḥulfu am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-is.
Yettḥulfu am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-is.
Nettḥulfu am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nneɣ.
Nettḥulfu am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nteɣ.
Yuɣal uqelmun ɣer yiḍarren.
Tettḥulfuḍ am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-ik.
Tettḥulfum am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nwen.
Tettḥulfumt am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nwent.
Tettḥulfumt am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nkent.
Tettḥulfuḍ am wakken d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-im.
Tettḥulfuḍ amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-ik.
Neqqar mazal lxir ɣer sdat, dagi ad as-nini mazal ixmir ɣer sdat.
Tettḥulfumt amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nkent.
Tettḥulfumt amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nwent.
Tettḥulfum amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nwen.
Nettḥulfu amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nteɣ.
Nettḥulfu amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nneɣ.
Yettḥulfu amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-is.
Tettḥulfu amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-is.
Ttḥulfunt amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nsent.
Ttḥulfun amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-nsen.
Ttḥulfuɣ amzun d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-iw.
Ttḥulfuɣ ad as-tiniḍ d times i iteddun deg yiẓuran-iw.
Efk-iyi-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-sweɣ.
Efk-as-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-isew.
Fkem-as-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-isew.
Fkem-as-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-tsew.
Fkem-iyi-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-sweɣ.
Fkemt-as-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-isew.
Fkemt-as-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-tsew.
Fkemt-iyi-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-sweɣ.
Fket-iyi-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-sweɣ.
Fket-as-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-isew.
Ma tessawḍeḍ teɣriḍ aḍris-a ad tafeḍ kullec din.
Fket-as-d lkas n ddemmar ad t-tsew.
Ma ssawḍeɣ ɣriɣ aḍris-a ad afeɣ kullec din.
Ma yessaweḍ yeɣra aḍris-a ad yaf kullec din.
Ma tessaweḍ teɣra aḍris-a ad taf kullec din.
Ma nessaweḍ neɣra aḍris-a ad naf kullec din.

Wissen acimi akka i d-ɣlin fell-aneɣ ?
Wissen acimi i d-ɣlin akka fell-aneɣ ?
Wissen acimi akka i d-yeɣli fell-aneɣ ?
Wissen acimi i d-yeɣli akka fell-aneɣ ?

Amer ttafen ad nenger ɣef tikkelt.
Amer ttafen d nutni ara d-yeqqimen.
Awer awḍen!
Awer yaweḍ ɣer yir axemmem-is.
Awer taweḍ ɣer yir axemmem-is.
Awer naweḍ ɣer yir axemmem-nneɣ.
Awer naweḍ ɣer yir axemmem-nteɣ.
Awer tawḍeḍ ɣer yir axemmem-ik.
Awer tawḍeḍ ɣer yir axemmem-inek.
Awer tawḍeḍ ɣer yir axemmem-im.
Awer tawḍeḍ ɣer yir axemmem-inem.
Awer tawḍem ɣer yir axemmem-nwen.
Awer tawḍemt ɣer yir axemmem-nwent.
Awer tawḍemt ɣer yir axemmem-nkent.
Awer awḍeɣ ɣer yir axemmem-iw.
Awer awḍeɣ ɣer yir axemmem-inu.
Awer awḍen ɣer yir axemmem-nsen.
Awer awḍent ɣer yir axemmem-nsent.
Ayen i k-ibeɛden, bɛed-it.
Ay Aɛrab n Falesṭin, qqim kan deg umakan-ik
Ay Aɛrab n Falesṭin, ibɛed-ik waluf.
Ay Aɛrab n Falesṭin, tusiḍ-d d inebgi, tuɣaleḍ teẓẓleḍ iḍarren.
S tezmert n yimensi-m ula d kemm.

Wissen acimi i berrikit wulawen-nsent ?

Wissen acimi i berrikit wulawen-nwent ?

Ssuref-iyi ulac ɣur-i isalli ɣef waya
Twalaḍ akka tura yella wayen yugaren aya.
Nekmen deg yixxamen-nneɣ, nedha-d kan d lhemm-nneɣ.
Ayen yellan s taɛrabt ur ḥsiɣ ara ad sleɣ kra fell-as.
Wissen acimi i berrik wul-ik ?
Wissen acimi i berrik wul-im ?
Wissen acimi i berrik wul-is ?
Wissen acimi i berrikit wulawen-nkent ?
Yekmen deg uxxam-nsen, yedha-d kan d lhemm-is.
Tekmen deg uxxam-nsen, tedha-d kan d lhemm-is.
Kemneɣ deg uxxam-nneɣ, dhiɣ-d kan d lhemm-iw.
Kemnen deg yixxamen-nsen, dhan-d kan d lehmum-nsen.
Kemnent deg yixxamen-nsent, dhant-d kan d lehmum-nsent.
Neɛya s tidet.
Teɛya s tidet.
Yeɛya s tidet.

D yiwen n urgaz ur ilaq ara akk ad nettu.
Ilaq yiwen n lqern akken ma yella iwakken yiwet n tmurt ad d-tarew yiwen n umdan am Tahar Djaout.
Tudert-is i izemren ad d-tfek agejdur d uqriḥ deg tsekla tunnigt, tin i d-yettifririn nnig tiyaḍ, kkren yimcumen n Rebbi ur neswi ttren, sfesden-tt, kksen-tt, nɣan-tt akken ur d-trennu ara deg tikta timaynutin deg tsekla ifazen.

Tanemmirt. S tezmert n yimensi-k ula d kečč.
Tacemlit-a ur telli d tamadwant maca d takmamt.
Iswi amezwaru n leqdic-a aseklan d asennerni n tutlayt-nsen taqbaylit.
Tullist d ullis amecṭuḥ, deg-s ulac aṭas n yiwudam, aglam-nsen d aslaf kan, d aḍris awezzlan, ilaq ad tesɛu ayen ara yeṭṭfen lbal n umeɣri, mačči d ḥekku kan am tmacahut.
Ihi, nekk ad asen-iniɣ i yimeskaren-a imeẓẓyanen: “Gedha! Ayuz!”
Aru ma tebɣiḍ ad d-teǧǧeḍ.
Ma tebɣiḍ ad d-teǧǧeḍ, aru.
Wid yebɣan ad d-ǧǧen, arun.
Tid yebɣan ad d-ǧǧent, arunt.
Ma yella seg temẓi-nsen i ten-yekcem lḥir n usebɣer n tmeslayt-nsen yellan kan d timawit mačči aṭas aya, ar sdat d ayen issefraḥen, seg tura ad nekkes aɣilif, ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger i as-d-heggan yicenga-s yezgan.
Tutlayt-nneɣ taqbaylit, urǧin ad taɣ abrid n nnger i as-d-heggan yicenga-s yezgan.
Cwi kan llan wid yettxemmimen ɣef tutlayt-nsen, begsen ad as-fken afud akken skudmal ad yettimɣutr ccan-is alma tcuba tutlayin-nniḍen.
Imru-nwen, i t-yeččuren d asirem swayes ara teččarem ma d kra n yisbetren s teqbaylit.
Yenna Caligula Amenkad n Rum : « Lufan talsa yiwen uqerruy i tesɛa, ad as t-id-ɣeḍleɣ s yiwet n tyita n llemca, ur tettaf acu ara tger deg uqelmun ».
Maca, ur lliɣ d Caligula yezɣezɣen Neɣ d Néron isaɣen times i Rome.
Yiwen wass deg wussan n tefsut, ddmeɣ-d ul n talsa, ssurgeɣ-d seg-s kra n lkerh yesɛa.
D lkerh ijemden, win yella deg wul, d aberkan am yiḍ.
S tmara i yeffeɣ s tzuliɣt n zzman, uwin-t yiɣeẓran anda ur d-yettuɣal.
Yuwi-t yiɣẓer anda ur d-yettuɣal.
Yeqqim almi yeffeɣ s tzuliɣt.
Ul iwumi d-yeggra cwiṭ n tayri, smareɣ-as diɣen tayri almi yettenfal.
Ul-is yeččur d tayri.
Ul-is yeččur d taɣeccact.
Talsa merra tuɣal d leḥmala, ala aḥemmel kan i tessen.
Talsa tekcem-itt tayri.
Tisiswa n yimdanen, ḥlulint, lɣuɣint deg wakken ččurent d tayri.
Ul n wuccen yeqqim yeččur d tixidas d tɣeccact.
Deg wul n wuccen, azeɣbub n tayri ur yelli.
Deg wul n wuccen, azeɣbub n tayri ur yexliq.
Deg wul n wuccen, cwiṭ n tayri ur yexliq.
Deg wul n wuccen, cwiṭ n tayri ur yelli.
Talsa, tessebleɛ-itt tayri, tuɣal bezzaf telha.

Teɣli deg wul-is.
Teɣli deg wul-iw.

Yeɣli, yedda deg leɛmer.
Yeɣli, d awessur.

Tayri tezdeɣ ul-iw.
Tayri tezdeɣ ul-is.
Tayri tezdeɣ ul-ik.
Tayri tezdeɣ ul-im.

Arrac am lmal kessen, imeksawen-nsen d iselmaden.
Igerdan am lmal kessen, imeksawen-nsen d iselmaden.
Ur tnuda, ur tufi.
Ur nnuda, ur nufi.
Ur nudaɣ, ur ufiɣ.
Ur nudan, ur ufin.
Ur nudant, ur ufint.
Ameqqran d Rebbi, maca tanemmirt.
Aqcic am urekti, ɛrek-it akken tebɣiḍ.
Agrud am urekti, ɛrek-it akken tebɣiḍ.
Aqcic am urekti, ɛerkem-t akken tebɣam.
Aqcic am urekti, ɛerkemt-t akken tebɣamt.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-ɛerkeɣ akken bɣiɣ.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-ɛerken akken bɣan.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-ɛerkent akken bɣant.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-yeɛrek akken yebɣa.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-teɛrek akken tebɣa.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-neɛrek akken nebɣa.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-tɛerkeḍ akken tebɣiḍ.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-tɛerkem akken tebɣam.
Aqcic am urekti, ad t-tɛerkemt akken tebɣamt.
Agrud am urekti, ad t-yeɛrek akken yebɣa.
Agrud am urekti, ad t-tɛerkeḍ akken tebɣiḍ.
Agrud am urekti, ad t-ɛerken akken bɣan.
Aqcic am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen tebɣuḍ, taruḍ-t.
Agrud am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen tebɣuḍ, taruḍ-t.
Aqcic am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen tebɣum, tarum-t.
Agrud am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen tebɣum, tarum-t.
Aqcic am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen tebɣumt, tarumt-t.
Aqcic am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen tebɣu, taru-t.
Agrud am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen tebɣu, taru-t.
Aqcic am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen yebɣu, yaru-t.
Agrud am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen yebɣu, yaru-t.
Aqcic am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen nebɣu, naru-t.
Agrud am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen nebɣu, naru-t.
Aqcic am usebter amellat, fell-as ayen bɣuɣ, aruɣ-t.
Anda-tt tgelzimt n lejdud, ad γizeγ amruj i lkanun ?
Mlem-iyi anda-tt tgelzimt n lejdud, ad γizeγ amruj i lkanun ?
Mlemt-iyi anda-tt tgelzimt n lejdud, ad γizeγ amruj i lkanun ?
Mlet-iyi anda-tt tgelzimt n lejdud, ad γizeγ amruj i lkanun ?
Mel-iyi anda-tt tgelzimt n lejdud, ad γizeγ amruj i lkanun ?
Anda-tt tgelzimt n lejdud, ad γizeγ amruj i lkanun ? Ad as-surgeγ lbarud, ad as-d-slen wid ur nceffu.
Amdan γer wayla-s yeffud, ḥegnen taḍunt ur as-d-berrun.
Amaziɣ γer wayla-s yeffud, ḥegnen taḍunt ur as-d-berrun.
Amaziɣ, yeffud idles-ines, ḥegnen taḍunt ur as-d-berrun.
Amaziɣ, yeffud tutlayt-ines, ḥegnen taḍunt ur as-d-berrun.
Amaziɣ, yeffud idles-ines, nutni ḥegnen taḍunt ur as-d-berrun.
Amaziɣ, yeffud tutlayt-ines, nutni ḥegnen taḍunt ur as-d-berrun.
Amaziɣ, yeffud tutlayt-ines, kunwi tḥegnem taḍunt ur as-d-tberrum.
Amaziɣ, yeffud idles-ines, kunwi tḥegnem taḍunt ur as-d-tberrum.
Amdan, yeffud tutlayt-ines, kunemti tḥegnemt taḍunt ur as-d-tberrumt.
Amdan, yeffud idles-ines, kunemti tḥegnemt taḍunt ur as-d-tberrumt.

S yifassen-iw sferfudeɣ, mmugreɣ-d tillas teddunt-d.
Ur ten-ttamnet, d iɛdawen (icenga) n tudert. Aru akka, lmed tameslayt-ik.
S yifassen-ik tesferfudeḍ, temmugreḍ-d tillas teddunt-d.
S yifassen-im tesferfudeḍ, temmugreḍ-d tillas teddunt-d.
S yifassen-is tesferfud, temmuger-d tillas teddunt-d.
S yifassen-is yesferfud, yemmuger-d tillas teddunt-d.
S yifassen-nsen sferfuden, mmugren-d tillas teddunt-d.
S yifassen-nsent sferfudent, mmugrent-d tillas teddunt-d.

Tin iwimi qqaren d tamcumt, d tin yettnadin ad tefhem.

Win yettnadin ad yefhen, ssemman-as amcum.
Tin yettnadin ad tefhen, ssemman-as tamcumt.

Anda i rran tebrek tella, amzun deg yifri i d-ggran.
Anda i rrant tebrek tella, amzun deg yifri i d-ggrant.

Anda i yerra tebrek tella, amzun deg yifri i d-yeggra.
Anda i nerra tebrek tella, amzun deg yifri i d-neggra.

Mi ffudeɣ ttarguɣ tala, deg waman-is tesseɣ alma rwiɣ.
Mi ffuden ttargun tala, deg waman-is tessen alma rwan.
Mi ffudent ttargunt tala, deg waman-is tessent alma rwant.
Mi teffudeḍ tettarguḍ tala, deg waman-is tettesseḍ alma terwiḍ.
Mi teffudem tettargum tala, deg waman-is tettessem alma terwam.
Mi teffudemt tettargumt tala, deg waman-is tettessemt alma terwamt.
Mi yeffud ittargu tala, deg waman-is itess alma yerwa.
Mi teffud tettargu tala, deg waman-is tettess alma terwa.
Mi neffud nettargu tala, deg waman-is ntess alma nerwa.
Yiwen ur as-yezmir i wawal ladɣa ma yebna ɣef tidet.
Yiwen ur as-yezmir i wawal ladɣa ma yebna ɣef sseḥḥ.
Tidet yiwen ur as-yezmir ɣas ma tikerkas deg tmurt-nneɣ ala nutenti.
Tidet yiwen ur as-yezmir ɣas ma lekdubat deg tmurt-nneɣ ala nutnii.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ, tikerkas ala nutenti.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ, lekdubat ala nutni.
Yiwen, ama d amdan ama d tarbɛt, ama d agdud ma yella yebna-tt ɣef tidet, ur tufiḍ d acu ara yagad.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara tagadeḍ ma ur texdimeḍ kra.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara tagademt ma yella ur texdimemt kra.

Yeqqar : “Tutlayt-iw tuklal, azekka ad as-yili d urqim”
Mass Fersawi, ass-a d ilelli.

Yeqqar : “Tutlayt-iw tuklal, azekka ad as-yuɣal d urqim”
Tutlayt-iw tuklal ad teǧǧuǧǧeg.
Tutlayt-iw tuklal ad tennerni.
Tutlayt-iw tuklal ad tili bḥal tiyiḍ.

Tutlayt-iw tuklal ad tili bḥal tiyiḍ neɣ xir.
Tutlayt-iw tuklal ad tili am tiyiḍ neɣ xir.

Tugiḍ aẓar-im ad yeqqar.
Tugi aẓar-is ad yeqqar.

Tugimt aẓar-nkent ad yeqqar.

Ugint aẓar-nsent ad yeqqar.
Mi ara k-gezmen iẓuran, ur k-d-yettɣimi kra, ala ul-ik ma yesnektay.
Mi ara k-gezmen iẓuran, ur k-d-yettɣimi kra, ala allen-ik i yimeṭṭawen.
Mi ara m-gezmen iẓuran, ur kem-d-yettɣimi kra, ala allen-im i yimeṭṭawen.
Mi ara m-gezmen iẓuran, ur kem-d-yettɣimi kra, ala ul-ik ma yesnektay.
Mi ara s-gezmen iẓuran, u rs-d-yettɣimi kra, ala ul-is ma yesnektay.
Mi ara s-gezmen iẓuran, ur s-d-yettɣimi kra, ala allen-is i yimeṭṭawen.
Mi ara iyi-gezmen iẓuran, ur iyi-d-yettɣimi kra, ala allen-iw i yimeṭṭawen.
Mi ara iyi-gezmen iẓuran, ur iyi-d-yettɣimi kra, ala ul-is ma yesnektay.
Mi ara wen-gezmen iẓuran, ur wen-d-yettɣimi kra, ala ul-nwen ma yesnektay.
Mi ara wen-gezmen iẓuran, ur wen-d-yettɣimi kra, ala allen-nwen i yimeṭṭawen.

Mi ara went-gezmen iẓuran, ur went-d-yettɣimi kra, ala allen-nkent i yimeṭṭawen.
Mi ara went-gezmen iẓuran, ur went-d-yettɣimi kra, ala ul-is ma yesnektay.
Mi ara sen-gezmen iẓuran, ur sen-d-yettɣimi kra, ala ul-nsen ma yesnektay.

Mi ara sent-gezmen iẓuran, ur sent-d-yettɣimi kra, ala allen-nsent i yimeṭṭawen.
Mi ara sent-gezmen iẓuran, ur sent-d-yettɣimi kra, ala ul-nsent ma yesnektay.

Am yilindi, am useggas-a.
Am kečč, am netta.
Am unebdu, am ccetwa.
Am yiḍelli, am wass-a.
Am wass-a, am uzekka.

Kunwi, tɛemdem tettum aqqerruy, terram lwelha-nwen ɣef uceṭṭiḍ i tebɣam ad tesbur agman i as-d-iberrun i tikta ur teḥmmilem ara imi d-kkant seg yiwet tmarut yemmuten d tilemẓit.

Tezgam deffir n tyuga, tkerrzem lqaɛa, d ifellaḥen seg wasmi i d-tekkrem.
Nezga deffir n tyuga, nkerrz lqaɛa, d ifellaḥen seg wasmi i d-nekker.

Tumen azekka-nsent d tafat, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Umnen azekka-nsen d tafat, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Umnent azekka-nsent d tafat, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Tumneḍ azekka-nwen d tafat, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Tumnem azekka-nwen d tafat, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Tumnemt azekka-nwent d tafat, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Tumnemt azekka-nkent d tafat, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Ma zik ur nefhim tigert, tura neḥsa d tamaziɣt i d lsas.
Ma zik ur nefhim tigert, ass-a neḥsa d tamaziɣt i d lsas.
Ma zik ur fhimen tigert, tura ḥsan d tamaziɣt i d lsas.
Ma zik ur fhimeɣ tigert, tura ḥsiɣ d tamaziɣt i d lsas.
Ma zik ur tefhimem tigert, tura teḥsam d tamaziɣt i d lsas.
Ma zik ur tefhimem tigert, ass-a teḥsam d tamaziɣt i d lsas.
Ma zik ur fhimeɣ tigert, ass-a ḥsiɣ d tamaziɣt i d lsas.
Ma zik ur fhimen tigert, ass-a ḥsan d tamaziɣt i d lsas.
Tuffɣa n uberriq tella, tuɣalin ulac.
Iberriq ma yeffeɣ seg ddamus-is, urǧin i d-yuɣal.
Deg ufus-nneɣ tella tifrat, tamurt ma tezdi tarwa-s.
Deg ufus-nwen tella tifrat, tamurt ma tezdi tarwa-s.
Deg ufus-nsen tella tifrat, tamurt ma tezdi tarwa-s.
Deg ufus-nneɣ i tella tifrat, ma tezdi tarwa n tamurt.
Deg ufus-nwen i tella tifrat, ma tezdi tarwa n tamurt.
Deg ufus-nsen i tella tifrat, ma tezdi tarwa n tamurt.
Zdim iɣallen, anda i tebɣam ad tawḍem.
Zdimt iɣallen, anda i tebɣamt ad tawḍemt.
Zdit iɣallen, anda i tebɣam ad tawḍem.
Ma zdin iɣallen, anda bɣun ad awḍen.
Ma zdint iɣallen, anda bɣunt ad awḍent.
Ma nezdi iɣallen, anda nebɣu ad naweḍ.
Ma tezdim iɣallen, anda tebɣum ad tawḍem.
Ma tezdimt iɣallen, anda tebɣumt ad tawḍemt.
Tikli-nneɣ dima ɣer sdat, ad nili am nekkni am leǧnas.
Ma nɛuned wid i aɣ-yifen, nezmer ad ten-naweḍ neɣ ad ten-nɛeddi.
Ma tɛuned wid i tt-yifen, tezmer ad t-taweḍ neɣ ad t-tɛeddi.
Ma iɛuneḍ wid i t-yifen, yezmer ad t-yaweḍ neɣ ad t-iɛeddi.
Ma tɛuned tin i tt-yifen, tezmer ad tt-taweḍ neɣ ad tt-tɛeddi.
Ma iɛuneḍ tin i t-yifen, yezmer ad tt-yaweḍ neɣ ad tt-iɛeddi.
Ma iɛuneḍ tid i t-yifen, yezmer ad tent-yaweḍ neɣ ad tent-iɛeddi.
Ma tɛuned win i tt-yifen, tezmer ad t-taweḍ neɣ ad t-tɛeddi.
Ma tɛuned tid i tt-yifen, tezmer ad tent-taweḍ neɣ ad tent-tɛeddi.
Ma ɛundeɣ win i iyi-yifen, zemreɣ ad t-awḍeɣ neɣ ad t-ɛeddiɣ.
Ma ɛundeɣ tin i iyi-yifen, zemreɣ ad tt-awḍeɣ neɣ ad tt-ɛeddiɣ.
Ma ɛundeɣ wid i iyi-yifen, zemreɣ ad ten-awḍeɣ neɣ ad ten-ɛeddiɣ.
Ma ɛundeɣ tid i iyi-yifen, zemreɣ ad tent-awḍeɣ neɣ ad tent-ɛeddiɣ.
Ma ɛunden win i ten-yifen, zemren ad t-awḍen neɣ ad t-ɛeddin.
Ma ɛunden tin i ten-yifen, zemren ad tt-awḍen neɣ ad tt-ɛeddin.
Ma ɛunden wid i ten-yifen, zemren ad ten-awḍen neɣ ad ten-ɛeddin.
Ma ɛunden wtd i ten-yifen, zemren ad tent-awḍen neɣ ad tent-ɛeddin.
Ma ɛundent wid i tent-yifen, zemren ad ten-awḍent neɣ ad ten-ɛeddint.
Ma ɛundent tid i tent-yifen, zemren ad tent-awḍent neɣ ad tent-ɛeddint.
Ma ɛundent win i tent-yifen, zemren ad t-awḍent neɣ ad t-ɛeddint.
Ma ɛundent tin i tent-yifen, zemren ad tt-awḍent neɣ ad tt-ɛeddint.

D ulaqrar ad ifakk yiḍ.

Ssifa-s tsuffuɣ leɛqel.

Iɣurr-itent Rebbi seg ssifa.

Sufella yiwen yelha, ɣer daxel yerka.
Ad t-tenwuḍ yelha, netta ziɣen acemma deg-s ur yelhi.
Ad t-tenwuḍ yelha, netta ziɣen d yir netta.
Ad t-tenwuḍ yelha, netta ziɣen diri-t.
Ad tt-tenwuḍ telha, nettat ziɣen acemma deg-s ur yelhi.
Ad tt-tenwuḍ telha, nettat ziɣen d yir nettat.
Ad tt-tenwuḍ telha, nettat ziɣen diri-tt.
Ad ten-tenwuḍ lhan, nutni ziɣen acemma deg-sen ur yelhi.
Ad ten-tenwuḍ lhan, nutni ziɣen diri-ten.
Ad ten-tenwuḍ lhan, nutni ziɣen d yir nutni.
Ad tent-tenwuḍ lhant, nutenti ziɣen acemma deg-sent ur yelhi.
Ad tent-tenwuḍ lhant, nutenti ziɣen d yir nutenti.
Ad tent-tenwuḍ lhant, nutenti ziɣen diri-tent.
Win yuwin kra mačči s leḥlal, ad as-yuɣal d yir lfal.
Win yuwin kra mačči s leḥlal, d yir lfal ara as-yuɣal.
Tin yuwin kra mačči s leḥlal, ad as-yuɣal d yir lfal.
Tin yuwin kra mačči s leḥlal, d yir lfal ara as-yuɣal.

Tid yuwin kra mačči s leḥlal, ad asent-yuɣal d yir lfal.

Wid yuwin kra mačči s leḥlal, d yir lfal ara asen-yuɣal.

Azul a Raḥim. Tafaska-k d tin n twacult-ik d tamerbuḥt. Akka tinnubga-inek qebleɣ-tt.
Aɣerbaz Ɛecciw Buǧemɛa yezga-d deg tlemmest n temdint n Tezmalt, nnig n uxxam n tɣiwant.
Yeldi tiwwura-ines deg useggas 1939 s ufus n Tiddukla n Yimussnawen Inselmen deg yiwet n tallit netta d yiwen uɣerbaz i t-yecban deg temdint n Tlemsan.
Deg lawan-nni, iga am temɛemmert, d leqraya yerzan ddin, almad n leqran, i d-yettilin.
Azul a Boukaouma Allaoua! Tafaska tamerbuḥt tḥadreḍ iman-ik.
Aɣerbaz-a imiren qqaren-as :”Aɣerbaz n ttrebga d uselmed”.
Deg useggas 1957 deffir n tmenɣiwt n unemhal-is i sgedlen Yifransisen aselmed deg-s, rran-t d asgen i yiserdasen-nsen deg tallit-nni n ttrad n tsellullit taɣelnawt.
Ilaq ad nraju ad d-taweḍ timunnent n tmurt deg useggas 1962 akken ad yeldi diɣen tiwurra-ines i yinelmaden.
Almud yettili-d s wudem atrar s snat n tutlayin : taɛrabt d tefransist.
Ilaq diɣen ad nraju aseggas 2005 iwakken ad tekcem tutlayt n tmaziɣt aɣerbaz-a amenzu.
Ara yeɣren tutlayt n tmaziɣt d inelmaden n uswir wis ukkuẓ d uswir wis semmus (d wis sdis deg tazwara).
D nekk ay tt-yesselmaden seg yimiren ar ass-a.
D nekk ay yesselmaden tutlayt n tmaziɣt seg yimiren ar ass-a.
Ta, d yiwet n tegzemt n yiwen n usenfar yerzan isekla s umata.
Ihi tagzemt-a ad d-tili d aglam n useklu talqent d ubdar n wayen akk i tt-yerzan.
Neḥsa akka tura aṭas n tɣawsiwin i yettruḥun, iteddu yid-sent umawal-nsent.
S temsirin am ti nezmer ad d-nerr ayen i yettruḥun i yinelmaden-nneɣ am umawal n lexrif.
Inelmaden zemren ad d-gen allus i kra n tedyant.
Deg wullis amecṭuḥ zemren ad d-gren yiwen udiwenni.
Ad issinen yinelmaden ismawen n yisekla, amek i gan (igumma, iferrawen, lqedd, anda i d-meqqin, abaɣur i d-ttakken…)

Dihya d yiwet n teqcict tuḥrict, ɣur-s mraw n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.

Ur tessin ara tamurt n Leqbayel s wallen-is maca kra n uḍris i d-yettmeslayen fell-as i tufa deg yidlisen neɣ deg yiɣmisen neɣ deg Internet teɣra-t.
Ass-nni i yeɣra d yinelmaden n tesmilt-is yiwen uḍris ɣef telqent, ur yeǧǧi ara baba-s yiwen wass melba ma yenna-as : “Awi-iyi ɣer tmurt ad d-kkseɣ tabexsist s ufus-iw".
Ass-nni i teɣra d yinelmaden n tesmilt-is yiwen uḍris ɣef telqent, ur teǧǧi ara baba-s yiwen wass melba ma tenna-as : “Awi-iyi ɣer tmurt ad d-kkseɣ tabexsist s ufus-iw".

Yerbeḥ a yelli, imuras n unebdu i d-iteddun ad nerzef akken ma nella ɣer taddart-nneɣ. I as-yerra baba-s.

Akka tura, ɛeddan 2 n yiseggasen.

Tmuqel-iyi-d s ucmumeḥ, tenna-iyi-d : Anta i tḥemmleḍ nnig tayeḍ, d Zzayer neɣ d Canada ?
Tmuqel-it s ucmumeḥ, tenna-as : Anta i tḥemmleḍ ugar tayeḍ, d Zzayer neɣ d Canada ?
Tmuqel-itt s ucmumeḥ, tenna-as : Anta i tḥemmleḍ ugar tayeḍ, d Zzayer neɣ d Canada ?
Tmuqel-ik-d s ucmumeḥ, tenna-k-d : Anta i tḥemmleḍ nnig tayeḍ, d Zzayer neɣ d Canada ?
Tmuqel-ikem-d s ucmumeḥ, tenna-m-d : Anta i tḥemmleḍ nnig tayeḍ, d Zzayer neɣ d Canada ?
Ur t-ttuɣ ara, ɣer aḍris akken i ilaq. Iḍelli i d 25 mayyu 2020, d amulli wis 19 n tmettant n 2 imeɣrasen-a n tlelli.
Yella wayen yugaren aya. Akka i d-qqaren.
Yella wayen yugaren aya. Akka i d-nnan.
Medden akk ttxemmimen xef waṭṭan-a n kuruna.
Medden i ten-iceɣben waṭṭan-a n kuruna.
Ur ttxemmim ara aṭas.
Ur ttxemmimem ara aṭas.
Ur ttxemmimemt ara aṭas.
Ur ttxemmimet ara aṭas.
Tura ad ak-d-fkeɣ tugna yeddan d usefru-a.
Amgired giɣ gar Zzayer d Canada am win giɣ gar yemma d tmeṭṭut-iw.
Amgired iga gar Zzayer d Canada am win iga gar yemma-s d tmeṭṭut-is.
Amgired tgiḍ gar Zzayer d Canada am win tgiḍ gar yemma-k d tmeṭṭut-ik.
Tameṭṭut-iw d nekk i tt-yextaren, tesḥer-iyi s sser n ssifa-s, ḥemmleɣ-tt, ar ass-a tayri-w ɣur-s d tameqqrant, maca ur tezmir ara akk ad iyi-tessettu yemma.
Tameṭṭut-iw d nekk i tt-yextaren, tesḥer-iyi s sser n ssifa-s.
Ḥemmleɣ tameṭṭut-iw, ar ass-a tayri-w ɣur-s d tameqqrant.
Maca, tameṭṭut-iw ur tezmir ara akk ad iyi-tessettu yemma.
Maca, tameṭṭut-ik ur tezmir ara akk ad ak-tessettu yemma-k.
Maca, tameṭṭut-is ur tezmir ara akk ad as-tessettu yemma-s.
Tḥemmleḍ tameṭṭut-ik, ar ass-a tayri-k ɣur-s d tameqqrant.
Iḥemmel tameṭṭut-is, ar ass-a tayri-s ɣur-s d tameqqrant.
Tameṭṭut-ik d kečč i tt-yextaren, tesḥer-ik s sser n ssifa-s.
Tameṭṭut-is d netta i tt-yextaren, tesḥer-it s sser n ssifa-s.
Ur xtareɣ ara yemma, maca ḥsiɣ nekk ines, tettayal-iyi, ur ttiliɣ bxir ala deg yirebbi-s, ur iyi-d-iɣelli imeṭṭi ala ɣef tayet-is.
Ur xtareɣ ara yemma, maca ḥsiɣ nekk ines, tettayal-iyi.
Ur xtareɣ ara yemma, maca ḥsiɣ nekk ines, nettat inu.
Ur ttiliɣ bxir ala deg yirebbi-s.
Ur ttiliɣ bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma.
Ur ttilin bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-tsen.
Ur ttilint bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-tsent.
Ur yettili bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-s.
Ur tettili bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-s.
Ur nettili bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-tneɣ.
Ur nettili bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-tenteɣ
Ur tettiliḍ bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-k.
Ur tettiliḍ bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-m.
Ur tettilim bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-twen.
Ur tettilimt bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-twent.
Ur tettilimt bxir ala deg yirebbi n yemma-tkent.
Ur xtaren ara yemma-tsen, maca ḥsan nutni ines, nettat nsen.
Ur xtarent ara yemma-tsent, maca ḥsan nuteni ines, nettat nsent.
Ur yextar ara yemma-s, maca yeḥsa netta ines, nettat ines.
Ur textar ara yemma-s, maca teḥsa nettat n yemma-s, yemma-s n yelli-s.
Ur nextar ara yemma-tneɣ, maca neḥsa nettat nneɣ, nekkni ines.
Ur nextar ara yemma-tenteɣ, maca neḥsa nettat nteɣ, nekkenti ines.
Ur textareḍ ara yemma-k, maca teḥsiḍ nettat inek, kečč ines.
Ur textareḍ ara yemma-m, maca teḥsiḍ nettat inem, kemm ines.
Ur textarem ara yemma-twen, maca teḥsam nettat nwen, kunwi ines.
Ur textaremt ara yemma-twent, maca teḥsamt nettat nwent, kunemti ines.
Ur textaremt ara yemma-tkent, maca teḥsamt nettat nkent, kunemti ines.
Teqfel amsineg-iw, tmuqel-iyi-d nettat tedhec.
Yeqfel amsineg-iw, imuqel-iyi-d nettat yedhec.
Tenna-iyi-d : Nsell dima d akken tudert deg Zzayer mačči d tin isehlen. Amek akka i tḥemmleḍ tamurt am ta?
Nsell dima d akken tudert deg Zzayer mačči d tin isehlen.
Amek akka i tḥemmleḍ tamurt am ta ?
Amek akka i tḥemmlem tamurt am ta ?
Amek akka i tḥemmlemt tamurt am ta?
Amek akka i tḥemmel tamurt am ta ?
Amek akka i iḥemmel tamurt am ta ?
Amek akka i nḥemmel tamurt am ta ?
Amek akka i ḥemmleɣ tamurt am ta ?
Amek akka i ḥemmlen tamurt am ta ?
Amek akka i ḥemmlent tamurt am ta ?
Akken i ḥemmleɣ yemma i ḥemmleɣ tamurt-iw.
Akken i ḥemmlen yemma-tsen i ḥemmlen tamurt-nsen.
Akken i ḥemmlent yemma-tsent i ḥemmlent tamurt-nsent.
Akken i iḥemmel yemma-s i iḥemmel tamurt-is.
Akken i tḥemmel yemma-s i tḥemmel tamurt-is.
Akken i nḥemmel yemma-tneɣ i nḥemmel tamurt-nneɣ.
Akken i nḥemmel yemma-tenteɣ i nḥemmel tamurt-nteɣ.
Akken i tḥemmleḍ yemma-k i tḥemmleḍ tamurt-ik.
Akken i tḥemmleḍ yemma-m i tḥemmleḍ tamurt-im.
Akken i tḥemmlem yemma-twen i tḥemmlem tamurt-nwen.
Akken i tḥemmlemt yemma-twent i tḥemmlemt tamurt-nwent.
Akken i tḥemmlemt yemma-tkent i tḥemmlemt tamurt-tkent.

Dayen a tayri, terra-as tablaḍt i wul.

Ar tura ur tferreẓ timsal.

Kamal ddin Fekhar yemmut.
Mačči deg uxxam-is i isuffeɣ rruḥ, maɛna deg lḥebs anda i nnumen garren-t imi yezga d amdan yeddan d tidet.
Kamal, yezga d amdan yeddan d tidet.

Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-bniɣ, ad yelhu wass ad d-mmagreɣ.
Isekla n tegmat ad aɣen.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-tebniḍ, ad yelhu wass ad d-temmagreḍ.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-tebnam, ad yelhu wass ad d-temmagram.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-tebnamt, ad yelhu wass ad d-temmagramt.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-tebnamt, talfi ad yelhu wass ad d-temmagramt
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-tebnamt, talfi ad yelhu wass ad d-temmagramt.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-tebnam, talfi ad yelhu wass ad d-temmagram.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-tebniḍ, talfi ad yelhu wass ad d-temmagreḍ.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-bniɣ, talfi ad yelhu wass ad d-mmagreɣ.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-bnant, talfi ad yelhu wass ad d-mmagrent, isekla n tegmat ad aɣen.
Lufan ɣef tidet i tt-bnan, talfi ad yelhu wass ad d-mmagren, isekla n tegmat ad aɣen.

Yemma-k tettḥudduḍ-tt, yemma tserkiḍ-d fell-as iḍan.
Yemma-k tefkiḍ-as akk ayen tebɣa, ma d yemma teǧǧiḍ-tt akken.
Yemma-s yefka-as akk ayen tebɣa, ma d yemma yeǧǧa-tt akken.

Yemma-s yefka-as akk ayen tebɣa, ma d yemma yeǧǧa-tt fiḥel.

Yemma-tsen fkan-as akk ayen tebɣa, ma d yemma-tneɣ ǧǧan-tt fiḥel.

Yemma-twen tefkam-as akk ayen tebɣa, ma d yemma-tneɣ teǧǧam-tt fiḥel.

Yemma-tsen ttekkin-d fell-as, yemma serkin-d fell-as iḍan.
