Ad ruḥeɣ ɣur-s ad tt-id-necdeɣ nekk.
Ad ruḥeɣ ɣur-sen ad ten-id-necdeɣ nekk.
Ad ruḥeɣ ɣur-sent ad tent-id-necdeɣ nekk.
Ad n-ruḥeɣ ɣur-wen ad ken-id-necdeɣ nekk.
Ad n-ruḥeɣ ɣur-went ad kent-id-necdeɣ nekk.
Ad n-ruḥeɣ ɣur-kent ad kent-id-necdeɣ nekk.
A-t-an d nekk i ak-in-yuznen tinnubga.
A-t-an d nekk i am-in-yuznen tinnubga.
Ad ak-t-in-azneɣ ?
Ad am-t-in-azneɣ ?
Ad as-t-in-azneɣ ?
Ad asen-t-in-azneɣ ?
Ad asent-t-in-azneɣ ?
Ad awen-t-in-azneɣ ?
Ad awent-t-in-azneɣ ?
Ad akent-t-in-azneɣ ?
Igerrez. Tura ad k-in-yaweḍ.
Ẓer dagi ma tzemreḍ ad teldiḍ akaram-a ?
Labas, ssarameɣ ula d kemm akken.
Labas, ssarameɣ ula d kečč akken.
Tura ad kem-in-yaweḍ.
Tura ad ken-in-yaweḍ.
Tura ad kent-in-yaweḍ.
Tura ad t-in-yaweḍ.
Tura ad tt-in-yaweḍ.
Tura ad ten-in-yaweḍ.
Tura ad tent-in-yaweḍ.
Tura ad aɣ-d-yaweḍ.
Tura ad iyi-d-yaweḍ.
Wali kan ma tzemreḍ ad teldiḍ akaram-a ?
Walim kan ma tzemrem ad teldim akaram-a ?
Walimt kan ma tzemremt ad teldimt akaram-a ?
Walit kan ma tzemrem ad teldim akaram-a ?
Ẓrem kan ma tzemrem ad teldim akaram-a ?
Ẓremt kan ma tzemremt ad teldimt akaram-a ?
Ẓret kan ma tzemrem ad teldim akaram-a ?
Wissen ma zemreɣ ad d-ldiɣ akaram-a ?
Wissen ma zemren ad d-ldin akaram-a ?
Wissen ma zemrent ad d-ldint akaram-a ?
Wissen ma tezmer ad d-teldi akaram-a ?
Wissen ma yezmer ad d-yeldi akaram-a ?
Wissen ma nezmer ad d-neldi akaram-a ?
Wissen ma tzemreḍ ad d-teldiḍ akaram-a ?
Wissen ma tzemrem ad d-teldim akaram-a ?
Wissen ma tzemremt ad d-teldimt akaram-a ?
Ɣef wuccen tettɛedday kan tikkelt.
Tettɛedday ɣef wuccen tikkelt kan.
Mačči snat n tikal i tettɛedday ɣef wuccen.
Tettɛedday tikkelt kan ɣef wuccen, mačči snat.
Imawlan uzan-aɣ, ččan-aɣ, la d-ɛerḍen deg yiwaziwen.
Tagmat tejmeɛ iɣsan-nneɣ, yiwen n wass lerwaḥ ad d-uɣalen.
Aɛeqqa yessawalen iruḥ, alɣem meskin yettru.
Aɛeqqa yessawalen wissen anda-t, alɣem yerra-tt i lweɛd n yimeṭṭi.
Aɛeqqa yessawalen wissen anda yuɣal, alɣem yerra-tt i lweɛd n yimeṭṭi.
Aɛeqqa yessawalen wissen anda yuɣal, alɣem yessenger iẓri-s.
Taklit mm yibeccicen yenɣa-tt zzuxx.
Taklit mm yibeccicen teqber seg zzuxx.
Tettɛedday tikkelt ɣef wuccen.
Ala tikkelt i tettɛedday ɣef wuccen.
Kra n win i yessexdamen deg txidas, yiwen n wass kan ad d-uɣalen fell-as.
Win yessexdamen tixidas, yiwen n wass ad d-uɣalent fell-as.
Tin yessexdamen tixidas, yiwen n wass ad d-uɣalent fell-as.
Wid yessexdamen tixidas, yiwen n wass ad d-uɣalent fell-asen.
Tid yessexdamen tixidas, yiwen n wass ad d-uɣalent fell-asent.
Cfu fell-asen!
Cfu fell-asent!
Cfu fell-i!
Cfum fell-asen!
Cfum fell-asent!
Cfum fell-i!
Cfumt fell-asen!
Cfumt fell-asent!
Cfumt fell-i!
Cfut fell-asen!
Cfut fell-asent!
Cfut fell-i!
Tecfa ɣef wasmi i tedda d tislit.
Ur tecfi ara ɣef wasmi i tedda d tislit.
Azekka d amulli amezwaru n tissulya-s.
Azekka ad tesfugel amulli amezwaru n tissulya-s.
Azekka ad yesfugel amulli amezwaru n tissulya-s.
Azekka ad nesfugel amulli amezwaru n tissulya-nneɣ.
Azekka ad tesfugleḍ amulli amezwaru n tissulya-k.
Azekka ad tesfugleḍ amulli amezwaru n tissulya-m.
Azekka ad tesfuglem amulli amezwaru n tissulya-nwen.
Azekka ad sfugleɣ amulli amezwaru n tissulya-w.
Azekka ad sfugleɣ amulli amezwaru n tissulya-inu.
Azekka ad tesfugleḍ amulli amezwaru n tissulya-inem.
Azekka ad yesfugel amulli amezwaru n tissulya-ines.
Azekka ad tesfugleḍ amulli amezwaru n tissulya-inek.
Azekka ad sfuglen amulli amezwaru n tissulya-nsen.
Tudert tecbeḥ am teslit.
Am teslit i tecbeḥ tudert.
Kra negull yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik nettraju, neṭṭes tuwi-aɣ targit.
Kra yegull yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik yettraju, yeṭṭes tuwi-t targit.
Kra tegull yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik tettraju, teṭṭes tuwi-tt targit.
Kra tegulleḍ yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik tettrajuḍ, teṭṭseḍ tuwi-k targit.
Kra tegulleḍ yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik tettrajuḍ, teṭṭseḍ tuwi-kem targit.
Kra tegullem yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik tettrajum, teṭṭsem tuwi-ken targit.
Kra tegullemt yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik tettrajumt, teṭṭsemt tuwi-kent targit.
Kra gulleɣ yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik ttrajuɣ, ṭṭseɣ tuwi-iyi targit.
Kra gullen yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik ttrajun, ṭṭsen tuwi-ten targit.
Kra gullent yuwi-t waḍu, seg zik ttrajunt, ṭṭsent tuwi-tent targit.
Teḍra yid-neɣ am “Ccix n lkanun”, isem-is yella, netta ulac-it.
Teḍra yid-wen am “Ccix n lkanun”, isem-is yella, netta ulac-it.
Teḍra yid-sen am “Ccix n lkanun”, isem-is yella, netta ulac-it.
Nekkni nella d imelyan, ma d isen-nneɣ ulac-it s wudem unsib deg tmurt-nneɣ.
Kunwi tellam d imelyan, ma d isen-nwen ulac-it s wudem unsib deg tmurt-nwen.
Nutni llan d imelyan, ma d isen-nsen ulac-it s wudem unsib deg tmurt-nsen.
Ulac rriḥa-nneɣ ɣef lkaɣeḍ.
Deg tmendawt n tmurt-nneɣ Zzayer, tutlayt-nneɣ ulac-itt.
Nekkni mačči d nekkni.
Nekkni beddlen-neɣ s wiyaḍ.
Ar melmi akka ara nili akken nella ?
Yeṭṭeḍ yelli-s akken ur yettmmettat seg laẓ.

Amek ad yili uzekka ? Ma d tudert neɣ d aẓekka ?
Yiwet ur tettkacaf.
Yensa yiwen n yitri deg yigenni.
Itri-nni yensan deg yigenni, ikcem-d s ulawen-nneɣ.
S ulawen-nneɣ i d-yekcem yitri-nni yensa deg yigenni.
Yiwen ur yekcem s ul n wayeḍ.
Barkawt tuzzmiwin deg yimdanen.
Tamurt ur aɣ-tefki azal, tebɣa ad aɣ-terr d iɛeṭṭaren.
Tamurt ur aɣ-tefki azal, tebɣa ad aɣ-terr d tiɛeṭṭarin.
Tamurt ur iyi-tefki azal, tebɣa ad iyi-terr d aɛeṭṭar.
Tamurt ur k-tefki azal, tebɣa ad k-terr d aɛeṭṭar.
Tamurt ur m-tefki azal, tebɣa ad kem-terr d aɛeṭṭar.
Tamurt ur s-tefki azal, tebɣa ad t-terr d aɛeṭṭar.
Tamurt ur wen-tefki azal, tebɣa ad ken-terr d iɛeṭṭaren.
Tamurt ur went-tefki azal, tebɣa ad kent-terr d tiɛeṭṭarin.
Tamurt ur kent-tefki azal, tebɣa ad kent-terr d tiɛeṭṭarin.
Tamurt ur sen-tefki azal, tebɣa ad ten-terr d iɛeṭṭaren.
Tamurt ur sent-tefki azal, tebɣa ad tent-terr d tiɛeṭṭarin.
Iḍarren-iw ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.
Iḍarren-inu ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.
Iḍarren-inek ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.
Iḍarren-ik ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.
Iḍarren-ines ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.
Iḍarren-is ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.
Iḍarren-nneɣ ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.
Iḍarren-nteɣ ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.
Iḍarren-nwen ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.

Iḍarren-nkent ɛebban uzzal, deg taẓẓayt d iqenṭaren.

Nekk d aferṭeṭṭu amellal yettaffgen ɣeff yijeǧǧigen.

Azekka d win ara yelhun.
Ad yelhu uzekka.

Nugi ad namen.
Tugim ad tamnem.
Tugimt ad tamnemt.
Ugint ad amnent.
Tugi ad tamen.
Ilaq ad tiliḍ akken bɣan, mačči akken tebɣiḍ.
Ilaq ad tilim akken bɣan, mačči akken tebɣam.
Ilaq ad tilimf akken bɣan, mačči akken tebɣamf.
Ilaq ad tili akken bɣan, mačči akken tebɣa.
Ilaq ad yili akken bɣan, mačči akken yebɣa.
Ilaq ad nili akken bɣan, mačči akken nebɣa.
Ilaq ad iliɣ akken bɣan, mačči akken bɣiɣ.

Ilaq ad ilint akken bɣan, mačči akken bɣant.
Ilaq ad ilint akken yebɣa win yettcaxen, mačči akken bɣant nutenti.
Tettaweḍ ur tezmir.
Nettaweḍ ur nezmir.
Ttawḍeɣ ur zmireɣ.

Ttawḍent ur zmirent.

Tettaweḍem ur tezmirem.

Teṭallay-d ur d-tkeččem.

Nteddu kan iman-nneɣ.
Nteddu kan iman-nteɣ.

Tayri-nneɣ teqqen s ssnasel.
Ur ttru ara a yemma, mmi-m d argaz.
Ur ttrumt ara a tiyemmatin, arraw-nkent d irgazen.

Kra n wayen i as-d-yezzin, tettwali-t d aberkan.

Kra n wayen i ak-d-yezzin, tettwaliḍ-t d aberkan.

Yekmec wul-is.
Yekkat wul-iw.
Ala fell-am i yekkat wul-iw.
Ala fell-am i yekkat wul-is.
Ala fell-as i yekkat wul-im.
Ala fell-i i yekkat wul-im.
Ala fell-ak i yekkat wul-is.

Amer ittaf ur d-yettlal ara akk.

Anta i kem-icekren a tislit ?

Akal n lejdud-iw, aṭas n yizmawen i d-yefka.

Aṭas n yirgazen i d-yefka wakal n lejdud-iw.

S iɣzer deggren asirem-iw, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer deggren asirem-ik, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer deggren asirem-im, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer deggren asirem-is, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer deggren asirem-nneɣ, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer deggren asirem-nteɣ, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer deggren asirem-nwen, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer deggren asirem-nwent, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.

S iɣzer deggren asirem-nsent, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer deggren asirem-nsen, ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen.
S iɣzer i deggren asirem-iw.
S anu i deggren asirem-iw.
Ɣer lbir i deggren asirem-iw.
Ɣer daxel n lbir i deggren asirem-iw.
Asirem-iw, gezmen-as afriwen.
Nenwa d tafat ara aɣ-d-immagren.
Yenwa d tafat ara t-id-immagren.
Tenwa d tafat ara tt-id-immagren.
Tenwam d tafat ara ken-id-immagren.
Tenwamt d tafat ara kent-id-immagren.

Nwan d tafat ara ten-id-immagren.
Nwant d tafat ara tent-id-immagren.
Tenwiḍ d tafat ara k-id-immagren.
Tenwiḍ d tafat ara kem-id-immagren.
Dayen, faqeɣ.
Dayen, faqen.
Dayen, faqent.
Dayen, ifaq.
Dayen, tfaq.
Dayen, nfaq.
Dayen, tfaqeḍ.
Dayen, tfaqem.
Dayen, tfaqemt.

Armi d tura i tfaqem.

Akim, berkam iḍes.

Tigi akk d timucuha a mmi.
Tigi akk d timucuha a yelli.
Tigi akk d timucuha ay arraw-iw.
Nadi, tzemreḍ ad t-tafeḍ.
Nadim, tzemrem ad t-tafem.
Nadimt, tzemremt ad t-tafemt.
Nadit, tzemrem ad t-tafem.
Ma nudan akken i ilaq, zemren ad t-afen.
Ma nudant akken i ilaq, zemrent ad t-afent.
Ma nudaɣ akken i ilaq, zemreɣ ad t-afeɣ.
Ma tnuda akken i ilaq, tezmer ad t-taf.
Ma inuda akken i ilaq, yezmer ad t-yaf.
Ma nnuda akken i ilaq, nezmer ad t-naf.
Ma tnudam akken i ilaq, tzemrem ad t-tafem.
Ma tnudamt akken i ilaq, tzemremt ad t-tafemt.
Ma tnudaḍ akken i ilaq, tzemreḍ ad t-tafeḍ.
Settin iseggasen aya d leḥzen yugi ad iṭṭixer.
Settin iseggasen aya d nettɛebbi aɣilif.
Settin iseggasen aya d nekkni nettbibbi urfan.
Settin iseggasen aya d nekkni ur nufi iman-nneɣ.
Settin iseggasen aya d kunwi ur tufim iman-nwen.
Inced-it-id ɣer tmeɣra-s ur d-yusi ara.
Inced-itt-id ɣer tmeɣra-s ur d-tusi ara.
Inced-iten-id ɣer tmeɣra-s ur d-usin ara.
Inced-itent-id ɣer tmeɣra-s ur d-usint ara.
Inced-iyi-n ɣer tmeɣra-s ur n-usiɣ ara.
Inced-aɣ-in ɣer tmeɣra-s ur nusi-n ara.
Inced-ik-id ɣer tmeɣra-s ur d-tusiḍ ara.

Inced-iken-id ɣer tmeɣra-s ur d-tusim ara.

Tugdut, rran-tt akkin.

Ɣer lejba walan tafat, tettmurud deg tikli ur teɛjil.
Ɣer lejba walant tafat, tettmurud deg tikli ur teɛjil.
Ɣer lejba twalam tafat, tettmurud deg tikli ur teɛjil.
Ɣer lejba twalamt tafat, tettmurud deg tikli ur teɛjil.
Ɣer lejba twalaḍ tafat, tettmurud deg tikli ur teɛjil.
Ɣer lejba twala tafat, tettmurud deg tikli ur teɛjil.
Ɣer lejba iwala tafat, tettmurud deg tikli ur teɛjil.
Ɣer lejba nwala tafat, tettmurud deg tikli ur teɛjil.
Walaɣ tafat mebɛid i d-tettezɣuɣud.
Walan tafat mebɛid i d-tettezɣuɣud.
Walant tafat mebɛid i d-tettezɣuɣud.
Iwala tafat mebɛid i d-tettezɣuɣud.
Twala tafat mebɛid i d-tettezɣuɣud.
Nwala tafat mebɛid i d-tettezɣuɣud.

Twalam tafat mebɛid i d-tettezɣuɣud.
Twalamt tafat mebɛid i d-tettezɣuɣud.
Abrid n tafat metwal taddart yezdeɣ ugdud agujil.
Abrid-is metwal taddart yezdeɣ ugdud agujil.
Tafat terra srid ɣer taddart yeqqim deg ṭṭlam aṭas aya.
Tafat terra srid ɣer taddart yeqqim deg tillas aṭas aya.
Tafat terra srid ɣer taddart akken ad tt-id-tsuffeɣ seg ṭṭlam.
Tafat terra srid ɣer taddart akken ad tt-id-tsuffeɣ seg tillas.
Yectaq ugdud-iw cwiṭ n tafat.
Yectaq ugdud-iw yerwan ṭṭlam cwiṭ n tafat.
Yectaq ugdud-iw yerwan tillas cwiṭ n tafat.

Yectaq uɣref-iw yerwan tillas cwiṭ n tafat.
Yectaq uɣref-iw yerwan ṭṭlam cwiṭ n tafat.

Ssubbeɣ s asif ad d-gemreɣ iselman.

Ddmen-d tisennarin, ssubben s asif ad d-gemren iselman.
Ddment-d tisennarin, ssubbent s asif ad d-gemrent iselman.

Teskiddib ɣef yiman-is, teqqar-as rwiɣ.

Qqarent-as neṛwa, nutenti lluẓent.

Aqerruy icab, bab-is ur yuwiḍ ɛecrin.
Icab uqerruy-is, netta mazal-it meẓẓi.
Icab uqerruy-is, nettat mazal-itt meẓẓiyet.
Icab uqerruy-iw, nekk mazal-iyi meẓẓiyeɣ.
Icab uqerruy-ik, kečč mazal-ik meẓẓiyeḍ.
Icab uqerruy-im, kemm mazal-ikem meẓẓiyeḍ.
Icab uqerruy-inek, kečč mazal-ik meẓẓiyeḍ.

Icab uqerruy-ines, nettat mazal-itt meẓẓiyet.

Caben kan akka d imeẓẓyanen.
Cabent kan akka d timeẓẓyanin.

Icab uqerruy-nwent, kunemti mazal-ikent meẓẓiyit.
Icab uqerruy-nkent, kunemti mazal-ikent meẓẓiyit.

Icab uqerruy-nsent, nutenti mazal-itent meẓẓiyit.

Twala amrar d aberqac, tenwa-t d azrem.

Yeqqes-it uzrem, yettagad aseɣwen.
Yeqqes-itt uzrem, tettagad aseɣwen.
Yeqqes-aɣ uzrem, nettagad aseɣwen.
Yeqqes-iyi uzrem, ttagadeɣ aseɣwen.
Yeqqes-iten uzrem, ttagaden aseɣwen.
Yeqqes-itent uzrem, ttagadent aseɣwen.

Yeqqes-ikem uzrem, tettagadeḍ aseɣwen.
Yeqqes-iken uzrem, tettagadem aseɣwen.
Yeqqes-ikent uzrem, tettagademt aseɣwen.

Tettebririḥ, amzun yeqqes-itt uzrem.

Ttebririḥen, amzun yeqqes-iten uzrem.
Ttebririḥent, amzun yeqqes-itent uzrem.
Tettebririḥeḍ, amzun yeqqes-ik uzrem.
Tettebririḥeḍ, amzun yeqqes-ikem uzrem.
Tettebririḥem, amzun yeqqes-iken uzrem.
Tettebririḥemt, amzun yeqqes-ikent uzrem.
Wissen ma tfukkeḍ s tɣuri ungal-nni inu ?
Wissen ma tfukkem s tɣuri ungal-nni inu ?
Wissen ma tfukkemt s tɣuri ungal-nni inu ?
Wissen ma tfukk s tɣuri ungal-nni inu ?
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkeḍ rray-im mi i t-tfukkeḍ.
Wissen ma ifukk s tɣuri ungal-nni inu ?
Wissen ma fukken s tɣuri ungal-nni inu ?
Wissen ma fukkent s tɣuri ungal-nni inu ?
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkem rray-nwen mi i t-tfukkem s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkemt rray-nwent mi i t-tfukkemt s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-fken rray-nsen mi i t-fukken s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-fkent rray-nsent mi i t-fukkent s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkemt rray-nkent mi i t-tfukkemt s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkemt tamuɣli-nkent mi i t-tfukkemt s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-fkent tamuɣli-nsent mi i t-fukkent s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-fken tamuɣli-nsen mi i t-fukken s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkemt tamuɣli-nwent mi i t-tfukkemt s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkeḍ tamuɣli-inek mi i t-tfukkeḍ s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkeḍ tamuɣli-k mi i t-tfukkeḍ s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkeḍ tamuɣli-inem mi i t-tfukkeḍ s tɣuri.
Bɣiɣ kan ad iyi-d-tefkeḍ tamuɣli-m mi t-tfukkeḍ s tɣuri.
Yiwen n wass n umwan, yiwen n urgaz yeqqim ddaw n tasaft-is tameqqrant.
Yiwen n wass n tmenzut, yiwen n urgaz yeqqim ddaw n tasaft-is tameqqrant.
Yiwen n wass n lexrif, yiwen n urgaz yeqqim ddaw n tasaft-is tameqqrant.
Yiwen n wass n umwan, yiwen n urgaz yeqqim ddaw n belluḍt-is tameqqrant.
Yiwen n wass n lexrif, yiwen n urgaz yeqqim ddaw n belluḍt-is tameqqrant.
Sdat n useklu n tasaft tella yiwet n tebḥirt teẓẓa d ddellaɛ.
Sdat n useklu n tasaft tella yiwet n tebḥirt n ddellaɛ.
D ayen issewhamen, tidellaɛin timeqqranin meqqint-d kan akka deg rrbiɛ, ma d tasaft-iw tettakk-d igumma d imecṭaḥ maḍi.
Dɣa imiren kan yiwen n uɛeqqa n ubelluḍ yeɣli-d ɣef uqerruy n urgaz-nni. Irfed ifassen-is s igenni netta isellef I yixef-is, yenna : " Ssuref-iyi a Rebbi, d ayen ur ttuɣaleɣ ara ad kecmeɣ deg wayen ur iyi-iɛnan. Cwi kan tasaf-iw mačči d tidellaɛin I d-tettarew…”
Lmut tugar talalit, tudert tɣunfa lṭufan.
Ayen i yettmmettaten yugar n wayen i d-yettlalen.
Ttlalen-d cwiṭ, ttmmettaten aṭas.
Ɣef uɛrur teqwa-d teɣrit.
Ɣef uzagur teqwa-d teɣrit.
Ssnen kan tiɣrit.
Ala tiɣrit i ssnen.
Tiyitiwin ssnen-asent.
Ssnen kan ad wwten.
Ulac aḥezzeb ɣur-sen.
Ulac aḥezzeb ɣur-s.
Imdanen ḥemmlen tudert.
Imdanen ur beqqun ara ad mmten.
Ur bɣin ara ad mmten.
Aṭṭan i t-id-ittakken d iɛewwzan.
Aṭṭan i t-id-ittakken d aɛekkaz.
S uɛekkaz deg ufus, rraḥma ulac.
Deg ufus ayeffus aɛekkaz, aḥezzeb ulac.
Deg ufus ayeffus aɛekkaz, aḥezzeb ur yelli.
Yeẓra d acu i yellan deg uɣyul, yekkes-as acciwen.
Cwi kan yekkes-as i uɣyul acciwen.
I lufan yesɛa uɣyul acciwen ?
Rebbi yessen aɣyul, ɣef waya i t-id-yefka mebla acciwen.
Yuḍen uzger,kerrzen s uɣyul.
Ur ṛwiɣ ara yid-m iɣimi.
Ur ṛwin ara yid-m iɣimi.
Ur ṛwint ara yid-m iɣimi.
Ur yeṛwi ara yid-m iɣimi.

D taqbaylit i d-yessawlen, rrem-as awal.
D taqbaylit i d-yessawlen, rremt-as awal.
D taqbaylit i d-yessawlen, rret-as awal.
D taqbaylit i d-yessawlen, err-as awal.
Ma tessawel-awen-d teqbaylit, ḥadret ur as-tettarram ara awal.
Ma tessawel-awent-d teqbaylit, ḥadremt ur as-tettarramt ara awal.
Ma tessawel-akent-d teqbaylit, ḥadremt ur as-tettarramt ara awal.
Ma tessawel-ak-d teqbaylit, ḥader ur as-tettarraḍ ara awal.
Ma tessawel-am-d teqbaylit, ḥader ur as-tettarraḍ ara awal.
Ma tessawel-awen-d teqbaylit, ḥadret ad as-tezzim aɛrur.
Ma tessawel-awent-d teqbaylit, ḥadremt ad as-tezzimt aɛrur.

Ma tessawel-am-d teqbaylit, ḥader ad as-tezziḍ aɛrur.
Ma tessawel-awen-d teqbaylit, ḥadrem ad as-tezzim aɛrur.
Ala kunwi i tesɛa.
Ala nekkni i tesɛa.
Ḥadrem ad tt-tḥecmem.
Ḥadremt ad tt-tḥecmemt.
Ḥadret ad tt-tḥecmem.
Ḥaderad tt-tḥecmeḍ.
Taḍsa asmi ara tt-ḍsen s yimeṭṭi n widak yettrun, nekk bateɣ.
Ttaḍsan ɣef wid yettrun.
Wa yettru wayeḍ yettaḍsa.
Ta tettru tayeḍ tettaḍsa.
Kra ttaḍsan, kra ttrun.
S yimi d taḍsa, s yiẓri d imeṭṭi.
A win yettaḍsan ass-a, heyyi-d iman-ik azekka i yimeṭṭi.
A tin yettaḍsan ass-a, heyyi-d iman-im azekka i yimeṭṭi.
A wid yettaḍsan ass-a, heyyim-d iman-nwen azekka i yimeṭṭi.
A tid yettaḍsan ass-a, heyyimt-d iman-nwent azekka i yimeṭṭi.
A tid yettaḍsan ass-a, heyyimt-d iman-nkent azekka i yimeṭṭi.
S yimi nettaḍsa, s yiẓri ntettru.
A tid yettaḍsan ass-a, heggimt-d iman-nkent azekka i yimeṭṭi.
A tid yettaḍsan ass-a, heggimt-d iman-nwent azekka i yimeṭṭi.
A wid yettaḍsan ass-a, heggim-d iman-nwen azekka i yimeṭṭi.
A tin yettaḍsan ass-a, heggi-d iman-im azekka i yimeṭṭi.
A win yettaḍsan ass-a, heggi-d iman-ik azekka i yimeṭṭi.
Tamezduɣt mi ara tt-zedɣen deg yixxamen n wid i neffun, nekk yettɣaḍ-iyi lḥal.
Neffun-ten akken ad zedɣen ixxamen-nsen.
Nfan-t akken ad zedɣen axxam-is.
Nfan-tt akken ad zedɣen axxam-is.
Nfan-k akken ad zedɣen axxam-ik.
Nfan-kem akken ad zedɣen axxam-im.
Nfan-ken akken ad zedɣen ixxamen-nwen.
Nfan-kent akken ad zedɣen ixxamen-nwent.
Nfan-kent akken ad zedɣen ixxamen-nkent.
Nfan-ten akken ad zedɣen ixxamen-nsen.
Nfan-tent akken ad zedɣen ixxamen-nsent.

Akka i nniɣ i waṭas am kečč.

Yir amdan d win yeqizziben.
Yir amdan d win yekkaten ccita.

Yir amdan d win nettaṭṭaf ara imi-s.
Yir amdan d win ixeddɛen.
Yir amdan d win yettzzuxxun.
Yir amdan d win yekkaten deg gma-s.
Yir amdan d win ur nettqadar.
Yir amdan d win yettun laṣel-is.
Yir amdan d win ur nettasem ɣef yidles-is.
Yir amdan d win yettawin yettarra.
Yir amdan d win yettawin imecriwen.
Yir amdan d win ur nettqili.
Yir amdan d win ur nsemmeḥ.
Yir amdan d win yettaṭṭafen tuḥsibin.
Yir amdan d win iḥeqren.
Yir amdan d win yettɣurrun agujil.
Yir amdan d win yettɣurrun gma-s.
Yir amdan d win yeskiddiben.
Yir amdan d win ur nesɛi ara tinzert.
Yir amdan d win ur nesɛi ara nnif.
Yir amdan d bu sin wudmawen.
Yir amdan d win yeddan d lbaṭel.
Yir amdan d win iɣuccen iman-is.

Yir amdan d win ur yeṭṭifen ara deg tjadit-is.
Yir amdan d win irekḍen iẓuran-is.
Ulac lemqam i teǧǧa ad d-tesɛu dderya, tizzya-s ɛyant deg urebbi.
Ulac afakan i teǧǧa ad d-tesɛu dderya, tizzya-s ɛyant deg urebbi.
Tnuda-d akk ifukan akken ad d-tesɛu dderya.
Tnudamt-d akk ifukan akken ad d-tesɛumt dderya.
Nudant-d akk ifukan akken ad d-sɛunt dderya.
Tnudaḍ-d akk ifukan akken ad d-tesɛuḍ dderya.

Tennejla neɣ texmet kan simira ?

Lecyux ḥemmlen lewɛadi.

Aseggas a-t-a iɛedda, amaynut yettaḍsa, s tafat axxam yeflali.

D amenzu rwin-tt s tmeɣra, s ṭṭbel d lɣiḍa, seksu d weksum n uɣelmi.
D amenzu xedmen-as tmeɣra, s ṭṭbel d lɣiḍa, seksu d weksum n uɣelmi.
Ilul-d umenzu, xedmen-as ssbuɛ.
Ilul-d uqcic, slalwent tlawin.
Amenzu i d-ilulen d aqcic.
Aqcic d argaz n uzekka, baba-s yethenna, temɣer anef-as ad d-testeqsi.
Mi ara yuɣal baba-s d amɣar, d netta ara yeṭṭfen amḍiq-is.
Ilul-d uqcic, yefreḥ baba-s.
Lmeḥna yeẓra ad tt-yerwu, ulac asteɛfu, mmi-s ilaq ad d-yekker.
Ifukk usteɛfu ɣef urgaz i d-yesɛan aqcic.
Tamasit n ubabat meqqert mi ara as-d-ilal uqcic.
Akka tura ɣur-i ixeddim, alma weɛɛaɣ ara ɛeddiɣ ɣur-s.
Ma weɛɛaɣ ad as-rreɣ tasuqqilt i uḍris-a.
Netta d ddunit d amcečču, tewɛer tettɣullu, ur tt-ittaǧǧa ad t-tezzuɣer.
Netta d ddunit d amcečču seg zik.
Nettat d ddunit d amcečču seg zik.
Nekk d ddunit d amcečču seg zik.
Nekkni d ddunit d amcečču seg zik.

Nutni d ddunit seg zik d amcečču.

Yemma-s iẓri-s iteddu, tḥemmel-it d amenzu, ad tsebbel fell-as leɛmer.
Ɣef mmi-s, tayemmat tezmer ad tsebbel leɛmer-is.
Ɣef mmi-s, tayemmat tezmer ad tsebbel tudert-is.
Tayemmat tḥemmel mmi-s am leɛmer-is.
Tayemmat tḥemmel mmi-s am tmemmuct n tiṭ-is.
Ulac win neɣ tin iḥemmlen mmi-s neɣ yelli-s am tyemmat.
Tayemmat d tayri akken ma tella.
Yemma tif kullec.
Mmi-s yettimɣur irennu, s turart izehhu, am netta am tizzya-s yeqqar.
Aqcic yettimɣur irennu.
Taqcict tettimɣur trennu.
Arrac ttimɣuren rennun.
Tiqcicin ttimɣurent rennunt.
Am netta am tizzya-s yeqqar.
Am nettta am tizzya-s teqqar.
Am nekkni am tizziwin-nneɣ neqqar.
Am nekkenti am tizziwin-nteɣ neqqar.
Am kečč am tizzya-k teqqareḍ.
Am kemm am tizzya-m teqqareḍ.
Am kunwi am tizziwin-nwen teqqarem.
Am kunemti am tizziwin-nwent teqqaremt.
Am kunemti am tizziwin-nkent teqqaremt.
Am nutni am tizziwin-nsen qqaren.
Am nutennti am tizziwin-nsent qqarent.
Metlen-t deg uxxam ɣer ujgu, netta i d aqerru, mi ara yuɣal baba-s d amɣar.
Metlen-t deg uxxam ɣer ujgu.
D netta ara yuɣalen d aqerru.
Mi ara yuɣal baba-s d amɣar, d netta ara yeṭṭfen amkan-is.
Mi ara yeɣli baba-s d amɣar, d netta ara irefden amḍiq-is.
Mi meqqer yewweḍ ɛecrin, zewjent tizzyiwin, yemma-s tekker ad d-tnadi.
Tameṭṭut tekker ad d-tnadi tislit i mmi-s.
Aqcic yuweḍ ɛecrin, yemma-s tekker ad as-d-tezwej.
Tizzya-s s uxxam, ula d netta ilaq ad yercel.
Tizziwin-is xedment ixxamen, yeggra-d kan netta.
Ala netta i d-yeggran ur yezwij ara.
Tɣaz tewtult tineqqicin, mɣint-d tjeǧǧigin.
Mi tɣaz tewtult tineqqicin, d tijeǧǧigin i d-yemɣin.
Teglalez ɣef yijeǧǧigen, tberqec teɛrurt-is.
Teglalez deg tefsut ɣef yijeǧǧigen, taɛrurt-is tuɣal akk d taberqact.
Teglalez deg tefsut ɣef yijeǧǧigen, tazagurt-is tuɣal akk d taberqact.
Teglalez deg tefsut ɣef yijeǧǧigen, taɛrurt-is akk teberqec.
Teglalez deg tefsut ɣef yijeǧǧigen, tazagurt-is akk teberqec.
eglalez deg tefsut ɣef yijeǧǧigen, taɛrurt-is akken ma tella teberqec.
Teglalez deg tefsut ɣef yijeǧǧigen, tazagurt-is akken ma tella teberqec.
Teglalez deg tefsut ɣef yijeǧǧigen, taɛrurt-is teberqec d tirni.
Teglalez deg tefsut ɣef yijeǧǧigen, tazagurt-is teberqec d tirni.
Deg tsemhuyt n tefsut, yiwet n tewtult tacebḥant, teffeɣ-d seg usgen-is, teɛna iɣewdan yeǧǧuǧǧgen.
Teffeɣ-d tewtult seg usgen-is.
Teffeɣ-d seg usgen-is, terra srid ɣer yiɣewdan yeččuren d ijeǧǧigen.
Segmi tuweḍ ɣer din, terra-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi tengef.
Segmi yuweḍ ɣer din, yerra-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi yengef.
Segmi nuweḍ ɣer din, nerra-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi nengef.
Segmi uwḍeɣ ɣer din, rriɣ-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi negfeɣ.
Segmi uwḍen ɣer din, rran-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi negfen.
Segmi uwḍent ɣer din, rrant-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi negfent.
Segmi tuwḍeḍ ɣer din, terriḍ-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi tnegfeḍ.
Segmi tuwḍem ɣer din, terram-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi tnegfem.
Segmi tuwḍemt ɣer din, terramt-tt i uǧelleb d tazzla almi tnegfemt.
Tuɣal teggar-d nnhati mi testaɛfay maca allaɣ-is ixeddem.
Yuɣal yeggar-d nnhati mi yestaɛfay maca allaɣ-is ixeddem.
Tuɣal teggar-d nnhati mi tesgunfuy maca allaɣ-is ixeddem.
Yuɣal yeggar-d nnhati mi yesgunfuy maca allaɣ-is ixeddem.
Nuɣal neggar-d nnhati mi nestaɛfay maca allaɣ-nneɣ ixeddem.
Nuɣal neggar-d nnhati mi nesgunfuy maca allaɣ-nneɣ ixeddem.
Nuɣal neggar-d nnhati mi nesgunfuy maca allaɣ-nteɣ ixeddem.
Nuɣal neggar-d nnhati mi nestaɛfay maca allaɣ-nteɣ ixeddem.
Uɣaleɣ ggareɣ-d nnhati mi staɛfayeɣ maca allaɣ-inu ixeddem.
Uɣaleɣ ggareɣ-d nnhati mi sgunfuyeɣ maca allaɣ-inu ixeddem.
Uɣalen ggaren-d nnhati mi staɛfayen maca allaɣ-nsen ixeddem.
Uɣalen ggaren-d nnhati mi sgunfuyen maca allaɣ-nsen ixeddem.
Uɣalent ggarent-d nnhati mi sgunfuyent maca allaɣ-nsent ixeddem.
Uɣalent ggarent-d nnhati mi sfeɛfayent maca allaɣ-nsent ixeddem.
Yuɣal yeggar-d nnhati mi yesgunfuy maca allaɣ-ines ixeddem.
Tuɣal teggar-d nnhati mi tesgunfuy maca allaɣ-ines ixeddem.
Tuɣaleḍ teggareḍ-d nnhati mi tesgunfuyeḍ maca allaɣ-ik ixeddem.
Tuɣaleḍ teggareḍ-d nnhati mi testeɛfayeḍ maca allaɣ-ik ixeddem.
Tuɣaleḍ teggareḍ-d nnhati mi tesgunfuyeḍ maca allaɣ-im ixeddem.
Tuɣaleḍ teggareḍ-d nnhati mi testaɛfayeḍ maca allaɣ-im ixeddem.
Tuɣalem teggarem-d nnhati mi tesgunfuyem maca allaɣ-nwen ixeddem.
Tuɣalem teggarem-d nnhati mi testaɛfayem maca allaɣ-nwen ixeddem.
Tuɣalemt teggaremt-d nnhati mi testaɛfayemt maca allaɣ-nwent ixeddem.
Tuɣalemt teggaremt-d nnhati mi tesgunfuyemt maca allaɣ-nwent ixeddem.
Tuɣalemt teggaremt-d nnhati mi tesgunfuyemt maca allaɣ-nkent ixeddem.
Tuɣalemt teggaremt-d nnhati mi testaɛfayemt maca allaɣ-nkent ixeddem.
Tuɣaleḍ teggareḍ-d nnhati mi testaɛfayeḍ maca allaɣ-inek ixeddem.
Tuɣaleḍ teggareḍ-d nnhati mi tesgunfuyeḍ maca allaɣ-inek ixeddem.
Tuɣaleḍ teggareḍ-d nnhati mi testaɛfayeḍ maca allaɣ-inem ixeddem.
Tuɣaleḍ teggareḍ-d nnhati mi tesgunfuyeḍ maca allaɣ-inem ixeddem.
Tettxemmim, tettxemmim almi i d-tufa yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Yettxemmim, Yettxemmim almi i d-yufa yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Nettxemmim, nettxemmim almi i d-nufa yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Tettxemmimeḍ, tettxemmimeḍ almi i d-tufiḍ yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Tettxemmimem, tettxemmimem almi i d-tufam yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Tettxemmimemt, tettxemmimemt almi i d-tufamt yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Ttxemmimeɣ, ttxemmimeɣ almi i d-ufiɣ yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Ttxemmimen, ttxemmimen almi i d-ufan yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Ttxemmiment, ttxemmiment almi i d-ufant yiwet n takti ara yernun i tefsut ccbaḥa.
Nɣant-kem tismin.
Nɣant-tent tismin.
Nɣant-ken tismin.
Nɣant-kent tismin.
Nɣant-aɣ tismin.
Usmeɣ deg win i iyi-yifen, bɣiɣ ad iliɣ am netta neɣ xir.
Usmen deg win i ten-yifen, bɣan ad ilin am netta neɣ xir.
Usment deg win i tent-yifen, bɣant ad ilint am netta neɣ xir.
Tusmeḍ deg win i k-yifen, tebɣiḍ adt tiliḍ am netta neɣ xir.
Tusmeḍ deg win i kem-yifen, tebɣiḍ ad tiliḍ am netta neɣ xir.
Tusmem deg win i ken-yifen, tebɣam ad tilim am netta neɣ xir.
Tusmemt deg win i kent-yifen, tebɣamt adt tilimt am netta neɣ xir.
Tusem deg win i tt-yifen, tebɣa adt tili am netta neɣ xir.
Yusem deg win i t-yifen, yebɣa adt yili am netta neɣ xir.
Nusem deg win i aɣ-yifen, nebɣa ad nili am netta neɣ xir.
Ihi d acu i d takti-yagi? D acu i tga tewtult?
Teṭall tewtult s igenni, geḥlent wallen-is.
Geḥlent wallen-is mi teṭall tewtult s igenni.
Tgeḥel tewtult mebla taẓult.
Tehmej tewtult ulmu, teḍla agusim.
Teḍla agusim tewtult mi tehmej ulmu.
Teḍla kan tewtult agusim, uglan-is uɣalen d izeggaɣen.
Teḍla kan tewtult agusim, uglan-is uɣalen d izewwaɣen.
Tilawin ttarrant agusim i wuglan-nsent.
Ttarrant tlawin agusim i wuglan-nsent.
Jebdeɣ-d akk iman-iw ɣef wayen yerzan almud.
Rnu nadi, yezmer yiwen n wass ad tafeḍ.
D acu ara m-in-iniɣ ? Ula d tuffɣ ur teffɣeɣ ara.
Wissen ma tesliḍ ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ ixeddim, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma tesla ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ ixeddim, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma yesla ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ ixeddim, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma tesliḍ ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ amahil, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma yesla ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ amahil, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma tesla ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ amahil, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma teslam ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ amahil, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma teslamt ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ amahil, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma teslam ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ ixeddim, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma teslamt ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ ixeddim, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma slan ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ amahil, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma slant ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ amahil, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Wissen ma slan ? Nekk dayen, ḥebseɣ ixeddim, uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Mačči aṭas aya i uwiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Mačči aṭas aya i uwin tastaɣt-nsen.
Mačči aṭas aya i uwint tastaɣt-nsent.
Mačči aṭas aya i yuwi tastaɣt-is.
Mačči aṭas aya i yuwi tastaɣt-ines.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwi tastaɣt-is.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwi tastaɣt-ines.
Mačči aṭas aya i nuwi tastaɣt-nneɣ.
Mačči aṭas aya i nuwi tastaɣt-nteɣ.
Mačči aṭas aya i uwiɣ tastaɣt-inu.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwiḍ tastaɣt-inek.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwiḍ tastaɣt-ik.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwiḍ tastaɣt-inem.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwiḍ tastaɣt-im.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwim tastaɣt-nwen.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwimt tastaɣt-nwent.
Mačči aṭas aya i tuwimt tastaɣt-nkent.
Nettḥar ad d-taweḍ testaɣt.
Nettḥar ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ neɛweq d acu ara nexdem.
Yettḥar ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ yeɛweq d acu ara yexdem.
Tettḥar ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ teɛweq d acu ara texdem.
Tettḥareḍ ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ tɛewqeḍ d acu ara txedmeḍ.
Tettḥarem ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ tɛewqem d acu ara txedmem.
Tettḥaremt ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ tɛewqemt d acu ara txedmemt.
Ttḥareɣ ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ ɛewqeɣ d acu ara xedmeɣ.
Ttḥaren ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ ɛewqen d acu ara xedmen.
Ttḥarent ad d-taweḍ testaɣt, mi ara d-taweḍ ɛewqent d acu ara xedment.
Ixeddim yečča temẓi, tastaɣt temmuger-itt-id temɣer.
Amahil yečča temẓi, tastaɣt temmuger-itt-id temɣer.
Ixeddim yečča temẓi, tastaɣt temmuger-itt-id tewser.
Amahil yečča temẓi, tastaɣt temmuger-itt-id tewser.
Temẓi yečča-tt umahil, tastaɣt tɣelli-d deg temɣer.
Temẓi yečča-tt yixeddim, tastaɣt tɣelli-d deg temɣer.
Temẓi yečča-tt umahil, tastaɣt tɣelli-d deg tewser.
Tastaɣt tettuɣal d aɣbel.
D aɣbel i tettuɣal testaɣt.
Ad tɛewqeḍ d acu ara txedmeḍ mi ara tawiḍ tastaɣt-ik.
Ad tɛewqeḍ d acu ara txedmeḍ mi ara tawiḍ tastaɣt-im.
Ad tɛewqeḍ d acu ara txedmeḍ mi ara tawiḍ tastaɣt-inek.
Ad tɛewqeḍ d acu ara txedmeḍ mi ara tawiḍ tastaɣt-inem.
Ad ɛewqeɣ d acu ara xedmeɣ mi ara awiɣ tastaɣt-iw.
Ad ɛewqeɣ d acu ara xedmeɣ mi ara awiɣ tastaɣt-inu.
Ad yeɛweq d acu ara yexdem mi ara yawi tastaɣt-is.
Ad yeɛweq d acu ara yexdem mi ara yawi tastaɣt-ines.
Ad teɛweq d acu ara texdem mi ara tawi tastaɣt-is.
Ad teɛweq d acu ara texdem mi ara tawi tastaɣt-ines.
Ad neɛweq d acu ara nexdem mi ara nawi tastaɣt-nneɣ.
Ad neɛweq d acu ara nexdem mi ara nawi tastaɣt-nteɣ.
Ad ɛewqen d acu ara xedmen mi ara awin tastaɣt-nsen.
Ad ɛewqent d acu ara xedment mi ara awint tastaɣt-nsent.
Ad tɛewqem d acu ara txedmem mi ara tawim tastaɣt-nwen.
Ad tɛewqemt d acu ara txedmemt mi ara tawimt tastaɣt-nwent.
Ad tɛewqemt d acu ara txedmemt mi ara tawimt tastaɣt-nkent.
Tezger taḥemmalt , teḍla tabacemmaqt.
Tezger taḥemmalt , tewwet tabacemmaqt.
Tezger taḥemmalt , teḍla lḥenni i yiḍarren-is.
Tezger taḥemmalt , tewwet lḥenni i yiḍarren-is.
Tuli tasawent, terkeb tajedɛunt.
Tuli tasawent, terkeb tagmert.
Yuli tasawent, yerkeb tajedɛunt.
Yuli tasawent, yerkeb tagmert.
Tuliḍ tasawent, trekbeḍ tagmert.
Tuliḍ tasawent, trekbeḍ tajedɛunt.
Imi tuweḍ ɣer lejba, tṣubb-d seg uɛrur n tegmart-is tamecṭuḥt, temmuger-d tuccent.
Imi yuweḍ ɣer lejba, iṣṣubb-d seg uɛrur n tegmart-is tamecṭuḥt, immuger-d tuccent.
Imi tuweḍ ɣer lejba, tṣubb-d seg uɛrur n tjedɛunt-is, temmuger-d tuccent.
Imi yuweḍ ɣer lejba, iṣṣubb-d seg uɛrur n tjedɛunt-is, immuger-d tuccent.
Tuccent teldi deg warquqen-is, teqqim ddeqs akken, tuɣal amzun tendekwal-d seg yiḍes.
Tettewhem, dɣa teldi deg warquqen-is.
Yettewhem, dɣa yeldi deg warquqen-is.
Nettewhem, dɣa neldi deg warquqen-nneɣ.
Nettewhem, dɣa neldi deg warquqen-nteɣ.
Ttwehmeɣ, dɣa ldiɣ deg warquqen-iw.
Ttwehmeɣ, dɣa ldiɣ deg warquqen-inu.
Ttwehmen, dɣa ldin deg warquqen-nsen.
I uḍris, wissen ma teɣriḍ-t ?
Ttwehment, dɣa ldint deg warquqen-nsent.
Tettewhem, dɣa teldi deg warquqen-ines.
Yettewhem, dɣa yeldi deg warquqen-ines.
Tettwehmeḍ, dɣa teldiḍ deg warquqen-ik.
Tettwehmeḍ, dɣa teldiḍ deg warquqen-inek.
Tettwehmeḍ, dɣa teldiḍ deg warquqen-im.
Tettwehmeḍ, dɣa teldiḍ deg warquqen-inem.
Tettwehmem, dɣa teldim deg warquqen-nwen.
Tettwehmemt, dɣa teldimt deg warquqen-nwent.
Tettwehmemt, dɣa teldimt deg warquqen-nkent.
D tahuski n tewtult i tt-iswehmen.
D tahuski n tmeddakelt-is i tt-iswehmen.
D tahuski n tmeddakelt-is i tt-yeǧǧan tbat.
D tahuski n tmeddakelt-is i t-yeǧǧan ibat.
D tahuski n tmeddakelt-is i t-iswehmen.
Mebla ma tenna-as azul, teɣli fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Mebla ma yenna-as azul, yeɣli fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Mebla ma nenna-as azul, neɣli fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Mebla ma nniɣ-as azul, ɣliɣ fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Mebla ma nnan-as azul, ɣlin fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Mebla ma nnant-as azul, ɣlint fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Mebla ma tennam-as azul, teɣlim fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Mebla ma tennamt-as azul, teɣlimt fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Mebla ma tenniḍ-as azul, teɣliḍ fell-as s yisteqsiyen.
Kra dagi akk tettnadi ad teḥṣu amek akka i texdem tewtult iwakken ad teqqim tettcercur deg sser.
Kra dagi akk tettnadi ad teḥṣu amek akka i texdem tmeddakelt-is iwakken ad teqqim tettcercur deg sser.
Kra dagi akk yettnadi ad yeḥṣu amek akka i texdem tmeddakelt-is iwakken ad teqqim tettcercur deg sser.
Tawtult d tin ur nettɣullu, temla-as merra ansa i d-tɛedda d wayen akk i tga akken ɣer taggara tuɣal tif akk tizziwin-is deg ṣṣifa.
Tuɣal tif akk tizziwin-is deg ṣṣifa.
Tuɣal tif akk tizziwin-is deg thuski.
Tuɣal tif akk tizziwin-is deg sser.
D nettat akk i d timserrit.
Tameṭṭut mačči d tin yettɣullun.
Taqcict mačči d tin yettɣullun.
Tameṭṭut d tin yettsebbilen.
Ur tettɣullu, tettsebbil.
Ur yettɣullu, yettsebbil.
Ur nettɣullu, nettsebbil.
Ur ttɣulluɣ, ttsebbileɣ.
Ur ttɣullun, ttsebbilen.
Ur ttɣullunt, ttsebbilent.
Ur tettɣulluḍ, tettsebbileḍ.
Ur tettɣullum, tettsebbilem.
Ur tettɣullumt, tettsebbilemt.
Tɣaz tuccent tineqqicin, mɣint-d tsennanin.
Tuccent mi tɣaz tineqqucin, mɣint-d tsennanin.
Tuccent mi tɣaz tineqqucin, d tisennanin i d-yemɣin.
Mɣint-d tsennanin mi tɣaz tuccent tineqqicin.
Teglalez tuccent ɣef tsennanin i d-yemɣin, tencew teɛrurt-is.
Teglalez tuccent ɣef tsennanin, tencew teɛrurt-is.
Teṭall tuccent s igenni, tedderɣel tiṭ-is.
Tuccent mi teṭall s igenni, tedderɣel tiṭ-is.
Tuccent mi teṭall s igenni, d tiṭ-is i yeddreɣlen.
Tehmej tuccent ulmu, frurin-d wuglan-is.
D uglan-is i d-yefrurin mi tehmej tuccent ulmu.
Frurin-d wuglan-is mi tehmej tuccent ulmu.
Tezger taḥemmalt, treẓ tqejjirt-is.
Treẓ tqejjirt-is mi tezger taḥemmalt.
D taḥemmalt i tezger mi treẓ tqejjirt-is.
Tuli tasawent, teffeɣ-d tẓemmumt-is.
D taẓemmumt-is i as-d-yeffɣen mi tuli tasawent.
Teffeɣ-as-d tẓemmumt-is mi tuli tasawent.
Abrid i d-yuwi ɣezzif, Iwerrek d isennanen.
Abrid i d-yuwi ɣezzif, yeččur d isennanen.
Abrid i d-yuwi ɣezzif, yessa d isennanen.
Abrid i d-yuwi ɣezzif, yeččur d uguren.
Abrid i d-yuwi ɣezzif, yessa d uguren.
Abrid i d-yuwi ɣezzif, iwerrek d uguren.

Yezga meskin yettiẓẓif, cergent tfexsa iḍarren.
Yeṛwa tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-is.
Teṛwa tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-is.
Neṛwa tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-nneɣ.
Neṛwa tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-nteɣ.
Teṛwam tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-nwen.
Teṛwamt tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-nwent.
Teṛwamt tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-nkent.
Ṛwiɣ tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-iw.
Ṛwan tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-nsen.
Ṛwan tikli ḥafi, tifexsa cergent iḍarren-nsent.
Iɣrem-as-d tamart lḥif, seg wasmi i d-yeldi allen.
Yettgalla fell-as lḥif, seg wasmi i d-yeldi allen.
Yettgalla fell-as lḥif, seg wasmi i d-teldi allen.
Yettgalla fell-aneɣ lḥif, seg wasmi i d-neldi allen.
Yettgalla fell-anteɣ lḥif, seg wasmi i d-neldi allen.
Yettgalla fell-i lḥif, seg wasmi i d-ldiɣ allen.
Yettgalla fell-asen lḥif, seg wasmi i d-ldin allen.
Yettgalla fell-asent lḥif, seg wasmi i d-ldint allen.
Yettgalla fell-ak lḥif, seg wasmi i d-teldiḍ allen.
Yettgalla fell-am lḥif, seg wasmi i d-teldiḍ allen.
Yettgalla fell-awen lḥif, seg wasmi i d-teldim allen.
Yettgalla fell-awent lḥif, seg wasmi i d-teldimt allen.
Yettgalla fell-akent lḥif, seg wasmi i d-teldimt allen.
Yettawi lḥif yid-s asurif, d yir lfal i d-ttmmagaren.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-s asurif.
D lḥid i t-yettsaɛafen.
D lḥif i t-yettwanasen.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-i asurif.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-k asurif.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-m asurif.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-neɣ asurif.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-wen asurif.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-went asurif.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-kent asurif.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-sen asurif.
D lḥif i yettawin yid-sent asurif.
D yir lfal i d-ttmmagareɣ.
D yir lfal i d-ttmmagaren.
D yir lfal i d-ttmmagarent.
D yir lfal i d-yettmmagar.
D yir lfal i d-tettmmagar.
D yir lfal i d-nettmmagar.
D yir lfal i d-tettmmagarem.
D yir lfal i d-tettmmagaremt.
D yir lfal i d-tettmmagareḍ.
S tayri ittenfal wul-is, ma d tasa-s tetteḥdiqqir.
S tayri ittenfal wul-is.
S tayri ittenfal wul-ines

S tayri ittenfal wul-inek

Yessway akk iẓuran-is, iḥemmel ad ilin bxir.

Teffud, teswa.
Neffud, neswa.

Ffudent, swant.

Ɣas yebɣa ad yerr ɣef yixef-is, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-it-id am ddkir.
Ɣas tebɣa ad terr ɣef yixef-is, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-itt-id am ddkir.
Ɣas nebɣa ad nerr ɣef yixfawen-nneɣ, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-aɣ-d am ddkir.
Ɣas nebɣa ad nerr ɣef yixfawen-nteɣ, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-aɣ-d am ddkir.
Ɣas tebɣam ad terrem ɣef yixfawen-nwen, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-iken-id am ddkir.
Ɣas tebɣamt ad terremt ɣef yixfawen-nwent, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-ikent-id am ddkir.
Ɣas tebɣamt ad terremt ɣef yixfawen-nkent, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-ikent-id am ddkir.
Ɣas bɣiɣ ad rreɣ ɣef yixef-iw, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-iyi-d am ddkir.
Ɣas bɣan ad rren ɣef yixfawen-nsen, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-iten-id am ddkir.
Ɣas bɣant ad rrent ɣef yixfawen-nsent, tamurt tettaṭṭaf-iten-id am ddkir.
Temɣer txeddem ccɣel-is, nettat kra ur as-tezmir.
Temɣer txeddem ccɣel-is, netta kra ur as-yezmir.

Temɣer txeddem ccɣel-is, nutenti kra ur as-zmirent.

Lufan i d-tzewwir temɣer, tudert ad tbeddel akk.

Lufan i d-tzewwir temɣer, wissen amek ara tɛeddi tudert-nneɣ.

Nettgalla anda teddiḍ ad neddu, ssber-nneɣ ur yesɛi tilisa.
Nettgalla anda teddiḍ ad neddu, ssber-nteɣ ur yesɛi tilisa.
Tettgallam anda tedda ad teddum, ssber-nwen ur yesɛi tilisa.
Tettgallamt anda tedda ad teddumt, ssber-nwent ur yesɛi tilisa.
Tettgallamt anda tedda ad teddumt, ssber-nkent ur yesɛi tilisa.
Ttgallaɣ anda teddiḍ ad dduɣ, ssber-iw ur yesɛi tilisa.
Ttgallan anda teddiḍ ad ddun, ssber-nsen ur yesɛi tilisa.
Ttgallant anda teddiḍ ad ddunt, ssber-nsen tur yesɛi tilisa.

Tamurt tzedɣeḍ tufa iman-is, nnig-s igenwan d izegzawen.
Tamurt anda i tettiliḍ, tettaf iman-is.
Tamurt anda i tettiliḍ, ur tufiḍ d acu i tt-yuɣen.

Tɛennu dima tin teɣna, asmahat teɛya deg-s aṭas.
Tɛennu dima tid teɣna, asmahat ɛyant deg-s aṭas.

Mačči d tin yetthuddun.
Mačči d tid yetthuddun.
Mačči d wid yetthuddun.
Zgan bennun, ur tthuddun.
Zgant bennunt, ur tthuddunt.
Yezga ibennu, ur yetthuddu.
Tezga tbennu, ur tetthuddu.
Nezga nbennu, ur netthuddu.
Tezgam tbennum, ur tetthuddum.
Tezgamt tbennum, ur tetthuddumt.
Tezgiḍ tbennuḍ, ur tetthudduḍ.
Zgiɣ bennuɣ, ur tthudduɣ.
« Lecɣal n taddart meqqrit, nekkni meẓẓiyit » Akkagi i yennum yeqqar.
Lecɣal n taddart meqqrit, nekkni meẓẓiyit.
Nekkni meẓẓiyit sdat n lecɣal n taddart.
Nezga meẓẓiyit sdat n lecɣal n taddart.
Zgan meẓẓiyit sdat n lecɣal n taddart.
Tezgam meẓẓiyit sdat n lecɣal n taddart.
D yiwen n urgaz iɛedren iman-is.
Ur yessin ara d acu i d zzuxx.
Ur tessin ara d acu i d zzuxx.
Ur nessin ara d acu i d zzuxx.

Ur tessinem ara d acu i d zzuxx.
Ur tessinemt ara d acu i d zzuxx.
Ur ssineɣ ara d acu i d zzuxx.
Ur ssinen ara d acu i d zzuxx.
Ur ssinent ara d acu i d zzuxx.

D yiwen n umadn ur nenkir ara aẓar-is.
D argaz iɣuccen ccwal.
D argaz i iḥemmlen talwit.
Abrid n tmussni yuɣ-it, i yelhan yeddem-it i tmaziɣt iga leqrar.
Iga leqrar i tmaziɣt.
Tga leqrar i tmaziɣt.
Gan leqrar i tmaziɣt.
Ala ayen yelhan i yettaddam.

Gant leqrar i tmaziɣt.

Ur d-tlul, ur d-tettlala.
Ur d-tluleḍ, ur d-tettlalaḍ.

A wi ara d-yuɣalen d aqcic.

Deg wahil-ines, tasgilt n tmedyazt, “tamedyazt war tilas” i d-isissin Muḥend n Tferka, d tin i nefren Djamal d nekk.
Nuzen-as acḥal d asefru.
Muḥend yeqqar-iten-id ɣer usawaḍ n rradyu-a.
Tadwilt-a (Tamedyezt war tilas) tuɣal d yiwen n ugraw n yimedyazen.
Ma bedreɣ-d kra deg-sen, llan : Igi Ǧamal, Buɛlam Messusi, Ǧamila n Tferka, Ǧamal Ḥemri, Ǧamal At Wdiɛ, Tsekkurt n Jerjer, Malek Ḥud atg...
Deg useggas 2000, tiliẓri BRTV tuweḍ ɣer yal axxam n tmurt n Leqbayel d tmura-nniḍen.
Djamal d neKk imi nezga d imeddukal imenza n tesgilt “Tamedyazt war tilas”, amekfadu-ines Muḥend n Tferka yusa-d seg Fransa ɣer tmurt deg useggas 2001, iɛreḍ-aɣ nekkni d Djamal d Tsekkurt n Jerjer s axxam-is, nečča-d imensi.
S uɛaruḍ ɣer yimensi, Muḥend yebɣa ad aɣ-isnemmer imi ncebbeḥ tadwilt-is.
Nekkni diɣen nebɣa ad s-nerr areṭṭal-is.
Nekker nuɣ-d seg ssuq n Tazmalt yiwet n tmehrazt n usɣar.
Yal yiwen deg-neɣ isuneɣ akken yebɣa yiwet n tama n tmehrazt-nni, nura diɣ fell-as sin n yisefra imecṭaḥ : “Tilelli “ n Djamal ma d “Tidet” inu.
Ma yella ɣef uzduz n tmehrazt-nni nura merra ismawen n yimedyazen n tedwilt-nni.
Muḥend n Tferka yerra tamehrazt iɣef d-uwiɣ awal, yis-s i d-tkeččem tesgilt “Tamedyazt war tilas”.
Ad d-tban deg ugdil (écran) tettezzi, mi ara teḥbes tuzzya-ines kra n yisekkilen keččmen d aserbabuɛ ɣer daxel-is. Azduz-is imiren ad ten-yeddez s 12 n tyitiwin. Taggara, isekkilen-nni teffɣen-d s tikli iseggmen wa deffir wa, ttaken-d aḍris n usefru-inu.
Nettazzal, nettazzal, addal am wa ɣur-s azal, yerna nnmara-nneɣ d uzzal.
Tajmilt i nezmer ad nerr i umedyaz-a i yemmuten meẓẓi, yeǧǧa-d taǧǧalt d snat yessi-s d timecṭuḥin, yiwet teqqar deg uɣerbaz amezwaru tayed deg ulemmas, d tiɣin n yiwen n udlis “Ɣas”.
Rriɣ-as tajmilt i Djamal s yiwen n usefru.
Ur fhimeɣ tigert deg wayen i d-teqqareḍ.
Ma ur t-id-tenniḍ ara s tefransist, ur ḥsiɣ d acu-t.
«Ɣas !» d azwel n wammud n tmedyazt i d-yeffɣen deg yunyu 2009 n umedyaz Djamal Iggui i aɣ-yeǧǧan deg wayyur n ṭuber aseggas 2008.

Tamurt, rẓan-tt deg ujgu n uɛrur, ur tettadded ɣef yiḍarren.
Tamurt, rẓan-tt deg ujgu n uɛrur, ur tettuɣal ad tbedd ɣef yiḍarren.
Tamurt, rẓan-tt deg ujgu n uɛrur, ur tettuɣal ad tbedd ɣef yiḍarren-is.
Ssaɣen-as times i uhicur, iliz-is iɛedda i wayyur.
Ssaɣen-as times i tmurt-iw.
Heggan-d akk anda ad rewlen mi qqden tamurt-nneɣ.
Heggan-d akk anda ara rewlen mi qqden tamurt-nneɣ.
Heggan-d akk anda ara ffren iman-nsen mi qqden tamurt-nneɣ.
Aṭas n Leqbayel i yettxemmimen akka am kečč ɣef temsal akk i d-tbedreḍ, nekk d yiwen gar-asen.
Maca mačči d kra yellan gar yifassen-nneɣ.
Ula d imdebbren n tmurt-nneɣ ur ttayalen ara deg yman-nsen,
Zgan d tiɛleǧtin gar yifassen n umaḍal n umalu, akken i d yenna i tetteddu ddunit.
Yiwen ur yeẓri anda i tettdu d wamek ara tefru.
Ad ak-d-yefk Rebbi abernus n tudert tumrant d tlaba ara icebḥen tudert-ik.
Ad icebbeḥ Rebbi tudert-ik.

Tamurt-iw tuwi ddnub, tečča wid i tt-iḥemmlen.
Tamurt-iw am temcict, tečča arraw-is.
Tamurt-iw d tamcict itetten arraw-is.
Tamurt-iw ur teḥmmil ara win i tt-iḥemmlen.
Tamurt-iw, tekkat amesmar deg uqerruy-is.
Tamurt-iw, mačči d arraw-is i tt-isferken.
Tamurt-iw a-tt-an gar yifassen iberraniyen.
Tamurt-iw tefka lebɣi i ujerbub, d netta i tt-iseddawen.
Tamurt-iw tefka lebɣi i win ur neswi, d netta i tt-iseddawen.
Tamurt-iw ɣef uqadum-is tkubb, cerrgen-tt wid terra d lerbub, almi ur teswi dayen.
Tamurt-iw ɣef uqadum-is tkubb.
Tamurt-iw i tt-icerrgen d wid terra d lerbub.

Aṭas i tḥemmlemt akal anda akken tefkamt iẓuran.
Yeɣli-d yimɣi ɣef wakal yeqqur mi t-id-gezmen d azegzaw.
Imɣi d azegzaw mi t-id-gezmen.
Nwan Amaziɣ leqqmen-t, ɣef wayla-s ad yezzi aɛrur.
Ttrajun deg Umaziɣ ad yezzi aɛrur i wayla-s.
Nwan Amaziɣ leqment s txellalt taɛrabt.
Ur ufiɣ ara amek ara kecmeɣ ɣe uɣmis Tiɣremt n wass n 24/06/2020,
Ur ufiɣ ara amek ara kecmeɣ ɣe uɣmis Tiɣremt n wass-a,
Ass-a deg uɣmis n tmaziɣt Tiɣremt tedda-d tdiwennit-iw.
Nuwi-d awal ɣef waṭas n yisental.
Asentel agejdan iɣef d-nuwi awal d win n teskla taqbaylit.
Llan warraw n leḥram ula deg iselmaden n tmaziɣt, maɛna cukkeɣ ugaren-ten warraw n leḥlal.
Ugur mačči deg tira i t-id-yettmmagar umaru yettarun tutlayt taqbaylit neɣ tamaziɣt s umata.
Qqim kan ulac tama ur neqris.
Qqimem kan ulac tama ur neqris.
Qqimemt kan ulac tama ur neqris.
Qqimet kan ulac tama ur neqris.
Yal yiwen amek yettaru, acu n usentel yefren akken ad d-yawi awal fell-as.
Tal yiwen amek tettaru, acu n usentel tefren akken ad d-tawi awal fell-as.
Uguren beddun mi ara ifakk umaru adlis-is s tira.
Ad t-iɣer wissen acḥal d abrid akken ad yessenqes deg tucḍiwin yettilin akken yebɣu iɛuss yiwen.
Ad t-tɣer wissen acḥal d abrid akken ad tessenqes deg tucḍiwin yettilin akken yebɣu iɛuss yiwen.
Ad issuter imeddukal-is iselmaden neɣ wid iẓzewren deg tmaziɣt ad t-ɛiwnen, ur ten-ittaf ara, sɛan lecɣal.
Ad tessuter imeddukal-is iselmaden neɣ wid iẓzewren deg tmaziɣt ad tt-ɛiwnen, ur ten-tettaf ara, sɛan lecɣal.
Inuda fell-asen, ur ten-yufi ara.
Tnuda fell-asen, ur ten-tufi ara.
Nnuda fell-asen, ur ten-nufi ara.
Tnudaḍ fell-asen, ur ten-tufiḍ ara.
Tnudam fell-asen, ur ten-tufim ara.
Terra-ken tmara ad teqqnem takmamt.
Terra-kent tmara ad teqqnemt takmamt.
Terra-k tmara ad teqqneḍ takmamt.
Terra-kem tmara ad teqqneḍ takmamt.
Tnudamt fell-asen, ur ten-tufimt ara.
Nudaɣ fell-asen, ur ten-ufiɣ ara.
Terra-t tmara ad yeqqen takmamt.
Terra-tt tmara ad teqqen takmamt.
Terra-aɣ tmara ad neqqen takmamt.
Terra-iyi tmara ad qqneɣ takmamt.
Terra-ten tmara ad qqnen takmamt.
Terra-tent tmara ad qqnent takmamt.
Nudaɣ fell-asent, ur tent-ufiɣ ara.
Tuwi-d fell-ak ad tessirideḍ ifassen-ik aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-am ad tessirideḍ ifassen-im aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-as ad yessirid ifassen-is aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-as ad tessirid ifassen-is aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-iyi ad ssirideɣ ifassen-iw aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-asen ad ssiriden ifassen-nsen aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-asent ad ssirident ifassen-nsent aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-awen ad tessiridem ifassen-nwen aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-awent ad tessiridemt ifassen-nwent aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Tuwi-d fell-akent ad tessiridemt ifassen-nkent aṭas n tikal deg wass.
Yeɣli-d leɛdez d ameqqran ɣef medden.
Yeɣli-d leɛdez meqqer ɣef medden.
Yeɣli-d leɛdez meqqer ɣef yimdanen.
Yeɣli-d leɛdez d ameqqran ɣef yimdanen.

Ilaq ad d-tafem amsiẓreg.
Ilaq ad d-tafemt amsiẓreg.

Wissen ma tessnem ad tarumt s tefransist ?
Wissen ma tessneḍ ad taruḍ s tefransist ?

Ttemliliɣ yid-s deg tfaskiwin n tmedyezt.
Mlaleɣ-tt deg tmeɣra.
Deg tmeɣra i mlalen.

Wissen ma nessen ad naru s tefransist ?

Ad k-iɛuzz Rebbi.

Ilaq ad d-afent abrid isuffuɣen.

Ilaq ad d-tafem abrid isuffuɣen.

Ilaq ad d-taf abrid isuffuɣen.
Ilaq ad d-yaf abrid isuffuɣen.

Zik, Amaziɣ ɣas ur yessin ara ad iɣer neɣ yettheǧǧi kan, ittaɣ idlisen.
Iɛuzz-ikem ula d kemm.
Iɛuzz-ik ula d kečč.
Iɛuzz-iken ula d kunwi.
Iɛuzz-ikent ula d kunemti.
Iḍrisen yerzan tussna deg tal taɣult nettaf-iten deg yiẓeḍwa inmettiyen.
Iḍrisen yerzan tussna deg tal taɣult nezmer ad ten-naf deg yiẓeḍwa inmettiyen.
Tutlayt n tmaziɣt ala nekkni i tesɛa.
Tutlayt taqbaylit ala nekkni i tesɛa.
Ilaq ad d-nedhu yid-s.
Ilaq ad d-nedhu yid-sen.
Ilaq ad d-nedhu yid-sent.
Ilaq ad as-nfek azal d ameqqran i tutlay-nneɣ.
Ma mazal ur yelli ara ulama cwiṭ n leḥkem gar yifassen-is, cwiṭ n timanit tadelsant, ad teqqim ur tettaf ara iman-is alma tessukef (ɣef yiqerray n wid yellan d ssebba n waya).
Akken ad d-teqqim, ilaq ad yili gar yifassen-is cwiṭ n leḥkem.
Win iḥemmlen tutlayt-is iqeddec kra ara tekk tudert-is akken ad tecbu tutlayin yennernin deg ddunit.
Tin iḥemmlen tutlayt-is, tqeddec kra ara tekk tudert-is akken ad tecbu tutlayin yennernin deg ddunit.
Wid iḥemmlen tutlayt-nsen, qeddcen kra ara tekk tudert-nsen akken ad tecbu tutlayin yennernin deg ddunit.
Tid iḥemmlen tutlayt-nsent, qeddcetn kra ara tekk tudert-nsent akken ad tecbu tutlayin yennernin deg ddunit.
Asirem-nsen yezga yella akken ad teffeɣ tutlayt-nsen deg ṭṭiq ideg tella neɣ i bɣan kra n urbaɛ ad tili.
Asirem-nsent yezga yella akken ad teffeɣ tutlayt-nsent deg ṭṭiq ideg tella neɣ i bɣan kra n urbaɛ ad tili.
Asirem-is yezga yella akken ad teffeɣ tutlayt-is deg ṭṭiq ideg tella neɣ i bɣan kra n urbaɛ ad tili.
Asirem-iw yezga yella akken ad teffeɣ tutlayt-iw deg ṭṭiq ideg tella neɣ i bɣan kra n urbaɛ ad tili.
Seg wasmi i tebda ddunit, tura ɣef Umaziɣ ad yettnaɣ akken ad d-yeqqim ur inegger ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-aneɣ ad nettnaɣ akken ad d-neqqim ur nnegger ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-asen ad ttnaɣen akken ad d-qqimen ur neggren ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-asent ad ttnaɣent akken ad d-qqiment ur neggrent ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-as ad yettnaɣ akken ad d-yeqqim ur inegger ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-as ad tettnaɣ akken ad d-teqqim ur tnegger ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-ak ad tettnaɣeḍ akken ad d-teqqimeḍ ur tneggreḍ ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-am ad tettnaɣeḍ akken ad d-teqqimeḍ ur tneggreḍ ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-awen ad tettnaɣem akken ad d-teqqimem ur tneggrem ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-awent ad tettnaɣemt akken ad d-teqqimemt ur tneggremt ara.
Seg wasmi i tebna ddunit, tura fell-akent ad tettnaɣemt akken ad d-teqqimemt ur tneggremt ara.
Iswi amezwaru n tira n ungal-a d aḥuddu n tutlayt dagi taqbaylit akken ad tiɣzif tudert-is.
Aṭas n wawalen i smerseɣ dagi, llan wid i ten-yettun.
Llan wid yettun kra n wawalen.
Llant tid yettun kra n wawalen.
Tella tin yettun kra n wawalen.
Yella win yettun kra n wawalen.
Ungal-a diɣen yefka-d kra n yisalan yerzan amezruy n tmurt, win akken ur nesselmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nneɣ.
Deg ungal-a, ad naf deg-s kra n wazalen d kra n yinsayen, zik llan tura drus i d-yeggran neɣ neqḍen maḍi.
Mi d-teffɣeḍ seg yixeddim, err-d s axxam.
Mi d-teffeɣ seg yixeddim, terra-d s axxam.
Mi d-yeffeɣ seg yixeddim, yerra-d s axxam.
Mi d-neffeɣ seg yixeddim, nerra s axxam.
Mi d-teffɣem seg yixeddim, terram-d s axxam.
Mi d-teffɣemt seg yixeddim, terramt-d s axxam.
Mi d-teffɣeḍ seg yixeddim, terriḍ-d s axxam.
Mi d-ffɣeɣ seg yixeddim, rriɣ-d s axxam.
Mi d-ffɣen seg yixeddim, rran-d s axxam.
Mi d-ffɣent seg yixeddim, rrant-d s axxam.
Tenwam ttmettaten yimedyazen ?
Tenwam imedyazen ttmettaten ?
Mi ara tenɣem amedaz, ḥsut imir-nni i d-ittlal wissen acḥal n tikal.
Amedyaz d awal, awal ur yettmettat.
Iɛǧeb-awen tneqqem imedyazen.
Ayen i iyi-d-tuzneḍ, kksen-t.
Ayen i iyi-d-tuznem, kksen-t.
Ayen i iyi-d-tuznemt, kksen-t.
Ayen i iyi-d-tuzen, kksen-t.
Ayen i iyi-d-yuzen, kksen-t.
Ayen i iyi-d-uznen, kksen-t.
Ayen i iyi-d-uznent, kksen-t.
Amedyaz, d inigi n tallit-is.
Amedyaz, ur yezmir ad yeṭṭef imi-s.
Ameyaz, ur yeḥkim deg yimru-s.
Amedyaz, akka i d netta, itett-it-id yiles-is.
Amedyaz, urǧin yemmut.
"Ɣas" yemmut, deg wul-nneɣ mazal-it yedder.

Tugi ad teknu.
Nugi ad neknu.

Ugin ad knun.
Ugint ad knunt.

Gezmet-as iles-is.

Tamurt-iw tebna ɣef tkerkas.

Nɣan-t mi d-yenna tidet.

Nɣan-tent mi d-nnant tidet.

Ččḥen akken ma llan.
Ččḥent akken ma llant.

Teččḥemt akken ma tellamt.
Ad snemmreɣ aɣmis-a Tiɣremt akked d yixeddamen-is.
Win yettarun amzun yekcem ɛemrayen, yettuɣal d wayeḍ.
Tin yettarun amzun tekcem ɛemrayen, tettuɣal d tayeḍ.
Wid yettarun amzun kecmen ɛemrayen, ttuɣalen d wiyaḍ.
Tid yettarun amzun kecment ɛemrayen, ttuɣalent d tiyaḍ.
Mi ara ifakk tira n kra n udris n ungal-is, ur yettamen ara iman-is, yeqqar-as mačči d neḳk i yuran aya.
Mi ara tfakk tira n kra n udris n ungal-is, ur tettamen ara iman-is, teqqar-as mačči d neḳk i yuran aya.
Mi ara nfakk tira n kra n udris n ungal-nneɣ, ur nettamen ara iman-nneɣ, neqqar-as mačči d neḳkni i yuran aya.
Mi ara nfakk tira n kra n udris n ungal-nteɣ, ur nettamen ara iman-nteɣ, neqqar-as mačči d neḳkenti i yuran aya.
Ad neǧǧ imeɣri ad tent-id-yaf iman-is tmuffirin-a.
Ad ǧǧeɣ imeɣri ad tent-id-yaf iman-is tmuffirin-a.

Ad teǧǧ imeɣri ad tent-id-yaf iman-is tmuffirin-a.

Allaɣ iḥemmel ad idelleg, idellu ɣef zik-nni.

Tḥemmel kan iman-is.

Am wass-a i temmut tmarut kaysa.
Am wass-a i aɣ-teǧǧa tmarut kaysa.
Ass-a d amulli wis sin n tmettant n tmarut Kaysa.
Aɣewwaɣ d Kaysa mmuten deg yiwen n wass n yunyu, ass wis 25.
Talwit i yiɣsan n Kaysa.
Talwit i yiɣsan n uɣewwaɣ.
Teččeḥ tsekla taqbaylit mi tt-teǧǧa Kaysa.
Tasekla taqbaylit tɣurr-itt lmut mi as-tuwi Kaysa.
Tasekla taqbaylit tɣurr-itt lmut mi as-tuwi Kaysa tamarut.
Ayen tura Kaysa neḥrez-it, yis-s ara tellez tasa.
Kaysa tura isefra, tullisin akked yiwen n ungal.
Nerja azekka n Kaysa s umaynut, d taqbaylit ara yennernin.
Tasekla taqbaylit tettnnerni yal aseggas.
Ziɣ txuṣṣ tejɣelt i terbut assen akken i d-ttseqqin.
Tijɣelt i ixuṣṣen d tin n Kaysa.
Kaysa teǧǧa-d tibratin, idlisen-is merra i d ttbut.
Kaysa tukyist n tira i d-tedda ala asurif.
Amecwar aseklan n Kaysa wezzil.
Amecwar aseklan n Kaysa d awezzlan.
Nruja deg-s ma d kra, tundi-as tmettant lmendif.
Nruja deg Kaysa aṭas n yidlisen, maca tɣurr-aɣ seg-s tmettant.
Zwir sdat-i.
Zwirem sdat-i.
Zwiremt sdat-i.
Zwiret sdat-i.
Ggri deffir-i.
Ggrim deffir-i.
Ggrimt deffir-i.
Ggrit deffir-i.
Tundi-as lmendif, tin i aɣ-d-irennun aɣilif, tger-itt meskint s aẓekka.
Tuwi-tt tmettant kan akken meẓẓiyet.
Tuwi-tt tmettant kan akken d tameẓẓyant.
Tuwi-tt tmettant kan akken d taqcict.
Seg twacult tanaẓurt, icellex-d yiwen n ufurek.
Afurek i d-icellxen seg tzemmurt taseklant d Kaysa.
Ilem d-teǧǧiḍ d ageɛmir, deg twacult taqbaylit.
Ilem d-teǧǧiḍ d ameqqran, deg twacult taqbaylit.
Ilem d-teǧǧa d ameqqran, deg twacult taqbaylit.
Ilem d-teǧǧa d ageɛmir, deg twacult taqbaylit.
Tikli-im yerra-tt-id yigmir, uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-ik yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-is yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-iw yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-nneɣ yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-nteɣ yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-nwen yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-nwent yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-nkent yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-nsen yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Tikli-nsent yerra-tt-id yigmir uqbel ad d-taweḍ tmeddit.
Awal-im, nebɣa-t neddem-it, tugna-m tjerred deg unyir.
Awal-ik, nebɣa-t neddem-it, tugna-k tjerred deg unyir.
Awal-is, nebɣa-t neddem-it, tugna-s tjerred deg unyir.
Awal-nwen, nebɣa-t neddem-it, tugna-nwen tjerred deg unyir.
Awal-nwent, nebɣa-t neddem-it, tugna-nwent tjerred deg unyir.
Awal-nkent, nebɣa-t neddem-it, tugna-nkent tjerred deg unyir.

Lmut tettawi ala tid yelhan.

Lmut, amzun tettextiri anta ara tawi.
Ɣer tikkelt-nniḍen!
Yuɣ-as-d aserwal ur as-d-yezgi ara.
Yuɣ-ak-d aserwal ur ak-d-yezgi ara.
Yuɣ-am-d aserwal ur am-d-yezgi ara.

Aserwal i k-d-yuɣ, ur k-d-yezgi ara.
Aserwal i s-d-yuɣ, ur s-d-yezgi ara.
Wali tura amek ara txedmeḍ.
Walim tura amek ara txedmem.
Walimt tura amek ara txedmemt.
Wali tura amek ara txedmem.
Ur walaɣ ara d acu ara xedmeɣ yis-s.
Ur walan ara d acu ara xedmen yis-s.
Ur walant ara d acu ara xedment yis-s.
Ur twala ara d acu ara texdem yis-s.
Ur iwala ara d acu ara yexdem yis-s.
Ur nwala ara d acu ara nexdem yis-s.
Ur twalaḍ ara d acu ara texdmeḍ yis-s.
Ur twalam ara d acu ara texdmem yis-s.
Ur twalamt ara d acu ara texdmemt yis-s.
Deg tillas, ur ẓriɣ ara akk anda i tedduɣ.
Deg tillas, ur ẓrin ara akk anda i teddun.
Deg tillas, ur ẓrint ara akk anda i teddunt.
Deg tillas, ur yeẓri ara akk anda i iteddu.
Deg tillas, ur neẓri ara akk anda i nteddu.
Deg tillas, ur teẓri ara akk anda i tetteddu.
Deg tillas, ur teẓriḍ ara akk anda i tettedduḍ.

Deg tillas, ur teẓrimt ara akk anda i tetteddumt.

Ula d kemm tḍerru yid-m akka.
Ula d netta tḍerru yid-s akka.
Ula d nettat tḍerru yid-s akka.
Ula d nekkenti tḍerru yid-nteɣ akka.
Ula d nutni tḍerru yid-sen akka.
Ula d nutenti tḍerru yid-sent akka.
Ula d kunwi tḍerru yid-wen akka.
Ula d kunemti tḍerru yid-went akka.
Ula d kunemti tḍerru yid-kent akka.
Bu tfuhrit, ttaǧǧan-t iman-is.
Yendeh unayna, ffɣen yinelmaden ɣer ubraḥ ad sgunfun.
Yendeh unayna, ffɣen yinelmaden ɣer ubraḥ ad steɛfun.
Tameddit ɣef tis 17, yendeh unayna akken ad ffɣen yinelmaden seg uɣerbaz.
Mel-iyi anda isuffuɣ ubrid-a.
Mlem-iyi anda isuffuɣ ubrid-a.

Ur tufiḍ d acu ara rreɣ yid-i.

Ur tufiḍ d acu ara nerr yid-neɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara nerr yid-nteɣ.

Nkellef-as Rebbi i waṭṭan, yesserẓagen ussan, yettawi win ɛzizen.
Tamettant tettawi wid yelhan.
Tamettant txeddem miḥyaf.
Tamettant taɣeddart tettawi wid i nḥemmel.
Tamettant tɣurr-aɣ seg yiwet n tmarut tameqqrant.
Ad yili yentem umdan, beɛden-t yiɣeblan, tudert, twerrek s warrazen.
Ntem, qwu, freḥ, tamettant urǧin tebɛed.
Tamettant, ur teqili yiwen.
Tamettant, tettas-d ur tt-nettraju.
Tella tɣeddart n laman, tɛeǧǧel ɣer lawan, deg wul tessaɣ ilizen.
Tin i tezzun tisiswa, tettas-d mebla ma nruja-tt.
Tettas-d lawan i s-yeɛǧeb tin i teqqden tisiswa-nneɣ.
Tettas-d lweqt i tebɣa tin yettawin wid nḥemmel.
Tettas-d lweqt i tebɣa tin yuwin win nḥemmel.
Tettas-d lweqt i tebɣa tin yettawin tid nḥemmel.
Tettas-d lweqt i tebɣa tin yuwin tin nḥemmel.
Tudert, telṭac d aseggas, tlul-d tira-s, asefru amenzu-s tura-t.
Asefru-s amenzu tura-t mi tella tesɛa mraw d kraḍ n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
Asefru-s amenzu yura-t mi yella yesɛa mraw d kraḍ n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
Asefru-w amenzu uriɣ-t mi lliɣ sɛiɣ mraw d kraḍ n yiseggasen deg tudert-iw.
Asefru-k amenzu turiḍ-t mi telliḍ tesɛiḍ mraw d kraḍ n yiseggasen deg tudert-ik.
Asefru-m amenzu turiḍ-t mi telliḍ tesɛiḍ mraw d kraḍ n yiseggasen deg tudert-im.
Mi tella mazal-itt d taqcict i d-tlul tira deg-s.
Mi telliḍ mazal-ikem d taqcict i d-tlul tira deg-m.
Mi telliḍ mazal-ik d aqcic i d-tlul tira deg-k.
Mi yella mazal-it d aqcic i d-tlul tira deg-s.
Mi lliɣ mazal-iyi d aqcic i d-tlul tira deg-i.
Tura kraḍ n wungalen.
Tettaru s snat n tutlayin, taqbaylit d taɛrabt.

Bedden mebla iẓuran.

Neḥsa Dihya Lwiz d lwiz, awal-is d ubriz, yeṭṭef adeg deg tsekla.

Iruḥ, dayen ur d-ittuɣal ara.

Tella « Gar yigenni d tmurt », tura ddaw n tmurt, maɛna tezdeɣ ulawen.

Ɣas yemmut, mazal-it yedder deg wulawen.

Yeṭallay-d kan mebɛid umeɣbun.
Neṭallay-d kan mebɛid am yimeɣban.
Teṭallayeḍ-d kan mebɛid am tmeɣbunt.
Teṭallayeḍ-d kan mebɛid am umeɣbun.
Teṭallayem-d kan mebɛid am yimeɣban.
Teṭallayem-d kan mebɛid am tmeɣban.

Ṭallayent-d kan mebɛid am tmeɣban.
Ad d-nini ayen iwimi necfa, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac aql-aɣ nɛedda.
Ad d-yini ayen iwimi yecfa, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac a-t-an iɛedda.
Ad d-tini ayen iwimi tecfa, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac a-tt-an tɛedda.
Ad d-tiniḍ ayen iwimi tecfiḍ, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac aql-ak tɛeddaḍ.
Ad d-tiniḍ ayen iwimi tecfiḍ, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac aql-akem tɛeddaḍ.
Ad d-iniɣ ayen iwimi cfiɣ, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac aql-i ɛeddaɣ.
Ad d-inin ayen iwimi cfan, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac a-ten-an ɛeddan.
Ad d-inint ayen iwimi cfant, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac a-tent-an ɛeddant.
Ad d-tinim ayen iwimi tecfam, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac aql-aken tɛeddam.
Ad d-tinimt ayen iwimi tecfamt, win yeddmen yeddem. ma ulac aql-akent tɛeddamt.
Tura iṭij mi d-yuli, ad idiren ass ajdid.
Tura iṭij mi d-yuli, ad idirent ass ajdid.
Tura mi d-yuli yiṭij, ad idiren ass amaynut.
Tura mi d-yuli yiṭij, ad idirent ass amaynut.
Tura mi d-yuli yiṭij, ad idireɣ ass amaynut.
Tura iṭij mi d-yuli, ad idireɣ ass ajdid.

Tura mi d-yuli yiṭij, ad tidiremt ass amaynut.
Tura mi d-yuli yiṭij, ad yidir ass amaynut.
Tura mi d-yuli yiṭij, ad tidir ass amaynut.

Tura iṭij mi d-yuli, ad tidirem ass ajdid.

Mačči yiwen wass kan, tudert akken ma tella, tuwi-d ad nettxemmim, ma nebɣa ad d-neqqim akken nella.
Ɣer asefru akken ma yella ad tfehmeḍ
Mačči tinna seg umdan ɣer umdan, tagi seg udabu ɣer ugdud.
Ɣrem asefru akken ma yella ad tfehmem.
Ɣremt asefru akken ma yella ad tfehmemt.
Ɣret asefru akken ma yella ad tfehmem.
Ayen tebɣam, nekk wissen ma bɣiɣ-t.
Ayen tebɣamt, nekk wissen ma bɣiɣ-t.
Ayen tebɣiḍ, nekk wissen ma bɣiɣ-t.
Ayen tebɣa, nekk wissen ma bɣiɣ-t.
Ayen yebɣa, nekk wissen ma bɣiɣ-t.
Ayen bɣan, nekk wissen ma bɣiɣ-t.
Ayen bɣant, nekk wissen ma bɣiɣ-t.
Zgan am times ddaw walim.
Tezgam am times ddaw walim.
Tebɣam ad teglum yis-neɣ.
Bɣan ad glun yis-neɣ.
Ur nettxemmim ara am nutni.
Tamuɣli-nneɣ tebɛed nezzeh ɣef tayla-nsen.
Tamuɣli-nsen teqqen aṭas ɣer ddin.
Axemmem-nsen itezzi kan ɣef usɣan asertan.
Ugin ad bḍun gar tasertit d usɣan.
Ugin ad bḍun gar tasertit d ddin.
Tamurt-agi d tamurt-nneɣ, tebɣam ad tt-terrem d ayla-nwen.
Tamurt-agi d tamurt-nneɣ, bɣan ad tt-terrem d ayla-nsen.
Bɣan ad as-beddlen udem i tmurt-nneɣ.
Ttnadin ad rren tamurt-nneɣ d tayeḍ.
Tettnadim ad terrem tamurt-nneɣ d tayeḍ.
Belḥaret neɣ Mhend Uccen d ismawen i nefka i kra n yiɣersiwen deg tmucuha-nneɣ.
Wanag izem amecṭuh, mmi-s n tsedda neqqar-as aqlalas.
S lekdubat ɣlid-d fell-aneɣ.
Ayen yellan yeččur, terram-t d ilem.
Ayen yellan yeččur, rran-t d ilem.
Tenwam lekdubat-nwen ad ɛeddin.
Nwan lekdubat-nsen ad ɛeddin.
Tenwam tikerkas-nwen ad ččent.
Nwan tikerkas-nsen ad ččent.
Tɛewjem, tugim ad teddum d ṣṣwab.
Tɛewjemt, tugimt ad teddumt d ṣṣwab.
Tɛewjeḍ, tugiḍ ad tedduḍ d ṣṣwab.
Teɛwej, tugi ad teddu d ṣṣwab.
Yeɛwej, yugi ad yeddu d ṣṣwab.
Neɛwej, nugi ad neddu d ṣṣwab.
Ɛewjeɣ, ugiɣ ad dduɣ d ṣṣwab.
Ɛewjen, ugin ad ddun d ṣṣwab.
Ɛewjent, ugint ad ddunt d ṣṣwab.
Ad aruɣ s tutlayt-iw.
Ad arun s tutlayt-nsen.
Ad arunt s tutlayt-nsent.
Ad yaru s tutlayt-is.
Ad taru s tutlayt-is.
Ad naru s tutlayt-nneɣ.
Ad taruḍ s tutlayt-ik.
Ad taruḍ s tutlayt-inek.
Ad tarum s tutlayt-nwen.
Ad tarumt s tutlayt-nwent.
Ad tarumt s tutlayt-nkent.
Ad taru s tutlayt-ines.
Ad aruɣ s tutlayt-inu.
Ad taruḍ s tutlayt-im.
Ad taruḍ s tutlayt-inem.

At taddart faqen s umihi i ten-yettrajun.
Ur yelhi wayen i ten-yettrajun.
Ur yelhi wayen i tent-yettrajun.

Awal tidet ur yesɛi asget.
Tidet ɣur-s yiwen n umdan, asuf.

Tenwa wissen d acu ara texdem mi tebges s uberwaq.
Nenwa wissen d acu ara nexdem mi nebges s uberwaq.

Awal tidet ulac ɣur-s talɣa n usget.
Awal tidet ur yesɛi ara talɣa n usget.

Ad nergu deg yiḍ deg wass, alma neqḍeɛ layas.
Ad targu deg yiḍ deg wass, alma teqḍeɛ layas.
Yiwen n wass, ulac deg-s aɛfas, ifukk ukras d umɛic amessas, ad nɛiwed i uxxam lsas, ad nuɣal am nekkni nam leǧnas.
Ad yargu deg yiḍ deg wass, alma yeqḍeɛ layas.

Terwim-iyi.
Terwimt-iyi.
Terwiḍ-iyi.
Terwi ddunit.
Ddunit, ur tufi ara iman-is.
Wissen melmi ara taf iman-is.
Yessared udem-is, yejɣem tiqit n lqahwa, yeffeɣ.
Tessared udem-is, tejɣem tiqit n lqahwa, teffeɣ.
Nessared udem-is, nejɣem tiqit n lqahwa, neffeɣ.
Tessardeḍ udem-ik, tjeɣmeḍ tiqit n lqahwa, teffɣeḍ.
Tessardeḍ udem-im, tjeɣmeḍ tiqit n lqahwa, teffɣeḍ.
Tessardem udmawen-nwen, tjeɣmem tiqit n lqahwa, teffɣem.
Tessardemt udmawen-nwent, tjeɣmemt tiqit n lqahwa, teffɣemt.
Tessardemt udmawen-nkent, tjeɣmemt tiqit n lqahwa, teffɣemt.
Ssardeɣ udem-iw, jeɣmeɣ tiqit n lqahwa, ffɣeɣ.
Ssarden udmawen-nsen jeɣmen tiqit n lqahwa, ffɣen.
Ssardent udmawen-nsent jeɣment tiqit n lqahwa, ffɣent.
Yeg Rebbi d tirga mxalfa.
Yerra iman-is ur t-yeẓri ara akk.
Terra iman-is ur t-Teẓri ara akk.

Terriḍ iman-im ur t-Teẓriḍ ara akk.

Afus-is d aqucaḥ, yerna yettaweḍ.
Afus-is d aqucaḥ, netta yettaweḍ.
Yettaweḍ, yerna afus-is d aqucaḥ.
Tettaweḍ, yerna afus-is d aqucaḥ.
Tettawḍeḍ, yerna afus-ik d aqucaḥ.
Tettawḍeḍ, yerna afus-im d aqucaḥ.
Ttawḍeɣ, yerna afus-iw d aqucaḥ.
Ttawḍen, yerna ifassen-nsen d iqucaḥen.
Ttawḍent, yerna ifassen-nsent d iqucaḥen.
Tettawḍem, yerna ifassen-nwen d iqucaḥen.
Tettawḍemt, yerna ifassen-nwent d iqucaḥen.

Nettaweḍ, yerna ifassen-nteɣ d iqucaḥen.
Acḥal d abrid i uwḍeɣ ɣur-s.

Wwten-tt s allaɣ akken ad tettu iman-is.
Wwten-t s allaɣ akken ad yettu iman-is.
Wwten-aɣ s allaɣ akken ad nettu iman-nneɣ.
Wwten-aɣ s allaɣ akken ad nettu iman-nteɣ.
Wwten-k s allaɣ akken ad tettuḍ iman-ik.
Wwten-kem s allaɣ akken ad tettuḍ iman-im.
Wwten-ken s allaɣ akken ad tettum iman-nwen.
Wwten-kent s allaɣ akken ad tettumt iman-nwent.
Wwten-kent s allaɣ akken ad tettumt iman-nkent.
Wwten-iyi s allaɣ akken ad ttuɣ iman-ik.
Wwten-ten s allaɣ akken ad ttun iman-nsen.
Wwten-tent s allaɣ akken ad ttunt iman-nsent.
Tayla-k, ttu-tt, ḍfer tayla-w.
Tayla-m, ttu-tt, ḍfer tayla-w.
Tayla-nwen, ttum-tt, ḍefrem tayla-w.
Tayla-nwent, ttumt-tt, ḍefremt tayla-w.
Tayla-nwen, ttut-tt, ḍefret tayla-w.
Tayla-nkent, ttumt-tt, ḍefremt tayla-w.
Tuwi-d ad yettu tutlayt-is, d tutlay-nneɣ i as-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad tettu tutlayt-is, d tutlay-nneɣ i as-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad nettu tutlayt-nneɣ, d tutlay-nsen i aɣ-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad tettum tutlayt-nwen, d tutlay-nneɣ i awen-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad tettumt tutlayt-nwent, d tutlay-nneɣ i awent-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad tettumt tutlayt-nkent, d tutlay-nneɣ i akent-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad tettuḍ tutlayt-ik, d tutlay-nneɣ i ak-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad tettuḍ tutlayt-im, d tutlay-nneɣ i am-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad ttuɣ tutlayt-iw, d tutlay-nsen i iyi-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad ttun tutlayt-nsen, d tutlay-nneɣ i asen-ilaqen.
Tuwi-d ad ttunt tutlayt-nsent, d tutlay-nneɣ i asent-ilaqen.
Ḥesben Rebbi d aɛrab.

Ur tenwi ad as-d-ggrin wussan, ussan yeččuren d ssem.
Ur tenwi ad as-d-ggrin wussan irẓaganen.
Ur yenwi ad as-d-ggrin wussan irẓaganen.
Ur nenwi ad aɣ-d-ggrin wussan irẓaganen.

Ur tenwiḍ ad am-d-ggrin wussan irẓaganen.

Ur tenwimt ad akent-d-ggrin wussan irẓaganen.

Ur nwin ad asen-d-ggrin wussan irẓaganen.
Ur nwint ad asent-d-ggrin wussan irẓaganen.

Wissen anwa i aɣ-yedɛan, mi nezdi d yileɣman.
Win i aɣ-yedɛan, ilḥeq-aɣ.
Tin i aɣ-yedɛan, telḥeq-aɣ.
Wid i aɣ-yedɛan, leḥqen-aɣ.
Tid i aɣ-yedɛan, leḥqent-aɣ.
Win i ak-yedɛan, ilḥeq-ik.
Tin i ak-yedɛan,telḥeq-ik.
Tin i am-yedɛan,telḥeq-ikem.
Win i am-yedɛan, ilḥeq-ikem.
Win i iyi-yedɛan, ilḥeq-iyi.
Tin i iyi-yedɛan,telḥeq-iyi.
Tin i as-yedɛan,telḥeq-it.
Win i as-yedɛan, ilḥeq-it.
Win i as-yedɛan, ilḥeq-itt.
Tin i as-yedɛan,telḥeq-itt.
Tin i asen-yedɛan,telḥeq-iten.
Win i asen-yedɛan, ilḥeq-iten.
Win i asent-yedɛan, ilḥeq-itent.
Tin i asent-yedɛan,telḥeq-itent.
Tin i awen-yedɛan,telḥeq-iken.
Win i awen-yedɛan, ilḥeq-iken.
Win i awent-yedɛan, ilḥeq-ikent.
Win i akent-yedɛan, ilḥeq-ikent.
Tin i awent-yedɛan,telḥeq-ikent.
Tin i akent-yedɛan,telḥeq-ikent.

La went-neqqar, deg-went neɛya.
La kent-neqqar, deg-kent neɛya.

La s-neqqar, deg-s neɛya.

La sent-neqqar, deg-sent neɛya.

Tettwaḥbes deg lbaṭel.
Nfan seg tmurt anaẓur, tamurt-nni izedɣen ul-is.
Ayen yellan deg tasilt ad t-id-isali uɣenja.
Ayen yellan deg tasilt ad t-id-tsali teflut.
Ayen yeffren ad d-iban.
Yemmut, yuwi lbaḍna-s yid-s.
Yemmut, yuwi lbaḍna-ines yid-s.
Lbaḍna-s, ur tt-yenni i yiwen.
Lbaḍna-k, ur tt-qqari i yiwen.
Lbaḍna-m, ur tt-qqari i yiwen.
Lbaḍna-nwen, ur tt-qqarem i yiwen.
Lbaḍna-nwen, ur tt-qqaret i yiwen.
Lbaḍna-nwent, ur tt-qqaremt i yiwen.
Lbaḍna-nkent, ur tt-qqaremt i yiwen.
Lbaḍna-s, yeffer-itt i yiman-is.
Lḥebs i kra n medden mačči d lḥebs; lḥebs a-t-an berra i lḥebs.
Ur k-terri ara tmara ad iyi-tedduḍ deg lebɣi.
Ur kem-terri ara tmara ad iyi-tedduḍ deg lebɣi.
Ur ken-terri ara tmara ad iyi-teddum deg lebɣi.
Ur kent-terri ara tmara ad iyi-teddumt deg lebɣi.
Ur ten-terri ara tmara ad iyi-ddun deg lebɣi.
Ur tent-terri ara tmara ad iyi-ddunt deg lebɣi.
Ur aɣ-terri ara tmara ad ak-neddu deg lebɣi.
Ur t-terri ara tmara ad ak-yeddu deg lebɣi.
Ur tt-terri ara tmara ad ak-teddu deg lebɣi.
Ur ten-terri ara tmara ad ak-ddun deg lebɣi.
Ur tent-terri ara tmara ad ak-ddunt deg lebɣi.
Tissirt, ma tuɣ-itent deg rryac, ula i as-gan yiɣuraf.
Tissirt, ma tuɣ-itent deg rryac, ula ad as-gen yiɣuraf.
Ur fhimeɣ ara d acu i d-teqqareḍ akka s taɛrabt, maɛna bu qejjiren-ihin, wellah ma yedda yid-i.

Ula d nekk ḥemmleɣ ad teɣrem ayen ttaruɣ.
Ula d nekk ḥemmleɣ ad teɣremt ayen ttaruɣ.

Teqqen timeḥremt.
Teqqnemt timḥermin.
Qqnent timḥermin.
Yewḥel wawal deg ugerjum.
Weḥlen yimeslayen deg ugerjum.
Awal yugi ad iyi-d-yali.
Awal yugi ad k-id-yali.

Tillect tečča tiyuzaḍ.
Tiyuzaḍ-iw, ččurent d tillect.

Iḍan ččuren d iselfan.

Nella netturar tizizwit taderɣalt.

Yiwen n urgaz yenɣa iman-is.

Ussan-agi, aṭas n wid yenɣan iman-nsen.
Nɣiman yezreɛ.
Ddunit, terna-k, kečč terniḍ iman-ik.
Ddunit, terna-iyi, nekk rniɣ iman-iw.
Ddunit, terna-ten, nutni rnan iman-nsen.
Ddunit, terna-tent, nutenti rnant iman-nsent.
Ddunit, terna-kem, kemm terniḍ iman-im.
Ddunit, terna-ken, kunwi ternam iman-nwen.
Ddunit, terna-kent, kunemti ternamt iman-nwent.
Ddunit, terna-tt, nettat terna iman-is.
Ddunit, terna-t, netta yerna iman-is.
Ddunit, terna-aɣ, nekkni nerna iman-nneɣ.
Ddunit, terna-aɣ, nekkenti nerna iman-nteɣ.
Win ur nezmir i ddunit, ineqq iman-is.
Tin ur nezmir i ddunit, tneqq iman-is.
Wid ur nezmir i ddunit, neqqen iman-nsen.
Tid ur nezmir i ddunit, neqqent iman-nsent.
Yiwen ur yeẓri acimi i yenɣa iman-is.
Yiwen ur yeẓri acimi i tenɣa iman-is.
Yiwen ur yeẓri acimi i nɣan iman-nsen.
Yiwen ur yeẓri acimi i nɣant iman-nsent.

Lbaḍna-s, tuwi-tt yid-s tin yenɣan iman-is.
Lbaḍna-s, yuwi-tt yid-s win yenɣan iman-is.
Lbaḍna-nsen, uwin-tt yid-sen wid yenɣan iman-nsen.
Lbaḍna-nsent, uwint-tt yid-sen tid yenɣan iman-nsent.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad d-issegzi ayɣer i nneqq iman-nneɣ.
Tanemmirt i tikkelt tis snat.

Ahat tneddem ɣef wayen texdem tin yenɣan iman-is.

Ahat neddment ɣef wayen xedment tid yenɣan iman-nsent.

Tin yeddren yir ussan, taggara-s d nɣiman.
Wid yeddren yir ussan, taggara-nsen d nɣiman.
Tid yeddren yir ussan, taggara-nsent d nɣiman.
Ay amdan, ur ilaq ara nɣiman.
Ɛni, ɛyiɣ deg yiman-iw ?

Ulac i ɛzizen am yiman.

Ad kkseɣ iziɣer-im !

Tinna ad kkseɣ iziɣer-is !
Wa d rruḥ-iw, ad as-xedmeɣ ayen bɣiɣ.

Mačči ala nettat kan, aṭas i yellan am nettat.
Wa d leɛmer-iw, ad as-xedmeɣ ayen bɣiɣ.
Wa d leɛmer-ik, xdem-as ayen tebɣiḍ.
Wa d leɛmer-im, xdem-as ayen tebɣiḍ.
Wa d leɛmer-nwen, xedmem-as ayen tebɣam.
Wa d leɛmer-nwent, xedmemt-as ayen tebɣamt.
Wa d leɛmer-nkent, xedmemt-as ayen tebɣamt.
Wa d leɛmer-is, ixdem-as ayen yebɣa.
Wa d leɛmer-is, texdem-as ayen tebɣa.
Wa d leɛmer-nneɣ, nexdem-as ayen nebɣa.
Wa d leɛmer-nteɣ, nexdem-as ayen nebɣa.

Teɛleq-d tamrart ɣer tejgut, texneq iman-is.

Yeɛleq-d tamrart ɣer ufurek n yiwet n tzemmurt, ixneq iman-is.

Tal yiwet amek i tenɣa iman-is.

Tlulemt-d akken ad temmtemt.

Talalit tlulemt-d, lmut ad temmtemt.

Zzayer n 60 d 70 tif Zzayer n tura yerran azekka-s gar yifassen n ddin d lecyux n lǧamaɛ.

Yeṭṭef lekteb algam.

Yiwen ur yeẓri amek ara yili uzekka. Nekkni nekkat s wayen iwimi nezmer akken ad aɣ-d-yas akken nebɣa.
Yekkat s wayen iwimi yezmer akken ad as-d-yas uzekka akken yebɣa.
Tekkat s wayen iwimi tezmer akken ad as-d-yas uzekka akken tebɣa.
Nekkat s wayen iwimi nezmer akken ad aɣ-d-yas uzekka akken nebɣa.
Tekkateḍ s wayen iwimi tzemreḍ akken ad ak-d-yas uzekka akken tebɣiḍ.
Tekkateḍ s wayen iwimi tzemreḍ akken ad am-d-yas uzekka akken tebɣiḍ.
Tekkatem s wayen iwimi tzemrem akken ad awen-d-yas uzekka akken tebɣam.
Tekkatemt s wayen iwimi tzemremt akken ad awent-d-yas uzekka akken tebɣamt.
Tekkatemt s wayen iwimi tzemremt akken ad akent-d-yas uzekka akken tebɣamt.
Kkateɣ s wayen iwimi zemreɣ akken ad iyi-d-yas uzekka akken bɣiɣ.
Kkaten s wayen iwimi zemren akken ad asen-d-yas uzekka akken bɣan.
Kkatent s wayen iwimi zemrent akken ad asent-d-yas uzekka akken bɣant.
Wali d acu i tzemreḍ ad t-txedmeḍ.
Walim d acu i tzemrem ad t-txedmem.
Walimt d acu i tzemremt ad t-txedmemt.
Walit d acu i tzemrem ad t-txedmem.
Ur yeẓri ara akk d acu ara yexdem.
Ur teẓri ara akk d acu ara texdem.
Ur neẓri ara akk d acu ara nexdem.
Ur teẓriḍ ara akk d acu ara txedmeḍ.
Ur teẓrim ara akk d acu ara txedmem.
Ur teẓrimt ara akk d acu ara txedmemt.
Ur ẓriɣ ara akk d acu ara xedmeɣ.
Ur ẓrin ara akk d acu ara xedmen.
Ur ẓrinf ara akk d acu ara xedmenf.
Fessuseḍ am tmeččimt n taduṭ.
Fessuseɣ am tmeččimt n taduṭ.
Fessus am tmeččimt n taduṭ.
Fessuset am tmeččimt n taduṭ.
Fessusit am tmeččimin n taduṭ.
Ẓẓayet am wuzzal.
Ẓẓay am wuzzal.
Ẓẓayeɣ am wuzzal.
Ẓẓayeḍ am wuzzal.
Ẓẓayit am wuzzal.
Yuḍen, d awraɣ wudem-is.
Tuḍen, d awraɣ wudem-is.
Nuḍen, d iwraɣen wudmawen-nneɣ.
Nuḍen, d iwraɣen wudmawen-nteɣ.
Tuḍneḍ, d awraɣ wudem-ik.
Tuḍneḍ, d awraɣ wudem-im.
Tuḍnem, d iwraɣen wudmawen-nwen.
Tuḍnemt, d iwraɣen wudmawen-nwent.
Tuḍnemt, d iwraɣen wudmawen-nkent.
Uḍneɣ, d awraɣ wudem-iw.
Uḍnen, d iwraɣen wudmawen-nsen.
Uḍnent, d iwraɣen wudmawen-nsent.
Zewwaɣ wudem-is deg wakken isetḥa.
Zewwaɣ wudem-is deg wakken tsetḥa.
Zewwaɣ wudem-ik deg wakken tsetḥaḍ.
Zewwaɣ wudem-im deg wakken tsetḥaḍ.
Zewwaɣ wudem-iw deg wakken setḥaɣ.
Zewwaɣit wudmawen-nneɣ deg wakken nsetḥa.
Zewwaɣit wudmawen-nsen deg wakken setḥan.
Zewwaɣit wudmawen-nsent deg wakken setḥant.
Zewwaɣit wudmawen-nteɣ deg wakken nsetḥa.
Zewwaɣit wudmawen-nwen deg wakken tsetḥam.
Zewwaɣit wudmawen-nwent deg wakken tsetḥamt.
Zewwaɣit wudmawen-nkent deg wakken tsetḥamt.
Deg yiḍ, iteddu ur yettagad.
Deg yiḍ, tetteddu ur tettagad.
Deg yiḍ, nteddu ur nettagad.
Deg yiḍ, tettedduḍ ur tettagadeḍ.
Deg yiḍ, tetteddum ur tettagadem.
Deg yiḍ, tetteddumt ur tettagademt.
Deg yiḍ, tedduɣ ur ttagadeɣ.
Deg yiḍ, teddun ur ttagaden.
Deg yiḍ, teddunt ur ttagadent.
Deg laɛmer i uɣaleɣ ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Deg laɛmer i uɣalen ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Deg laɛmer i uɣalent ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Deg laɛmer i tuɣaleḍ ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Deg laɛmer i tuɣalem ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Deg laɛmer i tuɣalemt ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Deg laɛmer i tuɣal ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Deg laɛmer i yuɣal ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Deg laɛmer i nuɣal ɣer deffir deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.

Afem-itt-id-tura kunwi.
Afemt-itt-id-tura kunemti.

Nekkni twalaḍ, s wawal n Rebbi ad nerr akkin lhemm-agi.
Wissen ma tuweḍ-ik-in tektabt-ik a Dda Ɛmar ?
Wissen ma tuweḍ-ik-in tunṭict-ik a Dda Ɛmar ?
D yir tunṭict i tefkam i yimejjayen.
Tunṭict i d-tuzen Suɛudiya, ṭṭfen-tt-id yimejjayen-nneɣ.
Ad yili Rebbi yid-wen a Dda Ɛmar, dagi nniɣ-t-id s teqbaylit.
Nekk s timmad-iw stɛerfeɣ akken i ilaq s yimejjayen imi d nutni i yettqabalen acengu ur nesɛi aɣfal.
D tabɣest tamrqqrant i ken-izedɣen.

Tal yiwet acḥal yedder.
Cwiṭ n uzref ur tesɛin.
Nadi ɣef yiẓuran-ik.
Nadi ɣef yiẓuran-im.

Nadit ɣef yiẓuran-ik.
Nadimt ɣef yiẓuran-nwent.
Nadimt ɣef yiẓuran-nkent.
D acu akka i ten-yuɣen wigi, nwan iman-nsen wissen d acu-ten.
D acu akka i tent-yuɣen tigi, nwant iman-nsent wissen d acu-tent.
D acu akka i t-yuɣen wagi, yenwa iman-is wissen d acu-t.
D acu akka i tt-yuɣen tagi, tenwa iman-is wissen d acu-tt.
D acu akka i k-yuɣen a wagi, tenwid iman-ik wissen d acu-k.
D acu akka i kem-yuɣen a tagi, tenwid iman-im wissen d acu-kem.
D acu akka i ken-yuɣen a wigi, tenwam iman-nwen wissen d acu-ken.
D acu akka i ketn-yuɣen a tigi, tenwamt iman-nwent wissen d acu-kent.
D acu akka i ketn-yuɣen a tigi, tenwamt iman-nkent wissen d acu-kent.
Ittaɣ awal ala i yiman-is.
Tettaɣ awal ala i yiman-is.
Nettaɣ awal ala i yiman-nneɣ.
Nettaɣ awal ala i yiman-nteɣ.

Abrid i bɣan ad t-nawi, ur isuffuɣ.

Abrid i yebɣa ad t-nawi, ur isuffuɣ.

Abrid i tebɣamt ad t-nawi, ur isuffuɣ.
Abrid i tebɣiḍ ad t-nawi, ur isuffuɣ.

Nutenti ad ddunt d win ara sent-imlen abrid isuffuɣen.
Netta ad yeddu d win ara s-imlen abrid isuffuɣen.
Nettat ad teddu d win ara s-imlen abrid isuffuɣen.
Nekkni ad neddu d win ara aɣ-imlen abrid isuffuɣen.
Nekkenti ad neddu d win ara aɣ-imlen abrid isuffuɣen.

Kečč ad tedduḍ d win ara k-imlen abrid isuffuɣen.

Kunemti ad teddumt d win ara kent-imlen abrid isuffuɣen.

Tal tallit s tallit-is.
Iwakken ad d-nerr akk asaḍen n tmucuha-nneɣ (Tteryel, Waɣzen, Mqidec, Blaɛjuḍ, Zelguma neɣ Silyuna...) Ilaq ad naru timucuha-a, ad d-ffɣen d idlisen ara qqaren warrac-nneɣ, ad tent-nerr diɣen d unuɣen yettembiwilen.
S wakka ara d-qqiment tmucuha-nneɣ.
Tal tafsut s tefsut-is.

Awal-im ɣur-s azal meqqren.

Seg yiwet n tɛebbuḍt i d-kkant, maɛna tal yiwet tekkat i uɛebbuḍ-is.

Seg yiwet n tɛebbuḍt i d-tekffɣem, maɛna yal yiwen yekkat i uɛebbuḍ-is.
D acu-tt ? D acu-tt ? Aɣaref ɣef uɣaref, maɛna ur ẓaden ara. Aqerruy n uzrem, maɛna ur iteqqes ara. Ineḍḍeb, yeccucuf, maɛna mačči d aslem i yella.
Seg yiwet n tɛebbuḍt i d-ffɣen, maɛna yal yiwen yekkat i Muḥend-is.
Seg yiwet n tɛebbuḍt i d-kkan, maɛna yal yiwen yekkat i Muḥend-is.
Seg yiwet n tɛebbuḍt i d-kkant, maɛna tal yiwet tekkat i Muḥend-is.

Seg yiwet n tɛebbuḍt i d-teffɣemt, maɛna tal yiwet tekkat i Muḥend-is.
