Seg yiwet n tɛebbuḍt i d-teffɣem, maɛna yal yiwen yekkat i Muḥend-is.
Dayen, tfukk tegmat.
Tagmat, d awal kan.
Zaɛma, mazal tella tegmat.
Anda-tt akka tegmat-a ?
Ulac tagmat.
Tagmat, nɣant-tt tlawin n watmaten.
Tagmat, aṭas aya i d-wujhen ɣur-s.
Tagmat, temmut.
Tagmat, teffeɣ ulawen.
Yenna-as Blaɛjuḍ i Yemma Jida : Kker ad teẓẓaleḍ a Yemm Jida ! Teẓẓuli tbeẓẓluli i as-d-terra.
Nessaram ad d-ḍefren wiyiḍ. Ma d ungal-a, ma ufiɣ-t, ad t-id-aɣeɣ, ad t-ɣreɣ.
D kečč iwimi yemmut wul imi ur tekkireḍ ara ad tlemdeḍ ad taruḍ tameslayt-ik.
Ssuref-iyi kan.
Ssurfem-iyi kan.
Ssurfemt-iyi kan.
Ssurfet-iyi kan.
D kemm iwimi yemmut wul imi ur tekkireḍ ara ad tlemdeḍ ad taruḍ tameslayt-im.
D kunwi iwimi yemmut wul imi ur tekkirem ara ad tlemdem ad tarum tameslayt-nwen.
D kunemti iwimi yemmut wul imi ur tekkiremt ara ad tlemdemt ad tarumt tameslayt-nwent.
D kunemti iwimi yemmut wul imi ur tekkiremt ara ad tlemdemt ad tarumt tameslayt-nkent.
D nekk iwimi yemmut wul imi ur kkireɣ ara ad lemdeɣ ad aruɣ tameslayt-iw.
D nutni iwimi yemmut wul imi ur kkiren ara ad lemden ad arun tameslayt-nsen.
D nutenti iwimi yemmut wul imi ur kkirent ara ad lemdetn ad arunt tameslayt-nsent.
D nettat iwimi yemmut wul imi ur tekkir ara ad telmed ad taru tameslayt-is.
D netta iwimi yemmut wul imi ur yekkir ara ad yelmed ad yaru tameslayt-is.
D nekkni iwimi yemmut wul imi ur nekkir ara ad nelmed ad naru tameslayt-nneɣ.
D nekkenti iwimi yemmut wul imi ur nekkir ara ad nelmed ad naru tameslayt-nteɣ.
Akken yebɣu yili ḷḥal tanemmirt.
Tlemdeḍ tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Maɛna ilaq ad twaliḍ wid i d-yettmalen timucuha amek i xeddmen.
Mačči d awal kan, yella uwehhi s yifassen, irennu-d azal i tmacahut iwimi ittakk rruḥ.
D ayen ara xedmeɣ tura.
Ulac kra i k-ittensaren a biccuḥ.
Ssarameɣ ad m-taɣ awal.
Azen-as lehdur-agi kemm. Akka i as-nniɣ ula d nekk.
Mebla lemziyya. Win iweɛɛan kan kra ixdem-it i teqbaylit ma nebɣa ad neqqim d Leqbayel.
D ayen ara xedmen tura.
D ayen ara xedment tura.
D ayen ara yexdem tura.
D ayen ara texdem tura.
D ayen ara nexdem tura.
D ayen ara txedmeḍ tura.
D ayen ara txedmem tura.
D ayen ara txedmemt tura.
Ssarameɣ ad k-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad s-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad iyi-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad aɣ-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad wen-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad went-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad ken-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad kent-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad sen-taɣ awal.
Ssarameɣ ad sent-taɣ awal.
Tlemdem tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Tlemdemt tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Telmed tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Yelmed tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Nelmed tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Lemdeɣ tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Lemden tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Lemdent tamacahut-a akken ma tella.
Mel-iyi-d tamacahut a yaya.
Mel-as-d tamacahut a yaya.
Mel-aɣ-d tamacahut a yaya.
Mel-asen-d tamacahut a yaya.
Mel-asent-d tamacahut a yaya.
Iḍ-a d yaya ara ɣ-d-yemlen tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
Iḍ-a d yaya ara wen-d-yemlen tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
Iḍ-a d yaya ara went-d-yemlen tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
Iḍ-a d yaya ara ken-d-yemlen tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
Iḍ-a d yaya ara kent-d-yemlen tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
Iḍ-a d yaya ara sen-d-yemlen tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
Iḍ-a d yaya ara sent-d-yemlen tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i iyi-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i aɣ-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i ak-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i am-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i as-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i asen-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i asent-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i awen-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i awent-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i aken-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
D yaya i akent-d-yemlan tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.
Tamacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ tuwi-d ɣef miḥyaf i d-yettilin gar yimdanen.
Ɣer-itt ihi, tura i tt-uriɣ din.
Ɣrem-itt ihi, tura i tt-uriɣ din.
Ɣremt-itt ihi, tura i tt-uriɣ din.
Ɣret-itt ihi, tura i tt-uriɣ din.
Azal n umdan, mačči d tiɣmi n uglim-is maɛna d lecɣal-is.
Azal n yimdanen, mačči d tiɣmi n uglim-nsen maɛna d lecɣal-nsen.
Ili-k telhiḍ d medden merra.
Ili-k telhiḍ d medden d tirni.
Ili-k telhiḍ d medden akk.
Ili-k telhiḍ d medden akken ma llan.
Igerrez ihi mi i m-teɛǧeb tmacahut n ugḍiḍ azeggaɣ.

Yecɛef, seg wass-nni ur yuɣal ɣer tid-is.
Tecɛef, seg wass-nni ur tuɣal ɣer tid-is.
Necɛef, seg wass-nni ur nuɣal ɣer tid-nneɣ.
Tceɛfeḍ, seg wass-nni ur tuɣaleḍ ɣer tid-ik.
Tceɛfeḍ, seg wass-nni ur tuɣaleḍ ɣer tid-im.

Tceɛfemt, seg wass-nni ur tuɣalemt ɣer tid-nkent.

Ceɛfen, seg wass-nni ur uɣalen ɣer tid-nsen.
Ceɛfent, seg wass-nni ur uɣalent ɣer tid-nsent.

Ccemma, tennum-itt seg wasmi tella d taqcict.

Ɛinani laɛmer neffer, tidet neqqar tqerreḥ.
Ɛinani laɛmer teffreḍ, tidet teqqareḍ tqerreḥ.
Ɛinani laɛmer teffrem, tidet teqqarem tqerreḥ.
Ɛinani laɛmer teffremt, tidet teqqaremt tqerreḥ.
Ɛinani laɛmer ffreɣ, tidet qqareɣ tqerreḥ.
Ɛinani laɛmer ffren, tidet qqaren tqerreḥ.
Ɛinani laɛmer ffrent, tidet qqarent tqerreḥ.
Itbeɛ-ik uḍad am wuccen.
Itbeɛ-ikem uḍad am wuccen.
Yerɣa ɣef yisurdiyen.
Terɣa ɣef yisurdiyen.
Nerɣa ɣef yisurdiyen.
Terɣam ɣef yisurdiyen.
Terɣamt ɣef yisurdiyen.
Terɣiḍ ɣef yisurdiyen.
Rɣiɣ ɣef yisurdiyen.
Rɣan ɣef yisurdiyen.
Rɣant ɣef yisurdiyen.
Amer ittaf, d netta kan ara yilin.
Amer tettaf, d nettat kan ara yilin.
Amer nettaf, d nekkni kan ara yilin.
Amer nettaf, d nekkenti kan ara yilin.
Amer tettafeḍ, d kečč kan ara yilin.
Amer tettafeḍ, d kemm kan ara yilin
Amer tettafem, d kunwi kan ara yilin.
Amer tettafemt, d kunemti kan ara yilin.
Amer ttafeɣ, d nekk kan ara yilin.
Amer ttafen, d nutni kan ara yilin.
Amer ttafent, d nutenit kan ara yilin
Amer ittaf, yiwen ur yettili sdat-s.
Amer tettaf, yiwen ur yettili sdat-s.
Amer nettaf, yiwen ur yettili sdat-nneɣ.
Amer nettaf, yiwen ur yettili sdat-nteɣ.
Amer tettafeḍ, yiwen ur yettili sdat-k.
Amer tettafeḍ, yiwen ur yettili sdat-m.
Amer tettafem, yiwen ur yettili sdat-wen.
Amer tettafem, yiwen ur yettili sdat-ken.
Amer tettafemt, yiwen ur yettili sdat-went.
Amer tettafemt, yiwen ur yettili sdat-kent.
Amer ttafeɣ, yiwen ur yettili sdat-i.
Amer ttafen, yiwen ur yettili sdat-sen.
Amer ttafent, yiwen ur yettili sdat-sent.
Amer ittaf, aḥric-is dima d ameqqran.
Amer nettaf, aḥric-nneɣ dima d ameqqran.
Amer nettaf, aḥric-nteɣ dima d ameqqran.
Amer tettaf, aḥric-is dima d ameqqran.
Amer tettafeḍ, aḥric-ik dima d ameqqran.
Amer tettafeḍ, aḥric-im dima d ameqqran.
Amer tettafem, aḥric-nwen dima d ameqqran.
Amer tettafemt, aḥric-nwent dima d ameqqran.
Amer tettafemt, aḥric-nkent dima d ameqqran.
Amer ttafeɣ, aḥric-iw dima d ameqqran.
Amer ttafen, aḥric-nsen dima d ameqqran.
Amer ttafent, aḥric-nsent dima d ameqqran.
D ameqqran n uɛebbuḍ.
D tameqqrant n uɛebbuḍ.
D imeqqranen n uɛebbuḍ.
D timeqqranin n uɛebbuḍ.

Ntett, tawant ulac.

Mačči d yiwen i iɣurr.
Mačči d yiwet i iɣurr.

Iɣurr ula d tid i t-iqerben.
Tɣurr ula d wid i tt-iqerben.
Tɣurr ula d tid i tt-iqerben.

Nɣurr ula d tid i aɣ-iqerben.
Tɣurreḍ ula d wid i k-iqerben.
Tɣurreḍ ula d tid i k-iqerben.

Tɣurrem ula d tid i ken-iqerben.
Tɣurremt ula d wid i kent-iqerben.
Tɣurremt ula d tid i kent-iqerben.

Tɣurreḍ ula d tid i kem-iqerben.

Ɣurren ula d tid i ten-iqerben.

Irebba azeɛbul s wayen yuker.
Irebba acegriḍ s wayen yuker.
Trebba azeɛbul s wayen tuker.
Trebba acegriḍ s wayen tuker.
Nrebba izeɛbal s wayen nuker.
Nrebba icegraḍ s wayen nuker.

Trebbaḍ acegriḍ s wayen tukreḍ.

Trebbam icegraḍ s wayen tukrem.
Trebbamt izeɛbal s wayen tukremt.
Trebbamt icegraḍ s wayen tukremt.

Rebban icegraḍ s wayen ukren.

Amdan d imɣelli.
Amdan d win yettɣullun.
Imdanen d wid yettɣullun.
Win yettɣullun, berrik wul-is.
Tin yettɣullun, berrik wul-is.
Wid yettɣullun, berrikit wulawen-nsen.
Tid yettɣullun, berrikit wulawen-nsent.
Iɣull aɣyul-is, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Aɣyul-is mi i t-iɣull, tewwet lmeɣla.
Tɣull aɣyul-is, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Nɣull aɣyul-nneɣ, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Nɣull aɣyul-nteɣ, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Tɣulleḍ aɣyul-ik, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Tɣulleḍ aɣyul-im, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Tɣullem aɣyul-nwen, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Tɣullemt aɣyul-nwent, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Tɣullemt aɣyul-nkent, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Ɣulleɣ aɣyul-iw, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Ɣullen aɣyul-nsen, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Ɣullent aɣyul-nsent, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
D amecḥaḥ, yettɣullu iman-is.
D tamecḥaḥt, tettɣullu iman-is.
D imecḥaḥen, nettɣullu iman-nneɣ.
D timecḥaḥin, nettɣullu iman-nteɣ.
D tamecḥaḥt, tettɣulluḍ iman-im.
D amecḥaḥ, tettɣulluḍ iman-ik.
D imecḥaḥen, tettɣullum iman-nwen.
D timecḥaḥin, tettɣullumt iman-nwent.
D timecḥaḥin, tettɣullumt iman-nkent.
D amecḥaḥ, ttɣulluɣ iman-iw.
D timecḥaḥin, ttɣullunt iman-nsent.
D imecḥaḥen, ttɣullun iman-nsen.
Win yettɣullun iman-is, yettɣullu akk medden.
Tin yettɣullun iman-is, tettɣullu akk medden.
Wid yettɣullun iman-nsen, ttɣullun akk medden.
Tid yettɣullun iman-nsent, ttɣullunt akk medden.
Ma ɣulleɣ-k, ɣulleɣ iman-iw.
Ma ɣulleɣ-kem, ɣulleɣ iman-iw.
Ma ɣulleɣ-ken, ɣulleɣ iman-iw.
Ma ɣulleɣ-kent, ɣulleɣ iman-iw.
Ma ɣulleɣ-ten, ɣulleɣ iman-iw.
Ma ɣulleɣ-tent, ɣulleɣ iman-iw.
Ma ɣulleɣ-t, ɣulleɣ iman-iw.
Ma ɣulleɣ-tt, ɣulleɣ iman-iw.
Ma iɣull-iyi, iɣull iman-is.
Ma tɣull-iyi, tɣull iman-is.
Ma tɣulleḍ-iyi, tɣulleḍ iman-ik.
Ma tɣulleḍ-iyi, tɣulleḍ iman-im.
Ma tɣullem-iyi, tɣullem iman-nwen.
Ma tɣullemt-iyi, tɣullemt iman-nwent.
Ma tɣullemt-iyi, tɣullemt iman-nkent.
Ma ɣullen-iyi, ɣullen iman-nsen.
Ma ɣullent-iyi, ɣullent iman-nsent.
Idir ayen tebɣiḍ, yiwen n wass kan ad temmteḍ.
Idirem ayen tebɣam, yiwen n wass kan ad temmtem.
Idiremt ayen tebɣamt, yiwen n wass kan ad temmtemt.
Idiret ayen tebɣam, yiwen n wass kan ad temmtem.
Ad yidir yiwen ayen yebɣa, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-is.
Ad tidir yiwet ayen yebɣa, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-is.
Ad tidireḍ ayen tebɣiḍ, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-ik.
Ad tidireḍ ayen tebɣiḍ, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-im.
Ad tidirem ayen tebɣam, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-nwen.
Ad tidiremt ayen tebɣamt, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-nwent.
Ad tidiremt ayen tebɣamt, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-nkent.
Ad idireɣ ayen bɣiɣ, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-iw.
Ad idiren ayen bɣan, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-nsen.
Ad idirent ayen bɣant, yiwen n wass kan ad fakken wussan-nsent.

Tanemirt mi ten-teqqareḍ.
Tanemmirt mi teqqareḍ ayen ttaruɣ.
Tanemmirt mi teqqareḍ isefra-inu.
Aṭas aya nekk ttaruɣ tamedyezt.
Ihi mi tweɛɛaḍ kan kcem s ablug-iw, mačči d yiwen n usefru ara tafeḍ din.
Aṭas aya nekk ttaruɣ isefra.
Tanemmirt mi teqqareḍ tamedyezt-inu.

Kkes-as aman i uslem ad yemmet.

Ur zmiren yiselman ad idiren berra i waman.

Ad k-ččen ma teččiḍ-iyi i tenna twekkiwt i uslem.

Tessenz-d iman-is ur tuḥtam.
Nessenz-d iman-nneɣ ur nuḥtam.

Tessenzeḍ-d iman-ik ur tuḥtameḍ.
Tessenzeḍ-d iman-im ur tuḥtameḍ.

Ur yessin ad ixiḍ, rnu-as asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur tessin ad txiḍ, rnu-as asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur nessin ad nxiḍ, rnu-aɣ asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur tessineḍ ad txiḍeḍ, nerna-ak-d asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur tessineḍ ad txiḍeḍ, nerna-am-d asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur tessinem ad txiḍem, nerna-awen-d asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur tessinemt ad txiḍemt, nerna-awent-d asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur tessinemt ad txiḍemt, nerna-akent-d asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur ssineɣ ad xiḍeɣ, rnu-iyi-d asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur ssinen ad xiḍen, ternuḍ-asen asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur ssinent ad xiḍent, ternuḍ-asent asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Ur ssineɣ ad xiḍeɣ, ternuḍ-iyi-d asseɣzef n lxiḍ.
Win ur nessin ad ixiḍ, yetbeɛ nnfadi.
Tin ur nessin ad txiḍ, tetbeɛ nnfadi.
Wid ur nessin ad xiḍen, tebɛen nnfadi.
Tid ur nessin ad xiḍent, tebɛent nnfadi.
Win ur nessin ad ixiḍ, yeḍfer nnfadi.
Tin ur nessin ad txiḍ, teḍfer nnfadi.
Tid ur nessin ad xiḍent, teḍrent nnfadi.
Wid ur nessin ad xiḍen, teḍren nnfadi.

D tin iwimi tekteb ara tt-yaɣen.
D wid iwimi tekteb ara tt-yaɣen.
D tid iwimi tekteb ara tt-yaɣen.

Ur d-nemzeg ara nekk d tid akken yebɣan ad aɣent takerrust-iw.

Taqcict d tuḥrict.
Aqcic d amuḥric.
Taqcic d tamuḥrict.

Fkan-asen ččan tisigert.
Fkan-asent ččant tisigert.

Ar tura ur nezmir i yiman-nneɣ.
Ar tura ur yezmir i yiman-is.
Ar tura ur tezmir i yiman-is.
Ar tura ur nezmir i yiman-nteɣ.
Ar tura ur tezmireḍ i yiman-ik.
Ar tura ur tezmireḍ i yiman-im.
Ar tura ur tezmirem i yiman-nwen.

Ar tura ur zmirent i yiman-nsent.

Ar tura d wiyiḍ i yettḍebbiren fell-anteɣ.
Ar tura d wiyiḍ i yettḍebbiren fell-i.

Ar tura d wiyiḍ i yettḍebbiren fell-asent.
D aya kan, ahat anect-a ttwalin-t-id bezzaf fell-aneɣ.

Ar tura nrehhen azekka-nneɣ.
Ar tura trehhnem azekka-nwen.
Ar tura rehhnen azekka-nsen.
Ar tura awal ur aɣ-d-yettali sdat n wid i aɣ-yerran d aklan ɣef yidles-nsen, neǧǧa ayla-nneɣ.
Ar tura awal ur as-d-yettali sdat n wid i t-yerran d akli ɣef yidles-nsen, yeǧǧa ayla-s.
Ar tura awal ur as-d-yettali sdat n wid i tt-yerran d taklit ɣef yidles-nsen, teǧǧa ayla-s.
Ar tura awal ur k-id-yettali sdat n wid i k-yerran d akli ɣef yidles-nsen, teǧǧiḍ ayla-k.
Ar tura awal ur kem-id-yettali sdat n wid i kem-yerran d taklit ɣef yidles-nsen, teǧǧiḍ ayla-m.
Ar tura awal ur ken-id-yettali sdat n wid i ken-yerran d aklan ɣef yidles-nsen, teǧǧam ayla-nwen.
Ar tura awal ur kent-id-yettali sdat n wid i kent-yerran d taklatin ɣef yidles-nsen, teǧǧamt ayla-nwent.
Ar tura awal ur kent-id-yettali sdat n wid i kent-yerran d taklatin ɣef yidles-nsen, teǧǧamt ayla-nkent.
Ar tura awal ur iyi-d-yettali sdat n wid i iyi-yerran d akli ɣef yidles-nsen, ǧǧiɣ ayla-w.
Ar tura awal ur ten-id-yettali sdat n wid i ten-yerran d aklan ɣef yidles-nsen, ǧǧan ayla-nsen.
Ar tura awal ur tent-id-yettali sdat n wid i tent-yerran d taklatin ɣef yidles-nsen, ǧǧant ayla-nsent.

Sliɣ i yir awal.

Slant i yir lehdur.

Tugi ad teddu d taqeffaft.

Lbaḍna, nenna-as-tt s ameẓẓuɣ-is.
Lbaḍna, tennam-as-tt s ameẓẓuɣ-is.
Lbaḍna, tennamt-as-tt s ameẓẓuɣ-is.
Lbaḍna, tenniḍ-as-tt s ameẓẓuɣ-is.
Lbaḍna, nniɣ-as-tt s ameẓẓuɣ-is.
Lbaḍna, nnan-as-tt s ameẓẓuɣ-is.
Lbaḍna, nnant-as-tt s ameẓẓuɣ-is.

tin yuklalen kra, tawi-t.
Wid yuklalen kra, awin-t.
Tid yuklalen kra, awint-t.
Ččan-as lxir.
Lxir yexdem, yuɣal-as d ixmir.
Yuɣal-as d ixmir lxir yexdem.
Yuɣal-as d ixmir lxir texdem.
Yuɣal-aɣ d ixmir lxir nexdem.
Yuɣal-awen d ixmir lxir txedmem.
Yuɣal-awent d ixmir lxir txedmemt.
Yuɣal-aken d ixmir lxir txedmem.
Yuɣal-akent d ixmir lxir txedmemt.
Yuɣal-ak d ixmir lxir txedmeḍ.
Yuɣal-am d ixmir lxir txedmeḍ.
Yuɣal-iyi d ixmir lxir xedmeɣ.
Yuɣal-asen d ixmir lxir xedmen.
Yuɣal-asent d ixmir lxir xedment.
Imeslayen, ur ttaččaren ara aɛebbud.
Amer ittaf ur d-ittlal ara deg tmurt-a.
Amer tettaf ur d-tettlal ara deg tmurt-a.
Amer nettaf ur d-nettlal ara deg tmurt-a.
Amer tettafeḍ ur d-tettlaleḍ ara deg tmurt-a.

Amer tettafemt ur d-tettlalemt ara deg tmurt-a.

Amer ttafent ur d-ttlalent ara deg tmurt-a.

D ṭṭlaba iwimi ur tezmireḍ ara.

Tid yesɛan ṭṭlaba, xellṣent-tt.

D yiwet n teqcict i as-yeččuren tiṭ.

Ala netta i tettragu.

Anda tedda, tugna-s ad teddu yid-s.

Anda yedda, tugna-m ad teddu yid-s.
Anda tedda, tugna-k ad teddu yid-s.

Wissen d acu i d-iteddun ?

Ṭill a tameṭṭut, iger-ihin wenɛen-as tamegra s umger.
Ṭill ay argaz, iger-ihin wenɛen-as tamegra s umger.
Ṭillem ay irgazen, iger-ihin wenɛen-as tamegra s umger.
Ṭillet ay irgazen, iger-ihin wenɛen-as tamegra s umger.
Ṭillemt a tilawin, iger-ihin wenɛen-as tamegra s umger.
D tidet ay argaz wenɛen-as tamegra, maca mačči s umger s temqessin i t-gezmen.
.D acu i kem-yuɣen akka a tameṭṭut ? Am wakken ur teḥsiḍ ara s wacu i megren igran.

Mneɛ-iten seg udɣaɣ uffir d tyita n deffir.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-as lemḥani, netta iɣull-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i as-ssutreɣ.
Mneɛ-itent seg udɣaɣ uffir d tyita n deffir.
Mneɛ-it seg udɣaɣ uffir d tyita n deffir.
Mneɛ-itt seg udɣaɣ uffir d tyita n deffir.
Mneɛ-iyi seg udɣaɣ uffir d tyita n deffir.
Mneɛ-aɣ seg udɣaɣ uffir d tyita n deffir.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-as lemḥani, nettat tɣull-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i as-ssutreɣ.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-asen lemḥani, nutni ɣullen-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i asen-ssutreɣ.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-asent lemḥani, nutenti ɣullent-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i asent-ssutreɣ
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-aken lemḥani, kunwi tɣullem-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i aken-ssutreɣ.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-akent lemḥani, kunemti tɣullemt-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i akent-ssutreɣ.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-awent lemḥani, kunemti tɣullemt-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i awent-ssutreɣ.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-awen lemḥani, kunwi tɣullem-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i awen-ssutreɣ.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-ak lemḥani, kečč tɣulleḍ-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i ak-ssutreɣ.
Nekk ṛwiɣ fell-am lemḥani, kemm tɣulleḍ-iyi deg cwiṭ n kra i am-ssutreɣ.

Yestufa-n lḥif ɣur-ken.

Tuḍen lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-is yiwen yiwen.
Nuḍen lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-nneɣ yiwen yiwen.
Nuḍen lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-nteɣ yiwen yiwen.
Tuḍnem lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-nwen yiwen yiwen.
Tuḍnemt lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-nwent yiwen yiwen.
Tuḍnemt lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-nkent yiwen yiwen.
Tuḍneḍ lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-ik yiwen yiwen.
Tuḍneḍ lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-im yiwen yiwen.

Uḍnent lfula, ɣellin-d wuglan-nsent yiwen yiwen.

Deg wakken i d-tdehhu akken i iwata d wuglan-is, yiwen deg-sen ur yesɛi lfula.
Deg wakken i d-ndehhu akken i iwata d wuglan-nneɣ, yiwen deg-sen ur yesɛi lfula.
Deg wakken i d-ndehhu akken i iwata d wuglan-nteɣ, yiwen deg-sen ur yesɛi lfula.

Deg wakken i d-tdehhuḍ akken i iwata d wuglan-im, yiwen deg-sen ur yesɛi lfula.

S ucacfal i d-tettekksem akermus.
S ucacfal i d-tettekksemt akermus.
S ucacfal i d-ttekkseɣ akermus.
Dagi mačči d tabarda n uɣyul maca d tin n uɛudiw iwimi qqaren tarikt.
Ilaq ad t-tagareḍ deg lewɛara.
S ucacfal i d-ttekksen akermus.
S ucacfal i d-ttekksent akermus.
Ahat ma teqqareḍ ayen i am-d-ttaruɣ, tettafeḍ kra n wawal ur t-teqqarem ara ɣur-wen.
Ahat ma teqqareḍ ayen i ak-d-ttaruɣ, tettafeḍ kra n wawal ur t-teqqarem ara ɣur-wen.
Ahat ma teqqarem ayen i awen-d-ttaruɣ, tettafem kra n wawal ur t-teqqarem ara ɣur-wen.

Deg yiwet n taddart i nezdeɣ, maɛna laɛmer i k-walaɣ.
Deg yiwet n taddart i nezdeɣ, maɛna laɛmer i ken-walaɣ.
Deg yiwet n taddart i nezdeɣ, maɛna laɛmer i kent-walaɣ.

Mi tetteddu deg ubrid, tesseɣzaf asurif akken ad taweḍ zik s axxam.

Ad ten-ternum ma tebḍam-ten.
Ad ten-ternumt ma tebḍamt-ten.
Ad ten-rnun ma bḍan-ten.
Ad ten-rnunt ma bḍant-ten.
Ad ten-yernu ma yebḍa-ten.
Ad ten-ternu ma tebḍa-ten.
Ad ten-nernu ma nebḍa-ten.
Mi ara dduklen, yiwen ur asen-yezmir.
Mi ara dduklent, yiwen ur asent-yezmir.
Mi ara neddukel, yiwen ur aɣ-yezmir.
Mi ara tedduklem, yiwen ur awen-yezmir.
Mi ara tedduklemt, yiwen ur awent-yezmir.
Mi ara tedduklem, yiwen ur aken-yezmir.
Mi ara tedduklemt, yiwen ur akent-yezmir.
Tuzzel tɛebbuḍt-iw.
Tuzzel tɛebbuḍt-ik.

Uzzlent tɛebbaḍin-nwent.

Tebreḍ aserwal-is.
Nebreḍ iserwula-nneɣ.
Tberḍeḍ aserwal-ik.
Tberḍeḍ aserwal-im.
Tberḍem iserwula-nwen.
Tberḍemt iserwula-nwent.
Tberḍemt iserwula-nkent.

Berḍeɣ aserwal-inu.

Berḍen iserwula-nsent.
Tberḍeḍ aserwal-inem.
Tberḍeḍ aserwal-inek.
Tebreḍ aserwal-ines.
Yebreḍ aserwal-ines.

Tserreḥ tɛebbuḍt-ines.

Tserreḥ tɛebbuḍt-inem.

Serrḥent tɛebbaḍin-nwent.

Azul ! Lufan kan ad d-tiniḍ anta i d kemm.
Bunerjuf d yiwen n yimɣi yesɛan iferrawen d ihrawanen, teddun ɣef lqaɛa. Tiɣmi-s d adal acletḥan. Agummu-s ma teldiḍ-t, ad tafeḍ deg-s tiɣeqqayin tiberkanin. Win i tent-yeččan ad isewweq leɛqel-is. Am win yeččan lḥelba.

Trew-d taɣaḍt-nneɣ iɣid d tɣideḍt.

Iwakken ur iteṭṭeḍ ara yiɣid yemma-s, nettarra ɣef tqamumt-is takmamt.

Iwakken ur teṭṭḍen ara yiɣiden yemma-tsen, ttarran i tmaẓẓagt n taɣaḍt acemmal.

Iwakken ur iteṭṭeḍ ara yiɣid yemma-s, ttarran ɣef tqamumt-is takmamt.

Aziḍuḍ yuɣalen d ayaziḍ ɣef Leqbayel msakit yunfen i wazalen n wat zik ttensaren-asen yiwen yiwen alma dayen ur ɛeqlen ara iman-nsen imi uɣalen fsin am teḥjurt n ssekker deg lqahwa i d-ihegga uziḍuḍ.
Ala bu nneyya i tent-ittaɣen.
Uḥric, yezmer i yiman-is.
Amuḥric, yezmer i yiman-is.

Yettandi uziḍuḍ tixeftin i Leqbayel.
Yettandi uziḍuḍ tifdulin i Leqbayel.

Yettandi uziḍuḍ tismaṛḍasin i Leqbayel.
Yettandi uziḍuḍ llazuq i Leqbayel.
Ass-a, azalen-nni n zik, ttensaren-aɣ yiwen yiwen i nekkni s Leqbvayel.

Ad yeǧǧ Rebbi axxam-iw d ilem ma yella ur t-xdimeɣ ara.
Lufan ad d-tedhu d lecɣal-is xir wala d lecɣal n medden.
Ad yessenker Rebbi iberdiyen-ik d iferḍan.
Ad d-iṣṣenṣel Rebbi aglim n yiberdiyen-ik.
Axxam-is ur t-id-tefriḍ, lǧameɛ teṭṭef-as amezzir
Axxam-is ur as-tezmir, lǧameɛ teṭṭef-as amezzir.
Lufan ad d-tedhu d lecɣal-is xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-yedhu d lecɣal-is xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-nedhu d lecɣal-nneɣ xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-nedhu d lecɣal-nteɣ xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-tedhuḍ d lecɣal-ik xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-tedhuḍ d lecɣal-im xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-tedhum d lecɣal-nwen xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-tedhumt d lecɣal-nwent xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-tedhumt d lecɣal-nkent xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-dhuɣ d lecɣal-iw xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-dhuɣ d lecɣal-inu xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-dhun d lecɣal-nsen xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-dhunt d lecɣal-nsent xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-tedhuḍ d lecɣal-inek xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-tedhuḍ d lecɣal-inem xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-tedhu d lecɣal-ines xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Lufan ad d-yedhu d lecɣal-ines xir, wala d lecɣal n medden.
Axxam-is ur t-id-yefriḍ, lǧameɛ yeṭṭef-as amezzir.
Axxam-nneɣ ur t-id-nefriḍ, lǧameɛ neṭṭef-as amezzir.
Axxam-nteɣ ur t-id-nefriḍ, lǧameɛ neṭṭef-as amezzir.
Axxam-ik ur t-id-tefriḍeḍ, lǧameɛ teṭṭfeḍ-as amezzir.
Axxam-nwen ur t-id-tefriḍem, lǧameɛ teṭṭfem-as amezzir.
Axxam-nwent ur t-id-tefriḍemt, lǧameɛ teṭṭfemt-as amezzir.
Axxam-nkent ur t-id-tefriḍemt, lǧameɛ teṭṭfemt-as amezzir.
Axxam-im ur t-id-tefriḍeḍ, lǧameɛ teṭṭfeḍ-as amezzir.
Axxam-iw ur t-id-friḍeɣ, lǧameɛ ṭṭfeɣ-as amezzir.
Axxam-inu ur t-id-friḍeɣ, lǧameɛ ṭṭfeɣ-as amezzir.
Axxam-nsen ur t-id-friḍen, lǧameɛ ṭṭfen-as amezzir.
Axxam-nsent ur t-id-friḍent, lǧameɛ ṭṭfent-as amezzir.

Tebɣa ad tent-terbeḥ i snat.

Tamurt idel-itt usemmiḍ, sya u sya zzint-as tillas.
Tamurt, zzint-as tillas.
Tamurt, yal ass trennu deg tebrek.
Tamurt-iw tuḍen nezzeh.
Tamurt-iw yuḍnen, tugi ad tliwi iman-is.

Lferḍ n uxxam d isɣaren, d aman, d awren
Ayen i ilaqen ad yili deg uxxam d isɣaren, d aman, d awren.
Ala lqut i d lferḍ i sɛan.
Sɛan ayen i ilaqen kan akken ad idiren.
Win ur nesɛi ula d ayen i ilaqen, yeṭṭamaɛ ayen ur neswi ara akk azal.
Tin ur nesɛi ula d ayen i ilaqen, teṭṭamaɛ ayen ur nesɛi ara akk azal.
Aru-ten kan akken tessneḍ. Ilaq ad tessiwḍeḍ ad ten-id-teɣreḍ i walbaɛḍ n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt ara m-ten-yerun akken i ilaq.
Tid ur nesɛi ula d ayen i ilaqen, ṭṭamaɛent ayen ur nesɛi ara akk azal.
Akken ih, ilaq ad kem-issinen medden, ad ilin wid iwimi ara ɛeǧben yisefra-inem.
Ilaq ad tḥulfuḍ s kra iwakken ad taruḍ fell-as.
Yezmer lḥal ad am-d-yuɣal lebɣi n tira.
Win yennumen kra, ur t-itettu.
Tin yennumen kra, ur t-tettettu.
Wid yennumen kra, ur t-tettun.
Tid yennumen kra, ur t-tettunt.
Wid ur nesɛi ula d ayen i ilaqen, ṭṭamaɛen ayen ur nesɛi ara akk azal.
Ilaq ad tḥulfum s kra iwakken ad tarum fell-as.
Ilaq ad tḥulfumt s kra iwakken ad tarumt fell-as.
Ilaq ad ḥulfuɣ s kra iwakken ad aruɣ fell-as.
Ilaq ad ḥulfun s kra iwakken ad arun fell-as.
Ilaq ad ḥulfunt s kra iwakken ad arunt fell-as.
Ilaq ad iḥulfu s kra iwakken ad yaru fell-as.
Ilaq ad tḥulfu s kra iwakken ad taru fell-as.
Ilaq ad nḥulfu s kra iwakken ad naru fell-as.
Akka ihi, ad kem-iɛin Rebbi.
Akka ihi, ad k-iɛin Rebbi.
Akka ihi, ad ken-iɛin Rebbi.
Akka ihi, ad kent-iɛin Rebbi.
Amek i tettili tezmert-ik ?
Amek i tettili tezmert-im ?
Amek i tettili tezmert-nwen ?
Amek i tettili tezmert-nwent ?
Amek i tettili tezmert-nkent ?
Ddeqsis kan.
Aṭṭan yettawi-d tawla.
Tawla tessalay tazɣelt n tfekka n umdan.
Tazɣelt tamagnut n tfekka n umdan d 37°c.
Ad d-yawi Rebbi tujjya i yimuḍan anda ma llan.
Ad d-yawi Rebbi tujjya i kra n win yuḍnen.
Tujjya iɛejlen i kra n win yuḍnen.
Ssarameɣ tujjya iɛejlen i kra n win yuḍnen.
Ssarameɣ tujjya iɛejlen i kra n win yellan d amuḍin.
Yeffer fell-as, ur as-d-yenni kra.
Ur as-d-yenni kra, yeffer fell-as.
Ur as-d-tenni kra, teffer fell-as.
Ur as-d-nenni kra, neffer fell-as.
Ur as-d-tenniḍ kra, teffreḍ fell-as.
Ur as-d-tennim kra, teffrem fell-as.
Ur as-d-tennimt kra, teffremt fell-as.
Ur as-d-nniɣ kra, ffreɣ fell-as.
Ur as-d-nnin kra, ffren fell-as.
Ur as-d-nnint kra, ffrent fell-as.
Ur yettu ara ayen iɣef t-id-tweṣṣa yemma-s.
Ur tettu ara ayen iɣef tt-id-tweṣṣa yemma-s.
Ur nettu ara ayen iɣef aɣ-d-tweṣṣa yemma-nneɣ.
Ur nettu ara ayen iɣef aɣ-d-tweṣṣa yemma-nteɣ.
Ur tettuḍ ara ayen iɣef k-id-tweṣṣa yemma-k.
Ur tettuḍ ara ayen iɣef kem-id-tweṣṣa yemma-m.
Ur tettum ara ayen iɣef ken-id-tweṣṣa yemma-tken.
Ur tettumt ara ayen iɣef kent-id-tweṣṣa yemma-tkent.
Ur tettum ara ayen iɣef ken-id-tweṣṣa yemma-twen.
Ur tettumt ara ayen iɣef kent-id-tweṣṣa yemma-twent.
Ur ttuɣ ara ayen iɣef iyi-d-tweṣṣa yemma.
Ur ttun ara ayen iɣef ten-id-tweṣṣa yemma-tsen.
Ur ttunt ara ayen iɣef tent-id-tweṣṣa yemma-tsent.
Yettnadi ad yefhem ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-is.
Tettnadi ad tefhem ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-is.
Nettnadi ad nefhem ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-nneɣ.
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-ik.
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-im.
Tettnadim ad tfehmem ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-nwen.
Tettnadimt ad tfehmemt ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-nwent.
Tettnadimt ad tfehmemt ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-nkent.
Ttnadiɣ ad fehmeɣ ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-iw.
Nettnadi ad nefhem ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-nteɣ.
Ttnadin ad fehmen ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-nsen.
Ttnadint ad fehment ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-nsent.
Ttnadiɣ ad fehmeɣ ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-inu.
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-inem.
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-inek.
Tettnadi ad tefhem ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-ines.
Yettnadi ad yefhem ayɣer i yettwaḥqar yidles-ines.
Yettnadi ad yefhem ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-is.
Yettnadi ad yefhem ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-ines.
Tettnadi ad tefhem ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-is.
Tettnadi ad tefhem ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-ines.
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-ik.
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-inek
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-im
Tettnadiḍ ad tfehmeḍ ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-inem
Ttnadiɣ ad fehmeɣ ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-iw
Ttnadiɣ ad fehmeɣ ayɣer i tettwaḥqar tutlayt-inu
D yiwen yettnadin ad yefhem, yesteqsay medden ɣef tal tamsalt.
D yiwen yettnadin ad yefhem, yesteqsay medden ɣef tal taluft.
D yiwet yettnadin ad tefhem, testeqsay medden ɣef tal tamsalt.
D yiwet yettnadin ad tefhem, testeqsay medden ɣef tal taluft.
Wid yettnadin ad fehmen, steqsayen medden ɣef tal tamsalt.
Wid yettnadin ad fehmen, steqsayen medden ɣef tal taluft.
Tid yettnadin ad fehment, steqsayent medden ɣef tal tamsalt.
Tid yettnadin ad fehment, steqsayent medden ɣef tal taluflt.
Win yettnadin ad yefhem, yesteqsay medden ɣef tal tamsalt.
Win yettnadin ad yefhem, yesteqsay medden ɣef tal taluft.
Tin yettnadin ad tefhem, testeqsay medden ɣef tal tamsalt.
Tin yettnadin ad tefhem, testeqsay medden ɣef tal taluft.
Imi ur tettlusu ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-is ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur yettlusu ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-is ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur nettlusu ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-nneɣ ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur tettlusuḍ ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-ik ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur tettlusuḍ ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-im ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur tettlusum ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-nwen ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur tettlusumt ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-nwent ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur tettlusumt ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-nkent ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur ttlusuɣ ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-iw ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur ttlusun ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-nsen ččuren d tifexsa.
Imi ur ttlusunt ara ssebbaḍ, igerzan n yiḍarren-nsent ččuren d tifexsa.
Tamsalt n tmagit nefra-tt.
Ɣas ma tamsalt n tmagit nefra-tt, Kkren-d kra yiɛerbuben bɣan ad tt-id-rren s wadda.
Lekdeb ameqqran d wa : Akal n Zzayer d aɛrab.
Tamurt n Zzayer tekki deg tmurt n Tmazɣa, ihi d tamaziɣt mačči d taɛrabt.
Ayen bɣun kken lekdubat, tidet yiwen n wass kan ad d-tban.
Ayen bɣunt kkent tkerkas, tidet yiwen n wass kan ad d-tban.
Ad fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem yazen i yimawlan-is ssber. Iman-is di talwit.

Teḍra yid-wen am win yettrebbin ibki, la taduṭ, la ayefki.
Teḍra yid-sen am win yettrebbin ibki, la taduṭ, la ayefki.

Taɛrabt nekk ur ssineɣ ara, nekk seg yiqdimen.
Ad k-iɛin Rebbi deg ccɣel-ik.
Ad k-iɛin Rebbi deg lecɣal-ik.

Imi yemma temmut, awer d-teggri tmeṭṭut.
Teččur-as i yemma, temmut.
Teččur-as i yemma, tuweḍ sanda ara naweḍ.
Temmut yemma, yerna baba ɣur-s.
Ad ten-yerḥem Rebbi, iwseɛ-itt fell-asen.
Mačči ala yemma kan i yemmuten.

Acḥal i kem-neḥmmel a yemma.
Tamendawt terẓa ddeqs n yizerfan.

Tḥemmleḍ nezzeh tanmegla imi ddunit fell-as i tebna.

Yeqber wul-is.

Tefkam aɛrur i tyita.

Kra yeḍran yid-neɣ, s ufus-nneɣ i t-id-nuwi.
Kra yeḍran yid-s, s ufus-is i t-id-yuwi.
Kra yeḍran yid-s, s ufus-is i t-id-tuwi.
Kra yeḍran yid-k, s ufus-ik i t-id-tuwiḍ.
Kra yeḍran yid-m, s ufus-im i t-id-tuwiḍ.

Kra yeḍran yid-went, s ufus-nwent i t-id-tuwimt.
Kra yeḍran yid-kent, s ufus-nkent i t-id-tuwimt.

Kra yeḍran yid-sen, s ufus-nsen i t-id-uwin.
Kra yeḍran yid-sent, s ufus-nsent i t-id-uwint.

Tesruḥem tamagit-nwen.
Sruḥen tamagit-nsen.

Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara yels, aggur ad ten-yesfercec.
Yeg Rebbi yelsa ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma yesseɣres-iten.
Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara tels, aggur ad ten-tesfercec.
Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara nels, aggur ad ten-nesfercec.
Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara telseḍ, aggur ad ten-tesferceceḍ.
Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara telsem, aggur ad ten-tesfercecem.
Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara telsemt, aggur ad ten-tesfercecemt.
Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara lseɣ, aggur ad ten-sferceceɣ.
Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara lsen, aggur ad ten-sfercecen.
Ma d ssebbaḍ n ddkir ara lsenf, aggur ad ten-sfercecenf.
Yeg Rebbi telsa ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma tesseɣres-iten.
Yeg Rebbi nelsa ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma nesseɣres-iten.
Yeg Rebbi telsam ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma tessɣersem-ten.
Yeg Rebbi telsamt ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma tessɣersemt-ten.
Yeg Rebbi telsiḍ ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma tessɣerseḍ-ten.
Yeg Rebbi lsiɣ ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma ssɣerseɣ-ten.
Yeg Rebbi lsan ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma ssɣersen-ten.
Yeg Rebbi lsant ssebbaḍ n ddkir, ur ttawḍen aggur alma ssɣersent-ten.
Ssan-d taḥsirt, ɣlin ɣef lehdur ur nettfakka.
Ssant-d taḥsirt, ɣlint ɣef lehdur ur nettfakka.
Tessam-d taḥsirt, teɣlim ɣef lehdur ur nettfakka.
Tessamt-d taḥsirt, teɣlimt ɣef lehdur ur nettfakka.
Nessa-d taḥsirt, neɣli ɣef lehdur ur nettfakka.
Yeɛweq umdan d acu ara yaru.

Ttnadiɣ anta tafyirt ara aruɣ.

Zẓebra d taqbaylit am tawent.
Ayen akk i d-ikecmen ɣer teqbaylity d taqbaylit, akka i d tutlayin yeqqimen ar tura ddrent.
Tutlayin ttemyerḍalent awalen.
Nekk ad d-nniɣ ẓẓebra, yeg Rebbi yekka-d anda yebɣa d taqbaylit.
Ad iyi-tessuref twacult Ait Caɛlal akked d yiselmaden n tmaziɣt imi ur n-lliɣ ara gar-awen acku uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur ken-ɛniɣ.
Tawent-a ɣur-k kan i as-sliɣ, nekk mi d-kkreɣ lemdeɣ ẓẓebra, ass-a ad d-taseḍ ad iyi-tt-tekkseḍ.

Ma d tidet deg lǧennet d taɛrabt i ttutlayen, qebleɣ ad rreɣ ɣer tmes.

Yerkeb azlalam, itezzi-d yis-s.
Terkeb azlalam, tettezzi-d yis-s.
Nerkeb azlalam, nettezzi-d yis-s.
Trekbeḍ azlalam, tettezziḍ-d yis-s.
Trekbem azlalam, tettezzim-d yis-s.
Trekbemt azlalam, tettezzimt-d yis-s.
Rekbeɣ azlalam, ttezziɣ-d yis-s.
Rekben azlalam, ttezzin-d yis-s.
Rekbent azlalam, ttezzint-d yis-s.
Ulac aqcic neɣ taqcict ur nesɛi tura azlalam.
S yizlalamen idehhun warrac.
S yizlalamen izehhun warrac.
S uzlalam i idehhu uqcic.
S uzlalam i idehhu teqcict.
S uzlalam i izehhu uqcic.
S uzlalam i tzehhu teqcict.
Azlalam d allal anaddal.
Azlalam, seg zik, yezga d allal anaddal.
Win yebɣan yeg addal, yenher azlalam.
Tin yebɣan teg addal, tenher azlalam.
Wid yebɣan gen addal, nehren azlalam.
Tid yebɣan gent addal, nehrent azlalam.
Tanhert n uzlalam, d addal yemmden n yiḍarren.
Mi d-yuɣ azlalam, yebɣa ad yekkes fell-as tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-tuɣ azlalam, tebɣa ad tekkes fell-as tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-nuɣ azlalam, nebɣa ad nekkes fell-aneɣ tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-nuɣ azlalam, nebɣa ad nekkes fell-anteɣ tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-tuɣeḍ azlalam, tebɣiḍ ad tekkseḍ fell-ak tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-tuɣeḍ azlalam, tebɣiḍ ad tekkseḍ fell-am tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-tuɣem azlalam, tebɣam ad tekksem fell-aken tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-tuɣemt azlalam, tebɣamt ad tekksemt fell-akent tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-tuɣem azlalam, tebɣam ad tekksem fell-awen tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-tuɣem azlalam, tebɣam ad tekksem fell-awent tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-uɣeɣ azlalam, bɣiɣ ad kkseɣ fell-i tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-uɣen azlalam, bɣan ad kksen fell-asen tikli ɣef uḍar.
Mi d-uɣent azlalam, bɣant ad kksent fell-asent tikli ɣef uḍar.
Llan yizlalamen i yimeqqranen, llan i yimecṭaḥ.
Llan yizlalamen i yimeqqranen, llan i yimeẓẓyanen.
Deg yimuras i nehren warrac izlalamen-nsen.
Deg yimuras i nehrent teqcicin izlalamen-nsen.
Mmi yegma-d, uɣeɣ-as-d azlalam-is amenzu.
Mmi yegma-d, uɣeɣ-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Mmi-tsen yegma-d, uɣen-as-d azlalam-is amenzu.
Mmi-tsent yegma-d, uɣent-as-d azlalam-is amenzu.
Mmi-s yegma-d, yuɣ-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Mmi-s yegma-d, tuɣ-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Mmi-tneɣ yegma-d, nuɣ-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Mmi-tenteɣ yegma-d, nuɣ-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Mmi-k yegma-d, tuɣeḍ-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Mmi-m yegma-d, tuɣeḍ-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Mmi-twen yegma-d, tuɣem-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Mmi-twent yegma-d, tuɣemt-as-d azlalam-is amezwaru.
Aḥjab tikwal yif kra n leḥbab.
Timuɣliwin n tyemmatin iwimi gren arraw-nsent ɣer leḥbus, bɣant aṭas ad d-inint.
Teqqar-d mačči ala nekk kan iwimi qqden tasa.
Kra n win i iḥemmlen tamurt-is, yebɣan ad d-tecbu tid i aɣ-yeǧǧan, gren-t ɣer bu kurdan acku ur yettxemmim ara am nutni ur nettawi ara Zzayer deg wulawen-nsen, maca deg leǧyub-nsen.
Brut-d i mmi d warraw akk n tlawin n tmurt, ad d-uɣalen ɣer warraw-nsen imeẓẓyanen i tjeɛrem yal iḍ.
Brum-d i mmi d warraw akk n tlawin n tmurt, ad d-uɣalen ɣer warraw-nsen imeẓẓyanen i tjeɛrem yal iḍ.
Bɣan s tidet yiwet n Zzayer tamaynut mačči tin i aɣ-d-tettheggim, teqqarem-as d tamaynut ladɣa d tajerbubt-nni kan i tebɣam ad aɣ-d-terrem.
Nekk meqqreɣ, jbiɣ akkin i tesɛin, cfiɣ am wass-a d acu i texdem Fransa deg-neɣ, maɛna ɣef wayen akka i d-iḍerrun deg yal amḍiq deg tmurt n Zzayer, ladɣa deg tmurt n Leqbayel, amzun fransa-nni i ɣ-iqehren mazal ur teffiɣ ara tamurt.
Ldim-d tiwwura n leḥbus terrem-d lfeṛḥ s ulawen i tebɣem deg tmedwin n leḥzen.
Ldit-d tiwwura n leḥbus terrem-d lfeṛḥ s ulawen i tebɣem deg tmedwin n leḥzen.
I sin yinaẓuren-a, nessaram-asen tazmert yelhan.
Nessaram azekka yeǧǧuǧgen i unaẓur ameẓẓyan.
Uɣeɣ-d kilu n uksum.
Tanezzayt-a ffɣeɣ ad d-qḍuɣ kra n tɣawsiwin.
Tanezzayt-a ffɣen ad d-qḍun kra n tɣawsiwin.
Tanezzayt-a ffɣent ad d-qḍunt kra n tɣawsiwin.
Tanezzayt-a yeffeɣ ad d-yeqḍu kra n tɣawsiwin.
Tanezzayt-a teffeɣ ad d-teqḍu kra n tɣawsiwin.
Tanezzayt-a neffeɣ ad d-neqḍu kra n tɣawsiwin.

Tanezzayt-a teffɣem ad d-teqḍum kra n tɣawsiwin.
Tanezzayt-a teffɣemt ad d-teqḍumt kra n tɣawsiwin.

Uɣent-d kilu n uksum.

Tuɣem-d kilu n uksum.
Tuɣemt-d kilu n uksum.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-uɣeɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-uɣen.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-uɣent.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-yuɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-tuɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-nuɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-tuɣeḍ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-tuɣem.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-tuɣemt.
Ruḥeɣ ɣer ssuq, uɣaleɣ-d akken.
Ruḥen ɣer ssuq, uɣalen-d akken.
Ruḥent ɣer ssuq, uɣalent-d akken.
Iruḥ ɣer ssuq, yuɣal-d akken.
Truḥ ɣer ssuq, tuɣal-d akken.
Nruḥ ɣer ssuq, nuɣal-d akken.

Truḥem ɣer ssuq, tuɣalem-d akken.
Truḥemt ɣer ssuq, tuɣalemt-d akken.
Nettraju lhemm ad yeɛyu akken ad iruḥ.
Yettraju lhemm ad yeɛyu akken ad iruḥ.
Tettraju lhemm ad yeɛyu akken ad iruḥ.

Ttḥulfun medden akken i nettḥulfu.
Ttḥulfun medden akken i tettḥulfum.
Yusa-d ad iyi-iwanes, taggara yetberriq deg taṭṭucin-is.
Tusa-d ad iyi-twanes, taggara tetberriq deg taṭṭucin-is.
Tusam-d ad iyi-twansem, taggara tetberriqem deg taṭṭucin-nwen.
Tusamt-d ad iyi-twansemt, taggara tetberriqemt deg taṭṭucin-nwent.
Tusamt-d ad iyi-twansemt, taggara tetberriqemt deg taṭṭucin-nkent.
Tusiḍ-d ad iyi-twanseḍ, taggara tetberriqeḍ deg taṭṭucin-ik.
Tusiḍ-d ad iyi-twanseḍ, taggara tetberriqeḍ deg taṭṭucin-im.
Acengu-inu zemreɣ-as, ḥuddem-iyi kan ɣef yimeddukal-iw.
Acengu-ines izmer-as, ḥuddem-t kan ɣef yimeddukal-is.
Acengu-ines tezmer-as, ḥuddem-tt kan ɣef yimeddukal-is.
Icenga-nwen tzemrem-asen, ad ken-nḥudd kan ɣef yimeddukal-nwen.
Icenga-nwent tzemremt-asen, ad kent-nḥudd kan ɣef yimeddukal-nwent.
Icenga-nkent tzemremt-asen, ad kent-nḥudd kan ɣef yimeddukal-nkent.
Icenga-nsent zemrent-asen, ad tent-nḥudd kan ɣef yimeddukal-nsent.
Icenga-nsen zemren-asen, ad ten-nḥudd kan ɣef yimeddukal-nsen.
Dayen, ifukk laman.
Azalen n zik fessin am udfel mi ara d-iwwet yiṭij.
Azalen-nni zik ruḥen, ɣef waya i neqqar : Yuɣal uqelmun ɣer yiḍarren.
Azalen-nni zik ruḥen, ɣef waya i qqaren : Yuɣal uqelmun ɣer yiḍarren.
Azalen-nni zik ruḥen, ɣef waya i teqqarem : Yuɣal uqelmun ɣer yiḍarren.
Aqelmun yuɣal ɣer yiḍarren.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i iyi-d-iɛeǧben.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i aɣ-d-iɛeǧben.

Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-as, ar tura ur t-ufiɣ.
Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-ak, ar tura ur k-ufiɣ.
Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-am, ar tura ur kem-ufiɣ.
Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-as, ar tura ur tt-ufiɣ.
Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-asen, ar tura ur ten-ufiɣ.
Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-asent, ar tura ur tent-ufiɣ.
Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-awen, ar tura ur ken-ufiɣ.
Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-awent, ar tura ur kent-ufiɣ.
Anda ddiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-akent, ar tura ur kent-ufiɣ.

Anda ddan ttnadin fell-aneɣ, ar tura ur aɣ-ufin.
Anda ddan ttnadin fell-anteɣ, ar tura ur aɣ-ufin.

Ulac d acu issefcalen am waṭṭan.

Ad kem-yessefreḥ Rebbi akken iyi-d-tessferheḍ.

Ɣas mgaradent tikta-nkent, tuwi-d fell-akent ad tettemqadaremt.

Ɣas mgaradent tikta-nsent, tuwi-d fell-asent ad ttemqadaren.

Tudert-im, bezzaf i tt-teqqneḍ ɣer usɣan.
Tudert-im, bezzaf i tt-teqqneḍ ɣer ddin.
Tudert-iw, bezzaf i tt-qqneɣ ɣer usɣan.
Tudert-iw, bezzaf i tt-qqneɣ ɣer ddin.
Tudert-nsen, bezzaf i tt-qqnen ɣer ddin.
Tudert-nsent, bezzaf i tt-qqnent ɣer usɣan.
Tudert-nsent, bezzaf i tt-qqnent ɣer ddin.
Tudert-is, bezzaf i tt-teqqen ɣer usɣan.
Tudert-is, bezzaf i tt-teqqen ɣer ddin.
Tudert-is, bezzaf i tt-yeqqen ɣer usɣan.
Tudert-is, bezzaf i tt-yeqqen ɣer ddin.
Tudert-nneɣ, bezzaf i tt-neqqen ɣer usɣan.
Tudert-nneɣ, bezzaf i tt-neqqen ɣer ddin.
Tudert-nteɣ, bezzaf i tt-neqqen ɣer usɣan.
Tudert-nteɣ, bezzaf i tt-neqqen ɣer ddin.
Tudert-nsen, bezzaf i tt-qqnen ɣer usɣan.
Tudert mačči d asɣan kan, tudert d ayen-nniḍen.
Tudert mačči d ddin kan, tudert d ayen-nniḍen.
Ur ddiren ara wid iḍefren ala asɣan.
Ur ddiren ara wid iḍefren ala ddin.
Ur ddirent ara tid iḍefren ala asɣan.
Ur ddirent ara tid iḍefren ala ddin.
Ur yeddir ara win iḍefren ala asɣan.
Ur yeddir ara win iḍefren ala ddin.
Ur teddir ara tin iḍefren ala asɣan.
Ur teddir ara tin iḍefren ala ddin.
Ula d nekk swehmen-iyi lehdur i iyi-d-tenniḍ.
Yettaṭṭaf cceḥna.
Ur yettaṭṭaf ara cceḥna.
Tettaṭṭaf cceḥna.
Ur tettaṭṭaf ara cceḥna.
Ur nettaṭṭaf ara cceḥna.
Nettaṭṭaf cceḥna.
Tettaṭṭafeḍ cceḥna.
Ur tettaṭṭafeḍ ara cceḥna.
Ur tettaṭṭafem ara cceḥna.
Tettaṭṭafem cceḥna.
Tettaṭṭafemt cceḥna.
Ur tettaṭṭafemt ara cceḥna.

Ur ttaṭṭafeɣ ara cceḥna.

Ur ttaṭṭafent ara cceḥna.
Ttaṭṭafen cceḥna.
Ttaṭṭafent cceḥna.
Ad am-uɣaleɣ d tili-m, anda teddiɣ ad dduɣ.
Ad ak-uɣaleɣ d tili-k, anda teddiɣ ad dduɣ.
Ad as-yuɣal d tili-s, anda tedda ad yeddu.
Ad as-tuɣal d tili-s, anda yedda ad teddu.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i ixeddem akken ad seggment tlufa.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i ixeddem akken ad seggment temsal.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txeddem akken ad seggment tlufa.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txeddem akken ad seggment temsal.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i nxeddem akken ad seggment temsal.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i nxeddem akken ad seggment tlufa.

Ur tufiḍ d acu i txeddmeḍ akken ad seggment tlufa.

Qqim ɣef yiri n tmes ad tesseḥmuḍ.

Iḥiqel ixeddeɛ atmaten-is.
Mi yessefqed anda yundi, yufa yeṭṭef-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.
Mi tessefqed anda tundi, tufa teṭṭef-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.
Mi nessefqed anda nundi, nufa neṭṭef-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.
Mi tessfeqdeḍ anda tundiḍ, tufiḍ teṭṭfeḍ-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.
Mi tessfeqdem anda tundim, tufam teṭṭfem-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.
Mi tessfeqdemt anda tundimt, tufamt teṭṭfemt-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.
Mi ssfeqdeɣ anda undiɣ, ufiɣ ṭṭfeɣ-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.
Mi ssfeqden anda undin, ufan ṭṭfen-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.
Mi ssfeqdent anda undint, ufant ṭṭfent-d semmus n yimerga d ɣiwen n ɛeẓẓi.

Tuɣ-d iwzan uqbel iferraǧ.

Mi ara yeččar yiwen d iɣeblan, yeggar aẓeṭṭa deg ubrid.
Yeggar aẓeṭṭa deg ubrid acku yeččur d iɣeblan.
Teggar aẓeṭṭa deg ubrid acku teččur d iɣeblan.

Ayen n diri nettu-t, ayen yelhan necfa fell-as.

Ayen n diri tettumt-t, ayen yelhan tecfamt fell-as.

Ɛerḍeɣ ad ttuɣ ayen yeḍran yid-i, ur zmireɣ ara.
Ɛerḍen ad ttun ayen yeḍran yid-sen, ur zmiren ara.
Ɛerḍent ad ttunt ayen yeḍran yid-sent, ur zmirent ara.
Yeɛreḍ ad yettu ayen yeḍran yid-s, ur yezmir ara.
Teɛreḍ ad tettu ayen yeḍran yid-s, ur tezmir ara.
Neɛreḍ ad nettu ayen yeḍran yid-neɣ, ur nezmir ara.
Neɛreḍ ad nettu ayen yeḍran yid-nteɣ, ur nezmir ara.
Tɛerḍeḍ ad tettuḍ ayen yeḍran yid-k, ur tezmireḍ ara.
Tɛerḍeḍ ad tettuḍ ayen yeḍran yid-m, ur tezmireḍ ara.
Tɛerḍem ad tettum ayen yeḍran yid-ken, ur tezmirem ara.

Ur ḥmmilen ara ad ten-ittraju kra.
Ur ḥmmilent ara ad tent-ittraju kra.

Tafermact d tin ur nesɛi ara akk uglan.
Ifermacen d wid ur nesɛi ara akk uglan.
Tifermacin d tid ur nesɛi ara akk uglan.

Tafermact d tin iwimi ɣlin wuglan.
Ifermacen d wid iwimi ɣlin wuglan.

Wissen d acu i aɣ-yuɣen akka ?

Yeɣli-d ger wid yejjujran.
Teɣliḍ-d ger wid yejjujran.
Teɣlim-d ger wid yejjujran.
Teɣlimt-d ger wid yejjujran.
Ɣliɣ-d ger wid yejjujran.
Ɣlin-d ger wid yejjujran.
Ɣlint-d ger wid yejjujran.
Ɣlint-d ger tid yejjujran.
Teɣlimt-d ger tid yejjujran.
Teɣliḍ-d ger tid yejjujran.
Neɣli-d ger tid yejjujran.
Teɣli-d ger tid yejjujran.
Ɣliɣ-d ger tid yejjujran.
Deg Tezmalt, azemmur meḥsub akk d acemlal.
Deg taggara n tsemhuyt n umwan i nbeddu nleqqeḍ azemmur.
Deg taggara n tsemhuyt n umwan i tbeddum tleqqeḍem azemmur.
Deg taggara n tsemhuyt n umwan i beddun leqqḍen azemmur.
Aseggas-a yurew uaemmur.
Aseggas-a yurew uaemmur akken i ilaq.
Aseggas-a yurew uaemmur akken i yebɣa wul.
Meqqar ad yagar zzit mi yurew akka uzemmur.
Ad nelqeḍ azemmur, ad nkes yerna ad nandi i umergu.
Ad yelqeḍ azemmur, ad ikes yerna ad yandi i umergu.
Ad telqeḍ azemmur, ad tkes yerna ad tandi i umergu.
Ad tleqḍeḍ azemmur, ad tekseḍ yerna ad tandiḍ i umergu.
Ad tleqḍem azemmur, ad teksem yerna ad tandim i umergu.
Ad tleqḍemt azemmur, ad teksemt yerna ad tandimt i umergu.
Ad leqḍeɣ azemmur, ad kseɣ yerna ad andiɣ i umergu.
Ad leqḍen azemmur, ad ksen yerna ad andin i umergu.
Ad leqḍent azemmur, ad ksent yerna ad andint i umergu.

Ɛellawa Zerruqi ilul ass n 5 yulyu deg useggas 1915 deg Umalu (Bgayet), d mmi-s n ccix n lǧameε El Ḥaǧ Sɣir Ben Areẓqi.
Deg temdint n Bgayet i yebda isurifen-is imenza deg ccna tandalusit ɣer ccix Sadeq Abǧawi i d-yufan deg-s yiwet n taɣect taḥlawant igerrzen maḍi.

Seg yimiren, acennay Ɛellawa Zerruqi yuɣal mussnaw aṭas aṭas.

Asentel n yisefra-k, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-m, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-s, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-inu, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-ines, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-inem, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-inek, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-nneɣ, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-nteɣ, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-nwen, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-nwent, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-nkent, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-nsen, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.
Asentel n yisefra-nsent, s umata yebna ɣef tnegmit n tmagit tamaziɣt.

Aɛqal n taɣect d yiwen n usenfar i iteddun akken i iwata.

Tugi ad iyi-d-tefhem.

Tugimt ad iyi-d-tfehmemt.
Ugin ad iyi-d-fehmen.
Ugint ad iyi-d-fehment.

Yexbec udem-is s yiḥder n ukermus.
Texbec udem-is s yiḥder n ukermus.
Nexbec udmawen-nneɣ s yiḥder n ukermus.
Nexbec udmawen-nteɣ s yiḥder n ukermus.
Txebceḍ udem-ik s yiḥder n ukermus.
Txebceḍ udem-inek s yiḥder n ukermus.
Txebceḍ udem-im s yiḥder n ukermus.
Txebceḍ udem-inem s yiḥder n ukermus.
Yexbec udem-ines s yiḥder n ukermus.
Texbec udem-ines s yiḥder n ukermus.
Txebcem udmawen-nwen s yiḥder n ukermus.
Txebcemt udmawen-nwent s yiḥder n ukermus.
Txebcemt udmawen-nkent s yiḥder n ukermus.

Xebceɣ udem-iw s yiḥder n ukermus.
Xebcen udmawen-nsen s yiḥder n ukermus.
Xebcent udmawen-nsent s yiḥder n ukermus.
Anef-as ad yeqqim iman-is.
Eǧǧ-it ad yeqqim iman-is.
Eǧǧ-itt ad teqqim iman-is.
Eǧǧ-iten ad qqimen iman-nsen.
Eǧǧ-itent ad qqiment iman-nsent.
Ǧǧem-t ad yeqqim iman-is.
Ǧǧem-tt ad teqqim iman-is.
Ǧǧem-ten ad qqimen iman-nsen.
Ǧǧem-tent ad qqiment iman-nsent.

Tugi ad as-tanef ad teqqim iman-is.
Nugi ad as-nanef ad teqqim iman-is.

Teggumma ad teknu.

Teggummamt ad teknumt.

Ggummant ad knunt.

I teslit iwmi kkaten tabacemmaqt.
Wwtent-as tabacemmaqt i teslit.
Kkaten-as lḥenni i yiḍarren n teslit akken ma llan, alma d agrez.
I kunwi amek ias-teqqarem i tbacemmaqt ?
I kunemti amek i as-teqqarem i tbacemmaqt ?
I nutni amek i as-qqaren i tbacemmaqt ?
I nutenti amek i as-qqarent i tbacemmaqt ?
Wa d asegzi n tbacemmaqt.

Steqsi timɣarin-nkent, d nutenti ara yecfun ɣef wawal tabacemmaqt.
Ma tuli tezɣelt n tawla n umuḍin, yettuɣal yettjefjif.
Win yettjefjifen, ur tfehmeḍ ara d acu i d-yeqqar.
Tin yettjefjifen, ur tfehmeḍ ara d acu i d-teqqar.
Wid yettjefjifen, ur tfehmeḍ ara d acu i d-qqaren.
Tid yettjefjifen, ur tfehmeḍ ara d acu i d-qqarent.
Yettwejririḥ, amzun yeqqes-it uzrem.
Tettwejririḥ, amzun yeqqes-itt uzrem.
Nettwejririḥ, amzun yeqqes-aɣ uzrem.
Tettwejririḥeḍ, amzun yeqqes-ik uzrem.
Tettwejririḥeḍ, amzun yeqqes-ikem uzrem.
Tettwejririḥem, amzun yeqqes-iken uzrem.
Tettwejririḥem, amzun yeqqes-ikent uzrem.
Ttwejririḥeɣ, amzun yeqqes-iyi uzrem.
Ttwejririḥen, amzun yeqqes-ten uzrem.
Ttwejririḥent, amzun yeqqes-tent uzrem.
Ur d-yeqqim ara ɣur-i, yeffeɣ-iyi afus.
Ur d-yeqqim ara ɣur-k, yeffeɣ-ak afus.
Ur d-yeqqim ara ɣur-m, yeffeɣ-am afus.
Ur d-yeqqim ara ɣur-s, yeffeɣ-aksafus.

Ur d-yeqqim ara ɣur-ken, yeffeɣ-akent afus.

Ur d-yeqqim ara ɣur-sen, yeffeɣ-asen afus.
Ur d-yeqqim ara ɣur-sent, yeffeɣ-asent afus.

Ssuref-iyi kan, ur nnumeɣ ara qqareɣ ala i win i iyi-d-yessutren kra.
Ur nnumeɣ ara qqareɣ ala i win i iyi-d-yessutren kra.
Ur nnumen ara qqaren ala i win i ten-id-yessutren ɣef kra.
Ur nnument ara qqarent ala i win i tent-id-yessutren ɣef kra.
Ur yennum ara yeqqar ala i win i t-id-yessutren ɣef kra.

Ur tennumemt ara teqqaremt ala i win i kent-id-yessutren ɣef kra.

Tetteddumt tettegriribemt.

Fiḥel ma truḥem ad trum ɣef uẓekka-w; ur iyi-tettafem ara din. Ur mmuteɣ ara !
Fiḥel ma truḥemt ad trumt ɣef uẓekka-w; ur iyi-tettafemt ara din. Ur mmuteɣ ara !
Fiḥel ma ruḥen ad run ɣef uẓekka-w; ur iyi-ttafen ara din. Ur mmuteɣ ara !
Fiḥel ma ruḥent ad runt ɣef uẓekka-w; ur iyi-ttafent ara din. Ur mmuteɣ ara !
Fiḥel ma nruḥ ad nru ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-nettaf ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma truḥ ad tru ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-tettaf ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma iruḥ ad iru ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-ittaf ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma truḥeḍ ad truḍ ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-tettafeḍ ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma truḥem ad trum ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-tettafem ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma truḥemt ad trumt ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-tettafemt ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma ruḥeɣ ad ruɣ ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-ttafeɣ ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma ruḥen ad run ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-ttafen ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma ruḥent ad runt ɣef uẓekka-s; ur t-ttafent ara din. Ur yemmut ara !
Fiḥel ma truḥ ad tru ɣef uẓekka-w; ur iyi-tettaf ara din. Ur mmuteɣ ara !
Fiḥel ma iruḥ ad iru ɣef uẓekka-w; ur iyi-ittaf ara din. Ur mmuteɣ ara !
Fiḥel ma truḥeḍ ad truḍ ɣef uẓekka-w; ur iyi-tettafeḍ ara din. Ur mmuteɣ ara !

Ffɣen-tent merra.

Ffɣent-tent akken ma llant.

Tɛedda teldunt nnig uqerruy-iw.

Tɛedda teldunt nnig iqerray-nsent.

Kra yekka wass d nettat tesnigir.
Kra yekka wass d netta yesnigir.

Kra yekka wass d nutni snigiren.
Kra yekka wass d nutenti snigirent.

Kra yekka wass d nutni d asniger.

Terra-iyi tmara ad rajuɣ ma bɣiɣ ad d-qḍuɣ kra n tɣawsa.
Terra-ten tmara ad rajun ma bɣan ad d-qḍun kra n tɣawsa.
Terra-tent tmara ad rajunt ma bɣant ad d-qḍunt kra n tɣawsa.

Terra-tt tmara ad traju ma tebɣa ad d-teqḍu kra n tɣawsa.
Terra-aɣ tmara ad nraju ma nebɣa ad d-neqḍu kra n tɣawsa.
Terra-k tmara ad trajuḍ ma tebɣiḍ ad d-teqḍuḍ kra n tɣawsa.
Terra-kem tmara ad trajuḍ ma tebɣiḍ ad d-teqḍuḍ kra n tɣawsa.
Terra-ken tmara ad trajum ma tebɣam ad d-teqḍum kra n tɣawsa.
Terra-kent tmara ad trajumt ma tebɣamt ad d-teqḍumt kra n tɣawsa.
Takerrust i bɣiɣ ad aɣeɣ, teɛǧeb-iyi nezzeh.
Takerrust i bɣan ad aɣen, teɛǧeb-iten nezzeh.
Takerrust i bɣant ad aɣent, teɛǧeb-itent nezzeh.
Takerrust i yebɣa ad yaɣ, teɛǧeb-it nezzeh.
Takerrust i tebɣa ad taɣ, teɛǧeb-itt nezzeh.
Takerrust i nebɣa ad naɣ, teɛǧeb-aɣ nezzeh.
Takerrust i tebɣam ad taɣem, teɛǧeb-iken nezzeh.
Takerrust i tebɣamt ad taɣemt, teɛǧeb-ikent nezzeh.
Takerrust i tebɣiḍ ad taɣeḍ, teɛǧeb-ik nezzeh.
Takerrust i tebɣiḍ ad taɣeḍ, teɛǧeb-ikem nezzeh.
Ma yura-ak kra, yiwen ur ak-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-am kra, yiwen ur am-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-awen kra, yiwen ur awen-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-awent kra, yiwen ur awent-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-aken kra, yiwen ur aken-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-akent kra, yiwen ur akent-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-as kra, yiwen ur as-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-aɣ kra, yiwen ur aɣ-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-iyi kra, yiwen ur iyi-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-asen kra, yiwen ur asen-t-itekkes.
Ma yura-asent kra, yiwen ur asent-t-itekkes.
Yessaram ad yesɛu ayen i d-imenna wul-is.
Tessaram ad tesɛu ayen i d-imenna wul-is.
Nessaram ad nesɛu ayen i d-imenna wul-nneɣ.
Nessaram ad nesɛu ayen i d-imenna wul-nteɣ.
Tessarameḍ ad tesɛuḍ ayen i d-imenna wul-ik.
Tessarameḍ ad tesɛuḍ ayen i d-imenna wul-im.
Tessaramem ad tesɛum ayen i d-imenna wul-nwen.
Tessaramemt ad tesɛumt ayen i d-imenna wul-nwent.
Tessaramemt ad tesɛumt ayen i d-imenna wul-nkent.
Ssarameɣ ad sɛuɣ ayen i d-imenna wul-iw.
Ssaramen ad sɛun ayen i d-imenna wul-nsen.
Win yessaramen kra, yeg Rebbi yaweḍ ɣur-s.
Tin yessaramen kra, yeg Rebbi taweḍ ɣur-s.
Wid yessaramen kra, yeg Rebbi aweḍen ɣur-s.
Tid yessaramen kra, yeg Rebbi aweḍent ɣur-s.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-aɣeɣ d aberkan.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-aɣen d aberkan.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-aɣent d aberkan.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-yaɣ d aberkan.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-taɣ d aberkan.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-naɣ d aberkan.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-taɣeḍ d aberkan.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-taɣem d aberkan.
Ini n tkerrust ara d-taɣemt d aberkan.
Wid ur nesɛi msakit tamezduɣt, gganen ddaw n tqenṭyar.
Tid ur nesɛi msakit tamezduɣt, gganent ddaw n tqenṭyar.
Win ur nesɛi meskin tamezduɣt, iggan ddaw n tqenṭyar.
Tin ur nesɛi meskint tamezduɣt, teggan ddaw n tqenṭyar.
Zher-iw amzun iɛab, aṭas aya nekk ttrajuɣ deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-nsen amzun iɛab, aṭas aya nutni ttrajun deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-nsen amzun iɛab, aṭas aya nutenti ttrajunt deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-is amzun iɛab, aṭas aya netta yettraju deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-is amzun iɛab, aṭas aya nettat tettraju deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-nneɣ amzun iɛab, aṭas aya nekkni nettraju deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-nteɣ amzun iɛab, aṭas aya nekknti nettraju deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-ik amzun iɛab, aṭas aya kečč tettrajuḍ deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-im amzun iɛab, aṭas aya kemm tettrajuḍ deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-nwen amzun iɛab, aṭas aya kunwi tettrajum deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-nwent amzun iɛab, aṭas aya kunemti tettrajumt deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Zher-nkent amzun iɛab, aṭas aya kunemti tettrajumt deg-s, ar tura ur d-yuwiḍ.
Tturaren warrac s yizir.
Tturarent teqcicin ilqafen.
Tturaren warrac timesqaqart.
Tturaren warrac tizizwit taderɣalt.
Tturaren warrac d teqcicin tiɛecciwin.
Tturaren warrac d teqcicin tixxamin.
Tturaren warrac d teqcicin tiɣunam.
Aqcic, laɛmer yeɛyi deg turart.
Aqcic yetturar ur iɛeyyu.
Arrac tturaren ur ɛeyyun.
Ifreɣ-iyi usewweq.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i d-xedmeɣ deg ssuq ass-a.
Tefreɣ-as ddunit.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i yexdem deg tudert-is.
Ifreɣ-iyi yides.
Iruḥ-iyi yiḍes.
Ur qmiceɣ ara akk tiṭ-iw.
Ifreɣ-as ccɣel.
Isewweq leɛqel-is, ur d-yedhi ara akk d ccɣel-is.
Ferɣen yifassen-is.
Ifassen-is d ilmawen, duru ur tt-yesɛi.
Yessefreɣ-iyi učči, ides.
Aṭṭan yekkes-iyi učči, iḍes.
Yessefreɣ-it fell-i.
La t-ssefraɣen fell-aɣ.
Yefka-as yir iwellihen fell-i.
Ifassen-is d ilmawen, duru ur tt-tesɛi.
Ifassen-nneɣ d ilmawen, duru ur tt-nesɛi.
Ifassen-nteɣ d ilmawen, duru ur tt-nesɛi.
Ifassen-ik d ilmawen, duru ur tt-tesɛiḍ.
Ifassen-im d ilmawen, duru ur tt-tesɛiḍ.
Ifassen-nwen d ilmawen, duru ur tt-tesɛim.
Ifassen-nwent d ilmawen, duru ur tt-tesɛimt.
Ifassen-nkent d ilmawen, duru ur tt-tesɛimt.
Ifassen-iw d ilmawen, duru ur tt-sɛiɣ.
Ifassen-nsen d ilmawen, duru ur tt-sɛin.
Ifassen-nsent d ilmawen, duru ur tt-sɛint.
Isewweq leɛqel-is, ur d-tedhi ara akk d ccɣel-is
Isewweq leɛqel-nneɣ, ur d-nedhi ara akk d ccɣel-nneɣ.
Isewweq leɛqel-nteɣ, ur d-nedhi ara akk d ccɣel-nteɣ.
Isewweq leɛqel-ik, ur d-tedhiḍ ara akk d ccɣel-ik.
Isewweq leɛqel-im, ur d-tedhiḍ ara akk d ccɣel-im.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i texdem deg tudert-is.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i nexdem deg tudert-nneɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i nexdem deg tudert-nteɣ.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmeḍ deg tudert-ik.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmeḍ deg tudert-im.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmem deg tudert-nwen.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmemt deg tudert-nwent.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmemt deg tudert-nkent.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedmeɣ deg tudert-iw.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedmen deg tudert-nsen.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedment deg tudert-nsent.
Aṭṭan yekkes-ak učči, iḍes.
Aṭṭan yekkes-am učči, iḍes.
Aṭṭan yekkes-aɣ učči, iḍes.
Aṭṭan yekkes-aken učči, iḍes.
Aṭṭan yekkes-akent učči, iḍes.
Aṭṭan yekkes-awen učči, iḍes.
Aṭṭan yekkes-awent učči, iḍes.
Aṭṭan yekkes-asen učči, iḍes.
Aṭṭan yekkes-asent učči, iḍes.
Ur qmiceɣ tiṭ-iw kra yekka yiḍ.
Ur qmicen tiṭ-nsen kra yekka yiḍ.
Ur qmicent tiṭ-nsent kra yekka yiḍ.
Ur teqmiceḍ tiṭ-ik kra yekka yiḍ.
Ur teqmiceḍ tiṭ-im kra yekka yiḍ.

Ur teqmicemt tiṭ-nkent kra yekka yiḍ.

Ur teqmic tiṭ-is kra yekka yiḍ.
Ur neqmic tiṭ-nneɣ kra yekka yiḍ.
Ur neqmic tiṭ-nteɣ kra yekka yiḍ.

Tefkamt-as yir iwellihen fell-i.

Fkant-as yir iwellihen fell-i.

Skudmal ttismiḍen wuḍan.

Yif-it ma tedda ɣef uḍar.

Tɛedda-d tgerfa nnig uqerruy-is.

Igenni iwerrek d itran.

Ur tufi ad teddu d yiwen.

Azal n umdan yeɣli.
Yugi ad yili am netta am medden.
Tugi ad tili am nettat am medden.

Nugi ad nili am nekkenti am medden.

Tugiḍ ad tiliḍ am kemm am medden.

Izerfan n tmaziɣt ttwarekḍen.
Ar ass-a tamaziɣt ur as-fkin ara izerfan i tuklal.
Ar ass-a tamaziɣt ur as-tefkim ara izerfan i tuklal.
Fkem i tmaziɣt izerfan-is akken ma llan.
Fket i tmaziɣt izerfan-is akken ma llan.
Amezruy n tmurt ilaq ad d-yuɣal s abrid.
Amezruy n tmurt yeffeɣ i ubrid.
Amezruy n tmurt, suffɣen-t i ubrid.
Wissen melmi ara d-tban tidet ?
Wissen melmi ara fakken lekdubat ?
Wissen melmi ara fakkent tkerkas ?
Ayen yelhan, rrant-t diri-t; ayen n diri, rrant-t yelha.
Ayen yelhan, rriɣ-t diri-t; ayen n diri, rriɣ-t yelha.
Ayen yelhan, rran-t diri-t; ayen n diri, rran-t yelha.
Ayen yelhan, yerra-t diri-t; ayen n diri, yerra-t yelha.
Ayen yelhan, terra-t diri-t; ayen n diri, terra-t yelha.
Ayen yelhan, nerra-t diri-t; ayen n diri, nerra-t yelha.
Ayen yelhan, terram-t diri-t; ayen n diri, terram-t yelha.
Ayen yelhan, terramt-t diri-t; ayen n diri, terramt-t yelha.
Ayen yelhan, terriḍ-t diri-t; ayen n diri, terriḍ-t yelha.
Ifreq-iten Rebbi ur mmuten.
Ifreq-aɣ Rebbi ur nemmut.
Ifreq-iken Rebbi ur temmutem.
Teḥzen tmaziɣt, teḥzen Tmazɣa, ḥeznen Yimaziɣen mi i aɣ-yeǧǧa umeɣnas ameqqran, Dda Ḥmed Adɣirni.
Iḥbes wul-is, yemmut.
Iḥbes wul-is, temmut.
Ḥebsen wulawen-nneɣ, nemmut.
Iḥbes wul-ik, temmuteḍ.
Iḥbes wul-im, temmuteḍ.
Iḥbes wul-iw, mmuteɣ.
Ḥebsen wulawen-nsen, mmuten.
Ḥebsen wulawen-nsent, mmutent.
Ḥebsen wulawen-nwen, temmutem.
Ḥebsen wulawen-nwent, temmutemt.
Ḥebsen wulawen-nkent, temmutemt.
Wissen ma turiḍ-t-id akken i ilaq wawal-a ?
Seg wasmi i tella meẓẓiyet, taqcict-nni laɛmer i as-tedda ddunit di lebɣi-s.
Seg wasmi i yella meẓẓi, aqcic-nni laɛmer i as-tedda ddunit di lebɣi-s.
Laɛmer i aɣ-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-nneɣ.
Laɛmer i aɣ-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-nteɣ.
Laɛmer i as-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-s.
Laɛmer i ak-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-k.
Laɛmer i am-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-m.
Laɛmer i iyi-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-iw.
Laɛmer i aken-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-nken.
Laɛmer i akent-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-nkent.
Laɛmer i awen-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-nwen.
Laɛmer i awent-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-nwent.
Laɛmer i asen-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-nsen.
Laɛmer i asent-tedda ddunit deg lebɣi-nsent.
Taqcict-nni meskint tettwafreɣ-as ddunit si temẓi-s.
Tiqcicin-nni msakit tettwaferɣ-asent ddunit si temẓi-nsent.
Ur ǧǧin kra deg uxxam-a.
Ukren axxam-a akken ma yella.
Nerra ixeddim-nneɣ d awezɣi s tmucuha d temɛayin i d-nemyeḥku.
Nemsefraɣ lecɣal s tmucuha.
Acbayli-nni d lfareɣ.
Acbayli-nni d ilem, ulac deg-s zzit.
Ma tferqeḍ taqeḍɛit, ad yawi wuccen taɣaḍt.
Taddukli tettawi-d afud d laman.
Taddukli tettawi-d afud d tɣellist.
Ma tebḍiḍ taqeḍɛit, uccen ad ak-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma yebḍa taqeḍɛit, uccen ad as-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma tebḍa taqeḍɛit, uccen ad as-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma nebḍa taqeḍɛit, uccen ad aɣ-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma tebḍam taqeḍɛit, uccen ad aken-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma tebḍamt taqeḍɛit, uccen ad akent-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma tebḍam taqeḍɛit, uccen ad awen-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma tebḍamt taqeḍɛit, uccen ad awent-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma bḍiɣ taqeḍɛit, uccen ad iyi-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma bḍan taqeḍɛit, uccen ad asen-yawi taɣaḍt.
Ma bḍant taqeḍɛit, uccen ad asent-yawi taɣaḍt.
Issexrab timsal am wuccen i ibeṭṭun tajlibt n yizamaren.
Tessexrab timsal am tuccent i ibeṭṭun tajlibt n yizamaren.
Tessexrabeḍ timsal am tuccent i ibeṭṭun tajlibt n yizamaren.
Ssexrabeɣ timsal am tuccent i ibeṭṭun tajlibt n yizamaren.
Awal n tsummta d win i iferrqen.
Ur smuzgut ara aṭas i lehdur n tlawin, ladɣa wid n tmeṭṭut-is, wid n tsumta, d wigi i ibeṭṭun.
Iḥbes wul-is, isuffeɣ rruḥ.
Iḥbes wul-is, iffeɣ-it rruḥ.
Iḥbes wul-is, iffeɣ-it yiman.
Yemmut kan akken d ameẓẓyan.
Temmut kan akken d tameẓẓyant.
Temmuteḍ kan akken d tameẓẓyant.
Temmuteḍ kan akken d ameẓẓyan.
Temmuteḍ kan akken meẓẓiyeḍ.
Temmut kan akken meẓẓiyet.
Yemmut kan akken meẓẓi.
Mmuten kan akken d imeẓẓyanen.
Mmuten kan akken meẓẓiyit.
Mmutent kan akken meẓẓiyit.
Mmutent kan akken d timeẓẓyanin.
Temmutem kan akken meẓẓiyit.
Temmutemt kan akken meẓẓiyit.
Temmutem kan akken d imeẓẓyanen.
Temmutemt kan akken d timeẓẓyanin.
Cwi kan lmut tella.
Yuweḍ anda ara naweḍ akken ma nella.
Tuweḍ anda ara naweḍ akken ma nella.
Tuwḍeḍ anda ara naweḍ akken ma nella.
Tuwḍem anda ara naweḍ akken ma nella.
Tuwḍemt anda ara naweḍ akken ma nella.
Uwḍen anda ara naweḍ akken ma nella.
Uwḍent anda ara naweḍ akken ma nella.
Leqrar-nneɣ akk d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nneɣ akken ma nella d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nneɣ merra d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nneɣ d tirni d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nwen akk d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nwen akken ma tellam d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nwen merra d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nwen d tirni d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nsen akk d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nsen akken ma llan d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nsen merra d timeqbert.
Leqrar-nsen d tirni d timeqbert.
Ilul-d akken ad yemmet.
Imi d-nlul ad nemmet.
Imi d-ilul ad yemmet.
Imi d-tlul ad temmet.
Imi d-tluleḍ ad temmteḍ.
Imi d-tlulem ad temmtem.
Imi d-tlulemt ad temmtemt.
Imi d-luleɣ ad mmteɣ.
Imi d-lulen ad mmten.
Imi d-lulent ad mmtent.
Amɣar yemmut, lṭufan ilul-d.
Imɣaren ttmettaten, lṭufanat ttlalen-d.
Idir ayen tebɣiḍ, tamettant tettraju-k.
Idirem ayen tebɣam, tamettant tettraju-ken.
Idiremt ayen tebɣamt, tamettant tettraju-kent.
Idiret ayen tebɣam, tamettant tettraju-ken.
Ayen yebɣu yidir-it, tamettant tettraju-t.
Ayen tebɣu tidir-it, tamettant tettraju-tt.
Ayen nebɣu nidir-it, tamettant tettraju-aɣ.
Ayen tebɣuḍ tidireḍ-t, tamettant tettraju-k.
Ayen tebɣuḍ tidireḍ-t, tamettant tettraju-kem.
Ayen tebɣum tidirem-t, tamettant tettraju-ken.
Ayen tebɣumt tidiremt-t, tamettant tettraju-kent.
Ayen bɣuɣ idireɣ-t, tamettant tettraju-iyi.
Ayen bɣun idiren-t, tamettant tettraju-ten.
Ayen bɣunt idirent-t, tamettant tettraju-tent.
Ruḥ sgunfu di talwit a Dda Ḥmed.
Ayen yellan fell-ak txedmeḍ-t yerna akken i iwata.
Tamazɣa, tamaziɣt, Imaziɣen akken ma llan ur tettun ara lxir i asen-tgiḍ.
Kečč seg wid yefkan akk tudert-nsen akken tamaziɣt ad teǧǧuǧǧeg.
Kemm seg tid yefkan akk tudert-nsent akken tamaziɣt ad teǧǧuǧǧeg.
Kkes aɣilif, tisutwin i d-yernan deffir-k, d abrid azeddgan i d-tneǧreḍ ara ḍefrent.
Kksem aɣilif, tisutwin i d-yernan deffir-wen, d abrid azeddgan i d-tneǧrem ara ḍefrent.
Kksemt aɣilif, tisutwin i d-yernan deffir-went, d abrid azeddgan i d-tneǧremt ara ḍefrent.
Kkse aɣilif, tisutwin i d-yernan deffir-wen, d abrid azeddgan i d-tneǧrem ara ḍefrent.
Ad ak-nini tanemmirt a Dda Ḥmed, iman-ik di talwit.
Ayen yellan fell-am txedmeḍ-t yerna akken i iwata.
Ayen yellan fell-as texdem-it yerna akken i iwata.
Ayen yellan fell-as ixdem-it yerna akken i iwata.
Ayen yellan fell-aneɣ nexdem-it yerna akken i iwata.
Ayen yellan fell-anteɣ nexdem-it yerna akken i iwata.
Ayen yellan fell-i xedmeɣ-t yerna akken i iwata.
Ayen yellan fell-asen xedmen-t yerna akken i iwata.
Ayen yellan fell-asent xedment-t yerna akken i iwata.
Tanemmirt ɣef ubuddu-a.
Inebgi n Rebbi yensa deg tejmaɛt.

Ur ilaq ara ad ḥecment inebgi n Rebbi.

Tugi ad teṭṭef tama wadda.

Teɛya deg yiman-is.

Teffeɣ-d ad d-teqḍu ayen ara tečč.
Neffeɣ-d ad d-neqḍu ayen ara nečč.

Teffɣemt-d ad d-teqḍumt ayen ara teččemt.

Ffɣen-d ad d-qḍun ayen ara ččen.
Ffɣent-d ad d-qḍunt ayen ara ččent.
Yebḍa wul-is, ur yeẓri d waniwa ara yeddu.
Yebḍa wul-is, ur teẓri d waniwa ara teddu.

Ad nebḍu tamellalt i wat Bgayet.

Ferrqem lɣaci.

Yettwafreq wul-ik.

Tewwteḍ-t s temri s aqerruy, tesseɣliḍ-d idammen-is.
Tewwtem-t s temriwin s aqerruy, tesseɣlim-d idammen-is.
Tewwtemt-t s temriwin s aqerruy, tesseɣlimt-d idammen-is.

Wwtent-t s temriwin s aqerruy, sseɣlint-d idammen-is.

Ma isɣer-ikem uɣyul, teẓriḍ d acu ara d-teffɣeḍ.

Ma isɣer-it uɣyul, teẓra d acu ara d-teffeɣ.
Ma isɣer-aɣ uɣyul, neẓra d acu ara d-neffeɣ.

Ma isɣer-ikent uɣyul, teẓramt d acu ara d-teffɣemt.

Ayen i d-nenna ɣef Dda Sliman drus.
Aɣerbaz-nneɣ yuɣal d nnger.
D nnger i yuɣal uɣerbaz-nneɣ.

Aselmed s tutlayt n lǧennet, ur tufiḍ d acu i d-yettawi.

D timɛemmert i yuɣal uɣerbaz-nneɣ.
D timɛemmert i rran uɣerbaz-nneɣ.
Ta deffir ta i d-ttasent.
Ta deffir tayeḍ i d-ttasent.

Ur yettraju kra deg yiwen.
Ur tettraju kra deg yiwen.
Ur nettraju kra deg yiwen.
Ur tettrajuḍ kra deg yiwen.
Ur tettrajum kra deg yiwen.
Ur tettrajumt kra deg yiwen.
Ur ttrajuɣ kra deg yiwen.
Ur ttrajun kra deg yiwen.
Ur ttrajunt kra deg yiwen.
Temmut ddeɛwa akken qqaren.
Yetthumu kan, ur yeẓri anda i yeggar aḍar.
Ula d nutni ulac kra i ḥekmen deg temsalt-a n waṭṭan-a. Terra-ten tmara ad tebɛen ayen yebɣa Maraikan neɣ Fransa.
Tanemmirt mi d-testeqsaḍ fell-i. I Dda Lḥusin amek yettili ?
Tetthumu kan, ur teẓri anda i teggar aḍar.
Netthumu kan, ur neẓri anda i neggar aḍar.
Tetthumuḍ kan, ur teẓriḍ anda i teggareḍ aḍar.
Aṭas aya ur nemlal, ur twalaḍ ara suffɣeɣ-d ungal-iw amezwaru. Azwel-ines d Ccḍeb akk d yiẓuran.
Tetthumum kan, ur teẓrim anda i teggarem aḍar.
Tetthumumt kan, ur teẓrimt anda i teggaremt aḍar.
Tthumuɣ kan, ur ẓriɣ anda i ggareɣ aḍar.
Tthumun kan, ur ẓrin anda i ggaren aḍar.
Tthumunt kan, ur ẓrint anda i ggarent aḍar.
Tthumuɣ kan, ur ẓriɣ anda i tedduɣ.
Tthumun kan, ur ẓrin anda i teddun.
Tthumunt kan, ur ẓrint anda i teddunt.
Yetthumu kan, ur yeẓri anda i iteddu.
Tetthumu kan, ur teẓri anda i tetteddu.
Netthumu kan, ur neẓri anda i nteddu.
Tetthumuḍ kan, ur teẓriḍ anda i tettedduḍ.
Tetthumum kan, ur teẓrim anda i tetteddum.
Tetthumumt kan, ur teẓrimt anda i tetteddumt.

Iḥemmel ad yeqqim iman-is.
Ur tḥemmel ara ad teqqim iman-is.
Ur nḥemmel ara ad neqqim iman-nneɣ.
Ur nḥemmel ara ad neqqim iman-nteɣ.

Ur tḥemmlemt ara ad teqqimemt iman-nwent.
Ur tḥemmlemt ara ad teqqimemt iman-nkent.

Yeččeḥ, yugi ad yečč imensi.
Teččeḥ, tugi ad tečč imensi.
Neččeḥ, nugi ad nečč imensi.
Teččḥeḍ, tugiḍ ad teččeḍ imensi.
Teččḥem, tugim ad teččem imensi.
Teččḥemt, tugimt ad teččemt imensi.

Ččḥen, ugin ad ččen imensi.
Ččḥent, ugint ad ččent imensi.
Yeččeḥ mi ur t-id-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Yeččeḥ mi ur t-id-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččeḥ mi ur tt-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččeḥ mi ur tt-id-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččeḥ mi ur tt-id-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Neččeḥ mi ur aɣ-d-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Neččeḥ mi ur aɣ-d-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Neččeḥ mi ur aɣ-d-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥeḍ mi ur k-id-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥeḍ mi ur k-id-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥeḍ mi ur k-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥeḍ mi ur kem-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥeḍ mi ur kem-id-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥeḍ mi ur kem-id-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥem mi ur ken-id-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥem mi ur ken-id-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥem mi ur ken-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥemt mi ur kent-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥemt mi ur kent-id-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Teččḥemt mi ur kent-id-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Ččḥeɣ mi ur iyi-d-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Ččḥeɣ mi ur iyi-d-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Ččḥeɣ mi ur iyi-d-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Ččḥen mi ur ten-id-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Ččḥen mi ur ten-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Ččḥen mi ur ten-id-nciden ara ɣer tmeɣra.

Ččḥent mi ur tent-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra.
Ččḥent mi ur tent-id-snubegten ara ɣer tmeɣra.

Teḍsamt ass-a deg-i, azekka d nekk ara yeḍsen deg-kent.
Teḍsamt ass-a deg-i, azekka d nekk ara yeḍsen deg-went.
Ittaḍsa taḍsa n wuglan.
Tettaḍsa taḍsa n wuglan.
Nettaḍsa taḍsa n wuglan.
Tettaḍsaḍ taḍsa n wuglan.
Tettaḍsam taḍsa n wuglan.
Tettaḍsamt taḍsa n wuglan.
Ttaḍsaɣ taḍsa n wuglan.
Ttaḍsan taḍsa n wuglan.
Ttaḍsant taḍsa n wuglan.
Tikkelt yeḍsa, tikkelt yettru.
Tikkelt teḍsa, tikkelt tettru.
Tikkelt neḍsa, tikkelt nettru.
Tikkelt teḍsam, tikkelt tettrum.
Tikkelt teḍsamt, tikkelt tettrumt.
Tikkelt teḍsiḍ, tikkelt tettruḍ.
Tikkelt ḍsiɣ, tikkelt ttruɣ.
Tikkelt ḍsan, tikkelt ttrun.
Tikkelt ḍsant, tikkelt ttrunt.
Ass-agi lliɣ, azekka wissen.
Ass-agi llan, azekka wissen.
Ass-agi llant, azekka wissen.
Ass-agi yella, azekka wissen.
Ass-agi tella, azekka wissen.
Ass-agi nella, azekka wissen.
Ass-agi tellam, azekka wissen.
Ass-agi tellamt, azekka wissen.
Iḍelli tella, ass-agi ulac-itt.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-as d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-ak d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-am d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-aɣ d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-i d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-asen d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-asent d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-aken d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-akent d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-awen d imeṭṭi.
Taḍsa, tuɣal-awent d imeṭṭi.
Tanemmirt mi d-terziḍ s ablug-iw aghucaf.
Ma ur neṭṭif ara deg wansayen-nneɣ, ad aɣ-yawi wasif n zzman.
Akka i d nekkni, nugi ad nbeddel.
Ayɣer i tesserwateḍ dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Ayɣer i tesserwatem dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Ayɣer i tesserwatemt dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Ayɣer i tesserwat dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Ayɣer i yesserwat dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Ayɣer i nesserwat dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Ayɣer i sserwateɣ dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Ayɣer i sserwaten dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Ayɣer i sserwatent dima deg wayen ur nelhi ?
Aqcic d afeqziz, yettaɛer-as ad yeddu akken yebɣa.
Taqcict d tafeqzizt, yettaɛer-as ad teddu akken tebɣa.
Arrac d ifeqzizen, yettaɛer-asen ad ddun akken bɣan.
Tiqcicin d tifeqzizin, yettaɛer-asent ad ddunt akken bɣant.
Agerful-ihin, itteḥluḥul am umulab.
Azalen n teqbaylit fessin am udfel mi ara d-iwwet yiṭij.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-aɣ.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-iyi.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-k.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-kem.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-t.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-tt.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-ten.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-tent.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-ken.
Taqbaylit, skudmal tettaǧǧa-kent.
Anda i tuɣal teqbaylit-nni n zik-nni ?
Taqbaylit-nni n zik-nni, wissen anda i tuɣal ?
Kkaten amek ara snegren taqbaylit.
D Aɛraben akked d Yimaziɣen yettwaɛerben i yettruẓun taqbaylit.
Kemm d taqcict tahuskayt.
A-t-an tessmerseḍ awal-a deg tefyirt, ur tettuɣaleḍ ara ad t-tettuḍ.
A-t-an tessmersem awal-a deg tefyirt, ur tettuɣalem ara ad t-tettum.
A-t-an tessmersemt awal-a deg tefyirt, ur tettuɣalemt ara ad t-tettumt.
A-t-an ssmerseɣ awal-a deg tefyirt, ur ttuɣaleɣ ara ad t-ttuɣ.
A-t-an ssmersen awal-a deg tefyirt, ur ttuɣalen ara ad t-ttun.
A-t-an ssmersent awal-a deg tefyirt, ur ttuɣalent ara ad t-ttunt.
A-t-an yessemres awal-a deg tefyirt, ur yettuɣal ara ad t-yettu.
A-t-an tessemres awal-a deg tefyirt, ur tettuɣal ara ad t-tettu.
A-t-an nessemres awal-a deg tefyirt, ur nettuɣal ara ad t-nettu.

Argaz-nni iman-is, ulac yiwen am netta.
Tameṭṭut-nni iman-is, ulac yiwet am nettat.

Llan deg ubrid mi d-tebda tesxicliw-d lehwa.

Llant deg ubrid mi d-tebda tesxicliw-d lehwa.

Tella deg ubrid mi d-tebda tesxicliw-d legerra.

Yettawi, yettarra deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Tettawi, tettarra deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Nettawi, nettarra deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Tettawiḍ, tettarraḍ deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Tettawim, tettarram deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Tettawimt, tettarramt deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Ttawiɣ, ttarraɣ deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Ttawin, ttarran deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Ttawint, ttarrant deg yiberdan am ubudali.
Tefser iceṭṭiḍen ɣef ccriḍa.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-tefser.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-yefser.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-nefser.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-tfesreḍ.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-tfesrem.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-tfesremt.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-fesreɣ.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-fesren.
Iceṭṭiden-nni, ɣef ccriḍa i ten-fesrent.
Tessared-d iceṭṭiḍen-is deg tala.
Nessared-d iceṭṭiḍen-nneɣ deg tala.
Nessared-d iceṭṭiḍen-nteɣ deg tala.
Tessardeḍ-d iceṭṭiḍen-im deg tala.
Tessardemt-d iceṭṭiḍen-nwent deg tala.
Tessardemt-d iceṭṭiḍen-nkent deg tala.
Ssardent-d iceṭṭiḍen-nsent deg tala.
Mi tfukk tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-is, tẓemma-ten uqbel ad ten-tefser.
Mi ifukk tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-is, iẓemma-ten uqbel ad ten-yefser.
Mi nfukk tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-nneɣ, nẓemma-ten uqbel ad ten-nefser.
Mi tfukkeḍ tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-ik, tẓemmaḍ-ten uqbel ad ten-tfesreḍ.
Mi tfukkeḍ tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-im, tẓemmaḍ-ten uqbel ad ten-tfesreḍ.
Mi tfukkem tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-nwen, tẓemmam-ten uqbel ad ten-tfesrem.
Mi tfukkemt tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-nwent, tẓemmamt-ten uqbel ad ten-tfesremt.
Mi tfukkem tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-nken, tẓemmam-ten uqbel ad ten-tfesrem.
Mi tfukkemt tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-nkent, tẓemmamt-ten uqbel ad ten-tfesremt.
Mi ffukkeɣ tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-iw, ẓemmaɣ-ten uqbel ad ten-fesreɣ.
Mi ffukken tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-nsen, ẓemman-ten uqbel ad ten-fesren.
Mi ffukkent tarda n yiceṭṭiḍen-nsetn, ẓemmant-ten uqbel ad ten-fesrent.

Fesrent iniɣman ɣef tdeknin yersen deg ṭṭerḥa.

Yiwet ur tebni ɣef lmut-is.
Mi yekmec wudem-is, yettban-d meqqer deg leɛmer.
Mi yekmec wudem-is, tettban-d meqqert deg leɛmer.
Mi kemcen wudmawen-nneɣ, nettban-d meqqrit deg leɛmer.
Mi kemcen wudmawen-nteɣ, nettban-d meqqrit deg leɛmer.
Mi yekmec wudem-ik, tettbaneḍ-d meqqreḍ deg leɛmer.
Mi yekmec wudem-im, tettbaneḍ-d meqqreḍ deg leɛmer.
Mi kemcen wudmawen-nwen, tettbanem-d meqqrit deg leɛmer.
Mi kemcen wudmawen-nwent, tettbanemt-d meqqrit deg leɛmer.
Mi kemcen wudmawen-nkent, tettbanemt-d meqqrit deg leɛmer.
Mi yekmec wudem-iw, ttbaneɣ-d meqqreɣ deg leɛmer.
Mi kemcen wudmawen-nsen, ttbanen-d meqqrit deg leɛmer.
Mi kemcen wudmawen-nsen, ttbanent-d meqqrit deg leɛmer.

D tillas deg wass, deg yiḍ ɣef uderɣal.
Yeɛdel was d yiḍ ɣef uderɣal.
D ass neɣ d iḍ, kif kif ɣef uderɣal.
D ass neɣ d iḍ, kif kif ɣef win ur nettwali.

Yesṭebṭeb acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad as-tt-id-ldin.
Tesṭebṭeb acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad as-tt-id-ldin.
Nesṭebṭeb acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad aɣ-tt-id-ldin.
Tesṭbeṭbeḍ acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad ak-tt-id-ldin.
Tesṭbeṭbeḍ acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad am-tt-id-ldin.
Tesṭbeṭbem acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad aken-tt-id-ldin.
Tesṭbeṭbemt acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad akent-tt-id-ldin.
Tesṭbeṭbem acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad awen-tt-id-ldin.
Tesṭbeṭbemt acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad awent-tt-id-ldin.
Seṭbeṭbeɣ acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad iyi-tt-id-ldin.
Seṭbeṭben acḥal d abrid ɣef tewwurt, maca ugin ad asen-tt-id-ldin.
Ɣur-wen zher mi ur twalam ara ayen ipderrun ass-a.
Ɣur-sen zher mi ur walan ara ayen ipderrun ass-a.
Tethennam mi ur tufiḍ d acu i twalam.
Tethennamt mi ur tufiḍ d acu i twalamt.
Tethennaḍ mi ur tufiḍ d acu i twalaḍ.
Thennaɣ mi ur tufiḍ d acu i walaɣ.
Thennan mi ur tufiḍ d acu i walan.
Thennant mi ur tufiḍ d acu i walant.
Tethenna mi ur tufiḍ d acu i twala.
Yethenna mi ur tufiḍ d acu i iwala.
Nethenna mi ur tufiḍ d acu i nwala.
Iɛreq-iyi ubrid.
Tesseɛreq abrid.
Nesseɛreq abrid.
Tessɛerqeḍ abrid.
Tessɛerqem abrid.
Tessɛerqeemt abrid.
Ssɛerqeɣ abrid.
Ssɛerqen abrid.
Ssɛerqent abrid.
Teɛreq-iyi lqebla.
Teɛreq-ak lqebla.
Teɛreq-am lqebla.
Teɛreq-as lqebla.
Teɛreq-awen lqebla.
Teɛreq-awent lqebla.
Teɛreq-aken lqebla.
Teɛreq-akent lqebla.
Teɛreq-asen lqebla.
Teɛreq-asent lqebla.
Teɛreq-aɣ lqebla.
Teɛreq-iyi lqebla, ur ẓriɣ ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-asen lqebla, ur ẓrin ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-asent lqebla, ur ẓrint ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-as lqebla, ur yeẓri ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-as lqebla, ur teẓri ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-aɣ lqebla, ur neẓri ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-ak lqebla, ur teẓriḍ ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-am lqebla, ur teẓriḍ ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-aken lqebla, ur teẓrim ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-akent lqebla, ur teẓrimt ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-awen lqebla, ur teẓrim ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Teɛreq-awent lqebla, ur teẓrimt ara akk anda i d-tezga.
Ilaq ad iyi-teɛreq lqebla akken ad uɣaleɣ akken llan yimarrawen-iw.
Ilaq ad ak-teɛreq lqebla akken ad tuɣaleḍ akken llan yimarrawen-ik.
Ilaq ad am-teɛreq lqebla akken ad tuɣaleḍ akken llan yimarrawen-im.
Ilaq ad asen-teɛreq lqebla akken ad uɣalen akken llan yimarrawen-nsen.
Ilaq ad asent-teɛreq lqebla akken ad uɣalent akken llan yimarrawen-nsent.
Ilaq ad aken-teɛreq lqebla akken ad tuɣalem akken llan yimarrawen-nken.
Ilaq ad akent-teɛreq lqebla akken ad tuɣalemt akken llan yimarrawen-nkent.
Ilaq ad awen-teɛreq lqebla akken ad tuɣalem akken llan yimarrawen-nwen.
Ilaq ad awent-teɛreq lqebla akken ad tuɣalemt akken llan yimarrawen-nwent.
Ilaq ad as-teɛreq lqebla akken ad tuɣal akken llan yimarrawen-is.
Ilaq ad as-teɛreq lqebla akken ad yuɣal akken llan yimarrawen-is.
Ilaq ad aɣ-teɛreq lqebla akken ad nuɣal akken llan yimarrawen-nneɣ.
Ilaq ad aɣ-teɛreq lqebla akken ad nuɣal akken llan yimarrawen-nteɣ.

Ddem aqrab-ik, tezwireḍ sdat-i s aɣerbaz.
Ddmem iqrab-nken, tezwirem sdat-i s aɣerbaz.
Ddmemt iqrab-nkent, tezwiremt sdat-i s aɣerbaz.
Ddmem iqrab-nwen, tezwirem sdat-i s aɣerbaz.
Ddmemt iqrab-nwent, tezwiremt sdat-i s aɣerbaz.
Ddmet iqrab-nwen, tezwirem sdat-i s aɣerbaz.
Ddmet iqrab-nken, tezwirem sdat-i s aɣerbaz.
Ffɣeɣ ɣer berra, qqimeɣ cwiṭ i yiṭij.
Ffɣen ɣer berra, qqimen cwiṭ i yiṭij.
Ffɣent ɣer berra, qqiment cwiṭ i yiṭij.
Yeffeɣ ɣer berra, yeqqim cwiṭ i yiṭij.
Teffeɣ ɣer berra, teqqim cwiṭ i yiṭij.

Teffɣemt ɣer berra, teqqimemt cwiṭ i yiṭij.
Ur tettnadiḍ ara akk ad tfehmeḍ.
Ur tettnadim ara akk ad tfehmem.
Ur tettnadimt ara akk ad tfehmemt.
Ur tettnadi ara akk ad tefhem.
Ur nettnadi ara akk ad nefhem.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara akk ad fehmeɣ.
Ur ttnadin ara akk ad fehmen.
Ur ttnadint ara akk ad fehment.

Ur yettnadi ara fell-am.

Argaz yettsebbilen, laɛmer i d-yenni ala.
Tameṭṭut yettsebbilen, laɛmer i d-tenni ala.
Argaz yettsebbilen, laɛmer yerri yiwen.
kra n win yettsebbilen, laɛmer i d-yenni ala.
kra n win yettsebbilen, laɛmer yerri yiwen.
kra n tin yettsebbilen, laɛmer i d-tenni ala.
kra n tin yettsebbilen, laɛmer terri yiwen.
kra n wid yettsebbilen, laɛmer rrin yiwen.
kra n wid yettsebbilen, laɛmer i d-nnin ala.
kra n tid yettsebbilen, laɛmer i d-nnint ala.
kra n tid yettsebbilen, laɛmer i d-rrint yiwen.
Ittakk Rebbi lhemm i win i s-izemren.

Yeččur ufus-im d tifiḍliwin.

Aṭas n tid i isebblen tudert-nsent.
Dayen yebbehba, yettu d acu ara yexdem.
Dayen tebbehba, tettu d acu ara texdem.
Dayen nebbehba, nettu d acu ara nexdem.

Dayen tebbehbamt, tettumt d acu ara txedmemt.

Dayen bbehbant, ttunt d acu ara xedment.

Tuḍen, truḥ ad tt-iwali umejjay.

Iḍarren-ik bezzf i gman acku ur telsiḍ ara isebbaḍen deg temẓi-k.
Iḍarren-im bezzaf i gman acku ur telsiḍ ara isebbaḍen deg temẓi-k.
