Ddurt yezrin sliɣ yerna ɣur-sen uqcic.
Abrid, ɣezzif.
Abrid d aɣezzfan.
Tudert d tawezzlant.
Tekki ɣef wassaɣ, ad teɣreḍ aḍris akken ma yella, ad tafeḍ tanfalit-a akka i d-tenniḍ.
Tekki ɣef wassaɣ azegzaw ad k-yawi alma d aḍris ara teɣreḍ akken ma yella, imir-nni ad tegzuḍ tamsalt.
Ur teḥmmilem ara ad teɣrem.
Tin yettakken azal i tutlayt-is, ccan-is d win meqqren.
Wid yettakken azal i tutlayt-nsen, ccan-nsen d win meqqren.
Tid yettakken azal i tutlayt-nsent, ccan-nsent d win meqqren.
Tin iteddun ɣef tidet, tessawaḍ.
Wid iteddun ɣef tidet, ssawaḍen.
Tid iteddun ɣef tidet, ssawaḍent.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-iyi lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-iyi lebɣi d ameqqran.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-ik lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-ik lebɣi d ameqqran.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-im lebɣi d ameqqran.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-im lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-it lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-it lebɣi d ameqqran.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-itt lebɣi d ameqqran.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-itt lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-iten lebɣi d ameqqran.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-iten lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-itent lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-itent lebɣi d ameqqran.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-iken lebɣi d ameqqran.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-iken lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-ikent lebɣi meqqren.
Abrid yettban-d ɣezzif, maca izdeɣ-ikent lebɣi d ameqqran.

Arumt temmeslayemt taqbaylit ma tebɣamt, tutlayt-nwent, ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger.
Arum temmeslayem taqbaylit ma tebɣam, tutlayt-nwen, ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger.
Arut temmeslayem taqbaylit ma tebɣam, tutlayt-nwen, ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger.
Aru temmeslayeḍ taqbaylit ma tebɣiḍ, tutlayt-ik, ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger.
Aru temmeslayeḍ taqbaylit ma tebɣiḍ, tutlayt-im, ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger.

Arum temmeslayem taqbaylit ma tebɣam, tutlayt-nken, ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger.
Arut temmeslayem taqbaylit ma tebɣam, tutlayt-nken, ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger.
Ma yella ur d-yedhi ara d yiman-is, yiwen, deg-s ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-tedhi ara d yiman-is, yiwen, deg-s ur d-idehhu.
Nadi kan ad tafeḍ.
Nadim kan ad tafem.
Nadimt kan ad tafemt.
Nadit kan ad tafem.
Ma yella ur d-tedhiḍ ara d yiman-ik, yiwen, deg-k ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-tedhiḍ ara d yiman-im, yiwen, deg-k ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-tedhim ara d yiman-nken, yiwen, deg-ken ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-tedhimt ara d yiman-nkent, yiwen, deg-kent ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-tedhim ara d yiman-nwen, yiwen, deg-wen ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-tedhimt ara d yiman-nwent, yiwen, deg-went ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-dhiɣ ara d yiman-iw, yiwen, deg-i ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-dhiɣ ara d yiman-iw, deg-i, yiwen ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-dhin ara d yiman-nsen, deg-sen, yiwen ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-dhint ara d yiman-nsent, deg-sent, yiwen ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-dhin ara d yiman-nsen, yiwen, deg-sen ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur d-dhint ara d yiman-nsent, yiwen, deg-sent ur d-idehhu.

Acu n tmara i tt-yerran ad tettgalla ad tḥennet.
Acu n tmara i aɣ-yerran ad nettgalla ad nḥennet.
Acu n tmara i k-yerran ad tettgallaḍ ad tḥennteḍ.
Acu n tmara i kem-yerran ad tettgallaḍ ad tḥennteḍ.
Acu n tmara i ken-yerran ad tettgallam ad tḥenntem.
Acu n tmara i kent-yerran ad tettgallamt ad tḥenntemt.

Acu n tmara i ten-yerran ad ttgallan ad ḥennten.
Acu n tmara i tent-yerran ad ttgallant ad ḥenntent.

Rebbi, anda teddiḍ yella.

Ɣremt aḍris akken ma yella ad tafemt tifrat.
Ɣret aḍris akken ma yella ad tafem tifrat.

Rebbi, anda teddamt yella.

Tugi ad tamen ayen ttwalint wallen-is.
Nugi ad namen ayen ttwalint wallen-nneɣ.
Nugi ad namen ayen ttwalint wallen-nteɣ.

Tugiḍ ad tamneḍ ayen ttwalint wallen-im.

Tugimt ad tamnemt ayen ttwalint wallen-nwent.

Ugiɣ ad amneɣ ayen ttwalint wallen-inu.

Yugi ad yamen ayen ttwalint wallen-ines.

Mi teffeɣ ad tkes lmal-is, tuwi yid-s aɛwin-is.
Mi yeffeɣ ad ikes lmal-is, yuwi yid-s aɛwin-is.
Mi neffeɣ ad nkes lmal-nneɣ, nuwi yid-neɣ aɛwin-nneɣ.
Mi neffeɣ ad nkes lmal-nteɣ, nuwi yid-nteɣ aɛwin-nteɣ.
Mi teffɣeḍ ad tekseḍ lmal-ik, tuwiḍ yid-k aɛwin-ik.
Mi teffɣeḍ ad tekseḍ lmal-im, tuwiḍ yid-m aɛwin-im.
Mi teffɣeḍ ad tekseḍ lmal-inek, tuwiḍ yid-k aɛwin-inek.
Mi teffɣeḍ ad tekseḍ lmal-inem, tuwiḍ yid-m aɛwin-inem.
Mi yeffeɣ ad ikes lmal-ines, yuwi yid-s aɛwin-ines.
Mi teffeɣ ad tkes lmal-ines, tuwi yid-s aɛwin-ines.
Mi teffɣem ad teksem lmal-nken, tuwim yid-ken aɛwin-nken.
Mi teffɣemt ad teksemt lmal-nkent, tuwimt yid-kent aɛwin-nkent.
Mi teffɣem ad teksem lmal-nwen, tuwim yid-wen aɛwin-nwen.
Mi teffɣemt ad teksemt lmal-nwent, tuwimt yid-went aɛwin-nwent.
Mi ffɣeɣ ad kseɣ lmal-iw, uwiɣ yid-i aɛwin-iw.
Mi ffɣeɣ ad kseɣ lmal-inu, uwiɣ yid-i aɛwin-inu.
Mi ffɣen ad ksen lmal-nsen, uwin yid-sen aɛwin-nsen.
Mi ffɣent ad ksetn lmal-nsent, uwint yid-sent aɛwin-nsent.

Tameqqrant n uɛebbuḍ, tettaddam aḥric azuran.
Imeqqranen n uɛebbuḍ, ttaddamen iḥercan izuranen.
Timeqqranin n uɛebbuḍ, ttaddament iḥercan izuranen.
Imeqqranen n uɛebbuḍ, ttaddamen iḥercan imeqqranen.
Timeqqranin n uɛebbuḍ, ttaddament iḥercan imeqqranen.
Tameqqrant n uɛebbuḍ, tettaddam aḥric ameqqran.
Ameqqran n uɛebbuḍ, yeettaddam aḥric ameqqran.

Ad t-yeg Rebbi d tixsi n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad as-yerfed tamaẓẓagt-is.
Ad kem-yeg Rebbi d tixsi n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad as-yerfed tamaẓẓagt-is.
Ad tt-yeg Rebbi d tixsi n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad as-yerfed tamaẓẓagt-is.
Ad iyi-yeg Rebbi d tixsi n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad as-yerfed tamaẓẓagt-is.
Ad aɣ-yeg Rebbi d ulli n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad asent-yerfed timaẓẓagin-nsent.
Ad ken-yeg Rebbi d ulli n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad asent-yerfed timaẓẓagin-nsent.
Ad kent-yeg Rebbi d ulli n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad asent-yerfed timaẓẓagin-nsent.
Ad ten-yeg Rebbi d ulli n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad asent-yerfed timaẓẓagin-nsent.
Ad tent-yeg Rebbi d ulli n ssuq, win d-iɛeddan ad asent-yerfed timaẓẓagin-nsent
Amcic, iga-t Rebbi d amakur.
Aydi, iga-t Rebbi d uqbiḥ
Azrem, iga-t Rebbi d axeddaɛ.
Azger, iga-t Rebbi d aṣebri.
Tixsi, iga-tt Rebbi d tamaggadt.
Tixsi, iga-tt Rebbi d tamaxuft.
Tasekkurt, iga-tt Rebbi d tahuskayt.
Tasekkurt, iga-tt Rebbi d tamelḥant.
Inisi, iga-t Rebbi d amuḥric.
Inisi, iga-t Rebbi d uḥric.
Uccen, iga-t Rebbi d bu txidas.
Kullec yettruḥu s nnuba.
Kullec d kečč i t-yuwin.
Kullec d kemm i t-yuwin.
Kullec d nekk i t-yuwin.
Kullec d netta i t-yuwin.
Kullec d nettat i t-yuwin.
Kullec d nekkni i t-yuwin.
Kullec d nekkenti i t-yuwin.
Kullec d nutni i t-yuwin.
Kullec d nutenti i t-yuwin.
Kullec d kunwi i t-yuwin.
Kullec d kunemti i t-yuwin.
Yewwet-itt Rebbi, ar tura ur tessin leslaḥ-is.
Yewwet-aɣ Rebbi, ar tura ur nessin leslaḥ-nneɣ.
Yewwet-aɣ Rebbi, ar tura ur nessin leslaḥ-nteɣ.
Yewwet-ik Rebbi, ar tura ur tessineḍ leslaḥ-ik.
Yewwet-ikem Rebbi, ar tura ur tessineḍ leslaḥ-im.
Yewwet-ikem Rebbi, ar tura ur tessineḍ leslaḥ-inem.
Yewwet-ik Rebbi, ar tura ur tessineḍ leslaḥ-inek.
Yewwet-itt Rebbi, ar tura ur tessin leslaḥ-ines.
Yewwet-it Rebbi, ar tura ur tessin leslaḥ-ines.
Yewwet-iken Rebbi, ar tura ur tessinem leslaḥ-nken.
Yewwet-ikent Rebbi, ar tura ur tessinemt leslaḥ-nkent.
Yewwet-iken Rebbi, ar tura ur tessinem leslaḥ-nwen.
Yewwet-ikent Rebbi, ar tura ur tessinemt leslaḥ-nwent.
Yewwet-iyi Rebbi, ar tura ur ssineɣ leslaḥ-iw.
Yewwet-iyi Rebbi, ar tura ur ssineɣ leslaḥ-inu.
Yewwet-iten Rebbi, ar tura ur ssinen leslaḥ-nsen.
Yewwet-itent Rebbi, ar tura ur ssinent leslaḥ-nsent.
Yuḍen, yewwet-it waḍu.
Tuḍen, yewwet-itt waḍu.
Nuḍen, yewwet-aɣ waḍu.
Tuḍneḍ, yewwet-ik waḍu.
Tuḍneḍ, yewwet-ikem waḍu.
Tuḍnem, yewwet-iken waḍu.
Tuḍnemt, yewwet-ikent waḍu.
Uḍneɣ, yewwet-iyi waḍu.
Uḍnen, yewwet-iten waḍu.
Uḍnent, yewwet-itent waḍu.
Tewwet-itt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi dTazmalt.
Yewwet-itt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi dTazmalt.
Newwet-itt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi dTazmalt.
Tewwteḍ-tt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi d Tazmalt.
Tewwtem-tt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi d Tazmalt.
Tewwtemt-tt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi dTazmalt.
Wwteɣ-tt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi d Tazmalt.
Wwten-tt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi d Tazmalt.
Wwtent-tt d ibeddi seg Bgayet almi d Tazmalt.
Wissen anda i d-yezga wadeg anda ara nas-n ?
Wissen ma ssnent anda i d-yezga wadeg anda ara d-asent ?
Ur as-d-yuzen ara tabrat i tettraju.
Ur as-d-tuzen ara tabrat i tettraju.
Ur as-d-tuzen ara tabrat i yettraju.

Ur asent-d-tuzneḍ ara tabrat i ttrajunt.

Ur iyi-d-tuzen ara tabrat i ttrajuɣ.

Lufan ad twali cclaɣem-iw ad texleɛ deg wakken meqqrit.

Yemmut yettɛeyyic arraw-is.
Yak terram kan isem-iw ddaw n yal aḍris.
Yak terramt kan isem-iw ddaw n yal aḍris.
Yak terra kan isem-iw ddaw n yal aḍris.
Yak yerra kan isem-iw ddaw n yal aḍris.
Yak rran kan isem-iw ddaw n yal aḍris.
Yak rrant kan isem-iw ddaw n yal aḍris.
Lufan ad iwali cclaɣem-iw ad ixleɛ deg wakken meqqrit.

Di taggara n lexrif i ttwafersent ttjuṛ.
Di taggara n umwan i ttwafersent ttjuṛ.

Di taggara n lexrif i ttwaqrracen yisekla, yettwakkes-asen wayen iten-yeskuffuren, ad afen amek ara ten-id-iwali yiṭij.

Dayen, ur nettuɣal ad neqqim yid-sen.
Dayen, ur yettuɣal ad yeqqim yid-sen.
Dayen, ur ttuɣaleɣ ad qqimeɣ yid-sen.
Dayen, ur ttuɣalen ad qqimen yid-sen.
Dayen, ur ttuɣalent ad qqiment yid-sen.
Tewḥel deg lqaɛa, tewḥel deg yigenni.
Tudrin akk n tmurt n Leqbayel ttemyaken anzi deg tudert-nsent.
Amexluḍ d wiyet n tsesfart i izemren ad tesɛu aṭas n yifuras.
Ifuras, yal yiwen amek i iga, yal yiwen d acu n lbenna i d-ittakk.
Deg yifyra-agi, yella win i d-iberrun teqreḥ, wayeḍ tesmem neɣ kra n lbenna ala netta kan i tt-isɛan.
Deg tsesfart yella kullec deg-s.
Ma nerfed-d kan tsesfart n uḥaluc, ad d-nebder ifuras akk tesɛa.
Deg tsesfat n uḥaluc nezmer ad naf deg-s : tibitest, aẓalim (lebṣel), amiṭuc, ifelfel n uɣlal, lbaṭaṭa tegzem d iḥricen imecṭah maḍi, taɣiɣact, tasemmumt n uzger, tisent, zzit, aman…
Tilawin ma mačči deg uxxam, neɣ deg lexla, ttilint deg tala anda i ttembeddalent imecriwen-nsent.
Isalli mazal yeḥma ad tafeḍ deg tala ɣer tlawin i d-yusan ad agment.
Isalli mazal yeḥma ad tafeḍ deg tala ɣer tlemẓiyin i d-yusan ad agment.
Tinnat tezwej, meẓziyet tuɣ amaɣar, d tizzya n baba-s.
Mačči d amɣar i tuɣ, tuɣ isurdiyen-is.
Mačči d amɣar i tuɣ, tuɣ lǧib-is.
Mačči d amɣar ara taɣ, ad taɣ lǧib-is.
Mačči d imɣaren i ttaɣent, ttaɣent isurdiyen-nsen.
Mačči d imɣaren i ttaɣent, ttaɣent leǧyub-nsen.
Tadkent, tideknin, fell-asent i nfesser iniɣman (iḥbuben, tazart) deg ṭṭerḥa.
Ɣef tdekent i fessrent tlawin tazart-nsent.
Ɣef tdekent i fessrent tlawin iniɣman-nsent.
Tayeḍ tebra-d ur uwiḍen sebɣeyyam segmi tezwej, tuwi-d kan akken lḥenni deg yiḍarren-is.
Mazal d-terri sebɛeyyam, tebra-d.
Tebɣiḍ ad d-tiniḍ : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Tebɣam ad d-tinim : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Tebɣamt ad d-tinimt : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Tebɣa ad d-tini : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Yebɣa ad d-yini : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Nebɣa ad d-nini : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Bɣiɣ ad d-iniɣ : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Bɣan ad d-inin : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Bɣant ad d-inint : Ad k-yeḥrez Rebbi.
Tinnat n at Winnat tsɛa-d akniwen.
Tinnat n at Winnat tsɛa-d akniwen, aqcic d teqcict.
Ma d faḍma, taǧaret-is, ur tesɛi ara zher, d tiɛiqert, ur tettarew ara,
Ṭawes meskint ur tesɛi ara zher, d tiɛiqert, ur tettarew ara, kra n wass kan ad d-yernu fell-as urgaz-is takna neɣ ad as-yebru.
Ur yebɣi ara ad yemmet d amengur, yebɣa ad d-yexlef yisem-is.
Ur yebɣi ara ad yemmet d amengur, yebɣa ad d-yexlef yisem-ines.
Tameṭṭut tiɛiqert, iberru-as urgaz-is neɣ irennu-d fell-as takna.
Mačči yiwen n umecriw ara tafeḍ deg tala.
Kra n temsal yeḍran ttɣimint-d deg wawal, uɣalent d lemɛayrat ɣef widak-nni i tent-ixedmen.
Amecriw yettruḥu seg yimi s ameẓẓuɣ.
Yir lhedra tettazzal seg yimi s ameẓẓuɣ.
Teḍra deg taddart am yiwet n twacult tameqqrant.
Ger yiɛeggalen n taddart ttilin-d wassaɣen inmettiyen
Ɣef wassaɣen-a inmettiyen i d-yuwi awal Wakli deg udlis-is.
Ɣef wassaɣen-a inmettiyen i d-tuwi awal Zuhra deg udlis-is.
Ɣef wassaɣen-a inmettiyen i d-tuwi awal Zuhra deg udlis-ines.
Ilaq ad yili d win iceffun akken ad d-yemmekti.
Ilaq ad nili d wid iceffun akken ad d-emmekti.
Ilaq ad tili d tin iceffun akken ad d-temmekti.
Ilaq ad tiliḍ d tin iceffun akken ad d-temmektiḍ.
Ilaq ad tiliḍ d win iceffun akken ad d-temmektiḍ.
Ilaq ad tilimt d tid iceffun akken ad d-temmektimt.
Ilaq ad iliɣ d tin iceffun akken ad d-mmektiɣ.
Ilaq ad iliɣ d win iceffun akken ad d-mmektiɣ.
Ilaq ad ilin d wid iceffun akken ad d-mmektin.
Ilaq ad ilint d tid iceffun akken ad d-mmektint.
Tikkelt-a ad ak-dduɣ deg lebɣi, tikkelt-nniḍen xaṭi imi ččureɣ d lecɣal.
Tikkelt-a ad am-dduɣ deg lebɣi, tikkelt-nniḍen xaṭi imi ččureɣ d lecɣal.
Tikkelt-a ad as-dduɣ deg lebɣi, tikkelt-nniḍen xaṭi imi ččureɣ d lecɣal.
Tikkelt-a ad aken-dduɣ deg lebɣi, tikkelt-nniḍen xaṭi imi ččureɣ d lecɣal.
Tikkelt-a ad akent-dduɣ deg lebɣi, tikkelt-nniḍen xaṭi imi ččureɣ d lecɣal.
Tikkelt-a ad awen-dduɣ deg lebɣi, tikkelt-nniḍen xaṭi imi ččureɣ d lecɣal.

Akka ceɣleɣ-d yid-ken, ǧǧiɣ iman-iw.
Akka ceɣleɣ-d yid-kent, ǧǧiɣ iman-iw.

Tceɣleḍ-d yid-i, teǧǧiḍ iman-im.

Tceɣlemt-d yid-i, teǧǧamt iman-kent.
Tceɣleḍ-d yid-neɣ, teǧǧiḍ iman-ik.
Tceɣleḍ-d yid-neɣ, teǧǧiḍ iman-im.

Ɣur-i yiwen n usefru ɣef tlelli wissen ad ak-yeɛǧeb.

Ɣur-s yiwen n usefru ɣef tlelli wissen ad aɣ-yeɛǧeb.
Ɣur-s yiwen n usefru ɣef tlelli wissen ad iyi-yeɛǧeb.
Ɣur-s yiwen n usefru ɣef tlelli wissen ad ak-yeɛǧeb.

Deg tilawt tilelli mačči d taččart n leǧyub s yisurdiyen, maca d ayen-nniḍen maḍi.
Deg tilawt tilelli mačči d taččart n leǧyub s yidrimen, maca d ayen-nniḍen maḍi.
Tilelli tamezwarut d tin n umussu acku tin ur nezmir ara ad teddu, yeɛni ad tḥerrek anda teḅɣa, ur telli d tilellit.
Tilelli tamezwarut d tin n umussu acku win ur nezmir ara ad yeddu, yeɛni ad iḥerrek anda yeḅɣa, ur yelli d ilelli.
Tilelli tamezwarut d tin n umussu acku wid ur nezmir ara ad ddun, yeɛni ad ḥerreken anda ḅɣan, ur llin d ilelliyen.
Tilelli tamezwarut d tin n umussu acku tid ur nezmir ara ad ddunt, yeɛni ad ḥerrekent anda ḅɣant, ur llint d tilelliyin.
Tikwal meyif tiɣimit d lmal wala yimdanen.
Tikwal meyif tiɣimit d yiɣersiwen wala yimdanen.
Ma yella tala n tlwain, tajmaɛt d ssuq n yirgazen.
Tajmaɛt d yiwen n uxxam i d-izeggen deg tlemmast n taddart.
Tajmaɛt d yiwen n wadeg i ttayalen akk medden, d azayez.
Deg tejmaɛt i ttnnegrawen yirgazen akken ad frun timsal yerzan tudert n taddart.
Ur ikeččem yiwen ɣer llufeq n taddart alma yemmed cwiṭ, bdan-t-id cclaɣem, d ayen yessaweḍ ad yefreẓ timsal.
Ur ittekki yiwen ɣer llufeq n taddart alma yemmed cwiṭ, bdan-t-id cclaɣem, d ayen yessaweḍ ad yefreẓ tilufa.
Seg zik n zik deg tudert n tmetti taqbaylit, tala tezga d adeg n tlawin.
Mačči yiwen n lexber ara tafeḍ deg tala.

Deg ddunnit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara yiwen am kečc.
Deg ddunnit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara yiwet am kemm.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara amdan am kečč.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara amdan am kemm.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara tameṭṭut am kemm.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara taqcict am kemm.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara taḥdayt am kemm.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara tilemẓit am kemm.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara argaz am kečč.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara aqcic am kečč.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara ilemẓi am kečč.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara imdanen am kunwi.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara lɣaci am kunwi.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara taqcict am nettat.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara tilawin am nutenti.
Nudaɣ-d ddunit akken ma tella, ur ufiɣ ara tilemẓiyin am nutenti.

Fell-as, tezmer ad tsebbel tudert-ines.

Dayen, ɛawdeɣ-asent akk anay i tefyar-a.

Tid yekkaten tijɛal nessen-itent.

Tcennu tizlatin n wiyaḍ imi ur tezmir ara ad d-tesnulfu.
Ncennu tizlatin n wiyaḍ imi ur nezmir ara ad d-nesnulfu.

Tcennum tizlatin n wiyaḍ imi ur tezmirem ara ad d-tesnulfum.
Tcennumt tizlatin n wiyaḍ imi ur tezmiremt ara ad d-tesnulfumt.

Cennun tizlatin n wiyaḍ imi ur zmiren ara ad d-snulfun.
Cennunt tizlatin n wiyaḍ imi ur zmirent ara ad d-snulfunt.

D ayen i tuklal i tuwi.
D ayen i yuklal i yuwi.
D ayen i nuklal i nuwi.

D ayen i uklalen i uwin.
D ayen i uklalent i uwint.

Tetteddu tettxemmim fell-as.

Diri tin ittezzmen tayeḍ aṭas.

Diri tid ittezzmen tiyiḍ aṭas.

Yelha win yessebɣasen wayeḍ.
Yelha tin yessebɣasen tayeḍ.
Yelha wid yessebɣasen wiyiḍ.
Yelha tid yessebɣasen tiyiḍ.

Aṭas i teffer deg wul-is.

Aṭas i teffreḍ deg wul-im.

Aṭas i teffremt deg wulawen-nkent.
Aṭas i teffrem deg wulawen-nwen.
Aṭas i teffremt deg wulawen-nwent.

Aṭas i teffer deg wul-ines.

Tismuɣbent, ma nnant-awen-d ur ssinen ara Ihendiwen ad smuɣebnen, skiddibent.

Tismuɣbent, ma nnan-awen-d ur ssinen ara Ihendiwen ad smuɣebnen, skiddiben.

Tismuɣbent, ma nnant-asen-d ur ssinen ara Ihendiwen ad smuɣebnen, skiddibent.

Ɣrant-tt iman-nsent tutlayt n tmaziɣt, uɣalent sɣarayent-tt.

Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-ak d twacult-ik, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-am d twacult-im, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-aken d twacult-nken, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-akent d twacult-nkent, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-awen d twacult-nwen, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-awent d twacult-nwent, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-asen d twacult-nsen, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-asent d twacult-nsent, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-i d twacult-iw, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-i d twacult-inu, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-aneɣ d twacult-nneɣ, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-anteɣ d twacult-nteɣ, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-ak d twacult-inek, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-am d twacult-inem, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-as d twacult-is, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Ad yili Rebbi d aɛessas fell-as d twacult-ines, yerr akkin aṭṭan-a.
Lehdur-ik skuffuren.
Lehdur-inek skuffuren.
Lehdur-im skuffuren.
Lehdur-inem skuffuren.
Lehdur-is skuffuren.
Lehdur-ines skuffuren.
Awal teqqar d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Awal yeqqar d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Awal neqqar d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Awal teqqareḍ d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Awal teqqarem d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Awal teqqaremt d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Awal qqareɣ d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Awal qqaren d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Awal qqarent d asefru, iteqqes am uzegḍuf.
Ɣur-s nnig n meyya waxfiwen, tbedd ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ɣur-s nnig n meyya waxfiwen, ibedd ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ɣur-neɣ nnig n meyya waxfiwen, nbedd ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ɣur-k nnig n meyya waxfiwen, tbeddeḍ ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ɣur-m nnig n meyya waxfiwen, tbeddeḍ ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ɣur-ken nnig n meyya waxfiwen, tbeddem ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ɣur-kent nnig n meyya waxfiwen, tbeddemt ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ɣur-wen nnig n meyya waxfiwen, tbeddem ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ɣur-went nnig n meyya waxfiwen, tbeddemt ɣur-sen s tyessawt.
Ayefki-a, ittismiḍ irennu.
Anebdu, skudmal iḥemmu.
Ɣer taggara n wussan-is, ad yuɣal skudmal irehhef.
Ɣer taggara n tudert-is, ad yuɣal skudmal irehhef.
Sya s uzekka, ussan ad uɣalen skudmal meẓẓiyit.
Sya s uzekka, ussan ad uɣalen skudmal wezzilit.

Teɣli tezmert-ik.
Teɣli tezmert-iw.
Teɣli tezmert-im.

Aql-i am ufrux mi kksen lejnaḥ.
Aql-i ur zmireɣ ad ḥuddeɣ ɣef yiman-iw.
Teḍra yid-i am ufrux iwimi gezmen wafriwen.
Taxemmujt n tqeffilt n tqemǧet tcerreg.
Taṭiṭuct n tqeffalt n tseddrit tefri.
Teqqen taɛelluqt taẓayant, yefri umeẓẓuɣ-is.
Icerreg umeẓẓuɣ-is mi i as-teqqen tamenguct taẓayant.
Imeẓẓuɣen n yikerri n lɛid, ur yessetḥeq ara ad frin.
Imeẓẓuɣen n yikerri n lɛid, ur ilaq ara ad cergen.
Imeẓẓuɣen n yikerri n lɛid, ur ilaq ara ad ldin.

Imeẓẓuɣen n wufrik n lɛid, ur ilaq ara ad ldin.

Tibexsisin ččurent tileqnin.

Aql-iken ur tezmirem ad tḥuddem ɣef yiman-ken.
Aql-iken ur tezmirem ad tḥuddem ɣef yiman-wen.
Aql-ikent ur tezmiremt ad tḥuddemt ɣef yiman-kent.
Aql-ikent ur tezmiremt ad tḥuddemt ɣef yiman-went.

Aql-ikem ur tezmireḍ ad tḥuddeḍ ɣef yiman-im.
Aṭas n lxir i nečča i uɣyul.
Ulac aɣersiw imegzi am uɣyul.
Kra n win i nettwali ur yefhim, nettsemmi-as aɣyul.
Ulac win iɛetben deg tmurt n Leqbayel am uɣyul.
Tudrin n Leqbayel, i tent-yebnan d aɣyul.
Newwet aɣyul akken i ilaq sin n yiberdan, nettɛebbi fell-as alma yemmut, neḥrem-it deg tayri.
Ur fhimeɣ ara Leqbayel, iɣyal ttrebbin-ten ma d tiɣyal xaṭi.
I yeskerhen ddunit i uɣyul, d arrac.
Deg wakken yekreh uɣyul arrrac i as-ten-isserwayen, yeffaɣ lǧennet ideg llan.
Aɣyul, nɣurr-it meskin.
Ulac aɣersiw ifehmen, isehlen, yettaɣen awal am uɣyul.
Nessentay ccuka deg yiberdi-s, s umerṭag neḍber-it, yettuɣaḍ uɣyul meskin.
Ad nawi ddnub deg-s.
Ad yawi ddnub deg-s.
Ad tawi ddnub deg-s.
Ad tawiḍ ddnub deg-s.
Ad tawim ddnub deg-s.
Ad tawimt ddnub deg-s.
Ad awiɣ ddnub deg-s.
Ad awin ddnub deg-s.
Ad awint ddnub deg-s.
Ur d-teggri kra n tegmat.
Yerwa uɣyul adeqqem.
Aɣyul yerwa adeqqem mačči d timẓin.
Mačči d timẓin i yerwa uɣyul meskin, yerwa tiɣrit d udeqqem.
Yerkeb aɣyul, iruḥ ad d-isewweq.
Nerkeb aɣyul, nruḥ ad d-nsewweq.
Trekbeḍ aɣyul, truḥeḍ ad d-tsewwqeḍ.
Trekbem aɣyul, truḥem ad d-tsewwqem.
Rekbeɣ aɣyul, ruḥeɣ ad d-sewwqeɣ.
Iberdeɛ aɣyul, yerkeb fell-as ad d-isewweq.
Bredɛeɣ aɣyul, rekbeɣ fell-as ad d-sewwqeɣ.
Bredɛen aɣyul, rekben fell-as ad d-sewwqen.
Tebredɛeḍ aɣyul, trekbeḍ fell-as ad d-tsewwqeḍ.
Tebredɛem aɣyul, trekbem fell-as ad d-tsewwqem.
Yebda-d usemmiḍ-nni iteqsen.
Ur ɛdileɣ ara d usemmiḍ.
Ur neɛdil ara nekk d usemmiḍ.
Yebɣa uɣrib ad d-yuɣal ɣer tmurt-is.
Yebɣa yiminig ad d-yuɣal ɣer tmurt-is.
Tebɣa teɣribt ad d-tuɣal ɣer tmurt-is.
Tebɣa tminigt ad d-tuɣal ɣer tmurt-is.
Bɣan yiɣriben ad d-uɣalen ɣer tmurt-nsen.
Bɣan yiminigen ad d-uɣalen ɣer tmurt-nsen.
Bɣant teɣribin ad d-uɣalent ɣer tmurt-nsent.
Bɣant tminigin ad d-uɣalent ɣer tmurt-nsent.
Bɣiɣ ad idireɣ anda i iyi-teɣli timiḍt.
Bɣan ad idiren anda i asen-teɣli timiḍt.
Bɣant ad idirent anda i asent-teɣli timiḍt.
Mačči win iɛeddan kan ad yaru.
Mačči tin iɛeddan kan ad taru.
Mačči wid iɛeddan kan ad arun.
Mačči tid iɛeddan kan ad arunt.
Wissen ma d-yeggri kra deg yidles-nneɣ ?
Nettzuxu s wayla n medden.
Ayen yexdem i yufa.
Xdem tafeḍ‑t.
Xedmem tafem-t.
Xedmemt tafemt-t.
Xedmet tafem-t.
Neḥqer ayla-nneɣ, nettzuxu s wayla n medden.
Neḥqer ayla-nteɣ, nettzuxu s wayla n medden.
Ussan iɛeddan i walaɣ lferg n ẓẓerẓur tama n Beclul yerna meqqer.
Teḥqer ayla-s, tettzuxu s wayla n medden.
Yeḥqer ayla-s, yettzuxu s wayla n medden.
Tḥeqreḍ ayla-k, tettzuxuḍ s wayla n medden.
Tḥeqreḍ ayla-m, tettzuxuḍ s wayla n medden.
Tḥeqrem ayla-nken, tettzuxum s wayla n medden.
Tḥeqremt ayla-nkent, tettzuxumt s wayla n medden.
Tḥeqrem ayla-nwen, tettzuxum s wayla n medden.
Tḥeqremt ayla-nwent, tettzuxumt s wayla n medden.

Ḥeqreɣ ayla-inu, ttzuxuɣ s wayla n medden.
Ḥeqren ayla-nsen, ttzuxun s wayla n medden.
Ḥeqrent ayla-nsent, ttzuxunt s wayla n medden.

Tḥeqreḍ ayla-inek, tettzuxuḍ s wayla n medden.
Tḥeqreḍ ayla-inem, tettzuxuḍ s wayla n medden.

Tal yiwet teṭṭef abrid-is.

Tal yiwen taɣ abrid-is.

Tura mi teɣrid asefru, tfehmeḍ-t, ad ak-iniɣ s tezmert n yimensi-k s uɣrum aquran d zzit.
Tura mi teɣrid asefru, tfehmeḍ-t, ad am-iniɣ s tezmert n yimensi-m s uɣrum aquran d zzit.
Tura mi teɣram asefru, tfehmem-t, ad aken-iniɣ s tezmert n yimensi-nken s uɣrum aquran d zzit.
Tura mi teɣramt asefru, tfehmemt-t, ad akent-iniɣ s tezmert n yimensi-nkent s uɣrum aquran d zzit.

Tura mi ɣrant asefru, fehment-t, ad asent-iniɣ s tezmert n yimensi-nsent s uɣrum aquran d zzit.

Mayna, tettawi-d lehna.
Ur yebɣi ara ad inaɣ, yefka mayna.
Argaz ukyis ur yettnaɣ ara; ittak mayna.
Bu lekyasa, ur yettnaɣ, ittak mayna.
Bu ččaqlala, yettarra-tt ala i lehmum.
Bu lehmum ur yessin mayna.
Akka i d netta, yettnaɣ ur ittak mayna.
Akka i d nettat, tettnaɣ ur tettak mayna.
Akka i d nekkni, nettnaɣ ur nettak mayna.
Akka i d nekkenti, nettnaɣ ur nettak mayna.

Akka i d nutni, ttnaɣen ur ttaken mayna.
Akka i d nutenti, ttnaɣent ur ttakent mayna.

Teḍra yid-sent am tid iẓeṭlen kra yekka wass.
Teḍra yid-ken am wid iẓeṭlen kra yekka wass.
Teḍra yid-wen am wid iẓeṭlen kra yekka wass.
Teḍra yid-went am tid iẓeṭlen kra yekka wass.
Teḍra yid-kent am tid iẓeṭlen kra yekka wass.
Akli amezwaru yeǧǧa-d taǧǧalt s uɛebbuḍ, yemmut deg Taruft, deg ṭṭrad amaḍlan wis sin
Ullis-a yuwi-d awal ɣef kraḍet n tsutwin.
Tasuta tamezwarut terza tallit n yiseggasen n 30 d 40, d abdar kan i d-tettwabdar.
Tasuta tis snat d tis kraḍet iɣef d-yella aṭas n wawal fell-asent, rzant iseggasen n 50 almi d wid n 70.
Amaru yewwet amek ara d-yesmmekti ansayen n yimir-nni i aɣ-yettruḥun cwit cwiṭ, s umawal n yimir-nni.
Yidir ikemmel tizrawin-is deg Bumerdas, din i d-yuwi agerdas swayes i yebda ixeddim dinna kan anda yeɣra.
Lḥif ɣef twacult n Wakli itekkes-it Yidir ittmahalen, iɛeggalen-is ferḥen nezzeh yis-s.
Yidir yettraju-t wugur-nniḍen, tuwi-d fell-as ad yesɛeddi lɛesker.
Mi d-yeffeɣ yebna ad yaɣ Ṭawes.
Mi i as-d-ssawlen, iruḥ ɣer lkazirna anda ad d-yesɛeddi sḍis wayyuren n tannant n yiluɣma iserdasanen.
Mi d-yeffeɣ seg bu yikurdan, yuzen yiwet n tebrat i yimawlan-is, tayeḍ i tayri n tudert-is.
Yura tabrat n tayri i tin yebɣa ad yaɣ.

Seg wasmi teffeɣ tamurt ur d-tuɣal.
Seg wasmi neffeɣ tamurt ur d-nuɣal.

Aḍris-nni i ak-d-uzneɣ, ulseɣ-as taɣuri, ufiɣ kra n tucḍiwin.
Yules-as taɣuri i uḍris, yufa deg-s ddeqs n tucḍiwin.
Tules-as taɣuri i uḍris, tufa deg-s ddeqs n tucḍiwin.
Nules-as taɣuri i uḍris, nufa deg-s ddeqs n tucḍiwin.

Izem ad yeqqim d izem yeg Rebbi kksen-as waccaren.
Aydi diɣen ad yeqqim kan d aydi.
Yeqbeḥ, yezga yesseglaf am uydi.
Teqbeḥ, tezga tesseglaf am uydi.
Tqebḥeḍ, tezgiḍ tesseglafeḍ am uydi.
Tqebḥem, tezgiam tesseglafem am uydi.
Tqebḥemt, tezgiamt tesseglafemt am uydi.
Qebḥeḍ, zgiɣ sseglafeɣ am uydi.
Qebḥen, zgan sseglafen am uydi.
Qebḥent, zgant sseglafent am uydi.
Neqbeḥ, nezga nesseglaf am uydi.
Aydi ad yeqqim d aydi ɣas ma yetturebba gar yizmawen.
Yugi ad yefhem, yeqqur uqerruy-is.
Nekk ur t-ssineɣ ara wawal-a, ufiɣ-t deg yiwen n umawal.
Tugi ad tefhem, yeqqur uqerruy-is.
Nugi ad nefhem, qquren yiqerray-nneɣ.
Nugi ad nefhem, qquren yiqerray-nteɣ.
Tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ, yeqqur uqerruy-ik.
Tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ, yeqqur uqerruy-im.
Tugim ad tfehmem, qquren yiqerray-nken.
Tugimt ad tfehmemt, qquren yiqerray-nkent.
Ugiɣ ad fehmeɣ, yeqqur uqerruy-iw.
Ugin ad fehmen, qquren yiqerray-nsen.
Ugint ad fehment, qquren yiqerray-nsent.
Tugim ad tfehmem, qquren yiqerray-nwen.
Tugimt ad tfehmemt, qquren yiqerray-nwent.

A wi yufan.
Tegziḍ nezzeh izen i bɣiɣ ad sɛeddiɣ.
Tutlayt-nneɣ taqbaylit ala nekkni i tesɛa.
Win iwɛɛan kan kra ixdem-it i tutlayt taqbaylit akken ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger i as-d-heggan wid yekkaten ad tt-skuffren.
Tegzam nezzeh izen i bɣiɣ ad sɛeddiɣ.

Tuwi-d fell-aneɣ ad tt-nḥudd ma nebɣa ad d-teqqim.

Akud d yir netta.

Iḥemmel ad yemmeɣ ɣef wayla n medden.
Tḥemmel ad temmeɣ ɣef wayla n medden.
Nḥemmel ad yemmeɣ ɣef wayla n medden.

Ittaf iman-is mi ara yili d tin iḥemmel.
Tettaf iman-is mi ara tili d win tḥemmel.
Nettaf iman-nneɣ mi ara nili d wid nḥemmel.
Nettaf iman-nneɣ mi ara nili d tid nḥemmel.
Nettaf iman-nteɣ mi ara nili d wid nḥemmel.
Nettaf iman-nteɣ mi ara nili d tid nḥemmel.
Tettafeḍ iman-ik mi ara tiliḍ d tin tḥemmleḍ.
Tettafeḍ iman-im mi ara tiliḍ d win tḥemmleḍ.
Tettafem iman-nken mi ara tilim d tid tḥemmlem.
Tettafemt iman-nkent mi ara tilimt d wid tḥemmlemt.
Tettafem iman-nwen mi ara tilim d tid tḥemmlem.
Tettafemt iman-nwent mi ara tilimt d wid tḥemmlemt.
Ttafeɣ iman-iw mi ara iliɣ d tin ḥemmleɣ.
Ttafeɣ iman-iw mi ara iliɣ d win ḥemmleɣ.
Ttafeɣ iman-iw mi ara iliɣ d tid ḥemmleɣ.
Ttafeɣ iman-iw mi ara iliɣ d wid ḥemmleɣ.
Ttafen iman-nsen mi ara ilin d tid ḥemmlen.
Ttafent iman-nsent mi ara ilin d wid ḥemmlent.
Yettu iman-is, yedha-d d wiyiḍ.
Yedha-d d wiyiḍ, netta yettu iman-is.
Tedha-d d wiyiḍ, nettat tettu iman-is.
Nedha-d d wiyiḍ, nekkni nettu iman-nneɣ.
Nedha-d d wiyiḍ, nekkenti nettu iman-nteɣ.
Tedham-d d wiyiḍ, kunwi tettum iman-nken.
Tedhamt-d d wiyiḍ, kunemti tettumt iman-nkent.
Tedhamt-d d wiyiḍ, kunemti tettumt iman-nwent.
Tedham-d d wiyiḍ, kunwi tettum iman-nwen.
Tedhiḍ-d d wiyiḍ, kečč tettuḍ iman-ik.
Tedhiḍ-d d wiyiḍ, kemm tettuḍ iman-im.
Dhiɣ-d d wiyiḍ, nekk ttuɣ iman-iw.
Dhan-d d wiyiḍ, nutni ttun iman-nsen.
Dhant-d d wiyiḍ, nutenti ttunt iman-nsent.
Zwir deg yiman-ik.
Zwirem deg yiman-nken.
Zwiremt deg yiman-nkent.
Zwirem deg yiman-nwen.
Zwiremt deg yiman-nwent.
Zwiret deg yiman-nwen.
Zwiret deg yiman-nken.
Zwir deg yiman-im.
Nečča tiɣrit s yiwen n uɛekkaz.
Teččam tiɣrit s yiwen n uɛekkaz.
Teččamt tiɣrit s yiwen n uɛekkaz.
Ččan tiɣrit s yiwen n uɛekkaz.
Ččant tiɣrit s yiwen n uɛekkaz.
Amulli-nwen d ameggaz. S teɣzi n tudert-nwen.
S yiwen n uɛekkaz i nečča tiɣrit.
S yiwen n uɛekkaz i nečča tiyita.
S yiwen n uɛekkaz i teččam tiyita.
S yiwen n uɛekkaz i teččamt tiyita.
S yiwen n uɛekkaz i ččan tiyita.
S yiwen n uɛekkaz i ččant tiyita.
Akud ur yettqili yiwen, yettarra udem n umdan yecmet.
Lweqt ur yettqili yiwen, yettarra udem n umdan yecmet.
Akud, ur yecliɣ deg yiwen.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-tiniḍ.
Ihi kečč, ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-tiniḍ.
Ihi kemm, ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-tiniḍ.
Seg wasmi i d-yekker, ala ɣef yiman-is i yettkel.
Seg wasmi i d-tekker, ala ɣef yiman-is i tettkel.
Seg wasmi i d-nekker, ala ɣef yiman-nneɣ i nettkel.
Seg wasmi i d-nekker, ala ɣef yiman-nteɣ i nettkel.
Seg wasmi i d-tekkreḍ, ala ɣef yiman-ik i tettekleḍ.
Seg wasmi i d-tekkreḍ, ala ɣef yiman-im i tettekleḍ.
Seg wasmi i d-tekkrem, ala ɣef yiman-nken i tetteklem.
Seg wasmi i d-tekkremt, ala ɣef yiman-nkent i tetteklemt.
Seg wasmi i d-tekkremt, ala ɣef yiman-nwent i tetteklemt.
Seg wasmi i d-tekkrem, ala ɣef yiman-nwen i tetteklem.

Ɣaḍ kan iman-im a tinnat, twalaḍ amek i tuɣal ddunit.

Seg wasmi i d-kkren, ala ɣef yiman-nsen i tteklen.
Seg wasmi i d-kkrent, ala ɣef yiman-nsent i tteklent.

Yekkaw wul-is, itett deg uksum-is.

Mi nekcem s ussu ndel s uxellal.

Bɣiɣ mmi ad iɣer s tutlayt-is.
Bɣan arraw-nsen ad ɣren s tutlayt-nsen.
Bɣant arraw-nsent ad ɣren s tutlayt-nsen.
Bɣiɣ arraw-iw ad ɣren s tutlayt-nsen.
Bɣiɣ arraw-inu ad ɣren s tutlayt-nsen.
Bɣan mmi-tsen ad iɣer s tutlayt-is.

Tebɣa mmi-s ad iɣer s tutlayt-is.
Nebɣa mmi-tneɣ ad iɣer s tutlayt-is.

Tebɣam mmi-tken ad iɣer s tutlayt-is.

Tebɣa arraw-is ad ɣren s tutlayt-nsen.

Ddeqs n udfel i yewwten ussan-a.
Yekkat-d umeččim.
Qqaren-d : "Adfel, ddu-as ; lgerra, ddari-as".
Qqaren-d : "Adfel, ddum-as ; lgerra, ddarim-as".
Qqaren-d : "Adfel, ddumt-as ; lgerra, ddarimt-as".
Qqaren-d : "Adfel, ddut-as ; lgerra, ddarit-as".
Yewwet udfel, iɣumm tiwwura.
Ruḥen yirgazen ad rẓen asalu mi d-iwwet udfel.
Yewwet udfel, iberdan reglen.
Asemmiḍ n useggas-a ad yiqsiḥ.
Semmeḍ lḥal nezzeh.
Uḍan deg tegrest d isemmaḍen.
Semmḍit wuḍan deg tegrest.
Semmḍit wuḍan deg ccetwa.
Ad ilin waman aseggas-a mi d-iwwet udfel s waṭas.
Ma ulac aman, urǧin ad d-tili tudert.

Tewwet fell-as lgerra almi yeččuččex akken ma yella.
Tewwet fell-am lgerra almi teččuččxeḍ akken ma telliḍ.
Tewwet fell-ak lgerra almi teččuččxeḍ akken ma telliḍ.
Tewwet fell-aken lgerra almi teččuččxem akken ma tellam.
Tewwet fell-akent lgerra almi teččuččxemt akken ma tellamt.
Tewwet fell-awen lgerra almi teččuččxem akken ma tellam.

Tewwet fell-asent lgerra almi ččuččxent akken ma llant.

Tewwet fell-anteɣ lgerra almi neččuččex akken ma nella.

A wi ara d-yerren zik-nni.
A wi ara d-yerren temẓi iɛeddan.
Ssuref-iyi a uletma, ur d-teggri ara deg teqsiḍt n tucḍa imi llan wid ibeddlen tira n yimesli "B" s "V" netta yiwet n tira kan i yellan d tin n "B" nṭeq-it-id akken tebɣiḍ "b" neɣ "v" maca tira-ines d "b" acku llan kra n yimyagen deg talɣa-nsen taḥerfit neṭqen s "v" am jbu, rbu, cbu...( jvu, rvu, cbu) mi ara ftin deg wurmir ussid, imesli-nni n "v" yettruḥu, yettɣimi-d win n "b". Ur neqqar ara ijevvu, irevvu, icevvu maca neqqar ijebbu, irebbu, icebbu... ɣef waya i ilaq ad naru amyag s "b" ama deg talɣa-s taḥerfit ama deg talɣa-nniḍen.

Tettawim-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur teqqarem ara asefru.
Tettwennitem ala tugniwin, tettaǧǧam asefru ur t-teqqarem ara.
Tettawimt-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur teqqaremt ara asefru.
Tettawiḍ-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur teqqareḍ ara asefru.
Uɣaleɣ ur umineɣ ara ayen d-teqqar tenfalit " ar d-tessemɣi tyaziḍt", imi llant tyuzaḍ i yesɛan tuɣmas neɣ uglan.
Tettarra-aɣ tmara nxeddem ayen ur nebɣi.
Tikwal yelha cwiṭ n uqeṣṣer.
Tettawi-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur teqqar ara asefru.
Yettawi-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur yeqqar ara asefru.
Nettawi-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur neqqar ara asefru.
Ttawiɣ-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur qqareɣ ara asefru.
Ttawin-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur qqaren ara asefru.
Ttawint-d awal ala ɣef tugna, ur qqarent ara asefru.
Tettwennitemt ala tugniwin, tettaǧǧamt asefru ur t-teqqaremt ara.
Tettwenniteḍ ala tugniwin, tettaǧǧaḍ asefru ur t-teqqareḍ ara.
Tettwennit ala tugniwin, tettaǧǧa asefru ur t-teqqar ara.
Yettwennit ala tugniwin, yettaǧǧa asefru ur t-yeqqar ara.
Nettwennit ala tugniwin, nettaǧǧa asefru ur t-neqqar ara.
Ttwenniteɣ ala tugniwin, ttaǧǧaɣ asefru ur t-qqareɣ ara.
Ttwenniten ala tugniwin, ttaǧǧan asefru ur t-qqaren ara.
Ttwennitent ala tugniwin, ttaǧǧant asefru ur t-qqarent ara.
Tettarra-t tmara ixeddem ayen ur yebɣi.
Tettarra-tt tmara txeddem ayen ur tebɣi.
Tettarra-k tmara txeddmeḍ ayen ur tebɣiḍ.
Tettarra-kem tmara txeddmeḍ ayen ur tebɣiḍ.
Tettarra-ken tmara txeddmem ayen ur tebɣim.
Tettarra-kent tmara txeddmemt ayen ur tebɣimt.
Tettarra-iyi tmara xeddmeɣ ayen ur bɣiɣ.
Tettarra-ten tmara xeddmen ayen ur bɣin.
Tettarra-tent tmara xeddment ayen ur bɣint.

Ma ufiɣ-t amek ara m-t-in-azneɣ ?
Akken d tenniḍ ulac am tyemmat.
Tayemmat mačči kan d tin i aɣ-d-yeǧǧan, yemma d tamurt-iw, yemma d tutlayt-iw ,yemma d iẓuran-iw, yemma d kra akk i iyi-yerran d nekk, akka i lliɣ.
Nurar ddabax n uḍar kra n wakud akken.
Cciṭan d amdan i t-id-yesnulfan.
Iṭall umdan ɣer yiman-is, dɣa yesnulfa-d cciṭan.
Ur n-ttaseɣ ara, ad qqimeɣ da.
Ur nettas-n ara, ad neqqim da.
Ur d-ittas ara, ad yeqqim din.
Ur d-tettas ara, ad teqqim din.
Ur d-tettaseḍ ara, ad teqqimeḍ din.
Ur d-tettasem ara, ad teqqimem din.
Ur d-tettasemt ara, ad teqqimemt din.
Ur d-ttasen ara, ad qqimen din.
Ur d-ttasent ara, ad qqiment din.
Aṭas n yimssnaweni yuran ɣef tmetti taqbaylit.
Ad nuɣal diɣen ɣer din ?
Ulac fell-as, mebla lemzeyya.
21 deg furar, d ass agreɣlan n tutlayt n tyemmat.
Tameslayt-iw, ṭṭḍeɣ-tt-id ɣer yemma.
Tutlayt-iw, ṭṭḍeɣ-tt-id ɣer yemma.
Tutlayt-nsen, ṭṭḍen-tt-id ɣer tyemmatin-nsen.
Tutlayt-nsent, ṭṭḍent-tt-id ɣer tyemmatin-nsent.
Tutlayt-ik, teṭṭḍeḍ-tt-id ɣer yemma-k.
Tutlayt-im, teṭṭḍeḍ-tt-id ɣer yemma-m.
Tutlayt-is, teṭṭeḍ-itt-id ɣer yemma-s.
Tutlayt-is, yeṭṭeḍ-itt-id ɣer yemma-s.
Tutlayt-nneɣ, neṭṭeḍ-itt-id ɣer tyemmatin-nneɣ.
Tutlayt-nteɣ, neṭṭeḍ-itt-id ɣer tyemmatin-nteɣ.
Tutlayt-nken, teṭṭḍem-tt-id ɣer tyemmatin-nken.
Tutlayt-nken, teṭṭḍemt-tt-id ɣer tyemmatin-nkent.
Tutlayt-nwen, teṭṭḍem-tt-id ɣer tyemmatin-nwen.
Tutlayt-nwent, teṭṭḍemt-tt-id ɣer tyemmatin-nwent.
Tameslayt-ik, teṭṭḍeḍ-tt-id ɣer yemma-k.
Tameslayt-im, teṭṭḍeḍ-tt-id ɣer yemma-m.
Tameslayt-is, yeṭṭeḍ-itt-id ɣer yemma-s.
Tameslayt-is, teṭṭeḍ-itt-id ɣer yemma-s.

Ala tujjya i am-nessaram.

Win issusfen s igenni, ala ɣef wudem-is ara d-ɣlint.
Tin issusfen s igenni, ala ɣef wudem-is ara d-ɣlint.
Wid issusfen s igenni, ala ɣef wudmawen-nsen ara d-ɣlint.
Tid issusfen s igenni, ala ɣef wudmawen-nsent ara d-ɣlint.
Ssusef s igenni, ad d-ɣlint ɣef wudem-im.
Ssusfem s igenni, ad d-ɣlint ɣef wudmawen-nwen.
Ssusfem s igenni, ad d-ɣlint ɣef wudmawen-nken.

Ssusfemt s igenni, ad d-ɣlint ɣef wudmawen-nkent.
Ssusfet s igenni, ad d-ɣlint ɣef wudmawen-nken.

Yeqqur uqerruy-ik, kečč iqemcen allen-ik ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-im, kemm iqemcen allen-im ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-is, netta iqemcen allen-is ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-is, nettat iqemcen allen-is ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-nsen, nutni iqemcen allen-nsen ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-nsent, nutenti iqemcen allen-nsent ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-nken, kunwi iqemcen allen-nken ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-nkent, kunemti iqemcen allen-nkent ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-nwen, kunwi iqemcen allen-nwen ɣef tidet.
Yeqqur uqerruy-nwent, kunemti iqemcen allen-nwent ɣef tidet.

Tid yessnen ad ssexdment akken kan iwata iles-nsent, ur tufiḍ d acu ara tent-yaɣen.
Tin yessnen ad tessexdem akken kan iwata iles-is, ur tufiḍ d acu ara as-d-yawi deg wayen ur nelhi.

Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen bɣiɣ.

Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen yelhan.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen igerrzen.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen issefraḥen.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udmawen-nneɣ.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udmawen-nteɣ.

Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udmawen-nwent.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udmawen-nken.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udmawen-nkent.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udmawen-nsen.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udmawen-nsent.

Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udem-inu.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udem-ik.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udem-inek.
Ansuf s useggas amaynut ara d-yeglun yid-s ala s wayen ara d-yerren taḍsa s udem-im.

Ma yella yiwen yessaweḍ ad yaru tutalayt taɛrabt akken i ilaq, lmeɛna-s yessen ilugan n tira n taɛrabt, ma yessen tafransist, yessen ilugan n tefransist...
Ma tella yiwet tessaweḍ ad taru tutalayt taɛrabt akken i ilaq, lmeɛna-s tessen ilugan n tira n taɛrabt, ma tessen tafransist, tessen ilugan n tefransist...
Ihi, ma yebɣa yiwen ad yaru tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-as ad yissin ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma tebɣa yiwet ad taru tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-as ad tissin ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma nebɣa ad naru tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-aneɣ ad nissin ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma nebɣa ad naru tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-anteɣ ad nissin ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma tebɣam ad tarum tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-aken ad tissinem ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma tebɣamt ad tarumt tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-akent ad tissinemt ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma tebɣam ad tarum tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-awen ad tissinem ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma tebɣamt ad tarumt tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-awent ad tissinemt ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma tebɣiḍ ad taruḍ tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-ak ad tissineḍ ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma tebɣiḍ ad taruḍ tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-am ad tissineḍ ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma bɣiɣ ad aruɣ tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-i ad issineɣ ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma bɣan ad arun tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-asen ad issinen ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.
Ihi, ma bɣant ad arunt tutlayt taqbaylit akken i iwata, tuwi-d fell-asent ad issinent ilugan n tira n teqbaylit.

Ma ur kem-ufiɣ ara deg tegnit n ṭṭiq, wissen melmi ara kem-afeɣ.
Ma ur ken-ufiɣ ara deg tegnit n ṭṭiq, wissen melmi ara ken-afeɣ.
Ma ur kent-ufiɣ ara deg tegnit n ṭṭiq, wissen melmi ara kent-afeɣ.
Ma ur ten-ufiɣ ara deg tegnit n ṭṭiq, wissen melmi ara ten-afeɣ.
Ma ur tent-ufiɣ ara deg tegnit n ṭṭiq, wissen melmi ara tent-afeɣ.
Ma ur t-ufiɣ ara deg tegnit n ṭṭiq, wissen melmi ara t-afeɣ.
Ma ur tt-ufiɣ ara deg tegnit n ṭṭiq, wissen melmi ara tt-afeɣ.

Yettɛedday-d ɣef tala akken ad d-issew lmal-is mi ara d-yuɣal seg tkessawt.
Tettɛedday-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tessew lmal-is mi ara d-tuɣal seg tkessawt.
Nettɛedday-d ɣef tala akken ad d-nessew lmal-nneɣ mi ara d-nuɣal seg tkessawt.
Nettɛedday-d ɣef tala akken ad d-nessew lmal-nteɣ mi ara d-nuɣal seg tkessawt.
Tettɛeddayeḍ-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tessweḍ lmal-ik mi ara d-tuɣaleḍ seg tkessawt.
Tettɛeddayeḍ-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tessweḍ lmal-im mi ara d-tuɣaleḍ seg tkessawt.
Tettɛeddayem-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tesswem lmal-nken mi ara d-tuɣalem seg tkessawt.
Tettɛeddayemt-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tesswemt lmal-nkent mi ara d-tuɣalemt seg tkessawt.
Tettɛeddayem-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tesswem lmal-nwen mi ara d-tuɣalem seg tkessawt.
Tettɛeddayemt-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tesswemt lmal-nwent mi ara d-tuɣalemt seg tkessawt.
Ttɛeddayeɣ-d ɣef tala akken ad d-ssweɣ lmal-iw mi ara d-uɣaleɣ seg tkessawt.
Ttɛeddayeɣ-d ɣef tala akken ad d-ssweɣ lmal-inu mi ara d-uɣaleɣ seg tkessawt.
Ttɛeddayen-d ɣef tala akken ad d-sswen lmal-nsen mi ara d-uɣalen seg tkessawt.
Ttɛeddayent-d ɣef tala akken ad d-sswent lmal-nsent mi ara d-uɣalent seg tkessawt.
Tettɛeddayeḍ-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tessweḍ lmal-inek mi ara d-tuɣaleḍ seg tkessawt.
Tettɛeddayeḍ-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tessweḍ lmal-inem mi ara d-tuɣaleḍ seg tkessawt.
Yettɛedday-d ɣef tala akken ad d-issew lmal-ines mi ara d-yuɣal seg tkessawt.
Tettɛedday-d ɣef tala akken ad d-tessew lmal-ines mi ara d-tuɣal seg tkessawt.
Swiɣ aman almi qebreɣ.
Ad sweɣ aman alma qebreɣ.
Ad swen aman alma qebren.
Ad swent aman alma qebrent.
Ad isew aman alma yeqber.
Ad tsew aman alma teqber.
Ad nsew aman alma neqber.
Ad tesweḍ aman alma tqebreḍ.
Ad teswem aman alma tqebrem.
Ad teswemt aman alma tqebremt.
Swiɣ-k a qeḍran i ddwa.
Swan-k a qeḍran i ddwa.
Swant-k a qeḍran i ddwa.
Yeswa-k a qeḍran i ddwa.
Teswa-k a qeḍran i ddwa.
Neswa-k a qeḍran i ddwa.
Qeḍran ma teswam-t d ddwa.
Qeḍran ma teswamt-t d ddwa.
Qeḍran ma teswiḍ-t d ddwa.
Qeḍran ma swiɣ-t d ddwa.
Qeḍran ma swan-t d ddwa.
Qeḍran ma swant-t d ddwa.
Qeḍran ma teswa-t d ddwa.
Qeḍran ma yeswa-t d ddwa.
Qeḍran ma neswa-t d ddwa.
Ččiɣ, swiɣ, ur tufiḍ d acu i iyi-ixuṣṣen.
Ččan, swan, ur tufiḍ d acu i ten-ixuṣṣen.
Ččant, swant, ur tufiḍ d acu i tent-ixuṣṣen.
Yečča, yeswa, ur tufiḍ d acu i t-ixuṣṣen.
Tečča, teswa, ur tufiḍ d acu i tt-ixuṣṣen.
Nečča, neswa, ur tufiḍ d acu i aɣ-ixuṣṣen.
Teččam, teswam, ur tufiḍ d acu i ken-ixuṣṣen.
Teččamt, teswamt, ur tufiḍ d acu i kent-ixuṣṣen.
Teččiḍ, teswiḍ, ur tufiḍ d acu i k-ixuṣṣen.
Teččiḍ, teswiḍ, ur tufiḍ d acu i kem-ixuṣṣen.

Teffud tilelli akken i teffud aman.

Ffudeɣ tilelli akken i ffudeɣ aman.
Ffuden tilelli akken i ffuden aman.
Ffudent tilelli akken i ffudent aman.

Yiwen ur yezmir ad yidir mebla aman.

Taɣaḍt-ik, tawwet-itt lfedra.
Mmi-s n taɣaḍt, yečč-it wuccen.
Rran-as asadel i yiɣid akken ur iteṭṭeḍ ara yemma-s.
Ttarran acemṃal i taɣaḍt akken ur tt-teṭṭḍen ara warraw-is.
Taɣaḍt-iw, turew-d iɣid d tɣideḍt.
Taɣaḍt-iw tcekkeḍ.
Taɣaḍt-iw tetteẓẓeg aṭas.
Taɣaḍt-iw tḥawel.
Imi k-ssneɣ amek i tgiḍ, win yebɣun yawi-k.
Imi k-ssneɣ amek i tgiḍ, tin yebɣun tawi-k.

Yiwet n tidet i yellan, ulac snat.
Tidet ur tesɛi asget imi yiwet kan i yellan.
Yiwen n umḍan i tesɛa tidet, d asuf.
Lekdubat ala nutni, ma d tidet ala yiwet.
Tikerkas ala nutenti, ma d tidet ala yiwet.
Lekdubat ala nutni, ma d tidet ala nettat.
Tikerkas ala nutenti, ma d tidet ala nettat.
Lekdeb ur iteddu d bu tidet.
Tidet ma tɣab, lekdeb ittaf iman-is.
Lekdeb ur ittezzi ara akk anda i tella tidet.
Tidet tettsewwiq yal ass ma d lekdeb yiwen n wass.
Lekdeb yettsewwiq yiwen n wass, ma d tidet yal ass.
Tikerkas ttsewwiqent yiwen n wass, ma d tidet yal ass.
Tidet tettsewwiq yal ass ma d tikerkas yiwen n wass.

Tikkelt tas-d, tikkelt teqqim.

Tikkelt asent-d, tikkelt qqiment.

Tikkelt nas-n, tikkelt neqqim.

Bɣant ad arunt asefru ara d-yinin ayen urǧin d-nnant.

Tin yeččuren d iɣilifen, ur teggan ara uḍan-is.
Wid yeččuren d iɣilifen, ur gganen ara uḍan-nsen.
Tid yeččuren d iɣilifen, ur gganent ara uḍan-nsent.
Win yeččuren d urfan, ur as-d-ittas ara yiḍes.
Win yeččuren d urfan, ur as-d-ittrusu ara yiḍes.
Tin yeččuren d urfan, ur as-d-ittas ara yiḍes.
Tin yeččuren d urfan, ur as-d-ittrusu ara yiḍes.
Wid yeččuren d urfan, ur asen-d-ittrusu ara yiḍes.
Wid yeččuren d urfan, ur asen-d-ittas ara yiḍes.
Tid yeččuren d urfan, ur asent-d-ittas ara yiḍes.
Tid yeččuren d urfan, ur asent-d-ittrusu ara yiḍes.

Ma yid-m yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, err-it yelha.

Ma yid-wen yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, rrem-t yelha.

Ma yid-wen yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, rret-t yelha.
Ma yid-ken yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, rret-t yelha.
Ddu d yiman-ik s tfenṭazit, tnekreḍ kra ur neffiɣ fell-ak.
Ddum d yiman-nken s tfenṭazit, tnekrem kra ur neffiɣ fell-aken.
Ddumt d yiman-nkent s tfenṭazit, tnekretm kra ur neffiɣ fell-akent.
Ddut d yiman-nken s tfenṭazit, tnekrem kra ur neffiɣ fell-aken.
Ddum d yiman-nwen s tfenṭazit, tnekrem kra ur neffiɣ fell-awen.
Ddut d yiman-nwen s tfenṭazit, tnekrem kra ur neffiɣ fell-awen.
Ddumt d yiman-nwent s tfenṭazit, tnekremt kra ur neffiɣ fell-awent.
Ma yid-i yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, ttarraɣ-t yelha.
Ma yid-sen yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, ttarran-t yelha.
Ma yid-sent yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, ttarrant-t yelha.
Ma yid-s yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, yettarra-t yelha.
Ma yid-s yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, tettarra-t yelha.

Ma yid-nteɣ yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, nettarra-t yelha.
Ma yid-k yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, tettarraḍ-t yelha.
Ma yid-m yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, tettarraḍ-t yelha.
Ma yid-ken yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, tettarram-t yelha.
Ma yid-kent yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, tettarramt-t yelha.
Ma yid-wen yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, tettarram-t yelha.
Ma yid-went yeḍra-d kra n wayen n diri, tettarramt-t yelha.

Tettnadi ɣef telwit ur tt-tufi.
Nettnadi ɣef telwit ur tt-nufi.
Tettnadiḍ ɣef telwit ur tt-tufiḍ.

Tettnadimt ɣef telwit ur tt-tufimt.
Ttnadiɣ ɣef telwit ur tt-ufiɣ.
Ttnadin ɣef telwit ur tt-ufin.
Ttnadint ɣef telwit ur tt-ufint.

Kečč d aẓawali yerna d lefḥel.
Netta d aẓawali yerna d lefḥel.
Tura ayen yesɛa lǧib-ik i teswiḍ.
Tura ayen yesɛa lǧib-im i teswiḍ.

Tura ayen sɛan leǧyub-nwent i teswamt.

Tura ayen sɛan leǧyub-nkent i teswamt.

Nwant ɛeddi kan ad taruḍ kra n tutlayt ma yella ur tessineḍ ara ilugan-is n tira.

Tenwiḍ ɛeddi kan ad taruḍ kra n tutlayt ma yella ur tessineḍ ara ilugan-is n tira.

Tceɣleḍ d wiyiḍ, teǧǧiḍ iman-ik.
Tceɣleḍ d wiyiḍ, teǧǧiḍ iman-im.
Necɣel d wiyiḍ, neǧǧa iman-nteɣ.

Tceɣlemt d wiyiḍ, teǧǧamt iman-nkent.

Tceɣlemt d wiyiḍ, teǧǧamt iman-nwent.

Ur tufiḍ yiwen ara kem-ikemzen anda i kem-iɣeẓẓa uɛrur-im.

Mazal ur d-ukiɣ ara.

Mi d-yuki, yufa-d liḥala mačči akken i tt-yeǧǧa.
Mi d-tuki, tufa-d liḥala mačči akken i tt-teǧǧa.
Mi d-nuki, nufa-d liḥala mačči akken i tt-neǧǧa.

Ur asen-d-iban ara akken ad t-akzen.
Ur asent-d-iban ara akken ad t-akzent.
Ur as-d-iban ara akken ad t-yakez.
Ur as-d-iban ara akken ad t-takez.
Ur aɣ-d-iban ara akken ad t-nakez.
Ur ak-d-iban ara akken ad t-takzeḍ.
Ur am-d-iban ara akken ad t-takzeḍ.
Ur aken-d-iban ara akken ad t-takzem.
Ur akent-d-iban ara akken ad t-takzemt.
Ur awen-d-iban ara akken ad t-takzem.
Ur awent-d-iban ara akken ad t-takzemt.
Ur ak-d-banen ara akken ad ten-takzeḍ.
Ur am-d-banen ara akken ad ten-takzeḍ.
Ur ak-d-banent ara akken ad tent-takzeḍ.
Ur am-d-banent ara akken ad tent-takzeḍ.
Ur iyi-d-banen ara akken ad ten-akzeɣ.
Ur iyi-d-banent ara akken ad tent-akzeɣ.
Ur as-d-banen ara akken ad ten-yakez.
Ur as-d-banent ara akken ad tent-yakez.
Ur as-d-banen ara akken ad ten-takez.
Ur as-d-banent ara akken ad tent-takez.
Ur aɣ-d-banen ara akken ad ten-nakez.
Ur aɣ-d-banenr ara akken ad tenr-nakez.
Ur asent-d-banent ara akken ad tent-akzent.
Ur asen-d-banen ara akken ad ten-akzen.
Ur asen-d-banent ara akken ad ten-akzent.
Ur asent-d-banen ara akken ad tent-akzen.
Tiɣirdemt d taɛdawt n Rebbi.
Tiɣirdemt teqqes agru iɣef terkeb deg tlemmast n temda ɣas teẓra ad ɣerqen i sin yid-sen.
Truḥ tzizwit ad as-tini win qqseɣ ad yemmet, teɛreq, tenna-as win qqseɣ ad mmteɣ.
Nnan-as i tzizwit : "D awal amezwaru i iqebbel Rebbi".
Yenṭeq yiwen n utwul yenna-as :"Nekkni s lewḥuc..."
Tiɣirdemt, akka i tt-id-yexleq Rebbi, ilaq ad teqqes.
Ilaq ad teqqes, ma ulac ur tettili ara bxir.
Seksu i d-nawel yemma ẓid.
Seksu i d-nawel yemma d aẓidan.
Seksu i d-tettnawal yemma ẓid.
Seksu i d-tettnawal yemma d aẓidan.
Win iɛerḍen seksu n tmeɣra, yettaf-it ẓid.
Tin iɛerḍen seksu n tmeɣra, tettaf-it ẓid.
Tid iɛerḍen seksu n tmeɣra, ttafent-t ẓid.
Wid iɛerḍen seksu n tmeɣra, ttafen-t ẓid.
Wid iɛerḍen seksu n tmeɣra, ttafen-t d aẓidan.
Tid iɛerḍen seksu n tmeɣra, ttafent-t d aẓidan.
Tin iɛerḍen seksu n tmeɣra, tettaf-it d aẓidan.
Win iɛerḍen seksu n tmeɣra, yettaf-it d aẓidan.
Azekka ad bduɣ alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Ussan-a ad bduɣ alqaḍ n uzemmur, wissen ma ad stufuɣ.
Azekka ad bdun alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Azekka ad bdunt alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Azekka ad yebdu alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Azekka ad tebdu alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Azekka ad nebdu alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Azekka ad tebduḍ alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Azekka ad tebdum alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Azekka ad tebduḍmt alqaḍ n uzemmur.
Ur ḥmmilen ara ad leqḍen azemmur deg lqaɛa, ḥemmlen ad t-id-cerwen.
Ur ḥmmilent ara ad leqḍent azemmur deg lqaɛa, ḥemmlent ad t-id-cerwent.
Ur iḥmmil ara ad yelqeḍ azemmur deg lqaɛa, iḥemmel ad t-id-icrew.
Ur teḥmmil ara ad telqeḍ azemmur deg lqaɛa, tḥemmel ad t-id-tecrew.
Ur neḥmmil ara ad nelqeḍ azemmur deg lqaɛa, nḥemmel ad t-id-necrew.
Ur teḥmmileḍ ara ad tleqḍeḍ azemmur deg lqaɛa, tḥemmleḍ ad t-id-tcerweḍ.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-sɛeddiɣ deg lexla.
Mi ara d-uɣaleɣ tameddit ad ɛerḍeɣ ad xedmeɣ ayen ara d-tefkeḍ ma ur ɛyiɣ ara.
Ur teḥmmilem ara ad tleqḍem azemmur deg lqaɛa, tḥemmlem ad t-id-tcerwem.
Ur teḥmmilemt ara ad tleqḍemt azemmur deg lqaɛa, tḥemmlemt ad t-id-tcerwemt.
Nniɣ-am ma bdiɣ kra, ilaq ad t-fakkeɣ.
Ur ḥmmileɣ ara ad leqḍeɣ azemmur deg lqaɛa, ḥemmleɣ ad t-id-cerweɣ.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-sɛeddin deg lexla.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-sɛeddint deg lexla.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-yesɛeddi deg lexla.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-tesɛeddi deg lexla.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-nesɛeddi deg lexla.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-tesɛeddiḍ deg lexla.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-tesɛeddim deg lexla.
Ass akken ma yella ad t-tesɛeddimt deg lexla.
Ma bdiɣ kra, ilaq ad t-fakkeɣ.
Ma bdan kra, ilaq ad t-fakken.
Ma bdant kra, ilaq ad t-fakkent.
Ma yebda kra, ilaq ad t-ifakk.
Ma tebda kra, ilaq ad t-tfakk.
Ma nebda kra, ilaq ad t-nfakk.
Ma tebdam kra, ilaq ad t-tfakkem.
Ma tebdamt kra, ilaq ad t-tfakkemt.
Alqaḍ n uzemmur yesseɛyaw.
Yesseɛyaw ulqaḍ n uzemmur.
Uliɣ ɣef usellum, cerweɣ-d azemmur.
Ulin ɣef yisellumen, cerwen-d azemmur.
Ulint ɣef yisellumen, cerwent-d azemmur.
Yuli ɣef usellum, icrew-d azemmur.
Tuli ɣef usellum, tecrew-d azemmur.
Nuli ɣef yisellumen, necrew-d azemmur.
Tuliḍ ɣef usellum, tcerweḍ-d azemmur.
Tulim ɣef yisellumen, tcerwem-d azemmur.
Tulimt ɣef yisellumen, tcerwemt-d azemmur.
Tebɣa ad as-aruɣ asefru s tefransist.
Yebɣa ad as-aruɣ asefru s tefransist.
Yeẓẓa tazemmurt akken ad ɣellten warraw-is.
Neẓẓa tizemmrin akken ad ɣellten warraw-nneɣ.
Ẓẓan tizemmrin akken ad ɣellten warraw-nsen.
Win yebɣan ad iɣellet tikkelt deg useggas, yezreɛ irden.
Win yebɣan ad iɣellet yal aseggas, yeẓẓu isekla.
Win yebɣan ad iɣellet i lebda, yesselmed tarwa-s.
Tin yebɣan ad iɣellet tikkelt deg useggas, tezreẓ irden.
Wid yebɣan ad ɣellten tikkelt deg useggas, zerɛen irden.
Tid yebɣan ad ɣelltent tikkelt deg useggas, zerɛent irden.
Tin yebɣan ad ɣellet yal aseggas, teẓẓu isekla.
Wid yebɣan ad ɣellten yal aseggas, ẓẓun isekla.
Tid yebɣan ad ɣelltent yal aseggas, ẓẓunt isekla.
Tin yebɣan ad tɣellet i lebda, tesselmed tarwa-s.
Tid yebɣan ad ɣelltent i lebda, sslemdent tarwa-nsent.
Wid yebɣan ad ɣellten i lebda, sslemden tarwa-nsen.

Win yesɛan tafrit-is terked, fell-as yettrusu-d yiḍes.

Tid yesɛan tafrit-nsent terked, fell-asent yettrusu-d yiḍes.

Mi ara yeṭṭes, yesxeṛxuṛ.
Mi ara teṭṭes, tesxeṛxuṛ.
Mi ara neṭṭes, nesxeṛxuṛ.

Mi ara teṭṭsem, tesxeṛxuṛem.
Mi ara teṭṭsemt, tesxeṛxuṛemt.

Mi ara ṭṭsen, sxeṛxuṛen.
Mi ara ṭṭsent, sxeṛxuṛent.

Mi i tt-yif, isuffeɣ-as-d aẓemmum seg tismin.
Mi i k-yif, isuffeɣ-ak-d aẓemmum seg tismin.
Mi i kem-yif, isuffeɣ-am-d aẓemmum seg tismin.
Mi i ken-yif, isuffeɣ-aken-d aẓemmum seg tismin.
Mi i kent-yif, isuffeɣ-akent-d aẓemmum seg tismin.
Mi i ken-yif, isuffeɣ-awen-d aẓemmum seg tismin.

Imi leqqḍent azemmur, imekli tettent-t deg lexla.
Mi nruḥ ad nelqeḍ azemmur, nuwi aɛwin yid-neɣ.
Mi nruḥ ad nelqeḍ azemmur, nuwi aɛwin yid-nteɣ.
Mi iruḥ ad yelqeḍ azemmur, yuwi aɛwin yid-s.
Mi truḥ ad telqeḍ azemmur, tuwi aɛwin yid-s.
Ad isseɣzef kan Rebbi deg tudert-nneɣ.

Mi truḥem ad tleqḍem azemmur, tuwim aɛwin yid-wen.
Mi truḥemt ad tleqḍemt azemmur, tuwimt aɛwin yid-went.

Mi ruḥen ad leqḍeṇ azemmur, uwin aɛwin yid-sen.
Mi ruḥent ad leqḍeṇt azemmur, uwint aɛwin yid-sent.

D ayen igerrzen. Maɛna kra n wungal yelhan i d-iteffɣen ur aɣ-d-ittaweḍ ara ad t-nɣer yeg Rebbi dagi i d-yeffeɣ.
Yenna-as winna i win yettẓallan : Azul a Muḥend ! Winna ur as-d-yerri ara imi yettẓalla. Iɛawed-as : Azul a Muḥend ! Kif kif, ur as-d-yerri ara i sslam-is. Mi ifukk taẓallit yeɛna-t-id winna, yenna-as s cwiṭ n zɛaf : Acimi ur iyi-d-terriḍ mi sselmeɣ fell-aḳ ? Teẓriḍ a Qasi, nekk ma ttẓallaɣ, Rebbi ur t-ssineɣ ara.
Tecṛeɛ arquqen-is, wissen texleɛ neɣ tebɣa ad aɣ-tessexleɛ.
Teldi arquqen-is, wissen texleɛ neɣ tebɣa ad aɣ-tessexleɛ.
27 dujember 1957–27 dujember 2020, 63 n yiseggassen segmi nɣan allaɣ n tegrawla n tmurt Zzayer.
Awalen i d-yeǧǧa Ɛeban ttsuɣun yis-sen igrawliwen n wass-a.
Nezɛef asmi nɣan Ɛebban, nnan-d yeɣli deg ugni n yiseɣ. Seg yimiren i d-iban ubrid anda ara teffeɣ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad aɣ-yessexleɛ.
Teldiḍ arquqen-ik, wissen txelɛeḍ neɣ tebɣiḍ ad aɣ-tessxelɛeḍ.
Teldiḍ arquqen-im, wissen txelɛeḍ neɣ tebɣiḍ ad aɣ-tessxelɛeḍ.
Ldiɣ arquqen-iw, wissen xelɛeɣ neɣ bɣiɣ ad ten-ssxelɛeɣ.
Ldiɣ arquqen-iw, wissen xelɛeɣ neɣ bɣiɣ ad tent-ssxelɛeɣ.
Ldiɣ arquqen-iw, wissen xelɛeɣ neɣ bɣiɣ ad ken-ssxelɛeɣ.
Ldiɣ arquqen-iw, wissen xelɛeɣ neɣ bɣiɣ ad kent-ssxelɛeɣ.
Ldiɣ arquqen-iw, wissen xelɛeɣ neɣ bɣiɣ ad t-ssxelɛeɣ.
Ldiɣ arquqen-iw, wissen xelɛeɣ neɣ bɣiɣ ad tt-ssxelɛeɣ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad iyi-yessexleɛ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad k-yessexleɛ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad kem-yessexleɛ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad ken-yessexleɛ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad kent-yessexleɛ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad ten-yessexleɛ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad tent-yessexleɛ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad t-yessexleɛ.
Yeldi arquqen-is, wissen yexleɛ neɣ yebɣa ad tt-yessexleɛ.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad nadi fell-asen, ad ten-afeɣ, ad am-ten-in-azneɣ.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad nadin fell-asen, ad ten-afen, ad am-ten-in-aznen.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad nadint fell-asen, ad ten-afent, ad am-ten-in-aznent.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad inadi fell-asen, ad ten-yaf, ad am-ten-in-yazen.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad tnadi fell-asen, ad ten-taf, ad am-ten-in-tazen.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad nnadi fell-asen, ad ten-naf, ad am-ten-in-nazen.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad tnadiḍ fell-asen, ad ten-tafeḍ, ad iyi-ten-in-tazneḍ.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad tnadim fell-asen, ad ten-tafem, ad iyi-ten-in-taznem.
Lekwaɣeḍ-nni, ad tnadimt fell-asen, ad ten-tafemt, ad iyi-ten-in-taznemt.
Akka i d ddunit, wid yeččuren d tikta, ɣur-sen ulac tadrimt, wid yesɛan tadrimt, tikta ɣur-sen ulac.
Mazal kra n wussan ad d-yekcem useggas amaynut.
Mazal yiwen n yimalas ad d-yekcem useggas amaynut.
Ruḥ ay aseggas 2020, awer d-tezziḍ.

Truḥ, awer d-tezzi.

Ruḥent, awer d-zzint.

Truḥ, awer d-tuɣal.

Ruḥent, awer d-uɣalent.

Awal uwiɣ-t-id ɣef yiwen n umarir n ddabax n uḍar i ḥemmlen deg ddunit akken ma tella, qqaren-as Zidan neɣ Zizu, laṣel-ines d Aqbayli.
Ḥṣu deg tmurt n Leqbayel, ahat yiwen ur yettawi deg wul-is tamurt n Fransa acku deg tmurt n Leqbayel texdem axeṣṣar (54-62).
D tamara i yerran ilmeẓyen-nneɣ ttinigen ɣer tmurt n Fransa imi tamurt-nneɣ ɣas teččur d lerbeḥ ur tezmir ara i warraw-is acku imḍebbren-is ur d-dhin ara d ugdud, dhan-d d tukerḍa-ines.

Ma yuḍen ilaq ad iwali amejjay.
Ma tuḍen ilaq ad twali ṭṭbib.
Ma nuḍen ilaq ad nwali ṭṭbib.

Nutni, yuwi-ten wasif, ttnadin ad glun yis-neɣ.
Xeddmeɣ kan ayen iwimi zemreɣ.
Kra n win i ixeddmen i teqbaylit, ixeddem mebla lemzeyya.
Linda d yiwet n tmeɣnast ur nettaǧǧa ara ayla-s ad yettwarkeḍ.
Kra n win i ixeddmen i teqbaylit, ixeddem mebla kra n lemzeyya.
Kra n tin i ixeddmen i teqbaylit, txeddem mebla kra n lemzeyya.
Kra n wid i ixeddmen i teqbaylit, xeddmen mebla kra n lemzeyya.
Kra n tid i ixeddmen i teqbaylit, xeddment mebla kra n lemzeyya.
Mačči d win yuklalen akken ad d-nawi awal fell-as kra ara yekk yiḍ.
Nutenti, yuwi-tent wasif, ttnadint ad glunt yis-neɣ.
Nekk, yuwi-iyi wasif, ttnadiɣ ad gluq yis-wen.
Netta, yuwi-t wasif, yettnadi ad yeglu yis-neɣ.
Nettat, yuwi-tt wasif, tettnadi ad teglu yis-neɣ.
Nekkni, yuwi-aɣ wasif, nettnadi ad neglu yis-wen.
Kečč, yuwi-k wasif, tettnadiḍ ad tegluḍ yis-neɣ.
Kemm, yuwi-kem wasif, tettnadiḍ ad tegluḍ yis-neɣ.
Kunwi, yuwi-ken wasif, tettnadim ad teglum yis-neɣ.
Kunemti, yuwi-kent wasif, tettnadimt ad teglumt yis-neɣ.

Mačči d tid yuklalen akken ad d-nawi awal fell-asent kra ara yekk yiḍ.

Tuwi-d fell-aneɣ, taqbaylit ad tt-nettmeslay u ad tt-naru diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-anteɣ, taqbaylit ad tt-nettmeslay u ad tt-naru diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-as, taqbaylit ad tt-yettmeslay u ad tt-yaru diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-as, taqbaylit ad tt-tettmeslay u ad tt-taru diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-ak, taqbaylit ad tt-tettmeslayeḍ u ad tt-taruḍ diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-am, taqbaylit ad tt-tettmeslayeḍ u ad tt-taruḍ diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-aken, taqbaylit ad tt-tettmeslayem u ad tt-tarum diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-akent, taqbaylit ad tt-tettmeslayemt u ad tt-tarumt diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-awen, taqbaylit ad tt-tettmeslayem u ad tt-tarum diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-awent, taqbaylit ad tt-tettmeslayemt u ad tt-tarumt diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-i, taqbaylit ad tt-ttmeslayeɣ u ad tt-aruɣ diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-asen, taqbaylit ad tt-ttmeslayen u ad tt-arun diɣen.
Tuwi-d fell-asent, taqbaylit ad tt-ttmeslayent u ad tt-arunt diɣen.
Issin ad taruḍ tutlayt-ik.
Issin ad taruḍ tutlayt-im.
Issinem ad tarum tutlayt-nken.
Issinemt ad tarumt tutlayt-nkent.
Issinem ad tarum tutlayt-nwen.
Issinemt ad tarumt tutlayt-nwent.
Issinet ad tarum tutlayt-nwen.
Issinet ad tarum tutlayt-nken.
Allal-a d amextaf, yis-s nzewwi-d azemmur neɣ nlewwi-d iniɣman.
Nferres tazemmurt s lemqes akked tmenččart.
Aseggas-im d win n twacult-im d ameggaz. Ad am-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣiḍ.
Aseggas-ik d win n twacult-ik d ameggaz. Ad ak-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣiḍ.
Aseggas-nwen d win n twaculin-nwen d ameggaz. Ad awen-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣam.
Aseggas-nken d win n twaculin-nken d ameggaz. Ad aken-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣam.
Aseggas-nkent d win n twaculin-nkent d ameggaz. Ad akent-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣamt.
Aseggas-nwent d win n twaculin-nwent d ameggaz. Ad awent-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣamt.
Aseggas-nsen d win n twaculin-nsen d ameggaz. Ad asen-d-yeglu ala s wayen i bɣan.
Aseggas-nsent d win n twaculin-nsent d ameggaz. Ad asent-d-yeglu ala s wayen i bɣant.
Aseggas-iw d win n twacult-iw d ameggaz. Ad iyi-d-yeglu ala s wayen i bɣiɣ.
Aseggas-nneɣ d win n twaculin-nneɣ d ameggaz. Ad aɣ-d-yeglu ala s wayen i nebɣa.
Aseggas-nteɣ d win n twaculin-nteɣ d ameggaz. Ad aɣ-d-yeglu ala s wayen i nebɣa.
Aseggas-is d win n twaculin-is d ameggaz. Ad as-d-yeglu ala s wayen i yebɣa.
Aseggas-ines d win n twaculin-ines d ameggaz. Ad as-d-yeglu ala s wayen i yebɣa.
Aseggas-is d win n twaculin-is d ameggaz. Ad as-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣa.
Aseggas-ines d win n twaculin-ines d ameggaz. Ad as-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣa.
Aseggas-inu d win n twacult-inu d ameggaz. Ad iyi-d-yeglu ala s wayen i bɣiɣ.
Aseggas-inek d win n twacult-inek d ameggaz. Ad ak-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣiḍ.
Aseggas-inem d win n twacult-inem d ameggaz. Ad am-d-yeglu ala s wayen i tebɣiḍ.

Yuǧǧew-d aqenṭar n zzit n uzemmur.
Ass-a, nelqeḍ aqenṭar n uzemmur.
Yuwi azemmur-is ɣer lemɛinesṛa ad d-iẓed.
Yuwi azemmur-is ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwi azemmur-is ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Nuwi azemmur-nneɣ ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Nuwi azemmur-nteɣ ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwiḍ azemmur-ik ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwiḍ azemmur-im ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tanemmirt ɣef yimeslayen-agi-inem yeččuren d tiẓeḍt.
Tanemmirt ɣef yimeslayen-agi-inek yeččuren d tiẓeḍt.
Tanemmirt ɣef yimeslayen-agi-nwen yeččuren d tiẓeḍt.
Tanemmirt ɣef yimeslayen-agi-nken yeččuren d tiẓeḍt.
Tanemmirt ɣef yimeslayen-agi-nwent yeččuren d tiẓeḍt.
Tanemmirt ɣef yimeslayen-agi-nkent yeččuren d tiẓeḍt.
Tuwiḍ azemmur-inek ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwiḍ azemmur-inem ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwim azemmur-nken ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwimt azemmur-nkent ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwim azemmur-nwen ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwimt azemmur-nwent ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Yuwi azemmur-ines ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuwi azemmur-ines ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.

Uwin azemmur-nsen ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Uwint azemmur-nsent ɣer tessirt ad d-iẓed.
Tuǧǧew-d aqenṭar n zzit n uzemmur.
Nuǧǧew-d aqenṭar n zzit n uzemmur.
Tuǧǧweḍ-d aqenṭar n zzit n uzemmur.

Kemm ur tezmireḍ ara i yiman-im, tekkreḍ ɣer lecɣal i kem-yugaren.
Kunwi ur tezmirem ara i yiman-ken, tekkrem ɣer lecɣal i ken-yugaren.
Kunwi ur tezmirem ara i yiman-wen, tekkrem ɣer lecɣal i ken-yugaren.
Kunemti ur tezmiremt ara i yiman-kent, tekkremt ɣer lecɣal i kent-yugaren.
Kunemti ur tezmiremt ara i yiman-went, tekkremt ɣer lecɣal i kent-yugaren.
Nekk ur zmireɣ ara i yiman-iw, kkreɣ ɣer lecɣal i iyi-yugaren.
Nutni ur zmiren ara i yiman-nsen, kkren ɣer lecɣal i ten-yugaren.
Nutenti ur zmirent ara i yiman-nsent, kkrent ɣer lecɣal i tent-yugaren.

Netta ur yezmir ara i yiman-is, yekker ɣer lecɣal i t-yugaren.
Nekkni ur nezmir ara i yiman-nneɣ, nekker ɣer lecɣal i aɣ-yugaren.
Nekkenti ur nezmir ara i yiman-nteɣ, nekker ɣer lecɣal i aɣ-yugaren.

Tenwiḍ tzemreḍ i yiman-im.

Aseggas-nken d win n twacult-nken d ameggaz. D aseggas ara aken-d-yeglun ala s wayen tebɣam, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.
Aseggas-nkent d win n twacult-nkent d ameggaz. D aseggas ara akent-d-yeglun ala s wayen tebɣamt, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.
Aseggas-nwen d win n twacult-nwen d ameggaz. D aseggas ara awen-d-yeglun ala s wayen tebɣam, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.
Aseggas-nwent d win n twacult-nwent d ameggaz. D aseggas ara awent-d-yeglun ala s wayen tebɣamt, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.
Aseggas-nsen d win n twacult-nsen d ameggaz. D aseggas ara asen-d-yeglun ala s wayen bɣan, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.
Aseggas-nsent d win n twacult-nsent d ameggaz. D aseggas ara asent-d-yeglun ala s wayen bɣant, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.
Aseggas-iw d win n twacult-iw d ameggaz. D aseggas ara iyi-d-yeglun ala s wayen bɣiɣ, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.

Aseggas-is d win n twacult-is d ameggaz. D aseggas ara as-d-yeglun ala s wayen yebɣa, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.
Aseggas-nneɣ d win n twacult-nneɣ d ameggaz. D aseggas ara aɣ-d-yeglun ala s wayen nebɣa, ladɣa tazmert, tayri, talwit, tumert d teɣzi n tudert.

Lbaḍna-nkent, ad teqqim ɣur-i.
Lbaḍna-nwen, ad teqqim ɣur-i.
Lbaḍna-nwent, ad teqqim ɣur-i.
Lbaḍna-nsen, ad teqqim ɣur-i.
Lbaḍna-nsent, ad teqqim ɣur-i.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-sen.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-sent.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-s.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-k.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-m.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-ken.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-kent.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-wen.
Lbaḍna-w, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-went.
Lbaḍna-nneɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-wen.
Lbaḍna-nteɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-wen.
Lbaḍna-nneɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-went.
Lbaḍna-nteɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-went.
Lbaḍna-nteɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-ken.
Lbaḍna-nteɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-kent.
Lbaḍna-nneɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-ken.
Lbaḍna-nneɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-kent.
Lbaḍna-nneɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-sen.
Lbaḍna-nneɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-sent.
Lbaḍna-nteɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-sen.
Lbaḍna-nteɣ, wissen ma teqqim ɣur-sent.

Ḥemmlen ad ččen tijɛal.

I wakken ad d-teqḍuḍ taɣawsa-m, ilaq ad tefkeḍ tajɛelt.

I wakken ad d-teqḍumt tiɣawsiwin-nwent, ilaq ad tefkemt tijɛal.

Kkawen yifadden-ik, ɛyan.
Kkawen yifadden-im, ɛyan.
Kkawen yifadden-nwen, ɛyan.
Kkawen yifadden-nwent, ɛyan.
Kkawen yifadden-nken, ɛyan.
Kkawen yifadden-nkent, ɛyan.
Kkawen yifadden-nsen, ɛyan.
Kkawen yifadden-nsent, ɛyan.
Iɛawez kra yekka yiḍ.
Tɛawez kra yekka yiḍ.
Nɛawez kra yekka yiḍ.

Ɛawzen kra yekka yiḍ.
Ɛawzent kra yekka yiḍ.
Diri-t ɛawaz.
Ɛawaz ur yelhi.
Ɛawaz isseddram tazmert.

Yettban-d zeddig, netta di tidet ifuḥ.
Yettban-d zeddig, netta di tidet yerka.
Tanemmirt ula d kečč mi d-nuwi cwiṭ n wawal-a.
Yal wa ifaq i wayeḍ.
Tal ta tfaq i tayeḍ.
Yal yiwen yeɛqel s tixidas i as-d-yettheggi wayeḍ.
Ulac fell-as, ḥrec kan.
Ulac fell-as, ḥeṛcem kan.
Ulac fell-as, ḥeṛcemt kan.
Ulac fell-as, ḥeṛcet kan.

Txeddem ayem iwimi tezmer mebla kra n lemziyya.
Ixeddem ayem iwimi yezmer mebla kra n lemziyya.

Txeddmemt ayem iwimi tzemremt mebla kra n lemziyya.

Xeddment ayem iwimi zemrent mebla kra n lemziyya.

Tal yiwet tfaq s tixidas i as-d-tettheggi tayeḍ.
Tanemmirt ula d kemm mi d-nuwi cwiṭ n wawal-a.

Llan kra n yiḍrisen-iw deg tesɣunin-nni i ak-in-uzneɣ.

Ur telliz ara tasa-m.

Ma tebɣiḍ ad k-t-in-azneɣ.

Wardiya tnawel-d taḥbult n tmellalin.

Tuwi i yelli-s i d-yurwen taḥbult n tmellalin.

Taḥbult n tmellalin i tečča, tufa-tt d taẓidant.

Tettbaneḍ-d zeddigeḍ, kemm tmesxeḍ almi i tent-tugiḍ.

Tettbanemt-d zeddigit, kunemti tmesxemt almi i tent-tugimt.

Nniɣ-am-d leqdeɣ azemmur.
Deg wass akk ur ttiliɣ ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-kecmeɣ s axxam, ttaseɣ-d ɛyiɣ.
Deg wass akk ur ttilin ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-kecmen s axxam, ttasen-d ɛyan.
Deg wass akk ur ttilint ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-kecment s axxam, ttasent-d ɛyant.
Deg wass akk ur yettili ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-yekcem s axxam, ittas-d yeɛya.
Deg wass akk ur tettili ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-tekcem s axxam, tettas-d teɛya.
Deg wass akk ur nettili ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-nekcem s axxam, nettas-d neɛya.
Deg wass akk ur tettiliḍ ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-tkecmeḍ s axxam, tettaseḍ-d teɛyiḍ.
Deg wass akk ur tettilim ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-tkecmem s axxam, tettasem-d teɛyam.
Deg wass akk ur tettilimt ara deg uxxam, tameddit mi ara d-tkecmemt s axxam, tettasemt-d teɛyamt.

Azekka ad tesfuglemt amenzu n yennayer akked twaculin-nwent.
Tiwaculin n Leqbayel ttnawalent seksu s uyaziḍ i yimesi n yennayer.
Tilawin n Leqbayel ttnawalent seksu s uyaziḍ i yimesi n yennayer.
Yennayer, d inebgi i ttqadaren Yimaziɣen.
Imaziɣen, ttmmagaren yennayer s lferḥ.
S lferḥ i ttmmagaren Yimaziɣen yennayer.
Mi ara d-ires yimensi n yennayer, ula d tijeɣlin n wid yunagen ttrusunt-d.
Mi ara d-yaweḍ yennayer, ilaq ad d-yaf axxam zeddig.
Mi ara d-yekcem yennayer, ilaq ad d-yaf axxam d azeddgan.
Mi ara d-yekcem yennayer, ur ilaq ara ad d-yaf kra n uẓeṭṭa ibedd.
Deg wass n yennayer i ttemsemaḥen yimdanen.
Deg wass n yennayer i ferrun yimdanen.
Ccḥani, tettun-tent deg umenzu n yennayer.
Ccḥani, ntettu-tent deg umenzu n yennayer.
Ccḥani, tettettum-tent deg umenzu n yennayer.
Ccḥani, tettettumt-tent deg umenzu n yennayer.
Ccḥani, tettunt-tent deg umenzu n yennayer.
Deg taddart ufella gan timecreḍt i umenzu n yennayer.
Deg Taddart Ufella xedmen timecreḍt i umenzu n yennayer.
Ansuf yis-k a ɛemmi yennayer.
Yennayer d ayyur yifen akk ayyuren.
Yennayer d ayyur yifen ayyuren akken ma llan.
Yennayer d ayyur yifen ayyuren meṛṛa.
Yennayer d ayyur yifen ayyuren d tirni.
Yennayer d agellid n wayyuren.
Yennayer d ayyur amenzu n useggas.
Yennayer ma ur d-yuwi ara adfel, yettawi-d lgerra.
Yennayer igellu-d s udfel d usemmiḍ.
Deg tmecṛeḍt n yennayer yal axxam yettayal taxxamt-is n uksum.
Deg tmecṛeḍt n yennayer, Taddart Ufella tezla ukkuẓ n yizgaren anect-ila-ten.
Deg umenzu n yennayer, imdanen akk kif kif-iten.
Deg tmura n berra, yal yiwen amek yesfugul amenzu n yennayar.
Ur yuɣal umenzu n yennayer d unṣib almi i tt-necrew merriɣet.
Ur yuɣal umenzu n yennayer d unṣib deg tmurt n Zzayer almi i tt-necrew merriɣet.
Ar ass-a deg tmurt n Maruk, amenzu n yennayer ur yuɣal d unṣib.
Ar tura deg tmurt n Maruk, amenzu n yennayer ur yuɣal d unṣib.
Imaziɣen n tmurt n Maruk, ssuturen deg ugellid-nsen ad yerr amenzu n yennayer d unṣib.
Imezdaɣ n tmurt n Maruk, ssutren deg ugellid-nsen ad yerr amenzu n yennayer d unṣib.
Ad ak-in-nerr lxir.
Ad am-in-nerr lxir.
Amenzu n yennayer d ass n tiɣin n udlis amaziɣ.
Amenzu n yennayer d ass n usnuzu n udlis amaziɣ.
Aɣ adlis amaziɣ akken amaru ad d-yernu deg tira.
Aɣem adlis amaziɣ akken amaru ad d-yernu deg tira.
Aɣemt adlis amaziɣ akken amaru ad d-yernu deg tira.
Aɣet adlis amaziɣ akken amaru ad d-yernu deg tira.
Ma tuɣeḍ adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara tesbeɣseḍ amaru.
Ma tuɣem adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara tesbeɣsem amaru.
Ma tuɣemt adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara tesbeɣsemt amaru.
Ma tuɣ adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara tsebɣes amaru.
Ma yuɣ adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara isebɣes amaru.
Ma nuɣ adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara nsebɣes amaru.
Ma uɣeɣ adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara sbeɣseɣ amaru.
Ma uɣen adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara sbeɣsen amaru.
Ma uɣent adlis amaziɣ, d asebɣes ara sbeɣsent amaru.
Yura yiwen n ungal, yettnadi ad d-yernu wis sin.
Tura yiwen n ungal, tettnadi ad d-ternu wis sin.
Nura yiwen n ungal, nettnadi ad d-nernu wis sin.
Turam yiwen n ungal, tettnadim ad d-ternum wis sin.
Turamt yiwen n ungal, tettnadimt ad d-ternumt wis sin.
Turiḍ yiwen n ungal, tettnadiḍ ad d-ternuḍ wis sin.
Uriɣ yiwen n ungal, ttnadiɣ ad d-rnuɣ wis sin.
Uran yiwen n ungal, ttnadin ad d-rnun wis sin.
Urant yiwen n ungal, ttnadint ad d-rnunt wis sin.
Aqcic ma iruḥ-am ur d-yettuɣal.
Aqcic ma iruḥ-as ur d-yettuɣal.
Aqcic ma iruḥ-awen ur d-yettuɣal.
Aqcic ma iruḥ-awent ur d-yettuɣal.
Aqcic ma iruḥ-aken ur d-yettuɣal.
Aqcic ma iruḥ-akent ur d-yettuɣal.
Aqcic ma iruḥ-asen ur d-yettuɣal.
Aqcic ma iruḥ-asent ur d-yettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-ak ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-aɣ ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-iyi ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-as ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-aken ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-akent ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-awen ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-awent ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-asen ur d-tettuɣal.
Taqcict ma truḥ-asent ur d-tettuɣal.
Ad am-d-yefk Rebbi i yebɣa wul-im.
Ad ak-d-yefk Rebbi i yebɣa wul-ik.
Ad as-d-yefk Rebbi i yebɣa wul-is.
Ad iyi-d-yefk Rebbi i yebɣa wul-iw.
Ini-d tura melmi i d tameɣra-m ?
Ass iruḥen ur d-yettuɣal.
Zik d isli kan i yettḍebbiren, tura ula d tislit ɣur-s awal.
Tamɣart seg zik tettcax, mačči almi d tura.
Ɛni tamɣart-im tewɛer ?
Ihi, aḥeqq ayen yuran akken d-tenniḍ di tazwara.

Tin yettun iman-is, d yir ddunit.
Wid yettun iman-nsen, d yir ddunit.
Tid yettun iman-nsent, d yir ddunit.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-k, tuwi-d fell-ak ad tissineḍ iḍelli-k.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-m, tuwi-d fell-am ad tissineḍ iḍelli-m.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-s, tuwi-d fell-as ad yissin iḍelli-s.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-s, tuwi-d fell-as ad tissin iḍelli-s.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-nneɣ, tuwi-d fell-aneɣ ad nissin iḍelli-nneɣ.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-nteɣ, tuwi-d fell-anteɣ ad nissin iḍelli-nteɣ.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-nken, tuwi-d fell-aken ad tissinem iḍelli-nken.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-nkent, tuwi-d fell-akent ad tissinemt iḍelli-nkent.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-nwen, tuwi-d fell-awen ad tissinem iḍelli-nwen.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-nwent, tuwi-d fell-awent ad tissinemt iḍelli-nwent.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-nsen, tuwi-d fell-asen ad issinen iḍelli-nsen.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-nsent, tuwi-d fell-asent ad issinent iḍelli-nsent.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-inu, tuwi-d fell-i ad issineɣ iḍelli-inu.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-w, tuwi-d fell-i ad issineɣ iḍelli-iw.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-inek, tuwi-d fell-ak ad tissineḍ iḍelli-inek.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-inem, tuwi-d fell-am ad tissineḍ iḍelli-inem.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-ines, tuwi-d fell-as ad yissin iḍelli-ines.
I wakken ad yelhu uzekka-ines, tuwi-d fell-as ad tissin iḍelli-iness.

Terramt takmamt ɣef yimi, aqrab ɣef uɛrur, teṭṭfemt abrid n uɣerbaz.

Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-is, yettarra iman-is d argaz.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-is, tettarra iman-is d tameṭṭut.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-nneɣ, nettarra iman-nneɣ d irgazen.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-nteɣ, nettarra iman-nteɣ d tilawin.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-im, tettarraḍ iman-im d tameṭṭut.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-ik, tettarraḍ iman-ik d argaz.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-nken, tettarram iman-nken d irgazen.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-nkent, tettarramt iman-nkent d tilawin.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-nwen, tettarram iman-nwen d irgazen.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-nwent, tettarramt iman-nwent d tilawin.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-iw, ttarraɣ iman-iw d argaz.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-nsen, ttarraɣ iman-nsen d irgazen.
Mazal ayefki deg wanzaren-nsent, ttarrant iman-nsent d tilawin.
Yerfed imru, yebɣa ad yaru asefru.
Terfed imru, tebɣa ad taru asefru.
Nerfed imru, nebɣa ad naru asefru.
Trefdeḍ imru, tebɣiḍ ad taruḍ asefru.
Trefdem imru, tebɣam ad tarum asefru.
Trefdemt imru, tebɣamt ad tarumt asefru.
Refdeɣ imru, bɣiɣ ad aruɣ asefru.
Refden imru, bɣan ad arun asefru.
Refdent imru, bɣant ad arunt asefru.

Yettarra iman-is yeḥrec.
Yettarra iman-is yeẓẓwer.
Yettarra iman-is yif akk medden.
Tettarra iman-is tif akk medden.
Nettarra iman-nneɣ nif akk medden.
Tettarraḍ iman-ik tifeḍ akk medden.
Tettarraḍ iman-im tifeḍ akk medden.
Tettarram iman-nken tifem akk medden.
Tettarramt iman-nkent tifemt akk medden.
Tettarram iman-nwen tifem akk medden.
Tettarramt iman-nwent tifemt akk medden.
Ttarraɣ iman-iw ifeɣ akk medden.
Ttarran iman-nsen ifen akk medden.
Ttarrant iman-nsent ifent akk medden.

Tanemmirt a Lynda Taqbaylit, kemm i isebɣasen wid yettarun s teqbaylit.
Yir lɛebd d win ur nettsetḥi.
Yir lɛebd d win ur nettḥezzib.
Yir lɛebd d win iwimi zur wudem.
Win iweɛɛan kan kra ixdem-it i teqbaylit imi ala nekkni kan i tesɛa.
Ula d kečč amecwar-ik ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i aɣ-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kemm amecwar-im ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i aɣ-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kunwi amecwar-nken ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i ken-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kunemti amecwar-nkent ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i kent-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kunwi amecwar-nwen ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i ken-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kunemti amecwar-nwent ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i kent-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d nutni amecwar-nsen ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i ten-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d nutenti amecwar-nsent ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i tent-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d nekk amecwar-iw ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i iyi-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d netta amecwar-is ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i t-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d netta amecwar-ines ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i t-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d nettat amecwar-is ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i tt-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d nettat amecwar-ines ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i tt-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kemm amecwar-im ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i kem-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kemm amecwar-inem ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i kem-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kečč amecwar-ik ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i k-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d kečč amecwar-inek ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i k-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Ula d nekk amecwar-inu ɣezzif deg tmentilt-a tahaggart i iyi-iceɣben almi kan dayen.
Lufan i d-turiḍ awal-im s teqbaylit neɣ ulama s tefransist, tili negza cwiṭ.
Lufan i d-turiḍ awal-im s teqbaylit neɣ ulama s tefransist, tili nefhem cwiṭ.
Lufan i d-turiḍ awal-ik s teqbaylit neɣ ulama s tefransist, tili negza cwiṭ.
Lufan i d-turiḍ awal-ik s teqbaylit neɣ ulama s tefransist, tili nefhem cwiṭ.
Ad yeg Rebbi ddeɛwat n temɣart-a n lbaraka ffɣent.
Rnu-iyi-d cwiṭ n wawal ɣef usentel-a akken ad gzuɣ tamsalt akken i ilaq.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad neqqim akken nella.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad yeqqim akken yella.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad teqqim akken tella.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad teqqimeḍ akken telliḍ.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad teqqimem akken tellam.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad teqqimemt akken tellamt.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad qqimeɣ akken lliɣ.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad qqimen akken llan.
Yiwen n uẓar ma yeggra-d, ad qqiment akken llant.
Teɣzi n tudert d wayen akk i tebɣa i as-nessaram.

Anaẓur yessen ad yessuneɣ iḥulfan.
Ṭṭef deg yiẓuran-ik taffgeḍ anda i tebɣiḍ.
Ṭṭfem deg yiẓuran-nken taffgem anda i tebɣam.
Ṭṭfemt deg yiẓuran-nkent taffgemt anda i tebɣamt.
Ṭṭfem deg yiẓuran-nwen taffgem anda i tebɣam.
Ṭṭfemt deg yiẓuran-nwent taffgemt anda i tebɣamt.
Ṭṭfet deg yiẓuran-nwen taffgem anda i tebɣam.
Ṭṭfet deg yiẓuran-nken taffgem anda i tebɣam.
Amenzu n yennayer sfgulen-t deg Tmazɣa akken ma tella.

Ɛerben neɣ qqimen, tamaziɣt yeqqur uqerruy-is.

Tin iweɛɛan kan kra texdem-it i teqbaylit.
Wid iweɛɛan kan kra xedmen-t i teqbaylit.
Tid iweɛɛan kan kra xedment-t i teqbaylit.

Ur tufimt d acu ara d-ternumt.

Ur ufint d acu ara d-rnunt.

Ṭṭef afus-ik !

Tetten-tt-id yifassen-is.

Walan anda i teddun.
Walant anda i teddunt.

Nwala anda i nteddu.

Lbaḍna-s yuɣ-d akk iɣeẓran.
Lbaḍna-k tuɣ-d akk iɣeẓran.
Lbaḍna-m tuɣ-d akk iɣeẓran.

Yemmut, yewwi yid-s lbaḍna-s.
Temmut, tewwi yid-s lbaḍna-s.

Nemmut, newwi yid-nteɣ lbaḍna-nteɣ.

Temmuteḍ, tewwiḍ yid-m lbaḍna-m.

Temmutemt, tewwimt yid-went lbaḍna-nwent.

Cqerrweɣ-k, ruḥ ɣer tmeqbert teẓẓuḍ din tagust.
Cqerrweɣ-kem, ruḥ ɣer tmeqbert teẓẓuḍ din tagust.
Cqerrweɣ-ken, ruḥem ɣer tmeqbert teẓẓum din tagust.
Cqerrweɣ-kent, ruḥemt ɣer tmeqbert teẓẓumt din tagust.
Cqerrweɣ-ken, ruḥet ɣer tmeqbert teẓẓum din tagust.
Cqerrweɣ-t, ad iruḥ ɣer tmeqbert ad yeẓẓu din tagust, yugad.
Cqerrweɣ-tt, ad truḥ ɣer tmeqbert ad teẓẓu din tagust, tugad.
Cqerrweɣ-ten, ad ruḥen ɣer tmeqbert ad ẓẓun din tagust, ugaden.
Cqerrweɣ-tent, ad ruḥent ɣer tmeqbert ad ẓẓunt din tagust, ugadent.
Cqerrweɣ-k, ad truḥeḍ ɣer tmeqbert ad teẓẓuḍ din tagust, tugadeḍ.
Cqerrweɣ-kem, ad truḥeḍ ɣer tmeqbert ad teẓẓuḍ din tagust, tugadeḍ.

Cqerrweɣ-kent, ad truḥemt ɣer tmeqbert ad teẓẓumt din tagust, tugademt.

Tuwi taceṭṭabit, truḥ ad d-terr targa.
Nuwi ticeṭṭabiyin, nruḥ ad d-nerr targa.
Tuwiḍ taceṭṭabit, truḥeḍ ad d-terreḍ targa.
Tuwim ticeṭṭabiyin, truḥem ad d-terrem targa.
Tuwimt ticeṭṭabiyin, truḥemt ad d-terremt targa.
Uwiɣ taceṭṭabit, ruḥeɣ ad d-rreɣ targa.

Ur ttarra ara iman-im am tin ur nesli.

Tesla, tesɛuẓẓeg.

Ur kem-terri ara tmara ad txedmeḍ ayen ur tebɣiḍ.
Ur ken-terri ara tmara ad txedmem ayen ur tebɣim.
Ur kent-terri ara tmara ad txedmemt ayen ur tebɣimt.
