Ur tent-terri ara tmara ad xedment ayen ur bɣint.
Ur iyi-terri ara tmara ad xedmeɣ ayen ur bɣiɣ.

Ur tt-terri ara tmara ad texdem ayen ur tebɣi.

Nnig wul-iw ara m-aɣeɣ awal.
Nnig wul-iw ara s-aɣeɣ awal.

Ɣef yizerfan-is kan i tettnadi.
Ɣef yizerfan-nneɣ kan i nettnadi.
Ɣef yizerfan-nteɣ kan i nettnadi.
Ɣef yizerfan-ik kan i tettnadiḍ.
Ɣef yizerfan-im kan i tettnadiḍ.
Ɣef yizerfan-nken kan i tettnadim.
Ɣef yizerfan-nkent kan i tettnadimt.
Ɣef yizerfan-nwen kan i tettnadim.
Ɣef yizerfan-nwent kan i tettnadimt.
Ɣef yizerfan-iw kan i ttnadiɣ.
Ɣef yizerfan-inu kan i ttnadiɣ.
Ɣef yizerfan-nsen kan i ttnadin.
Ɣef yizerfan-nsent kan i ttnadint.
Ɣef yizerfan-inek kan i tettnadiḍ.
Ɣef yizerfan-inem kan i tettnadiḍ.
Ɣef yizerfan-ines kan i yettnadi.
Ɣef yizerfan-ines kan i tettnadi.
Aselmad yettmal iberdan isuffuɣen.
Iselmaden ttmalen iberdan isuffuɣen.

Taselmad yelhan d tin yettheggin akken i ilaq timsirin-is.
Iselmaden yelhan d wid yettheggin akken i ilaq timsirin-nsen.
Tiselmaden yelhan d tid yettheggin akken i ilaq timsirin-nsent.
Ur tnegger ddunit alma tessemɣi-d tyaziḍt.
Ur tnegger ddunit alma turew-d tserdunt.
Ilef ma yeṭall s igenni ad tenger ddunit.
Ur tnegger ddunit alma yesreɛrew uɣyul deg lebḥer.
Ur tnegger ddunit alma yeǧǧuǧǧeg lemleh.
Ma yeǧǧuǧǧed lemleḥ ad tenger ddunit.
Ma teǧǧuǧǧed tisent ad tenger ddunit.
Ur tnegger ddunit alma teǧǧuǧǧeg tisent.
Ma yesreɛreɛ uɣyul deg lebḥer ad tenger ddunit.
Ma yesreɛreɛ uɣyul deg yilel ad tenger ddunit.
Ur tnegger ddunit alma yesreɛrew uɣyul deg yilel.

Yettmettat cwiṭ cwiṭ win ur nessikil, win ur neqqar, win ur nesmuzgut i uẓawan, win ur nessin ad yaf s unadi n taṭṭucin-is. Yettmettat cwiṭ cwiṭ win yettruẓun nnif-is, win yugin afus n tallalt. Yettmettat cwiṭ cwiṭ win yuɣalen d akli n tnnumi yettawin ala iberdan-nni kan, win, urǧin ibeddel aseddag, win, urǧin iqemmer ad ibeddel tiɣmi n yiselsa-s neɣ urǧin immeslay d uberrani. Yettmettat cwiṭ cwiṭ win i irewwlen ɣef tnefsit d ubuciḍan-is n yiḥulfan widak i d-yettarran tafat i wallen jebbren ulawen yuḍnen. Yettmettat cwiṭ cwiṭ win ur nettbeddil ara tikli assen ara yili meḍrur deg umahil neɣ deg tayri, win ur nettqemmir akken ad yaweḍ lebɣi-s, win, tikkelt deg tudert-is ur yerwil ɣef yiwellihen yesɛan inumak. Idir tura ! Qemmer iman-ik ass-a ! Eg kan tura ! Ur ttaǧǧa ara iman-ik ad tettmettateḍ cwiṭ cwiṭ ! Ur ttɣullu ara iman-ik ad tidireḍ tumreḍ !

Ixeddim ẓẓay fell-anteɣ, nḥemmel kan ad nurar.

Tudert n warraw n Ɛuqba tebna ɣef tkerkas.
Tudert n warraw n Ɛuqba tebna ɣef lekdubat.
Tudert n wid yettarran iman-nsen d arraw n Ɛuqba skiddiben.
Tudert n wid yettarran iman-nsen d arraw n Ɛuqba uṛǧin i d-nnan tidet.
Wid yettarran iman-nsen d arraw n Ɛuqba, bɣan ad rren akal amaziɣ d aɛrab.
Arraw n Ɛuqba neɣ wid yettarran iman-nsen d aɛraben, ttarun amezruy akken bɣan.

Ɣuccent ad ṭillent iman-nsent deg lemri.

D akud i d ddwa n leǧruḥ.
Lemri i as-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-s, terẓa-t.
Lemri i am-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-m, terẓiḍ-t.
Lemri i akent-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nkent, terẓamt-t.
Lemri i awent-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nwent, terẓamt-t.
Lemri i iyi-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-w, rẓiɣ-t, i tenna Zehwa.
Rẓiɣ lemri i iyi-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-w.
Rẓan lemri i asen-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nsen.
Rẓant lemri i asent-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nsent.
Yerẓa lemri i as-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-s.
Terẓa lemri i as-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-s.
Nerẓa lemri i aɣ-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nneɣ.
Nerẓa lemri i aɣ-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nteɣ.
Terẓam lemri i aken-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nken.
Terẓamt lemri i akent-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nkent.
Terẓam lemri i awen-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nwen.
Terẓamt lemri i awent-d-yettarran yir ṣṣifa-nwent.
Asefru ma yelha, iḥemmel umeẓẓuɣ ad as-isel.
Iḥemel umeẓẓuɣ ad isel i usefru yelhan.
Aṭas n yimedyazen iqburen i iyi-iččuren tiṭ.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-i d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-k d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-m d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-s d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-neɣ d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-nteɣ d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-ken d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-kent d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-wen d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-went d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-sen d Muḥya.
Amedyaz i d-yeǧǧan ccama deg-sent d Muḥya.
D tamedyezt n Muḥya i yerran kra n yicennayen-nneɣ ttwassnen, maca aṭas i as-yeččan lxir.
Ččan-as lxir i Muḥya.
Teččam-as lxir i Muḥya.
Ass-a zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ mebla akukru nezmer ad nesselmed s teqbaylit tanga i nebɣa ama n tsekla ama n tussna.
Aṭas i tecɣeb temsalt n teqbaylit, ur gganen ara uḍan-nsen, xeddmen, ttnadin akken tutlayt ad taf iman-is acku ḥsiɣ yiwen wass kan ad nesɣer tarwa-nneɣ s tutlayt i d-ṭṭḍen ɣer tyemmatin-nsen.
Tamaziɣt (taqbaylit), azekka-s ad yecceɛcceɛ deg tal taɣult : tasekla, taklut, amezgun, sinima, tussna…
Ad ssutreɣ kan deg watmaten ad amnen, ad dduklen, ad ttasmen, ad xeddmen, akken taqbaylit ad tt-id-ittmmagar ala wass amellal.
Kra n Yicinwaten kkan kra n yiseggasen deg tmurt-nneɣ, lemden taqbaylit. Imḍebbren-nneɣ, ɣas nettwaḥkem nnig n 14 n leqrun, ɛedzen ar ass-a ad lemden tutlayt taqbaylit.
Aɣewwaɣ nɣan-t ɣef tikta-s.
Ɣef tikta-s i nɣan aɣewwaɣ.
D abrid yecreḍ ara naɣ.
D abrid yewwi ara naɣ
Tafekka-s nɣan-tt, tikta-s ttcalint.
Imawlan-is yiwen i d-sɛan, tamettant-is tessefti-t.
Ɣas yemmut yuɣal deg-neɣ d win yellan, deg wul dima nettawi-t.
Mačči s tmettant n uɣewwaɣ i bdan timenɣiwin-nsen.
Kra n win i d-yufraren, nɣan-t.
Ma ur k-nɣin ara ad k-nfun.
Ma ur kem-nɣin ara ad kem-nfun.
Ma ur ken-nɣin ara ad ken-nfun.
Ma ur kent-nɣin ara ad kent-nfun.
Ur walaɣ ara anwa i tt-ixedmen.
Wa nɣan-t, wa nfan-t, wa ɛelfen-t.
Ma ur sen-yeddi ara deg lebɣi umezruy, ad t-cewhen.
Ḥemmlen amezruy i ten-yettcebbiḥen.
D win i k-yernan ara yarun amezruy-ik.
D imernayen i yettarun amezruy n yimernan.
Ad tuɣaleḍ am nekk neɣ ad k-kkseɣ.
Ttu iman-ik, tedduḍ akken bɣiɣ.
Ttu iman-im, tedduḍ akken bɣiɣ.
Ttum iman-nken, teddum akken bɣiɣ.
Ttumt iman-nkent, teddumt akken bɣiɣ.
Ttum iman-nwen, teddum akken bɣiɣ.
Ttumt iman-nwent, teddumt akken bɣiɣ.
Ttut iman-nwen, teddum akken bɣiɣ.
Ttut iman-nken, teddum akken bɣiɣ.
Ɣriɣ asefru-m almi i ifukk, ufiɣ-t iɛǧeb-iyi.
Ɣriɣ asefru-k almi i ifukk, ufiɣ-t iɛǧeb-iyi.
Ɣriɣ asefru-s almi i ifukk, ufiɣ-t iɛǧeb-iyi.
Ɣriɣ isefra-nken, ufiɣ-ten ɛeǧben-iyi.
Ɣriɣ isefra-nkent, ufiɣ-ten ɛeǧben-iyi.
Ɣriɣ isefra-nwen, ufiɣ-ten ɛeǧben-iyi.
Ɣriɣ isefra-nwent, ufiɣ-ten ɛeǧben-iyi.
Ɣriɣ isefra-nsen, ufiɣ-ten ɛeǧben-iyi.
Ɣriɣ isefra-nsent, ufiɣ-ten ɛeǧben-iyi.
Ɣṛan isefra-nneɣ, ufan-ten ɛeǧben-asen.
Ɣṛan isefra-nteɣ, ufan-ten ɛeǧben-asen.
Ɣṛan isefra-inu, ufan-ten ɛeǧben-asen.
Teɣṛa isefra-inu, tufa-ten ɛeǧben-as.
Teɣṛam isefra-inu, tufam-ten ɛeǧben-awen.
Teɣṛam isefra-inu, tufam-ten ɛeǧben-aken.
Teɣṛamt isefra-inu, tufamt-ten ɛeǧben-awent.
Teɣṛamt isefra-inu, tufamt-ten ɛeǧben-akent.
Tedduɣ akken ufiɣ, mačči akken bɣiɣ.
Teddun akken ufan, mačči akken bɣan.
Teddunt akken ufant, mačči akken bɣant.
Iteddu akken yufa, mačči akken yebɣa.
Tetteddu akken tufa, mačči akken tebɣa.
Nteddu akken nufa, mačči akken nebɣa.
Tettedduḍ akken tufiḍ, mačči akken tebɣiḍ.
Ma tella tin yesddukllen leqbayel n tidet akken ma llan d JSK.
Tetteddum akken tufam, mačči akken tebɣam.
Tetteddumt akken tufamt, mačči akken tebɣamt.
Win ur neẓri ansa i d-yekka, ur yeẓri anda i iteddu.
Ur tẓerreḍ anda i tettedduḍ ma yella ur tessineḍ ara ansa i d-tekkiḍ.
Ur tẓerrem anda i tetteddum ma yella ur tessinem ara ansa i d-tekkam.
Ur tẓerremt anda i tetteddumt ma yella ur tessinemt ara ansa i d-tekkamt.
Ur tẓerr anda i tetteddu ma yella ur tessin ara ansa i d-tekka.
Ur iẓerr anda i iteddu ma yella ur yessin ara ansa i d-yekka.
Ur nẓerr anda i nteddu ma yella ur nessin ara ansa i d-nekka.
Ur ẓerreɣ anda i tedduɣ ma yella ur ssineɣ ara ansa i d-kkiɣ.
Ur ẓerren anda i teddun ma yella ur ssinen ara ansa i d-kkan.
Ur ẓerrent anda i teddunt ma yella ur ssinent ara ansa i d-kkant.
D yir ddunit ɣef win yettarran iman-is d wayeḍ.
D yir ddunit ɣef tin yettarran iman-is d tayeḍ.
D yir ddunit ɣef wid yettarran iman-nsen d wiyiḍ.
D yir ddunit ɣef tid yettarran iman-nsent d tiyiḍ.
Yerra iman-is d wayeḍ mi yettu iẓuran-is.
Terra iman-is d tayeḍ mi tettu iẓuran-is.
Nerra iman-nneɣ d wiyaḍ mi nettu iẓuran-nneɣ.
Nerra iman-nteɣ d tiyaḍ mi nettu iẓuran-nteɣ.
Terram iman-nken d wiyaḍ mi tettum iẓuran-nken.
Terramt iman-nkent d tiyaḍ mi tettumt iẓuran-nkent.
Terram iman-nwen d wiyaḍ mi tettum iẓuran-nwen.
Terramt iman-nwent d tiyaḍ mi tettumt iẓuran-nkent.
Terriḍ iman-im d tayeḍ mi tettuḍ iẓuran-im.
Terriḍ iman-ik d wayeḍ mi tettuḍ iẓuran-ik.
Rriɣ iman-iw d wayeḍ mi ttuɣ iẓuran-iw.
Rran iman-nsen d wiyaḍ mi ttun iẓuran-nsen.
Rrant iman-nsent d tiyaḍ mi ttunt iẓuran-nsent.
Ɣas yettu tutlayt-is, iẓuran-is yecfa fell-asen.
Ɣas tettu tutlayt-is, iẓuran-is tecfa fell-asen.
Ɣas nettu tutlayt-nneɣ, iẓuran-nneɣ necfa fell-asen.
Ɣas nettu tutlayt-nteɣ, iẓuran-nteɣ necfa fell-asen.
Ɣas tettum tutlayt-nken, iẓuran-nken tecfam fell-asen.
Ɣas tettumt tutlayt-nkent, iẓuran-nkent tecfamt fell-asen.
Ɣas tettum tutlayt-nwen, iẓuran-nwen tecfam fell-asen.
Ɣas tettumt tutlayt-nwent, iẓuran-nwent tecfamt fell-asen.
Ɣas tettuḍ tutlayt-ik, iẓuran-ik tecfiḍ fell-asen.
Ɣas tettuḍ tutlayt-im, iẓuran-im tecfiḍ fell-asen.
Ɣas ttuɣ tutlayt-iw, iẓuran-iw cfiɣ fell-asen.
Ɣas ttun tutlayt-insen, iẓuran-nsen cfan fell-asen.
Ɣas ttunt tutlayt-nsent, iẓuran-nsent cfant fell-asen.
Ɣas yettu tameslayt-is, aẓar-is ur t-yettu ara.
Ɣas tettu tameslayt-is, aẓar-is ur t-tettu ara.
Ɣas nettu tameslayt-nneɣ, iẓuran-nneɣ ur ten-nettu ara.
Ɣas nettu tameslayt-nteɣ, iẓuran-nteɣ ur ten-nettu ara.
Ɣas tettuḍ tameslayt-ik, aẓar-ik ur t-tettuḍ ara.
Ɣas tettum tameslayt-nken, iẓuran-nken ur ten-tettum ara.
Ɣas tettumt tameslayt-nkent, iẓuran-nkent ur ten-tettumt ara.
Ɣas tettum tameslayt-nwen, iẓuran-nwen ur ten-tettum ara.
Ɣas tettumt tameslayt-nwent, iẓuran-nwent ur ten-tettumt ara.
Ɣas ttuɣ tameslayt-iw, aẓar-iw ur t-ttuɣ ara.
Ɣas ttun tameslayt-nsen, iẓuran-nsen ur ten-ttun ara.
Ɣas ttunt tameslayt-nsent, iẓuran-nsent ur ten-ttunt ara.
Qmec allen-ik, ldi-tent-id, ad d-tafeḍ iɛedda useggas.

Terfed ayen iwmi ur tezmir.

Ur tbeddleḍ ara, amzun tḥuder-ik ddunit.
Ur tbeddlem ara, amzun tḥuder-iken ddunit.
Ur tbeddlemt ara, amzun tḥuder-ikent ddunit.
Ur tbeddel ara, amzun tḥuder-itt ddunit.

Ur beddlen ara, amzun tḥuder-iten ddunit.
Ur beddlent ara, amzun tḥuder-itent ddunit.
Ula d kemm ttḥadar ɣef yiman-im, ulac am tezmert.

Taqbaylit-nni tfessi am wudi ɣas ulac iṭij.
Lqaɛa d yiwen n umtiweg n unagraw afuktan.
Neftun d yiwen n umtiweg n unagraw afuktan.
Merkur d yiwen n umtiweg n unagraw afuktan.
Yebṭer d yiwen n umtiweg n unagraw afuktan.
Asturn d yiwen n umtiweg n unagraw afuktan.
Amtiweg lqaɛa itezzi ɣef wayyur n yiṭij, ayyur n tziri netta itezzi ɣef lqaɛa.
Itri i d-iqerben akk ɣer lqaɛa d iṭij.
Tanemmirt ɣef wawalen akk i d-tenniḍ fell-i.
Ilaq ad teɣreḍ taqbaylit akken ad tissineḍ ad tt-taruḍ.
Akken i ilaq ad tqadreḍ ilugan n tira n tefransist neɣ n taɛrabt ara tqadreḍ wid n teqbaylit.
Mačči win iɛeddan kan ad yaru taqbaylit.
Mačči tin iɛeddan kan ad taru taqbaylit.
Mačči wid iɛeddan kan ad arun taqbaylit.
Mačči tid iɛeddan kan ad arunt taqbaylit.
Ilaq ad teɣrem taqbaylit akken ad tissinem ad tt-tarum.
Ilaq ad teɣremt taqbaylit akken ad tissinemt ad tt-tarumt.
Ilaq ad ɣreɣ taqbaylit akken ad issineɣ ad tt-aruɣ.
Ilaq ad ɣren taqbaylit akken ad issinen ad tt-arun.
Ilaq ad ɣrent taqbaylit akken ad issinent ad tt-arunt.
Ilaq ad iɣer taqbaylit akken ad yissin ad tt-yaru.
Ilaq ad tɣer taqbaylit akken ad tissin ad tt-taru.
Ilaq ad nɣer taqbaylit akken ad nissin ad tt-naru.
Yal yiwen ittaru taqbaylit akken yebɣa.
Llan tẓa n yimtigwen deg unagraw-nneɣ afuktan.
Amaḍal d yiwen umtiweg n unagraw-nneɣ afuktan.
Ilaq ad nhedder ad nettemsefham.
Mačči win i d-yefkan iwellihen d uweṣṣi, ad t-nefhem meqlubi.
Ur ḥmmileɣ ad d-wwteɣ deg yiwen.
Izen i wakken ad yaweḍ, ad t-fehmen, ilaq ad t-naru akken i ilaq.
Imi kemm ahat d taselmadt n tefransist ,aru izen-im s tefransist neɣ efk-it i win yessnen taqbaylit ad am-t-id yaru.
Taqbaylit a winnat, d ccɣel-iw, d ccɣel-ik, d ccɣel-nneɣ akken ma nella.
Ilaq seg tura tura win ur nessin ara ad yaru s tmeslayt-is, ad yekker ad yelmed imi ḥṣiɣ d taqbaylit ara yilin d tameslayt tamezwarut deg tmurt n leqbayel deg kra kan n yiseggasen akka d tasawent.
Nettqadar tafransist, nettqadar taɛrabt, yewweḍ-d lawan ad nqader iman-nneɣ, ad nqader tameslayt-nneɣ.
Iḥemmel tin yebɣan ul-is.
Tḥemmel win yebɣan ul-is.
Tḥemmleḍ win yebɣan ul-im.
Tḥemmleḍ tin yebɣan ul-ik.
Ḥemmleɣ win yebɣan ul-iw.
Ḥemmleɣ tin yebɣan ul-iw.
Yekkat ṭṭbel n laẓ deg yiɛebbaḍ.
Itett deg tbarda-s.
Tetten deg tbardiwin-nsen.
Tuɣmest n leɛqel tsuffuɣ leɛqel.
Yettuẓum mebla lebɣi-s.
Tettuẓum mebla lebɣi-s.

Nettuẓum mebla lebɣi-nteɣ.
Tettuẓumeḍ mebla lebɣi-k.
Tettuẓumeḍ mebla lebɣi-m.
Tettuẓumem mebla lebɣi-nken.
Tettuẓumemt mebla lebɣi-nkent.
Tettuẓumem mebla lebɣi-nwen.
Tettuẓumemt mebla lebɣi-nwent.

Ttuẓument mebla lebɣi-nsent.
Ur ḥmmilen ad d-wwten deg yiwen.
Ur ḥmmilent ad d-wwtent deg yiwen.
Ur iḥemmil ad d-iwwet deg yiwen.
Ur tḥemmil ad d-tewwet deg yiwen.
Ur nḥemmil ad d-newwet deg yiwen.
Ur teḥmmileḍ ad d-tewwteḍ deg yiwen.
Ur teḥmmilem ad d-tewwtem deg yiwen.
Ur teḥmmilemt ad d-tewwtemt deg yiwen.
Ul-nneɣ yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi nettawi ifassen-nneɣ d ilmawen.
Ul-nteɣ yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi nettawi ifassen-nteɣ d ilmawen.
Ul-is yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi yettawi ifassen-is d ilmawen.
Ul-is yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawi ifassen-is d ilmawen.
Ul-ik yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawiḍ ifassen-ik d ilmawen.
Ul-im yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawiḍ ifassen-im d ilmawen.
Ul-nken yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawim ifassen-nken d ilmawen.
Ul-nkent yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawimt ifassen-nkent d ilmawen.
Ul-nwen yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawim ifassen-nwen d ilmawen.
Ul-nwent yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawimt ifassen-nwent d ilmawen.
Ul-iw yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi ttawiɣ ifassen-iw d ilmawen.
Ul-inu yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi ttawiɣ ifassen-inu d ilmawen.
Ul-nsen yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi ttawin ifassen-nsen d ilmawen.
Ul-nsent yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi ttawint ifassen-nsent d ilmawen.
Ul-inem yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawiḍ ifassen-inem d ilmawen.
Ul-inek yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawiḍ ifassen-inek d ilmawen.
Ul-ines yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi yettawi ifassen-ines d ilmawen.
Ul-ines yeččur d asirem yeg Rebbi tettawi ifassen-ines d ilmawen.
Mi ruḥen ad rejmen lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i ten-id-immugren.
Mi ruḥent ad rejment lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i tent-id-immugren.
Mi ruḥeɣ ad rejmeɣ lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i iyi-d-immugren.
Mi iruḥ ad yerjem lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i t-id-immugren.
Mi truḥ ad terjem lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i tt-id-immugren.
Mi nruḥ ad nerjem lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i ɣ-d-immugren.
Mi truḥeḍ ad trejmeḍ lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i k-id-immugren.
Mi truḥeḍ ad trejmeḍ lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i kem-id-immugren.
Mi truḥem ad trejmem lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i ken-id-immugren.
Mi truḥemt ad trejmemt lbaṭel s udɣaɣ, d rrṣaṣ i kent-id-immugren.
Mi ten-id-wwten s rrṣaṣ, wa yemmut, wa yettwaɛdem.
Mi ten-id-wwten s rrṣaṣ, wa nɣan-t, wa ɛedmen-t.
Mi tent-id-wwten s rrṣaṣ, ta temmut, ta tettwaɛdem.
Mi tent-id-wwten s rrṣaṣ, ta nɣan-tt, ta ɛedmen-tt.
Mi ken-id-wwten s rrṣaṣ, wa yemmut, wa yettwaɛdem.
Mi kent-id-wwten s rrṣaṣ, ta temmut, ta tettwaɛdem.
Mi ken-id-wwten s rrṣaṣ, wa nɣan-t, wa ɛedmen-t.
Mi kent-id-wwten s rrṣaṣ, ta nɣan-tt, ta ɛedmen-tt.
Mi d-yeḥmel wasif n zɛaf, yewwi yid-s tikerkas.
Tikerkas yewwi-tent wasif n zɛaf i d-iḥemlen ussan-nni n tefsut.
Yuɣ abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.
Tuɣ abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.
Nuɣ abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.
Tuɣeḍ abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.
Tuɣem abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.
Tuɣemt abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.
Uɣeɣ abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.
Uɣen abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.
Uɣent abrid n yimezwura, wid i d-yerran tilelli i tmurt.

Ayen iɣef tettnadi, tufa-t.

Ayen iɣef tettnadimt, tufamt-t.
Ayen iɣef ttnadin, ufan-t.
Ayen iɣef ttnadint, ufant-t.
Ayen iɣef ttnadiɣ, ufiɣ-t.
Yennuɣ yid-s s uqemmuc.
Yennuɣ yid-i s uqemmuc.
Yennuɣ yid-k s uqemmuc.
Yennuɣ yid-m s uqemmuc.
Yennuɣ yid-sen s uqemmuc.

Ur zmireɣ ara ad kem-ǧǧeɣ.
Ur zmiren ara ad kem-ǧǧen.
Ur zmiren ara ad k-ǧǧen.
Ur zmirent ara ad kem-ǧǧent.
Ur zmirent ara ad k-ǧǧen.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad k-ǧǧeɣ.
Ur yezmir ara ad kem-yeǧǧ.
Ur yezmir ara ad k-yeǧǧ.
Ur tezmir ara ad kem-teǧǧ.
Ur tezmir ara ad k-teǧǧ.
Ur nezmir ara ad kem-neǧǧ.
Ur nezmir ara ad k-neǧǧ.

Ur tezmirem ara ad tt-teǧǧem.

Ur zmireɣ ara ad tt-ǧǧeɣ.
D yiwen n umedyaz yettwalin s wul-is.

Ur zmiren ara ad tt-ǧǧen.
Ur zmirent ara ad t-ǧǧent.
Ur zmirent ara ad tt-ǧǧent.
Aṭas aya i sɛiɣ adlis-a, ɣriɣ-t, igerrez.
Ufan tira n tifinaɣ d nettat akk i d taqburt deg ddunnit.
Tira n tifinaɣ d tira tamezwarut deg ddunit.
Taɣerma-nneɣ d tameqqrant, nekkni ar tura nḥeqqer iman-nneɣ.
Taɣerma-nwen d tameqqrant, kunwi ar tura tḥeqqrem iman-nwen.
Taɣerma-nken d tameqqrant, kunwi ar tura tḥeqqrem iman-nken.
Taɣerma-nsen d tameqqrant, nutni ar tura ḥeqqren iman-nsen.
Kra yellan d amezruy amaziɣ, rran-t d aɛrab.
Lekdubat skudmal tteddramen.
Tikerkas skudmal tteddrament.
Nettnadi ɣef umezruy-nneɣ n tidet.
Yettnadi ɣef umezruy-ines n tidet.
Tettnadi ɣef umezruy-ines n tidet.
Tettnadiḍ ɣef umezruy-inek n tidet.
Tettnadiḍ ɣef umezruy-inem n tidet.
Tettnadim ɣef umezruy-nken n tidet.
Tettnadimt ɣef umezruy-nkent n tidet.
Tettnadim ɣef umezruy-nwen n tidet.
Tettnadimt ɣef umezruy-nwent n tidet.

Ttnadint ɣef umezruy-nsent n tidet.
Ttnadiɣ ɣef umezruy-inu n tidet.

Tifinaɣ d agemmay amezwaru deg umaḍal.
Tafekka-s teččur d ilefḍan acku ur tt-yessirid ara.
Tafekka-s teččur d ilefḍan acku ur tt-tessirid ara.
Tifekkiwin-nneɣ ččurent d ilefḍan acku ur tent-nessirid ara.
Tifekkiwin-nteɣ ččurent d ilefḍan acku ur tent-nessirid ara.
Tafekka-k teččur d ilefḍan acku ur tt-tessirideḍ ara.
Tafekka-inek teččur d ilefḍan acku ur tt-tessirideḍ ara.
Tafekka-m teččur d ilefḍan acku ur tt-tessirideḍ ara.
Tafekka-inem teččur d ilefḍan acku ur tt-tessirideḍ ara.
Tafekka-ines teččur d ilefḍan acku ur tt-tessirid ara.
Tafekka-ines teččur d ilefḍan acku ur tt-yessirid ara.
Tifekkiwin-nken ččurent d ilefḍan acku ur tent-tessiridem ara.
Tifekkiwin-nkent ččurent d ilefḍan acku ur tent-tessiridemt ara.
Tifekkiwin-nwen ččurent d ilefḍan acku ur tent-tessiridem ara.
Tifekkiwin-nwent ččurent d ilefḍan acku ur tent-tessiridemt ara.
Tifekkiwin-nsen ččurent d ilefḍan acku ur tent-ssiriden ara.
Tifekkiwin-nsent ččurent d ilefḍan acku ur tent-ssirident ara.
Allaɣ-ik ma yeččur d ilefḍan, ssired-it neɣ qqim, yemsex.
Allaɣ-im ma yeččur d ilefḍan, ssired-it neɣ qqim, yemsex.
Allaɣ-nken ma yeččur d ilefḍan, ssirdem-it neɣ qqim, yemsex.
Allaɣ-nkent ma yeččur d ilefḍan, ssirdemt-it neɣ qqimemt, yemsex.
Allaɣ-nwen ma yeččur d ilefḍan, ssirdem-t neɣ qqimem, yemsex.
Allaɣ-nwent ma yeččur d ilefḍan, ssirdemt-t neɣ qqimemt, yemsex.
Allaɣ-nwen ma yeččur d ilefḍan, ssirdet-t neɣ qqimet, yemsex.
Allaɣ-nken ma yeččur d ilefḍan, ssirdet-t neɣ qqimet, yemsex.
Uriɣ adlis ɣur-s nnig n snat tmaḍ n yisbetren.
Uriɣ ungal ɣur-s nnig n snat tmaḍ n yisbetren.
Yura ungal ɣur-s nnig n snat tmaḍ n yisbetren.
Tura ungal ɣur-s nnig n snat tmaḍ n yisbetren.
Turiḍ ungal ɣur-s nnig n snat tmaḍ n yisbetren.
Awal n diri ma yeffeɣ-d seg yimi ur yettuɣal.
Awal am terṣaṣt, ma yeffeɣ-d ur yettuɣal.
Awal am teldunt, ma yeffeɣ-d ur yettuɣal.
Ulac ayen ur nelhi am yir lehdur.
Xemmem-as i wawal ara d-tiniḍ.
D yir awal d ssebba n lehmum.
Yir leǧruḥ qazen ḥellun, yir lehdur qazen rennun.
Yir lǧerḥ iqaz iḥellu, yir awal iqaz irennu.
Amedyaz ittazu awal.
Amedyaz yettwali awal d arekti, iɛrek-it akken yebɣa.
Amedyaz yeɛrek awal, isuffeɣ-d seg-s ayen yebɣa.
Eǧǧ-as abrid ad iɛeddi.
Ǧǧem-as abrid ad iɛeddi.
Ayɣer ur iyi-tettaǧǧaḍ ara abrid ad ɛeddiɣ ?
Acimi ur iyi-tettaǧǧaḍ ara abrid ad ɛeddiɣ ?
Ayen ur iyi-tettaǧǧaḍ ara abrid ad ɛeddiɣ ?
Yeǧǧa-d lewṣaya.
Teǧǧa-d lewṣaya.
Ayɣer ur aɣ-tettaǧǧam ara abrid ad nɛeddi ?
Acimi ur aɣ-tettaǧǧam ara abrid ad nɛeddi ?
Ayen ur aɣ-tettaǧǧam ara abrid ad nɛeddi ?
Acuɣef ur aɣ-tettaǧǧam ara abrid ad nɛeddi ?
Acuɣef ur iyi-tettaǧǧaḍ ara abrid ad ɛeddiɣ ?
Ayɣer ur ten-tettaǧǧam ara abrid ad ɛeddin ?
Acimi ur ten-tettaǧǧam ara abrid ad ɛeddin ?
Ayen ur ten-tettaǧǧam ara abrid ad ɛeddin ?
Acuɣef ur ten-tettaǧǧam ara abrid ad ɛeddin ?
Acimi ur ten-ǧǧin ara ad ɛeddin ?
Aɣer ur ten-ǧǧin ara ad ɛeddin ?
Ayen ur ten-ǧǧin ara ad ɛeddin ?
Acuɣef ur ten-ǧǧin ara ad ɛeddin ?
Acimi ur tent-ǧǧin ara ad ɛeddint ?
Acuɣef ur tent-ǧǧin ara ad ɛeddint ?
Ayɣer ur tent-ǧǧin ara ad ɛeddint ?
Ayen ur tent-ǧǧin ara ad ɛeddint ?
Acimi ur t-ǧǧin ara ad iɛeddi ?
Ayɣer ur t-ǧǧin ara ad iɛeddi ?
Ayen ur t-ǧǧin ara ad iɛeddi ?
Acuɣef ur t-ǧǧin ara ad iɛeddi ?
Ayɣer ur tt-ǧǧin ara ad tɛeddi ?
Ayen ur tt-ǧǧin ara ad tɛeddi ?
Acimi ur tt-ǧǧin ara ad tɛeddi ?
Acuɣef ur tt-ǧǧin ara ad tɛeddi ?
Ulac tilelli n umeslay deg tmurt-nneɣ.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ, ulac tilelli n umslay.
Ulac tilelli n uxemmem deg tmurt-nneɣ.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ, ulac tilelli n uxemmem.
Ulac tilelli n tɣamsa deg tmurt-nneɣ.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ, ulac tilelli n tɣamsa.
Tamurt-nneɣ terkeḍ tilelliyin titerrasin.
Tamurt-nneɣ terkeḍ tilelliyin timazdayin.
Tamurt-nneɣ terkeḍ tilelliyin timazdayin akked tlelliyin titerrasanin.
Tamurt-nneɣ ur tettqadar ara tilelliyin timazdayin akked tlelliyin titerrasanin.
Ar ass-a llant kra n tmura ur ttqadarent ara tilelliyin titerrasanin. akked tlelliyin timazdayin n yiɣerman-nsent.
Tamurt ur nettqadar ara tllelli akken tebɣu tili, ur tettaf ara iman-is.
Ulac tamurt yufan iman-is ma yella ur tettqadar ara tilelliyin akken ma llant.
Ulac tamurt yufan iman-is ma yella ur tquder ara tilelliyin akken ma llant.
Yefka-as-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-yessexdem.
Yefka-as-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-tessexdem.
Yefka-ak-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-tessxedmeḍ.
Yefka-am-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-tessxedmeḍ.
Yefka-aken-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-tessxedmem.
Yefka-akent-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-tessxedmemt.
Yefka-awen-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-tessxedmem.
Yefka-awent-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-tessxedmemt.
Yefka-asen-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-ssxedmen.
Yefka-asent-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-ssxedment.
Yefka-iyi-d Rebbi iles akken ad t-ssxedmeɣ.
Izerfan n umdan ttwarekḍen deg kra n tmura.
Izerfan n umdan ttwarekḍen deg ddeqs n tmura.
Deg tmura i ulac tilelli, qwant tejɛal.
D acu i k-yewwin ad d-tiniḍ ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i kem-yewwin ad d-tiniḍ ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i ken-yewwin ad d-tinim ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i kent-yewwin ad d-tinimt ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i tt-yewwin ad d-tini ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i t-yewwin ad d-yini ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i aɣ-yewwin ad d-nini ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i iyi-yewwin ad d-iniɣ ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i ten-yewwin ad d-inin ayen ur nelli ?
D acu i tent-yewwin ad d-inint ayen ur nelli ?
Tafyirt i d-iɛeddan d tamezwarut deg uqerruy-ik, aru-tt, maɛna akken ilaq.
Tafyirt i d-iɛeddan d tamezwarut deg uqerruy-im, aru-tt, maɛna akken ilaq.
Tafyirt i d-iɛeddan d tamezwarut deg yiqerray-nwen, arum-tt, maɛna akken ilaq.
Tafyirt i d-iɛeddan d tamezwarut deg yiqerray-nwent, arumt-tt, maɛna akken ilaq.
Tafyirt i d-iɛeddan d tamezwarut deg yiqerray-nken, arum-tt, maɛna akken ilaq.
Tafyirt i d-iɛeddan d tamezwarut deg yiqerray-nkent, arumt-tt, maɛna akken ilaq.
Tafyirt i d-iɛeddan d tamezwarut deg yiqerray-nken, arut-tt, maɛna akken ilaq.
Tafyirt i d-iɛeddan d tamezwarut deg yiqerray-nwen, arut-tt, maɛna akken ilaq.
D tamurt n Leqbayel i izerɛen timeɣnest deg Tfarka n Ugafa.
Yettarra iman-is d aɛrab ɣas ma ugin-t waɛraben n tidet.
Tettarra iman-is d taɛrabt ɣas ma ugin-tt waɛraben n tidet.
Nettarra iman-nneɣ d aɛraben ɣas ma ugin-aɣ waɛraben n tidet.
Nettarra iman-nteɣ d taɛrabin ɣas ma ugin-aɣ waɛraben n tidet.
Tettarraḍ iman-ik d aɛrab ɣas ma ugin-k waɛraben n tidet.
Tettarraḍ iman-im d taɛrabt ɣas ma ugin-kem waɛraben n tidet.
Tettarram iman-nken d aɛraben ɣas ma ugin-ken waɛraben n tidet.
Tettarramt iman-nkent d taɛrabin ɣas ma ugin-kent waɛraben n tidet.
Tettarram iman-nwen d aɛraben ɣas ma ugin-ken waɛraben n tidet.
Tettarramt iman-nwent d taɛrabin ɣas ma ugin-kent waɛraben n tidet.
Ttarraɣ iman-iw d aɛrab ɣas ma ugin-iyi waɛraben n tidet.
Ttarran iman-nsen d aɛraben ɣas ma ugin-ten waɛraben n tidet.
Ttarrant iman-nsent d taɛrabin ɣas ma ugin-tent waɛraben n tidet.
Anda yebɣu iruḥ, tamurt-is tezga deg wul-is.
Anda tebɣu truḥ, tamurt-is tezga deg wul-is.
Anda nebɣu nruḥ, tamurt-nneɣ tezga deg wulawen-nneɣ.
Anda nebɣu nruḥ, tamurt-nteɣ tezga deg wulawen-nteɣ.
Anda tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ, tamurt-ik tezga deg wul-ik.
Anda tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ, tamurt-im tezga deg wul-im.
Anda tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ, tamurt-inek tezga deg wul-inek.
Anda tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ, tamurt-inem tezga deg wul-inem.
Anda yebɣu iruḥ, tamurt-ines tezga deg wul-ines.
Anda tebɣu truḥ, tamurt-ines tezga deg wul-ines.
Anda tebɣum truḥem, tamurt-nken tezga deg wulawen-nken.
Anda tebɣumt truḥemt, tamurt-nkent tezga deg wulawen-nkent.
Anda tebɣum truḥem, tamurt-nwen tezga deg wulawen-nwen.
Anda tebɣumt truḥemt, tamurt-nwent tezga deg wulawen-nwent.
Anda bɣuɣ ruḥeɣ, tamurt-iw tezga deg wul-iw.
Anda bɣuɣ ruḥeɣ, tamurt-inu tezga deg wul-inu.
Anda bɣun ruḥen, tamurt-nsen tezga deg wulawen-nsen.
Anda bɣunt ruḥent, tamurt-nsent tezga deg wulawen-nsent.
Anda yebɣu iruḥ, tezga tamurt-is deg uqerruy-is.
Anda tebɣu truḥ, tezga tamurt-is deg uqerruy-is.
Anda tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ, tezga tamurt-ik deg uqerruy-ik.
Anda tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ, tezga tamurt-im deg uqerruy-im.
Anda yebɣu iruḥ, tezga tamurt-ines deg uqerruy-ines.
Anda tebɣu truḥ, tezga tamurt-ines deg uqerruy-ines.
Anda tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ, tezga tamurt-inem deg uqerruy-inem.
Anda tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ, tezga tamurt-inek deg uqerruy-inek.
Anda bɣuɣ ruḥeɣ, tezga tamurt-iw deg uqerruy-iw.
Anda bɣuɣ ruḥeɣ, tezga tamurt-inu deg uqerruy-inu.
Nuɣal d iɣriben deg tmurt-nneɣ.
Nuɣal d tiɣribin deg tmurt-nteɣ.
Yuɣal d aɣrib deg tmurt-is.
Yuɣal d aɣrib deg tmurt-ines.
Tuɣal d taɣribt deg tmurt-is.
Tuɣal d taɣribt deg tmurt-ines.
Tuɣaleḍ d taɣribt deg tmurt-im.
Tuɣaleḍ d taɣribt deg tmurt-inem.
Tuɣaleḍ d aɣrib deg tmurt-inek.
Tuɣaleḍ d aɣrib deg tmurt-ik.
Tuɣalem d iɣriben deg tmurt-nken.
Tuɣalemt d tiɣribin deg tmurt-nkent.
Tuɣalem d iɣriben deg tmurt-nwen.
Tuɣalemt d tiɣribin deg tmurt-nwent.
Uɣaleɣ d taɣribt deg tmurt-iw.
Uɣaleɣ d taɣribt deg tmurt-inu.
Uɣaleɣ d aɣrib deg tmurt-iw.
Uɣaleɣ d aɣrib deg tmurt-inu.
Tella tbedd, necdeɣ-tt-id ad teqqim, tugi.
Yella ibedd, necdeɣ-t-id ad yeqqim, yugi.
Telliḍ tbeddeḍ, necdeɣ-k-id ad teqqimeḍ, tugiḍ.
Telliḍ tbeddeḍ, necdeɣ-kem-id ad teqqimeḍ, tugiḍ.
Ɣas yezger i lebḥer, ul-is yeǧǧa-t-in di tmurt.
Ɣas tezger i lebḥer, ul-is teǧǧa-t-in di tmurt.
Ɣas nezger i lebḥer, ulawen-nneɣ neǧǧa-ten-in di tmurt.
Ɣas nezger i lebḥer, ulawen-nteɣ neǧǧa-ten-in di tmurt.
Ɣas tzegreḍ i lebḥer, ul-ik teǧǧiḍ-t-in di tmurt.
Ɣas tzegreḍ i lebḥer, ul-im teǧǧiḍ-t-in di tmurt.
Ɣas tzegrem i lebḥer, ulawen-nken teǧǧam-ten-in di tmurt.
Ɣas tzegremt i lebḥer, ulawen-nkent teǧǧamt-ten-in di tmurt.
Ɣas tzegrem i lebḥer, ulawen-nwen teǧǧam-ten-in di tmurt.
Ɣas tzegremt i lebḥer, ulawen-nwent teǧǧamt-ten-in di tmurt.
Ɣas zegren i lebḥer, ulawen-nsen ǧǧan-ten-in di tmurt.
Ɣas zegrent i lebḥer, ulawen-nsent ǧǧant-ten-in di tmurt.
Ɣas zegreɣ i lebḥer, ul-iw ǧǧiɣ-t-in di tmurt.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-as.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-ak.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-am.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-i.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-asen.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-asent.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-akent.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-awen.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-awent.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-aneɣ.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-anteɣ.
Tugi ad tekfu lɣerba fell-aken.
Ḥnin wul-is, iḥemmel akk medden.
Ḥnin wul-is, tḥemmel akk medden.
Ḥnin wul-ik, tḥemmleḍ akk medden.
Ḥnin wul-im, tḥemmleḍ akk medden.
Ḥnin wul-iw, ḥemmleɣ akk medden.
Ḥninit wulawen-nsen, ḥemmlen akk medden.
Ḥninit wulawen-nsent, ḥemmlent akk medden.
Ḥninit wulawen-nken, tḥemmlem akk medden.
Ḥninit wulawen-nkent, tḥemmlemt akk medden.
Ḥninit wulawen-nwen, tḥemmlem akk medden.
Ḥninit wulawen-nwent, tḥemmlemt akk medden.
I tmeṭṭut n gma-tkent teɛdel yid-kent ?
Yal yiwen yexdem ayen iwimi yezmer.
Tal yiwet texdem ayen iwimi tezmer.
Yefka azal i wiyiḍ, yeǧǧa iman-is.
Efk azal i yiman-ik uqbel wiyiḍ.
Win ur neḥmmil ara iman-is, amek i tebɣiḍ ad iḥemmel wiyiḍ.
Tin ur neḥmmil ara iman-is, amek i tebɣiḍ ad tḥemmel wiyiḍ.
Tid ur neḥmmil ara iman-nsent, amek i tebɣiḍ ad tḥemmlent wiyiḍ.
Wid ur neḥmmil ara iman-nsen, amek i tebɣiḍ ad tḥemmlen wiyiḍ.
Yewweḍ uɣyul s anrar yeglalez, mi iwala timẓin ur tent-yečči ara, tewwet-it lmeɣla.
Fkem azal i yiman-nken uqbel wiyiḍ.
Fkemt azal i yiman-nkent uqbel wiyiḍ.
Fkem azal i yiman-nwen uqbel wiyiḍ.
Fkemf azal i yiman-nwenf uqbel wiyiḍ.
Fket azal i yiman-nwen uqbel wiyiḍ.
Fket azal i yiman-nken uqbel wiyiḍ.
Tefka azal i wiyiḍ, teǧǧa iman-is.
Nefka azal i wiyiḍ, neǧǧa iman-nneɣ.
Nefka azal i wiyiḍ, neǧǧa iman-nteɣ.
Tefkam azal i wiyiḍ, teǧǧam iman-nken.
Tefkamt azal i wiyiḍ, teǧǧamt iman-nkent.
Tefkam azal i wiyiḍ, teǧǧam iman-nwen.
Tefkamt azal i wiyiḍ, teǧǧamt iman-nwent.
Fkan azal i wiyiḍ, ǧǧan iman-nsen.
Fkant azal i wiyiḍ, ǧǧant iman-nsent.
Fkiɣ azal i wiyiḍ, ǧǧiɣ iman-iw.
Ittenfal uxxam d tayri, wa iḥemmel wayeḍ.
Yeččur uxxam-nsen d tayri.
Yeččur uxxam-nneɣ d tayri.
Yeččur uxxam-nwen d tayri.
Yeččur uxxam-nken d tayri.
Nḥemmel aṭas imawlan, fell-aneɣ ɛetben aṭas.
Aṭas i ɛetben fell-aneɣ yimawlan-nneɣ.
Aṭas i ɛetben fell-awen yimawlan-nwen.
Aṭas i ɛetben fell-aken yimawlan-nken.
Aṭas i ɛetben fell-asen yimawlan-nsen.
Ɣas yebɛed fell-anteɣ, gma-tenteɣ deg wul i yezdeɣ.
Nḥemmel-it mačči d kra, iḥemmel-aɣ aṭas ula d netta.
Ad tt-ikemmel Rebbi akka.
D ayagi kan i nebɣa
Am ubernus tagmat-nneɣ teẓḍa, asemmiḍ ur t-nettissin.
Ala idurar ur nettemlili.
Deg tesdawit i d-nettagem tamussni.
Tugem-d aman deg uyeddid i d-tbubb ɣef uɛrur-is.
D acu ara k-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur k-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara m-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur kem-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara ken-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur ken-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara kent-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur kent-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara wen-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur ken-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara went-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur kent-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara sen-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur ten-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara sent-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur tent-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara s-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur t-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
D acu ara s-iniɣ ? Uḍneɣ cwiṭ ur tt-ɛniɣ, akka tura aqerruy-iw d ilem.
Iruḥ-as win iwimi tessawal baba.
I waniwa tura iwimi ara tessiwel baba ?
Lufan i yettuɣal lxir talfi i t-nerra i uzger, ad yeɣli kan ad nemmeɣ fell-as s ujenwi s amgerḍ.
Ur zmireɣ ad xemmemeɣ ɣef kra.
Ur zmiren ad xemmemen ɣef kra.
Ur zmirent ad xemmement ɣef kra.
Ur yezmir ad ixemmem ɣef kra.
Ur tezmir ad txemmem ɣef kra.
Ur nezmir ad xemmem ɣef kra.
Ur tezmireḍ ad txemmemeḍ ɣef kra.
Ur tezmirem ad txemmemem ɣef kra.
Ur tezmiremt ad txemmememt ɣef kra.
Teqqim teggugem, awal ur tt-id-yuli.
Neqqim neggugem, awal ur aɣ-d-yuli.
Teqqimeḍ teggugmeḍ, awal ur k-id-yuli.
Teqqimeḍ teggugmeḍ, awal ur kem-id-yuli.
Teqqimem teggugmem, awal ur ken-id-yuli.
Teqqimemt teggugmemt, awal ur kent-id-yuli.
Qqimeɣ ggugmeɣ, awal ur iyi-d-yuli.
Qqimen ggugmen, awal ur ten-id-yuli.
Qqiment ggugment, awal ur tent-id-yuli.
Ur tesɛiḍ d acu ara d-tiniḍ !
Ur tesɛim d acu ara d-tinim.
Ur tesɛimt d acu ara d-tinimt.
Ur tesɛiḍ d acu ara d-tiniḍ.
Ur tesɛi d acu ara d-tini.
Ur yesɛi d acu ara d-yini.
Ur nesɛi d acu ara d-nini.
Ur sɛin d acu ara d-inin.
Ur sɛint d acu ara d-inint.
Kra ara d-iniɣ ur yettɛedday.
Kra ara d-inin ur yettɛedday.
Kra ara d-inint ur yettɛedday.
Kra ara d-yini ur yettɛedday.
Kra ara d-tini ur yettɛedday.
Kra ara d-nini ur yettɛedday.
Kra ara d-tiniḍ ur yettɛedday.
Kra ara d-tinim ur yettɛedday.
Kra ara d-tinimt ur yettɛedday.
Ala awal-ik i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-im i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-is i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-iw i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-nneɣ i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-nteɣ i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-nken i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-nkent i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-nwen i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-nwent i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-nsen i yettɛeddayen.
Ala awal-nsent i yettɛeddayen.
Qader iman-ik, ad k-qadren medden.
Qader iman-im, ad kem-qadren medden.

Qadremt iman-nwent, ad kent-qadren medden.
Qadret iman-nken, ad ken-qadren medden.
Qadret iman-nwen, ad ken-qadren medden.

Ttemsefhament deg yigenni.
Nettemsefham deg yigenni.
Tettemsefhamem deg yigenni.
Tettemsefhamemt deg yigenni.
Tameṭṭut yuɣen sin, ulac d acu ur tessin.
Ulac d acu ur yessin.
Ulac d acu ur tessin.
Ulac d acu ur nessin.

Ulac d acu ur tessinemt.

Ulac d acu ur ssinent.
Fell-as ad tsebbel leɛmer-is.
Fell-as ad isebbel leɛmer-is.
Fell-as ad nsebbel leɛmer-nneɣ.
Fell-as ad nsebbel leɛmer-nteɣ.
Fell-as ad tsebbleḍ leɛmer-ik.
Fell-as ad tsebbleḍ leɛmer-inek.
Fell-as ad tsebbleḍ leɛmer-im.
Fell-as ad tsebbleḍ leɛmer-inem.

Fell-as ad tsebblem leɛmer-nken.
Fell-as ad tsebblem leɛmer-nwen.

Aṭas n tmura deg umaḍal ur nettayal ara deg yiman-nsent.
Llant kra n tmura d taklatin ɣef tiyaḍ.
Ma yella ur neddukel ara, terwi fell-aneɣ.
Ma yella ur tedduklem ara, terwi fell-aken.
Ma yella ur tedduklem ara, terwi fell-awen.
Ma yella ur dduklen ara, terwi fell-asen.
Ala taddukli gar-aneɣ ara aɣ-iḥudden ɣef nnger.
Ala taddukli gar-aken ara ken-iḥudden ɣef nnger.
Ala taddukli gar-awen ara ken-iḥudden ɣef nnger.
Ala taddukli gar-asen ara ten-iḥudden ɣef nnger.
Tinnufra tekkent rebɛin n wussan, tameṭṭut ur txeddem ara ccɣel yerna ad tett ala akanaf d tmellalin.
Llan kra n Yicinwaten i ixeddmen deg tmurt-nneɣ lemden taqbaylit, uɣalen ttmeslayen-tt.

Wigi bɣan ad aɣ-mḥun.
Wigi bɣan ad aɣ-kksen.

Tebɣam ad nettu laṣel-nneɣ.

D awezɣi ad ttun laṣel-nsen.

D awezɣi ad yettu laṣel-ines.

Mmɣeɣ ɣef tkemmict n udfel, mmektaɣ-d tamurt n Leqbayel.
Mmɣen ɣef tkemmict n udfel, mmektan-d tamurt n Leqbayel.
Mmɣent ɣef tkemmict n udfel, mmektant-d tamurt n Leqbayel.
Yemmeɣ ɣef tkemmict n udfel, yemmekta-d tamurt n Leqbayel.
Temmeɣ ɣef tkemmict n udfel, temmekta-d tamurt n Leqbayel.
Nemmeɣ ɣef tkemmict n udfel, nemmekta-d tamurt n Leqbayel.

Temmɣemt ɣef tkemmict n udfel, temmektamt-d tamurt n Leqbayel.
Tessefqed i tyaziḍt-is, tufa-tt turew-d semmus n tmellalin.
Yessefqed i tyaziḍt-is, yufa-tt turew-d semmus n tmellalin.
Tessfeqdeḍ i tyaziḍt-ik, tufiḍ-tt turew-d semmus n tmellalin.
Tessfeqdeḍ i tyaziḍt-im, tufiḍ-tt turew-d semmus n tmellalin.
Ssfeqdeɣ i tyaziḍt-iw, ufiɣ-tt turew-d semmus n tmellalin.
Ssfeqden i tyaziḍt-nsen, ufan-tt turew-d semmus n tmellalin.
Ssfeqdent i tyaziḍt-nsen, ufant-tt turew-d semmus n tmellalin.

Nessefqed i tyaziḍt-nteɣ, nufa-tt turew-d semmus n tmellalin.

Ili-kem d tin yettḥezziben.
Ilim-ken d wid yettḥezziben.

Ilit-ken d wid yettḥezziben.

Ddum ɣer sdat ur ttkukrum.
Ddumt ɣer sdat ur ttkukrumt.

Ttkel ɣef yiman-im tebduḍ tikli.

Irgazen am yirden, mi ɣlin ad d-kkren.

Akken i xedment ɛewqent.
Akken i xedmeɣ ɛewqeɣ.

Akken i texdem tewḥel.
Akken i nexdem newḥel.

Akken i txedmemt tweḥlemt.

Akken i xedment weḥlent.

Aẓwar i yeẓẓwer uqcic-ihin iman-is.
Aẓwar i teẓẓwer teqcict-ihin iman-is.
Aẓwar i ẓẓewren warrac-ihin iman-is.
Aẓwar i ẓẓewrent teqcicin-ihin iman-is.

Tetteddu tettrejdil.
Nteddu nettrejdil.
Tettedduḍ tettrejdileḍ.
Tetteddum tettrejdilem.
Tetteddumt tettrejdilemt.
Ttedduɣ ttrejdileɣ.
Tteddun ttrejdilen.
Tteddunt ttrejdilent.
Ajedɛun d mmi-s n tegmert.
Tajedɛunt d yelli-s n tegmert.
Treyyec tasekkurt, tessared-itt akken ad tt-id-tseknef.
Ireyyec tasekkurt, yessared-itt akken ad tt-id-iseknef.
Yerra-d akk ijeɣdan-is mi yeswa taqerɛet n ccrab.
Terra-d akk ijeɣdan-is mi teswa taqerɛet n ccrab.
Nerra-d akk ijeɣdan-nneɣ mi neswa taqerɛet n ccrab.
Nerra-d akk ijeɣdan-nteɣ mi neswa taqerɛet n ccrab.
Terram-d akk ijeɣdan-nken mi teswam taqerɛet n ccrab.
Terramt-d akk ijeɣdan-nkent mi teswamt taqerɛet n ccrab.
Terriḍ-d akk ijeɣdan-ik mi teswiḍ taqerɛet n ccrab.
Terriḍ-d akk ijeɣdan-im mi teswiḍ taqerɛet n ccrab.
Terram-d akk ijeɣdan-nwen mi teswam taqerɛet n ccrab.
Terramt-d akk ijeɣdan-nwent mi teswamt taqerɛet n ccrab.
Rriɣ-d akk ijeɣdan-iw mi swiɣ taqerɛet n ccrab.
Rran-d akk ijeɣdan-nsen mi swan taqerɛet n ccrab.
Rrant-d akk ijeɣdan-nsent mi swant taqerɛet n ccrab.
Yelsa tabanta-s, iɛedda ɣer yiger ad yemger.
Telsa tabanta-s, tɛedda ɣer yiger ad temger.
Telsa tabanta-s, tɛedda s iger ad temger.
Yelsa tabanta-s, iɛedda s iger ad yemger.
Nelsa tibantiwin-nneɣ, nɛedda s iger ad nemger.
Nelsa tibantiwin-nteɣ, nɛedda s iger ad nemger.
Telsam tibantiwin-nken, tɛeddam s iger ad tmegrem.
Telsamt tibantiwin-nkent, tɛeddamt s iger ad tmegremt.
Telsam tibantiwin-nwen, tɛeddam s iger ad tmegrem.
Telsamt tibantiwin-nwent, tɛeddamt s iger ad tmegremt.
Telsiḍ tabanta-k, tɛeddaḍ s iger ad tmegreḍ.
Telsiḍ tabanta-m, tɛeddaḍ s iger ad tmegreḍ.
Lsiɣ tabanta-w, ɛeddaɣ s iger ad megreɣ.
Lsan tibantiwin-nsen, ɛeddan s iger ad megren.
Lsant tibantiwin-nsent, ɛeddant s iger ad megrent.
Yessenta tagust n usɣar deg lḥiḍ.
Yessenta tagust n wuzzal deg uɣrab.
Tessenta tagust n wuzzal deg uɣrab.
Nessenta tagust n usɣar deg lḥiḍ.
Nessenta tagust n wuzzal deg uɣrab.
Tessentam tagust n wuzzal deg uɣrab.
Tessentamt tagust n wuzzal deg uɣrab.
Tessentam tagust n usɣar deg lḥiḍ.
Tessentamt tagust n usɣar deg lḥiḍ.
Tessentaḍ tagust n wuzzal deg uɣrab.
Tessenta tagust n wuzzal deg lḥiḍ.
Tessentaḍ tagust n wuzzal deg lḥiḍ.
Ssentaɣ tagust n wuzzal deg lḥiḍ.

Ssentant tagust n wuzzal deg lḥiḍ.

Wwiɣ snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nneɣ.
Wwint snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nsent.
Yewwi snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-is.
Tewwi snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-is.
Newwi snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nneɣ.
Newwi snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nteɣ.
Tewwiḍ snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-ik.
Tewwiḍ snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-inek.
Tewwiḍ snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-im.
Tewwiḍ snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-inem.
Yewwi snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-ines.
Tewwi snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-ines.
Tewwim snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nken.
Tewwimt snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nkent.
Tewwim snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nwen.
Tewwimt snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nwent.
Wwiɣ snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-iw.
Wwiɣ snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-inu.
Wwin snat lgelbat n temẓin d snat n yirden ɣer tessirt ad tent-id-iẓed umeẓẓad n taddart-nsen.

Tura-d tnelmadt aḍris ɣef walug-is..

D aksum i tetten yizmawen.

Kkset aɣilif, ur tesɛim d acu ara tagadem.

Tettagad ad d-teffeɣ deg yiḍ.
Nettagad ad d-neffeɣ deg yiḍ.

Tettagademt ad d-teffɣemt deg yiḍ.

Ttagadent ad d-ffɣent deg yiḍ.

Yettaǧǧa ccɣel-is d azgen.
Lecɣal-is yettaǧǧa-ten d izegnen.
Tettaǧǧa ccɣel-is d azgen.
Nettaǧǧa ccɣel-nneɣ d azgen.
Nettaǧǧa ccɣel-nteɣ d azgen.
Tettaǧǧaḍ ccɣel-ik d azgen.
Tettaǧǧaḍ ccɣel-inek d azgen.
Tettaǧǧaḍ ccɣel-im d azgen.
Tettaǧǧaḍ ccɣel-inem d azgen.
Yettaǧǧa ccɣel-ines d azgen.
Tettaǧǧa ccɣel-ines d azgen.
Tettaǧǧam ccɣel-nken d azgen.
Tettaǧǧamt ccɣel-nkent d azgen.
Tettaǧǧam ccɣel-nwen d azgen.
Tettaǧǧamt ccɣel-nwent d azgen.
Ttaǧǧaɣ ccɣel-iw d azgen.
Ttaǧǧan ccɣel-nsen d azgen.
Ttaǧǧant ccɣel-nsent d azgen.
Ttaǧǧaɣ ccɣel-inu d azgen.
Lecɣal-is tettaǧǧa-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-nneɣ nettaǧǧa-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-nteɣ nettaǧǧa-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-ik tettaǧǧaḍ-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-inek tettaǧǧaḍ-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-im tettaǧǧaḍ-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-inem tettaǧǧaḍ-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-ines tettaǧǧa-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-ines yettaǧǧa-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-nken tettaǧǧam-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-nkent tettaǧǧamt-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-nwen tettaǧǧam-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-nwent tettaǧǧamt-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-iw ttaǧǧaɣ-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-inu ttaǧǧaɣ-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-nsen ttaǧǧan-ten d izegnen.
Lecɣal-nsent ttaǧǧant-ten d izegnen.

Ili akken tebɣiḍ mačči akken bɣan.
Ilim akken tebɣam mačči akken bɣan.
Ilimt akken tebɣamt mačči akken bɣan.
Ilit akken tebɣam mačči akken bɣan.
Bɣiɣ ad iliɣ akken bɣiɣ mačči akken tebɣam.
Bɣan ad iliɣ akken bɣan mačči akken tebɣam.
Bɣant ad iliɣ akken bɣant mačči akken tebɣam.

Nettat d tidet ur ttemlilin.

Kemm d tidet ur tettemlilim.

Kunemti d tidet ur tettemlilimt.
Nutni d tidet ur ttemlilin.
Nutenti d tidet ur ttemlilint.

Ulac lettkal ɣef tin inekṛen laṣel-is.
Ulac lettkal ɣef wid inekṛen laṣel-nsen.
Ulac lettkal ɣef tid inekṛen laṣel-nsent.
Ḍfin allaɣ-is almi yettu iman-is.
Ḍfin allaɣ-is almi yettu laṣel-is.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nneɣ almi yettu iman-nneɣ.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nteɣ almi yettu iman-nteɣ.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nneɣ almi yettu laṣel-nneɣ.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nteɣ almi yettu laṣel-nteɣ.
Ḍfin allaɣ-is almi tettu iman-is.
Ḍfin allaɣ-is almi tettu laṣel-is.
Ḍfin allaɣ-ik almi tettuḍ laṣel-ik.
Ḍfin allaɣ-im almi tettuḍ laṣel-im.
Ḍfin allaɣ-ik almi tettuḍ iman-ik.
Ḍfin allaɣ-im almi tettuḍ iman-im.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nken almi tettum iman-nken.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nkent almi tettumt iman-nkent.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nwen almi tettum iman-nwen.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nwent almi tettumt iman-nwent.
Ḍfin allaɣ-iw almi ttuɣ iman-iw.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nsen almi ttun iman-nsen.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nsent almi ttunt iman-nsent.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nsen almi ttun laṣel-nsen.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nsent almi ttunt laṣel-nsent.
Ḍfin allaɣ-iw almi ttuɣ laṣel-iw.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nken almi tettum laṣel-nken.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nkent almi tettumt laṣel-nkent.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nwen almi tettum laṣel-nwen.
Ḍfin allaɣ-nwent almi tettumt laṣel-nwent.
Ma tḥeqreḍ iman-ik, ad k-ḥeqren medden.
Ma tḥeqreḍ iman-im, ad kem-ḥeqren medden.
Ma tḥeqrem iman-nken, ad ken-ḥeqren medden.
Ma tḥeqremt iman-nkent, ad kent-ḥeqren medden.
Ma tḥeqrem iman-nwen, ad ken-ḥeqren medden.
Ma tḥeqremt iman-nwent, ad kent-ḥeqren medden.
Ma teḥqer iman-is, ad tt-ḥeqren medden.
Ma yeḥqer iman-is, ad t-ḥeqren medden.
Ma neḥqer iman-nneɣ, ad ɣ-ḥeqren medden.
Ma neḥqer iman-nteɣ, ad ɣ-ḥeqren medden.
Ma ḥeqreɣ iman-iw, ad iyi-ḥeqren medden.
Ma ḥeqren iman-nsen, ad ten-ḥeqren medden.
Ma ḥeqrent iman-nsent, ad tent-ḥeqren medden.
Efk ccan i yiman-ik ad tiɛzizeḍ.
Efk ccan i yiman-im ad tiɛzizeḍ.
Fkem ccan i yiman-nken ad tiɛzizem.
Fkemt ccan i yiman-nkent ad tiɛzizemt.
Fkem ccan i yiman-nwen ad tiɛzizem.
Fkemt ccan i yiman-nwent ad tiɛzizemt.
Fket ccan i yiman-nwen ad tiɛzizem.
Fket ccan i yiman-nken ad tiɛzizem.
Win yeddan d wi t-yifen ad yelmed.
Tin yeddan d wi tt-yifen ad telmed.
Wid yeddan d wi ten-yifen ad lemden.
Tid yeddan d wi tent-yifen ad lemdent.
D acu n tmara i t-yewwin ad yeqbeḥ medden.
D acu n tmara i tt-yewwin ad teqbeḥ medden.
D acu n tmara i ɣ-yewwin ad neqbeḥ medden.
D acu n tmara i k-yewwin ad tqebḥeḍ medden.
D acu n tmara i kem-yewwin ad tqebḥeḍ medden.
D acu n tmara i ken-yewwin ad tqebḥem medden.
D acu n tmara i kent-yewwin ad tqebḥemt medden.
D acu n tmara i iyi-yewwin ad qebḥeɣ medden.
D acu n tmara i ten-yewwin ad qebḥen medden.
D acu n tmara i tent-yewwin ad qebḥent medden.
Imi-s am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.
Imi-k am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.
Imi-m am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.
Imawen-nken am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.
Imawen-nkent am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.
Imawen-nwen am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.
Imawen-nwent am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.
Imawen-nsen am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.
Imawen-nsent am tzuliɣt, kra n yir awal syin i d-itekk.

Tikli i d-tewwim tezleg.
Tikli i d-tewwimt tezleg.
Tikli i d-tewwi tezleg.

Tikli i d-wwin tezleg.
Tikli i d-wwint tezleg.
Ala tidet ara d-yeqqimen.
Ma tɣab tidet, tikerkas ttaṭṭafent taqaɛet.
Tikerkas ttaṭṭafent taqaɛet ma tidet ulac-itt.
Win ara yeswen tilelli, ad as-yekkes fad n tal tamsalt.
Tin ara yeswen tilelli, ad as-yekkes fad n tal tamsalt.
Wid ara yeswen tilelli, ad asen-yekkes fad n tal tamsalt.
Tid ara yeswen tilelli, ad asent-yekkes fad n tal tamsalt.
Ur iyi-d-ttak ara aslem, sselmed-iyi amek ar t-id-ṭṭfeɣ.
Ur s-ttak ara aslem, sselmed-as amek ar t-id-yeṭṭef.
Ur s-ttak ara aslem, sselmed-as amek ar t-id-teṭṭef.
Ur ɣ-d-ttak ara iselman, sselmed-aɣ amek ar ten-id-neṭṭef.
Ur sen-d-ttak ara iselman, sselmed-asen amek ar ten-id-ṭṭfen.
Ur sent-d-ttak ara iselman, sselmed-asent amek ar ten-id-ṭṭfent.
Ur iyi-d-ttak kra, sselmed-iyi amek ara zemreɣ i yiman-iw.
Ur s-d-ttak kra, sselmed-as amek ara yezmer i yiman-is.
Ur s-d-ttak kra, sselmed-as amek ara tezmer i yiman-is.
Ur ɣ-d-ttak kra, sselmed-aɣ amek ara nezmer i yiman-nneɣ.
Ur ɣ-d-ttak kra, sselmed-aɣ amek ara nezmer i yiman-nteɣ.
Ur sen-d-ttak kra, sselmed-asen amek ara zemren i yiman-nsen.
Ur sent-d-ttak kra, sselmed-asent amek ara zemrent i yiman-nsent.
Menyif ad ak-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfeḍ aslem wala ad k-t-in-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad am-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfeḍ aslem wala ad m-t-in-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad aken-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfem iselman wala ad ken-ten-in-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad akent-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfemt iselman wala ad kent-ten-in-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad awen-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfem iselman wala ad wen-ten-in-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad awent-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfemt iselman wala ad went-ten-in-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad asen-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-ṭṭfen iselman wala ad sen-ten-in-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad asent-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-ṭṭfent iselman wala ad sent-ten-in-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad iyi-tesslemdeḍ amek ara d-ṭṭfeɣ aslem wala ad iyi-t-id-tefkeḍ d tikci.
Menyif ad asen-tesslemdeḍ amek ara d-ṭṭfen iselman wala ad asen-ten-id-tefkeḍ d tikci.
Menyif ad asent-tesslemdeḍ amek ara d-ṭṭfent iselman wala ad asent-ten-id-tefkeḍ d tikci.
Menyif ad aɣ-tesslemdeḍ amek ara d-neṭṭef iselman wala ad aɣ-ten-id-tefkeḍ d tikci.
Talsa tlul-d deg Tmazɣa.
Tamurt n Maṣer d tamaziɣt.
Imaṣriyen nekṛen laṣel-nsen amaziɣ.
Aṭas n yidgan deg tmurt n Maṣer ttawin isem amaziɣ.
Yečča tajɛelt.
Tečča tajɛelt.
Tetten tijɛal.
Tettent tijɛal.
Mačči yiwen deg-sen i yeččan tajɛelt.
Mačči yiwet deg-sent i yeččan tajɛelt.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ tilawt tɛedda i tsugna.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ tilawt tɛedda i uferriɣ.
Tilawt tɛedda i tsugna.
Yessenɣal win ur d-nettagem, yesserɣay win ur d-nzeddem.
Tessenɣal tin ur d-nettagem, tesserɣay tin ur d-nzeddem.
Ssenɣalen wid ur d-nettagem, sserɣayen wid ur d-nzeddem.
Ssenɣalent tid ur d-nettagem, sserɣayent tid ur d-nzeddem.
I wakken tamurt ad taf iman-is, ilaq ad neslelli taɣdemt.
Deg tmurt ideg ulac tilelli, taɣdemt ur tettili.
Ma ulac tilelli, ulac taɣdemt.
Taɣdemt tetteddu d tlelli.
Lmizan n teɣdemt anda ulac tilelli, yefcel.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i as-d-yeggran i tmurt yettɛeddayen ɣef tarwa-s.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-nernu.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-ternu.

Ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-ternumt.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-rnun.
Ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-rnunt.

Tamurt yufan iman-is d tin yettqadaren izerfan n umdan.
Tamurt yufan iman-is d tin yettqadaren tilelli n umeslay.

Tbeddemt ɣef yiwen uḍar.
Beddeɣ ɣef yiwen uḍar.
Bedden ɣef yiwen uḍar.
Beddent ɣef yiwen uḍar.
Yewwet-itt-id almi ur iẓerr ara abrid.
Tewwet-itt-id almi ur tẓerr ara abrid.
Newwet-itt-id almi ur nẓerr ara abrid.
Tewwteḍ-tt-id almi ur tẓerreḍ ara abrid.
Tewwtem-tt-id almi ur tẓerrem ara abrid.
Tewwtemt-tt-id almi ur tẓerremt ara abrid.
Wwteɣ-tt-id almi ur ẓerreɣ ara abrid.
Wwten-tt-id almi ur ẓerren ara abrid.
Wwtent-tt-id almi ur ẓerrent ara abrid.
Yedder ibedd ur yekni.
Tedder tbedd ur tekni.
Nedder nbedd ur nekni.
Teddreḍ tbeddeḍ ur tekniḍ.
Teddrem tbeddem ur teknim.
Teddremt tbeddemt ur teknimt.
Ddreɣ beddeɣ ur kniɣ.
Ddren bedden ur knin.
Ddrent beddent ur knint.
Mi as-tegzem tbeḥlust-is i wuccen, yettnadi ad gezment akk tbeḥlas n watmaten-is akken ur d-ittban ara.
Mi as-tegzem tṣeṭṭa-s i wuccen, yettnadi ad gezment akk tṣeḍwa n watmaten-is akken ur d-ittban ara.
Ma ur teqbileḍ ara ddin-nsen, ad teččeḍ tiyita s uqabac bu yiwen n wugel ɣer tmelɣiɣt. Ɣef waya i as-qqaren ddin n uqabac.
A ddin n uqabac !
Yeswa afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-is.
Teswa afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-is.
Neswa afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-nneɣ.
Neswa afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-nteɣ.
Teswam afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-nken.
Teswamt afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-nkent.
Teswam afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-nwen.
Teswamt afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-nwent.
Teswiḍ afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-ik.
Teswiḍ afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-inek.
Teswiḍ afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-inem.
Teswiḍ afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-im.
Teswa afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-ines.
Yeswa afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-ines.
Swiɣ afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-iw.
Swiɣ afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-inu.
Swan afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-nsen.
Swant afenǧal n lqahwa, ldint-d wallen-nsent.
Ma ur teqbilem ara ddin-nsen, ad teččem tiyita s uqabac bu yiwen n wugel ɣer tmelɣiɣt. Ɣef waya i as-qqaren ddin n uqabac.
Ma ur teqbilemt ara ddin-nsen, ad teččemt tiyita s uqabac bu yiwen n wugel ɣer tmelɣiɣt. Ɣef waya i as-qqaren ddin n uqabac.
Ma ur teqbil ara ddin-nsen, ad tečč tiyita s uqabac bu yiwen n wugel ɣer tmelɣiɣt. Ɣef waya i as-qqaren ddin n uqabac.
Ma ur yeqbil ara ddin-nsen, ad yečč tiyita s uqabac bu yiwen n wugel ɣer tmelɣiɣt. Ɣef waya i as-qqaren ddin n uqabac.
Ma ur neqbil ara ddin-nsen, ad nečč tiyita s uqabac bu yiwen n wugel ɣer tmelɣiɣt. Ɣef waya i as-qqaren ddin n uqabac.
Ma ur qbilen ara ddin-nsen, ad ččen tiyita s uqabac bu yiwen n wugel ɣer tmelɣiɣt. Ɣef waya i as-qqaren ddin n uqabac.
Ma ur qbilent ara ddin-nsen, ad ččent tiyita s uqabac bu yiwen n wugel ɣer tmelɣiɣt. Ɣef waya i as-qqaren ddin n uqabac.

Ttruḥun wudmawen, ttɣimin-d yismawen.
Issin ad tmelkeḍ iman-ik deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Issin ad tmelkeḍ iman-im deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Issinem ad tmelkem iman-nken deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Issinemt ad tmelkemt iman-nkent deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.
Issinem ad tmelkem iman-nwen deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.

Issinet ad tmelkem iman-nken deg tegnit n ṭṭiq.

Tamkarḍit taqbaylit skudmal tettimɣur.

Win ur nessin d acu ara d-tini, teṭṭef imi-s.

Tid ur nessin d acu ara d-inint, ṭṭfent imawen-nsent.

Nuɣal neɛdez ad nɣer adlis.

Tuɣal teɛdez ad tɣer adlis.

Yugi ad yecɛef.

Ad ken-ǧǧeɣ kan i Rebbi.
Ad kent-ǧǧeɣ kan i Ṛebbi.
Ad ten-ǧǧeɣ kan i Ṛebbi.
Ad tent-ǧǧeɣ kan i Ṛebbi.
Ad k-ǧǧeɣ kan i Rebbi.

Ad t-ǧǧeɣ kan i Rebbi.

Ad k-seqlilḥeɣ.

Iseqlaleḥ-itt.

Kker ad asen-teldiḍ taggurt.
Kker ad asent-teldiḍ taggurt.
Err tademmaɛt i teggurt.
Rrem tademmaɛt i teggurt.
Rremt tademmaɛt i teggurt.
Rret tademmaɛt i teggurt.
Yezger kan amnaṛ n teggurt, yufa-d iman-is deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Tezger kan amnaṛ n teggurt, tufa-d iman-is deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Nezger kan amnaṛ n teggurt, nufa-d iman-nneɣ deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Nezger kan amnaṛ n teggurt, nufa-d iman-nteɣ deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Tzegreḍ kan amnaṛ n teggurt, tufiḍ-d iman-ik deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Tzegreḍ kan amnaṛ n teggurt, tufiḍ-d iman-im deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Tzegrem kan amnaṛ n teggurt, tufam-d iman-nken deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Tzegremt kan amnaṛ n teggurt, tufamt-d iman-nkent deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Tzegrem kan amnaṛ n teggurt, tufam-d iman-nwen deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Tzegremt kan amnaṛ n teggurt, tufamt-d iman-nwent deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Zegreɣ kan amnaṛ n teggurt, ufiɣ-d iman-iw deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Zegren kan amnaṛ n teggurt, ufan-d iman-nsen deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.
Zegrent kan amnaṛ n teggurt, ufant-d iman-nsent deg tlemmast n tɣerɣert n uxxam.

Ur ggar ara iman-ik deg wayen ur k-nerzi.
Ur ggarem ara iman-nken deg wayen ur ken-nerzi.
Ur ggaremt ara iman-nkent deg wayen ur kent-nerzi.
Ur ggarem ara iman-nwen deg wayen ur ken-nerzi.
Ur ggaremt ara iman-nwent deg wayen ur kent-nerzi.
Ur ggaret ara iman-nwen deg wayen ur ken-nerzi.
Ur ggaret ara iman-nken deg wayen ur ken-nerzi.
Ur ggar ara iman-im deg wayen ur kem-nerzi.
Ur ilaq ara ad tegreḍ iman-ik deg wayen i k-ibeɛden.
Ur ilaq ara ad tegreḍ iman-ik deg wayen ur k-nerzi.
Ur ilaq ara ad tegreḍ iman-im deg wayen ur kem-nerzi.

Ur ilaq ara ad iger iman-is deg wayen ur t-nerzi.
Ur ilaq ara ad nger iman-nneɣ deg wayen ur aɣ-nerzi.
Ur ilaq ara ad nger iman-nteɣ deg wayen ur aɣ-nerzi.

Ur ilaq ara ad gren iman-nsen deg wayen ur ten-nerzi.
Ur ilaq ara ad grent iman-nsent deg wayen ur tent-nerzi.
Rfint-as akk tmiṭucin i d-iger deg tculliḍt.
Rfint-as akk tbexsisin i d-iger deg tculliḍt.
Rfint-as akk tbexsisin i d-tger deg tculliḍt.
Rfint-aɣ akk tbexsisin i d-nger deg tculliḍt.
Rfint-ak akk tbexsisin i d-tegreḍ deg tculliḍt.
Rfint-aken akk tbexsisin i d-tegrem deg tculliḍin.
Rfint-akent akk tbexsisin i d-tegremt deg tculliḍin.
Rfint-awen akk tbexsisin i d-tegrem deg tculliḍin.
Rfint-awent akk tbexsisin i d-tegremt deg tculliḍin.
Rfint-iyi akk tbexsisin i d-greɣ deg tculliḍt.
Rfint-asen akk tbexsisin i d-gren deg tculliḍin.
Rfint-asent akk tbexsisin i d-grent deg tculliḍin.
Yerfa mi as-rfint tmiṭucin i d-iger deg tculliḍt mačči deg teqbat.
Terfa mi as-rfint tmiṭucin i d-tger deg tculliḍt mačči deg teqbat.
Nerfa mi aɣ-rfint tmiṭucin i d-nger deg tculliḍt mačči deg teqbat.

Terfiḍ mi am-rfint tmiṭucin i d-tegreḍ deg tculliḍt mačči deg teqbat.

Terfamt mi akent-rfint tmiṭucin i d-tegremt deg tculliḍin mačči deg teqbatin.

Iɛreḍ-iten-id umeddakel-nsen ad ččen imensi.
Iɛreḍ-itent-id umeddakel-nsent ad ččent imensi.

Iwala-tt deg tmeɣra ass-nni, teɛǧeb-as.
Twala-tt deg tmeɣra ass-nni, iɛǧeb-as.
Twalaḍ-tt deg tmeɣra ass-nni, teɛǧeb-ak.
Twalaḍ-t deg tmeɣra ass-nni, iɛǧeb-am.
Walaɣ-tt deg tmeɣra ass-nni, teɛǧeb-iyi.
Walaɣ-t deg tmeɣra ass-nni, iɛǧeb-iyi.
Netta iḥemmel-itt, nettat tugi-t.
Nettat tḥemmel-it, netta yugi-tt.
Nekk ḥemmleɣ-k, kečč tugiḍ-iyi.
Nekk ḥemmleɣ-kem, kemm tugiḍ-iyi.
Ḥemmleɣ-t, iḥemmel-iyi.
Nemyeḥmal di sin, yugi Rebbi ad nemlili.
Ɣas bɣiɣ-tt tebɣa-iyi, Rebbi yugi ad aɣ-issemlil.
Wissen d acu i as-nexdem i Rebbi mi yugi ad nemlil.
Wissen d acu i as-xedmen i Rebbi mi yugi ad mlilen.
Wissen d acu i as-txedmem i Rebbi mi yugi ad temlilem.
Tsetḥa ad as-tini ḥemmleɣ-k.
Isetḥa ad as-yini ḥemmleɣ-kem.
Wissen acimi i msebran ?
Wissen acimi i temsebram ?
Wissen acimi i nemsebra ?
Ma tesɛiḍ tabɣest bru-iyi.
Yebra-as mebla lebɣi-ṣ.
Msebran mebla lebɣi-nsen.
Ma teɛǧeb-ik, aɣ-itt.
Ur iyi-teɛǧib, ur tt-ttaɣeɣ.
Taqcict i iḥemmel d taberqact.
Taqcict i iḥemmel tif akk tizziwin-is.
Ayyur deg yigenni, nettat di lqaɛa.
Ur iyi-teɛǧib, ur tt-uɣeɣ.
Akken i d-kkren, akken i kemmlen tudert-nsen.
Akken i d-nekker, akken i nkemmel tudert-nneɣ.
Akken i d-tekkrem, akken i tkemmlem tudert-nken.
Akken i d-tekkrem, akken i tkemmlem tudert-nwen.
Ssarameɣ ṭṭlam ad yuɣal d tafat, yal aɣbel ad yaf tifrat.
Ssarameɣ tillas ad uɣalent d tafat, yal aɣbel ad yaf tifrat.
Tameɣra n tayri d tamerbuht.
Tamurt tezdeɣ tayri, umren warraw-is.
Akken tamurt ad taf iman-is, ilaq tilelli ad tili nettat d tayri.
Temmut ur tuklal.
Yemmut ur yuklal.
Temmuteḍ ur tuklaleḍ.
Temmutem ur tuklalem.
Temmutemt ur tuklalemt.
Mmuten ur uklalen.
Mmutent ur uklalent.

Ala tid yelhan i yettmettaten.
Ala win yelhan i yettmettaten.
Ala tin yelhan i yettmettaten.

Tid ur nelhi tettɣunfu-tent lmut.
Win ur nelhi tettɣunfu-t lmut.
Tin ur nelhi tettɣunfu-tt lmut.
Aṭas i iɣurr zzman.
Ddunit tettɣurru.
Yiwen ur yeẓri d acu ara d-yeḍrun.
Yiwet ur teẓri d acu ara d-yeḍrun.
Ad nemmet akk, yiwen ur d-d-igerri.
Ad nemmet akken ma nella, yiwen ur d-igerri.
Ad nemmet d tirni, yiwen ur d-igerri.
Ad nemmet meṛṛa, yiwen ur d-igerri.
Ini-iyi-d d acu i tebɣiḍ.
Inim-iyi-d d acu i tebɣam.
Inimt-iyi-d d acu i tebɣamt.
Init-iyi-d d acu i tebɣam.
Ur iyi-d-yenni ara d acu i yebɣa.
Ur iyi-d-tenni ara d acu i tebɣa.
Ur iyi-d-tenniḍ ara d acu i tebɣiḍ.
Ur iyi-d-tennim ara d acu i tebɣam.
Ur iyi-d-tennimt ara d acu i tebɣamt.
Ur iyi-d-nnin ara d acu i bɣan.
Ur iyi-d-nnint ara d acu i bɣant.
Ur ak-nniɣ ara d acu i bɣiɣ.
Ur am-nniɣ ara d acu i bɣiɣ.
Ur as-nniɣ ara d acu i bɣiɣ.

Ur asent-nniɣ ara d acu i bɣiɣ.

Ayen tebɣa ad d-tini, tenna-t-id.
Ayen nebɣa ad d-nini, nenna-t-id.

Ayen tebɣamt ad d-tinimt, tennamt-t-id.

Ayen bɣan ad d-inin, nnan-t-id.
Ayen bɣant ad d-inint, nnant-t-id.

Aṭas i d-yettmektin laṣel-nsen.
Yettu laṣel-is, yeḍfer wayeḍ.
Tettu laṣel-is, teḍfer wayeḍ.
Nettu laṣel-nneɣ, neḍfer wayeḍ.
Nettu laṣel-nteɣ, neḍfer wayeḍ.

Ttuɣ laṣel-inu, ḍefreɣ wayeḍ.

Ttunt laṣel-nsent, ḍefrent wayeḍ.

Yettu laṣel-ines, yeḍfer wayeḍ.

Win ur nteddu ara ɣer sdat, yettuɣal ɣer deffir.
Tin ur nteddu ara ɣer sdat, tettuɣal ɣer deffir.

Ttuɣalent ɣer deffir tid ur nteddu ara ɣer sdat.

Tin ur nettxemmim amek ara ara ffɣent, tettaɣ-itent akken i ilaq.

Teɣli-d deg wawal.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-as uzaylal.
Ur iɛedda ara fell-i uzaylal.
Ur yettɛedday ara fell-i uzaylal.
Ur yettɛedday ara fell-ak uzaylal.
Ur yettɛedday ara fell-am uzaylal.
Ur yettɛedday ara fell-as uzaylal.

Ur yettɛedday ara fell-awent uzaylal.

Iberra deg yimawlan-is.
Tgureb ɣer yimawlan-is mi myezɛafen nettat d urgaz-is.
Tennuɣ d temɣart-is, dɣa tgureb ɣer yimawlan-is.
Tgureb ɣer yimawlan-is mi tennuɣ d temɣart-is.
Tgureb ɣer yimawlan-is mi tt-tennuɣ d temɣart-is.
Tennuɣ-itt temɣart-is, tekker tgureb.
Nnuɣen-tt yimɣaren-is, tekker tgureb.
Seg wasmi akken i tgureb ur d-tuɣal.
Seg wasmi akken i tgureb ur tt-id-rrin.
Deg yimawlan-is i iberra.
Deg yimawlan-is i tberra.
Deg yimawlan-is i nberra.
Deg yimawlan-is i tberraḍ.
Deg yimawlan-is i tberram.
Deg yimawlan-is i tberramt.
Deg yimawlan-is i berraɣ.
Deg yimawlan-is i berran.
Deg yimawlan-is i berrant.
Ansa i as-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Ansa i ak-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Ansa i am-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Ansa i aken-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Ansa i akent-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Ansa i awen-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Ansa i awent-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Ansa i asen-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Ansa i asent-kkiɣ mačči akken.
Anida ara nemlil ?
Anida ara temlilem ?
Anida ara mlilen ?

Ḥader ad tenwuḍ ur kem-ssineɣ ara.
Ḥader ad tenwum ur ken-ssineɣ ara.

Tin ara ten-id-yessiwlen, ilaq ad ten-tɣer ddeqs n tikal.
Wid ara ten-id-yessiwlen, ilaq ad ten-ɣren ddeqs n tikal.
Tid ara ten-id-yessiwlen, ilaq ad ten-ɣrent ddeqs n tikal.

Ur yeẓri d acu i as-d-ttheggin wussan.
Ur teẓri d acu i as-d-ttheggin wussan.

Tin ara d-yaɣen ssebbaḍ imaynuten, neqqar-as yeg Rebbi tesseɣres-iten.

Tid ara d-yaɣen ssebbaḍ imaynuten, neqqar-asent yeg Rebbi sseɣrsent-ten.

Ur teẓri anwa abrid ara taɣ.
Ur neẓri anwa abrid ara naɣ.

Ur teẓrim anwa abrid ara taɣem.
Ur teẓrimt anwa abrid ara taɣemt.

Ur ẓrint anwa abrid ara aɣent.

Bɣiɣ ad idireɣ d ilelli.
Bɣan ad idiren d ilelliyen.
Bɣant ad idirent d tilelliyin.
Yebɣa ad yidir d ilelli.
Tebɣa ad tidir d tilellit.

Ttayaleɣ ad sɛuɣ izerfan-inu akken ma llan.

Mi ur t-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra, yeččeḥ.
Mi ur tt-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra, teččeḥ.
Mi ur aɣ-id-ɛriḍen ara ɣer tmeɣra, neččeḥ.

Awer k-id-yaf lexrif a win ur nesɛi nnif.
Awer kem-id-yaf lexrif a tin ur nesɛi nnif.
Awer ken-id-yaf lexrif a wid ur nesɛi nnif.
Awer kent-id-yaf lexrif a tid ur nesɛi nnif.
Awer ten-id-yaf lexrif wid ur nesɛi nnif.
Awer tent-id-yaf lexrif tid ur nesɛi nnif.
Awer t-id-yaf lexrif win ur nesɛi nnif.
Awer tt-id-yaf lexrif tin ur nesɛi nnif.

Ur yebɣi ara ad temmet tmeslayt-is.
Ur yebɣi ara ad temmet tmeslayt-ines.
Ur tebɣi ara ad temmet tmeslayt-is.
Ur tebɣi ara ad temmet tmeslayt-ines.
Ur nebɣi ara ad temmet tmeslayt-nneɣ.
Ur nebɣi ara ad temmet tmeslayt-nteɣ.
Ur tebɣiḍ ara ad temmet tmeslayt-inek.
Ur tebɣiḍ ara ad temmet tmeslayt-inem.
Ur tebɣiḍ ara ad temmet tmeslayt-ik.
Ur tebɣiḍ ara ad temmet tmeslayt-im.
Ur tebɣim ara ad temmet tmeslayt-nken.
Ur tebɣimt ara ad temmet tmeslayt-nkent.
Ur tebɣim ara ad temmet tmeslayt-nwen.
Ur tebɣimt ara ad temmet tmeslayt-nwent.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad temmet tmeslayt-iw.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad temmet tmeslayt-inu.
Fkan tudert-nsen ɣef tmurt.
Fkant tudert-nsent ɣef tmurt.
Fkiɣ tudert-iw ɣef tmurt.
Fkiɣ tudert-inu ɣef tmurt.
Tefkiḍ tudert-ik ɣef tmurt.
Tefkiḍ tudert-inek ɣef tmurt.
Tefkiḍ tudert-im ɣef tmurt.
Tefkiḍ tudert-inem ɣef tmurt.
Tefkam tudert-nken ɣef tmurt.
Tefkamt tudert-nkent ɣef tmurt.
Tefkam tudert-nwen ɣef tmurt.
Tefkamt tudert-nwent ɣef tmurt.
Tefka tudert-is ɣef tmurt.
Tefka tudert-ines ɣef tmurt.
Yefka tudert-is ɣef tmurt.
Yefka tudert-ines ɣef tmurt.
Nefka tudert-nneɣ ɣef tmurt.
Nefka tudert-nteɣ ɣef tmurt.
Mmuten ɣef tmurt-nsen.
Mmutent ɣef tmurt-nsent.
Ad mmteɣ ɣef tmurt-iw.
Yemmut ɣef tmurt-is.
Temmut ɣef tmurt-is.
Ad nemmet ɣef tmurt-nneɣ.
Ad nemmet ɣef tmurt-nteɣ.
Temmuteḍ ɣef tmurt-ik.
Temmuteḍ ɣef tmurt-im.
Temmutem ɣef tmurt-nken.
Temmutemt ɣef tmurt-nkent.
Temmutem ɣef tmurt-nwen.
Temmutemt ɣef tmurt-nwent.
Telelli rran-tt-id i tmurt, maɛna nutni mmten.
Yeẓra ɣer lmut i iteddu.
Teẓra ɣer lmut i tetteddu.
Neẓra ɣer lmut i nteddu.
Teẓram ɣer lmut i tetteddum.
Teẓramt ɣer lmut i tetteddumt.
Teẓriḍ ɣer lmut i tettedduḍ.
Ẓriɣ ɣer lmut i tedduɣ.
Ẓran ɣer lmut i teddun.
Ẓrant ɣer lmut i teddunt.
Fkan iman-sen d asfel ɣef tmurt.
Fkant iman-sent d asfel ɣef tmurt.
Yefka iman-is d asfel ɣef tmurt.
Tefka iman-is d asfel ɣef tmurt.
Tefkam iman-nken d asfel ɣef tmurt.
Tefkamt iman-nkent d asfel ɣef tmurt.
Sebblen tirwiḥin-nsen ɣef tmurt.
Sebblent tirwiḥin-nsent ɣef tmurt.
Ad sebbleɣ tarwiḥt-iw ɣef tmurt.
Ad nsebbel tirwiḥin-nneɣ ɣef tmurt.
Ad nsebbel tirwiḥin-nteɣ ɣef tmurt.
Isebbel tarwiḥt-is ɣef tmurt.
Tsebbel tarwiḥt-is ɣef tmurt.

Nsebbel tirwiḥin-nteɣ ɣef tmurt.

Ruḥen d iseflan ɣef tmurt-nsen.

Acengu n daxel yugar win n berra.

Tuɣal d taǧǧalt kan akken meẓẓiyet.
Tameṭṭut ur nessidir ara, tin iwimi ttmettaten warraw-is mi ara d-lalen, tettssemmi Aɛrab, neɣ Akli i mmi-s ara d-ilalen akken ma yella tusa-d lmut ad t-tawi, ad t-id-taf kan s yisem-nni, ad t-tagad neɣ ad t-tɣunfu, ad tuɣal syin, ad t-teǧǧ ad yidir.
Ǧǧlent tullas ur qfilent ɛecrin.
Axabit yexdeɛ tamurt-is.
Axabit ixeddem i ucengu.
Axabit yedda d ucengu.
Deg ṭṭrad llan sin n yiberdan, abrid n tiferfent d ubrid n tixubta.

Tamurt teggra-d deg ufus n yixabiten.
Mi ruḥeɣ s aɣerbaz, kkiɣ ɣef umeddakel-iw.
Mi ruḥen s aɣerbaz, kkan ɣef umeddakel-nsen.
Mi ruḥent s aɣerbaz, kkant ɣef tmeddakelt-nsent.
Mi iruḥ s aɣerbaz, yekka ɣef umeddakel-is.
Mi iruḥ s aɣerbaz, yekka ɣef tmeddakelt-is.
Mi iruḥ s aɣerbaz, yekka ɣef tmeddakelt-ines.
Mi iruḥ s aɣerbaz, yekka ɣef umeddakel-ines.
Mi ruḥeɣ s aɣerbaz, kkiɣ ɣef umeddakel-inu.
Mi ruḥeɣ s aɣerbaz, kkiɣ ɣef tmeddakelt-iw.
Mi ruḥeɣ s aɣerbaz, kkiɣ ɣef tmeddakelt-inu.
Mi truḥ s aɣerbaz, tekka ɣef umeddakel-is.
Mi truḥ s aɣerbaz, tekka ɣef umeddakel-ines.
Mi truḥ s aɣerbaz, tekka ɣef tmeddakelt-is.
Mi truḥ s aɣerbaz, tekka ɣef tmeddakelt-ines.

Mi nruḥ s aɣerbaz, nekka ɣef umeddakel-nneɣ.
Mi nruḥ s aɣerbaz, nekka ɣef tmeddakelt-nteɣ.
Mi nruḥ s aɣerbaz, nekka ɣef umeddakel-nteɣ.
Mi truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz, tekkiḍ ɣef tmeddakelt-inek.
Mi truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz, tekkiḍ ɣef tmeddakelt-ik.
Mi truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz, tekkiḍ ɣef umeddakel-inek.
Mi truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz, tekkiḍ ɣef umeddakel-ik.
Mi truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz, tekkiḍ ɣef umeddakel-inem.
Mi truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz, tekkiḍ ɣef umeddakel-im.
Mi truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz, tekkiḍ ɣef tmeddakelt-im.
Mi truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz, tekkiḍ ɣef tmeddakelt-inem.
Mi truḥem s aɣerbaz, tekkam ɣef tmeddakelt-nken.
Mi truḥemt s aɣerbaz, tekkamt ɣef tmeddakelt-nkent.
Mi truḥem s aɣerbaz, tekkam ɣef umeddakel-nken.
Mi truḥemt s aɣerbaz, tekkamt ɣef umeddakel-nkent.

Mi truḥemt s aɣerbaz, tekkamt ɣef umeddakel-nwent.

Ugin ad neqqim akken nella.
Acimi i tugim ad neqqim akken nella ?

Tugim ad neqqim akken nella.

Nekk, ur bɣiɣ ara ad uɣaleɣ am kečč.
Akken i tḥemmleḍ iman-ik, i ḥemmleɣ iman-iw.
Ur ttnadiɣ ara ad beddleɣ, bɣiɣ ad qqimeɣ akken lliɣ.
Ur ttnadin ara ad beddlen, bɣan ad qqimen akken llan.
Ur ttnadint ara ad beddlent, bɣant ad qqiment akken llant.
Ur yettnadi ara ad ibeddel, yebɣa ad yeqqim akken yella.
Ur tettnadi ara ad tbeddel, tebɣa ad teqqim akken tella.
Ur nettnadi ara ad nbeddel, nebɣa ad neqqim akken nella.
Ur tettnadiḍ ara ad tbeddleḍ, tebɣiḍ ad teqqimeḍ akken telliḍ.
Ur tettnadim ara ad tbeddlem, tebɣam ad teqqimem akken tellam.
Ur tettnadimt ara ad tbeddlemt, tebɣamt ad teqqimemt akken tellamt.

Tazmert tif idrimen.
Yettɣiḍ win ur nesɛi tazmert.
Tettɣiḍ tin ur nesɛi tazmert.
Ttɣiḍen wid ur nesɛi tazmert.
Ttɣiḍent tid ur nesɛi tazmert.
Ma yuɣ-itent yiwen deg tezmert-is; abrid-is yenɣer s aẓekka.
Ma tuɣ-itent yiwet deg tezmert-is; abrid-is yenǧer s aẓekka.
Ma uɣen-tent kra deg tezmert-nsen; abrid-nsen yenǧer s aẓekka.
Ma uɣent-tent kra deg tezmert-nsent; abrid-nsent yenǧer s aẓekka.

Tin yuḍnen yettwali-tt umejjay.

Uḍnen aṭṭan n tayri.
Uḍnent aṭṭan n tayri.

Tin i t-iwalan ad tedhec.
Wid i t-iwalan ad dehcen.
Tid i t-iwalan ad dehcent.
Wid i tt-iwalan ad dehcen.
Tid i tt-iwalan ad dehcent.

Win i tt-iwalan ad yedhec.
Win i ten-iwalan ad yedhec.
Tin i ten-iwalan ad tedhec.
Wid i ten-iwalan ad dehcen.
Tid i ten-iwalan ad dehcent.
Wid i tent-iwalan ad dehcen.
Tid i tent-iwalan ad dehcent.
Tin i tent-iwalan ad tedhec.
Win i tent-iwalan ad yedhec.
Win i ken-iwalan ad yedhec.
Tin i ken-iwalan ad tedhec.

Wid i ken-iwalan ad dehcen.
Wid i kent-iwalan ad dehcen.
Tid i kent-iwalan ad dehcent.

Tid i kem-iwalan ad dehcent.
Wid i kem-iwalan ad dehcen.

Nekkni s Yimaziɣen nettwaḥqar, neqqar s tutlayt taberranit.
Kunwi s Yimaziɣen tettwaḥqarem, teqqarem s tutlayt taberranit mačči s tayla-nwen.
Kunemti s Tmaziɣin tettwaḥqaremt, teqqaremt s tutlayt taberranit mačči s tayla-nkent.
Nutni s Yimaziɣen ttwaḥqaren, qqaren s tutlayt taberranit mačči s tayla-nsen.
Nutenti s Tmaziɣin ttwaḥqarent, qqarent s tutlayt taberranit mačči s tayla-nsent.

Kunwi s Yimaziɣen tettwaḥqarem, teqqarem s tutlayt taberranit mačči s tayla-nken.

Tanelmadt Tamaziɣt tettwaḥqar, teqqar s tutlayt taberranit mačči s tayla-s.

I kečč tura d acu akka i tettarraḍ iman-ik ?

Ur tnudaḍ, ur tufiḍ.

Ma iɛedda wakud ur d-yettuɣal.
Akud yekkat yettɛedday.

Ur tufiḍ d acu i tzemrem, ad t-txedmem.

Ur tufiḍ d acu i yezmer, ad t-yexdem.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i nezmer, ad t-nexdem.

Ur tufiḍ d acu i zemrent, ad t-xedment.
Tura ḥḥah i d-wwḍeɣ.

Tura ḥḥah i d-wwḍent.

Ur iḥemmel ara ad yeqqim iman-is.

Ad kem-issiweḍ Ṛebbi ɣer lebɣi n wul-im.

Ad kent-issiweḍ Ṛebbi ɣer lebɣi n wulawen-nkent.

Ad kent-issiweḍ Ṛebbi ɣer lebɣi n wulawen-nwent.

Iclex-d afurek n telqent mi i iɛedda ad d-yekkes tabexsist.
Teclex-d afurek n telqent mi i tɛedda ad d-tekkes tabexsist.
Neclex-d afurek n telqent mi i nɛedda ad d-nekkes tibexsisin.
Tcelxeḍ-d afurek n telqent mi i tɛeddaḍ ad d-tekkseḍ tabexsist.
Celxeɣ-d afurek n telqent mi i ɛeddaɣ ad d-kkseɣ tabexsist.
Celxen-d afurek n telqent mi i ɛeddan ad d-kksen tibexsisin.
Celxent-d afurek n telqent mi i ɛeddant ad d-kksent tibexsisin.
Tcelxem-d ifurkan n telqent mi i tɛeddam ad d-tekksem tibexsisin.
Tcelxemt-d ifurkan n telqent mi i tɛeddamt ad d-tekksemt tibexsisin.

Mi i tɛedda ad d-telwi iniɣman, teclex-d acḥal d afurek.
Mi i nɛedda ad d-nelwi iniɣman, neclex-d acḥal d afurek.
Mi i tɛeddaḍ ad d-telwiḍ iniɣman, tcelxeḍ-d acḥal d afurek.
Mi i tɛeddam ad d-telwim iniɣman, tcelxem-d acḥal d afurek.
Mi i tɛeddamt ad d-telwimt iniɣman, tcelxemt-d acḥal d afurek.
Mi i ɛeddaɣ ad d-lwiɣ iniɣman, celxeɣ-d acḥal d afurek.
Mi i ɛeddan ad d-lwin iniɣman, celxen-d acḥal d afurek.

Ldim tiwwura n yisekrafen ad d-ffɣen yimelsa.
Imelsa teggarem-ten daxel n usekraf, ma d imenɣanen ttcalin berra.
D acu-tt tmurt-agi ? Amelsi a-t-an deg usekraf ma d amenɣan a-t-an berra yettcali.
Imelsa ggaren-ten daxel n usekraf, ma d imenɣanen ttcalin berra.
Amelsi ggaren-t daxel n usekraf, ma d amenɣan unfen-as yettcali berra.
Amelsi teggarem-t daxel n usekraf, ma d amenɣan tunfem-as yettcali berra.
Gren-tt ɣer lḥebs deg lbaṭel.
Gren-tent ɣer lḥebs deg lbaṭel.
Gren-k ɣer lḥebs deg lbaṭel.
Gren-kem ɣer lḥebs deg lbaṭel.
Gren-ken ɣer lḥebs deg lbaṭel.
Gren-kent ɣer lḥebs deg lbaṭel.
Gren-iyi ɣer lḥebs deg lbaṭel.
Gren-aɣ ɣer lḥebs deg lbaṭel.
Ldimt tiwwura n yisekrafen ad d-ffɣen yimelsa.
Ldit tiwwura n yisekrafen ad d-ffɣen yimelsa.
Ldi tiwwura n yisekrafen ad d-ffɣen yimelsa.
Wid ur nexdim kra, ur ilaq ara ad d-ggrin deg leḥbus.
Tid ur nexdim kra, ur ilaq ara ad d-ggrint deg leḥbus.
Win ur nexdim kra, ur ilaq ara ad d-yeggri deg leḥbus.
Tin ur nexdim kra, ur ilaq ara ad d-teggri deg leḥbus.
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedmeɣ, acimi ara iyi-tegrem ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedmen, acimi ara ten-tegrem ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedment, acimi ara tent-tegrem ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i yexdem, acimi ara t-tegrem ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i texdem, acimi ara tt-tegrem ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i nexdem, acimi ara aɣ-tegrem ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmeḍ, acimi ara k-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmeḍ, acimi ara kem-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmem, acimi ara ken-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i txedmemt, acimi ara kent-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i texdem, acimi ara tt-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i yexdem, acimi ara t-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i nexdem, acimi ara aɣ-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedmeɣ, acimi ara iyi-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedmen, acimi ara ten-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Ur tufiḍ d acu i xedment, acimi ara tent-gren ɣer lḥebs ?
Tamurt-nneɣ akken ma tella d lḥebs.
Win i irewlen ɣef tmurt am win i d-irewlen seg lḥebs.
Tin i irewlen ɣef tmurt am tin i d-irewlen seg lḥebs.
Wid i irewlen ɣef tmurt am wid i d-irewlen seg lḥebs.
Tid i irewlen ɣef tmurt am tid i d-irewlen seg lḥebs.
Leḥkem ibedden ɣef lbaṭel, ur yettdum ara.
Leqbayel rwan lbaṭel.
Leḥkem amesbaṭli, yerẓa Aqbayli.
D imɣaren i yettḍebbiren ɣef tmurt.
D awal n uwessur i yettɛeddayen.
Ilemẓi ur yesɛi amkan deg tmurt-is.

Ur ilaq ara ad teqqim akka.

Tebdam-tt-id, ilaq ad tt-tfakkem.

Yettmuqul-d ɣur-sent s timuɣbent.
Ur ttemlaɛin ara.
Ur ttemlaɛin ara, nnuɣen.
Ur ttemlaɛint ara, nnuɣent.
Ur nettemlaɛi ara, nennuɣ.
Ur nennuɣ, ur nettemlaɛi.
Ur nnuɣen, ur ttemlaɛin.
Ur tennuɣem, ur tettemlaɛim.

Akken i txedmeḍ tweḥleḍ a winnat.

Lulen-d akken ad mmten.
Tluleḍ-d akken ad temmteḍ.

Taḥbult n tmellalin nettheggi-tt-id s lfarina neɣ awren yerwin deg waman d zzit iwimi nrennu tamettunt d tisent, nqellu-tt-id deg taggara deg zzit irekmen.
Taḥbult n lmerqa d taḥbult n tmellalin i d-nettheggi deg lmerqa yesɛan aman, zzit, tisent, aẓalim d yifelfel azeggaɣ ineɣden.
Teffeɣ Faḍma deg yiwackanen.
Tella ur tessin tigert, tuɣal telmed.
Yella ur yessin tigert, yuɣal yelmed.
Nella ur nessin tigert, nuɣal nelmed.
Tellam ur tessinem tigert, tuɣalem tlemdem.
Tellamt ur tessinemt tigert, tuɣalemt tlemdemt.
Telliḍ ur tessineḍ tigert, tuɣaleḍ tlemded.
Lliɣ ur ssineɣ tigert, uɣaleɣ lemdeɣ.
Llan ur ssinen tigert, uɣalen lemden.
Llant ur ssinent tigert, uɣalent lemdent.
Imejɛuren n tmucuha ffɣen-d ɣer ddunit n tidet.
Waɣzen n ddunit-a yugar win n tmucuha deg tizeɣzeɣt.
Ttaḍsen medden ɣef win yettnamaren deg yigenwan iṭiǰ d yitran.
Mi ara d-iṣṣub win yezdin d yitran ɣer tmurt, tɛerreq-as ula d tikli sdat n medden.
Fkan rray i wid ur nessin tigert deg temsalt n tmaziɣt, ma d wid iẓẓewren rran-ten deg ṭṭerf akken tamaziɣt ad tkubb ɣef uqadum.

Nefka afus deg-neɣ.
Ma neqqim d nneyyat, ad aɣ-lsen am wulli.
Ma teqqimem d nneyyat, ad ken-lsen am wulli.
Ma qqimen d nneyyat, ad ten-lsen am wulli.
Deg uxemmem-nsen, d nutni kan i yellan, ulac wiyiḍ.
Deg uxemmem-nwen, d kunwi kan i yellan, ulac wiyiḍ.
Deg uxemmem-nken, d kunwi kan i yellan, ulac wiyiḍ.
Wissen melmi ara iyi-d-twaliḍ akken lliɣ mačči akken i tebɣiḍ ad iliɣ.
Wissen melmi ara iyi-d-twalim akken lliɣ mačči akken i tebɣam ad iliɣ.
Wissen melmi ara iyi-d-twalimt akken lliɣ mačči akken i tebɣamt ad iliɣ.
Wissen melmi ara iyi-d-twali akken lliɣ mačči akken i tebɣa ad iliɣ.
Wissen melmi ara iyi-d-iwali akken lliɣ mačči akken i yebɣa ad iliɣ.
Wissen melmi ara aɣ-d-twali akken nella mačči akken i tebɣa ad nili.
Wissen melmi ara aɣ-d-iwali akken nella mačči akken i yebɣa ad nili.
Wissen melmi ara aɣ-d-twaliḍ akken nella mačči akken i tebɣiḍ ad nili.
Wissen melmi ara aɣ-d-twalim akken nella mačči akken i tebɣam ad nili.
Wissen melmi ara aɣ-d-twalimt akken nella mačči akken i tebɣamt ad nili.
Wissen melmi ara aɣ-d-walin akken nella mačči akken i bɣan ad nili.
Wissen melmi ara aɣ-d-walint akken nella mačči akken i bɣant ad nili.
Wissen melmi ara iyi-d-walin akken lliɣ mačči akken i bɣan ad iliɣ.
Wissen melmi ara iyi-d-walint akken lliɣ mačči akken i bɣant ad iliɣ.
Kkaten ad nili akken i bɣan.
Kkaten ad yili akken i bɣan.
Kkaten ad tili akken i bɣan.

Tekkat ad iliɣ akken i tebɣa.

Amennuɣ mazal ur ifukk.

Wid yesɛan tazerfa tamazrayt neqqen deg-sen yiwen yiwen.
Tagrawla n furar ilaq ad taweḍ s iswi.
Ilaq ad nawi abrid n tugdut.
Ilaq ad tawim abrid n tugdut.
Ilaq ad awin abrid n tugdut.
Aṭas n tmura n umaḍal i iɣunzan tugdut.
Timura iḍefren abrid n tugdut, ufant iman-nsent.
Amzun d mejɛer i yettḍebbiren deg tmurt-nneɣ.

Ilaq ad yaɣ usenfar ametti abrid n tugdut.

Ad d-nekker kan, ad d-naf iman-nneɣ nefcel.
Ad d-nekker kan, ad d-naf iman-nneɣ neɛya.
Ad d-yekker kan, ad d-yaf iman-is yefcel.
Ad d-yekker kan, ad d-yaf iman-is yeɛya.
Ad d-tekker kan, ad d-yaf iman-is tefcel.
Ad d-tekker kan, ad d-yaf iman-is teɛyal.
Ad d-tekkreḍ kan, ad d-tafeḍ iman-ik tfecleḍ.
Ad d-tekkreḍ kan, ad d-tafeḍ iman-ik teɛyiḍ.
Ad d-tekkreḍ kan, ad d-tafeḍ iman-im tfecleḍ.
Ad d-tekkreḍ kan, ad d-tafeḍ iman-im teɛyiḍ.
Deg tmurt-nneɣ, aselmad ur yerbiḥ yiwet.

Ad d-tekkremt kan, ad d-tafemt iman-nkent teɛyamt.

Ad d-tekkremt kan, ad d-tafemt iman-nwent teɛyamt.
Ad d-kkreɣ kan, ad d-afeɣ iman-iw ɛyiɣ.
Ad d-kkreɣ kan, ad d-afeɣ iman-iw fecleɣ.
Ad d-kkren kan, ad d-afen iman-nsen feclen.

Ad d-kkrent kan, ad d-afent iman-nsent feclent.
