Tafsut d asefru n tayri.
Agama yettaki-d deg tsemhuyt n tefsut.
I yifen akk tisemhay d tafsut.
Deg tefsut i d-yettaki ugama.
Mi ara teffeɣ tegrest d tafsut i d-ikeččmen.
Yeffeɣ usemmiḍ.
Tekcem-d tefsut.
Leqbayel ttmmagaren tafsut s tumert.
Deg ukeččum n tefsut nettegliliz ɣef rrbiɛ.
Deg umenzu n tefsut, teffɣen medden ɣef lexlawi.
Deg umenzu n tefsut, teffɣen medden ɣef lexlawi akken ad mmagren tasemhuyt i d-ikecmen.
Deg umenzu n tefsut nettnawal ameqful s tmellalin.
Deg umenzu n tefsut tettnawalem ameqful s tmellalin.
Deg umenzu n tefsut tettnawalemt ameqful s tmellalin.
Deg umenzu n tefsut ttnawalen ameqful s tmellalin.
Deg umenzu n tefsut ttnawalent ameqful s tmellalin.
Amenzu n tefsut sfugulen-t akk deg tmurt n Leqbayel.
Nennum nettmmagar tafsut.
Tasemhuyt yifen akk tisemhay d tafsut.
Tagellidt n tsemhay d tafsut.
Melmi ara d-tekcem tefsut ?
Melmi ara teffeɣ tegrest.
Melmi ara ifakk usemmiḍ ?
Ilaq ad d-nerr akk insayen-nneɣ.
Teqqiṃeḍ almi i tseggem tikli-k, tekkreḍ ad tuɣaleḍ ansa i d-tekkiḍ.
Yiwen am nekk, bɣiɣ ad tkemmleḍ amecwar yid-neɣ alma newweḍ anda i ilaq ad naweḍ.
Yal yiwen s ṛṛay-is.
Tal yiwet s ṛṛay-is.
Teqqiṃeḍ almi i tseggem tikli-m, tekkreḍ ad tuɣaleḍ ansa i d-tekkiḍ.
Teqqiṃem almi i tseggem tikli-nken, tekkrem ad tuɣalem ansa i d-tekkam.
Teqqiṃemt almi i tseggem tikli-nkent, tekkremt ad tuɣalemt ansa i d-tekkamt.
Teqqiṃem almi i tseggem tikli-nwen, tekkrem ad tuɣalem ansa i d-tekkam.
Teqqiṃemt almi i tseggem tikli-nwent, tekkremt ad tuɣalemt ansa i d-tekkamt.
Qqiṃeɣ almi i tseggem tikli-iw, kkreɣ ad uɣaleɣ ansa i d-kkiɣ.
Qqiṃeɣ almi i tseggem tikli-inu, kkreɣ ad uɣaleɣ ansa i d-kkiɣ.
D tismuhbelt i yebɣan akka.
Qqiṃen almi i tseggem tikli-nsen, kkren ad uɣalen ansa i d-kkan.
Qqiṃent almi i tseggem tikli-nsent, kkrent ad uɣalent ansa i d-kkant.
Teqqiṃ almi i tseggem tikli-s, tekker ad tuɣal ansa i d-tekka.
Teqqiṃ almi i tseggem tikli-ines, tekker ad tuɣal ansa i d-tekka.
Yeqqiṃ almi i tseggem tikli-ines, yekker ad yuɣal ansa i d-yekka.
Yeqqiṃ almi i tseggem tikli-s, yekker ad yuɣal ansa i d-yekka.
Neqqiṃ almi i tseggem tikli-nneɣ, nekker ad nuɣal ansa i d-nekka.
Neqqiṃ almi i tseggem tikli-nteɣ, nekker ad nuɣal ansa i d-nekka.
Teqqiṃeḍ almi i tseggem tikli-inek, tekkreḍ ad tuɣaleḍ ansa i d-tekkiḍ.
Teqqiṃeḍ almi i tseggem tikli-inem, tekkreḍ ad tuɣaleḍ ansa i d-tekkiḍ.
Bɣiɣ ad tkemmleḍ amecwar yid-neɣ alma newweḍ anda i ilaq ad naweḍ.
Bɣan ad tkemmleḍ amecwar yid-sen alma tewwḍem anda i ilaq ad tawḍem.
Bɣant ad tkemmleḍ amecwar yid-sent alma tewwḍem anda i ilaq ad tawḍem.
Yebɣa ad tkemmleḍ amecwar yid-s alma tewwḍem anda i ilaq ad tawḍem.
Ass-a d sed ur teqqareḍ ara.
Wissen ma teqqareḍ deg uxxam ?
Nfukk ikayaden-nneɣ.
Nfukk ikayaden-nteɣ.
Tebɣa ad tkemmleḍ amecwar yid-s alma tewwḍem anda i ilaq ad tawḍem.
Nebɣa ad tkemmleḍ amecwar yid-neɣ alma newweḍ anda i ilaq ad naweḍ.
Nebɣa ad tkemmleḍ amecwar yid-nteɣ alma newweḍ anda i ilaq ad naweḍ.
Teḍra yid-neɣ am yiselman deg yilel, ameqqran yečča amecṭuḥ.
Teḍra yid-sen am yiselman deg yilel, ameqqran yečča amecṭuḥ.
Teḍra yid-ken am yiselman deg yilel, ameqqran yečča amecṭuḥ.
Teḍra yid-wen am yiselman deg yilel, ameqqran yečča amecṭuḥ.
Win iḥercen yezwir deg yiman-is.
Tin iḥercen tezwir deg yiman-is.
Wid iḥercen zwiren deg yiman-nsen.
Tid iḥercen zwirent deg yiman-nsent.
Ssneɣ abrid ara awiɣ.
Ssnen abrid ara awin.
Ssnent abrid ara awint.
Yessen abrid ara yawi.
Tessen abrid ara tawi.
Nessen abrid ara nawi.
Tessneḍ abrid ara tawiḍ.
Tessnem abrid ara tawim.
Tessnemt abrid ara tawimt
Yettnadi ɣef yizerfan n tlawin, yeɛfes wid n tmeṭṭut-is.
Izerfan n tmeṭṭut-is d uletma-s irkeḍ-iten, yekkat ɣef yizerfan n tlawin ad ilin.
Tettnadiḍ ɣef yizerfan n tlawin, kečč tɛefseḍ ɣef wid n tmeṭṭut-ik.
Tettnadim ɣef yizerfan n tlawin, kunwi tɛefsem ɣef wid n tlawi-nwen.
Tettnadim ɣef yizerfan n tlawin, kunwi tɛefsem ɣef wid n tlawin-nken.
Ttnadin ɣef yizerfan n tlawin s umata, nutnii ɛefsen ɣef wid n tlawin-nsen.
Izerfan n tmeṭṭut-ik d uletma-k trekḍeḍ-ten, tekkateḍ ɣef yizerfan n tlawin ad ilin.
Izerfan n tlawin-nwen d yessetma-twen trekḍem-ten, tekkatem ɣef yizerfan n tlawin ad ilin.
Izerfan n tlawin-nken d yessetma-tken trekḍem-ten, tekkatem ɣef yizerfan n tlawin ad ilin.
Izerfan n tlawin-nsen d yessetma-tsen rekḍen-ten, kkaten ɣef yizerfan n tlawin ad ilin.
Aɣbel n tmeṭṭut deg tmurt-nneɣ d aṣaḍuf n twacult.
D aṣaḍuf n twacult deg tmurt-nneɣ i d aɣbel n tlawin.
Yal yiwen d acu i d tamuɣli-ines ɣef kra neɣ kra.
Tal yiwet d acu i d tamuɣli-ines ɣef kra neɣ kra.
Timuɣliwin n yimdanen mgaradent.
Tameɣra n tlawin d tameggazt.
Tameɣra n tlawin d tamerbuḥt.
Ma d abrid yelhan i tewwiḍ, nekk aql-i deffir-k.
Ma d abrid isuffuɣen i tewwiḍ, nekk aql-i deffir-k.
Ma d abrid yelhan i tewwim, nekk aql-i deffir-ken.
Ma d abrid yelhan i tewwimt, nekk aql-i deffir-kent.
Ma d abrid isuffuɣen i tewwim, nekk aql-i deffir-ken.
Ma d abrid isuffuɣen i tewwimt, nekk aql-i deffir-kent.
Ma d abrid isuffuɣen i tewwim, nekk aql-i deffir-wen.
Ma d abrid isuffuɣen i tewwimt, nekk aql-i deffir-went.
Ma d abrid yelhan i tewwim, nekk aql-i deffir-wen.
Ma d abrid yelhan i tewwimt, nekk aql-i deffir-went.
Ma d abrid yelhan i wwin, nekk aql-i deffir-sen.
Ma d abrid yelhan i wwint, nekk aql-i deffir-sent.
Ma d abrid isuffuɣen i wwin, nekk aql-i deffir-sen.

Cwi kan ur k-id-yefki ara Ṛebbi d tameṭṭut deg Zzayer.
Cwi kan ur t-id-yefki ara Ṛebbi d tameṭṭut deg Zzayer.
Cwi kan ur aɣ-d-yefki ara Ṛebbi d tilawin deg Zzayer.
Cwi kan ur ken-id-yefki ara Ṛebbi d tilawin deg Zzayer.
Cwi kan ur ten-id-yefki ara Ṛebbi d tilawin deg Zzayer.

Ixdeɛ-itt zher-is mi tt-id-yefka Ṛebbi d tameṭṭut deg Zzayer.

Gneɣ ɣer lqaɛa, mi d-kkreɣ, ufiɣ-d akk iman-iw segreɣ.
Gnen ɣer lqaɛa, mi d-kkren, ufan-d akk iman-nsen segren.
Gnent ɣer lqaɛa, mi d-kkrent, ufant-d akk iman-nsent segrent.
Aɛrur n ufus-is azelmaḍ iwerrek d tifiḍliwin.
Aɛrur n ufus-is ayeffus yeččur d tifiḍliwin.
Aɛrur n ufus-ik azelmaḍ iwerrek d tifiḍliwin.
Aɛrur n ufus-im azelmaḍ iwerrek d tifiḍliwin.
Aɛrur n ufus-ik ayeffus yeččur d tifiḍliwin.
Aɛrur n ufus-im ayeffus yeččur d tifiḍliwin.
Aɛrur n ufus-iw ayeffus yeččur d tifiḍliwin.
Aɛrur n ufus-iw azelmaḍ iwerrek d tifiḍliwin.

Tuččḥa-k d tayla-w ur mgaradent ara deg waṭas n tlufa.

Tilawin seg zik ttwaḥeqrent.

Aṣaḍuf n twacult iɣurr tameṭṭut deg yizerfan-is.

Tezmer i yiman-is.

Nezmer i yiman-nteɣ.

Tzemreḍ i yiman-im.

Tzemremt i yiman-nkent.

Tzemremt i yiman-nwent.
Zemreḍ i yiman-iw.
Zemren i yiman-nsen.
Zemrent i yiman-nsent.
S yiles aẓidan, tzemreḍ ad teṭṭḍeḍ tasedda.
S yiles aẓidan, tzemrem ad teṭṭḍem tisedwin.
S yiles aẓidan, tzemremt ad teṭṭḍemt tisedwin.
S yiles aẓidan, tezmer ad teṭṭeḍ tasedda.
S yiles aẓidan, yezmer ad yeṭṭeḍ tasedda.
S yiles aẓidan, nezmer ad neṭṭeḍ tisedwin.

S yiles aẓidan, zemrent ad ṭṭḍent tisedwin.

Ulac tin i tt-yugaren deg cceḥḥa.

Tilawt tɛedda tasugna.
Yessen ala tiɛbac.
Tessen ala tiɛbac.

Tin yewwi wasif, tettaṭṭaf ula deg uzrem.
Wid yewwi wasif, ttaṭṭafen ula deg yizerman.
Tid yewwi wasif, ttaṭṭafent ula deg yizerman.

Teḍra yid-s am uɣyul n uɣalad, ur yečči, ur yeglalez.
Aɣyul yettwaqqnen ɣef yiri n uɣalad, ur ittaf d acu ara yečč, ur ittaf amek ara yeglilez.
Teḍra yid-i am uɣyul n uɣalad, ur yečči, ur yeglalez.
Teḍra yid-k am uɣyul n uɣalad, ur yečči, ur yeglalez.
Teḍra yid-k am uɣyul itetten deg tbarda-s.
Teḍra yid-m am uɣyul itetten deg tbarda-s.
Teḍra yid-s am uɣyul itetten deg tbarda-s.

Kra n tin ur nettxemmimen ara am kemm d tacengut.
Kra n wid ur nettxemmimen ara am kunwi d icenga.
Kra n tid ur nettxemmimen ara am kunemti d ticenga.

Kra tenna yewwi-t waḍu.

Akka d tasawent, ur iyi-d-ttak ara aslem, ini-iyi-d amek ara t-id-ṭṭfeɣ.
Akka d tasawent, ur s-d-ttak ara aslem, ini-as-d amek ara t-id-yeṭṭef.
Akka d tasawent, ur sen-d-ttak ara iselman, ini-asen-d amek ara ten-id-ṭṭfen.
Akka d tasawent, ur sent-d-ttak ara iselman, ini-asent-d amek ara ten-id-ṭṭfent.
Akka d tasawent, ur ɣ-d-ttak ara iselman, ini-aɣ-d amek ara ten-id-neṭṭef.

Menyif ad aɣ-tesslemdeḍ amek ara d-neṭṭef aslem wala ad aɣ-t-id-tefkeḍ d tikci.
Menyif ad as-tesslemdeḍ amek ara d-teṭṭef aslem wala ad as-t-id-tefkeḍ d tikci.
Menyif ad asen-tesslemdeḍ amek ara d-ṭṭfen aslem wala ad asen-t-id-tefkeḍ d tikci.
Menyif ad asent-tesslemdeḍ amek ara d-ṭṭfent aslem wala ad asent-t-id-tefkeḍ d tikci.

Menyif ad akent-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfemt aslem wala ad akent-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad awen-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfem aslem wala ad awen-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad awent-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfemt aslem wala ad awent-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad ak-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfeḍ aslem wala ad ak-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad am-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭfeḍ aslem wala ad am-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad as-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-teṭṭef aslem wala ad as-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad as-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-yeṭṭef aslem wala ad as-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad asen-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-ṭṭfen aslem wala ad asen-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.
Menyif ad asent-sslemdeɣ amek ara d-ṭṭfent aslem wala ad asent-t-id-fkeɣ d tikci.

Wissen ma testufaḍ ?

Iger-ik-id ger wallen-is.

Lebṣel abeɛli, taxsayt tabeɛlit, d izegza ur nesteḥq ara ad ten-nessew.
Iger abeɛli, d win i ttun waman.
Dderya tabeɛlit neɣ ibeɛliyen, d arrac yeweɛren, ur d-ṭṭiḍen ɣer yemma-tsen.
Taɣlalt d yiwet n turart taqburt i tturaren at zik.
Taɣlalt d yiwen uɛekkaz iɛekfen cwiṭ deg yiwen yixef, yis-s nezzuɣur deg umrij taqrenǧet, yiwet n tebɣalt n usɣar.
Abeɛli, d ayen ur neḥlaǧ ara aman am amqerqur abeɛli, lebṣel abeɛli...
Llan kra n yimɣaren iwessura, ar ass-a akka i qqaren, tal tamurt, tal tagnit...

Ar tura tettent tkerkas-nsent.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-nken.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-nkent.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-nwen.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-nwent.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-is.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-ik.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-im.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-iw.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-nneɣ.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-nteɣ.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-inu
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-ines.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-inek.
Ar tura tettent tkerkas-inem.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-nwen.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-nwent.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-nken.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-nkent.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-nsen.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-ik.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-inek.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-im.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-inem.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-is.
Neɛya seg tkerkas-ines.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-nsen.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-nsent.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-nken.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-nkent.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-nwen.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-nwent.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-ik.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-inek.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-im.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-inem.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-is.
Neɛya seg lekdubat-ines.
Neẓra teɛyam deg lekdubat-nneɣ.
Neẓra teɛyam deg lekdubat-nteɣ.
Neẓra teɛyam deg lekdubat-iw.
Neẓra teɛyam deg lekdubat-inu.
Neẓra teɛyam deg lekdubat-nsen.
Neẓra teɛyam deg lekdubat-nsent.
Neẓra teɛyam deg lekdubat-is.
Neẓra teɛyam deg lekdubat-ines.
Wissen melmi ara fakken tikerkas-nsen ?
Wissen melmi ara fakkent tikerkas-nsent ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakkem tikerkas-nken ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakkemt tikerkas-nkent ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakkem tikerkas-nwen ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakkemt tikerkas-nwent ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakkeḍ tikerkas-ik ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakkeḍ tikerkas-inek ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakkeḍ tikerkas-im ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakkeḍ tikerkas-inem ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakk tikerkas-is ?
Wissen melmi ara tfakk tikerkas-ines ?
Wissen melmi ara ifakk tikerkas-is ?
Wissen melmi ara ifakk tikerkas-ines ?
Wissen melmi ara fakkeɣ tikerkas-iw ?
Wissen melmi ara fakkeɣ tikerkas-inu ?
Wissen melmi ara nfakk tikerkas-nneɣ ?
Wissen melmi ara nfakk tikerkas-nteɣ ?
Win yessnen kra, yini-t i wayeḍ.
Ma tebɣiḍ ad d-tawiḍ akayad-ik, ilaq ad t-theggiḍ akken i ilaq.
Tin yessnen kra, tini-t i tayeḍ.
Wid yessnen kra, inin-t i wiyaḍ.
Tid yessnen kra, inint-t i tiyaḍ.
Ma tebɣiḍ ad d-tawiḍ akayad-im, ilaq ad t-theggiḍ akken i ilaq.
Ma tebɣam ad d-tawim akayad-nken, ilaq ad t-theggim akken i ilaq.
Ma tebɣamt ad d-tawimt akayad-nkent, ilaq ad t-theggimt akken i ilaq.
Ma tebɣam ad d-tawim akayad-nwen, ilaq ad t-theggim akken i ilaq.
Ma tebɣamt ad d-tawimt akayad-nwent, ilaq ad t-theggimt akken i ilaq.
Ma bɣiɣ ad d-awiɣ akayad-iw, ilaq ad t-heggiɣ akken i ilaq.
Ma bɣiɣ ad d-awiɣ akayad-inu, ilaq ad t-heggiɣ akken i ilaq.
Ma bɣan ad d-awin akayad-nsen, ilaq ad t-heggin akken i ilaq.
Ma bɣant ad d-awint akayad-nsent, ilaq ad t-heggint akken i ilaq.
Ma yebɣa ad d-yawi akayad-is, ilaq ad t-iheggi akken i ilaq.
Ma yebɣa ad d-yawi akayad-ines, ilaq ad t-iheggi akken i ilaq.
Ma tebɣa ad d-tawi akayad-is, ilaq ad t-theggi akken i ilaq.
Ma tebɣa ad d-tawi akayad-ines, ilaq ad t-theggi akken i ilaq.
Ma nebɣa ad d-nawi akayad-nneɣ, ilaq ad t-nheggi akken i ilaq.
Ma nebɣa ad d-nawi akayad-nteɣ, ilaq ad t-nheggi akken i ilaq.
Ma tebɣiḍ ad d-tawiḍ akayad-inem, ilaq ad t-theggiḍ akken i ilaq.
Ma tebɣiḍ ad d-tawiḍ akayad-inek, ilaq ad t-theggiḍ akken i ilaq.
Ameddakel n umeddakel-iw, d ameddakel-iw.
Acengu n umeddakel-iw, d acengu-w.
Acengu n umeddakel-inu, d acengu-inu.
Ameddakel n umeddakel-inu, d ameddakel-inu.
Ameddakel n ucengu-inu, d acengu-inu.
Acengu n ucengu-inu, d ameddakel-iw.
Acengu n ucengu-inu, d ameddakel-inu.
Tikwal ameddakel-iw yif gma.
Tikwal ameddakel-inu yif gma.
Tikwal imeddukal ifen atmaten.
Ur d-ireffed ara allen-is sdat n baba-s.
Ur d-treffed ara allen-is sdat n baba-s.
Ur d-nreffed ara allen-nneɣ sdat n baba-tneɣ.
Ur d-nreffed ara allen-nneɣ sdat n baba-tenteɣ.
Ur d-treffdeḍ ara allen-ik sdat n baba-k.
Ur d-treffdeḍ ara allen-inek sdat n baba-k.
Ur d-treffdeḍ ara allen-im sdat n baba-m.
Ur d-treffdeḍ ara allen-inem sdat n baba-m.
Ur d-ireffed ara allen-ines sdat n baba-s.
Ur d-treffed ara allen-ines sdat n baba-s.
Ur d-treffdem ara allen-nken sdat n baba-tken.
Ur d-treffdemt ara allen-nkent sdat n baba-tkent.
Ur d-treffdem ara allen-nwen sdat n baba-twen.
Ur d-treffdemt ara allen-nwent sdat n baba-twent.
Ur d-reffdeɣ ara allen-iw sdat n baba.
Ur d-reffdeɣ ara allen-inu sdat n baba.
Ur d-reffden ara allen-nsen sdat n baba-tsen.
Ur d-reffdent ara allen-nsent sdat n baba-tsent.
Amcic ɣur-s sebɛa leṛwaḥ.
Ṛṛuḥ-is yeṭṭef ɣer yiwen uẓar.
D yiwen n uẓar i yeṭṭfen ṛṛuḥ-is ur iṛuḥ ara.
